[03] 61^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^passati passo^eb^ti passati sammādiṭṭhiyā dhamme aviparītaṃ jānāti bujjhatīti passo, dassanasampanno ariyo, so ^b^passantaṃ^eb^ aviparītadassāviṃ ``ayaṃ aviparītadassāvī''ti passati paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti. na kevalaṃ passantameva, atha kho ^b^apassantañca^eb^ passati, yo paññācakkhuvirahito dhamme yathāsabhāvato na passati, tampi apassantaṃ puthujjanaṃ ``andho vatāyaṃ bhavaṃ acakkhuko''ti attano paññācakkhunā passati. ^b^apassanto apassantaṃ, passantañca na passatī^eb^ti apassanto paññācakkhurahito andhabālo tādisaṃ andhabālaṃ ayaṃ dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato na passatīti yathā apassantaṃ na passati na jānāti, evaṃ attano paññācakkhunā dhammādhammaṃ yathāsabhāvato passantañca paṇḍitaṃ ``ayaṃ evaṃvidho''ti na passati na jānāti, tasmā ahampi pubbe dassanarahito sakalaṃ ñeyyaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ apassantampi pūraṇādiṃ yathāsabhāvato na passiṃ, idāni pana buddhānubhāvena sampanno ubhayepi yathāsabhāvato passāmīti sevitabbāsevitabbesu attano aviparītapaṭipattiṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^ekakā^eb^ ^a^M1.0178^ea^ ^a^V1.0151^ea^ ^a^P1.0152^ea^ ^b^mayaṃ araññe^eb^ti āyasmato vajjiputtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāgapupphakesarehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amaccakule nibbatti, ^b^vajjiputto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vesāliyā avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati. tena ca samayena vesāliyaṃ ussavo ahosi. tattha tattha naccagītavāditaṃ pavattati, mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho ussavasampattiṃ paccanubhoti, taṃ sutvā so bhikkhu ayoniso ummujjanto vivekaṃ vajjamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā attano anabhiratiṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ.
[22] etādisikāya rattiyā, ko su nāma amhehi pāpiyo''ti.. -- gāthamāha.
[01] taṃ sutvā vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anukampamānā ``yadipi, tvaṃ bhikkhu, araññavāsaṃ hīḷento vadasi, vivekakāmā pana viddasuno taṃ bahu maññantiyevā''ti imamatthaṃ dassentī --
[21] ``ekako tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ.
[22] tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina''nti.. --

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā, ``kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, bhikkhu, niyyānike sammāsambuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā aniyyānikaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakkessasī''ti santajjentī saṃvejesi ^a^M1.0179^ea^. evaṃ so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṃvejito kasābhihato viya bhadro assājānīyo vipassanāvīthiṃ ^a^P1.0153^ea^ otaritvā nacirasseva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.11.62-66) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ``ayaṃ me arahattappattiyā aṅkuso jāto''ti attano devatāya ca vuttanayaṃ saṃkaḍḍhitvā --
[21] ``ekakā mayaṃ araññe viharāma, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ.
[22] tassa me bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina''nti.. --

[03] tassattho -- anapekkhabhāvena vane chaḍḍitadārukkhaṇḍaṃ viya yadipi ^b^mayaṃ ekakā^eb^ ekākino asahāyā imasmiṃ ^b^araññe viharāma,^eb^ evaṃ viharato pana ^b^tassa me bahukā pihayanti^eb^ maṃ bahū atthakāmarūpā kulaputtā abhipatthenti, ``aho vatassa mayampi vajjiputtatthero viya gharabandhanaṃ pahāya araññe vihareyyāmā''ti. yathā kiṃ? ^b^nerayikā viya saggagāminaṃ,^eb^ yathā nāma nerayikā attano pāpakammena niraye nibbattasattā saggagāmīnaṃ saggūpagāmīnaṃ pihayanti -- ``aho vata mayampi nirayadukkhaṃ pahāya saggasukhaṃ paccanubhaveyyāmā''ti evaṃsampadamidanti attho. ettha ^a^M1.0180^ea^ ca attani garubahuvacanappayogassa icchitabbattā ``ekakā mayaṃ viharāmā''ti puna tassa atthassa ekattaṃ sandhāya ``tassa me''ti ekavacanappayogo kato. ``tassa me'', ``saggagāmina''nti ca ubhayampi `pihayantī'ti padaṃ apekkhitvā upayogatthe sampadānaniddeso daṭṭhabbo. taṃ abhipatthentīti ca tādise araññavāsādiguṇe abhipatthentā nāma hontīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^tassa me^eb^ti vā tassa mama santike guṇeti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^cutā^eb^ ^a^V1.0153^ea^ ^a^P1.0154^ea^ ^b^patantī^eb^ti āyasmato pakkhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito ekanavute kappe yakkhasenāpati hutvā vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dibbavatthena pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakkesu devadahanigame sākiyarājakule nibbatti, ``sammodakumāro''tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. athassa daharakāle vātarogena pādā na vahiṃsu. so katipayaṃ kālaṃ pīṭhasappī viya vicari. tenassa ^b^pakkho^eb^ti samaññā jātā. pacchā arogakālepi tatheva naṃ sañjānanti, so bhagavato ñātisamāgame pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati. athekadivasaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ gacchanto antarāmagge aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi. tasmiñca samaye aññataro kulalo maṃsapesiṃ ādāya ākāsena gacchati, taṃ bahū kulalā anupatitvā pātesuṃ. pātitaṃ maṃsapesiṃ eko kulalo aggahesi. taṃ añño acchinditvā gaṇhi, taṃ disvā thero ``yathāyaṃ maṃsapesi, evaṃ kāmā nāma bahusādhāraṇā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā''ti -- kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ``anicca''ntiādinā manasikaronto piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco ^a^M1.0181^ea^ divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.1-10) --
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā.
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā yadeva saṃvegavatthuṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññā adhigatā, tassa saṃkittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto ^b^``cutā patantī''^eb^ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^cutā^eb^ti bhaṭṭhā. ^b^patantī^eb^ti anupatanti. ^b^patitā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0155^ea^ cavanavasena bhūmiyaṃ patitā, ākāse vā sampatanavasena patitā. ^b^giddhā^eb^ti gedhaṃ āpannā ^a^M1.0182^ea^. ^b^punarāgatā^eb^ti punadeva upagatā. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo sabbattha yojetabbo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- patanti anupatanti ca idha kulalā, itarassa mukhato cutā ca maṃsapesi, cutā pana sā bhūmiyaṃ patitā ca, giddhā gedhaṃ āpannā sabbeva kulalā punarāgatā. yathā cime kulalā, evaṃ saṃsāre paribbhamantā sattā ye kusaladhammato cutā, te patanti nirayādīsu, evaṃ patitā ca, sampattibhave ṭhitā tattha kāmasukhānuyogavasena kāmabhave rūpārūpabhavesu ca bhavanikantivasena giddhā ca punarāgatā bhavato aparimuttattā tena tena bhavagāminā kammena taṃ taṃ bhavasaññitaṃ dukkhaṃ āgatā eva, evaṃbhūtā ime sattā. mayā pana ^b^kataṃ kiccaṃ^eb^ pariññādibhedaṃ soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ kataṃ, na dāni taṃ kātabbaṃ atthi. ^b^rataṃ rammaṃ^eb^ ramitabbaṃ ariyehi sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ rataṃ abhirataṃ rammaṃ. tena ca ^b^sukhenanvāgataṃ sukhaṃ^eb^ phalasamāpattisukhena anuāgataṃ upagataṃ accantasukhaṃ nibbānaṃ, sukhena vā sukhāpaṭipadābhūtena vipassanāsukhena maggasukhena ca anvāgataṃ phalasukhaṃ nibbānasukhañcāti attho veditabbo.

[01] ^b^dumavhayāya uppanno^eb^ti vimalakoṇḍaññattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ^a^V1.0155^ea^ tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso catūhi suvaṇṇapupphehi pūjesi. bhagavā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāresi, yathā suvaṇṇābhā sakalaṃ taṃ padesaṃ ottharati. taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso hutvā ^a^P1.0156^ea^ bhagavantaṃ vanditvā taṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ gantvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahanto kenaci rogena kālaṃ katvā tusitesu upapanno aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājānaṃ ^a^M1.0183^ea^ bimbisāraṃ paṭicca ambapāliyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. rājā hi bimbisāro taruṇakāle ambapāliyā rūpasampattiṃ sutvā sañjātābhilāso katipayamanussaparivāro aññātakavesena vesāliṃ gantvā ekarattiṃ tāya saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. tadā ayaṃ tassā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. sā ca gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ tassa ārocesi. rājāpi attānaṃ jānāpetvā dātabbayuttakaṃ datvā pakkāmi. sā gabbhassa paripākamanvāya puttaṃ vijāyi, ``vimalo''tissa nāmaṃ ahosi, pacchā ^b^vimalakoṇḍañño^eb^ti paññāyittha. so vayappatto bhagavato vesāligamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.40-48) --
[22] buddhābhā ca suvaṇṇābhā, āloko vipulo ahu..
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0184^ea^ pana patvā aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto ^b^``dumavhayāyā''^eb^ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dumavhayāyā^eb^ti dumena ambena avhātabbāya, ambapāliyāti attho. ādhāre cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^uppanno^eb^ti tassā kucchiyaṃ uppanno uppajjamāno ca. ^b^jāto paṇḍaraketunā^eb^ti dhavalavatthadhajattā ``paṇḍaraketū''ti paññātena bimbisāraraññā hetubhūtena jāto, taṃ paṭicca nibbattoti attho. ^b^uppanno^eb^ti vā paṭhamābhinibbattidassanaṃ. tato hi ^b^jāto^eb^ti abhijātidassanaṃ. vijāyanakālato paṭṭhāya hi loke jātavohāro. ettha ca ``dumavhayāya uppanno''ti iminā attukkaṃsanabhāvaṃ apaneti, anekapatiputtānampi visesādhigamasambhavañca dīpeti. ``jāto paṇḍaraketunā''ti iminā ^a^P1.0157^ea^ viññātapitikadassanena paravambhanaṃ apaneti. ^b^ketuhā^eb^ti mānappahāyī. māno hi uṇṇatilakkhaṇattā ketu viyāti ketu. tathā hi so ``ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno''ti vuccati. ^b^ketunāyevā^eb^ti paññāya eva. paññā hi anavajjadhammesu accuggataṭṭhena mārasenappamaddanena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ariyānaṃ dhajā nāma. tenāha ``dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.241; a0 ni0 4.48; jā0 2.21.494). ^b^mahāketuṃ padhaṃsayī^eb^ti mahāvisayatāya mahantā, seyyamānajātimānādibhedato bahavo ca mānappakārā, itare ca kilesadhammā samussitaṭṭhena ketu etassāti mahāketu māro pāpimā. taṃ balavidhamanavisayātikkamanavasena abhibhavi nibbisevanaṃ akāsīti. ``mahāketuṃ padhaṃsayī''ti attānaṃ paraṃ viya dassento aññāpadesena arahattaṃ byākāsi.

[01] ^b^ukkhepakatavacchassā^eb^ti āyasmato ukkhepakatavacchattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito catunavute kappe siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthāraṃ uddissa ^a^M1.0185^ea^ māḷaṃ karontassa pūgassa ekatthambhaṃ alabhantassa thambhaṃ datvā sahāyakiccaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena ^a^V1.0157^ea^ devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^vaccho^eb^tissa gottato āgatanāmaṃ. so satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kosalaraṭṭhe gāmakāvāse vasanto āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti. ``ayaṃ ^a^P1.0158^ea^ vinayo idaṃ suttantaṃ ayaṃ abhidhammo''ti pana paricchedaṃ na jānāti. athekadivasaṃ āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchitvā yathāparicchedaṃ sabbaṃ sallakkhesi. dhammasaṅgītiyā pubbepi piṭakādisamaññā pariyattisaddhamme vavatthitā eva, yato bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharādivohāro. so tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto paripucchanto tattha vutte rūpārūpadhamme sallakkhetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sammasanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.13-26) --
[22] saraṇaṃ gatā ca te buddhaṃ, saddahanti tathāgataṃ..
[22] māḷaṃ mayaṃ kattukāmā, ekatthambho na labbhati..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā katakiccattā akilāsubhāve ṭhito attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vīmaṃsitvā dhammaṃ desesi. desento ca ekadivasaṃ attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā dassento --
[22] taṃ bhāsati gahaṭṭhānaṃ, sunisinno uḷārapāmojjo''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^ukkhepakatavacchassā^eb^ti kataukkhepavacchassa, bhikkhuno santike visuṃ visuṃ uggahitaṃ vinayapadesaṃ suttapadesaṃ abhidhammapadesañca yathāparicchedaṃ vinayasuttābhidhammānaṃyeva upari khipitvā sajjhāyanavasena tattha tattheva pakkhipitvā ṭhitavacchenāti attho karaṇatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^saṅkalitaṃ bahūhi vassehī^eb^ti bahukehi saṃvaccharehi sampiṇḍanavasena hadaye ṭhapitaṃ. ``saṅkhalita''ntipi pāṭho, saṅkhalitaṃ viya kataṃ ekābaddhavasena ^a^M1.0187^ea^ vācuggataṃ ^a^P1.0159^ea^ kataṃ. yaṃ buddhavacananti vacanaseso. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ pariyattidhammaṃ ^b^bhāsati^eb^ katheti. ^b^gahaṭṭhāna^eb^nti tesaṃ yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^sunisinno^eb^ti tasmiṃ dhamme sammā niccalo nisinno, lābhasakkārādiṃ apaccāsīsanto kevalaṃ vimuttāyatanasīseyeva ṭhatvā kathetīti attho. tenāha ^b^``uḷārapāmojjo''^eb^ti phalasamāpattisukhavasena dhammadesanāvaseneva ca uppannauḷārapāmojjoti. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``yathā yathāvuso bhikkhu, yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ deseti tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammavedaṃ, labhati dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ pāmojja''ntiādi (dī0 ni0 3.355).

[03] ^b^anusāsi^eb^ ^a^V1.0159^ea^ ^b^mahāvīro^eb^ti āyasmato meghiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave kusalabījāni ropento ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. tasmiñca samaye vipassī bhagavā buddhakiccassa pariyosānamāgamma āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji. tena pathavīkampādīsu uppannesu mahājano bhītatasito ahosi. atha naṃ vessavaṇo mahārājā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetvā samassāsesi. taṃ sutvā mahājano saṃvegappatto ahosi. tatthāyaṃ kulaputto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā satthari sañjātagāravabahumāno uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbatti, tassa ^b^meghiyo^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto satthu santike pabbajitvā bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahanto bhagavati jālikāyaṃ viharante kimikālāya nadiyā tīre ramaṇīyaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā ^a^P1.0160^ea^ tattha viharitukāmo ^a^M1.0188^ea^ dve vāre bhagavatā vāretvā tatiyavāraṃ vissajjito tattha gantvā micchāvitakkamakkhikāhi khajjamāno cittasamādhiṃ alabhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. athassa bhagavā ``aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī''tiādinā (udā0 31) ovādaṃ adāsi. so tasmiṃ ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.57-65) --
[22] uppādo nu kimatthāya, āloko vipulo ahu..
[22] pāṇabhūte bhayaṃ natthi, ekaggā hotha saṃvutā..
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā.
[01] arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā ``mayā arahattaṃ adhigata''nti aññaṃ byākaronto --
[27] tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvāna, vihāsiṃ santike sato.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^anusāsī^eb^ti ``aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā pañca dhammā paripākāya saṃvattantī''tiādinā ovadi anusiṭṭhiṃ adāsi. ^b^mahāvīro^eb^ti mahāvikkanto, vīriyapāramipāripūriyā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānena anaññasādhāraṇacatubbidhasammappadhānasampattiyā ca mahāvīriyoti attho. ^b^sabbadhammāna pāragū^eb^ti sabbesañca ñeyyadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ñāṇagamanena gato adhigatoti sabbadhammāna pāragū, sabbaññūti attho. sabbesaṃ vā saṅkhatadhammānaṃ pārabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ sayambhūñāṇena gato adhigatoti sabbadhammāna pāragū. ^b^tassāhaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānā^eb^ti tassa buddhassa bhagavato sāmukkaṃsikaṃ taṃ catusaccadhammaṃ suṇitvā. ^b^vihāsiṃ santike^eb^ti ambavane micchāvitakkehi upadduto cālikā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu samīpeyeva vihāsiṃ. ^b^sato^eb^ti satimā, samathavipassanābhāvanāya appamattoti attho. ^b^aha^eb^nti idaṃ yathā ``anusāsī''ti ettha ``ma''nti evaṃ ``vijjā ^a^P1.0161^ea^ anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti ettha ``mayā''ti pariṇāmetabbaṃ. ^b^``kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''^eb^nti ca iminā yathāvuttaṃ vijjāttayānuppattimeva satthu ovādapaṭikaraṇabhāvadassanena pariyāyantarena pakāseti. sīlakkhandhādiparipūraṇameva hi satthu sāsanakāritā.

[03] ^b^kilesā^eb^ ^a^M1.0190^ea^ ^b^jhāpitā mayha^eb^nti āyasmato ekadhammasavanīyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? so kira ^a^V1.0161^ea^ padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto katipaye bhikkhū maggamūḷhe mahāraññe vicarante disvā anukampamāno attano bhavanato otaritvā te samassāsetvā bhojetvā yathādhippetaṭṭhānaṃ pāpesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā katabuddhakicce parinibbute tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā kikī nāma ahosi. tasmiṃ kālaṅkate tassa puthuvindarājā nāma putto āsi. tassa putto susāmo nāma. tassa putto kikībrahmadatto nāma hutvā rajjaṃ kārento sāsane antarahite dhammassavanaṃ alabhanto, ``yo dhammaṃ deseti, tassa sahassaṃ dammī''ti ghosāpetvā ekampi dhammakathikaṃ alabhanto, ``mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādīnaṃ kāle dhammo saṃvattati, dhammakathikā sulabhā ahesuṃ. idāni pana catuppadikagāthāmattampi kathento dullabho. yāva dhammasaññā na vinassati, tāvadeva pabbajissāmī''ti rajjaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ uddissa gacchantaṃ sakko devarājā āgantvā, ``aniccā vata saṅkhārā''ti gāthāya dhammaṃ kathetvā nivattesi. so nivattitvā bahuṃ puññaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde setabyanagare seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto bhagavati setabyanagare siṃsapāvane viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ^a^P1.0162^ea^ nisīdi. tassa satthā ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā, ``aniccā vata saṅkhārā''ti imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi. tassa tattha katādhikāratāya so aniccasaññāya pākaṭataraṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitāya paṭiladdhasaṃvego pabbajitvā dhammasammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dukkhasaññaṃ anattasaññañca manasikaronto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.66-71) --
[22] tassa te munino puttā, vippanaṭṭhā mahāvane..
[03] tassa ^a^V1.0162^ea^ ekeneva dhammassavanena nipphannakiccattā ^b^ekadhammasavanīyo^eb^tveva samaññā ahosi. so arahā hutvā aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^kilesā^eb^ti yasmiṃ santāne uppannā, taṃ kilesenti vibādhenti upatāpenti vāti kilesā, rāgādayo. ^b^jhāpitā^eb^ti indagginā viya rukkhagacchādayo ariyamaggañāṇagginā samūlaṃ daḍḍhā. ^b^mayha^eb^nti mayā, mama santāne vā. ^b^bhavā sabbe samūhatā^eb^ti kāmakammabhavādayo sabbe bhavā samugghāṭitā kilesānaṃ jhāpitattā. sati hi kilesavaṭṭe kammavaṭṭena bhavitabbaṃ. kammabhavānaṃ samūhatattā eva ca upapattibhavāpi samūhatā eva anuppattidhammatāya āpāditattā. ^b^vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro^eb^ti jātiādiko --

[25] vuttalakkhaṇo ^a^P1.0163^ea^ saṃsāro visesato khīṇo, tasmā ^b^natthi dāni punabbhavo^eb^. yasmā āyatiṃ punabbhavo natthi, tasmā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro. tasmā ca punabbhavo natthi, yasmā bhavā sabbe samūhatāti āvattetvā vattabbaṃ. atha vā vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, tato eva natthi dāni punabbhavoti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^adhicetaso^eb^ ^a^M1.0192^ea^ ^b^appamajjato^eb^ti āyasmato ekudāniyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle yakkhasenāpati hutvā nibbatto satthari parinibbute, ``alābhā vata me, dulladdhaṃ vata me, yohaṃ satthudharamānakāle dānādipuññaṃ kātuṃ nālattha''nti paridevasokamāpanno ahosi. atha naṃ sāgaro nāma satthu sāvako sokaṃ vinodetvā satthu thūpapūjāyaṃ niyojesi. so pañca vassāni thūpaṃ ^a^V1.0163^ea^ pūjetvā tato cuto tena puññena devamanussesu eva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kālena kālaṃ satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkami. tasmiñca samaye satthā ^b^``adhicetaso''^eb^ti gāthāya sāvake abhiṇhaṃ ovadi. so taṃ sutvā saddhājāto pabbaji. pabbajitvā ca pana tameva gāthaṃ punappunaṃ parivatteti. so tattha vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ñāṇassa aparipakkattā visesaṃ nibbattetu nāsakkhi. tato pana cuto devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā jetavanapaṭiggahaṇasamaye buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco araññe viharanto satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. tasmiñca samaye satthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ attano avidūre adhicittamanuyuttaṃ disvā ^b^``adhicetaso''^eb^ti imaṃ udānaṃ ^a^P1.0164^ea^ udānesi. taṃ sutvā ayaṃ cirakālaṃ bhāvanāya araññe viharantopi kālena kālaṃ tameva gāthaṃ udāneti, tenassa ^b^ekudāniyo^eb^ti samaññā udapādi. so athekadivasaṃ cittekaggataṃ labhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.72-81) --
[22] yakkhayoniṃ upapajjiṃ, yasaṃ patto cahaṃ tadā..
[22] yaṃ me bhoge vijjamāne, parinibbāyi cakkhumā..
[21] ``kiṃ nu socasi mā bhāyi, cara dhammaṃ sumedhasa.
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ āyasmatā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭibhānaṃ vīmaṃsituṃ, ``āvuso, mayhaṃ dhammaṃ bhaṇāhī''ti ajjhiṭṭho cirakālaparicitattā --
[22] sokā na bhavanti tādino, upasantassa sadā satīmato''ti.. (udā0 37) --

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0194^ea^ ^b^adhicetaso^eb^ti adhicittavato, sabbacittānaṃ adhikena arahattaphalacittena samannāgatassāti attho. ^b^appamajjato^eb^ti nappamajjato, appamādena anavajjadhammesu sātaccakiriyāya samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^munino^eb^ti ``yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī''ti (dha0 pa0 269; mahāni0 149; cūḷani0 mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddesa 21) evaṃ ubhayalokamunanena vā, monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, tena arahattaphalapaññāsaṅkhātena monena samannāgatatāya vā khīṇāsavo muni nāma, tassa munino. ^b^monapathesu sikkhato^eb^ti arahattañāṇasaṅkhātassa monassa pathesu upāyamaggesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesu, tīsu vā sikkhāsu sikkhato. idañca pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. pariniṭṭhitasikkho hi arahā, tasmā evaṃ sikkhato, imāya sikkhāya munibhāvaṃ pattassa muninoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. yasmā cetadevaṃ tasmā heṭṭhimamaggaphalacittānaṃ vasena adhicetaso, catusaccasambodhipaṭipattiyaṃ appamādavasena ^a^P1.0165^ea^ appamajjato, aggamaggañāṇasamannāgamena muninoti evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho yujjatiyeva. atha vā ``appamajjato sikkhato'' padhānahetū akkhātāti daṭṭhabbā. tasmā appamajjanahetu sikkhanahetu ca adhicetasoti attho.

[03] ^b^sokā na bhavanti tādino^eb^ti tādisassa khīṇāsavamunino abbhantare iṭṭhaviyogādivatthukā sokā cittasantāpā na honti. atha vā tādilakkhaṇappattassa asekkhamunino sokā na bhavantīti. ^b^upasantassā^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ accantūpasamena upasantassa. ^b^sadā satīmato^eb^ti sativepullappattiyā niccakālaṃ satiyā avirahitassa.

[03] ettha ^a^V1.0165^ea^ ca ``adhicetaso''ti iminā adhicittasikkhā, ``appamajjato''ti iminā adhisīlasikkhā, ``munino monapathesu sikkhato''ti etehi adhipaññāsikkhā. ``munino''ti vā etena adhipaññāsikkhā, ``monapathesu sikkhato''ti etena tāsaṃ lokuttarasikkhānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadā, ``sokā na bhavantī''tiādīhi sikkhāpāripūriyā ānisaṃsā pakāsitāti veditabbaṃ ayameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosi.

[01] ^b^sutvāna^eb^ ^a^M1.0195^ea^ ^b^dhammaṃ mahato mahārasa^eb^nti āyasmato channattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ siddhatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchantaṃ disvā pasannacitto mudusamphassaṃ paṇṇasantharaṃ santharitvā adāsi. pupphehi ca ^a^P1.0166^ea^ samantato okiritvā pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā punapi aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle suddhodanamahārājassa gehe dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^channo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi, bodhisattena sahajāto. so satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā bhagavati pemena, ``amhākaṃ buddho, amhākaṃ dhammo''ti mamattaṃ uppādetvā sinehaṃ chindituṃ asakkonto samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā satthari parinibbute satthārā āṇattavidhinā katena brahmadaṇḍena santajjito saṃvegappatto hutvā sinehaṃ chinditvā vipassanto nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.10.45-50) --
[22] ito te pañcame kappe, uppajjiṃsu janādhipā..
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0196^ea^ pana patvā vimuttisukhasantappito pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento --
[22] so yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sutvānā^eb^ti suṇitvā, sotena gahetvā ohitasoto sotadvārānusārena upadhāretvā. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammaṃ. ^b^mahato^eb^ti bhagavato. bhagavā hi mahantehi uḷāratamehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā, sadevakena lokena visesato mahanīyatāya ca ``mahā''ti vuccati, yā tassa ^b^mahāsamaṇo^eb^ti samaññā jātā. nissakkavacanañcetaṃ ``mahato dhammaṃ sutvānā''ti. ^b^mahārasa^eb^nti vimuttirasassa dāyakattā uḷārarasaṃ. ^b^sabbaññutaññāṇavarena desita^eb^nti sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññū, tassa bhāvo sabbaññutā. ñāṇameva varaṃ, ñāṇesu vā varanti ñāṇavaraṃ, sabbaññutā ñāṇavaraṃ etassāti sabbaññutaññāṇavaro, bhagavā. tena sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātāggañāṇena vā karaṇabhūtena desitaṃ kathitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvānāti ^a^P1.0167^ea^ yojanā. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^magga^eb^nti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ ariyamaggaṃ. ^b^papajji^eb^nti paṭipajjiṃ. ^b^amatassa pattiyā^eb^ti nibbānassa adhigamāya upāyabhūtaṃ paṭipajjinti yojanā. ^b^so^eb^ti so bhagavā. ^b^yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido^eb^ti catūhi yogehi anupaddutassa nibbānassa yo patho, tassa kovido tattha sukusalo. ayañhettha attho -- bhagavato catusaccadesanaṃ sutvā amatādhigamūpāyamaggaṃ ahaṃ paṭipajjiṃ paṭipajjanamaggaṃ mayā kataṃ, so eva pana bhagavā sabbathā yogakkhemassa pathassa kovido, parasantāne vā paramanesu kusalo, yassa saṃvidhānamāgamma ahampi maggaṃ paṭipajjinti. ayameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^sīlamevā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0197^ea^ ^a^V1.0167^ea^ āyasmato puṇṇattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe buddhasuññe loke brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantappadese paṇṇakuṭiṃ katvā vāsaṃ kappesi. tassa vasanaṭṭhānassa avidūre ekasmiṃ pabbhāre paccekabuddho ābādhiko hutvā parinibbāyi, tassa parinibbānasamaye mahā āloko ahosi. taṃ disvā so, ``kathaṃ nu kho ayaṃ āloko uppanno''ti vīmaṃsanavasena ito cito ca āhiṇḍanto ^a^P1.0168^ea^ pabbhāre paccekasambuddhaṃ parinibbutaṃ disvā gandhadārūni saṃkaḍḍhitvā sarīraṃ jhāpetvā gandhodakena upasiñci. tattheko devaputto antalikkhe ṭhatvā evamāha -- ``sādhu, sādhu, sappurisa, bahuṃ tayā puññaṃ pasavantena pūritaṃ sugatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ tena tvaṃ sugatīsuyeva uppajjissasi, `puṇṇo'ti ca te nāmaṃ bhavissatī''ti. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade suppārakapaṭṭane gahapatikule nibbatti, ^b^puṇṇo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto vāṇijjavasena mahatā satthena saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gato. tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati. atha so sāvatthivāsīhi upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vattapaṭivattehi ācariyupajjhāye ārādhento vihāsi. so ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, ``sādhu maṃ, bhante bhagavā, saṃkhittena ovādena ovadatu, yamahaṃ sutvā sunāparantajanapade vihareyya''nti āha. tassa bhagavā, ``santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.395; saṃ0 ni0 4.88) ovādaṃ datvā sīhanādaṃ nadāpetvā vissajjesi. so bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sunāparantajanapadaṃ gantvā suppārakapaṭṭane viharanto samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā tisso vijjā sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.41.29-44) --
[22] ābādhiko ca so buddho, vasati pabbatantare..
[22] vāḷā ca kesarī sabbe, abhigajjiṃsu tāvade..
[22] citakaṃ sukataṃ katvā, sarīraṃ jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ..
[22] puṇṇako nāma nāmena, sadā hohi tuvaṃ mune..

[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0199^ea^ pana patvā thero bahū manusse sāsane abhippasādesi. yato pañcasatamattā purisā upāsakattaṃ pañcasatamattā ca itthiyo upāsikābhāvaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. so tattha rattacandanena candanamāḷaṃ nāma gandhakuṭiṃ kārāpetvā, ``satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ māḷaṃ paṭicchatū''ti bhagavantaṃ pupphadūtena nimantesi ^a^P1.0169^ea^. bhagavā ca iddhānubhāvena tattakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā candanamāḷaṃ paṭiggahetvā aruṇe anuṭṭhiteyeva paccāgamāsi. thero aparabhāge parinibbānasamaye aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] manussesu ca devesu, sīlapaññāṇato jaya''nti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sīla^eb^nti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena samādhānaṭṭhena cāti attho. sīlañhi sabbaguṇānaṃ patiṭṭhā, tenāha -- ``sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.23; peṭako0 22; visuddhi0 1.1). samādahati ca taṃ kāyavācāavippakiṇṇaṃ karotīti attho. tayidaṃ sīlameva ^b^aggaṃ^eb^ sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhāvato pamukhabhāvato ca. yathāha -- ``tasmātiha, tvaṃ bhikkhu, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ sīlañca suvisuddha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 5.369), ``pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta''nti (mahāva0 135) ca ādi. ^b^idhā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^paññavā^eb^ti ñāṇasampanno. so ^b^uttamo^eb^ seṭṭho pavaroti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya paññāyayeva seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dasseti. paññuttarā hi kusalā dhammā. idāni taṃ sīlapaññānaṃ aggaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ kāraṇato dasseti ^b^``manussesu ca devesu, sīlapaññāṇato jaya''^eb^nti ca. sīlapaññāṇahetu paṭipakkhajayo kāmakilesajayo hotīti attho.

[03] ^b^susukhumanipuṇatthadassinā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0200^ea^ ^a^V1.0170^ea^ āyasmato vacchapālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni ācinanto devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito ekanavute kappe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gantvā aggiṃ paricaranto ekadivasaṃ mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyāsaṃ ādāya ^a^P1.0170^ea^ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesanto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāse caṅkamantaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā dātukāmataṃ dassesi. paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^vacchapālo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so bimbisārasamāgame uruvelakassapattherena iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā satthu paramanipaccakāre kate taṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhapabbajito eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.26-34) --
[22] āhutiṃ yiṭṭhukāmo so, upanesiṃ baliṃ ahaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā sukheneva attanā nibbānassa adhigatabhāvaṃ vibhāvento --
[22] saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^susukhumanipuṇatthadassinā^eb^ti ativiya duddasaṭṭhena sukhume, saṇhaṭṭhena nipuṇe saccapaṭiccasamuppādādiatthe aniccatādiṃ oropetvā passatīti susukhumanipuṇatthadassī, tena. ^b^matikusalenā^eb^ti matiyā paññāya kusalena chekena, ``evaṃ pavattamānassa paññā vaḍḍhati, evaṃ na vaḍḍhatī''ti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgapaññāya uppādane kusalena. ^b^nivātavuttinā^eb^ti sabrahmacārīsu nivātanīcavattanasīlena, vuḍḍhesu navesu ca yathānurūpapaṭipattinā. ^b^saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā^eb^ti saṃsevitaṃ āciṇṇaṃ vuddhasīlaṃ saṃsevitavuddhasīlaṃ, taṃ yassa atthi, tena saṃsevitavuddhasīlinā. atha vā saṃsevitā upāsitā vuddhasīlino etenāti ^b^saṃsevitavuddhasīlī,^eb^ tena ^a^P1.0171^ea^. ^b^hī^eb^tisaddo hetuattho. yasmā yo nivātavutti saṃsevitavuddhasīlī matikusalo susukhumanipuṇatthadassī ca, tasmā nibbānaṃ na tassa dullabhanti attho. nivātavuttitāya hi saṃsevitavuddhasīlitāya ca paṇḍitā taṃ ovaditabbaṃ anusāsitabbaṃ maññanti, tesañca ovāde ṭhito sayaṃ ^a^M1.0202^ea^ matikusalatāya susukhumanipuṇatthadassitāya ca vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva nibbānaṃ adhigacchatīti, ayameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosīti.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V1.0172^ea^ ^b^kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggo^eb^ti āyasmato ātumattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ ācinanto ito ekanavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso gandhodakena gandhacuṇṇena ca pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi, ñāṇassa pana aparipakkattā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. atha imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^ātumo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. tassa vayappattassa mātā ``puttassa me bhariyaṃ ānessāmā''ti ñātakehi sammantesi. so taṃ upadhāretvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ``kiṃ mayhaṃ gharāvāsena, idāneva pabbajissāmī''ti bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji. pabbajitampi naṃ mātā uppabbājetukāmā nānānayehi palobheti. so tassā avasaraṃ adatvā attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``yathā kaḷīro susu vaḍḍhitaggo, dunnikkhamo hoti pasākhajāto.
[22] evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānītāya, anumañña maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0203^ea^ ^b^kaḷīro^eb^ti aṅkuro, idha pana vaṃsaṅkuro adhippeto. ^b^susū^eb^ti taruṇo. ^b^vaḍḍhitaggo^eb^ti pavaḍḍhitasākho. ^b^susuvaḍḍhitaggo^eb^ti vā suṭṭhu vaḍḍhitasākho sañjātapattasākho. ^b^dunnikkhamo^eb^ti veḷugumbato nikkhāmetuṃ nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyo. ^b^pasākhajāto^eb^ti jātapasākho, sākhānampi pabbe pabbe uppannānusākho. ^b^evaṃ ahaṃ bhariyāyānītāyā^eb^ti yathā vaṃso vaḍḍhitaggo vaṃsantaresu saṃsaṭṭha sākhāpasākho veḷugumbato dunnīharaṇīyo hoti, evaṃ ahampi bhariyāya mayhaṃ ānītāya puttadhītādivasena vaḍḍhitaggo āsattivasena gharāvāsato dunnīharaṇīyo bhaveyyaṃ. yathā pana vaṃsakaḷīro asañjātasākhabandho veḷugumbato sunīharaṇīyova hoti, evaṃ ahampi asañjātaputtadārādibandho sunīharaṇīyo homi, tasmā anānītāya eva bhariyāya ^b^anumañña maṃ^eb^ attanāva maṃ anujānāpetvā. ^b^pabbajitomhi dānī^eb^ti, ``idāni pana pabbajito amhi, sādhu suṭṭhū''ti attano nekkhammābhiratiṃ pakāsesi, atha vā ``anumañña maṃ pabbajitomhi dānī''ti mātu katheti. ayañhettha attho -- yadipi tāya pubbe nānumataṃ, idāni pana pabbajito amhi, tasmā anumañña anujānāhi maṃ samaṇabhāveyeva ṭhātuṃ, nāhaṃ tayā nivattanīyoti ^a^V1.0173^ea^. evaṃ pana kathento yathāṭhitova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā kilese khepetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.35-40) --
[22] pabhā niddhāvate tassa, yathā ca sataraṃsino..
[03] chaḷabhiñño ^a^M1.0204^ea^ pana hutvā mātaraṃ āpucchitvā tassā pekkhantiyāyeva ākāsena pakkāmi. so arahattappattiyā uttarikālampi antarantarā tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.

[03] tattha ``pabbajitomhī''ti imināpadesena ayampi therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahosi ^a^P1.0173^ea^ attano santāne rāgādimalassa pabbājitabhāvadīpanato. tenāha bhagavā -- ``pabbājayamattano malaṃ, tasmā `pabbajito'ti vuccatī''ti (dha0 pa0 388).

[03] ^b^jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhita^eb^nti āyasmato māṇavattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā lakkhaṇadharo hutvā vipassissa bhagavato abhijātiyā lakkhaṇāni pariggahetvā pubbanimittāni sāvetvā, ``ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī''ti ^a^V1.0174^ea^ byākaritvā nānānayehi thometvā abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālassa gehe nibbattitvā yāva sattavassāni, tāva antoghareyeva vaḍḍhitvā sattame saṃvacchare upanayanatthaṃ uyyānaṃ nīto antarāmagge jiṇṇāturamate disvā tesaṃ adiṭṭhapubbattā te parijane pucchitvā jarārogamaraṇasabhāvaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvego tato anivattanto vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.41-64) --
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] so dāni bhagavā satthā, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[03] adhigatārahatto pana bhikkhūhi, ``kena, tvaṃ āvuso, saṃvegena atidaharova samāno pabbajito''ti pucchito attano pabbajjānimittakittanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``jiṇṇañca ^a^P1.0174^ea^ disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ.
[22] tato ahaṃ nikkhamitūna pabbajiṃ, pahāya kāmāni manoramānī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0207^ea^ ^a^V1.0176^ea^ ^b^jiṇṇa^eb^nti jarāya abhibhūtaṃ, khaṇḍiccapāliccavalittacatādīhi samaṅgībhūtaṃ. ^b^dukhita^eb^nti dukkhappattaṃ. ^b^byādhita^eb^nti gilānaṃ. ettha ca ``byādhita''nti vuttepi dukkhappattabhāvo siddho, ``dukhita''nti vacanaṃ tassa bāḷhagilānabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ. ^b^mata^eb^nti kālaṅkataṃ, yasmā kālaṅkato āyuno khayaṃ vayaṃ bhedaṃ gato nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``gatamāyusaṅkhaya''^eb^nti. tasmā jiṇṇabyādhimatānaṃ diṭṭhattā, ``ime jarādayo nāma na imesaṃyeva, atha kho sabbasādhāraṇā, tasmā ahampi jarādike anativatto''ti saṃviggattā. ^b^nikkhamitūnā^eb^ti nikkhamitvā, ayameva vā pāṭho. pabbajjādhippāyena gharato niggantvā. ^b^pabbaji^eb^nti satthu sāsane pabbajaṃ upagato. ^b^pahāya kāmāni manoramānī^eb^ti iṭṭhakantādibhāvato avītarāgānaṃ mano ramentīti manorame vatthukāme pajahitvā, tappaṭibaddhassa chandarāgassa ariyamaggena samucchindanena nirapekkhabhāvena chaḍḍetvāti attho. kāmānaṃ pahānakittanamukhena cetaṃ therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi. māṇavakāle pabbajitattā imassa therassa ^b^māṇavo^eb^tveva samaññā jātāti.

[03] ^b^kāmacchando ca byāpādo^eb^ti āyasmato suyāmanattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle dhaññavatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^a^P1.0175^ea^ vayappatto brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā brāhmaṇamante vāceti. tena ca samayena vipassī bhagavā mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ dhaññavatīnagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti. taṃ disvā brāhmaṇo pasannacitto attano gehaṃ netvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tassūpari pupphasanthāraṃ santharitvā adāsi, satthari tattha nisinne paṇītena āhārena santappesi, bhuttāviñca pupphagandhena pūjesi. satthā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā ^a^M1.0208^ea^ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^suyāmano^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū paramanissamayutto hutvā gehavāsīnaṃ kāmūpabhogaṃ jigucchitvā jhānaninno bhagavato vesāligamane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.65-74) --
[22] mante ca sisse vācesiṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vedāna pāragū..
[22] santharitvāna taṃ pupphaṃ, abhinesiṃ sakaṃ gharaṃ..
[21] ``yaṃ me atthi sake gehe, āmisaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ.
[22] tāhaṃ buddhassa pādāsiṃ, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā nīvaraṇappahānakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] uddhaccaṃ vicikicchā ca, sabbasova na vijjatī''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^kāmacchando^eb^ti kāmesu chando, kāmo ca so chando cātipi kāmacchando, kāmarāgo. idha pana sabbopi rāgo kāmacchando aggamaggavajjhassāpi adhippetattā, tenāha ^b^``sabbasova na vijjatī''^eb^ti. sabbepi hi tebhūmakadhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, tattha pavatto rāgo kāmacchando, tenāha bhagavā -- ``āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ uppajjatī''ti (paṭṭhā0 3.8.8) byāpajjati ^a^P1.0176^ea^ cittaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ ^a^V1.0178^ea^ gacchati etenāti ^b^byāpādo,^eb^ ``anatthaṃ me acarī''tiādinayappavatto (dha0 sa0 1066; vibha0 909) āghāto. thinaṃ cittassa akalyatā anussāhasaṃhananaṃ, middhaṃ kāyassa akalyatā asattivighāto, tadubhayampi thinañca middhañca ^b^thinamiddhaṃ,^eb^ kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ ekatāya ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. uddhatabhāvo ^b^uddhaccaṃ,^eb^ yena dhammena cittaṃ uddhataṃ hoti avūpasantaṃ, so cetaso vikkhepo uddhaccaṃ. uddhaccaggahaṇeneva cettha kiccāhārapaṭipakkhānaṃ samānatāya kukkuccampi gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ. yo hi katākatakusalākusalūpanissayo vippaṭisāro, taṃ kukkuccaṃ. ^b^vicikicchā^eb^ti, ``evaṃ nu kho na nu kho''ti saṃsayaṃ āpajjati, dhammasabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto kicchati kilamati etāyāti vicikicchā, buddhādivatthuko saṃsayo. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti anavasesato. ^b^na vijjatī^eb^ti natthi, maggena samucchinnattā na upalabbhati. idañca padadvayaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ ayañhettha yojanā -- yassa bhikkhuno tena tena ariyamaggena samucchinnattā kāmacchando ca byāpādo ca thinamiddhañca uddhaccakukkuccañca vicikicchā ca sabbasova na vijjati, tassa na kiñci karaṇīyaṃ, katassa vā paticayoti aññāpadesena aññaṃ byākaroti. pañcasu hi nīvaraṇesu maggena samucchinnesu tadekaṭṭhatāya sabbepi kilesā samucchinnāyeva honti. tenāha -- ``sabbete bhagavanto pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese''ti (dī0 ni0 2.146).

[03] ^b^sādhu^eb^ ^a^M1.0210^ea^ ^b^suvihitāna dassana^eb^nti āyasmato susāradattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? so kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vijjāpadesu nipphattiṃ gantvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ ^a^P1.0177^ea^ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantappadese araññāyatane assamaṃ kāretvā vihāsi. atha naṃ anuggaṇhanto padumuttaro bhagavā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ upasaṅkami. so dūratova disvā pasannamānaso paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā madhurāni phalāni pakkhipitvā adāsi. bhagavā taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde dhammasenāpatino ñātibrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā mandapaññattā ^b^susārado^eb^ti gahitanāmo aparabhāge dhammasenāpatissa santike dhammaṃ sutvā ^a^V1.0179^ea^ paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.75-83) --
[22] antalikkhe ṭhito satthā, imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsatha..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā sappurisūpanissayānisaṃsakittanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``sādhu suvihitāna dassanaṃ, kaṅkhā chijjati buddhi vaḍḍhati.
[22] bālampi karonti paṇḍitaṃ, tasmā sādhu sataṃ samāgamo''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^sādhū^eb^ti sundaraṃ, bhaddakanti attho. ^b^suvihitāna dassana^eb^nti suvihitānaṃ dassanaṃ. gāthāsukhatthaṃ anusvāralopo kato. sīlādiguṇehi susaṃvihitattabhāvānaṃ parānuddayāya suṭṭhu vihitadhammadesanānaṃ ariyānaṃ dassanaṃ sādhūti yojanā. ``dassana''nti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ savanādīnampi bahukārattā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``ye ^a^V1.0180^ea^ te bhikkhū sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā ovādakā viññāpakā sandassakā samādapakā samuttejakā sampahaṃsakā alaṃsamakkhātāro saddhammassa, dassanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmi, savanaṃ...pe0... upasaṅkamanaṃ...pe0... payirupāsanaṃ...pe0... anussaraṇaṃ...pe0... anupabbajjampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmī''ti ^a^P1.0178^ea^ (itivu0 104).

[03] dassanamūlakattā vā itaresaṃ dassanamevettha vuttaṃ, ^b^kaṅkhā chijjatī^eb^tiādi tattha kāraṇavacanaṃ. tādisānañhi kalyāṇamittānaṃ dassane sati viññujātiko atthakāmo kulaputto te upasaṅkamati payirupāsati ``kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusala''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.296) pañhaṃ pucchati. te cassa anekavihitesu kaṅkhāṭṭhānīyesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti, tena vuttaṃ ``kaṅkhā chijjatī''ti. yasmā ca te dhammadesanāya tesaṃ kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodetvā ^a^M1.0212^ea^ pubbabhāge kammapathasammādiṭṭhiṃ vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiñca uppādenti, tasmā tesaṃ ^b^buddhi vaḍḍhati^eb^. yadā pana te vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saccāni paṭivijjhanti, tadā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca vicikicchā chijjati samucchijjati, nippariyāyena paññā buddhi vaḍḍhati. bālyasamatikkamanato te paṇḍitā honti. so tehi buddhiṃ vaḍḍheti, ^b^bālampi karonti paṇḍita^eb^nti. ^b^tasmā^eb^tiādi nigamanaṃ, yasmā sādhūnaṃ dassanaṃ vuttanayena kaṅkhā chijjati buddhi vaḍḍhati, te bālaṃ paṇḍitaṃ karonti, tasmā tena kāraṇena ^b^sādhu^eb^ sundaraṃ ^b^sataṃ^eb^ sappurisānaṃ ariyānaṃ ^b^samāgamo,^eb^ tehi samodhānaṃ sammā vaḍḍhananti attho.

[03] ^b^uppatantesu nipate^eb^ti āyasmato piyañjahattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle himavante rukkhadevatā hutvā pabbatantare vasanto devatāsamāgamesu appānubhāvatāya parisapariyante ṭhatvā dhammaṃ sutvā satthari paṭiladdhasaddho ekadivasaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ gaṅgāyaṃ pulinappadesaṃ disvā satthu guṇe anussari -- ``itopi suvisuddhā satthu guṇā anantā aparimeyyā cā''ti, evaṃ so ^a^P1.0179^ea^ satthu guṇe ārabbha cittaṃ pasādetvā ^a^V1.0181^ea^ tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ licchavirājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto yuddhasoṇḍo aparājitasaṅgāmo amittānaṃ piyahānikaraṇena ^b^piyañjaho^eb^ti paññāyittha. so satthu vesāligamane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā araññe vasamāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.84-90) --
[22] ñāṇena te samo natthi, yāvatā ñāṇamuttamaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ``andhaputhujjanānaṃ paṭipattito vidhurā ariyānaṃ paṭipattī''ti imassa atthassa dassanavasena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] vase avasamānesu, ramamānesu no rame''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^uppatantesū^eb^ti uṇṇamantesu, sattesu mānuddhaccathambhasārambhādīhi attukkaṃsanena anupasantesu. ^b^nipate^eb^ti nameyya, tesaññeva pāpadhammānaṃ parivajjanena nivātavutti bhaveyya. ^b^nipatantesū^eb^ti oṇamantesu, hīnādhimuttikatāya kosajjena ca guṇato nihīyamānesu. ^b^uppate^eb^ti uṇṇameyya, paṇītādhimuttikatāya vīriyārambhena ca guṇato ussukkeyya. atha vā ^b^uppatantesū^eb^ti uṭṭhahantesu, kilesesu pariyuṭṭhānavasena sīsaṃ ukkhipantesu. ^b^nipate^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhānabalena yathā te na uppajjanti, tathā anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāya nipateyya, vikkhambheyya ceva ^a^V1.0182^ea^ samucchindeyya ca. ^b^nipatantesū^eb^ti paripatantesu, ayonisomanasikāresu vīriyapayogamandatāya vā yathāraddhesu samathavipassanādhammesu hāya mānesu ^a^M1.0214^ea^. ^b^uppate^eb^ti yonisomanasikārena vīriyārambhasampadāya ca te upaṭṭhāpeyya uppādeyya vaḍḍheyya ca. ^b^vase^eb^ ^a^P1.0180^ea^ ^b^avasamānesū^eb^ti sattesu maggabrahmacariyavāsaṃ ariyavāsañca avasantesu sayaṃ taṃ vāsaṃ vaseyyāti, ariyesu vā kilesavāsaṃ dutiyakavāsaṃ avasantesu yena vāsena te avasamānā nāma honti, sayaṃ tathā vase. ^b^ramamānesu no rame^eb^ti sattesu kāmaguṇaratiyā kilesaratiyā ramantesu sayaṃ tathā no rame naṃ rameyya, ariyesu vā nirāmisāya jhānādiratiyā ramamānesu sayampi tathā rame, tato aññathā pana kadācipi no rame nābhirameyya vāti attho.

[03] ^b^idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārika^eb^nti āyasmato hatthārohaputtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ hatthārohakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto hatthisippe nipphattiṃ agamāsi. so ekadivasaṃ hatthiṃ sikkhāpento nadītīraṃ gantvā hetusampattiyā codiyamāno ``kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā hatthidamanena, attānaṃ damanameva vara''nti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvāva cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ciraparicayena kammaṭṭhānato bahiddhā vidhāvantaṃ cittaṃ cheko hatthācariyo viya aṅkusena caṇḍamattavaravāraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānāṅkusena niggaṇhanto ^b^``idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārika''^eb^nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P1.0181^ea^ ^b^ida^eb^nti vuccamānassa cittassa attapaccakkhatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^pure^eb^ti niggahakālato pubbe. ^b^acārī^eb^ti vicari, anavaṭṭhitatāya nānārammaṇesu paribbhami ^a^M1.0215^ea^. ^b^cārika^eb^nti yathākāmacariyaṃ. tenāha ^b^``yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukha''^eb^nti. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ cittaṃ. ^b^ajjā^eb^ti etarahi. ^b^niggahessāmī^eb^ti niggaṇhissāmi, nibbisevanaṃ karissāmi. ^b^yoniso^eb^ti upāyena. yathā ^a^V1.0183^ea^ kiṃ? ^b^hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅkusaggaho^eb^. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- idaṃ mama cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yena yena ramituṃ icchati, tassa tassa vasena yenicchakaṃ, yattha yattha cassa kāmo, tassa tassa vasena yatthakāmaṃ, yathā yathā vicarantassa sukhaṃ hoti, tatheva caraṇato yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ acari, taṃ ajjapāhaṃ bhinnamadamattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena niggahessāmi, nāssa vītikkamituṃ dassāmīti. evaṃ vadanto eva ca thero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.91-96) --
[22] haṭṭho haṭṭhena cittena, puna vandiṃ tathāgataṃ..

[03] ^b^anekajātisaṃsāra^eb^nti ^a^M1.0216^ea^ āyasmato meṇḍasirattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni karonto ito ekanavute kappe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahatā isigaṇena saddhiṃ himavante vasanto satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso isigaṇena padumāni āharāpetvā ^a^V1.0184^ea^ satthu pupphapūjaṃ katvā ^a^P1.0182^ea^ sāvake appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ ovaditvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa meṇḍasarikkhasīsatāya ^b^meṇḍasiro^eb^tveva samaññā ahosi. so bhagavati sākete añjanavane viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samathavipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. teva vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.97-105) --
[22] mā kho tumhe pamajjittha, appamādo sukhāvaho..
[22] tassa me dukkhajātassa, dukkhakkhandho aparaddho''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^anekajātisaṃsāra^eb^nti anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ idaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ, addhuno adhippetattā ^a^V1.0185^ea^ accantasaṃyogekavacanaṃ. ^b^sandhāvissa^eb^nti saṃsariṃ, aparāparaṃ cavanuppajjanavasena paribbhamiṃ. ^b^anibbisa^eb^nti tassa nivattakañāṇaṃ avindanto alabhanto. ^b^tassa me^eb^ti evaṃ saṃsarantassa me. ^b^dukkhajātassā^eb^ti jātiādivasena uppannadukkhassa, tissannaṃ vā dukkhatānaṃ vasena dukkhasabhāvassa. ^b^dukkhakkhandho^eb^ti kammakilesavipākavaṭṭappakāro dukkharāsi. ^b^aparaddho^eb^ti arahattamaggappattito paṭṭhāya paribbhaṭṭho cuto na abhinibbattissati. ``aparaṭṭho''ti vā pāṭho, apagatasamiddhito samucchinnakāraṇattā apagatoti attho. idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^sabbo^eb^ ^a^P1.0183^ea^ ^b^rāgo pahīno me^eb^ti āyasmato rakkhitattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso desanāñāṇaṃ ārabbha thomanaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa cittappasādaṃ oloketvā ``ayaṃ ito satasahassakappamatthake gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa rakkhito nāma sāvako bhavissatī''ti byākāsi ^a^M1.0218^ea^. so taṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devadahanigame sākiyarājakule nibbatti, ^b^rakkhito^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so ye sākiyakoliyarājūhi bhagavato parivāratthāya dinnā pañcasatarājakumārā pabbajitā, tesaṃ aññataro. te pana rājakumārā na saṃvegena pabbajitattā ukkaṇṭhābhibhūtā yadā satthārā kuṇāladahatīraṃ netvā ^b^kuṇālajātakadesanāya^eb^ (jā0 2.21.kuṇālajātaka) itthīnaṃ dosavibhāvanena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ pakāsetvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitā, tadā ayampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.1-9) --
[21] ``yathā ^a^V1.0186^ea^ samuddo udadhīnamaggo, nerū nagānaṃ pavaro siluccayo.
[22] tatheva ye cittavasena vattare, na buddhañāṇassa kalaṃ upenti te..
[22] sobhito nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0219^ea^ pana patvā attano pahīnakilese paccavekkhanto ^b^``sabbo rāgo''^eb^ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^``sabbo rāgo''^eb^ti kāmarāgādippabhedo sabbopi rāgo. ^b^pahīno^eb^ti ariyamaggabhāvanāya samucchedappahānavasena pahīno. ^b^sabbo doso^eb^ti āghātavatthukādibhāvena anekabhedabhinno sabbopi byāpādo. ^b^samūhato^eb^ti maggena samugghāṭito. ^b^sabbo me vigato moho^eb^ti ``dukkhe aññāṇa''ntiādinā (dha0 sa0 1067; vibha0 909) vatthubhedena aṭṭhabhedo, saṃkilesavatthuvibhāgena anekavibhāgo sabbopi moho maggena viddhaṃsitattā mayhaṃ vigato. ^b^sītibhūtosmi nibbuto^eb^ti evaṃ mūlakilesappahānena tadekaṭṭhatāya saṃkilesānaṃ sammadeva paṭippassaddhattā anavasesakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvato ^a^P1.0184^ea^ sītibhāvaṃ patto, tato eva sabbaso kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto ahaṃ asmi bhavāmīti aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kamma^eb^nti āyasmato uggattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato ^a^V1.0187^ea^ kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso ketakapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ugganigame seṭṭhiputto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^uggo^eb^tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto bhagavati tasmiṃ nigame bhaddārāme viharante vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.10-16) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano vaṭṭūpacchedadīpanena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kammaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
[22] sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ mayā pakataṃ kamma^eb^nti yaṃ kammaṃ tīhi kammadvārehi, chahi uppattidvārehi, aṭṭhahi asaṃvaradvārehi ^a^P1.0185^ea^, aṭṭhahi ca saṃvaradvārehi pāpādivasena dānādivasena cāti anekehi pakārehi anādimati saṃsāre yaṃ mayā kataṃ upacitaṃ abhinibbattitaṃ vipākakammaṃ. ^b^appaṃ vā yadi vā^eb^ ^a^V1.0188^ea^ ^b^bahu^eb^nti tañca vatthucetanāpayogakilesādīnaṃ dubbalabhāvena appaṃ vā, tesaṃ balavabhāvena abhiṇhapavattiyā ca bahuṃ vā. ^b^sabbametaṃ parikkhīṇa^eb^nti sabbameva cetaṃ kammaṃ kammakkhayakarassa aggamaggassa adhigatattā parikkhayaṃ gataṃ, kilesavaṭṭappahānena hi kammavaṭṭaṃ pahīnameva hoti vipākavaṭṭassa ^a^M1.0221^ea^ anuppādanato. tenāha ^b^``natthi dāni punabbhavo''^eb^ti. āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti mayhaṃ natthīti attho. ``sabbampeta''ntipi pāṭho, sabbampi etanti padavibhāgo.

[03] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0189^ea^ ^b^mayā pakataṃ pāpa^eb^nti āyasmato samitiguttattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannacitto jātisumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena yattha yattha bhave nibbatti, tattha tattha kularūpaparivārasampadāya aññe satte abhibhavitvā aṭṭhāsi. ekasmiṃ pana attabhāve aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ muṇḍako kuṭṭhī maññe, tenāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā vicaratī''ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkāmi. so tena kammena bahuṃ kālaṃ niraye paccitvā kassapassa bhagavato kāle manussaloke nibbatto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ upagato ekaṃ sīlācārasampannaṃ upāsakaṃ disvā dosantaro hutvā, ``kuṭṭharogī bhaveyyāsī''ti akkosi, nhānatitthe ca manussehi ṭhapitāni ^a^P1.0186^ea^ nhānacuṇṇāni dūsesi. so tena kammena puna niraye nibbattitvā bahūni vassāni dukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^samitigutto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā suvisuddhasīlo hutvā viharati. tassa purimakammanissandena kuṭṭharogo uppajji, tena tassa sarīrāvayavā yebhuyyena chinnabhinnā hutvā paggharanti. so gilānasālāyaṃ vasati. athekadivasaṃ dhammasenāpati gilānapucchaṃ gantvā tattha tattha gilāne bhikkhū pucchanto taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā ``āvuso, yāvatā khandhappavatti nāma, sabbaṃ dukkhameva vedanā. khandhesu pana asantesuyeva natthi ^a^M1.0222^ea^ dukkha''nti vedanānupassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā agamāsi. so therassa ovāde ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiññā sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.12.82-90) --
[22] na tā sakkonti kopetuṃ, jātipūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ..
[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena etarahi anubhuyyamānarogavasena purimajātīsu attanā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ anussaritvā tassa idāni sabbaso pahīnabhāvaṃ vibhāvento --
[21] ``yaṃ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu.
[22] idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ, vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0223^ea^ ^b^pāpa^eb^nti akusalaṃ kammaṃ. tañhi lāmakaṭṭhena pāpanti vuccati. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti purā. ^b^aññāsu jātisū^eb^ti ito aññāsu jātīsu, aññesu attabhāvesu. ayañhettha attho -- yadipi mayā imasmiṃ attabhāve na tādisaṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ atthi, idāni pana tassa sambhavoyeva natthi. yaṃ pana ito aññāsu jātīsu kataṃ atthi, ^b^idheva taṃ vedanīyaṃ,^eb^ tañhi idheva imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vedayitabbaṃ anubhavitabbaṃ phalaṃ, kasmā? ^b^vatthu aññaṃ na vijjatī^eb^ti tassa kammassa vipaccanokāso añño khandhappabandho natthi, ime ^a^P1.0187^ea^ pana khandhā sabbaso upādānānaṃ ^a^V1.0191^ea^ pahīnattā anupādāno viya jātavedo carimakacittanirodhena appaṭisandhikā nirujjhantīti aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^yena yena subhikkhānī^eb^ti āyasmato kassapattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā tīsu vedesu aññesu ca brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato, so ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. karonto ca satthu samantato upari ca pupphamuṭṭhiyo khipi. buddhānubhāvena pupphāni pupphāsanākārena sattāhaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. so taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. aparāparaṃ puññāni karonto kappasatasahassaṃ sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa udiccabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^kassapo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. tassa daharakāleyeva pitā kālamakāsi. mātā taṃ paṭijaggati. so ekadivasaṃ jetavanaṃ gato bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā hetusampannatāya tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpanno hutvā mātu santikaṃ gantvā anujānāpetvā pabbajito satthari vuṭṭhavasse pavāretvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkante sayampi satthārā saddhiṃ gantukāmo āpucchituṃ mātu santikaṃ agamāsi. mātā vissajjentī ovādavasena --
[22] tena puttaka gacchassu, mā sokāpahato bhavā''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yena yenā^eb^ti yattha yattha. bhummatthe hi etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ disābhāgeti attho. ^b^subhikkhānī^eb^ti sulabhapiṇḍāni, raṭṭhānīti adhippāyo. ^b^sivānī^eb^ti khemāni arogāni. ^b^abhayānī^eb^ti corabhayādīhi nibbhayāni, rogadubbhikkhabhayāni pana ``subhikkhāni, sivānī''ti padadvayeneva gahitāni. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tattha, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ^a^P1.0188^ea^ disābhāgeti attho. ^b^puttakā^eb^ti anukampantī taṃ ālapati. ^b^mā^eb^ti paṭisedhatthe nipāto ^b^sokāpahato^eb^ti vuttaguṇarahitāni raṭṭhāni gantvā dubbhikkhabhayādijanitena sokena upahato mā ^b^bhava^eb^ māhosīti attho. taṃ sutvā thero, ``mama mātā mayhaṃ sokarahitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ āsīsati, handa mayaṃ sabbaso accantameva sokarahitaṃ ^a^V1.0192^ea^ ṭhānaṃ pattuṃ yutta''nti ussāhajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.13.1-9) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ``idameva mātu vacanaṃ arahattappattiyā aṅkusaṃ jāta''nti tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.

[03] ^b^sīhappamatto viharā^eb^ti āyasmato sīhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? so kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake atthadassissa bhagavato kāle candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā pupphabhakkho pupphanivasano hutvā viharanto ākāsena gacchantaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pūjetukāmo añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ^a^V1.0193^ea^ ñatvā ākāsato oruyha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle pallaṅkena nisīdi. kinnaro candanasāraṃ ghaṃsitvā candanagandhena pupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mallarājakule nibbatti, tassa ^a^P1.0189^ea^ ^b^sīho^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. so bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ kathesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharati. tassa cittaṃ nānārammaṇe vidhāvati, ekaggaṃ na hoti, sakatthaṃ nipphādetuṃ na sakkoti. satthā taṃ disvā ākāse ṭhatvā --
[22] bhāvehi kusalaṃ dhammaṃ, jaha sīghaṃ samussaya''nti.. --
[25] gāthāya ovadi. so gāthāvasāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.17-25) --

[03] yā pana bhagavatā ovādavasena vuttā ``sīhappamatto''ti gāthā, tattha ^b^sīhā^eb^ti tassa therassa ālapanaṃ. ^b^appamatto viharā^eb^ti satiyā avippavāsena pamādavirahito sabbiriyāpathesu satisampajaññayutto hutvā viharāhi. idāni taṃ appamādavihāraṃ saha phalena saṅkhepato dassetuṃ ^b^``rattindiva''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tassattho -- rattibhāgaṃ ^a^M1.0227^ea^ divasabhāgañca ``caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.239; a0 ni0 3.16; vibha0 519) vuttanayena catusammappadhānavasena atandito akusīto āraddhavīriyo kusalaṃ samathavipassanādhammañca lokuttaradhammañca bhāvehi uppādehi vaḍḍhehi ca, evaṃ bhāvetvā ca ^b^jaha sīghaṃ samussaya^eb^nti tava samussayaṃ attabhāvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena sīghaṃ nacirasseva pajaha, evaṃbhūto ca pacchā carimakacittanirodhena anavasesato ca pajahissatīti. arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsīti.

[03] ^b^sabbarattiṃ^eb^ ^a^P1.0190^ea^ ^b^supitvānā^eb^ti āyasmato nītattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle sunando nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā anekasate brāhmaṇe mante vācento vājapeyyaṃ nāma yaññaṃ yaji, bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ anukampanto yaññaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse caṅkami. brāhmaṇo satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso sissehi pupphāni āharāpetvā ākāse khipitvā pūjaṃ akāsi. buddhānubhāvena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sakalañca nagaraṃ pupphapaṭavitānikaṃ viya chāditaṃ ahosi. mahājano satthari uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. sunandabrāhmaṇo tena kusalamūlena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^nīto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto ``ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu senāsanesu viharanti, imesu pabbajitvā sukhena viharituṃ sakkā''ti sukhābhilāsāya pabbajitvāva satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā katipāhameva manasikaritvā taṃ chaḍḍetvā yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā divasabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇikārāmo tiracchānakathāya vītināmeti, rattibhāgepi thinamiddhābhibhūto sabbarattiṃ supati. satthā tassa hetuparipākaṃ oloketvā ovādaṃ dento --
[22] kudāssu nāma dummedho, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sabbaratti^eb^nti sakalaṃ rattiṃ. ^b^supitvānā^eb^ti niddāyitvā, ``rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī''tiādinā vuttaṃ jāgariyaṃ ananuyuñjitvā kevalaṃ rattiyā tīsupi yāmesu niddaṃ okkamitvāti attho. ^b^divā^eb^ti divasaṃ, sakalaṃ divasabhāganti attho. ^b^saṅgaṇike^eb^ti tiracchānakathikehi kāyadaḷhibahulapuggalehi ^a^P1.0191^ea^ sannisajjā saṅgaṇiko, tasmiṃ ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato tattha avigatacchando ``saṅgaṇike rato''ti vutto ``saṅgaṇikārato''tipi pāḷi. ^b^kudāssu nāmā^eb^ti kudā nāma. ^b^assū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, kasmiṃ nāma kāleti attho. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippañño. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa. ^b^anta^eb^nti pariyosānaṃ. accantameva anuppādaṃ kadā nāma karissati, edisassa dukkhassantakaraṇaṃ natthīti attho. ``dummedha dukkhassantaṃ karissasī''tipi pāḷi.
[03] evaṃ pana satthārā gāthāya kathitāya thero saṃvegajāto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.26-33) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto tameva gāthaṃ paccudāhāsi.

[03] ^b^cittanimittassa kovido^eb^ti āyasmato sunāgattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekattiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā araññāyatane assame vasanto tīṇi brāhmaṇasahassāni mante vācesi. athekadivasaṃ tassa satthāraṃ disvā lakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā lakkhaṇamante parivattentassa, ``īdisehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato anantajino anantañāṇo buddho bhavissatī''ti buddhañāṇaṃ ārabbha uḷāro pasādo uppajji. so tena cittappasādena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto ^a^P1.0192^ea^ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde nālakagāme aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^sunāgo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so dhammasenāpatissa gihisahāyo therassa santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dassanabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.34-40) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāpadesena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] jhāyaṃ nipako patissato, adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^cittanimittassa kovido^eb^ti bhāvanācittassa nimittaggahaṇe kusalo, ``imasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, imasmiṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ, imasmiṃ ajjhupekkhitabba''nti evaṃ paggahaṇādiyogyassa cittanimittassa gahaṇe cheko. ^b^pavivekarasaṃ vijāniyā^eb^ti kāyavivekasaṃvaḍḍhitassa cittavivekassa rasaṃ sañjānitvā, vivekasukhaṃ anubhavitvāti attho. ``pavivekarasaṃ pitvā''ti (dha0 pa0 205) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^jhāya^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānena pacchā lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanto. ^b^nipako^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānapariharaṇe kusalo. ^b^patissato^eb^ti upaṭṭhitassati. ^b^adhigaccheyya sukhaṃ nirāmisa^eb^nti evaṃ samathanimittādikosallena labbhe cittavivekasukhe patiṭṭhāya sato sampajāno ^a^M1.0231^ea^ hutvā vipassanājhāneneva jhāyanto kāmāmisavaṭṭāmisehi asammissatāya nirāmisaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ phalasukhañca adhigaccheyya samupagaccheyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^ito^eb^ ^a^P1.0193^ea^ ^b^bahiddhā puthuaññavādina^eb^nti āyasmato nāgitattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle nārado nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā ekadivasaṃ māḷake nisinno bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena purakkhataṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tīhi gāthāhi abhitthavi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sakyarājakule nibbatti, ^b^nāgito^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so bhagavati ^a^V1.0198^ea^ kapilavatthusmiṃ viharante ^b^madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 1.199 ādayo) sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.47-54) --
[22] vikappetuṃ na sakkonti, ko disvā nappasīdati..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā satthu avitathadesanataṃ dhammassa ca niyyānikataṃ nissāya sañjātapītisomanasso pītivegappavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānento --
[21] ``ito bahiddhā puthuaññavādinaṃ, maggo na nibbānagamo yathā ayaṃ.
[22] itissu saṅghaṃ bhagavānusāsati, satthā sayaṃ pāṇitaleva dassaya''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ito bahiddhā^eb^ti imasmā buddhasāsanā bāhirake samaye, tenāha ^b^``puthuaññavādina''^eb^nti, nānātitthiyānanti attho. ^b^maggo na nibbānagamo yathā aya^eb^nti yathā ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ekaṃsena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti nibbānagamo, nibbānagāmī, evaṃ nibbānagamo maggo titthiyasamaye natthi asammāsambuddhappaveditattā aññatitthiyavādassa. tenāha bhagavā --

[02] ``idheva ^a^V1.0199^ea^, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha ^a^P1.0194^ea^ catuttho samaṇo, suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.214; ma0 ni0 1.139; a0 ni0 4.241).

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^assū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^saṅgha^eb^nti bhikkhusaṅghaṃ, ukkaṭṭhaniddesoyaṃ yathā ``satthā devamanussāna''nti. ^b^saṅgha^eb^nti vā samūhaṃ, veneyyajananti adhippāyo. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavā, ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyaṃ itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena ^a^M1.0233^ea^ veditabbo. ^b^satthā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti satthā. ^b^saya^eb^nti sayameva. ayañhettha attho -- ``sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko nibbānagāmī ariyamaggo yathā mama sāsane atthi, evaṃ bāhirakasamaye maggo nāma natthī''ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto amhākaṃ satthā bhagavā sayameva sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ, sayameva vā mahākaruṇāsañcodito hutvā attano desanāvilāsasampattiyā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya dassento bhikkhusaṅghaṃ veneyyajanataṃ anusāsati ovadatīti.

[03] ^b^khandhā diṭṭhā yathābhūta^eb^nti āyasmato paviṭṭhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kesavo nāma tāpaso hutvā ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso abhivādetvā añjaliṃ paggayha padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uppajjitvā anukkamena viññutaṃ patto nekkhammaninnajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha sikkhitabbaṃ sikkhitvā ^a^P1.0195^ea^ vicaranto upatissakolitānaṃ buddhasāsane pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā ``tepi nāma mahāpaññā tattha pabbajitā, tadeva maññe seyyo''ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. tassa satthā vipassanaṃ ācikkhi. so vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.55-59) --
[21] ``nārado ^a^V1.0200^ea^ iti me nāmaṃ, kesavo iti maṃ vidū.
[22] assāsayanto satte so, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā..
[22] vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^khandhā^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhā, te hi vipassanupalakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca ñātapariññādīhi parijānanavasena vipassitabbā. ^b^diṭṭhā yathābhūta^eb^nti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya ``idaṃ dukkha''ntiādinā aviparītato diṭṭhā. ^b^bhavā sabbe padālitā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo sabbe kammabhavā upapattibhavā ca maggañāṇasatthena bhinnā viddhaṃsitā. kilesapadālaneneva hi kammopapattibhavā padālitā nāma honti. tenāha ^b^``vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''^eb^ti. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^asakkhiṃ vata attāna^eb^nti āyasmato ajjunattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa ^a^P1.0196^ea^ bhagavato kāle sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ araññe aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ ^a^M1.0235^ea^ disvā ``ayaṃ kho imasmiṃ kāle sabbaseṭṭho purisasīho''ti pasannamānaso supupphitasālasākhaṃ ^a^V1.0201^ea^ bhañjitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti. ^b^ajjuno^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto nigaṇṭhehi kataparicayo hutvā ``evāhaṃ amataṃ adhigamissāmī''ti vivaṭṭajjhāsayatāya daharakāleyeva nigaṇṭhesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṃ alabhanto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā nacirasseva arahā ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.60-65) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā anuttarasukhādhigamasambhūtena pītivegena udānaṃ udānento --
[22] vuyhamāno mahogheva, saccāni paṭivijjhaha''nti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.
[03] tattha ^a^M1.0236^ea^ ^b^asakkhi^eb^nti sakkosiṃ. ^b^vatā^eb^ti vimhaye nipāto. ativimhayanīyañhetaṃ yadidaṃ saccapaṭivedho. tenāha --
[02] ``taṃ kiṃmaññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho dukkarataraṃ vā durabhisambhavataraṃ vā, yaṃ sattadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyyā''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 5.1115)?

[03] ^b^attāna^eb^nti niyakajjhattaṃ sandhāya vadati. yo hi paro na hoti so attāti. ^b^uddhātu^eb^nti ^a^V1.0202^ea^ uddharituṃ, ``uddhaṭa''ntipi pāṭho. ^b^udakā^eb^ti saṃsāramahoghasaṅkhātā udakā. ^b^thala^eb^nti nibbānathalaṃ. ^b^vuyhamāno mahoghevā^eb^ti mahaṇṇave vuyhamāno viya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā nāma gambhīravitthate appatiṭṭhe mahati udakoghe vegasā vuyhamāno puriso kenaci ^a^P1.0197^ea^ atthakāmena upanītaṃ phiyārittasampannaṃ daḷhanāvaṃ labhitvā sukheneva tato attānaṃ uddharituṃ sakkuṇeyya pāraṃ pāpuṇeyya, evamevāhaṃ saṃsāramahoghe kilesābhisaṅkhāravegena vuyhamāno satthārā upanītaṃ samathavipassanupetaṃ ariyamagganāvaṃ labhitvā tato attānaṃ uddharituṃ nibbānathalaṃ pattuṃ aho asakkhinti. yathā pana asakkhi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saccāni paṭivijjhaha''^eb^nti āha. yasmā ahaṃ dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhiṃ ariyamaggañāṇena aññāsiṃ, tasmā asakkhiṃ vata attānaṃ uddhātuṃ udakā thalanti yojanā.

[03] ^b^uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipā^eb^ti āyasmato devasabhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? sopi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso piyālaphalaṃ upanesi. satthā tassa pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ taṃ paribhuñji. so tena ativiya pasannacitto hutvā kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cittaṃ pasādeti ^a^M1.0237^ea^. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbatto aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatto taruṇakāleyeva rajje patiṭṭhito rajjasukhamanubhavanto vuddho satthāraṃ upasaṅkami, tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho saṃvegajāto rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.14.66-72) --
[22] deyyadhammo ca me natthi, dvipadindassa tādino..
[21] ``ekattiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ ahaṃ.
[01] arahattaṃ ^a^P1.0198^ea^ pana patvā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavasena uppannasomanasso udānaṃ udānento --
[22] mutto oghā ca ganthā ca, sabbe mānā visaṃhatā''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0238^ea^ ^b^uttiṇṇā^eb^ti uttaritā atikkantā. ^b^paṅkapalipā^eb^ti paṅkā ca palipā ca. paṅko vuccati pakatikaddamo. ``palipo''ti gambhīraputhulo mahākaddamo. idha pana paṅko viyāti paṅko, kāmarāgo asucibhāvāpādanena cittassa makkhanato. palipo viyāti palipo, puttadārādivisayo bahalo chandarāgo vuttanayena sammakkhanato duruttaraṇato ca. te mayā anāgāmimaggena sabbaso atikkantāti āha ``uttiṇṇā paṅkapalipā''ti. ^b^pātālā^eb^ti pātāyālanti pātālā, mahāsamudde ninnatarapadesā. keci pana nāgabhavanaṃ ``pātāla''nti vadanti. idha pana agāhaduravaggāhaduruttaraṇaṭṭhena pātālā viyāti pātālā, diṭṭhiyo. te ca mayā paṭhamamaggādhigameneva sabbathā vajjitā samucchinnāti āha ^b^``pātālā parivajjitā''^eb^ti ^b^mutto oghā ca ganthā cā^eb^ti kāmoghādioghato abhijjhākāyaganthādiganthato ca tena tena maggena mutto parimutto, puna anabhikiraṇāganthanavasena atikkantoti attho. ^b^sabbe mānā visaṃhatā^eb^ti navavidhāpi mānā aggamaggādhigamena visesato saṅghātaṃ vināsaṃ āpāditā samucchinnā ``mānavidhā hatā''ti keci paṭhanti, mānakoṭṭhāsāti attho. ``mānavisā''ti apare, tesaṃ pana mānavisassa dukkhassa phalato mānavisāti attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^pañcakkhandhā^eb^ ^a^V1.0204^ea^ ^a^P1.0199^ea^ ^b^pariññātāti^eb^ āyasmato sāmidattattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpe pupphehi chattātichattaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devaloke nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^sāmidatto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so anukkamena viññutaṃ patto buddhānubhāvaṃ sutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato satthāraṃ ^a^M1.0239^ea^ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekamantaṃ nisīdi. satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ desesi, yathā saddhaṃ paṭilabhi saṃsāre ca saṃvegaṃ. so paṭiladdhasaddho saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā ñāṇassa aparipakkattā katipayakālaṃ alasabahulī vihāsi. puna satthārā dhammadesanāya samuttejito vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha yuttappayutto viharanto nacireneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.15.1-4) --
[21] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..
[03] so aparabhāge bhikkhūhi ``kiṃ tayā, āvuso, uttarimanussadhammo adhigato''ti puṭṭho sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ attano ca dhammānudhammappaṭipattiṃ tesaṃ pavedento aññābyākaraṇavasena --
[22] vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^pañcakkhandhā pariññātā^eb^ti mayā ime pañcupādānakkhandhā ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na tato bhiyyo''ti tīhi pariññāhi paricchinditvā ñātā viditā paṭividdhā. ^b^tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā^eb^ti tathā pariññātattāyeva mūlabhūtassa ^a^M1.0240^ea^ ^a^P1.0200^ea^ samudayassa sabbaso pahīnattā te idāni yāva carimakacittanirodho tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā, carimakacittanirodhena pana appaṭisandhikāva nirujjhanti. tenāha -- ``vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V1.0206^ea^ ^b^tathā mataṃ satarasa^eb^nti āyasmato paripuṇṇakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro dhammadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute satthu cetiye pupphādīhi uḷāraṃ pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devesu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ puññāni katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sakyarājakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto paripuṇṇavibhavatāya ^b^paripuṇṇako^eb^ti paññāyittha. so vibhavasampannatāya sabbakālaṃ satarasaṃ nāma āhāraṃ paribhuñjanto satthu missakāhāraparibhogaṃ sutvā ``tāva sukhumālopi bhagavā nibbānasukhaṃ apekkhitvā yathā tathā yāpeti, kasmā mayaṃ āhāragiddhā hutvā āhārasuddhikā bhavissāma, nibbānasukhameva pana amhehi pariyesitabba''nti saṃsāre jātasaṃvego gharāvāsaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā bhagavatā kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne niyojito tattha patiṭṭhāya paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.15.5-9) --
[21] ``aho ^a^M1.0241^ea^ buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā.
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^V1.0207^ea^ pana patvā dhamme gāravabahumānena pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ ^a^P1.0201^ea^ udānaṃ udānento ^b^``na tathā mataṃ satarasa''^eb^nti gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^na tathā mataṃ satarasaṃ, sudhannaṃ yaṃ mayajja paribhutta^eb^nti ^b^tathā^eb^ti tena pakārena. ^b^mata^eb^nti abhimataṃ. ^b^satarasa^eb^nti satarasabhojanaṃ ``satarasabhojanaṃ nāma satapākasappiādīhi abhisaṅkhataṃ bhojana''nti vadanti. atha vā anekattho satasaddo ``sataso sahassaso''tiādīsu viya. tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ anekasūpaṃ anekabyañjanaṃ, taṃ anekarasatāya ``satarasa''nti vuccati, nānārasabhojananti attho. sudhā eva annaṃ sudhābhojanaṃ devānaṃ āhāro. ^b^yaṃ mayajja paribhutta^eb^nti yaṃ mayā ajja anubhuttaṃ. ``yaṃ mayā paribhutta''nti ca idaṃ ``satarasaṃ sudhanna''nti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yaṃ mayā ajja etarahi nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanavasena ca accantameva santaṃ paṇītaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ paribhuñjiyamānaṃ, taṃ yathā mataṃ abhimataṃ sambhāvitaṃ tathā rājakāle mayā paribhuttaṃ satarasabhojanaṃ devattabhāve paribhuttaṃ sudhannañca na mataṃ nābhimataṃ. kasmā? idañhi ariyanisevitaṃ nirāmisaṃ kilesānaṃ avatthubhūtaṃ, taṃ pana puthujjanasevitaṃ sāmisaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ, taṃ imassa saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetīti. idāni ``yaṃ mayajja paribhutta''nti vuttadhammaṃ desento ^b^aparimitadassinā gotamena, buddhena sudesito dhammo''^eb^ti āha. tassattho -- aparimitaṃ aparicchinnaṃ uppādavayābhāvato santaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sayambhūñāṇena passī, aparimitassa anantāparimeyyassa ñeyyassa dassāvīti tena ^b^aparimitadassinā^eb^ gotamagottena sammāsambuddhena ^a^M1.0242^ea^ ``khayaṃ virāgaṃ amataṃ paṇīta''nti (khu0 pā0 6.4; su0 ni0 227) ca ``madanimmadano pipāsavinayo'' (a0 ni0 4.34; itivu0 90) ``sabbasaṅkhārasamatho''ti (a0 ni0 5.140; 10.6) ca ādinā suṭṭhu ^b^desito dhammo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ mayā ajja paribhuttanti yojanā.

[03] ^b^yassāsavā^eb^ ^a^P1.0202^ea^ ^b^parikkhīṇā^eb^ti āyasmato vijayattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro piyadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa thūpassa ratanakhacitaṃ vedikaṃ kāretvā tattha uḷāraṃ vedikāmahaṃ ^a^V1.0208^ea^ kāresi. so tena puññakammena anekasate attabhāve maṇiobhāsena vicari. evaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, ^b^vijayo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto brāhmaṇavijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane jhānalābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā uppannappasādo satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. tassa satthā dhammaṃ desesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.15.10-14) --
[22] vedikāya mahaṃ katvā, tattha kālaṅkato ahaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0243^ea^ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto ^b^``yassāsavā parikkhīṇā''^eb^ti gāthaṃ abhāsi.
