[03] ^b^yathāpi^eb^ ^a^M1.0381^ea^ ^b^bhaddo ājañño^eb^ti āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle paccantadese uppajjitvā viññutaṃ patto ^a^P2.0048^ea^ vanacāriko hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṃ disvā pasannacitto vālukā okiri. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campāyaṃ gahapatikule nibbatti, tassa ^b^nandako^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. jeṭṭhakabhātā panassa bharato nāma. tassa pubbayogo anantaravatthusmiṃ āvibhavissati. te ubhopi ^a^V1.0325^ea^ viññutaṃ patvā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ koḷivisaṃ pabbajitaṃ sutvā ``soṇopi nāma tathāsukhumālo pabbaji, kimaṅgaṃ pana maya''nti pabbajiṃsu. tesu bharato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. nandako pana kilesānaṃ balavabhāvena tāva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi, vipassanāya kammaṃ karoti eva. athassa bharatatthero āsayaṃ ñatvā avassayo bhavitukāmo taṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vihārato nikkhamitvā maggasamīpe nisinno vipassanākathaṃ kathesi.

[03] tena ca samayena sakaṭasatthe gacchante eko sakaṭe yutto goṇo cikkhallaṭṭhāne sakaṭaṃ uddharituṃ asakkonto paripati. tato naṃ satthavāho sakaṭā mocetvā tiṇañca pānīyañca datvā parissamaṃ apanetvā puna dhure yojesi. tato goṇo vūpasantaparissamo laddhabalo taṃ sakaṭaṃ cikkhallaṭṭhānato uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi. atha bharatatthero nandakassa ``passasi no tvaṃ, āvuso nandaka, imassa kamma''nti taṃ nidassetvā tena ``passāmī''ti vutte ``imamatthaṃ suṭṭhu upadhārehī''ti āha. itaro ``yathāyaṃ goṇo vūpasantaparissamo paṅkaṭṭhānato bhāraṃ ubbahati, evaṃ mayāpi saṃsārapaṅkato attā uddharitabbo''ti tamevārammaṇaṃ katvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.90-95) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano jeṭṭhabhātikassa bharatattherassa santike aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] bhiyyo laddhāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhuraṃ..
[22] ājānīyaṃ maṃ dhāretha, puttaṃ buddhassa orasa''nti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0326^ea^ ^a^P2.0049^ea^ ^b^bhiyyo laddhāna saṃvegaṃ, adīno vahate dhura^eb^nti ``mayhaṃ jātibalavīriyānaṃ ananucchavikametaṃ yadidaṃ āgatassa bhārassa avahana''nti saṃvegaṃ labhitvā adīno adīnamānaso alīnacitto. ``alīno''ti vā pāṭho, so eva attho. bhiyyo punappunaṃ bhiyyosomattāya attano dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vahate ubbahati. sesaṃ heṭṭhā ramaṇīyavihārittherassa gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ehi^eb^ ^a^M1.0383^ea^, ^b^nandaka, gacchāmā^eb^ti āyasmato bharatattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ manuññadassanaṃ mudusukhasamphassaṃ upāhanadvayaṃ gahetvā gacchanto satthāraṃ caṅkamantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanā upanāmetvā, ``abhiruhatu bhagavā upāhanā, yaṃ mama assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā''ti āha. abhiruhi bhagavā tassa anuggaṇhanatthaṃ upāhanā. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde campānagare gahapatikule nibbatti, ^b^bharato^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto soṇattherassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā ``sopi nāma pabbajī''ti sañjātasaṃvego pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.71-89) --
[22] ito phalaṃ labhissāmi, so me attho samijjhatu..
[21] ``yo ^a^V1.0327^ea^ pānadhiṃ me adāsi, pasanno sehi pāṇibhi.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] datvāna pānadhiṃ ekaṃ, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ..

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikena nandakattherena heṭṭhā vuttanayena aññābyākaraṇe kate ``idāni nandakopi arahā jāto, handa mayaṃ ubhopi satthu santikaṃ gantvā vusitabrahmacariyataṃ nivedessāmāti uppannaṃ parivitakkaṃ nandakattherassa kathento --
[22] so no attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0328^ea^ ^a^P2.0050^ea^ ^b^nandakā^eb^ti ālapanaṃ. ^b^ehī^eb^ti tassa attano santikakaraṇaṃ. ^b^gacchāmā^eb^ti tena attanā ca ekajjhaṃ kātabbakiriyāvacanaṃ, ^b^upajjhāyassā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa, sammāsambuddho hi samantacakkhunā buddhacakkhunā ca sattānaṃ āsayānusayacaritādīnaṃ yathābhūtavilokanena sadevakassa lokassa vajjāvajjaṃ upanijjhāyatīti visesato upajjhāyoti vattabbataṃ arahati. yadatthaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sīhanādaṃ nadissāma, buddhaseṭṭhassa sammukhā''^eb^ti āha. yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāratāya abhītanādabhāvato sīhanādaṃ buddhassa sammāsambuddhassa tato eva sabbasattuttamatāya seṭṭhassa, buddhānaṃ vā sāvakabuddhādīnaṃ seṭṭhassa sammukhā purato nadissāmāti attho.

[03] yathā pana sīhanādaṃ naditukāmo, taṃ dassento ^b^``yāyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yāyā^eb^ti yadatthaṃ, yāya yadatthānuppattiyāti attho. ^b^no^eb^ti amhākaṃ. ^b^anukampāyā^eb^ti anuggaṇhanena amhe dvepi ^b^pabbājayi^eb^ pabbājesi. ^b^munī^eb^ti bhagavā. ^b^so no attho anuppatto^eb^ti so attho sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ no amhehi anuppatto, adhigatoti attho.

[03] ^b^nadanti evaṃ sappaññā^eb^ti āyasmato bhāradvājattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sumanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ^a^M1.0386^ea^ paripakkaṃ vallikāraphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā gottanāmena ^b^bhāradvājo^eb^tveva paññāyittha. so vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaputtaṃ labhi. tassa ``kaṇhadinno''ti nāmaṃ akāsi. tassa viññutaṃ pattakāle ``tāta, asukassa nāma ācariyassa santike sippaṃ sikkhitvā ehī''ti taṃ takkasilaṃ pesesi. so gacchanto antarāmagge satthu sāvakaṃ aññataraṃ mahātheraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ labhitvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā katapubbakicco vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.66-70) --
[21] ``ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā.

[03] athassa ^a^P2.0051^ea^ pitā bhāradvājo veḷuvane viharantaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. atha putto satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ āgato satthu santike nisinnaṃ pitaraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto ``pitāpi kho me pabbajito, kiṃ nu kho tena pabbajjākiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpita''nti vīmaṃsanto khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmo, ``sādhu, kho tumhehi kataṃ pabbajantehi, pabbajjākiccaṃ pana matthakaṃ pāpita''nti pucchi. bhāradvājo puttassa adhigamaṃ dīpento --
[21] ``satthā ca pariciṇṇo me, dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito.
[22] ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsava''nti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0387^ea^ ^b^nadantī^eb^ti yathābhuccaguṇābhibyāhāravasena abhītanādaṃ nadanti gajjanti. ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vattabbākāradassanaṃ. ^b^sappaññā^eb^ti aggamaggapaññādhigamena sabbapaññādhigamena sabbapaññāvepullappattā. ^b^vīrā^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyasampannatāya vīrā, tato eva anavasesasaṃkilesapakkhanimmathanena ^b^savāhanaṃ^eb^ kilesa^b^māraṃ^eb^ abhisaṅkhāra^b^māraṃ^eb^ devaputta^b^mārañca jetvā^eb^ sabbaso ^b^vijitasaṅgāmā^eb^ nadanti sappaññāti sambandho.

[03] evaṃ vijetabbavijayena sīhanādaṃ dassetvā idāni ārādhetabbasamārādhanena icchitabbasiddhiyā ca taṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^``satthā ca pariciṇṇo me''^eb^ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^satthā ca pariciṇṇo me^eb^ti mama satthā sammāsambuddho yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ovādānusāsanīkaraṇena mayā pariciṇṇo upāsito, na dhammādhikaraṇaṃ visositoti adhippāyo. ^b^dhammo saṅgho ca pūjito^eb^ti navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo, yathāpaṭipattiyāgatamaggānuppattiyā sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagamanena ariyasaṅgho ca mayā pūjito mānito. ^b^ahañca vitto sumano, puttaṃ disvā anāsava^eb^nti mama puttaṃ ^a^V1.0330^ea^ anāsavaṃ sabbaso khīṇāsavaṃ disvā dassanahetu ahampi vitto nirāmisāya pītiyā tuṭṭho, tatoyeva nirāmisena somanassena sumano jātoti attho.

[03] ^b^upāsitā^eb^ ^a^P2.0052^ea^ ^b^sappurisā^eb^ti āyasmato kaṇhadinnattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito catunavute kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sobhitaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannacitto punnāgapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^kaṇhadinno^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno dhammasenāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ^a^M1.0388^ea^ dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.61-65) --
[21] ``bhavarāgahatassa me sato, bhavarāgo puna me na vijjati.
[22] na cāhu na ca me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^upāsitā^eb^ti paricaritā paṭipattipayirupāsanāya payirupāsitā. ^b^sappurisā^eb^ti santehi ^a^V1.0331^ea^ sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatā purisā, ariyapuggalā sāriputtattherādayo. etena purimacakkadvayasampattimattano dasseti. na hi patirūpadesavāsena vinā sappurisūpanissayo sambhavati. ^b^sutā dhammā^eb^ti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttadhammā sotadvārānusārena upadhāritā. etena attano bāhusaccaṃ dassento pacchimacakkadvayasampattiṃ dasseti. ^b^abhiṇhaso^eb^ti bahuso na kālena kālaṃ. idañca padaṃ ``upāsitā sappurisā''ti etthāpi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^sutvāna paṭipajjissaṃ, añjasaṃ amatogadha^eb^nti te dhamme sutvā tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme salakkhaṇādito pariggahetvā anukkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā amatogadhaṃ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ taṃsampāpakaṃ añjasaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃ pāpuṇiṃ.

[03] ^b^bhavarāgahatassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0389^ea^ ^b^me sato^eb^ti bhavarāgena bhavataṇhāya anādimati ^a^P2.0053^ea^ saṃsāre hatassa upaddutassa mama sato samānassa, aggamaggena vā hatabhavarāgassa. ^b^bhavarāgo puna me na vijjatī^eb^ti tato eva puna idāni bhavarāgo me natthi. ^b^na cāhu na me bhavissati, na ca me etarahi vijjatī^eb^ti yadipi pubbe puthujjanakāle sekkhakāle ca me bhavarāgo ahosi, aggamaggappattito pana paṭṭhāya na cāhu na ca ahosi, āyatimpi na me bhavissati, etarahi adhunāpi na ca me vijjati na ca upalabbhati, pahīnoti attho. bhavarāgavacaneneva cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya mānādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti sabbaso parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanataṃ dasseti.

[01] ^b^yato^eb^ ^a^V1.0332^ea^ ^b^ahaṃ pabbajito^eb^ti āyasmato migasirattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kusaṭṭhakaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā migasiranakkhattena jātattā ^b^migasiro^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhi, yaṃ parijappetvā tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā ``ayaṃ satto asukaṭṭhāne nibbatto''ti jānāti.

[03] so gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ vijjaṃ nissāya lokena sakkato garukato lābhī hutvā vicaranto sāvatthiṃ upagato ^a^M1.0390^ea^ satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento -- ``ahaṃ, bho gotama, matānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī''ti vatvā, ``kathaṃ pana tvaṃ jānāsī''ti vutte, ``chavasīsāni āharāpetvā mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena sīsaṃ ākoṭento nirayādikaṃ tehi tehi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī''ti kathesi. athassa bhagavā parinibbutassa bhikkhuno sīsakapālaṃ āharāpetvā, ``kathehi tāva tassa gatiṃ, yassidaṃ sīsakapāla''nti āha. so taṃ kapālaṃ mantaṃ parijappetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passati. atha satthārā, ``na sakkosi paribbājakā''ti vutte ^a^P2.0054^ea^, ``upaparikkhissāmi tāvā''ti vatvā punappunaṃ parivattentopi na passateva. bāhirakamantena hi khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati, athassa matthakato kacchehi ca sedo mucci. so lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi. satthā ``kilamasi paribbājakā''ti āha. so ``āma, kilamāmi, na imassa gatiṃ jānāmi, tumhe pana jānāthā''ti. ``ahaṃ etaṃ jānāmi, ito uttaritarampi jānāmī''ti vatvā ``nibbānaṃ gato so''ti āha. paribbājako ``imaṃ vijjaṃ mayhaṃ dethā''ti āha. ``tena hi pabbajā''ti vatvā taṃ pabbājetvā paṭhamaṃ samathakammaṭṭhāne niyojetvā ^a^V1.0333^ea^ jhānābhiññāsu patiṭṭhitassa vipassanāya kammaṃ upadisi. so vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.56-60) --
[22] akuppā me vimuttīti, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yato ahaṃ pabbajito, sammāsambuddhasāsane^eb^ti yato pabhuti ahaṃ pabbajito buddhassa bhagavato sāsane, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya. ^b^vimuccamāno uggacchi^eb^nti saṃkilesapakkhato paṭhamaṃ tāva samathavipassanāhi vimuccamāno vodānadhammasavanena uṭṭhahiṃ. evaṃ uggacchanto ^b^kāmadhātuṃ upaccagaṃ^eb^ anāgāmimaggena accantameva kāmadhātuṃ atikkamiṃ.

[03] ^b^brahmuno pekkhamānassa, tato cittaṃ vimucci me^eb^ti sadevakassa lokassa aggabhūtattā seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmuno buddhassa bhagavato mahākaruṇāyogena ``ayaṃ kulaputto mama sāsane pabbajitvā kathaṃ nu kho paṭipajjatī''ti pekkhantassa tato anāgāmimaggādhigamato pacchā aggamaggādhigamena mama cittaṃ sabbasaṃkilesato accantameva mucci. ^b^akuppā^eb^ ^a^P2.0055^ea^ ^b^me vimuttīti, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayā^eb^ti tathāvimuttacittattā eva sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayā parikkhayā iti evaṃ akuppā me vimuttīti aññaṃ byākāsi.

[01] ^b^aniccāni^eb^ ^a^V1.0334^ea^ ^b^gahakānī^eb^ti āyasmato sivakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso pattaṃ ādāya kummāsassa pūretvā adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, ^b^sivako^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ ^a^M1.0392^ea^ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāme pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.117-121) --
[22] rittakaṃ pattaṃ disvāna, kummāsaṃ pūrayiṃ ahaṃ..
[27] sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, thūṇikā ca vidālitā.
[22] vimariyādikataṃ cittaṃ, idheva vidhamissatī''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^aniccāni gahakāni, tattha tattha punappuna^eb^nti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave punappunaṃ nibbattamānāni gahakāni attabhāvagehāni na nibbāni anavaṭṭhitāni ittarāni parittakālāni. ^b^gahakāraṃ gavesanto^eb^ti imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ pariyesanto ettakaṃ kālaṃ anuvicarinti adhippāyo. ^b^dukkhā jāti punappuna^eb^nti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ ^a^P2.0056^ea^. yasmā ^a^V1.0335^ea^ jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā, na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati, tasmā taṃ gavesanto vicarinti attho.

[03] ^b^gahakāraka^eb^ ^a^M1.0393^ea^ ^b^diṭṭhosī^eb^ti idāni pana yena so sakkā daṭṭhuṃ, tena ariyamaggañāṇacakkhunā gahakāraka diṭṭho asi. ^b^puna geha^eb^nti puna imasmiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ ^b^na kāhasi^eb^ na karissasi. ^b^sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā^eb^ti tava sabbā anavasesakilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā. ^b^thūṇikā ca vidālitā^eb^ti idāni tayā kātabbassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātā kaṇṇikā ca bhinnā. ^b^vimariyādikataṃ citta^eb^nti mama cittaṃ vigatantaṃ kataṃ, āyatiṃ anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditaṃ. tato eva ^b^idheva vidhamissati^eb^ imasmiṃyeva bhave viddhaṃsissati, carimakacittanirodhena nirujjhissatīti attho.

[03] ^b^arahaṃ sugato^eb^ti āyasmato upavāṇattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bhagavati parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetvā manussadevanāgagaruḷakumbhaṇḍayakkhagandhabbehi sattaratanamaye sattayojanike thūpe kate tattha sudhotaṃ attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ veḷagge ābandhitvā dhajaṃ katvā pūjaṃ akāsi. taṃ gahetvā abhisammatako nāma yakkhasenāpati devehi cetiyapūjārakkhaṇatthaṃ ṭhapito adissamānakāyo ākāse dhārento cetiyaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. so taṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya pasannamānaso ahosi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^upavāṇo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.56.122-178) --
[22] manussā ceva devā ca, buddhathūpaṃ akaṃsu te..
[22] manussā devanāgā ca, buddhapūjaṃ akaṃsu te..
[21] ``sabbaṃ maṇimayaṃ thūpaṃ, akaruṃ te ca kañcukaṃ.
[22] manussā ceva devā ca, nāgā ca garuḷā tathā..
[22] mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā..
[22] manussā devanāgā ca, garuḷā ca kumbhaṇḍakā..
[22] mā no pamattā assumha, appamattā sadevakā..
[22] manujā devatā nāgā, kumbhaṇḍā garuḷā tathā..
[21] ``vediyo ^a^M1.0396^ea^ satta katvāna, dhajaṃ chattaṃ akaṃsu te.
[22] rattindivā na ñāyanti, āloko hoti sabbadā..
[21] ``tena kālena ye keci, thūpaṃ pūjenti mānusā.
[22] na te thūpaṃ āruhanti, ambare ukkhipanti te..
[22] dhajaṃ vā pupphadāmaṃ vā, abhiropeti uttariṃ..
[21] ``na te passanti taṃ yakkhaṃ, dāmaṃ passanti gacchato.
[22] evaṃ passitvā gacchantā, sabbe gacchanti suggatiṃ..
[21] ``viruddhā ye pāvacane, pasannā ye ca sāsane.
[22] āmoditaṃ janaṃ disvā, evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā..
[22] imā ca janatā tuṭṭhā, kāraṃ kubbaṃ na tappare..
[22] vāteritaṃ dhajaṃ disvā, bhiyyo hāsaṃ janesahaṃ..
[22] taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā, vipākaṃ pucchahaṃ dhaje..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[21] ``satasahasse ^a^V1.0339^ea^ kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
[22] tīṇi yojanāni sāmantā, ussīyanti dhajā sadā..

[01] athāyasmā ^a^P2.0057^ea^ upavāṇo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi. tena ca samayena bhagavato vātābādho uppajji. therassa ca gihisahāyo devahito nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati. so theraṃ catūhi paccayehi pavedesi. athāyasmā upavāṇo nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya tassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ upagacchi. brāhmaṇo ``kenaci aññena payojanena thero āgato''ti ñatvā, ``vadeyyātha, bhante, kenattho''ti āha. thero tassa brāhmaṇassa payojanaṃ ācikkhanto --
[22] sace uṇhodakaṃ atthi, munino dehi brāhmaṇa..
[22] apacitopaceyyānaṃ, tassa icchāmi hātave''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tassattho -- yo imasmiṃ ^b^loke pūjaneyyānaṃ^eb^ pūjetabbehi sakkādīhi devehi mahābrahmādīhi ca brahmehi ^b^pūjito, sakkareyyānaṃ^eb^ sakkātabbehi bimbisārakosalarājādīhi ^b^sakkato, apaceyyānaṃ^eb^ apacāyitabbehi mahesīhi khīṇāsavehi ^b^apacito,^eb^ kilesehi ārakattādinā ^b^arahaṃ,^eb^ sobhanagamanādinā ^b^sugato^eb^ sabbaññū ^b^muni^eb^ mayhaṃ satthā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā, so dāni ^b^vātehi^eb^ vātahetu vātakkhobhanimittaṃ ^b^ābādhiko^eb^ jāto. ^b^sace, brāhmaṇa, uṇhodakaṃ atthi, tassa^eb^ vātābādhavūpasamanatthaṃ taṃ ^b^hātave^eb^ upanetuṃ ^b^icchāmī^eb^ti. taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo uṇhodakaṃ tadanurūpaṃ vātārahañca ^a^M1.0399^ea^ bhesajjaṃ bhagavato upanāmesi. tena ca satthu rogo vūpasami. tassa bhagavā anumodanaṃ akāsīti.

[01] ^b^diṭṭhā^eb^ ^a^V1.0340^ea^ ^b^mayā^eb^ti āyasmato isidinnattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto bījaniṃ gahetvā bodhiyā pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sunāparantajanapade seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā ^b^isidinno^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu candanamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthāraṃ ^a^P2.0058^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. tassa hitānukampinī devatā taṃ codentī --
[21] ``diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā.
[22] sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā..
[21] ``addhā na jānanti yatodha dhammaṃ, kāmā aniccā iti cāpi āhu.
[22] rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettuṃ, tasmā sitā puttadāraṃ dhanañcā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^diṭṭhā mayā dhammadharā upāsakā, kāmā aniccā iti bhāsamānā^eb^ti idhekacce pariyattidhammadharā upāsakā mayā diṭṭhā, pariyattidhammadharattā ^a^M1.0400^ea^ eva ``kāmā nāmete aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā''ti kāmesu ādīnavapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsamānā, sayaṃ pana ^b^sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca te apekkhā^eb^ti sārattā hutvā bahalarāgarattā maṇīsu kuṇḍalesu ca, maṇicitesu vā kuṇḍalesu, puttesu puttadhītāsu dāresu ca adhigatasnehā, aññaṃ bhaṇantā aññaṃ karontā diṭṭhā mayāti attho.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yasmā te upāsakā sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu puttesu dāresu ca apekkhavanto, tasmā ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ buddhasāsane ^b^dhammaṃ^eb^ yāthāvato ^b^addhā^eb^ ekaṃsena ^b^na jānanti^eb^. evaṃ bhūtā ca ^b^``kāmā aniccā''iti cāpi āhu^eb^ ahosi, sattapakati vicittasabhāvāti adhippāyo. ^b^rāgañca tesaṃ na balatthi chettu^eb^nti tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ yasmā rāgaṃ chettuṃ samucchindituṃ tādisaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ natthi, ^b^tasmā^eb^ tena kāraṇena ^b^sitā^eb^ taṇhāvasena nissitā ^b^puttadāraṃ dhanañca^eb^ allīnā na vissajjentīti sabbametaṃ devatā taṃyeva upāsakaṃ uddissa aññāpadesena kathesi. taṃ sutvā upāsako saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.46-50) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākaronto imā eva gāthā abhāsīti.

[03] ^b^devo^eb^ ^a^M1.0401^ea^ ^a^P2.0059^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^ti āyasmato sambulakaccānattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito catunavutikappamatthake kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sataraṃsiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhā vuṭṭhahitvā piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tālaphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā ``sambulo''ti laddhanāmo kaccānagottatāya ^b^sambulakaccāno^eb^ti paññāyittha.

[03] so vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā himavantasamīpe bheravāya nāma pabbataguhāyaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto viharati. athekadivasaṃ mahā akālamegho satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo thanento gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārento gaḷagaḷāyanto uṭṭhahitvā vassituṃ ārabhi, asaniyo phaliṃsu. taṃ saddaṃ sutvā acchataracchuvanamahiṃsahatthiādayo bhītatasitā bhītaravaṃ viraviṃsu. thero pana āraddhavipassanattā kāye jīvite ca nirapekkho vigatalomahaṃso taṃ acintento vipassanāyameva kammaṃ karonto ghammāpagamena utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto tāvadeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā saha abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.85-90) --
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0402^ea^ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[26] tassa mayhaṃ ekakassa bherave bile viharato,
[22] natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā..
[21] ``dhammatā mamesā yassa me, ekakassa bherave bile.
[22] viharato natthi bhayaṃ vā, chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0060^ea^ ^b^devo ca vassati, devo ca gaḷagaḷāyatī^eb^ti devo megho vassati ca, ``gaḷagaḷā''ti ca karonto gajjatīti attho. gajjantassa hi anukaraṇametaṃ. ^b^ekako cāhaṃ bherave bile viharāmī^eb^ti ahañca ekako asahāyo sappaṭibhayāyaṃ pabbataguhāyaṃ vasāmi, ^b^tassa mayhaṃ^eb^ evaṃbhūtassa me sato ^b^natthi bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā^eb^ti cittutrāsasaññitaṃ bhayaṃ vā taṃnimittakaṃ sarīrassa chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃsanamattaṃ vā natthi.

[03] kasmāti tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``dhammatā mamesā''^eb^ti. apariññātavatthukassa hi tattha appahīnacchandarāgatāya bhayādinā bhavitabbaṃ, mayā pana sabbaso tattha pariññātaṃ, tattha ca chandarāgo samucchinno, tasmā bhayādīnaṃ abhāvo ^b^dhammatā mamesā^eb^ mama dhammasabhāvo esoti aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^kassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0403^ea^ ^a^V1.0343^ea^ ^b^selūpamaṃ citta^eb^nti āyasmato nitakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto vipassissa bhagavato kāle bandhumatīnagare ārāmagopako hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso nāḷikeraphalaṃ dātukāmo ahosi. satthā taṃ anuggaṇhanto ākāseyeva ṭhatvā paṭiggaṇhi. so taṃ datvā uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^nitako^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto ghaṭento arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.91-99) --

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā there phalasukhena nibbānasukhena viharante padhānapariggāhako thero taṃ āraññāyatanaṃ gantvā tattha vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariggaṇhanatthaṃ ^b^``kassa selūpama''^eb^ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M1.0404^ea^ ^a^V1.0344^ea^ ^a^P2.0061^ea^ ^b^kassa selūpamaṃ cittaṃ, ṭhitaṃ nānupakampatī^eb^ti imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu kassa bhikkhuno cittaṃ aggaphalādhigamena ekaghanasilāmayapabbatūpamaṃ sabbesaṃ iñjanānaṃ abhāvato vasībhāvappattiyā ca ṭhitaṃ sabbehipi lokadhammehi nānukampati na vedhati. idānissa akampanākāraṃ saddhiṃ kāraṇena dassetuṃ ^b^``viratta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^virattaṃ rajanīyesū^eb^ti virāgasaṅkhātena ariyamaggena rajanīyesu rāguppattihetubhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu virattaṃ, tattha sabbaso samucchinnarāganti attho. ^b^kuppanīye^eb^ti paṭighaṭṭhānīye, sabbasmimpi āghātavatthusmiṃ. ^b^na kuppatī^eb^ti na dussati na vikāraṃ āpajjati. ^b^yassevaṃ bhāvitaṃ citta^eb^nti yassa ariyapuggalassa cittaṃ mano evaṃ vuttanayena tādibhāvena bhāvitaṃ, ^b^kuto taṃ dukkhamessatī^eb^ti taṃ puggalaṃ kuto sattato saṅkhārato vā dukkhaṃ upagamissati, na tādisassa dukkhaṃ atthīti attho.
[03] 192^b^.^eb^ evaṃ aniyamavasena pucchitamatthaṃ nitakatthero attūpanāyikaṃ katvā vissajjento ^b^``mama selūpamaṃ citta''^eb^ntiādinā dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. taṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^na tāva supituṃ hotī^eb^ti āyasmato soṇassa poṭiriyaputtassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro sikhissa bhagavato kāle vanacaro hutvā jīvanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto kurañjiyaphalaṃ ^a^P2.0062^ea^ satthuno adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ poṭiriyassa nāma gāmabhojakassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^soṇo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto bhaddiyassa sākiyarañño senāpati ahosi. atha bhaddiyarāje heṭṭhā vuttanayena pabbajite, senāpati ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ``rājāpi nāma pabbaji, kiṃ mayhaṃ gharāvāsenā''ti pabbaji? pabbajitvā pana niddārāmo viharati, na bhāvanamanuyuñjati. taṃ bhagavā anupiyāyaṃ ambavane viharanto attano obhāsaṃ pharāpetvā tenassa satiṃ janetvā imāya gāthāya taṃ ovadanto --
[22] saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^na tāva supituṃ hoti, ratti nakkhattamālinī^eb^ti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vajjitaṃ navamaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa viññujātikassa yāva na arahattaṃ hatthagataṃ hoti, tāva ayaṃ nakkhattamālinī ratti supituṃ niddāyituṃ na hoti, supanassa kālo na hoti. apica kho ^b^paṭijaggitumevesā, ratti hoti vijānatā^eb^ti esā ratti nāma manussānaṃ migapakkhīnañca niddūpagamanena visesato nissaddavelābhūtā paṭipattiṃ attani sañjaggituṃ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuñjitumeva vijānatā viññunā icchitā hotīti.

[03] taṃ sutvā soṇo saṃviggataramānaso hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto ^b^``hatthikkhandhova patita''^eb^nti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^avapatita^eb^nti avamukhaṃ patitaṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ adhomukhaṃ patitaṃ. ^b^kuñjaro ce anukkame^eb^ti kuñjaro anukkameyya ce. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yadāhaṃ hatthimāruhitvā saṅgāmaṃ paviṭṭho hatthikkhandhato patito, tadāhaṃ ^b^saṅgāme^eb^ tena hatthinā maddito mato ahosiṃ ce, taṃ ^b^me^eb^ maraṇaṃ ^b^seyyo, yañce^eb^ idāni kilesehi ^b^parājito^eb^ jīveyyaṃ, taṃ na seyyoti. imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.1-6) --
[21] ``ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā.
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ``satthārā vuttaṃ, attanā vutta''nti ubhayañhi gāthaṃ ``hatthikkhandhāvapatita''ntiādinā paccudāhāsi. tena idameva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^pañca^eb^ ^a^V1.0346^ea^ ^b^kāmaguṇe hitvā^eb^ti āyasmato nisabhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannacitto kapitthaphalamadāsi. so tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde koliyajanapade kulagehe nibbattitvā ^b^nisabho^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto sākiyakoliyānaṃ saṅgāme buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā tadaheva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.7-11) --
[03] so ^a^M1.0407^ea^ arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyabhikkhū pamādavihārena kālaṃ vītināmente disvā te ovadanto --

[03] tassattho -- bālaputhujjanassa piyāyitabbasabhāvatāya ^b^piyarūpe^eb^ manuññasabhāvatāya ^b^manorame^eb^ rūpādike ^b^pañca kāmaguṇe^eb^ kāmakoṭṭhāse ^b^hitvā^eb^ pahāya pariccajitvā kammaphala^b^saddhāya^eb^ ratanattaya^b^saddhāya^eb^ ca vasena ^b^gharā^eb^ gharabandhanato ^b^nikkhamma^eb^ nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ upagato viññujātiko pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ghaṭento vāyamanto vaṭṭa^b^dukkhassa antakaro bhave^eb^ bhaveyyāti. evaṃ te bhikkhū ovaditvā ``ayaṃ pare eva saññāpento viharati, ``sayaṃ ^a^P2.0064^ea^ pana akārako'ti mā cintayitthā''ti tesaṃ attano paṭipannabhāvaṃ pakāsento --

[25] dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. tattha ^b^nābhinandāmi maraṇa^eb^nti maraṇaṃ na abhikaṅkhāmi. ^b^nābhinandāmi jīvita^eb^nti idaṃ pana tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā nābhinandāmi jīvitaṃ, tasmā nābhinandāmi maraṇanti. yo hi āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇāya kilesābhisaṅkhāre ācinoti upacinoti, so punabbhavābhinibbattiṃ abhinandanto nāntariyakatāya attano maraṇampi abhinandati nāma kāraṇassa appahīnattā, khīṇāsavo pana sabbaso ācayagāmidhamme pahāya apacayagāmidhamme patiṭṭhito pariññātavatthuko sabbaso jīvitaṃ anabhinandanto maraṇampi anabhinandati nāma kāraṇassa eva suppahīnattā. tenāha -- ``nābhinandāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhinandāmi jīvita''nti. yadi evaṃ khīṇāsavassa parinibbānābhikaṅkhā, yāva parinibbānā avaṭṭhānañca kathanti āha ^b^``kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, sampajāno patissato''^eb^ti, kilesaparinibbāne siddhe satipaññāvepullappattiyā sato sampajāno kevalaṃ ^a^M1.0408^ea^ khandhaparinibbānakālaṃ paṭikaṅkhāmi, taṃ udikkhamāno āgamayamāno viharāmi, na pana me maraṇe jīvite vā abhinandanā atthi arahattamaggeneva tassa samugghāṭitattāti.

[03] ^b^ambapallavasaṅkāsa^eb^nti āyasmato usabhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kosambaphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ sākiyarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^usabho^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so pabbajitakālato ^a^P2.0065^ea^ paṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā divā saṅgaṇikārāmo sakalarattiṃ niddāyamāno vītināmeti. so ekadivasaṃ muṭṭhassati asampajāno niddaṃ okkanto supine kesamassuṃ ohāretvā ambapallavavaṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā hatthigīvāyaṃ nisīditvā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ tattheva manusse sampatte disvā lajjāya hatthikkhandhato oruyha attānaṃ disvā paṭibuddho, ``īdisaṃ nāma supinaṃ muṭṭhassatinā asampajānena ^a^V1.0348^ea^ niddāyamānena mayā diṭṭha''nti uppannasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.12-16) --
[21] ``ekatiṃse ito kappe, yaṃ phalaṃ adadiṃ tadā.
[03] atha ^a^M1.0409^ea^ thero yathādiṭṭhaṃ supinaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā arahattassa adhigatattā tasseva supinassa kittanavasena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] sohaṃ ditto tadā santo, patto me āsavakkhayo''ti.. -- gāthādvayamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ambapallavasaṅkāsaṃ, aṃse katvāna cīvara^eb^nti ambapallavākāraṃ pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā. ^b^gāma^eb^nti attano rājadhāniṃ hatthikkhandhe ^b^nisinno piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ,^eb^ paviṭṭhamattova mahājanena olokiyamāno ^b^hatthikkhandhato oruyha^eb^ ṭhito paṭibujjhiṃ, pabuddhova ^b^saṃvegaṃ alabhiṃ tadā^eb^ ``muṭṭhassati asampajāno hutvā niddāyokkamanena etaṃ jāta''nti. apare pana ``rājāva hutvā rattibhāge evarūpaṃ supinaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā hatthikkhandhaṃ āruyha nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto taṃ supinaṃ saritvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha saṃvegaṃ labhitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patvā udānaṃ udānento imā gāthā abhāsī''ti vadanti. ^b^ditto^eb^ti tasmiṃ rājakāle jātimadabhogamadādiparidappito samāno saṃvegamalabhinti yojanā.

[03] ^b^ayamiti^eb^ ^a^V1.0349^ea^ ^a^P2.0066^ea^ ^b^kappaṭo^eb^ti āyasmato kappaṭakurattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti. ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso ketakapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ^a^M1.0410^ea^ sāvatthiyaṃ duggatakule nibbattitvā yāva vayappatti, tāva aññaṃ upāyaṃ ajānanto kappaṭakhaṇḍanivāsano sarāvahattho tattha tattha kuraṃ pariyesanto vicari, tena ^b^kappaṭakuro^eb^tveva paññāyittha. so vayappatto tiṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappento ekadivasaṃ tiṇalāvanatthaṃ araññaṃ gato tattha aññataraṃ khīṇāsavattheraṃ disvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi. tassa thero dhammaṃ kathesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho ``kiṃ me imāya kicchajīvikāyā''ti pabbajitvā attano nivatthakappaṭacoḷaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nikkhipi. yadā cassa anabhirati uppajjati, tadā taṃ kappaṭaṃ olokentassa anabhirati vigacchati, saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhi. evaṃ karonto sattakkhattuṃ uppabbaji. tassa taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ. athekadivasaṃ kappaṭakuro bhikkhu dhammasabhāyaṃ parisapariyante nisinno niddāyati, taṃ bhagavā codento --
[21] ``mā kho tvaṃ kappaṭa pacālesi, mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessaṃ.
[22] na hi tvaṃ kappaṭa mattamaññāsi, saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ayamiti kappaṭo kappaṭakuro^eb^ti kappaṭakuro bhikkhu ``ayaṃ mama kappaṭo, imaṃ paridahitvā yathā tathā jīvāmī''ti evaṃ uppannamicchāvitakko ^b^acchāya atibharitāya amataghaṭikāyaṃ^eb^ mama amataghaṭe tahaṃ tahaṃ vassante ``amatamadhigataṃ ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṃ ^a^P2.0067^ea^ dhammaṃ desemi'' (mahāva0 12; ma0 ni0 1.286; 2.342). ``andhībhūtasmiṃ lokasmiṃ, āhañchaṃ amatadundubhi''ntiādinā (mahāva0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285; 2.341) ghosetvā ^a^M1.0411^ea^ mayā dhammāmate pavassiyamāne ^b^katapadaṃ jhānāni ocetuṃ^eb^ lokiyalokuttarajjhānāni upacetuṃ bhāvetuṃ katapadaṃ kaṭamaggavihitabhāvanāmaggaṃ idaṃ mama sāsanaṃ, tathāpi ^b^dhammakaṭamatto^eb^ mama sāsanadhammato ^a^V1.0350^ea^ ukkaṇṭhacitto apagatamānaso kappaṭakuroti taṃ codetvā punapissa sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya pamādavihāraṃ dassento ^b^``mā kho tvaṃ, kappaṭa, pacālesī''^eb^ti gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^mā kho tvaṃ, kappaṭa, pacālesī^eb^ti tvaṃ, kappaṭakura, ``mama dhammaṃ suṇissāmī''ti nisīditvā mā kho pacālesi mā pacalāhi mā niddaṃ upagacchi. ^b^mā tvaṃ upakaṇṇamhi tāḷessa^eb^nti taṃ niddāyamānaṃ upakaṇṇamhi kaṇṇasamīpe desanāhatthena ahaṃ mā patāḷessaṃ. yathā ito paraṃ kilesappahānāya ahaṃ taṃ na ovadeyyaṃ, tathā paṭipajjāhīti attho. ^b^na hi tvaṃ, kappaṭa, mattamaññāsī^eb^ti tvaṃ, kappaṭa, ^b^saṅghamajjhamhi pacalāyamāno^eb^ mattaṃ pamāṇaṃ na vā maññasi, ``ayamatidullabho khaṇo paṭiladdho, so mā upajjhagā''ti ettakampi na jānāsi, passa yāva ca te aparaddhanti codesi.

[03] evaṃ bhagavatā dvīhi gāthāhi gāḷhaṃ taṃ niggayha codanāya katāya aṭṭhivedhaviddho viya caṇḍagajo maggaṃ otaranto viya ca sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.17-22) --
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0412^ea^ pana patvā satthārā vuttagāthādvayameva attano arahattādhigamanassa aṅkusabhūtanti paccudāhāsi. tenassa tadeva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^aho^eb^ ^a^V1.0351^ea^ ^a^P2.0068^ea^ ^b^buddhā aho dhammā^eb^ti āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. ``kulagehe''ti pana aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.217) vuttaṃ. so satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tadanurūpāni puññāni karonto kassapassa bhagavato kāle samaṇadhammaṃ katvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe seṭṭhidhītāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. sā kira kumārikākāleyeva pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatāpi gabbhasaṇṭhitampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā. tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu. so ``assamaṇī''ti āha. puna dasabalaṃ pucchiṃsu. satthā upālittheraṃ paṭicchāpesi. thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sarājikāya parisāya vinicchinanto ``pure laddho gabbho, pabbajjā arogā''ti āha. satthā ``suvinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇa''nti therassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi.

[03] sā bhikkhunī suvaṇṇabimbasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. taṃ rājā pasenadikosalo posesi. ``kassapo''ti cassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. aparabhāge ^a^M1.0413^ea^ alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi. kumārakāle pabbajitattā bhagavatā ``kassapaṃ pakkosatha, idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā''ti vutte ``katarakassapassā''ti. ``kumārakassapassā''ti. evaṃ gahitanāmattā rañño posāvanikaputtattā ca vuḍḍhakālepi ^b^kumārakassapo^eb^tveva paññāyittha.

[03] so pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṃ karoti, buddhavacanañca uggaṇhāti. atha tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāse nibbatto ^a^V1.0352^ea^ mahābrahmā ``vipassanāya mukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphalappattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī''ti pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā andhavane vasantassa ^a^P2.0069^ea^ therassa ``ime pañhe satthāraṃ puccheyyāsī''ti ācikkhitvā gato. so te pañhe bhagavantaṃ pucchi. bhagavāpissa byākāsi. thero satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva te uggaṇhitvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.150-177) --
[22] nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhāna patthayiṃ ahaṃ..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] sākhena cattā me mātā, nigrodhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā..
[22] nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhamhi jīvitaṃ..
[21] ``tenānusiṭṭhā migayūthapena, ahañca mātā ca tathetare ca.
[22] āgamma rammaṃ tusitādhivāsaṃ, gatā pavāsaṃ sagharaṃ yatheva..
[22] so avoca vināsetha, pāpikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ imaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā cittakathikabhāvena satthārā etadagge ṭhapito attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā ratanattayaguṇavibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``aho ^a^V1.0354^ea^ buddhā aho dhammā, aho no satthu sampadā.
[22] jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- gāthādvayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^aho^eb^ti acchariyatthe nipāto. ^b^buddhā^eb^ti sabbaññubuddhā, gāravavasena bahuvacanaṃ, aho acchariyā sambuddhāti attho. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti pariyattidhammena saddhiṃ nava lokuttaradhammā. ^b^aho no satthu sampadā^eb^ti amhākaṃ satthu dasabalassa aho sampattiyo. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ satthari ^a^M1.0416^ea^ brahmacariyavāsena. ^b^etādisaṃ dhammaṃ, sāvako sacchikāhitī^eb^ti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ suvisuddhajjhānābhiññāparivāraṃ anavasesakilesakkhayāvahaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ sāvakopi nāma sacchikarissati, tasmā evaṃvidhaguṇavisesādhigamahetubhūtā aho acchariyā buddhā bhagavanto, acchariyā dhammaguṇā, acchariyā amhākaṃ satthu sampattiyoti ratanattayassa guṇādhimuttiṃ pavedesīti. dhammasampattikittaneneva hi saṅghasuppaṭipatti kittitā hotīti.

[03] evaṃ sādhāraṇavasena dassitaṃ dhammassa sacchikiriyaṃ idāni attupanāyikaṃ katvā dassento ^b^``asaṅkheyyesū''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^asaṅkheyyesū^eb^ti gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattesu mahākappesu. ^b^sakkāyā^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhā. te hi paramatthato vijjamānadhammasamūhatāya ``sakkāyā''ti vuccanti. ^b^ahū^eb^ti nivattanūpāyassa anadhigatattā anapagatā ahesuṃ. ^b^tesamayaṃ pacchimako carimoyaṃ samussayo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0070^ea^ yasmā ayaṃ sabbapacchimako, tato eva carimo, tasmā ^b^jātimaraṇa^eb^sahito khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññito ^b^saṃsāro^eb^ idāni āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvato ^b^punabbhavo natthi,^eb^ ayamantimā jātīti attho.

[03] ^b^yo have daharo bhikkhū^eb^ti āyasmato dhammapālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ^a^V1.0355^ea^ pilakkhaphalamadāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde satthari parinibbute avantiraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^dhammapālo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sippaṃ uggahetvā paṭinivattento antarāmagge ekasmiṃ vihāre aññataraṃ theraṃ disvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ^a^M1.0417^ea^ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.21-25) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ vihāre dve sāmaṇere rukkhagge pupphāni ocinante ārūḷhasākhāya bhaggāya patante disvā thero iddhānubhāvena hatthena gahetvā arogeyeva bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ dhammaṃ desento --
[22] jāgaro sa hi suttesu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ..
[22] anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana''nti.. -- imā dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yo^eb^ti aniyamavacanaṃ. ^b^have^eb^ti daḷhatthe nipāto. ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo. bhikkhatīti ^b^bhikkhu. yuñjatī^eb^ti ghaṭati vāyamati. ^b^jāgaro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0071^ea^ jāgaraṇadhammasamannāgato. ^b^suttesū^eb^ti supantesu. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ^b^yo bhikkhu daharo^eb^va samāno taruṇo ``tathāhaṃ pacchā vuḍḍhakāle jānissāmī''ti acintetvā buddhānaṃ ^b^sāsane^eb^ appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ ^b^yuñjati^eb^ samathavipassanābhāvanāya yogaṃ karoti, so ^b^suttesu^eb^ avijjāniddāya suttesu pamattesu saddhādijāgaradhammasamannāgamena ^b^jāgaro,^eb^ tato eva attahitaparahitapāripūriyā ^b^amoghaṃ^eb^ avañjhaṃ ^b^tassa jīvitaṃ,^eb^ yasmā ca etadevaṃ, ^b^tasmā saddhañca^eb^ ``atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipāko''tiādinayappavattaṃ kammaphalasaddhañca, saddhūpanibandhattā sīlassa tadupanissayaṃ catupārisuddhi^b^sīlañca^eb^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^, ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho''ti evaṃ pavattaratanattaya^b^ppasāda^eb^ñca ^a^V1.0356^ea^, vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pariññādivasena catusacca^b^dhammadassana^eb^ñca ^b^medhāvī^eb^ dhammojapaññāya samannāgato bhikkhu ^b^buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ^eb^ ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ anussaranto ādittampi attano sīsaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā ^b^anuyuñjetha,^eb^ tattha anuyogaṃ ātappaṃ kareyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^kassindriyāni samathaṅgatānī^eb^ti āyasmato brahmālittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā pādaphalaṃ adāsi. satthā anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^brahmālī^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto hetusampattiyā codiyamāno saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena buddhasāsane pabbajitvā patirūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto ñāṇassa paripākagatattā nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.51.63-67) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño ^a^M1.0419^ea^ ^a^P2.0072^ea^ pana hutvā maggasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ padhānapariggāhakena therena tasmiṃ araññāyatane bhikkhū uddissa vuttaṃ padhānānuyogaṃ pariggaṇhanto --
[22] pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi kassa pihayanti tādino..
[22] pahīnamānassa anāsavassa, devāpi mayhaṃ pihayanti tādino''ti.. --

[03] tassattho -- imasmiṃ araññāyatane vasantesu bhikkhūsu ^b^kassa^eb^ bhikkhuno therassa vā navassa vā majjhimassa vā chekena ^b^sārathinā sudantā assā^eb^ viya manacchaṭṭhāni ^b^indriyāni samathaṃ^eb^ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ ^b^gatāni^eb^. kassa navavidhampi mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā ^b^pahīnamānassa^eb^ catunnampi āsavānaṃ abhāvena ^b^anāsavassa^eb^ iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā ^b^tādino devāpi pihayanti^eb^ manussāpi sammāpaṭipattidassanādinā ca ādarena patthentīti.

[03] tattha ca gāthāyaṃ purimaḍḍhena anāgāmimaggādhigamo puṭṭho, anāgāminopi hi indriyāni pahīnakāmarāgabyāpādatāya samathaṃ nibbisevanataṃ gatāni honti. itarena arahattamaggapaṭilābho, arahā hi ``pahīnamāno anāsavo tādī''ti ca vuccati.

[03] athāyasmā brahmāli padhānapariggāhakena vuttaṃ ^b^``kassindriyānī''^eb^ti gāthaṃ paccanubhāsi. tadatthaṃ attūpanāyikavasena vissajjento ^b^``mayhindriyānī''^eb^tiādikāya dutiyagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi, tattha ^b^mayhindriyānī^eb^ti mama cakkhādīni indriyāni. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^chavipāpaka^eb^ ^a^M1.0420^ea^ ^b^cittabhaddakā^eb^ti āyasmato mogharājattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu ^a^P2.0073^ea^ santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato brāhmaṇamāṇave vijjāsippāni sikkhāpento ekadivasaṃ atthadassiṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ gacchantaṃ ^a^V1.0358^ea^ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā ``yāvatā rūpino sattā''tiādinā chahi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā bhājanaṃ pūretvā madhuṃ upanāmesi. satthā madhuṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.

[03] so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kaṭṭhavāhanassa nāma rañño amacco hutvā tena satthu ānayanatthaṃ purisasahassena pesito satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vīsativassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ katvā tato cuto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^mogharājā^eb^ti laddhanāmo bāvarībrāhmaṇassa santike uggahitasippo saṃvegajāto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tāpasasahassaparivāro ajitādīhi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pesito tesaṃ pannarasamo hutvā pañhe pucchitvā pañhavissajjanapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.64-83) --
[22] sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā..
[22] ye keci udake pāṇā, antojāle bhavanti te..
[22] sabbe te tava ñāṇamhi, anto honti samogadhā..
[22] tava dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, kaṅkhāsotaṃ taranti te..
[22] mama cittaṃ pasādento, imā gāthā abhāsatha..
[22] tena cittappasādena, duggatiṃ so na gacchati..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti visesena tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi. tena naṃ satthā lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. aparabhāge purimakammappaccayā parihārassa akaraṇato therassa sarīre daddupīḷakādīni uppajjitvā vaḍḍhiṃsu. so ``senāsanaṃ dussatī''ti hemantepi magadhakkhettesu palālasanthārāni attharitvā seti. taṃ ekadivasaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ satthā paṭisanthāravasena ^b^``chavipāpakā''^eb^tiādinā ^a^P2.0074^ea^ paṭhamagāthāya pucchi.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^chavipāpakā^eb^ti daddukacchupīḷakāhi bhinnacchavibhāvato hīnacchavika duṭṭhacchavika ^a^V1.0360^ea^. ^b^cittabhaddakā^eb^ti anavasesakilesappahānena brahmavihārasevanāya ca bhaddacitta sundaracitta. ^b^mogharājā^eb^ti tassa ālapanaṃ. ^b^satataṃ samāhito^eb^ti aggaphalasamādhinā niccakālaṃ abhiṇhaṃ samāhitamānaso. ^b^hemantikasītakālarattiyo^eb^ti hemantasamaye sītakālarattiyo. accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ``hemantikā sītakālarattiyo''tipi pāḷi. tattha ^b^hemantikā^eb^ti hemantogadhā hemantapariyāpannāti attho. ^b^bhikkhu tvaṃ sī^eb^ti bhikkhu ko tvaṃ asi, evaṃbhūto paresu tava senāsanaṃ katvā adentesu saṅghikañca senāsanaṃ apavisanto. ^b^kathaṃ karissasī^eb^ti yathāvutte sītakāle kathaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattesīti satthā pucchi. evaṃ pana puṭṭho thero satthu tamatthaṃ kathento --

[03] tattha ^b^sampannasassā^eb^ti nipphannasassā. ^b^magadhā^eb^ti magadharaṭṭhaṃ vadati. magadhā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena ``magadhā''tveva bahuvacanena vuccati. ^b^kevalā^eb^ti anavasesā. ^b^iti me suta^eb^nti evaṃ mayā sutaṃ. tattha yo adiṭṭho padeso, tassa vasena sutanti vuttaṃ. tena edise kāle magadhesu yattha katthaci mayā vasituṃ sakkāti dasseti. ^b^palālacchannako seyyaṃ, yathaññe sukhajīvino^eb^ti yathā aññe sukhajīvino bhikkhū senāsanasappāyaṃ laddhā sundarehi attharaṇapāvuraṇehi sukhena sayanti, evaṃ ahampi palālasanthārameva heṭṭhā santharitvā upari tiriyañca palālacchadaneneva chāditasarīratāya palālacchannako seyyaṃ sayiṃ, seyyaṃ kappesinti attano yathālābhasantosaṃ vibhāveti.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P2.0075^ea^ ^b^ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare^eb^ti āyasmato visākhassa pañcālaputtassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito cuddase kappe paccantagāme daliddakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ phalapariyesanaṃ carantehi tasmiṃ gāme manussehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ gato tattha ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso valliphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ ^a^V1.0361^ea^ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe maṇḍalikarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^visākho^eb^ti laddhanāmo pañcālarājadhītuyā puttabhāvato pacchā ^b^pañcālaputto^eb^ti paññāyittha. so pitari mate rajjaṃ kārento satthari attano gāmasamīpagate satthu santikaṃ gantvā ^a^M1.0424^ea^ dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā satthārā saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ gato vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.31-36) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā thero ñātīnaṃ anukampāya jātibhūmiṃ agamāsi. tattha manussā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā kālena kālaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantā ekadivasaṃ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, aṅgehi samannāgato dhammakathiko hotī''ti dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ pucchiṃsu. thero tesaṃ dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ kathento --
[21] ``na ukkhipe no ca parikkhipe pare, na okkhipe pāragataṃ na eraye.
[22] na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhare, anuddhato sammitabhāṇi subbato..
[22] saṃsevitabuddhasīlinā, nibbānaṃ na hi tena dullabha''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^na ukkhipe^eb^ti attānaṃ na ukkhipeyya, jātiādīhi bāhusaccādīhi ca attukkaṃsanaṃ na kareyya. ^b^no ca parikkhipe pare^eb^ti pare parapuggale teheva jātiādīhi no parikkhipe paricchinditvā na ^a^P2.0076^ea^ khipeyya guṇaparidhaṃsanavasena ^a^M1.0425^ea^ vā na khipeyya. na okkhipe pare iccevaṃ sambandho. pare ojjhāpanavasena ^b^na okkhipe^eb^ heṭṭhato katvā pare na olokāpeyya, na ojjhāpeyyāti attho. ``na ukkhipe''ti keci paṭhanti, so evattho. ^b^pāragata^eb^nti ^a^V1.0362^ea^ saṃsārapāraṃ viya vijjāya pāraṃ gataṃ khīṇāsavaṃ tevijjaṃ chaḷabhiññaṃ vā ^b^na eraye^eb^ na ghaṭṭaye na āsādeyya. ^b^na cattavaṇṇaṃ parisāsu byāhare^eb^ti attano vaṇṇaṃ guṇaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno khattiyaparisādīsu na bhāseyya. ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti uddhaccarahito. uddhatassa hi vacanaṃ nādiyanti. ^b^sammitabhāṇī^eb^ti sammadeva mitabhāṇī, kālena sāpadesaṃ pariyantavatiṃ atthasañhitameva vācaṃ bhāsanasīloti attho. ito aññathā vadantassa vacanaṃ agahaṇīyaṃ hoti. ^b^subbato^eb^ti sundaravato sīlasampanno. ``siyā''ti kiriyāpadaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ thero saṅkhepeneva dhammakathikalakkhaṇaṃ vatvā tesaṃ guṇānaṃ attani labbhamānataṃ adhimuccitvā bhiyyosomattāya abhippasannaṃ mahājanaṃ ñatvā ``evaṃvidhassa dhammakathikassa vimuttāyatanasannissitassa na nibbānaṃ dullabhaṃ, atha kho sulabhamevā''ti dassento ^b^``susukhumanipuṇatthadassinā''^eb^ti dutiyagāthamāha. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā^eb^ti āyasmato cūḷakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso chattapaṇṇiphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^cūḷako^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto dhanapāladamane satthari ^a^M1.0426^ea^ laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto indasālaguhāyaṃ vasati, so ekadivasaṃ guhādvāre nisinno magadhakkhettaṃ olokesi. tasmiṃ khaṇe pāvusakālamegho gambhīramadhuranigghoso satapaṭalasahassapaṭalo añjana ^a^P2.0077^ea^ sikharasannikāso nabhaṃ pūretvā pavassati, mayūrasaṅghā ca meghagajjitaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā kekāsaddaṃ muñcitvā tattha tattha padese naccantā vicaranti. therassapi āvāsagabbhe meghavātaphassehi apagatadhammattā passaddhakarajakāye kallataṃ patte utusappāyalābhena cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi, kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ otari, so taṃ ñatvā kālasampadādikittanamukhena attānaṃ bhāvanāya ussāhento --
[21] ``nadanti ^a^V1.0363^ea^ morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino.
[22] susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī ayaṃ, subyāpitambu suvalāhakaṃ nabhaṃ..
[22] susukkasukkaṃ nipuṇaṃ sududdasaṃ, phusāhi taṃ uttamamaccutaṃ pada''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nadanti morā susikhā supekhuṇā, sunīlagīvā sumukhā sugajjino^eb^ti ete matthake uṭṭhitāhi sundarāhi sikhāhi samannāgatattā ^b^susikhā,^eb^ nānāvaṇṇehi anekehi sobhanehi bhaddakapiñchehi samannāgatattā ^b^supekhuṇā,^eb^ rājīvavaṇṇasaṅkāsāya sundarāya nīlavaṇṇāya gīvāya samannāgatattā ^b^sunīlagīvā,^eb^ sundaramukhatāya ^b^sumukhā,^eb^ manuññavāditāya ^b^sugajjino, morā^eb^ sikhaṇḍino chajjasaṃvādī kekāsaddaṃ muñcantā ^a^M1.0427^ea^ ^b^nadanti^eb^ ravanti. ^b^susaddalā cāpi mahāmahī aya^eb^nti ayañca mahāpathavī susaddalā sundaraharitatiṇā. ^b^subyāpitambū^eb^ti abhinavavuṭṭhiyā tahaṃ tahaṃ vissandamānasalilatāya suṭṭhu byāpitajalā vitatajalā. ``susukkatambū''tipi pāṭho, suvisuddhajalāti attho. ^b^suvalāhakaṃ nabha^eb^nti idañca nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ nīluppaladalasannibhehi samantato pūretvā ṭhitehi sundarehi valāhakehi meghehi suvalāhakaṃ.

[03] ^b^sukallarūpo^eb^ ^a^P2.0078^ea^ ^b^sumanassa jhāyata^eb^nti idāni utusappāyalābhena suṭṭhu kallarūpo kammaniyasabhāvo tvaṃ, nīvaraṇehi anajjhārūḷhacittatāya sundaramanassa yogāvacarassa yaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānavasena ca jhāyataṃ. ^b^sunikkamo...pe0... accutaṃ pada^eb^nti evaṃ jhāyanto ca ^b^sādhu subuddhassa^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa ^b^sāsane^eb^ sundaranikkamo hutvā suparisuddhasīlatāya ^b^susukkaṃ,^eb^ visuddhasabhāvatāya sabbassapi saṃkilesassa gocarabhāvānupagamanato ^b^sukkaṃ,^eb^ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya ^b^nipuṇaṃ,^eb^ paramagambhīratāya ^b^sududdasaṃ,^eb^ paṇītabhāvena seṭṭhabhāvena ca ^b^uttamaṃ,^eb^ niccasabhāvatāya ^b^accutaṃ padaṃ taṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^phusāhi^eb^ attapaccakkhakaraṇena sammāpaṭipattiyā sacchikarohīti.
[03] evaṃ thero attānaṃ ovadantova utusappāyalābhena samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.37-42) --
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^M1.0428^ea^ pana patvā thero attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto ^b^``nadanti morā''^eb^tiādinā tāyeva gāthā paccudāhāsi. tenassa idameva aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^nandamānāgataṃ cittā^eb^ti āyasmato anūpamattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ padumaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ rathiyaṃ disvā pasannamānaso aṅkolapupphehi pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā rūpasampattiyā ^b^anūpamo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto upanissayasampannatāya kāme pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto araññe viharati. tassa cittaṃ bahiddhā rūpādiārammaṇesu vidhāvati. kammaṭṭhānaṃ parivaṭṭati. thero vidhāvantaṃ cittaṃ niggaṇhanto --
[22] tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgaraṃ..
[22] satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṃ niyojayī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nandamānāgataṃ cittā^eb^ti nandamāna abhinandamāna citta abhinandamānaṃ āgataṃ uppannaṃ ^a^V1.0365^ea^. ^b^sūlamāropamānaka^eb^nti dukkhuppattiṭṭhānatāya sūlasadisattā sūlaṃ taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ kammakilesehi ettakaṃ kālaṃ āropiyamānaṃ. ^b^tena teneva vajasi, yena sūlaṃ kaliṅgara^eb^nti yattha yattha sūlasaṅkhātā ^a^M1.0429^ea^ bhavā kaliṅgarasaṅkhātā adhikuṭṭanakā kāmaguṇā ca tena teneva, pāpacitta, vajasi, taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ upagacchasi, attano anatthaṃ na sallakkhesi.

[03] ^b^tāhaṃ cittakaliṃ brūmī^eb^ti taṃ tasmā pamattabhāvato cittakaliṃ cittakālakaṇṇiṃ ahaṃ kathayāmi. punapi ^b^taṃ brūmi^eb^ kathemi ^b^cittadubbhakaṃ^eb^ cittasaṅkhātassa attano bahūpakārassa santānassa anatthāvahanato cittadubbhiṃ. ``cittadubbhagā''tipi paṭhanti. cittasaṅkhātālakkhikāppapuññāti attho. kinti brūhīti ce? āha ^b^``satthā te dullabho laddho, mānatthe maṃ niyojayī''^eb^ti. kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyampi nāma buddhasuñño loko hoti, satthari uppannepi manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo dullabhā eva, laddhesu ca tesu satthāpi dullabhoyeva hoti. evaṃ dullabho satthā idāni tayā laddho, tasmiṃ laddhe sampatipi anatthe ahite āyatiñca anatthāvahe dukkhāvahe akusale maṃ mā niyojesīti. evaṃ thero attano cittaṃ ovadanto eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.37.16-19) --
[22] disvāna taṃ ahaṃ buddhaṃ, sayambhuṃ aparājitaṃ..

[03] ^b^saṃsaraṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0430^ea^ ^b^dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti āyasmato vajjitattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcasaṭṭhime kappe ekasmiṃ paccantagāme nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto vanacarako hutvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ upasantaṃ ^a^V1.0366^ea^ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ pabbataguhāyaṃ viharantaṃ addasa. so tassa upasamaṃ disvā pasannamānaso campakapupphena pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya mātugāmahatthaṃ gato rodati. brahmalokato kira cavitvā idhāgato yasmā mātugāmasamphassaṃ na sahati, tasmā mātugāmasamphassavajjanato ^b^vajjito^eb^tveva nāmaṃ jātaṃ. so vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.37.27-30) --
[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dhammasaṃvegena --
[22] sabbā gatī samucchinnā, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0431^ea^ ^b^saṃsara^eb^nti saṃsaranto, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave ādānanikkhepavasena aparāparaṃ sandhāvanto. ^b^dīghamaddhāna^eb^nti cirakālaṃ anādimati saṃsāre aparimāṇakālaṃ. ^b^gatīsū^eb^ti sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ ^a^P2.0081^ea^ vasena sugatiduggatīsu. ^b^parivattisa^eb^nti ghaṭīyantaṃ viya paribbhamanto cavanupapajjanavasena aparāparaṃ parivattiṃ. tassa pana parivattanassa kāraṇamāha ^b^``apassaṃ ariyasaccāni, andhabhūto puthujjano''^eb^ti. dukkhādīni cattāri ariyasaccāni ñāṇacakkhunā apassanto appaṭivijjhanto, tato eva avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthūnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano honto gatīsu parivattisanti yojanā, tenevāha bhagavā --

[02] ``catunnaṃ ^a^V1.0367^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyasaccānaṃ ananubodhā appaṭivedhā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcā''ti (mahāva0 287; dī0 ni0 2.155; saṃ0 ni0 5.1091; netti0 114).

[03] ^b^tassa^eb^ mayhaṃ vuttanayena pubbe puthujjanasseva sato idāni satthārā dinnanayena ^b^appamattassa^eb^ appamādapaṭipattiyā samathavipassanābhāvanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitassa. ^b^saṃsārā vinaḷīkatā^eb^ti saṃsaranti sattā etehīti ``saṃsārā''ti laddhanāmā kammakilesā aggamaggena samucchinnattā vigatanaḷā nimmūlā katā. ^b^sabbā gatī samucchinnā^eb^ti evaṃ kammakilesavaṭṭānaṃ vinaḷīkatattā nirayādikā sabbāpi gatiyo sammadeva ucchinnā viddhaṃsitā, tato eva ^b^natthi dāni^eb^ āyatiṃ ^b^punabbhavo^eb^ti idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^assatthe haritobhāse^eb^ti āyasmato sandhitattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle eko gopālako ahosi. so satthari parinibbute aññataraṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ^a^M1.0432^ea^ tassa santike buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso ``kuhiṃ bhagavā''ti pucchitvā parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā ``evaṃ mahānubhāvā buddhāpi nāma aniccatāvasaṃ gacchanti, aho saṅkhārā addhuvā''ti aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhi. taṃ thero bodhipūjāya ussāhesi. so kālena kālaṃ bodhirukkhasamīpaṃ gantvā ^a^P2.0082^ea^ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā buddhaguṇe anussaranto bodhiṃ vandati. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe ibbhakule nibbattitvā ^b^sandhito^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. so attano pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto sikhissa bhagavato kāle bodhivandanaṃ buddhānussatiṃ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhañca anussaritvā tadupanissayena attano visesādhigamaṃ pakāsento --
[22] tassā saññāya vāhasā, patto me āsavakkhayo''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^assatthe^eb^ti assatthaṭṭhānīye, yvāyaṃ etarahi amhākaṃ bhagavato bodhirukkho assattho, etassa ṭhāne tadā sikhissa bhagavato bodhirukkho puṇḍarīko ṭhitoti so assatthaṭṭhānīyatāya ``assatthe''ti vuttaṃ. sattānaṃ assāsajananato vā. apare pana ``assattharukkhamūle nisīditvā tadā buddhānussatiyā bhāvitattā thero `assatthe'ti avocā''ti vadanti. ^b^haritobhāse^eb^ti haritehi sāramaṇivaṇṇehi obhāsamāne. ^b^saṃvirūḷhamhī^eb^ti suṭṭhu virūḷhe suppatiṭṭhite, sughananicitapattapalāsapallavehi virūḷhasañchanneti ca vadanti. ^b^pādape^eb^ti rukkhe. ^b^ekaṃ buddhagataṃ saññaṃ, alabhitthaṃ patissato^eb^ti buddhārammaṇaṃ ^a^M1.0433^ea^ ārammaṇassa ekajātiyattā ekaṃ ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinayappavattaṃ buddhānussatisahagataṃ saññaṃ buddhaguṇānaṃ patipatisaraṇato patissato hutvā alabhiṃ.

[01] kadā pana sā saññā laddhā, kīvatāya siddhāti āha ^b^``ekatiṃse ito kappe''^eb^tiādi. ito bhaddakappato uddhaṃ ārohanavasena ekatiṃse kappe. ^b^yaṃ sañña^eb^nti yaṃ buddhānussatisahagataṃ saññaṃ, yaṃ vā buddhānaṃ aniccataṃ disvā tadanusārena sabbāsaṅkhāresu tadā aniccasaññaṃ alabhiṃ. ^b^tassā saññāya vāhasā^eb^ti tassā yathāvuttāya saññāya kāraṇabhāvena taṃ upanissayaṃ katvā. ^b^patto me āsavakkhayo^eb^ti idāni ^a^P2.0083^ea^ mayā āsavānaṃ khayo nirodho adhigatoti imāyeva ca imassa therassa apadānagāthāpi. yathāha (apa0 thera 1.22.27-30) --

[03] tikanipāte ^a^M1.0434^ea^ ^a^V1.0369^ea^ ^b^ayoni suddhimanvesa^eb^nti āyasmato aṅgaṇikabhāradvājattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde himavantasamīpe ukkaṭṭhe nāma nagare vibhavasampannassa brāhmaṇassa gehe nibbattitvā ^b^aṅgaṇikabhāradvājo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato nekkhammajjhāsayatāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā amaraṃ tapaṃ caranto tattha tattha vicaranto sammāsambuddhaṃ janapadacārikaṃ carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā taṃ micchātapaṃ pahāya sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.23.48-51) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ñātīnaṃ anukampāya attano jātibhūmiṃ gantvā bahū ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tato nivattitvā kururaṭṭhe kuṇḍiyassa ^a^V1.0370^ea^ nāma nigamassa avidūre ^a^M1.0435^ea^ araññe vasanto kenacideva karaṇīyena uggārāmaṃ gato uttarāpathato āgatehi sandiṭṭhehi brāhmaṇehi ^a^P2.0084^ea^ samāgato tehi, ``bho bhāradvāja, kiṃ disvā brāhmaṇānaṃ samayaṃ pahāya imaṃ samayaṃ gaṇhī''ti pucchito tesaṃ ito buddhasāsanato bahiddhā suddhi natthīti dassento --
[22] suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto, akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapa''nti.. -- paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ayonī^eb^ti ayoniso anupāyena. ^b^suddhi^eb^nti saṃsārasuddhiṃ bhavanissaraṇaṃ. ^b^anvesa^eb^nti gavesanto. ^b^aggiṃ paricariṃ vane^eb^ti ``ayaṃ suddhimaggo''ti adhippāyena araññāyatane aggihutasālāyaṃ agyāgāraṃ katvā āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggidevaṃ paricariṃ vede vuttavidhinā pūjesiṃ. ^b^suddhimaggaṃ ajānanto, akāsiṃ amaraṃ tapa^eb^nti suddhiyā nibbānassa maggaṃ ajānanto aggiparicaraṇaṃ viya pañcatapatappanādiattakilamathānuyogaṃ ``suddhimaggo''ti maññāya akāsiṃ acariṃ paṭipajjiṃ.

[03] evaṃ thero assamato assamaṃ gacchanto viya vede vuttavidhinā aggiparicaraṇādinā anuṭṭhāya suddhiyā appattabhāvena bahiddhā suddhiyā abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni imasmiṃyeva sāsane suddhi ca mayā adhigatāti dassento --
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. -- dutiyagāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti yassatthāya suddhiṃ anvesanto tassa maggaṃ ajānanto aggiṃ paricariṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ acariṃ, taṃ nibbāna^b^sukhaṃ sukhena^eb^ samathavipassanāya sukhāya paṭipadāya attakilamathānuyogaṃ anupagamma mayā ^b^laddhaṃ^eb^ pattaṃ adhigataṃ. ^b^passa dhammasudhammata^eb^nti satthu sāsanadhammassa sudhammataṃ aviparītaniyyānikadhammasabhāvaṃ ^a^M1.0436^ea^ passa jānāhīti dhammālapanavasena vadati, attānaṃ vā ālapati. tassa laddhabhāvaṃ pana dassento --
[25] āha ^a^V1.0371^ea^, taṃ vuttatthameva. evaṃ suddhiyā adhigatattā ``ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ paramatthato brāhmaṇo''ti dassento --
[22] tevijjo nhātakocamhi, sottiyo camhi vedagū''ti.. -- tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tassattho -- ito pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇabhāvato brāhmaṇānaṃ samaññāya ^b^brahmabandhu^eb^ nāma ^b^āsiṃ^eb^. bāhitapāpattā pana ^b^idāni kho^eb^ arahattādhigamena paramatthato ^b^brāhmaṇo ca amhi^eb^. ito pubbe bhavasañcayakarānaṃ tissannaṃ vedasaṅkhātānaṃ vijjānaṃ ajjhayanena samaññāmattena tevijjo nāma hutvā idāni bhavakkhayakarāya vijjāya vasena tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ adhigatattā paramatthato ^b^tevijjo ca amhi^eb^. tathā ito pubbe bhavassādagadhitāya nhātakavatanipphattiyā samaññāmattena nhātako nāma hutvā idāni aṭṭhaṅgikamaggajalena suvikkhālitakilesamalatāya paramatthato ^b^nhātako camhi^eb^. ito pubbe avimuttabhavassādamantajjhānena vohāramattato sottiyo nāma hutvā idāni suvimuttabhavassādadhammajjhānena paramatthato ^b^sottiyo camhi^eb^. ito pubbe appaṭinissaṭṭhapāpadhammānaṃ vedānaṃ gatamattena vedagū nāma hutvā idāni vedasaṅkhātena maggañāṇena saṃsāramahoghassa vedassa catusaccassa ca pāraṃ gatattā adhigatattā ñātattā paramatthato ^b^vedagū^eb^ jātoti. taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇā sāsane uḷāraṃ pasādaṃ pavedesuṃ.

[03] ^b^pañcāhāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0437^ea^ ^b^pabbajito^eb^ti āyasmato paccayattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ vinatāya nāma nadiyā tīre gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso manuññadassanāni mahantāni udumbaraphalāni ocinitvā upanāmesi. so tena puññakammena sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ bhaddakappe kassape bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattavaradhammacakke veneyyajanānuggahaṃ karonte tassa sāsane pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjanto ekadivasaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ cintetvā

[25] ativiya ^a^V1.0372^ea^ sañjātasaṃvego vihāre nisinno ``arahattaṃ appatvā ito na nikkhamissāmī''ti ^a^P2.0086^ea^ cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya vāyamanto ñāṇassa aparipakkattā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. so kālaṅkatvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rohitanagare khattiyakule nibbattitvā ^b^paccayo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ mahārājabaliṃ kātuṃ ārabhi. tattha mahājano sannipati. tasmiṃ samāgame tassa pasādañjananatthaṃ satthā mahājanassa pekkhantasseva ākāse vessavaṇena nimmite ratanamayakūṭāgāre ratanamayasīhāsane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desesi. mahato janakāyassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi. taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā paccayarājāpi rajjaṃ pahāya purimahetusañcodito pabbaji. so yathā kassapassa bhagavato kāle paṭiññaṃ akāsi, evaṃ paṭiññaṃ katvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā tāvadeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.39.15-20) --
[22] na vihārā nikkhamissaṃ, iti katvāna mānasaṃ..
[22] pattomhi acalaṃ ṭhānaṃ, phusitvā accutaṃ padaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] vihāraṃ me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahu..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^pañcāhāhaṃ pabbajito^eb^ti pañcāho ahaṃ, pabbajito hutvā pañcāho, pabbajitadivasato pañcamo aho niṭṭhitoti attho. ^b^sekho appattamānaso^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ sikkhanato sekho. anavasesato mānaṃ siyati samucchindatīti mānaso, aggamaggo, taṃnibbattito mānasato āgataṃ mānasaṃ, arahattaṃ, taṃ, so vā appatto ^a^M1.0439^ea^ etenāti appattamānaso. ^b^vihāraṃ me paviṭṭhassa, cetaso paṇidhī ahū^eb^ti evaṃ sekhassa me vasanakavihāraṃ ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassa sato evarūpo idāni vuccamānākāro cetopaṇidhi ahosi, evaṃ mayā cittaṃ paṇihitanti attho.

[03] ^b^nāsissa^eb^ntiādinā ^a^P2.0087^ea^ cittapaṇidhiṃ dasseti. tattha ^b^nāsissa^eb^nti yaṃkiñci bhojanaṃ na bhuñjissaṃ na bhuñjissāmi ^b^taṇhāsalle^eb^ mama hadayagate ^b^anūhate^eb^ anuddhateti evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ. ^b^na pivissāmī^eb^ti yaṃkiñci pātabbaṃ na pivissāmi. ^b^vihārato na nikkhame^eb^ti imasmā idāni mayā nisinnagabbhato na nikkhameyyaṃ. ^b^napi passaṃ nipātessa^eb^nti mama sarīrassa dvīsu passesu ekampi passaṃ kāyakilamathavinodanatthaṃ na nipātessaṃ, ekapassenapi na nipajjissāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^tassa mevaṃ viharato^eb^ti tassa me evaṃ cittaṃ paṇidhāya daḷhavīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vipassanānuyogavasena viharato. ^b^passa vīriyaparakkama^eb^nti vidhinā īrayitabbato ``vīriyaṃ'' paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato ``parakkamo''ti ca laddhanāmaṃ ussoḷhībhūtaṃ vāyāmaṃ passa jānāhi. yassa panānubhāvena mayā ^b^tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana^eb^nti vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V1.0374^ea^ ^b^pubbe karaṇīyānī^eb^ti āyasmato bākulattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi kira atīte ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake anomadassissa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto ``samparāyikatthaṃ gavesissāmī''ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pabbatapāde viharanto pañcābhiññāaṭṭhasamāpattilābhī hutvā viharanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ^a^M1.0440^ea^ patiṭṭhito satthu udarābādhe uppanne araññato bhesajjāni āharitvā taṃ vūpasametvā tattha puññaṃ ārogyatthāya pariṇāmetvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayaṃ taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ ākaṅkhanto paṇidhānaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññālābhī hutvā pabbatapāde vasanto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ^a^P2.0088^ea^ patiṭṭhito bhikkhūnaṃ tiṇapupphakaroge uppanne taṃ vūpasametvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ vinassamānaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā tattha uposathāgārādikaṃ sabbaṃ āvasathaṃ kāretvā tattha bhikkhusaṅghassa sabbaṃ bhesajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhigehe nibbatti. so arogabhāvāya mahāyamunāya nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā hatthato macchena gilito macche kevaṭṭahatthagate bārāṇasiseṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇitvā gahite phāliyamānepi puññabalena arogoyeva hutvā tāya puttoti gahetvā posiyamāno taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā janakehi mātāpitūhi ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ putto, detha no putta''nti anuyoge kate raññā ``ubhayesampi sādhāraṇo hotū''ti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ dāyādabhāvena vinicchayaṃ katvā ṭhapitattā ^b^bākulo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto hutvā mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto āsītiko hutvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā sattāhameva puthujjano ahosi, aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.386-411) --
[22] kapitthā ca bahū tattha, pupphitā jīvajīvakā..
[22] phārusakā alābū ca, puṇḍarīkā ca pupphitā..
[22] mahānāmā bahū tattha, ajjunā ca piyaṅgukā..
[22] ediso assamo mayhaṃ, sasissohaṃ tahiṃ vasiṃ..
[21] ``yo me pādāsi bhesajjaṃ, byādhiñca samayī mama.
[22] vādite tūriye tattha, modissati sadā ayaṃ..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] bākulo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[22] khepetuṃ neva sakkomi, tadā hi sukataṃ mama..
[21] ``lābhā mama suladdhaṃ me, yohaṃ addakkhi nāyakaṃ.

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā attano sāvake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapentena appābādhānaṃ ^a^V1.0377^ea^ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito so parinibbānasamaye saṅghamajjhe bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā, pacchā ca manutappati..
[21] ``yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade.
[22] asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ, yattha dukkhaṃ nirujjhatī''ti.. -- gāthāttayamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0089^ea^ ^b^yo pubbe karaṇīyāni, pacchā so kātumicchatī^eb^ti yo puggalo pubbe puretaraṃ jarārogādīhi anabhibhūtakāleyeva kātabbāni attano hitasukhāvahāni kammāni pamādavasena akatvā pacchā so kātabbakālaṃ atikkamitvā kātuṃ icchati. ^b^so^eb^ti ca nipātamattaṃ. tadā pana jarārogādīhi abhibhūtattā kātuṃ na sakkoti, asakkonto ca ^b^sukhā so dhaṃsate ṭhānā, pacchā ca manutappatī^eb^ti so puggalo sukhā ^a^M1.0444^ea^ ṭhānā saggato nibbānato ca tadupāyassa anuppāditattā parihāyanto ``akataṃ me kalyāṇa''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.248; netti0 120) pacchā ca anutappati vippaṭisāraṃ āpajjati. ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ahaṃ pana karaṇīyaṃ katvā eva tumhe evaṃ vadāmīti dassento ^b^``yañhi kayirā''^eb^ti dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^parijānantī^eb^ti ``ettako aya''nti paricchijja jānanti na bahuṃ maññantīti attho. sammāpaṭipattivasena hi yathāvādī tathākārī eva sobhati, na tato aññathā. karaṇīyapariyāyena sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ idāni sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``susukhaṃ vatā''^eb^tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. tassattho -- sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā ^b^sammāsambuddhena^eb^ bhagavatā ^b^desitaṃ^eb^ sabbaso sokahetūnaṃ abhāvato ^b^asokaṃ^eb^ vigatarāgādirajattā ^b^virajaṃ^eb^ catūhi yogehi anupaddutattā ^b^khemaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ suṭṭhu ^b^sukhaṃ vata,^eb^ kasmā? ^b^yattha^eb^ yasmiṃ nibbāne sakalaṃ ^b^vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nirujjhati^eb^ accantameva vūpasamatīti.

[03] ^b^sukhañce^eb^ ^a^V1.0378^ea^ ^b^jīvituṃ icche^eb^ti āyasmato dhaniyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso naḷamālāya pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe kumbhakārakule nibbattitvā ^b^dhaniyo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto kumbhakārakammena jīvati. tena ca samayena satthā dhaniyassa kumbhakārassa sālāyaṃ nisīditvā pukkusātissa kulaputtassa ^b^chadhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.342 ādayo) desesi. so taṃ sutvā katakicco ahosi. dhaniyo tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ sutvā ``niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsanaṃ, yattha ekarattiparicayenāpi vaṭṭadukkhato muñcituṃ sakkā''ti paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ^a^P2.0090^ea^ kuṭimaṇḍanānuyutto ^a^M1.0445^ea^ viharanto kuṭikaraṇaṃ paṭicca bhagavatā garahito saṅghike senāsane vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.1-7) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā ye bhikkhū dhutaṅgasamādhānena attānaṃ ukkaṃsetvā saṅghabhattādiṃ sādiyante aññe bhikkhū avajānanti, tesaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] itarītarena tusseyya, ekadhammañca bhāvaye''ti.. -- tisso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sukhañce jīvituṃ icche, sāmaññasmiṃ apekkhavā^eb^ti sāmaññasmiṃ samaṇabhāve apekkhavā sikkhāya tibbagāravo hutvā sukhaṃ jīvituṃ iccheyya ce, anesanaṃ pahāya sāmaññasukhena sace jīvitukāmoti attho ^a^M1.0446^ea^. ^b^saṅghikaṃ nātimaññeyya, cīvaraṃ pānabhojana^eb^nti saṅghato ābhataṃ cīvaraṃ āhāraṃ na avamaññeyya, saṅghassa uppajjanakalābho nāma parisuddhuppādo hotīti taṃ paribhuñjantassa ājīvapārisuddhisambhavena sāmaññasukhaṃ hatthagatamevāti adhippāyo. ^b^ahi mūsikasobbhaṃvā^eb^ti ahi viya mūsikāya khatabilaṃ ^b^sevetha^eb^ seveyya senāsanaṃ. yathā nāma sappo sayamattano āsayaṃ akatvā mūsikāya aññena vā kate āsaye vasitvā yena kāmaṃ pakkamati, evamevaṃ bhikkhu sayaṃ senāsanakaraṇā saṃkilesaṃ anāpajjitvā yattha katthaci vasitvā pakkameyyāti attho.

[03] idāni vutte avutte ca paccaye yathālābhasantoseneva sāmaññasukhaṃ hoti, na aññathāti dassento āha ^b^``itarītarena tusseyyā''^eb^ti, yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā yathāladdhena paccayena santosaṃ āpajjeyyāti attho. ^b^ekadhamma^eb^nti appamādabhāvaṃ, tañhi anuyuñjantassa anavajjaṃ sabbaṃ lokiyasukhaṃ lokuttarasukhañca hatthagatameva hoti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti vipulaṃ sukha''nti (ma0 ni0 2.352; dha0 pa0 27).

[03] ^b^atisīta^eb^nti ^a^P2.0091^ea^ āyasmato mātaṅgaputtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle himavantasamīpe mahato jātassarassa heṭṭhā mahati nāgabhavane mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto ekadivasaṃ nāgabhavanato nikkhamitvā vicaranto satthāraṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano sīsamaṇinā pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe mātaṅgassa nāma kuṭumbikassa putto ^a^V1.0380^ea^ hutvā nibbatto ^a^M1.0447^ea^ ^b^mātaṅgaputto^eb^tveva paññāyittha. so viññutaṃ patto alasajātiko hutvā kiñci kammaṃ akaronto ñātakehi aññehi ca garahito ``sukhajīvino ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā''ti sukhajīvitaṃ ākaṅkhanto bhikkhūhi kataparicayo hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aññe bhikkhū iddhimante disvā iddhibalaṃ patthetvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.48.8-29) --
[22] tattha me bhavanaṃ āsi, puññakammena saṃyutaṃ..
[22] sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādetvā, avandiṃ satthuno ahaṃ..
[22] antalikkhe ṭhito satthā, imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsatha..
[21] ``so te ijjhatu saṅkappo, labhassu vipulaṃ sukhaṃ.
[22] bhaṇḍā me sukatā honti, yadicchasi piḷandhanā..
[22] divasañceva rattiñca, āloko hoti me sadā..
[22] ñāṇāloko mayā diṭṭho, pattomhi acalaṃ padaṃ..
[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena kosajjaṃ garahanto attano ca vīriyārambhaṃ kittento --
[21] ``yo ca sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati.
[22] karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhā na vihāyati..

[01] tattha ^b^atisīta^eb^nti himapātavaddalādinā ativiya sītaṃ, ^b^idaṃ ahū^eb^ti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^atiuṇha^eb^nti dhammaparitāpādinā ativiya uṇhaṃ, ubhayenapi utuvasena kosajjavatthumāha. ^b^atisāya^eb^nti divasassa pariṇatiyā atisāyaṃ, sāyaggahaṇeneva cettha pātopi saṅgayhati ^a^P1.0092^ea^, tadubhayena kālavasena kosajjavatthumāha. ^b^itī^eb^ti iminā pakārena. etena ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotī''tiādinā (a0 ni0 8.80; dī0 ni0 3.334) vuttaṃ kosajjavatthuṃ ^a^V1.0382^ea^ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^vissaṭṭhakammante^eb^ti pariccattayogakammante. ^b^khaṇā^eb^ti buddhuppādādayo brahmacariyavāsassa okāsā. ^b^accentī^eb^ti atikkamanti. ^b^māṇave^eb^ti satte. ^b^tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī^eb^ti tiṇato upari na maññati, tiṇaṃ viya maññati, sītuṇhāni abhibhavitvā attanā kattabbaṃ karoti. ^b^kara^eb^nti karonto. ^b^purisakiccānī^eb^ti vīrapurisena kattabbāni attahitaparahitāni. ^b^sukhā^eb^ti sukhato, nibbānasukhatoti adhippāyo. tatiyagāthāya attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^ye cittakathī bahussutā^eb^ti āyasmato khujjasobhitattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso dasahi gāthāhi abhitthavi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde pāṭaliputtanagare brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, ``sobhito''tissa nāmaṃ ^a^M1.0450^ea^ ahosi. thokaṃ khujjadhātukatāya pana ^b^khujjasobhito^eb^tveva paññāyittha. so vayappatto satthari parinibbute ānandattherassa santike pabbajitvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.49-58) --
[22] rathiyaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] ñāṇālokena jotantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] uddharantaṃ bahū satte, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] sīhanādaṃ vinadantaṃ, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] pucchanti nipuṇe pañhe, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] tena puññaṃ anubhonti, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] na vikampati ajjhiṭṭho, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] vinadanti gajā mattā, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] abbhunnatā samā honti, ko disvā na pasīdati..
[22] sabbe satte viññāpeti, ko disvā na pasīdati..
