[01] chaḷabhiñño ^a^M1.0451^ea^ pana hutvā paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle rājagahe sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ sannipatitena saṅghena ``āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantehī''ti āṇatto pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā therassa purato uṭṭhahitvā saṅghassa sāsanaṃ ārocetvā sayaṃ puretaraṃ ākāsena gantvā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāraṃ sampāpuṇi. tena ca samayena mārassa mārakāyikānañca paṭisedhanatthaṃ devasaṅghena pesitā aññatarā devatā sattapaṇṇiguhādvāre ṭhitā hoti, tassā khujjasobhito thero attano āgamanaṃ kathento --
[22] tesaññataroyamāyuvā, dvāre tiṭṭhati khujjasobhito''ti.. -- paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^cittakathī^eb^ti vicittadhammakathikā, saṅkhipanaṃ, vitthāraṇaṃ gambhīrakaraṇaṃ uttānīkaraṇaṃ kaṅkhāvinodanaṃ dhammapatiṭṭhāpananti evamādīhi nānānayehi paresaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammassa kathanasīlāti attho. ^b^bahussutā^eb^ti pariyattipaṭivedhabāhusaccapāripūriyā bahussutā. sabbaso samitapāpatāya ^b^samaṇā. pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaññataro^eb^ti pāṭaliputtanagaravāsitāya pāṭaliputtavāsino, tesaṃ aññataro, ^b^ayaṃ āyuvā^eb^ dīghāyu āyasmā. ^b^dvāre tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti sattapaṇṇiguhāya dvāre tiṭṭhati, saṅghassa anumatiyā pavisitunti attho. taṃ sutvā sā devatā therassa āgamanaṃ saṅghassa nivedentī --
[21] ``ye ^a^V1.0384^ea^ cittakathī...pe0... dvāre tiṭṭhati māluterito''ti.. -- dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
[03] tattha ^b^māluterito^eb^ti iddhicittajanitena vāyunā erito, iddhibalena āgatoti attho.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M1.0452^ea^ tāya devatāya niveditena saṅghena katokāso thero saṅghassa santikaṃ gacchanto --

[03] tattha ^b^suyuddhenā^eb^ti pubbabhāge tadaṅgavikkhambhanappahānavasena kilesehi suṭṭhu yujjhanena. ^b^suyiṭṭhenā^eb^ti antarantarā kalyāṇamittehi dinnasappāyadhammadānena. ^b^saṅgāmavijayena cā^eb^ti samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso kilesābhisaṅkhāranimmathanena laddhasaṅgāmavijayena ca. ^b^brahmacariyānuciṇṇenā^eb^ti anuciṇṇena aggamaggabrahmacariyena. ^b^evāyaṃ sukhamedhatī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārena ayaṃ khujjasobhito nibbānasukhaṃ phalasamāpattisukhañca edhati, anubhavatīti attho.

[03] ^b^yodha koci manussesū^eb^ti āyasmato vāraṇattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto ito dvānavute kappe tissassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva ^a^P2.0094^ea^ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu pāragū hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catupaṇṇāsasahassānaṃ antevāsikānaṃ mante vācento vasati. tena ca samayena tissassa bhagavato bodhisattabhūtassa tusitā kāyā cavitvā carimabhave mātukucchiṃ okkamanena mahāpathavikampo ahosi. taṃ disvā mahājano bhīto saṃviggo naṃ isiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pathavikampanakāraṇaṃ pucchi. so ``mahābodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkami, tenāyaṃ pathavikampo, tasmā mā bhāyathā''ti buddhuppādassa pubbanimittabhāvaṃ kathetvā samassāsesi, buddhārammaṇañca pītiṃ paṭivedesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu ^a^M1.0453^ea^ saṃsaranto imasmiṃ ^a^V1.0385^ea^ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^vāraṇo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto aññatarassa āraññakassa therassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. so ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ahinakule aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ katvā kālaṅkate disvā ``ime sattā aññamaññavirodhena jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā''ti saṃviggamānaso hutvā bhagavato santikaṃ gato, tassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā tadanurūpameva ovādaṃ dento --
[22] asmā lokā paramhā ca, ubhayā dhaṃsate naro..
[22] bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṃ tādisako naro..
[22] ekāsanassa ca raho, cittavūpasamassā cā''ti.. -- tisso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yodha koci manussesū^eb^ti idha manussesu yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. manussaggahaṇañcettha ukkaṭṭhasattanidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^parapāṇāni hiṃsatī^eb^ti parasatte māreti vibādhati ca. ^b^asmā lokā^eb^ti idha lokato. ^b^paramhā^eb^ti paralokato. ^b^ubhayā dhaṃsate^eb^ti ubhayato dhaṃsati, ubhayalokapariyāpannahitasukhato parihāyatīti attho. ^b^naro^eb^ti satto.

[03] evaṃ parapīḷālakkhaṇaṃ pāpadhammaṃ dassetvā idāni parapīḷānivattilakkhaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ dassento ^b^``yo ca mettenā''^eb^tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^mettena cittenā^eb^ti mettāsampayuttena cittena appanāpattena itarītarena vā. ^b^sabbapāṇānukampatī^eb^ti sabbe pāṇe attano orasaputte viya mettāyati. ^b^bahuñhi so pasavati, puññaṃ tādisako naro^eb^ti ^a^P2.0095^ea^ so tathārūpo mettāvihārī puggalo bahuṃ mahantaṃ anappakaṃ kusalaṃ pasavati paṭilabhati adhigacchati.

[01] idāni ^a^M1.0454^ea^ taṃ sasambhāre samathavipassanādhamme niyojento ^b^``subhāsitassā''^eb^tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^subhāsitassa sikkhethā^eb^ti appicchakathādibhedaṃ subhāsitaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ savanadhāraṇaparipucchādivasena sikkheyya. ^b^samaṇūpāsanassa cā^eb^ti samitapāpānaṃ samaṇānaṃ kalyāṇamittānaṃ upāsakānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā payirupāsanañceva paṭipattiyā tesaṃ samīpacariyañca ^a^V1.0386^ea^ sikkheyya. ^b^ekāsanassa ca raho cittavūpasamassa cā^eb^ti ekassa asahāyassa kāyavivekaṃ anubrūhantassa raho kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ sikkheyya. evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto bhāvanañca matthakaṃ pāpento samucchedavasena kilesānaṃ cittassa vūpasamañca sikkheyya. yāhi adhisīlasikkhādīhi kilesā accantameva vūpasantā pahīnā honti, tā maggaphalasikkhā sikkhantassa accantameva cittaṃ vūpasantaṃ nāma hotīti. gāthāpariyosāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.59-72) --
[21] ``avacāsiṃ ^a^M1.0455^ea^ tadā tesaṃ, mā bhetha natthi vo bhayaṃ.
[22] tathā nimittā dissanti, obhāso vipulo mahā..

[03] ^b^ekopi^eb^ ^a^V1.0387^ea^ ^b^saddho medhāvī^eb^ti āyasmato vassikattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto pilakkhaphalāni adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^vassiko^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ābādhiko ahosi. atha naṃ ñātakā vejjaparidiṭṭhena bhesajjavidhinā upaṭṭhahitvā arogamakaṃsu. so tamhā ābādhā vuṭṭhito saṃvegajāto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.40-44) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño ^a^P2.0096^ea^ pana hutvā ākāsena ñātakānaṃ santike gantvā ākāse ṭhito dhammaṃ desetvā te saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. tesu keci kālaṅkatā saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhitattā sagge nibbattiṃsu. atha naṃ satthā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ upagataṃ ``kiṃ te, vassika, ñātīnaṃ ārogya''nti pucchi. so ñātīnaṃ attanā kataṃ upakāraṃ satthu kathento --
[21] ``te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā, pattā te tidivaṃ sukhaṃ.
[22] bhātaro mayhaṃ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino''ti.. --

[03] tatthāyaṃ ^a^V1.0388^ea^ paṭhamagāthāya attho -- yo kammaphalasaddhāya ca ratanattayasaddhāya ca vasena ^b^saddho,^eb^ tato eva kammassakatañāṇādiyogato ^b^medhāvī,^eb^ satthu ovādadhamme navalokuttaradhamme ca ṭhitattā ^b^dhammaṭṭho,^eb^ ācārasīlassa maggasīlassa phalasīlassa ca vasena ^b^sīlasampanno,^eb^ so ^b^ekopi^eb^ yathāvuttāya saddhāya abhāvena ^b^assaddhānaṃ idha^eb^ imasmiṃ loke ``amhākaṃ ime''ti ñātabbaṭṭhena ^b^ñātīnaṃ,^eb^ tathā pemabandhanena bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^``bandhū''^eb^ti ca laddhanāmānaṃ bandhavānaṃ ^b^atthāya^eb^ hitāya ^b^hotī^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M1.0457^ea^ sādhāraṇato vuttamatthaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^``niggayhā''^eb^tiādinā itaragāthā vuttā. tattha ^b^niggayha anukampāya, coditā ñātayo mayā^eb^ti idānipi duggatā kusalaṃ akatvā āyatiṃ parikkilesaṃ puna mānubhavitthāti niggahetvā ñātayo mayā ovaditā. ^b^ñātibandhavapemena^eb^ ``amhākaṃ ayaṃ bandhavo''ti evaṃ pavattena pemena mama ovādaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkontā ^b^kāraṃ katvāna bhikkhūsu^eb^ pasannacittā hutvā cīvarādipaccayadānena ceva upaṭṭhānena ca bhikkhūsu sakkārasammānaṃ katvā ^b^te abbhatītā kālaṅkatā^eb^ hutvā imaṃ lokaṃ atikkantā. puna ^b^te^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^tidivaṃ sukha^eb^nti devalokapariyāpannasukhaṃ, sukhaṃ vā iṭṭhaṃ tidivaṃ adhigatā. ``ke pana te''ti āha. ``^b^bhātaro mayhaṃ mātā ca, modanti kāmakāmino''^eb^ti. attanā yathākāmitavatthukāmasamaṅgino hutvā abhiramantīti attho.

[03] ^b^kālapabbaṅgasaṅkāso^eb^ti ^a^P2.0097^ea^ āyasmato yasojattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle ārāmagopakakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ vipassiṃ bhagavantaṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso labujaphalaṃ adāsi.

[03] so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagaradvāre kevaṭṭagāme pañcakulasatajeṭṭhakassa kevaṭṭassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^yasojo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so vayappatto attano sahāyehi kevaṭṭaputtehi saddhiṃ macchagahaṇatthaṃ aciravatiyaṃ nadiyaṃ jālaṃ khipi. tattheko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo mahāmaccho antojālaṃ pāvisi. taṃ te rañño pasenadissa dassesuṃ ^a^V1.0389^ea^. rājā ``imassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa macchassa vaṇṇakāraṇaṃ bhagavā jānātī''ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato ^a^M1.0458^ea^ dassesi. bhagavā ``ayaṃ kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa sāsane osakkamāne pabbajitvā micchā paṭipajjanto sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā niraye nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tato cuto aciravatiyaṃ maccho hutvā nibbatto''ti vatvā tassa bhaginīnañca niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ, tassa bhātikattherassa parinibbutabhāvañca teneva kathāpetvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā ^b^kapilasuttaṃ^eb^ desesi.

[03] satthu desanaṃ sutvā yasojo saṃvegajāto saddhiṃ attano sahāyehi bhagavato santike pabbajitvā patirūpe ṭhāne vasanto ekadivasaṃ sapariso bhagavantaṃ vandituṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi. tassa āgamane senāsanapaññāpanādinā vihāre uccāsaddamahāsaddo ahosi. taṃ sutvā ``bhagavā saparisaṃ yasojaṃ paṇāmesī''ti (udā0 23) sabbaṃ udāne āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. paṇāmito pana āyasmā yasojo kasābhihato bhaddo assājānīyo viya saṃviggamānaso saddhiṃ parisāya vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vasanto ghaṭento vāyamanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā antovasseyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.32-39) --

[03] chaḷabhiññaṃ ^a^M1.0459^ea^ pana samānaṃ saparisaṃ āyasmantaṃ yasojaṃ satthā pakkositvā āneñjasamāpattinā paṭisanthāramakāsi. so sabbepi ^a^P2.0098^ea^ dhutaṅgadhamme samādāya vattati. tenassa sarīraṃ kisaṃ ahosi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ, taṃ bhagavā paramappicchatāya pasaṃsanto --
[22] mattaññū annapānamhi, adīnamānaso naro''ti.. -- paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^kālapabbaṅgasaṅkāso^eb^ti maṃsūpacayavigamena kisadusaṇṭhitasarīrāvayavatāya dantilatāpabbasadisaṅgo, tenāha ^b^``kiso dhamanisanthato''^eb^ti. ^b^kiso^eb^ti moneyyapaṭipadāpūraṇena kisasarīro. ^b^dhamanisanthato^eb^ti dhamanīhi santhatagatto appamaṃsalohitatāya pākaṭīhi kaṇḍarasirāhi vitatasarīro. ^b^mattaññū^eb^ti pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogavissajjanesu pamāṇaññū. ^b^adīnamānaso^eb^ti kosajjādīhi anabhibhūtattā alīnacitto akusītavutti. ^b^naro^eb^ti puriso, porisassa dhurassa vahanato porisalakkhaṇasampanno purisadhorayhoti adhippāyo.
[03] evaṃ thero satthārā pasaṭṭho pasaṭṭhabhāvānurūpaṃ attano adhivāsanakhantivīriyārambhavivekābhiratikittanamukhena bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathento --
[21] ``yathā brahmā tathā eko, yathā devo tathā duve.
[22] yathā gāmo tathā tayo, kolāhalaṃ tatuttari''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^nāgo saṅgāmasīsevā^eb^ti yathā nāma ājāneyyo hatthināgo yuddhamaṇḍale asisattitomarādippahāre adhivāsetvā parasenaṃ viddhaṃseti, evaṃ bhikkhu ^b^araññasmiṃ brahāvane^eb^ araññāniyaṃ ḍaṃsādiparissaye ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M1.0460^ea^ sampajāno adhivāseyya, adhivāsetvā ca bhāvanābalena mārabalaṃ vidhameyya.

[01] ^b^yathā brahmā^eb^ti yathā brahmā ekako cittappakoparahito jhānasukhena niccameva sukhito viharati ^b^tathā eko^eb^ti bhikkhupi eko adutiyo vivekasukhamanubrūhento sukhaṃ viharati. ekassa sāmaññasukhaṃ paṇītanti hi vuttaṃ. etena ekavihārī bhikkhu ``brahmasamo''ti ovādaṃ deti. ^b^yathā devo tathā duve^eb^ti yathā devānaṃ antarantarā ^a^P2.0099^ea^ cittappakopopi siyā, tathā dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāse ghaṭṭanāpi bhaveyyāti sadutiyavāsena bhikkhu ``devasamo''ti vutto. ^b^yathā gāmo tathā tayo^eb^ti asmimeva pāṭhe tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahavāso gāmavāsasadiso vivekavāso na hotīti adhippāyo ^a^V1.0391^ea^. ^b^kolāhalaṃ tatuttari^eb^nti tato tayato upari ca bahūnaṃ saṃvāso kolāhalaṃ uccāsaddamahāsaddamahājanasannipātasadiso, tasmā ekavihārinā bhavitabbanti adhippāyoti.

[03] ^b^ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā^eb^ti āyasmato sāṭimattiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso tālavaṇṭaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^sāṭimattiyo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya āraññakabhikkhūnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.38.43-47) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā bhikkhū ovadati anusāsati bahū ca satte dhammaṃ kathetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. aññatarañca kulaṃ assaddhaṃ appasannaṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ akāsi. tena tasmiṃ kule manussā there abhippasannā ahesuṃ. tatthekā dārikā abhirūpā dassanīyā theraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojanena parivisati. athekadivasaṃ māro ``evaṃ imassa ayaso vaḍḍhissati, appatiṭṭho bhavissatī''ti cintetvā therassa rūpena gantvā taṃ dārikaṃ hatthe aggahesi. dārikā ``nāyaṃ manussasamphasso''ti ca aññāsi, hatthañca muñcāpesi. taṃ disvā gharajano there appasādaṃ janesi. punadivase thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ anāvajjento taṃ gharaṃ agamāsi. tattha manussā anādaraṃ akaṃsu. thero taṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjento mārassa kiriyaṃ disvā ``tassa gīvāyaṃ kukkurakuṇapaṃ paṭimuñcatū''ti adhiṭṭhahitvā ^a^V1.0392^ea^ tassa mocanatthaṃ upagatena mārena atītadivase katakiriyaṃ ^a^P2.0100^ea^ kathāpetvā taṃ tajjetvā vissajjesi. taṃ disvā gharasāmiko ``khamatha, bhante, accaya''nti khamāpetvā ``ajjatagge ahameva, bhante, tumhe upaṭṭhahāmī''ti āha. thero tassa dhammaṃ kathento --
[21] ``ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjati.
[22] yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhamevetaṃ, natthi duccaritaṃ mama..
[21] ``aniccā hi calā saddhā, evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā.
[22] rajjantipi virajjanti, tattha kiṃ jiyyate muni..
[21] ``paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0462^ea^ ^b^ahu tuyhaṃ pure saddhā, sā te ajja na vijjatī^eb^ti, upāsaka, ito pubbe tava mayi ``ayyo dhammacārī samacārī''tiādinā saddhā ahosi, sā saddhā te tava ajja idāni na upalabbhati. tasmā ^b^yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhameveta^eb^nti catupaccayadānaṃ, tuyhameva etaṃ hotu, na tena mayhaṃ attho, sammā pasannacittena hi dānaṃ nāma dātabbanti adhippāyo. atha vā ^b^yaṃ tuyhaṃ tuyhameveta^eb^nti yaṃ tava mayi ajja agāravaṃ pavattaṃ, taṃ tuyhameva, tassa phalaṃ tayā eva paccanubhavitabbaṃ, na mayāti attho. ^b^natthi duccaritaṃ mamā^eb^ti mama pana duccaritaṃ nāma natthi maggeneva duccaritahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā.

[03] ^b^aniccā hi calā saddhā^eb^ti yasmā pothujjanikā saddhā aniccā ekantikā na hoti, tato eva calā assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya, thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇukaṃ viya ca anavaṭṭhitā. ^b^evaṃ diṭṭhā hi sā mayā^eb^ti evaṃ bhūtā ca sā saddhā mayā tayi diṭṭhā paccakkhato viditā. ^b^rajjantipi virajjantī^eb^ti evaṃ tassā anavaṭṭhitattā eva ime sattā kadāci katthaci mittasanthavavasena rajjanti sinehampi karonti, kadāci virajjanti virattacittā honti. ^b^tattha kiṃ jiyyate munī^eb^ti tasmiṃ puthujjanānaṃ rajjane virajjane ca muni pabbajito kiṃ jiyyati, kā tassa hānīti attho.

[03] ``sace mama paccaye na gaṇhatha, kathaṃ tumhe yāpethā''ti evaṃ mā cintayīti dassento ^b^``paccatī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho ^b^munino^eb^ pabbajitassa ^b^bhattaṃ^eb^ nāma ^b^kule kule^eb^ anugharaṃ divase divase ^a^V1.0393^ea^ ^b^thokaṃ thokaṃ^eb^ paccate, na ca tuyhaṃ eva gehe. ^b^piṇḍikāya carissāmi, atthi jaṅghabalaṃ mamā^eb^ti atthi me jaṅghabalaṃ, nāhaṃ obhaggajaṅgho na khañjo na ca pādarogī, tasmā ^a^P2.0101^ea^ piṇḍikāya missakabhikkhāya carissāmi, ``yathāpi bhamaro puppha''ntiādinā (dha0 pa0 49; netti0 123) satthārā vuttanayena piṇḍāya caritvā yāpessāmīti dasseti.

[03] ^b^saddhāya^eb^ ^a^M1.0463^ea^ ^b^abhinikkhammā^eb^ti āyasmato upālittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi. so yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, ^b^upālī^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so vayappatto anuruddhādīnaṃ channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajanatthāya nikkhamantehi chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji. tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva (cūḷava0 330).

[03] so pabbajitvā upasampanno satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ``mayhaṃ, bhante, araññavāsaṃ anujānāthā''ti āha. bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati, amhākaṃ pana santike vasantassa ganthadhurañca vipassanādhurañca paripūressatīti. thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.441-595) --
[22] lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato..
[22] carakā tāpasā ceva, caranti mahiyā tadā..
[22] bahujjano maṃ pūjeti, nāhaṃ pūjemi kiñcanaṃ..
[22] buddhoti vacanaṃ natthi, tāva nuppajjate jino..
[22] sabbaṃ tamaṃ vinodetvā, loke uppajji cakkhumā..
[21] ``pitu atthāya so buddho, dhammaṃ desesi cakkhumā.
[22] tena kālena parisā, samantā yojanaṃ tadā..
[22] aṭṭhame divase patte, sunandaṃ kittayī jino..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] hāsayanto janaṃ sabbaṃ, dassayanto sakaṃ balaṃ..
[21] ``tattha me ahu saṅkappo, sutvāna munino vacaṃ.
[22] ahampi kāraṃ kassāmi, yathā passāmi gotamaṃ..
[22] vinaye agganikkhitto, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthaye ahaṃ..
[22] tena bhogena buddhassa, ārāmaṃ māpaye ahaṃ..
[22] mā naṃ koci viheṭhesi, santacittāna tādinaṃ..
[22] sobhano nāma ārāmo, sampaṭiccha tuvaṃ muni..
[21] ``hatthī ^a^V1.0396^ea^ assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] upāli nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[21] ``bhave sātaṃ na vindāmi, ḍayhanto tīhi aggibhi.
[22] taṃ pivitvā sukhī assa, visamhā parimuttiyā..
[22] tassa so vihane bhūtaṃ, samūlañca vināsaye..
[22] so me tamaṃ vinodesi, bhūtavejjova bhūtakaṃ..
[22] devānaṃ sā piyā evaṃ, āsāvatī latuttamā..
[22] sāyaṃ pātaṃ namassāmi, devā āsāvatiṃ yathā..
[22] dūrāgatampi maṃ santaṃ, khaṇoyaṃ na virādhayi..
[22] meghesu gajjamānesu, gabbhaṃ gaṇhanti tā sadā..
[21] ``cirampi ^a^M1.0469^ea^ gabbhaṃ dhārenti, yāva megho na gajjati.
[22] caturo ca phale sabbe, dhammevaṃ vijanayiṃ ahaṃ..
[22] na me samasamo atthi, dhāremi sāsanaṃ ahaṃ..
[22] ettha me vimati natthi, akkhare byañjanepi vā..
[22] anaññātaṃ mayā natthi, ekaggo satthu sāsane..
[22] aṭṭālake ca vividhe, kāraye nagare bahū..
[22] mā me bhaṇḍaṃ vinassīti, bhaṇḍarakkhaṃ ṭhapeti so..
[21] ``mamatto hoti yo rañño, vuddhiṃ yassa ca icchati.
[22] saddhā te esikā vīra, dvārapālo ca saṃvaro..
[22] āneñjañca nirodho ca, esā dhammakuṭī tava..
[22] kolito nāma nāmena, porohicco tavaṃ mune..
[22] ānando nāma nāmena, dhammārakkho tavaṃ mune..
[22] tattha me cintanā natthi, taññevatthaṃ kathemahaṃ..
[22] vinaye mādiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo bhavissati..
[22] upālissa samo natthi, vinaye khandhakesu ca..
[22] so me attho anuppatto, vinaye pāramiṃ gato..
[22] vijahitvāna taṃ jātiṃ, putto jāto mahesino..
[21] ``tassa rañño ahaṃ putto, candano nāma khattiyo.
[22] āruyha sirikaṃ nāgaṃ, nagarā nikkhamiṃ tadā..
[22] devalo nāma sambuddho, āgacchi purato mama..
[22] tato sañjātakopo so, nāgo nuddharate padaṃ..
[21] ``sātaṃ tattha na vindāmi, siro pajjalito yathā.
[22] purā sabbe vinassāma, khamāpessāma taṃ muniṃ..
[22] pariḷāhaṃ vinodehi, mā no raṭṭhaṃ vināsaya..
[22] ayomayena kūṭena, siraṃ bhindeyyu me sadā..
[21] ``dake aggi na saṇṭhāti, bījaṃ sele na rūhati.
[22] agade kimi na saṇṭhāti, kopo buddhe na jāyati..
[21] ``yathā ca bhūmi acalā, appameyyo ca sāgaro.
[22] anantako ca ākāso, evaṃ buddhā akhobhiyā..
[22] khantānaṃ khamitānañca, gamanaṃ taṃ na vijjati..
[22] samatikkamma taṃ jātiṃ, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ..
[22] atthaṃ tuyhaṃ pavakkhāmi, yathā diṭṭhaṃ padaṃ mama..
[21] ``mā vo khaṇaṃ virādhetha, khaṇātītā hi socare.
[22] āsīviso diṭṭhaviso, evaṃ jhāpeti taṃ naraṃ..
[22] sadevakaṃ so tāreti, tasmā te avirādhiyā..
[22] pathavīsadisā buddhā, tasmā te na virādhiyā..
[22] rāhule dhanapāle ca, sabbesaṃ samako muni..
[22] kappemi vinaye vāsaṃ, vinayo mama gocaro..
[22] upāli taṃ mahāvīra, pāde vandati satthuno..
[21] ``so ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ.

[03] tattha hi naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi. so aparabhāge bhārukacchakavatthuṃ (pārā0 78) ajjukavatthuṃ (pārā0 158) kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchayi. satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. so aparabhāge ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesasamaye bhikkhū ovadanto --
[22] saṅghasmiṃ viharaṃ bhikkhu, sikkhetha vinayaṃ budho..
[22] kappākappesu kusalo, careyya apurakkhato''ti.. -- tisso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti saddhānimittaṃ, na jīvikatthanti attho. ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti vā kammaphalāni ratanattayaguṇañca saddahitvā. ^b^abhinikkhammā^eb^ti gharāvāsato nikkhamitvā. ^b^navapabbajito^eb^ti navo hutvā pabbajito, paṭhamavaye eva pabbajito. ^b^navo^eb^ti sāsane sikkhāya abhinavo daharo. ^b^mitte bhajeyya kalyāṇe suddhājīve atandite^eb^ti ``piyo garu bhāvanīyo''tiādinā (a0 ni0 7.37) vuttalakkhaṇe kalyāṇamitte, micchājīvavivajjanena suddhājīve ^a^M1.0476^ea^, āraddhavīriyatāya atandite ^a^V1.0404^ea^ bhajeyya upasaṅkameyya, tesaṃ ovādānusāsanīpaṭiggahaṇavasena seveyya. ^b^saṅghasmiṃ vihara^eb^nti saṅghe bhikkhusamūhe vattapaṭivattapūraṇavasena viharanto. ^b^sikkhetha vinayaṃ budho^eb^ti bodhañāṇatāsukusalo hutvā vinayapariyattiṃ sikkheyya. vinayo hi sāsanassa āyu, tasmiṃ ṭhite sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti. ``buddho''ti ca paṭhanti, so evattho. ^b^kappākappesū^eb^ti kappiyākappiyesu kusalo suttavasena suttānulomavasena ca nipuṇo cheko. ^b^apurakkhato^eb^ti na purakkhato taṇhādīhi kutoci purekkhāraṃ apaccāsīsanto hutvā vihareyya.

[03] ^b^paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santa^eb^nti āyasmato uttarapālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato gamanamagge setuṃ kārāpesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^uttarapālo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. tassa ekadivasaṃ ayonisomanasikāravasena ^a^P2.0103^ea^ anubhūtārammaṇaṃ anussarantassa kāmarāgo uppajji. so tāvadeva sahoḍḍhaṃ coraṃ gaṇhanto viya attano cittaṃ niggahetvā saṃvegajāto paṭipakkhamanasikārena kilese vikkhambhetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.16-20) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto --
[22] pañca kāmaguṇā loke, sammohā pātayiṃsu maṃ..
[21] ``sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā.

[03] tattha ^b^paṇḍitaṃ vata maṃ santa^eb^nti sutacintāmayāya paññāya vasena paññāsampannampi nāma maṃ samānaṃ. ^b^alamatthavicintaka^eb^nti attano ca paresañca atthaṃ hitaṃ vicintetuṃ samatthaṃ, alaṃ vā pariyattaṃ atthassa vicintakaṃ, kilesaviddhaṃsanasamatthaṃ atthadassinaṃ vā, sabbametaṃ attano antimabhavikatāya thero vadati. ^b^pañca kāmaguṇā^eb^ti rūpādayo pañca kāmakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^loke^eb^ti tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. ^b^sammohā^eb^ti sammohanimittaṃ ayonisomanasikārahetu. ^b^sammohā^eb^ti vā sammohanā sammohakarā. ^b^pātayiṃsū^eb^ti dhīrabhāvato pātesuṃ, lokato vā uttaritukāmaṃ maṃ loke pātayiṃsūti attho.

[03] ^b^pakkhando^eb^ti anupaviṭṭho. ^b^māravisaye^eb^ti kilesavisaye kilesamārassa pavattiṭṭhāne, tassa vasaṃ gatoti adhippāyo. devaputtamārassa vā issariyaṭṭhāne taṃ anupavisitvā ṭhito. ^b^daḷhasallasamappito^eb^ti daḷhaṃ thiraṃ, daḷhena vā sallena samappito, rāgasallena hadayaṃ āhacca viddho. ^b^asakkhiṃ maccurājassa, ahaṃ pāsā pamuccitu^eb^nti aggamaggasaṇḍāsena rāgādisallaṃ anavasesato uddharantoyeva rāgabandhanasaṅkhātā ^a^M1.0478^ea^ maccurājassa pāsā ahaṃ parimuccituṃ asakkhiṃ, tato attānaṃ pamocesiṃ.

[03] tato eva ca ^b^sabbe kāmā pahīnā me, bhavā sabbe padālitā^eb^ti vatthārammaṇādibhedena anekabhedabhinnā ^a^P2.0104^ea^ sabbe kilesakāmā ariyamaggena samucchedavasena mayā pahīnā. kilesakāmesu hi pahīnesu vatthukāmāpi pahīnā eva honti. tathā kāmabhavakammabhavādayo bhavā sabbe maggañāṇāsinā padālitā viddhaṃsitā. kammabhavesu hi padālitesu upapattibhavā padālitā eva honti. evaṃ kammabhavānaṃ padālitattā eva ^b^vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo^eb^ti. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^suṇātha^eb^ ^a^V1.0406^ea^ ^b^ñātayo sabbe^eb^ti āyasmato abhibhūtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vessabhussa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto tādisena kalyāṇamittasannissayena sāsane abhippasanno ahosi. so satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuṃ gahetuṃ mahājane ussāhaṃ karonte sayaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ gandhodakena citakaṃ nibbāpesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde veṭhapuranagare rājakule nibbattitvā ^b^abhibhūto^eb^ti laddhanāmo pitu accayena rajjaṃ kāreti. tasmiñca samaye bhagavā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi. tato so rājā ``bhagavā kira mama nagaraṃ anuppatto''ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dutiyadivase mahādānaṃ pavattesi. bhagavā bhuttāvī tassa rañño ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ karontoyeva vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi. so dhammaṃ sutvā laddhappasādo rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.11-15) --

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharante tasmiṃ tassa ñātakā amaccā pārisajjā nāgarā jānapadāti sabbe samāgantvā, ``bhante, kasmā tvaṃ amhe anāthe katvā pabbajito''ti parideviṃsu. thero te ñātipamukhe manusse paridevante disvā tesaṃ attano pabbajjakāraṇavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento --
[22] dhammaṃ vo desayissāmi, dukkhā jāti punappunaṃ..
[22] pahāya jātisaṃsāraṃ, dukkhassantaṃ karissatī''ti.. -- tisso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^suṇāthā^eb^ti nisāmetha, idāni mayā vuccamānaṃ ohitasotā sotadvārānusārena upadhārethāti attho. ^b^ñātayo^eb^ti ñātī pamukhe katvā tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ālapanaṃ, tenāha ^b^``sabbe yāvantettha samāgatā''^eb^ti, yāvanto yattakā ettha samāgame, etissaṃ vā mama pabbajjāya samāgatāti attho.

[01] idāni yaṃ sandhāya ``suṇāthā''ti savanāṇattikavacanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ ^b^``dhammaṃ vo desayissāmī''^eb^ti paṭijānitvā ^b^``dukkhā jāti punappuna''^eb^ntiādinā desetuṃ ārabhi. tattha ^b^dukkhā jāti punappuna^eb^nti jāti nāmesā gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedassa jarādibhedassa ca anekavihitassa dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhā. sā punappunaṃ pavattamānā ativiya dukkhā.

[01] tassā ^a^M1.0480^ea^ pana jātiyā samatikkamanatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyoti dassento āha ^b^``ārambhathā^eb^''tiādi. tattha ^b^ārambhathā^eb^ti ārambhadhātusaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ karotha. ^b^nikkamathā^eb^ti kosajjapakkhato nikkhantattā nikkamadhātusaṅkhātaṃ taduttariṃ vīriyaṃ karotha. ^b^yuñjatha buddhasāsane^eb^ti yasmā sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā satisampajaññanti imesu dhammesu patiṭṭhitānaṃ jāgariyānuyogavasena ārambhanikkamadhātuyo sampajjanti, tasmā tathābhūtā samathavipassanāsaṅkhāte adhisīlasikkhādisaṅkhāte vā bhagavato sāsane yuttappayuttā hotha. ^b^dhunātha maccuno senaṃ, naḷāgāraṃva kuñjaro^eb^ti evaṃ paṭipajjantā ca tedhātuissarassa maccurājassa vasaṃ satte netīti tassa senāsaṅkhātaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ yathā nāma thāmabalūpapanno kuñjaro naḷehi kataṃ agāraṃ khaṇeneva viddhaṃseti, evameva kilesagaṇaṃ dhunātha vidhamatha viddhaṃsethāti attho.
[03] evaṃ pana buddhasāsane ussāhaṃ karontassa ekaṃsiko jātidukkhassa samatikkamoti dassento ^b^``yo imasmi''^eb^ntiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] ^b^saṃsara^eb^nti ^a^V1.0408^ea^ ^a^P2.0106^ea^ āyasmato gotamattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto sikhimhi bhagavati parinibbute tassa citakaṃ devamanussesu pūjentesu aṭṭhahi campakapupphehi citakaṃ pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^gotamo^eb^ti gottavaseneva abhilakkhitanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.47.6-10) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā vimuttisukhena viharanto ekadivasaṃ ñātakehi ``kasmā, bhante, amhe pahāya pabbajito''ti puṭṭho saṃsāre attanā anubhūtadukkhañceva idāni adhigataṃ nibbānasukhañca pakāsento --
[22] dukkhamamhipi tiracchānayoniyaṃ, nekadhā hi vusitaṃ ciraṃ mayā..
[22] taṃ viditvā mahamahattasambhavaṃ, santimeva satimā samajjhaga''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^saṃsara^eb^nti anādimati saṃsāre saṃsaranto kammakilesehi pañcasu gatīsu cavanupapātavasena aparāparaṃ saṃsarantoti attho. ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^nirayaṃ agacchissa^eb^nti sañjīvādikaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahānirayaṃ, kukkuḷādikaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ ussadanirayañca paṭisandhivasena upagacchiṃ ^a^V1.0409^ea^. ^b^``punappuna''^eb^nti idaṃ idhāpi ānetabbaṃ ^a^P2.0107^ea^. ^b^petaloka^eb^nti pettivisayaṃ, khuppipāsādibhedaṃ petattabhāvanti ^a^M1.0482^ea^ attho. ^b^agama^eb^nti paṭisandhivasena upagacchiṃ upapajjiṃ. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti aparāparaṃ. ^b^dukkhamamhipī^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ tikhiṇakasāpatodābhighātādidukkhehi dussahāyapi. liṅgavipallāsena hetaṃ vuttaṃ ``dukkhamamhipī''ti. ^b^tiracchānayoniya^eb^nti migapakkhiādibhedāya tiracchānayoniyaṃ. ^b^nekadhā hī^eb^ti oṭṭhagoṇagadrabhādivasena ceva kākabalākakulalādivasena ca anekappakāraṃ anekavārañca ^b^ciraṃ^eb^ dīghamaddhānaṃ ^b^mayā vusitaṃ^eb^ niccaṃ utrastamānasatādivasena dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ. tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattasatto mahāmūḷhatāya cirataraṃ tattheva aparāparaṃ parivattatīti dassanatthaṃ idha ``cira''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^mānusopi ca bhavobhirādhito^eb^ti manussattabhāvopi mayā tādisena kusalakammunā samavāyena abhirādhito sādhito adhigato. kāṇakacchapopamasuttamettha (ma0 ni0 3.252; saṃ0 ni0 5.1117) udāharitabbaṃ. ^b^saggakāyamagamaṃ sakiṃ saki^eb^nti saggagatisaṅkhātaṃ kāmāvacaradevakāyaṃ sakiṃ sakiṃ kadāci kadāci upapajjanavasena agacchiṃ. ^b^rūpadhātusū^eb^ti puthujjanabhavaggapariyosānesu rūpabhavesu ^b^arūpadhātusū^eb^ti arūpabhavesu. ^b^nevasaññisu asaññisuṭṭhita^eb^nti rūpārūpadhātūsu ca na kevalaṃ saññīsu eva, atha kho nevasaññīnāsaññīsu asaññīsu ca upapajja ṭhitaṃ mayāti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. nevasaññiggahaṇena hettha nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo gahito. yadipime dve bhavā rūpārūpadhātuggahaṇeneva gayhanti, ye pana ito bāhirakā tattha niccasaññino bhavavimokkhasaññino ca, tesaṃ tassā saññāya micchābhāvadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi bhavamūlassa anupacchinnattā anādimati saṃsāre attano vaṭṭadukkhānubhavaṃ dassetvā idāni tadupacchedena vivaṭṭasukhānubhavaṃ dassento ^b^``sambhavā''^eb^tiādinā tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^sambhavā^eb^ti bhavā. kāmabhavādayo eva hi hetupaccayasamavāyena bhavantīti idha sambhavāti vuttā. ^b^suviditā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya suṭṭhu viditā. ^b^asārakā^eb^tiādi tesaṃ viditākāradassanaṃ. tattha ^b^asārakā^eb^ti niccasārādisārarahitā. ^b^saṅkhatā^eb^ti samecca sambhuyya paccayehi ^a^M1.0483^ea^ katā. ^b^pacalitā^eb^ti saṅkhatattā eva uppādajarādīhi pakārato calitā anavaṭṭhitā. ^b^saderitā^eb^ti sadā sabbakālaṃ bhaṅgena eritā, ittarā bhaṅgagāmino pabhaṅgunoti attho. ^b^taṃ viditvā^eb^ ^a^P2.0108^ea^ ^b^mahamattasambhava^eb^nti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṅkhatasabhāvaṃ attasambhavaṃ attani sambhūtaṃ attāyattaṃ issarādivasena aparāyattaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena ahaṃ viditvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ ^b^santimeva^eb^ nibbānameva maggapaññāsatiyā ^b^satimā^eb^ ^a^V1.0410^ea^ hutvā ^b^samajjhagaṃ^eb^ adhigacchiṃ ariyamaggabhāvanāya anuppattoti. evaṃ thero ñātakānaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^yo pubbe karaṇīyānī^eb^ti āyasmato hāritattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa citakapūjāya kayiramānāya gandhena pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^hārito^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto jātimānaṃ nissāya aññe vasalavādena samudācarati. so bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitopi ciraparicitattā vasalasamudācāraṃ na vissajji. athekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sañjātasaṃvego vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā attano cittappavattiṃ upaparikkhanto mānuddhaccaviggahitataṃ disvā taṃ pahāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.63-67) --
[03] arahā ^a^M1.0484^ea^ pana hutvā vimuttisukhaṃ anubhavanto ^b^``yo pubbe karaṇīyānī''^eb^tiādinā tīhi gāthāhi bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi. tāsaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^pāpamitte^eb^ti ^a^V1.0411^ea^ ^a^P2.0109^ea^ āyasmato vimalattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu satthu sarīraṃ gahetvā upāsakesu jhāpanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantesu satthu guṇe āvajjitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjamakāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^vimalo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto somamittattheraṃ nissāya sāsane pabbajitvā teneva ussāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.58-62) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano sahāyassa bhikkhussa ovādaṃ dento --
[22] ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyya, patthento acalaṃ sukhaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^pāpamitte^eb^ti akalyāṇamitte asappurise hīnavīriye. ^b^vivajjetvā^eb^ti taṃ abhajanavasena dūrato vajjetvā. ^b^bhajeyyuttamapuggala^eb^nti sappurisaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ ovādānusāsanīgahaṇavasena ^a^V1.0412^ea^ seveyya. ^b^ovāde cassa tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti assa kalyāṇamittassa ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanavasena tiṭṭheyya. ^b^patthento^eb^ti ākaṅkhanto. ^b^acalaṃ sukha^eb^nti nibbānasukhaṃ phalasukhañca. tampi hi akuppabhāvato ``acala''nti vuccati. sesaṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^alaṅkatā^eb^tiādikā ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ āyasmato nāgasamālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gimhasamaye sūriyātapasantattāya ^a^V2.0002^ea^ bhūmiyā gacchantaṃ satthāraṃ ^a^P2.0110^ea^ disvā pasannamānaso chattaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^nāgasamālo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kiñci kālaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhāko ahosi. so ekadivasaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ aññataraṃ naccakiṃ mahāpathe tūriyesu vajjantesu naccantiṃ disvā, ``ayaṃ cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena karajakāyassa tathā tathā parivatti, aho aniccā saṅkhārā''ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.37-48) --
[22] tattha disvāna sambuddhaṃ, vitti me upapajjatha..
[21] ``ayaṃ me pacchimā jāti, carimo vattate bhavo.
[22] majjhe mahāpathe nārī, tūriye naccati naṭṭakī..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --
[25] catūhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^alaṅkatā^eb^ti hatthūpagādiābharaṇehi alaṅkatagattā. ^b^suvasanā^eb^ti sundaravasanā sobhanavatthanivatthā. ^b^mālinī^eb^ti mālādhārinī piḷandhitapupphamālā. ^b^candanussadā^eb^ti candanānulepalittasarīrā. ^b^majjhe mahāpathe nārī, tūriye naccati naṭṭakī^eb^ti yathāvuttaṭṭhāne ekā nārī naṭṭakī nāṭakitthī nagaravīthiyā majjhe pañcaṅgike tūriye vajjante naccati, yathāpaṭṭhapitaṃ naccaṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^piṇḍikāyā^eb^ti bhikkhāya. ^b^paviṭṭhoha^eb^nti nagaraṃ paviṭṭho ahaṃ. ^b^gacchanto naṃ udikkhisa^eb^nti nagaravīthiyaṃ gacchanto parissayapariharaṇatthaṃ vīthiṃ olokento taṃ naṭṭakiṃ olokesiṃ. kiṃ viya? ^b^maccupāsaṃva oḍḍita^eb^nti yathā maccussa maccurājassa pāsabhūto rūpādiko oḍḍito loke anuvicaritvā ṭhito ekaṃsena sattānaṃ anatthāvaho, evaṃ ^a^P2.0111^ea^ sāpi appaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ ekaṃsato anatthāvahāti maccupāsasadisī vuttā.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā maccupāsasadisattā. ^b^me^eb^ti mayhaṃ. ^b^manasīkāro yoniso udapajjathā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāto nhārusambandho maṃsena anupalitto chaviyā paṭicchanno asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlo aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammo īdise vikāre dassetī''ti evaṃ yoniso manasikāro uppajji. ^b^ādīnavo pāturahū^eb^ti evaṃ kāyassa sabhāvūpadhāraṇamukhena tassa ca taṃnissitānañca cittacetasikānaṃ udayabbayaṃ sarasapabhaṅgutañca manasi karoto tesu ca yakkharakkhasādīsu viya bhayato upaṭṭhahantesu tattha me anekākārāadīnavo doso pāturahosi. tappaṭipakkhato ca nibbāne ānisaṃso. ^b^nibbidā samatiṭṭhathā^eb^ti nibbindanaṃ ādīnavānupassanānubhāvasiddhaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ mama hadaye saṇṭhāsi, muhuttampi ^a^V2.0004^ea^ tesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ gahaṇe cittaṃ nāhosi, aññadatthu muñcitukāmatādivasena tattha udāsīnameva jātanti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0004^ea^ vipassanāñāṇato paraṃ. ^b^cittaṃ vimucci me^eb^ti lokuttarabhāvanāya vattamānāya maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbakilesehi mama cittaṃ vimuttaṃ ahosi. etena phaluppattiṃ dasseti. maggakkhaṇe hi kilesā vimuccanti nāma, phalakkhaṇe vimuttāti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ahaṃ middhenā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato bhaguttherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute tassa dhātuyo pupphehi pūjesi. so tena puññakammena nimmānaratīsu nibbattitvā aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sakyarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^bhagū^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto anuruddhakimilehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā bālakaloṇakagāme vasanto ekadivasaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavaṃ vinodetuṃ vihārato nikkhamma caṅkamaṃ abhiruhanto papatitvā ^a^P2.0112^ea^ tadeva aṅkusaṃ katvā thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.49-57) --
[22] saṃsarāmi manusse ce, rājā homi mahāyaso..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento satthārā ekavihāraṃ anumodituṃ upagatena -- ``kacci tvaṃ, bhikkhu, appamatto viharasī''ti puṭṭho attano appamādavihāraṃ nivedento --
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^middhena pakato^eb^ti kāyālasiyasaṅkhātena asattivighātasabhāvena middhena abhibhūto. ^b^vihārā^eb^ti senāsanato. ^b^upanikkhami^eb^nti caṅkamituṃ nikkhamiṃ. ^b^tattheva papatiṃ chamā^eb^ti tattheva caṅkamasopāne niddābhibhūtatāya bhūmiyaṃ nipatiṃ. ^b^gattāni parimajjitvā^eb^ti bhūmiyaṃ patanena paṃsukitāni attano sarīrāvayavāni anumajjitvā. ^b^punapāruyha caṅkama^eb^nti ``patito dānāha''nti saṅkocaṃ anāpajjitvā punapi caṅkamaṭṭhānaṃ āruhitvā. ^b^ajjhattaṃ susamāhito^eb^ti gocarajjhatte kammaṭṭhāne nīvaraṇavikkhambhanena suṭṭhu samāhito ekaggacitto hutvā caṅkaminti yojanā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^pare^eb^ ^a^M2.0006^ea^ ^a^V2.0006^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sabhiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ divāvihārāya gacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upāhanaṃ ^a^P2.0113^ea^ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassape bhagavati parinibbute patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye chahi kulaputtehi saddhiṃ attasattamo sāsane pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto itare āha -- ``mayaṃ piṇḍapātāya gacchanto jīvite sāpekkhā homa, jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammaṃ adhigantuṃ, puthujjanakālaṅkiriyā ca dukkhā. handa, mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā''ti. te tathā akaṃsu.

[03] atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiñño hutvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ upanesi. itare -- ``tumhe, bhante, katakiccā tumhehi saddhiṃ sallāpamattampi papañco, samaṇadhammameva mayaṃ karissāma, tumhe attanā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuñjathā''ti vatvā piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipiṃsu. thero ne sampaṭicchāpetuṃ asakkonto agamāsi.

[03] tato nesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena abhiññāparivāraṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā tatheva vatvā tehi paṭikkhitto agamāsi. tesu khīṇāsavatthero parinibbāyi, anāgāmī suddhāvāsesu uppajji. itare puthujjanakālaṅkiriyameva katvā chasu kāmasaggesu anulomapaṭilomato dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokā cavitvā eko mallarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, eko gandhārarājakule, eko bāhiraraṭṭhe, eko rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. itaro aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. sā kira aññatarassa khattiyassa dhītā, naṃ mātāpitaro -- ``amhākaṃ dhītā samayantaraṃ jānātū''ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyādayiṃsu. atheko paribbājako tāya saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji. sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. taṃ gabbhiniṃ disvā paribbājakā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu. sā aññattha ^a^M2.0007^ea^ gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṃ vijāyi. tenassa ^b^sabhiyo^eb^tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. so vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā ^a^V2.0007^ea^ mahāvādī hutvā vādappasuto vicaranto attanā sadisaṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kāretvā khattiyakumārādayo sippaṃ sikkhāpento viharanto attano mātuyā itthibhāvaṃ jigucchitvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannāya abhisaṅkharitvā dinne vīsatipañhe gahetvā te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchi. te cassa tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ byākātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. ^b^sabhiyasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2. sabhiyasuttavaṇṇanā) pana ^a^P2.0114^ea^ ``suddhāvāsabrahmā te pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā adāsī''ti āgataṃ.

[03] yadā pana bhagavā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane vihāsi, tadā sabhiyo tattha gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā te pañhe pucchi. satthā tassa te pañhe byākāsīti sabbaṃ ^b^sabhiyasutte^eb^ (su0 ni0 sabhiyasuttaṃ) āgatanayena veditabbaṃ. sabhiyo pana bhagavatā tesu pañhesu byākatesu paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.27-31) --
[03] arahā pana hutvā devadatte saṅghabhedāya parakkamante devadattapakkhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento --
[22] ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā..
[22] vijānanti ca ye dhammaṃ, āturesu anāturā..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^M2.0008^ea^ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ.
[22] saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ..
[22] ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0008^ea^ ^b^pare^eb^ti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe -- ``adhammaṃ dhammo''ti ``dhammaṃ adhammo''tiādibhedakaravatthudīpanavasena vivādappasutā pare nāma. te tattha vivādaṃ karontā ``mayaṃ yamāmase uparamāma nassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā''ti na jānanti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijānantī^eb^ti ye tattha paṇḍitā -- ``mayaṃ maccusamīpaṃ gacchāmā''ti vijānanti. ^b^tato sammanti medhagā^eb^ti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti. atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammanti. atha vā ^b^pare cā^eb^ti ye satthu ovādānusāsaniyā aggahaṇena sāsanato bāhiratāya pare, te yāva ``mayaṃ micchāgāhaṃ gahetvā ettha idha loke ^a^P2.0115^ea^ sāsanassa paṭiniggāhena yamāmase vāyamāmā''ti na vijānanti, tāva vivādā na vūpasammanti, yadā pana tassa gāhassa vissajjanavasena ye ca tattha tesu vivādappasutesu adhammadhammādike adhammadhammādito yathābhūtaṃ vijānanti, tato tesaṃ santikā te paṇḍitapurise nissāya vivādasaṅkhātā medhagā sammantīti evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^avijānantā^eb^ti vivādassa vūpasamūpāyaṃ, dhammādhamme vā yāthāvato ajānantā. ^b^iriyantyamarā viyā^eb^ti amarā viya jarāmaraṇaṃ atikkantā viya uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vippakiṇṇavācā hutvā vattanti caranti vicaranti tadā vivādo na vūpasammateva. ^b^vijānanti ca ye dhammaṃ, āturesu anāturā^eb^ti ye pana satthu sāsanadhammaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānanti, te kilesarogena āturesu sattesu anāturā nikkilesā anīghā viharanti, tesaṃ vasena vivādo accantameva vūpasammatīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0009^ea^ ^b^kiñci sithilaṃ kamma^eb^nti oliyitvā karaṇena sithilagāhaṃ katvā sāthalibhāvena kataṃ yaṃ kiñci kusalakammaṃ. ^b^saṃkiliṭṭha^eb^nti vesīādike agocare caraṇena, kuhanādimicchājīvena vā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vatasamādānaṃ. ^b^saṅkassara^eb^nti saṅkāhi saritabbaṃ, vihāre kiñci asāruppaṃ sutvā -- ``nūna asukena kata''nti parehi asaṅkitabbaṃ, uposathakiccādīsu aññatarakiccavasena sannipatitampi saṅghaṃ disvā, ``addhā ime mama cariyaṃ ñatvā maṃ ukkhipitukāmā sannipatitā''ti evaṃ attano vā āsaṅkāhi saritaṃ usaṅkitaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ. ^b^na taṃ hotī^eb^ti taṃ evarūpaṃ brahmacariyaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇaṃ tassa puggalassa mahapphalaṃ na hoti. tassa amahapphalabhāveneva paccayadāyakānampissa na mahapphalaṃ hoti. tasmā sallekhavuttinā bhavitabbaṃ. sallekhavuttino ca vivādassa avasaro eva natthīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^gāravo^eb^ ^a^V2.0009^ea^ ^b^nūpalabbhatī^eb^ti anusāsaniyā apadakkhiṇaggāhibhāvena garukātabbesu sabrahmacārīsu yassa puggalassa gāravo garukaraṇaṃ na vijjati. ^b^ārakā hoti saddhammā^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo paṭipattisaddhammatopi paṭivedhasaddhammatopi dūre hoti, na hi taṃ garū sikkhāpenti, asikkhiyamāno anādiyanto na paṭipajjati, appaṭipajjanto kuto saccāni paṭivijjhissatīti. tenāha -- ``ārakā hoti saddhammā''ti. yathā kiṃ? ^b^``nabhaṃ puthaviyā yathā''^eb^ti yathā nabhaṃ ākāsaṃ puthaviyā pathavīdhātuyā sabhāvato dūre. na kadāci sammissabhāvo. tenevāha --
[21] ``nabhañca ^a^P2.0116^ea^ dūre pathavī ca dūre, pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre.
[22] tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo asatañca rājā''ti..(jā0 2.21.414).

[03] ^b^dhiratthū^eb^tiādikā ^a^M2.0010^ea^ āyasmato nandakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satasahassagghanikena vatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjetvā paṇidhānamakāsi, satthu bodhirukkhe padīpapūjañca pavatteti. so tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu saṃsaranto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle karavikasakuṇo hutvā madhurakūjitaṃ kūjanto satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. aparabhāge mayūro hutvā aññatarassa paccekabuddhassa vasanaguhāya dvāre pasannamānaso divase divase tikkhattuṃ madhuravassitaṃ vassi, evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā ^b^nandako^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.22-26) --

[03] arahā pana hutvā vimuttisukhena vītināmento satthārā bhikkhunīnaṃ ovāde āṇatto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pañca bhikkhunisatāni ekovādeneva arahattaṃ pāpesi. tena naṃ bhagavā bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. athekadivasaṃ theraṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ aññatarā purāṇadutiyikā itthī kilesavasena oloketvā hasi. thero tassā taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā sarīrassa paṭikkūlavibhāvanamukhena dhammaṃ kathento --
[22] navasotāni te kāye, yāni sandanti sabbadā..
[22] saggepi te na rajjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuse..
[21] ``ye ca kho bālā dummedhā, dummantī mohapārutā.
[21] ``yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā.
[22] tādī tattha na rajjanti, chinnasuttā abandhanā''ti.. -- gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^dhī^eb^ti jigucchanatthe nipāto, ^b^ratthū^eb^ti ra-kāro padasandhikaro, dhī atthu taṃ jigucchāmi tava dhikkāro hotūti attho. ^b^pūre^eb^tiādīni tassā dhikkātabbabhāvadīpanāni āmantanavacanāni. ^b^pūre^eb^ti ativiya jegucchehi nānākuṇapehi nānāvidhāsucīhi sampuṇṇe. ^b^duggandhe^eb^ti kuṇapapūritattā eva sabhāvaduggandhe. ^b^mārapakkhe^eb^ti yasmā visabhāgavatthu andhaputhujjanānaṃ ayonisomanasikāranimittatāya kilesamāraṃ vaḍḍheti, devaputtamārassa ca otāraṃ paviṭṭhaṃ deti. tasmā mārassa pakkho hoti. tena vuttaṃ ``mārapakkhe''ti. ^b^avassute^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ kilesāvassavanena tahiṃ tahiṃ asucinissandanena ca avassute. idānissā ^b^navasotāni te kāye, yāni sandanti sabbadā^eb^ti ``akkhimhā akkhigūthako''tiādinā (su0 ni0 199) vuttaṃ asucino avassavanaṭṭhānaṃ dasseti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0011^ea^ pana navachiddaṃ dhuvassavaṃ asucibharitaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānantī ^b^mā purāṇaṃ amaññittho^eb^ti purāṇaṃ ajānanakāle pavattaṃ hasitalapitaṃ kīḷitaṃ mā maññi, ``idānipi evaṃ paṭipajjissatī''ti mā cintehi. ^b^māsādesi tathāgate^eb^ti yathā upanissayasampattiyā purimakā buddhasāvakā āgatā, yathā vā te sammāpaṭipattiyā gatā paṭipannā, yathā ca rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ tathadhamme ca ariyasaccāni āgatā adhigatā avabuddhā, tathā imepīti evaṃ tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgate ariyasāvake pakatisatte viya avaññāya kilesavasena ca ^a^M2.0012^ea^ upasaṅkamamānā māsādesi. anāsādetabbatāya kāraṇamāha. ^b^saggepi te na rajjanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mānuse^eb^ti sabbaññubuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyasukhe saggepi te sāvakabuddhā na rajjanti, saṅkhāresu ādīnavassa suparidiṭṭhattā rāgaṃ na janenti, kimaṅgaṃ pana mīḷharāsisadise mānuse kāmaguṇe, tattha na rajjantīti vattabbameva natthi.

[03] ^b^ye ca kho^eb^ti ye pana bālyappayogato ^b^bālā,^eb^ dhammojapaññāya abhāvato ^b^dummedhā,^eb^ asubhe subhānupassanena ducintitacintitāya ^b^dummantī,^eb^ mohena aññāṇena sabbaso paṭicchāditacittatāya ^b^mohapārutā^eb^ ^a^P2.0118^ea^ ^b^tādisā^eb^ tathārūpā andhaputhujjanā, ^b^tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ itthisaññite, ^b^mārakhittamhi bandhane^eb^ mārena oḍḍite mārapāse, ^b^rajjanti^eb^ rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā tiṭṭhanti.

[03] ^b^virājitā^eb^ti ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ telañjanarāgo viya dummocanīyasabhāvo ^b^rāgo^eb^ sapatto viya laddhokāso dussanasabhāvo ^b^doso^eb^ aññāṇasabhāvā ^b^avijjā ca^eb^ ariyamaggavirāgena sabbaso ^b^virājitā^eb^ pahīnā samucchinnā, tādisā aggamaggasatthena ^b^chinna^eb^bhavanetti^b^suttā^eb^ tato eva katthacipi bandhanābhāvato ^b^abandhanā tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ yathāvutte mārapāse ^b^na rajjanti^eb^. evaṃ thero tassā itthiyā dhammaṃ kathetvā gato.

[03] ^b^pañcapaññāsā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato jambukattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto tissassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe ^a^V2.0012^ea^ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu sammāsambodhiṃ saddahanto bodhirukkhaṃ vanditvā bījanena pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto sāsane pabbajitvā aññatarena upāsakena kārite ārāme āvāsiko hutvā viharati tena ^a^M2.0013^ea^ upaṭṭhīyamāno. athekadivasaṃ eko khīṇāsavatthero lūkhacīvaradharo kesoharaṇatthaṃ araññato gāmābhimukho āgacchati, taṃ disvā so upāsako iriyāpathe pasīditvā kappakena kesamassūni ohārāpetvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojetvā sundarāni cīvarāni datvā ``idheva, bhante, vasathā''ti vasāpeti. taṃ disvā āvāsiko issāmaccherapakato khīṇāsavattheraṃ āha -- ``varaṃ te, bhikkhu, iminā pāpupāsakena upaṭṭhīyamānassa evaṃ idha vasanato aṅgulīhi kese luñcitvā acelassa sato gūthamuttāhārajīvana''nti. evañca pana vatvā tāvadeva vaccakuṭiṃ pavisitvā pāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhento viya hatthena gūthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā yāvadatthaṃ khādi, muttañca pivi. iminā niyāmena yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kālaṅkatvā niraye paccitvā puna gūthamuttāhāro vasitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena manussesu uppannopi pañca jātisatāni nigaṇṭho hutvā gūthabhakkho ahosi.

[03] puna ^a^P2.0119^ea^ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde manussayoniyaṃ nibbattamānopi ariyūpavādabalena duggatakūle nibbattitvā thaññaṃ vā khīraṃ vā sappiṃ vā pāyamāno, taṃ chaḍḍetvā muttameva pivati, odanaṃ bhojiyamāno, taṃ chaḍḍetvā gūthameva khādati, evaṃ gūthamuttaparibhogena vaḍḍhanto vayappattopi tadeva paribhuñjati. manussā tato vāretuṃ asakkontā pariccajiṃsu. so ñātakehi pariccatto naggapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā na nhāyati, rajojalladharo kesamassūni luñcitvā aññe iriyāpathe paṭikkhipitvā ekapādena tiṭṭhati, nimantanaṃ na sādiyati, māsopavāsaṃ adhiṭṭhāya puññatthikehi dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ kusaggena gahetvā divā jivhaggena lehati, rattiyaṃ pana ``allagūthaṃ sappāṇaka''nti akhāditvā sukkhagūthameva khādati, evaṃ karontassa pañcapaññāsavassāni vītivattāni mahājano ``mahātapo paramappiccho''ti maññamāno tanninno tappoṇo ahosi.

[03] atha bhagavā tassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya arahattūpanissayaṃ pajjalantaṃ disvā sayameva tattha gantvā dhammaṃ desetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā, ehibhikkhūpasampadāya laddhūpasampadaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthāro pana ^b^dhammapade^eb^ ^a^M2.0014^ea^ ``māse māse kusaggenā''ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.jambukattheravatthu) vuttanayena ^a^V2.0013^ea^ veditabbo. arahatte pana patiṭṭhito parinibbānakāle ``ādito micchā paṭipajjitvāpi sammāsambuddhaṃ nissāya sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ mayā adhigata''nti dassento --
[22] sukkhagūthāni ca khādiṃ, uddesañca na sādiyiṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^pañcapaññāsavassāni, rajojallamadhārayi^eb^nti naggapabbajjūpagamanena nhānapaṭikkhepato pañcādhikāni paññāsavassāni sarīre laggaṃ āgantukareṇusaṅkhātaṃ rajo, sarīramalasaṅkhātaṃ jallañca kāyena dhāresiṃ. ^b^bhuñjanto māsikaṃ bhatta^eb^nti rattiyaṃ gūthaṃ khādanto lokavañcanatthaṃ māsopavāsiko nāma hutvā puññatthikehi dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ māse māse ekavāraṃ jivhagge paṭhanavasena bhuñjanto ^b^alocayi^eb^nti tādisacchārikāpakkhepena sithilamūlaṃ kesamassuṃ aṅgulīhi luñcāpesiṃ.

[03] ^b^ekapādena^eb^ ^a^P2.0120^ea^ ^b^aṭṭhāsiṃ, āsanaṃ parivajjayi^eb^nti sabbena sabbaṃ āsanaṃ nisajjaṃ parivajjesiṃ, tiṭṭhanto ca ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā ekeneva pādena aṭṭhāsiṃ. ^b^uddesa^eb^nti nimantanaṃ. udissakatanti keci. ^b^na sādiyi^eb^nti na sampaṭicchiṃ paṭikkhipinti attho.

[03] ^b^etādisaṃ karitvāna, bahuṃ duggatigāmina^eb^nti etādisaṃ evarūpaṃ vipākanibbattanakaṃ duggatigāminaṃ bahuṃ pāpakammaṃ purimajātīsu idha ca katvā uppādetvā. ^b^vuyhamāno^eb^ ^a^M2.0015^ea^ ^b^mahoghenā^eb^ti kāmoghādinā mahatā oghena visesato diṭṭhoghena apāyasamuddaṃ patiākaḍḍhiyamāno, ^b^buddhaṃ saraṇamāgama^eb^nti tādisena puññakammacchiddena kicchena manussattabhāvaṃ labhitvā idāni puññabalena buddhaṃ ``saraṇa''nti āgamāsiṃ, ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā''ti aveccapasādena satthari pasīdiṃ. ^b^saraṇagamanaṃ passa, passa dhammasudhammata^eb^nti āyatanagataṃ mama saraṇagamanaṃ passa, passa sāsanadhammassa ^a^V2.0014^ea^ ca sudhammataṃ yohaṃ tathāmicchāpaṭipannopi ekovādeneva satthārā edisaṃ sampattiṃ sampāpito. ^b^``tisso vijjā''^eb^tiādinā taṃ sampattiṃ dasseti tenāha (apa0 thera 2.46.17-21) --

[03] ^b^svāgataṃ vatā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato senakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso morahatthena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā uruvelakassapattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^senako^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato gharāvāsaṃ vasati. tena ca samayena mahājano saṃvacchare saṃvacchare phaggunamāse uttaraphaggunanakkhatte ussavaṃ anubhavanto gayāyaṃ titthābhisekaṃ karoti. tena taṃ ussavaṃ ^a^M2.0016^ea^ ^b^``gayāphaggū''^eb^ti vadanti. atha bhagavā tādise ussavadivase veneyyānukampāya gayātitthasamīpe viharati, mahājanopi titthābhisekādhippāyena tato ^a^P2.0121^ea^ tato taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagacchati. tasmiṃ khaṇe senakopi titthābhisekatthaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagato satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.46.9-16) --
[22] nibbāyiṃsu tayo aggī, labhāmi vipulaṃ sukhaṃ..
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthusampadā.
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sañjātasomanasso udānavasena --

[01] tattha ^b^svāgataṃ vata me āsī^eb^ti mayā suṭṭhu āgataṃ vata āsi. mama vā sundaraṃ vata āgamanaṃ āsi. ^b^gayāya^eb^nti gayātitthasamīpe. ^b^gayaphagguyā^eb^ti ``gayāphaggū''ti laddhavohāre phaggunamāsassa uttaraphaggunīnakkhatte. ^b^``ya''^eb^ntiādi svāgatabhāvassa kāraṇadassanaṃ. tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmā. ^b^addasāsi^eb^nti addakkhiṃ. ^b^sambuddha^eb^nti sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sambuddhaṃ. ^b^desentaṃ dhammamuttama^eb^nti uttamaṃ aggaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ ekantaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ bhāsantaṃ.

[03] ^b^mahappabha^eb^nti mahatiyā sarīrappabhāya ñāṇappabhāya ca samannāgataṃ. ^b^gaṇācariya^eb^nti bhikkhuparisādīnaṃ gaṇānaṃ uttamena damathena ācārasikkhāpanena gaṇācariyaṃ. aggabhūtānaṃ sīlādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0016^ea^ guṇānaṃ adhigamena ^b^aggappattaṃ^eb^. devamanussādīnaṃ paramena vinayena vinayanato, sayaṃ nāyakarahitattā ca ^b^vināyakaṃ^eb^. kenaci anabhibhūto hutvā sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhitattā, pañcannampi mārānaṃ jitattā ca ^b^sadevakassa lokassa jinaṃ^eb^ sadevake loke aggajinaṃ, bāttiṃsavaramahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanādipaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya dasabalacatuvesārajjādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍitadhammakāyatāya ca ^a^P2.0122^ea^ sadevakena lokena aparimeyyadassanatāya asadisadassanatāya ca ^b^atuladassanaṃ^eb^.

[03] gatibalaparakkamādisampattiyā mahānāgasadisattā, nāgesupi khīṇāsavesu mahānubhāvatāya ca ^b^mahānāgaṃ^eb^. mārasenāvimathanato mahāvikkantatāya ca ^b^mahāvīraṃ. mahājuti^eb^nti mahāpatāpaṃ mahātejanti attho. natthi etassa cattāropi āsavāti ^b^anāsavaṃ^eb^. sabbe āsavā savāsanā parikkhīṇā etassāti ^b^sabbāsavaparikkhīṇaṃ^eb^. kāmaṃ sāvakabuddhā paccekabuddhā ca khīṇāsavāva, sabbaññubuddhā eva pana savāsane āsave khepentīti dassanatthaṃ ``anāsava''nti vatvā puna ``sabbāsavaparikkhīṇa''nti vuttaṃ. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sabbe āsavā savāsanā parikkhīṇā etassāti sabbāsavaparikkhīṇa''nti. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ veneyyānaṃ anusāsanato ^b^satthāraṃ,^eb^ catuvesārajjavisāradatāya kutocipi ^a^M2.0018^ea^ bhayābhāvato ^b^akutobhayaṃ,^eb^ evarūpaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ yaṃ yasmā addasāsiṃ, tasmā svāgataṃ vata me āsīti yojanā.

[03] idāni satthu dassanena attanā laddhaguṇaṃ dassento catutthaṃ gāthamāha. tassattho -- kañjiyapuṇṇalābu viya takkabharitacāṭi viya vasāpītapilotikā viya ca saṃkilesavatthūhi anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ ^b^saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ^eb^. gaddulabandhitaṃ viya thambhe sārameyaṃ sakkāyathambhe ^b^diṭṭhisandānena,^eb^ diṭṭhibandhanena ^b^bandhitaṃ^eb^ baddhaṃ, tato vimocento ca abhijjhādīhi ^b^sabbaganthe hi maṃ senakaṃ^eb^ ariyamaggahatthena, ^b^vimocayi vata so bhagavā^eb^ mayhaṃ satthāti bhagavati abhippasādaṃ pavedeti.

[03] ^b^yo dandhakāle^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sambhūtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni karonto buddhasuññe loke candabhāgāya nadiyā ^a^V2.0017^ea^ tīre kinnarayoniyaṃ nibbatto. ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā katañjalī ajjunapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kulagehe nibbattitvā ^b^sambhūto^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhagavato parinibbānassa pacchā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ^a^P2.0123^ea^ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.28-36) --
[22] sukhette vappitaṃ bījaṃ, sayambhumhi aho mama..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto vassasataparinibbute bhagavati vesālikesu vajjiputtakesu dasa vatthūni paggayha ṭhitesu kākaṇḍakaputtena yasattherena ussāhitehi sattasatehi khīṇāsavehi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā saddhammaṃ paggaṇhantehi dhammavinayasaṅgahe kate tesaṃ vajjiputtakānaṃ uddhammaubbinayadīpane dhammasaṃvegena thero --
[22] yaso kittiñca pappoti, mittehi na virujjhatī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^yo dandhakāle taratī^eb^ti kismiñci kattabbavatthusmiṃ -- ``kappati nu kho, na nu kho kappatī''ti vinayakukkucce uppanne yāva viyattaṃ vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā taṃ kukkuccaṃ na vinodeti, tāva dandhakāle tassa kiccassa dandhāyitabbasamaye tarati madditvā vītikkamaṃ karoti. ^b^taraṇīye ca dandhaye^eb^ti gahaṭṭhassa tāva saraṇagamanasīlasamādānādike, pabbajitassa vattapaṭivattakaraṇādike ^a^M2.0020^ea^ samathavipassanānuyoge ca taritabbe sampatte sīghaṃ taṃ kiccaṃ ananuyuñjitvā -- ``āgamanamāse pakkhe vā karissāmī''ti dandhāyeyya, taṃ kiccaṃ akarontova kālaṃ vītināmeyya. ^b^ayonisaṃvidhānenā^eb^ti evaṃ dandhāyitabbe taranto taritabbe ca dandhāyanto anupāyasaṃvidhānena upāyasaṃvidhānābhāvena ^b^bālo,^eb^ mandabuddhiko puggalo, sampati āyatiñca ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^ anatthaṃ pāpuṇāti.

[03] ^b^tassatthā parihāyantī^eb^ti tassa tathārūpassa puggalassa diṭṭhadhammikādibhedā atthā ^b^kāḷapakkhe candimā^eb^ viya, ^b^parihāyanti^eb^ divase ^a^P2.0124^ea^ divase parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchanti. ``asuko puggalo assaddho appasanno kusīto hīnavīriyo''tiādinā. ^b^āyasakyaṃ^eb^ viññūhi garahitabbataṃ ^b^pappoti^eb^ pāpuṇāti. ^b^mittehi ca virujjhatī^eb^ti ``evaṃ paṭipajja, mā evaṃ paṭipajjā''ti ovādadāyakehi kalyāṇamittehi ``avacanīyā maya''nti ovādassa anādāneneva viruddho nāma hoti.

[03] sesagāthādvayassa vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. keci panettha -- ``tarati dandhaye''tipadānaṃ atthabhāvena bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahe uddharanti. taṃ pacchimagāthāsu yujjati. purimā hi dve gāthā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya caritabbaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kukkuccapakatatāya dasa vatthūni dīpetvā saṅghena nikkaḍḍhite vajjiputtake sandhāya therena vuttā. pacchimā pana attasadise sammā paṭipanne sakatthaṃ nipphādetvā ṭhiteti.

[03] ^b^ubhayenā^eb^tiādikā ^a^V2.0019^ea^ āyasmato rāhulattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā ^a^M2.0021^ea^ sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā senāsanavisodhanavijjotanādikaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ katvā paṇidhānamakāsi. so tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde amhākaṃ bodhisattaṃ paṭicca yasodharāya deviyā kucchimhi nibbattitvā ^b^rāhulo^eb^ti laddhanāmo mahatā khattiyaparivārena vaḍḍhi, tassa pabbajjāvidhānaṃ khandhake (mahāva0 105) āgatameva. so pabbajitvā satthu santike anekehi suttapadehi suladdhovādo paripakkañāṇo vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.68-85) --
[22] bhikkhusaṅghe ṭhito satthā, imā gāthā abhāsatha..
[22] nibbattissanti pāsādā, ye keci manaso piyā..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] rāhulo nāma nāmena, arahā so bhavissati..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] yañcamhi putto buddhassa, yañca dhammesu cakkhumā..
[21] ``yañca me āsavā khīṇā, yañca natthi punabbhavo.

[03] tattha ^b^ubhayeneva sampanno^eb^ti jātisampadā, paṭipattisampadāti ubhayasampattiyāpi sampanno samannāgato. ^b^rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidū^eb^ti ``rāhulabhaddo''ti maṃ sabrahmacārino sañjānanti. tassa hi ^a^V2.0021^ea^ jātasāsanaṃ sutvā bodhisattena ``rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta''nti vuttavacanaṃ upādāya suddhodanamahārājā ``rāhulo''ti nāmaṃ gaṇhi. tattha ādito pitarā vuttapariyāyameva gahetvā āha -- ``rāhulabhaddoti maṃ vidū''ti. ^b^bhaddo^eb^ti ca pasaṃsāvacanametaṃ.

[03] idāni taṃ ubhayasampattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yañcamhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmā. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho. ^b^amhi putto buddhassā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa orasaputto amhi. ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti lokiyesu lokuttaresu ca dhammesu, catusaccadhammesūti attho. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti maggapaññācakkhunā cakkhumā ca amhīti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] puna aparāparehipi pariyāyehi attani ubhayasampattiṃ dassetuṃ -- ^b^``yañca me āsavā khīṇā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo^eb^ti dakkhiṇāraho. ^b^amataddaso^eb^ti nibbānassa dassāvī. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] idāni yāya vijjāsampattiyā ca vimuttisampattiyā ca abhāvena sattakāyo kumine bandhamacchā viya saṃsāre parivattati, taṃ ubhayasampattiṃ attani dassetuṃ ^b^``kāmandhā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha kāmehi kāmesu vā andhāti ^b^kāmandhā^eb^. ``chando rāgo''tiādivibhāgehi (cūḷani0 ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 8) kilesakāmehi rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu anādīnavadassitāya andhīkatā. ^b^jālapacchannā^eb^ti sakalaṃ bhavattayaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena visattikājālena pakārato channā paliguṇṭhitā. ^b^taṇhāchadanachāditā^eb^ti tato eva taṇhāsaṅkhātena chadanena chāditā nivutā sabbaso paṭikujjitā. ^b^pamattabandhunā baddhā, macchāva kumināmukhe^eb^ti kumināmukhe macchabandhānaṃ macchapasibbakamukhe baddhā macchā viya pamattabandhunā mārena ^a^P2.0126^ea^ yena ^a^M2.0024^ea^ kāmabandhanena baddhā ime sattā tato na nigacchanti antobandhanagatāva honti.

[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ tathārūpaṃ ^b^kāmaṃ^eb^ bandhanabhūtaṃ ^b^ujjhitvā^eb^ pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā pahāya kilesa^b^mārassa bandhanaṃ chetvā,^eb^ puna ariyamaggasatthena anavasesato samucchinditvā tato eva avijjāsaṅkhātena mūlena ^b^samūlaṃ,^eb^ kāmataṇhādikaṃ ^b^taṇhaṃ abbuyha^eb^ uddharitvā sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvato, ^b^sītibhūto^eb^ saupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbuto, ahaṃ ^b^asmi^eb^ homīti attho.

[03] ^b^jātarūpenā^eb^tiādikā ^a^V2.0022^ea^ āyasmato candanattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe buddhasuññe loke rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto sudassanaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ pabbatantare vasantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kuṭajapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā ^b^candano^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpanno ahosi. so ekaṃ puttaṃ labhitvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato susāne vasati. tassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā purāṇadutiyikā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā dārakaṃ ādāya mahatā parivārena therassa santikaṃ gacchati -- ``itthikuttādīhi naṃ palobhetvā uppabbājessāmī''ti. thero taṃ āgacchantiṃ dūratova disvā ``idānissā avisayo bhavissāmī''ti yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.37-43) --

[03] chaḷabhiñño pana hutvā ākāse ṭhatvā tassā dhammaṃ desetvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā sayaṃ attanā pubbe vasitaṭṭhānameva gato. sahāyabhikkhūhi -- ``vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, kacci tayā saccāni paṭividdhānī''ti puṭṭho --
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --
[25] imāhi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ kathento aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^jātarūpena sañchannā^eb^ti jātarūpamayena sīsūpagādialaṅkārena alaṅkaraṇavasena paṭicchāditasarīrā, sabbābharaṇabhūsitāti attho. ^b^dāsīgaṇapurakkhatā^eb^ti yathārahaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattena attano dāsigaṇena ^a^M2.0026^ea^ purato katā parivāritāti attho. ^b^aṅkena puttamādāyā^eb^ti ``api nāma puttampi disvā gehassitasāto bhaveyyā''ti puttaṃ attano aṅkena gahetvā.

[03] ^b^āyanti^eb^nti āgacchantiṃ. ^b^sakaputtassa mātara^eb^nti mama orasaputtassa jananiṃ, mayhaṃ purāṇadutiyikanti attho. sabbamidaṃ thero attano kāmarāgasamucchedaṃ bahumaññanto vadati. ^b^yoniso udapajjathā^eb^ti ``evarūpāpi nāma sampatti jarābyādhimaraṇehi abhibhuyyati, aho saṅkhārā aniccā adhuvā anassāsikā''ti evaṃ yonisomanasikāro uppajji. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^dhammo have^eb^tiādikā āyasmato dhammikattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle migaluddako hutvā ekadivasaṃ araññāyatane devaparisāya satthu dhammaṃ desentassa ``dhammo eso vuccatī''ti desanāya nimittaṃ gaṇhi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^dhammiko^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto jetavanapaṭiggahaṇe laddhappasādo pabbajitvā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakāvāse āvāsiko hutvā viharanto ^a^V2.0024^ea^ āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vattāvattesu ujjhānabahulo akkhamo ahosi. tena bhikkhū taṃ vihāraṃ chaḍḍetvā pakkamiṃsu. so ekakova ahosi. vihārasāmiko upāsako taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā bhagavato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā tena ``evaṃ, bhante''ti vutte -- ``nāyaṃ idāneva akkhamo, pubbepi akkhamo ahosī''ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito rukkhadhammaṃ (jā0 1.1.74) kathetvā upari tassa ovādaṃ dento --
[21] ``dhammo ^a^M2.0027^ea^ ^a^P2.0128^ea^ have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti.
[22] esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī..
[21] ``na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino.
[22] adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggatiṃ..
[21] ``tasmā hi dhammesu kareyya chandaṃ, iti modamāno sugatena tādinā.
[22] dhamme ṭhitā sugatavarassa sāvakā, nīyanti dhīrā saraṇavaraggagāmino..
[22] cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiya''nti.. -- catasso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti lokiyalokuttaro sucaritadhammo. ^b^rakkhatī^eb^ti apāyadukkhato rakkhati, saṃsāradukkhato ca vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūto rakkhatiyeva. ^b^dhammacāri^eb^nti taṃ dhammaṃ carantaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ. ^b^suciṇṇo^eb^ti suṭṭhu ciṇṇo kammaphalāni saddahitvā sakkaccaṃ cittīkatvā upacito. ^b^sukha^eb^nti lokiyalokuttarasukhaṃ. tattha lokiyaṃ tāva kāmāvacarādibhedo dhammo yathāsakaṃ sukhaṃ diṭṭhe vā dhamme upapajje vā apare vā pariyāye ^b^āvahati^eb^ nipphādeti, itaraṃ pana vivaṭṭūpanissaye ṭhatvā ciṇṇo paramparāya āvahatīti vattuṃ vaṭṭati anupanissayassa tadabhāvato. ^b^esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī^eb^ti dhammacārī puggalo dhamme suciṇṇe taṃnimittaṃ duggatiṃ na gacchatīti eso dhamme suciṇṇe ānisaṃso udrayoti attho.

[03] yasmā ^a^M2.0028^ea^ dhammeneva sugatigamanaṃ, adhammeneva ca duggatigamanaṃ, tasmā ``dhammo adhammo''ti ime aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaphalāti dassetuṃ ^b^``na hi dhammo''^eb^tiādinā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^adhammo^eb^ti dhammapaṭipakkho duccaritaṃ. ^b^samavipākino^eb^ti sadisavipākā samānaphalā.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0025^ea^ yasmā dhammādhammānaṃ ayaṃ yathāvutto vipākabhedo, tasmā. ^b^chanda^eb^nti kattukamyatāchandaṃ. ^b^iti modamāno sugatena tādinā^eb^ti iti evaṃ vuttappakārena ovādadānena sugatena sammaggatena sammāpaṭipannena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattiyā tādināmavatā hetubhūtena modamāno ^a^P2.0129^ea^ tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjamāno dhammesu chandaṃ kareyyāti yojanā. ettāvatā vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni vivaṭṭaṃ dassento ^b^``dhamme ṭhitā''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- yasmā sugatassa varassa sugatesu ca varassa sammāsambuddhassa ^b^sāvakā^eb^ tassa ^b^dhamme ṭhitā dhīrā^eb^ ativiya aggabhūtasaraṇagāmino teneva saraṇagamanasaṅkhāte dhamme ṭhitabhāvena sakalavaṭṭadukkhatopi ^b^nīyanti^eb^ nissaranti, tasmā hi dhammesu kareyya chandanti.
[03] evaṃ satthārā tīhi gāthāhi dhamme desite desanānusārena yathānisinnova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.44-50) --
[22] tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, uttariṃ duttaraṃ bhavaṃ..
[03] tathā arahatte patiṭṭhito. arahattaṃ pana patvā attanā adhigataṃ visesaṃ satthu nivedento carimagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0029^ea^ ^b^vipphoṭito^eb^ti vidhuto, maggañāṇena paṭinissaṭṭhoti attho. ^b^gaṇḍamūlo^eb^ti avijjā. sā hi gaṇḍati savati. ``gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhu, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti (saṃ0 ni0 4.103; a0 ni0 6.23; 8.56; 9.15; cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 137) evaṃ satthārā vuttassa dukkhamūlayogato, kilesāsucipaggharaṇato, uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkapabhijjanato ca, gaṇḍābhidhānassa upādānakkhandhapañcakassa ^a^V2.0026^ea^ mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^taṇhājālo samūhato^eb^ti taṇhāsaṅkhāto jālo maggena samugghāṭito. ^b^so khīṇasaṃsāro na catthi kiñcana^eb^nti so ahaṃ evaṃ pahīnataṇhāvijjatāya parikkhīṇasaṃsāro pahīnabhavamūlattā eva na catthi, na ca upalabbhati rāgādikiñcanaṃ. ^b^cando yathā dosinā puṇṇamāsiya^eb^nti yathā nāma cando abbhamahikādidosarahito puṇṇamāsiyaṃ paripuṇṇakāle evaṃ ahampi arahattādhigamena apetarāgādikiñcano paripuṇṇadhammakoṭṭhāso ahosinti.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ ^a^P2.0130^ea^ ^b^balākā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sappakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto sambhavassa nāma paccekabuddhassa abbhokāse samāpattiyā nisinnassa mahantaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā uparimuddhani dhārento pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^sappako^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ajakaraṇiyā ^a^M2.0030^ea^ nāma nadiyā tīre leṇagirivihāre vasanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.52.78-83) --
[22] buddhopi sambhavo nāma, abbhokāse vasī tadā..

[03] so arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato ñātīhi upaṭṭhīyamāno tattha katipāhaṃ ^a^V2.0027^ea^ vasitvā dhammaṃ desetvā ñātake saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā yathāvuttaṭṭhānameva gantukāmo ahosi. taṃ ñātakā ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, mayaṃ paṭijaggissāmā''ti yāciṃsu. so gamanākāraṃ dassetvā ṭhito attanā vasitaṭṭhānakittanāpadesena vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``yadā balākā sucipaṇḍaracchadā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā.
[22] palehiti ālayamālayesinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ..
[21] ``yadā balākā suvisuddhapaṇḍarā, kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā.
[22] pariyesati leṇamaleṇadassinī, tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti maṃ..
[21] ``kaṃ nu tattha na ramenti, jambuyo ubhato tahiṃ.
[22] khemā ajakaraṇī sivā surammā''ti.. -- catasso gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^balākā^eb^ti balākāsakuṇikā. ^b^sucipaṇḍaracchadā^eb^ti sucisuddhadhavalapakkhā. ^b^kāḷassa meghassa bhayena tajjitā^eb^ti jalabhārabharitatāya kāḷassa añjanagirisannikāsassa pāvussakameghassa gajjato vuṭṭhibhayena nibbijjitā bhiṃsāpitā. ^b^palehitī^eb^ti gocarabhūmito uppatitvā gamissati. ^b^ālaya^eb^nti nilayaṃ attano kulāvakaṃ. ^b^ālayesinī^eb^ti tattha ālayanaṃ nilīyanameva icchantī. ^b^tadā nadī ajakaraṇī rameti ma^eb^nti tasmiṃ pāvussakakāle ajakaraṇīnāmikā nadī navodakassa pūrā hārahārinī kulaṅkasā maṃ rameti mama cittaṃ ārādhetīti utupadesavisesakittanāpadesena vivekābhiratiṃ pakāsesi.

[03] ^b^suvisuddhapaṇḍarā^eb^ti suṭṭhu visuddhapaṇḍaravaṇṇā, asammissavaṇṇā sabbasetāti attho. ^b^pariyesatī^eb^ti maggati. ^b^leṇa^eb^nti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^aleṇadassinī^eb^ti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apassantī. pubbe nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānassa abhāvena aleṇadassinī, idāni pāvussakakāle meghagajjitena āhitagabbhā ^b^pariyesati leṇa^eb^nti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānaṃ kulāvakaṃ karotīti attho.

[03] ^b^kaṃ nu tattha...pe0... pacchato^eb^ti ^b^mama^eb^ vasanakamahāleṇassa ^b^pacchato^eb^ pacchābhāge ^b^āpagākūlaṃ^eb^ ajakaraṇīnadiyā ubhatotīraṃ ^b^tahiṃ tahiṃ^eb^ ito cito ca sobhentiyo niccakālaṃ phalabhāranamitasākhā ^a^V2.0028^ea^ siniddhapaṇṇacchāyā ^b^jambuyo tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ^b^kaṃ^eb^ nāma sattaṃ ^b^na ramenti nu,^eb^ sabbaṃ ramentiyeva.

[03] ^b^tāmatamadasaṅghasuppahīnā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0032^ea^ amataṃ vuccati agadaṃ, tena majjantīti amatamadā, sappā, tesaṃ saṅgho amatamadasaṅgho, tato suṭṭhu pahīnā apagatā. ^b^bhekā^eb^ maṇḍūkiyo, ^b^mandavatī^eb^ saravatiyo, ^b^panādayanti^eb^ taṃ ṭhānaṃ madhurena vassitena ninnādayanti. ^b^nājja^eb^ ^a^P2.0132^ea^ ^b^girinadīhi vippavāsasamayoti^eb^ ajja etarahi aññāhipi pabbateyyāhi nadīhi vippavāsasamayo na hoti, visesato pana vāḷamacchasusumārādivirahitato ^b^khemā ajakaraṇī^eb^ nadī. sundaratalatitthapulinasampattiyā ^b^sivā^eb^. suṭṭhu rammā ramaṇīyā, tasmā tattheva me mano ramatīti adhippāyo.
[03] evaṃ pana vatvā ñātake vissajjetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato. suññāgārābhiratidīpanena idameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^pabbaji^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato muditattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ekaṃ mañcamadāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā ^b^mudito^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. tena ca samayena taṃ kulaṃ raññā kenacideva karaṇīyena palibuddhaṃ ahosi. mudito rājabhayābhīto palāyitvā araññaṃ paviṭṭho aññatarassa khīṇāsavattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchi. thero tassa bhītabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``mā bhāyī''ti samassāsesi. so ``kittakena nu kho, bhante, kālena idaṃ me bhayaṃ vūpasamessatī''ti pucchitvā ``sattaṭṭhamāse atikkamitvā''ti vutte -- ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ adhivāsetuṃ na sakkomi, pabbajissāmahaṃ, bhante, pabbājetha ma''nti jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. thero taṃ pabbājesi. so pabbajitvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho bhaye vūpasantepi samaṇadhammaṃyeva ^a^M2.0033^ea^ ^a^V2.0029^ea^ rocento kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto -- ``arahattaṃ appatvā imasmā vasanagabbhā bahi na nikkhamissāmī''tiādinā paṭiññaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.36.30-33) --
[22] ekaṃ mañcaṃ mayā dinnaṃ, pasannena sapāṇinā..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento sahāyabhikkhūhi adhigataṃ pucchito attano paṭipannākāraṃ kathento --
[21] ``nāsissaṃ na pivissāmi, vihārā ca na nikkhame.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^jīvikattho^eb^ti jīvikāya atthiko jīvikappayojano. ``ettha pabbajitvā nibbhayo sukhena akilamanto jīvissāmī''ti evaṃ jīvikatthāya pabbajinti attho. ^b^laddhāna upasampada^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ sāmaṇerapabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito ^a^M2.0034^ea^ ñatticatutthena kammena upasampadaṃ labhitvā. ^b^tato saddhaṃ paṭilabhi^eb^nti tato upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto dve mātikā, tisso anumodanā, ekaccaṃ suttaṃ, samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ, vipassanāvidhiñca uggaṇhanto buddhādīnaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ ^a^V2.0030^ea^ disvā -- ``sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho''ti ratanattaye saddhaṃ paṭilabhiṃ. ^b^daḷhavīriyo parakkami^eb^nti evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddho hutvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva saccapaṭivedhāya daḷhavīriyo thiravīriyo hutvā parakkamiṃ, akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya sammadeva padahiṃ.

[03] yathā pana parakkamiṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kāma''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāma^eb^nti yathākāmaṃ ekaṃsato vā ^b^bhijjatu. ayaṃ kāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ mama pūtikāyo, iminā vīriyapatāpena bhijjati ce, bhijjatu chinnabhinnaṃ hotu. ^b^maṃsapesī visīyaru^eb^nti iminā daḷhaparakkamena imasmā kāyā maṃsapesiyo visīyanti ce, visīyantu ito cito viddhaṃsantu. ^b^ubho jaṇṇukasandhīhi, jaṅghāyo papatantu me^eb^ti ubhohi jaṇṇukasandhīhi saha mama ubho jaṅghāyo satthiyo ūrubandhato bhijjitvā bhūmiyaṃ papatantu. ``ma''ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[01] pañcakanipāte ^a^M2.0035^ea^ ^a^V2.0031^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato rājadattattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro, tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto, ito catuddase kappe buddhasuññe loke ^a^P2.0134^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto, ekadivasaṃ kenacideva karaṇīyena vanantaṃ upagato tattha aññataraṃ paccekabuddhaṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso suparisuddhaṃ ambāṭakaphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule nibbatti. tassa mahārājaṃ vessavaṇaṃ ārādhetvā paṭiladdhabhāvato mātāpitaro ^b^rājadatto^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya vāṇijjavasena rājagahaṃ agamāsi. tena ca samayena rājagahe aññatarā gaṇikā abhirūpā dassanīyā paramasobhaggayogato divase divase sahassaṃ labhati. atha so satthavāhaputto divase divase tassā gaṇikāya sahassaṃ datvā saṃvāsaṃ kappento nacirasseva sabbaṃ dhanaṃ khepetvā duggato hutvā ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto ito cito ca paribbhamanto saṃvegappatto ahosi. so ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamāsi.
