[01] tena ca samayena satthā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti. so parisapariyante nisīditvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyitvā susāne vasati. tadā aññataropi satthavāhaputto sahassaṃ datvā tāya gaṇikāya saha vasati. sā ca gaṇikā tassa hatthe mahaggharatanaṃ disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā aññehi dhuttapurisehi taṃ mārāpetvā taṃ ratanaṃ gaṇhi. atha tassa satthavāhaputtassa manussā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ocarakamanusse pesesuṃ. te rattiyaṃ tassā gaṇikāya gharaṃ pavisitvā chaviādīni anupahacceva taṃ māretvā sivathikāya chaḍḍesuṃ. rājadattatthero asubhanimittaṃ gahetuṃ susāne vicaranto tassā gaṇikāya kaḷevaraṃ ^a^M2.0036^ea^ paṭikkulato manasi kātuṃ upagato katipayavāre yoniso manasi katvā aciramatabhāvato soṇasiṅgālādīhi anupahatachavitāya visabhāgavatthutāya ca ayoniso ^a^V2.0032^ea^ manasikaronto, tattha kāmarāgaṃ uppādetvā saṃviggataramānaso attano cittaṃ paribhāsitvā muhuttaṃ ekamantaṃ apasakkitvā ādito upaṭṭhitaṃ asubhanimittameva gahetvā yoniso manasikaronto jhānaṃ uppādetvā taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tāvadeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.55-59) --
[01] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto --
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[01] tattha ^a^M2.0037^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu sivathikaṃ gantvā^eb^ti saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato bhikkhu, asubhakammaṭṭhānatthaṃ āmakasusānaṃ upagantvā. ``bhikkhū''ti cetaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya thero sayaṃ vadati. ^b^itthi^eb^nti thīyati ettha sukkasoṇitaṃ sattasantānabhāvena saṃhaññatīti thī, mātugāmo. evañca sabhāvaniruttivasena ``itthī''tipi vuccati. vañjhādīsu pana taṃsadisatāya taṃsabhāvānativattanato ca tabbohāro. ``itthī''ti itthikaḷevaraṃ vadati. ^b^ujjhita^eb^nti pariccattaṃ ujjhaniyattā eva ^b^apaviddhaṃ^eb^ anapekkhabhāvena khittaṃ. ^b^khajjantiṃ kimihī phuṭa^eb^nti kimīhi pūritaṃ hutvā khajjamānaṃ.

[03] ^b^yañhi ^a^V2.0033^ea^ eke jigucchanti, mataṃ disvāna pāpaka^eb^nti yaṃ apagatāyūsmāviññāṇatāya mataṃ kaḷevaraṃ pāpakaṃ nihīnaṃ lāmakaṃ eke cokkhajātikā jigucchanti, oloketumpi na icchanti. ^b^kāmarāgo pāturahū^eb^ti tasmiṃ kuṇape ayonisomanasikārassa balavatāya kāmarāgo mayhaṃ pāturahosi uppajji. ^b^andhova savatī ahu^eb^nti tasmiṃ kaḷevare navahi dvārehi asuciṃ savati sandante asucibhāvassa adassanena andho viya ahosiṃ. tenāha --
[21] ``ratto atthaṃ na jānāti, ratto dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara''nti ca..

[03] ``kāmacchando kho, brāhmaṇa, andhakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo''ti ca ādi. keci panettha takārāgamaṃ katvā ``kilesapariyuṭṭhānena avasavatti kilesassa vā vasavattī''ti atthaṃ vadanti. apare ``andhova asati ahu''nti pāḷiṃ ^a^P2.0136^ea^ vatvā ``kāmarāgena andho eva hutvā satirahito ahosi''nti atthaṃ vadanti. tadubhayaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ natthi.

[03] ^b^oraṃ odanapākamhā^eb^ti odanapākato oraṃ, yāvatā kālena suparidhotatintataṇḍulanāḷiyā odanaṃ pacati, tato orameva kālaṃ, tatopi lahukālena rāgaṃ vinodento, ^b^tamhā ṭhānā apakkamiṃ^eb^ yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitassa me rāgo uppajji, tamhā ṭhānā apakkamiṃ apasakkiṃ. apakkantova ^b^satimā sampajānohaṃ^eb^ samaṇasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā satipaṭṭhānamanasikāravasena satimā, sammadeva dhammasabhāvajānanena sampajāno ^a^M2.0038^ea^ ca hutvā ekamantaṃ upāvisiṃ, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdiṃ. nisinnassa ca ^b^tato me manasīkāro, yoniso udapajjathā^eb^tiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.

[03] ^b^ayoge^eb^tiādikā āyasmato subhūtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya māse māse aṭṭhakkhattuṃ catujjātiyagandhena satthu gandhakuṭiṃ ^a^V2.0034^ea^ opuñjāpesi. so tena puññakammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sugandhasarīro hutvā, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā ^b^subhūto^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto, nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya titthiyesu pabbajitvā tattha sāraṃ alabhanto, satthu santike upatissakolitaselādike bahū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pabbajitvā sāmaññasukhaṃ anubhavante disvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ācariyupajjhāye ārādhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivekavāsaṃ vasanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.272-308) --
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[22] ākāso viya paññāya, asaṅgo anilo yathā..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ.
[22] gabbhaṃ me vasato mātā, dehenāsi sugandhitā..
[22] vāsayiṃsu sugandhena, yasmiṃ jāto ahaṃ ghare..
[21] ``yadā ^a^M2.0041^ea^ ca taruṇo bhaddo, paṭhame yobbane ṭhito.
[22] tadā buddhānubhāvaṃ taṃ, disvā pabbajito ahaṃ..
[21] ``yadā pabbajito cāhaṃ, yadā ca arahā ahuṃ.
[22] nibbāyissaṃ yadā cāhaṃ, gandhavasso tadā ahu..
[22] tatheva gandhe itare ca sabbaso, pasayha vāyāmi tato tahiṃ tahiṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā titthiyesu pabbajitvā attano pattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dukkhaṃ, sāsane pabbajitvā pattaṃ jhānādisukhañca cintetvā attano paṭipattipaccavekkhaṇamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] caraṃ ce nādhigaccheyya, taṃ me dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ..
[21] ``abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijitaṃ, ekañce ossajeyya kalīva siyā.
[22] sabbānipi ce ossajeyya andhova siyā, samavisamassa adassanato..
[21] ``yañhi kayirā tañhi vade, yaṃ na kayirā na taṃ vade.
[22] evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato..
[22] evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^ayoge^eb^ti ayuñjitabbe asevitabbe antadvaye. idha pana attakilamathānuyogavasena attho veditabbo. ^b^yuñja^eb^nti tasmiṃ attānaṃ yuñjanto yojento tathā paṭipajjanto. ^b^kiccamicchako^eb^ti ^a^V2.0037^ea^ ubhayahitāvahaṃ kiccaṃ icchanto, tappaṭipakkhato ayoge ^b^caraṃ^eb^ caranto ce bhaveyya. ^b^nādhigaccheyyā^eb^ti yathādhippetaṃ hitasukhaṃ na pāpuṇeyyāti ñāyo. tasmā yaṃ ahaṃ titthiyamatavañcito ayoge yuñjiṃ, ^b^taṃ me dubbhagalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ apuññasabhāvo. ``purimakammabyāmohito ayoge yuñji''nti dasseti.

[03] ^b^abbūḷhaṃ aghagataṃ vijita^eb^nti vibādhanasabhāvatāya aghā nāma rāgādayo, aghāni eva aghagataṃ, aghagatānaṃ vijitaṃ saṃsārappavatti, tesaṃ vijayo kusaladhammābhibhavo. ``aghagataṃ vijita''nti anunāsikalopaṃ akatvā vuttaṃ. taṃ abbūḷhaṃ anuddhataṃ yena, taṃ abbūḷhāghagataṃ vijitaṃ katvā evaṃbhūto hutvā, kilese asamucchinditvāti attho. ^b^ekañce ossajeyyā^eb^ti adutiyatāya padhānatāya ca ekaṃ appamādaṃ sammāpayogameva vā ossajeyya pariccajeyya ce. ^b^kalīva^eb^ so puggalo kāḷakaṇṇī viya ^b^siyā. sabbānipi ce ossajeyyā^eb^ti sabbānipi vimuttiyā paripācakāni saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññindriyāni ossajeyya ce, abhāvanāya chaḍḍeyya ce, ^b^andhova siyā samavisamassa adassanato^eb^.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ti opammasampaṭipādanatthe nipāto. ^b^rucira^eb^nti sobhanaṃ. ^b^vaṇṇavanta^eb^nti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannaṃ. ^b^agandhaka^eb^nti gandharahitaṃ pālibhaddakagirikaṇṇikajayasumanādibhedaṃ. ^b^evaṃ subhāsitā vācā^eb^ti subhāsitā vācā nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannapupphasadisaṃ. yathā hi agandhakaṃ pupphaṃ ^a^P2.0138^ea^ dhārentassa sarīre gandho na pharati, evaṃ etampi yo sakkaccasavanādīhi ^a^M2.0043^ea^ ca samācarati, tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha kattabbaṃ, taṃ akubbato sutagandhaṃ paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati aphalā hoti. tena vuttaṃ ``evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato''ti.

[01] ^b^sugandhaka^eb^nti sumanacampakanīluppalapupphādibhedaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho pharati, evaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasaṅkhātā subhāsitā vācāpi yo sakkaccasavanādīhi tattha kattabbaṃ karoti, assa puggalassa saphalā hoti, sutagandhapaṭipattigandhānaṃ āvahanato mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā. tasmā yathovādaṃ paṭipajjeyya, yathākārī tathāvādī ca bhaveyyāti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^vassati^eb^ ^a^V2.0038^ea^ ^b^devo^eb^tiādikā āyasmato girimānandattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto attano bhariyāya putte ca kālaṅkate sokasallasamappito araññaṃ paviṭṭho satthārā tattha gantvā dhammaṃ kathetvā sokasalle abbūḷhe pasannamānaso sugandhapupphehi pūjetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ katvā abhitthavi.

[03] so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe bimbisārarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^girimānando^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto satthu rājagahagamane buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto katipayaṃ divasaṃ gāmakāvāse vasitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ rājagahaṃ agamāsi. bimbisāramahārājā tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā upasaṅkamitvā ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, ahaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahāmī''ti sampavāretvā gato ^a^M2.0044^ea^ bahukiccatāya na sari. ``thero abbhokāse vasatī''ti devatā therassa temanabhayena vassaṃ vāresuṃ. rājā avassanakāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā therassa kuṭikaṃ kārāpesi. thero kuṭikāyaṃ vasanto senāsanasappāyalābhena samādhānaṃ ^a^P2.0139^ea^ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.419-448) --
[22] mātā pitā matā bhātā, ekacitamhi ḍayhare..
[22] cittakkhepo ca me āsi, tena sokena aṭṭito..
[22] yathāgatā tathā gatā, tattha kā paridevanā..
[22] evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā..
[22] evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, tattha kā paridevanā..
[21] ``yathāpi urago jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tacaṃ.
[22] evaṃ mātā pitā tuyhaṃ, saṃ tanuṃ idha hīyare..
[22] sabbe satte uddharasi, ñāṇena tvaṃ mahāmune..
[22] paṭipādesi me maggaṃ, tava ñāṇena cakkhuma..
[21] ``paṭipannā ca sekhā ca, phalaṭṭhā santi sāvakā.
[03] atha therassa arahattappattiyā haṭṭhatuṭṭhe viya deve vassante upari taṃ vassane niyojanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] tassaṃ viharāmi vūpasanto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva..
[21] ``vassati devo yathāsugītaṃ, channā me kuṭikā sukhā nivātā.
[22] tassaṃ viharāmi santacitto, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva..
[22] atha ce patthayasī pavassa devā''ti.. -- imā pañca gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^a^M2.0047^ea^ ^b^yathāsugīta^eb^nti sugītānurūpaṃ, sundarassa attano meghagītassa anurūpamevāti attho. valāhako hi yathā agajjanto kevalaṃ vassanto na sobhati, evaṃ satapaṭalasahassapaṭalena uṭṭhahitvā thanayanto gajjanto vijjullatā nicchārentopi avassanto na sobhati, tathābhūto pana hutvā vassanto sobhatīti vuttaṃ ``vassati devo yathāsugīta''nti. tenāha -- ``abhitthanaya, pajjunna'' ^a^V2.0041^ea^, (cariyā0 3.89; jā0 1.1.75) ``gajjitā ceva vassitā cā''ti (a0 ni0 4.101; pu0 pa0 157) ca. ^b^tassaṃ viharāmī^eb^ti tassaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ ariyavihāragabbhena iriyāpathavihārena viharāmi. ^b^vūpasantacitto^eb^ti aggaphalasamādhinā sammadeva upasantamānaso.
[03] evaṃ therassa anekavāraṃ kataṃ uyyojanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanto valāhakadevaputto ninnañca thalañca pūrento mahāvassaṃ vassāpesi.

[03] ^b^yaṃ patthayāno^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sumanattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito pañcanavute kappe buddhasuññe loke kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ byādhitaṃ disvā harītakaṃ adāsi ^a^P2.0140^ea^. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe gahapatikule nibbattitvā ^b^sumano^eb^ti laddhanāmo sukhena vaḍḍhi. tassa pana mātulo pabbajitvā arahā hutvā araññe viharanto sumane vayappatte taṃ pabbājetvā caritānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. so tattha yogakammaṃ karonto cattāri jhānāni pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattesi. athassa thero vipassanāvidhiṃ ācikkhi. so ca nacireneva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.60-71) --
[22] sabbattha sukhito hotu, mā ca te byādhimāgamā..
[22] imaṃ jātiṃ upādāya, byādhi me nupapajjatha..
[22] tisso vijjā sacchikatā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[03] arahatte pana patiṭṭhito ekadivasaṃ mātulattherassa upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. taṃ thero adhigamaṃ pucchi, taṃ byākaronto --
[22] sadattho me anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] sabbe me āsavā khīṇā, natthi dāni punabbhavo..
[25] imāhi pañcahi gāthāhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yaṃ patthayāno dhammesu, upajjhāyo anuggahi. amataṃ abhikaṅkhanta^eb^nti samathavipassanādīsu anavajjadhammesu yaṃ dhammaṃ mayhaṃ patthayanto ākaṅkhanto upajjhāyo amataṃ nibbānaṃ abhikaṅkhantaṃ maṃ ovādadānavasena anuggaṇhi. ^b^kataṃ kattabbakaṃ mayā^eb^ti tassa adhigamatthaṃ kattabbaṃ pariññādisoḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ kataṃ niṭṭhāpitaṃ mayā.

[03] tato ^a^V2.0043^ea^ eva ^b^anuppatto^eb^ adhigato catubbidhopi maggadhammo ^b^sacchikato. sayaṃ dhammo anītiho^eb^ti sayaṃ attanāyeva nibbānadhammo phaladhammo ca anītiho asandiddho attapaccakkho kato, ``itiha, iti kirā''ti pavattiyā itihasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsayaṃ samucchindantoyeva ariyamaggo pavattati. tenāha ^b^``visuddhañāṇo nikkaṅkho''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^visuddhañāṇo^eb^ti sabbasaṃkilesavisuddhiyā visuddhañāṇo. ^b^tavantike^eb^ti tava samīpe.

[01] ^b^sadattho^eb^ti arahattaṃ. ^b^sikkhā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0141^ea^ adhisīlasikkhādayo. ^b^sussutā^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccassa paṭivedhabāhusaccassa ca pāripūrivasena suṭṭhu sutā. ^b^tava sāsane^eb^ti tava ovāde anusiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa.
[03] ^b^ariyavatā^eb^ti suvisuddhasīlādivatasamādānena. ^b^antevāsimhi sikkhito^eb^ti tuyhaṃ samīpe ciṇṇabrahmacariyavāsatāya antevāsī sikkhitavā sikkhitādhisīlādisikkho amhīti.

[03] ^b^sādhū^eb^ ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ^b^hī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato vaḍḍhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayāni puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhārukacchanagare gahapatikule nibbattitvā ^b^vaḍḍho^eb^ti laddhanāmo anupubbena vaḍḍhati. athassa mātā saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvegā puttaṃ ñātīnaṃ niyyādetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā aparena samayena puttampi viññutaṃ pattaṃ veḷudantattherassa santike pabbājesi. so pabbajito buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā ganthadhuraṃ vahanto ekadivasaṃ ``ekako santaruttarova mātaraṃ passissāmī''ti bhikkhunupassayaṃ agamāsi. taṃ disvā mātā ``kasmā tvaṃ ekako santaruttarova idhāgato''ti codesi. so mātarā codiyamāno ``ayuttaṃ mayā kata''nti uppannasaṃvego vihāraṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne nisinno vipassitvā arahattaṃ patvā mātu ovādasampattipakāsanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``sādhū ^a^V2.0044^ea^ hi kira me mātā, patodaṃ upadaṃsayi.
[21] ``ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṃsu āsavā.
[22] sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna..
[22] apihā nūna mayipi, vanatho te na vijjati..
[22] jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0051^ea^ ^a^P2.0142^ea^ ^b^sādhū hi kira me mātā, patodaṃ upadaṃsayī^eb^ti sādhu vata mātā mayhaṃ ovādasaṅkhātaṃ patodaṃ dasseti, tena me vīriyaṃ uttejentī uttamaṅge paññāsīse vijjhi. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassā me mātuyā. ^b^sambodhi^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ayañhettha yojanā -- janettiyā me anusiṭṭho yassā anusāsanībhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ahaṃ āraddhavīriyo pahitatto viharanto uttamaṃ aggaphalaṃ sambodhiṃ arahattaṃ patto.

[03] tato eva ārakattā kilesehi ^b^arahā^eb^ puññakkhettatāya ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo^eb^ dakkhiṇāraho amhi. pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāttayassa adhigatattā ^b^tevijjo^eb^ nibbānassa sacchikatattā ^b^amataddaso namucino^eb^ mārassa ^b^senaṃ^eb^ kilesavāhiniṃ bodhipakkhiyasenāya jinitvā tassa jitattāyeva anāsavo sukhaṃ viharāmīti.

[03] idāni ``anāsavo''ti vuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``ajjhattañcā''^eb^ ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^ajjhattaṃ^eb^ ajjhattavatthukā ca ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ bahiddhavatthukā ca ^b^āsavā ye^eb^ mayhaṃ ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe ^b^vijjiṃsu^eb^ upalabbhiṃsu, te sabbe anavasesā ^b^ucchinnā^eb^ ariyamaggena samucchinnā pahīnā puna dāni kadācipi na ca uppajjeyyuṃ na uppajjissantiyevāti.

[03] idāni mātu vacanaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā attanā arahattassa adhigatattā mātaraṃ thomento ^b^``visāradā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^visāradā kho^eb^ti ekaṃsena vigatasārajjā. evaṃ mātu attano ^a^V2.0045^ea^ ca arahattādhigamena satthu orasaputtabhāvaṃ ullapento mātaraṃ ^b^``bhaginī''^eb^ti āha. ^b^etamatthaṃ abhāsayī^eb^ti etaṃ mama ovādabhūtaṃ atthaṃ abhaṇi. evaṃ pana maṃ ovadantī na kevalaṃ visāradā eva, atha kho ^b^apihā nūna mayipi^eb^ tava puttakepi apihā asanthavā maññe, kiṃ vā etena parikappanena? ^b^vanatho te na vijjati^eb^ avijjādiko vanatho tava santāne nattheva, yā maṃ bhavakkhaye niyojesīti adhippāyo.
[03] idāni ``tayā niyojitākāreneva mayā paṭipanna''nti dassento ^b^``pariyantakata''^eb^nti osānagāthamāha, tassattho suviññeyyova.

[03] ^b^atthāya^eb^ ^a^M2.0052^ea^ ^b^vata me^eb^tiādikā āyasmato nadīkassapattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle ^a^P2.0143^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso attanā ropitassa ambarukkhassa paṭhamuppannaṃ manosilāvaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ ambaphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule uruvelakassapassa bhātā hutvā nibbatto. vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ anicchanto tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre assamaṃ māpetvā viharati. nadītīre vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca ^b^nadīkassapo^eb^ti samaññā ahosi. tassa bhagavā saparisassa ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. taṃ sabbaṃ khandhake (mahāva0 36-39) āgatameva. so bhagavato ^b^ādittapariyāyadesanāya^eb^ (mahāva0 54; saṃ0 ni0 4.28) arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.81-87) --
[03] arahatte pana patiṭṭhito aparabhāge attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā diṭṭhisamugghātakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``atthāya ^a^M2.0053^ea^ vata me buddho, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agā.

[03] tattha ^b^atthāya vata me^eb^ti mayhaṃ atthāya vata hitāya vata. ^b^buddho^eb^ti sabbaññubuddho. ^b^nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ agā^eb^ti nerañjarāsaṅkhātaṃ nadiṃ agañchi, tassā nadiyā tīre ca mama bhātu uruvelakassapassa assamaṃ upagatoti adhippāyo.

[01] idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``yassāha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa buddhassa bhagavato. ^b^dhammaṃ sutvānā^eb^ti catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā, sotadvārānusārena upalabhitvā. ^b^micchādiṭṭhiṃ vivajjayi^eb^nti ^a^P2.0144^ea^ ``yaññādīhi suddhi hotī''tiādinayappavattaṃ viparītadassanaṃ pajahiṃ.

[03] micchādiṭṭhiṃ ^a^V2.0047^ea^ vivajjayinti vuttamevatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^``yaji''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^yajiṃ uccāvace yaññe^eb^ti pākaṭayaññe somayāgavājapeyyādike nānāvidhe yaññe yajiṃ. ^b^aggihuttaṃ juhiṃ aha^eb^nti tesaṃ yaññānaṃ yajanavasena āhutiṃ paggaṇhanto aggiṃ paricariṃ. ^b^esā suddhīti maññanto^eb^ti esā yaññakiriyā aggipāricariyā suddhihetubhāvato suddhi ``evaṃ me saṃsārasuddhi hotī''ti maññamāno. ^b^andhabhūto puthujjano^eb^ti paññācakkhuvekallena avijjandhatāya andhabhūto puthujjano hutvā vanagahanapabbatagahanādīni viya duratikkamanaṭṭhena diṭṭhiyeva gahanaṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ ^a^M2.0054^ea^, taṃ pakkhando anupaviṭṭhoti ^b^diṭṭhigahanapakkhando. parāmāsenā^eb^ti dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā ``idameva sacca''nti parāmasanato parāmāsasaṅkhātena micchābhinivesena. ^b^mohito^eb^ti mūḷhabhāvaṃ pāpito. ^b^asuddhiṃ maññisaṃ suddhi^eb^nti asuddhiṃ maggaṃ ``suddhiṃ magga''nti maññisaṃ maññiṃ. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``andhabhūto aviddasū''^eb^ti. yasmā avijjāya andhabhūto, tato eva dhammādhammaṃ yuttāyuttañca avidvā, tasmā tathā maññinti attho.

[03] ^b^micchādiṭṭhi pahīnā me^eb^ti evaṃbhūtassa pana satthu sammukhā catusaccagabbhaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā yoniso paṭipajjantassa ariyamaggasammādiṭṭhiyā sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi samucchedappahānavasena mayhaṃ pahīnā. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti kāmabhavādayo sabbepi bhavā ariyamaggasatthena ^b^vidālitā^eb^ viddhaṃsitā. ^b^juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyaggi^eb^nti āhavanīyādike aggī chaḍḍetvā sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyatāya sabbassa ca pāpassa dahanato dakkhiṇeyyaggiṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi. tayidaṃ mayhaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaggiparicaraṇaṃ dadhinavanītamathitasappiādinirapekkhaṃ satthu namassanamevāti āha ^b^``namassāmi tathāgata''^eb^nti. atha vā ^b^juhāmi dakkhiṇeyyaggi^eb^nti dāyakānaṃ dakkhiṇāya mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena pāpassa ca dahanena dakkhiṇeyyaggibhūtaṃ attānaṃ juhāmi paricarāmi tathā katvā paricarāmi, tathā katvā pariharāmi. pubbe aggidevaṃ namassāmi, idāni pana namassāmi tathāgatanti.

[03] ^b^mohā sabbe pahīnā me^eb^ti dukkhe aññāṇādibhedā sabbe mohā mayhaṃ pahīnā samucchinnā, tato eva ^b^``bhavataṇhā padālitā. vikkhīṇo jātisaṃsāro, natthi dāni punabbhavo''^eb^ti tīsu padesu me-saddo ānetvā yojetabbo.

[01] ^b^pāto^eb^ ^a^V2.0048^ea^ ^a^P2.0145^ea^ ^b^majjhanhika^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato gayākassapattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto ito ekatiṃse kappe sikhissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññāyatane ^a^M2.0055^ea^ assamaṃ kāretvā vanamūlaphalāhāro vasati. tena ca samayena bhagavā eko adutiyo tassa assamasamīpena gacchati. so bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito velaṃ oloketvā manoharāni kolaphalāni satthu upanesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā dvīhi tāpasasatehi saddhiṃ gayāyaṃ viharati. gayāyaṃ vasanato hissa kassapagottatāya ca ^b^gayākassapo^eb^ti samaññā ahosi. so bhagavatā saddhiṃ parisāya ehibhikkhūpasampadaṃ datvā ^b^ādittapariyāyadesanāya^eb^ (mahāva0 54) ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.8-14) --
[21] ``tamhi kāle sikhī buddho, eko adutiyo ahu.
[03] arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāpapavāhanakittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^V2.0049^ea^ mayā pakataṃ pāpaṃ, pubbe aññāsu jātisu.
[22] taṃ dānīdha pavāhemi, evaṃdiṭṭhi pure ahuṃ..
[22] suddho suddhassa dāyādo, putto buddhassa oraso..
[22] tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^pāto^eb^ sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ, ^b^majjhanhikaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0146^ea^ majjhanhavelāyaṃ, ^b^sāyaṃ^eb^ sāyanhavelāyanti divasassa ^b^tikkhattuṃ^eb^ tayo vāre ahaṃ udakaṃ ^b^otariṃ^eb^ ogāhiṃ. otaranto ca sohaṃ na yattha katthaci yadā vā tadā vā otariṃ, atha kho ^b^gayāya^eb^ mahājanassa ``pāpapavāhana''nti abhisammate gayātitthe, ^b^gayaphagguyā^eb^ gayāphaggunāmake phaggunīmāsassa uttaraphaggunīnakkhatte anusaṃvaccharaṃ udakorohanamanuyutto ahosinti.

[01] idāni tadā yenādhippāyena udakorohanamanuyuttaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ mayā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ``yaṃ mayā pubbe ito aññāsu jātīsu pāpakammaṃ upacitaṃ. taṃ idāni ^b^idha^eb^ gayātitthe imissā ca gayāphagguyā iminā udakorohanena ^b^pavāhemi^eb^ apanemi vikkhālemī''ti. ^b^pure^eb^ satthu sāsanupagamanato pubbe ^b^evaṃdiṭṭhi^eb^ evarūpaviparītadassano ^b^ahuṃ^eb^ ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^dhammatthasahitaṃ pada^eb^nti vibhattialopena niddeso. dhammena ca atthena ca sahitakoṭṭhāsaṃ, ādito majjhato pariyosānato ca dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthūpasaṃhitaṃ suṭṭhu ekantena niyyānikaṃ katvā bhāsitaṃ vācaṃ sammāsambuddhavacanaṃ sutvā tena pakāsitaṃ paramatthabhāvena tacchabhāvato ^b^tathaṃ^eb^ yathārahaṃ pavattinivattiupāyabhāve byabhicārābhāvato ^b^yāthāvakaṃ^eb^ dukkhādi^b^atthaṃ yoniso^eb^ upāyena pariññeyyādibhāvena ^b^paccavekkhisaṃ^eb^ ``dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ, samudayo pahātabbo, nirodho sacchikātabbo ^a^M2.0057^ea^, maggo bhāvetabbo''ti patiavekkhiṃ, ñāṇacakkhunā passiṃ paṭivijjhinti attho.

[03] ^b^ninhātasabbapāpomhī^eb^ti evaṃ paṭividdhasaccattā eva ariyamaggajalena vikkhālitasabbapāpo amhi. tato eva rāgamalādīnaṃ abhāvena nimmalattā ^b^nimmalo^eb^. tato eva ^a^V2.0050^ea^ parisuddhakāyasamācāratāya parisuddhavacīsamācāratāya parisuddhamanosamācāratāya ^b^payato suci^eb^ ^b^suddho^eb^. savāsanasabbakilesamalavisuddhiyā ^b^suddhassa^eb^ buddhassa bhagavato lokuttaradhammadāyassa ādiyanato ^b^dāyādo^eb^. tasseva desanāñāṇasamuṭṭhānaurovāyāmajanitābhijātitāya ^b^oraso^eb^ putto amhīti yojanā.

[03] punapi attano paramatthato nhātakabhāvameva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``ogayhā''^eb^ti osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^ogayhā^eb^ti ogāhetvā anupavisitvā. ^b^aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sota^eb^nti sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānabhūtaṃ maggasotaṃ. ^b^sabbapāpaṃ pavāhayi^eb^nti anavasesaṃ pāpamalaṃ pakkhālesiṃ, ariyamaggajalapavāhanena paramatthanhātako ahosiṃ. tato eva ^b^tisso vijjā ajjhagamiṃ, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana^eb^nti vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^vātarogābhinīto^eb^tiādikā ^a^P2.0147^ea^ āyasmato vakkalittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthu santikaṃ gacchantehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā byākari.

[03] sopi ^a^M2.0058^ea^ yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, ^b^vakkalī^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā rūpakāyassa sampattidassanena atitto satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicarati. ``agāramajjhe vasanto niccakālaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhissāmī''ti satthu santike pabbajitvā ṭhapetvā bhojanavelaṃ sarīrakiccakālañca sesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ, tattha ṭhito aññaṃ kiccaṃ pahāya bhagavantaṃ olokentova viharati. satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento bahukālaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassaneneva vicarante kiñci avatvā punekadivasaṃ ^a^V2.0051^ea^ ``kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena? yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passati. yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. dhammañhi, vakkali, passanto maṃ passati, maṃ passanto dhammaṃ passatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.87) āha.

[03] satthari evaṃ vadantepi thero satthu dassanaṃ pahāya aññattha gantuṃ na sakkoti. tato satthā ``nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī''ti vassūpanāyikadivase ``apehi, vakkalī''ti theraṃ paṇāmesi. so satthārā paṇāmito sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto ``kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, yohaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmī''ti gijjhakūṭapabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā ``ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ nāseyyā''ti attānaṃ dassetuṃ obhāsaṃ vissajjento --
[22] adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha''nti.. (dha0 pa0 381) --

[25] gāthaṃ vatvā ``ehi, vakkalī''ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. thero ``dasabalo me diṭṭho, `ehī'ti avhānampi laddha''nti balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetvā ^a^P2.0148^ea^ ``kuto āgacchāmī''ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ ajānitvā satthu sammukhe ākāse pakkhandanto paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā vuttagāthaṃ ^a^M2.0059^ea^ āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti ^b^aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.208) ^b^dhammapadavaṇṇanāyañca^eb^ (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 2.381) āgataṃ.

[03] idha pana evaṃ vadanti -- ``kiṃ te, vakkalī''tiādinā satthārā ovadito gijjhakūṭe viharanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, tassa saddhāya balavabhāvato eva vipassanā vīthiṃ na otarati, bhagavā taṃ ñatvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. puna vipassanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhiyeva, athassa āhāravekallena vātābādho uppajji, taṃ vātābādhena pīḷiyamānaṃ ñatvā bhagavā tattha gantvā pucchanto --

[03] tattha ^b^vātarogābhinīto^eb^ti vātābādhena aseribhāvaṃ upanīto, vātabyādhinā abhibhūto. ^b^tva^eb^nti theraṃ ālapati. ^b^vihara^eb^nti tena iriyāpathavihārena viharanto. ^b^kānane vane^eb^ti kānanabhūte vane, mahāaraññeti attho. ^b^paviddhagocare^eb^ti vissaṭṭhagocare dullabhapaccaye. vātarogassa sappāyānaṃ sappiādibhesajjānaṃ abhāvena pharusabhūmibhāgatāya ca ^b^lūkhe^eb^ lūkhaṭṭhāne. ^b^kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasī^eb^ti bhikkhu tvaṃ kathaṃ viharissasīti bhagavā pucchi.

[03] taṃ ^a^M2.0060^ea^ sutvā thero nirāmisapītisomanassādinā attano sukhavihāraṃ pakāsento ^b^``pītisukhenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pītisukhenā^eb^ti ubbegalakkhaṇāya pharaṇalakkhaṇāya ca ^a^P2.0149^ea^ pītiyā taṃsampayuttasukhena ca. tenāha ^b^``vipulenā''^eb^ti uḷārenāti attho. ^b^pharamāno samussaya^eb^nti yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhitehi paṇītehi rūpehi sakalaṃ kāyaṃ pharāpento nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ karonto. ^b^lūkhampi abhisambhonto^eb^ti araññāvāsajanitaṃ sallekhavuttihetukaṃ dussahampi paccayalūkhaṃ abhibhavanto adhivāsento. ^b^viharissāmi kānane^eb^ti jhānasukhena vipassanāsukhena ca araññāyatane viharissāmīti attho. tenāha -- ``sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesi''nti (pārā0 11).
[22] labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata''nti ca.. (dha0 pa0 374).

[03] ^b^bhāvento satipaṭṭhāne^eb^ti maggapariyāpanne kāyānupassanādike cattāro satipaṭṭhāne uppādento vaḍḍhento ca. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti maggapariyāpannāni eva saddhādīni pañcindriyāni. ^b^balānī^eb^ti tathā saddhādīni ^a^V2.0053^ea^ pañca balāni. ^b^bojjhaṅgānī^eb^ti tathā satisambojjhaṅgādīni satta bojjhaṅgāni. ^b^ca^eb^-saddena sammappadhānaiddhipādamaggaṅgāni saṅgaṇhāti. tadavinābhāvato hi taggahaṇeneva tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^viharissāmī^eb^ti yathāvutte bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvento maggasukhena tadadhigamasiddhena phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca viharissāmi.

[03] ^b^āraddhavīriye^eb^ti catubbidhasammappadhānavasena paggahitavīriye. ^b^pahitatte^eb^ti nibbānaṃ patipesitacitte. ^b^niccaṃ daḷhaparakkame^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ asithilavīriye. avivādavasena kāyasāmaggidānavasena ca ^b^samagge^eb^. diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena ^b^sahite^eb^ sabrahmacārī disvā. etena kalyāṇamittasampattiṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^anussaranto sambuddha^eb^nti sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṃ sabbasattuttamatāya, ^b^aggaṃ^eb^ uttamena damathena ^b^dantaṃ,^eb^ anuttarasamādhinā ^b^samāhitaṃ atandito^eb^ analaso hutvā, ^b^rattindivaṃ^eb^ sabbakālaṃ ``itipi so bhagavā araha''ntiādinā anussaranto viharissāmi. etena buddhānussatibhāvanāya ^a^M2.0061^ea^ yuttākāradassanena sabbattha kammaṭṭhānānuyogamāha, purimena pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānānuyogaṃ.
[03] evaṃ pana vatvā thero vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.28-65) --
[22] rañjayaṃ parisaṃ sabbaṃ, santhavī sāvakaṃ sakaṃ..
[22] natthi etādiso añño, yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vakkali..
[22] hutvā sutvā ca taṃ vākyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānamabhirocayiṃ..
[21] ``yo so tayā santhavito, ito sattamake muni.
[22] bhikkhu saddhāvataṃ aggo, tādiso homahaṃ mune..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] vakkali nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[22] sāvatthiyaṃ pure jāto, kule aññatare ahaṃ..
[22] imaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyaka..
[21] ``tadā paṭiggahi so maṃ, bhītānaṃ saraṇo muni.
[22] alaṃ vakkali kiṃ rūpe, ramase bālanandite..
[21] ``yo hi passati saddhammaṃ, so maṃ passati paṇḍito.
[22] apassamāno saddhammaṃ, maṃ passampi na passati..
[22] vakkalīti jino vācaṃ, taṃ sutvā mudito ahaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ ^a^P2.0150^ea^ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi. atha naṃ satthā bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.

[03] ^b^olaggessāmī^eb^tiādikā ^a^M2.0064^ea^ ^a^V2.0056^ea^ āyasmato vijitasenattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ākāsena gacchantaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso pasannākāraṃ dassento añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi. satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ākāsato otari. so bhagavato manoharāni madhurāni phalāni upanesi, paṭiggahesi bhagavā anukampaṃ upādāya. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kosalaraṭṭhe hatthācariyakule nibbattitvā ^b^vijitaseno^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ pāpuṇi. tassa mātulā seno ca upaseno cāti dve hatthācariyā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā pabbajitvā vāsadhuraṃ pūrentā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. vijitasenopi hatthisippe nipphattiṃ gato nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāse alaggamānaso satthu yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātulattherānaṃ santike pabbajitvā tesaṃ ovādānusāsaniyā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto vipassanāvīthiṃ laṅghitvā bahiddhā nānārammaṇe vidhāvantaṃ attano cittaṃ ovadanto --
[22] na taṃ pāpe niyojessaṃ, kāmajālaṃ sarīrajaṃ..
[21] ``tvaṃ olaggo na gacchasi, dvāravivaraṃ gajova alabhanto.
[22] na ca cittakali punappunaṃ, pasakka pāparato carissasi..
[22] balavā āvatteti akāmaṃ, evaṃ āvattayissaṃ taṃ..
[22] evaṃ damayissaṃ taṃ, patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesu..
[22] vīriyadhuraniggahito, na yito dūraṃ gamissase cittā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^olaggessāmī^eb^ti saṃvarissāmi nivāressāmi. ^b^te^eb^ti taṃ. upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ ^a^V2.0057^ea^. te gamananti vā vacanaseso. ^b^hatthina^eb^nti ca hatthinti attho. ^b^cittā^eb^ti attano cittaṃ ālapati. yathā taṃ vāretukāmo, taṃ dassento ^b^``āṇidvāreva hatthina''^eb^nti āha. āṇidvāraṃ nāma pākārabaddhassa nagarassa khuddakadvāraṃ, yaṃ ghaṭikāchidde āṇimhi pakkhitte yantena vinā abbhantare ṭhitehipi vivarituṃ na sakkā. yena manussagavassamahiṃsādayo na niggantuṃ sakkā. nagarato bahi niggantukāmampi hatthiṃ yato palobhetvā hatthācariyo gamanaṃ nivāresi. atha vā āṇidvāraṃ nāma palighadvāraṃ. tattha hi tiriyaṃ palighaṃ ṭhapetvā rukkhasūcisaṅkhātaṃ āṇiṃ palighasīse āvuṇanti. ^b^pāpe^eb^ti rūpādīsu uppajjanakābhijjhādipāpadhamme ^b^taṃ na niyojessaṃ^eb^ na niyojissāmi. ^b^kāmajālā^eb^ti kāmassa jālabhūtaṃ. yathā hi macchabandhamigaluddānaṃ jālaṃ nāma macchādīnaṃ tesaṃ yathākāmakārasādhanaṃ, evaṃ ayonisomanasikārānupātitaṃ cittaṃ mārassa kāmakārasādhanaṃ. tena hi so satte anatthesu pāteti. ^b^sarīrajā^eb^ti sarīresu uppajjanaka. pañcavokārabhave hi cittaṃ rūpapaṭibaddhavuttitāya ``sarīraja''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^tvaṃ olaggo na gacchasī^eb^ti tvaṃ, cittakali, mayā satipaññāpatodāṅkusehi vārito na dāni yathāruciṃ gamissasi, ayonisomanasikāravasena yathākāmaṃ vattituṃ na labhissasi. yathā kiṃ? ^b^dvāravivaraṃ gajova alabhanto^eb^ nagarato gajanirodhato vā niggamanāya dvāravivarakaṃ alabhamāno hatthī viya. ^b^cittakalī^eb^ti cittakāḷakaṇṇi. ^b^punappuna^eb^nti aparāparaṃ. ^b^pasakkā^eb^ti saraṇasampassāsavasena. ^b^pāparato^eb^ti pāpakammanirato pubbe viya idāni ^b^na carissasi^eb^ tathā carituṃ na dassāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^adanta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0066^ea^ adamitaṃ hatthisikkhaṃ asikkhitaṃ. ^b^navaggaha^eb^nti aciragahitaṃ. ^b^aṅkusaggaho^eb^ti hatthācariyo. ^b^balavā^eb^ti kāyabalena ñāṇabalena ca balavā. ^b^āvatteti akāma^eb^nti anicchantameva nisedhanato nivatteti. ^b^evaṃ āvattayissa^eb^nti yathā yathāvuttaṃ hatthiṃ hatthācariyo, evaṃ taṃ cittaṃ cittakaliṃ duccaritanisedhanato nivattayissāmi.

[03] ^b^varahayadamakusalo^eb^ti ^a^P2.0152^ea^ uttamānaṃ assadammānaṃ damane kusalo. tato eva ^b^sārathipavaro^eb^ assadammasārathīsu visiṭṭho ^b^dameti ājaññaṃ^eb^ ājānīyaṃ assadammaṃ desakālānurūpaṃ saṇhapharusehi dameti vineti nibbisevanaṃ karoti. ^b^patiṭṭhito pañcasu balesū^eb^ti saddhādīsu pañcasu balesu patiṭṭhito hutvā assaddhiyādinisedhanato ^b^taṃ damayissaṃ^eb^ damessāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^satiyā^eb^ ^a^V2.0058^ea^ ^b^taṃ nibandhissa^eb^nti gocarajjhattato bahi gantuṃ adento satiyottena kammaṭṭhānathambhe, cittakali, taṃ nibandhissāmi niyamessāmi. ^b^payutto te damessāmī^eb^ti tattha nibandhanto eva yuttappayutto hutvā te damessāmi, saṃkilesamalato taṃ visodhessāmi. ^b^vīriyadhuraniggahito^eb^ti yathāvutto chekena susārathinā yuge yojito yuganiggahito yugantaragato taṃ nātikkamati, evaṃ tvampi citta, mama vīriyadhure niggahito sakkaccakāritāya sātaccakāritāya aññathā vattituṃ alabhanto ito gocarajjhattato dūraṃ bahi na gamissasi. bhāvanānuyuttassa hi kammaṭṭhānato aññaṃ āsannampi lakkhaṇato dūramevāti evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi attano cittaṃ niggaṇhantova vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.22-30) --
[22] anukampatu maṃ buddho, bhikkhaṃ icchāmi dātave..
[22] tattha cittaṃ pasādetvā, abhivandiṃ tadā jinaṃ..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^upārambhacitto^eb^tiādikā āyasmato yasadattattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacini. tathā hesa padumuttarassa ^a^V2.0059^ea^ bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā araññe viharanto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso añjaliṃ paggayha abhitthavi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde mallaraṭṭhe mallarājakule nibbattitvā ^b^yasadatto^eb^ti laddhanāmo, vayappatto takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni sikkhitvā sabhiyena paribbājakena saddhiṃyeva cārikaṃ caramāno, anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabhiyena puṭṭhapañhesu ^a^P2.0153^ea^ vissajjiyamānesu sayaṃ otārāpekkho suṇanto nisīdi ``samaṇassa gotamassa vāde dosaṃ dassāmī''ti. athassa bhagavā cittācāraṃ ñatvā ^b^sabhiyasuttadesanāvasāne^eb^ (su0 ni0 sabhiyasutta) ovādaṃ dento --
[22] ārakā hoti saddhammā, nabhaso pathavī yathā..
[22] na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva pūtikaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^upārambhacitto^eb^ti sārambhacitto, dosāropanādhippāyoti attho. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippañño. ^b^ārakā hoti saddhammā^eb^ti so tādiso puggalo nabhaso viya pathavī paṭipattisaddhammatopi dūre hoti, pageva paṭivedhasaddhammato. ``na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.18) viggāhikakathaṃ anuyuttassa kuto santanipuṇo paṭipattisaddhammo.

[03] ^b^parihāyati saddhammā^eb^ti navavidhalokuttaradhammato pubbabhāgiyasaddhādisaddhammatopi nihīyati. ^b^parisussatī^eb^ti visussati kāyacittānaṃ pīṇanarasassa pītipāmojjādikusaladhammassābhāvato. ^b^na virūhatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0060^ea^ virūḷhiṃ vuddhiṃ na pāpuṇāti. ^b^pūtika^eb^nti gomayalepadānādiabhāvena pūtibhāvaṃ pattaṃ.

[03] ^b^tuṭṭhena cittenā^eb^ti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ, attamano pamudito hutvāti attho. ^b^khepetvā^eb^ti samucchinditvā. ^b^akuppata^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^pappuyyā^eb^ti pāpuṇitvā. ^b^paramaṃ santi^eb^nti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ. tadadhigamo ^a^M2.0069^ea^ cassa kevalaṃ kālāgamanameva, na kocividhoti taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``parinibbātināsavo''^eb^ti.
[03] evaṃ satthārā ovadito saṃvegajāto pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.35-43) --
[22] ekaṃsaṃ ajinaṃ katvā, buddhaseṭṭhaṃ thaviṃ ahaṃ..
[22] ñāṇe te upamā natthi, yāvatā jagato gati..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā aññaṃ byākarontopi thero imā eva gāthā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^upasampadā^eb^ ^a^V2.0061^ea^ ^b^ca me laddhā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato soṇassa kuṭikaṇṇassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno seṭṭhi hutvā uḷārāya issariyasampattiyā ṭhito ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivutaṃ mahatiyā ^a^M2.0070^ea^ buddhalīḷāya mahantena buddhānubhāvena nagaraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso vanditvā añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. so pacchābhattaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavato santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā ``anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggo bhavissatī''ti byākāsi.

[03] so tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle sāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭivattāni pūrento ekassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ sibbitvā adāsi. puna buddhasuññe loke bārāṇasiyaṃ tunnavāyo hutvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa cīvarakoṭiṃ chinnaṃ ghaṭetvā adāsi. evaṃ tattha tattha puññāni katvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde avantiraṭṭhe kuraraghare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti. ^b^soṇo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. koṭiagghanakassa kaṇṇapiḷandhanassa dhāraṇena ``koṭikaṇṇo''ti vattabbe ^b^kuṭikaṇṇo^eb^ti paññāyittha.

[03] so anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento āyasmante mahākaccāne kulagharaṃ nissāya pavattapabbate viharante tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāya taṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi. so aparabhāge saṃsāre sañjātasaṃvego therassa santike pabbajitvā kicchena kasirena dasavaggaṃ saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā upasampajjitvā katipayakālaṃ therassa santike vasitvā, theraṃ āpucchitvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ sāvatthiṃ upagato, satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ labhitvā paccūsasamaye ajjhiṭṭho soḷasāṭṭhakavaggiyānaṃ ^a^P2.0155^ea^ ussāraṇena sādhukāraṃ datvā bhāsitāya ``disvā ādīnavaṃ loke''ti (udā0 46; mahāva0 258) udānagāthāya pariyosāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.26-34) --
[22] sayaṃ vīṇā pavajjanti, buddhassa pavisato puraṃ..
[21] ``aho buddho aho dhammo, aho no satthu sampadā.

[03] arahatte pana patiṭṭhito attano upajjhāyena ācikkhitaniyāmena paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā, dhuvanhānaṃ, cammattharaṇaṃ, guṇaṅguṇūpāhanaṃ, cīvaravippavāsoti pañca vare yācitvā te satthu santikā labhitvā punadeva attano vasitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā upajjhāyassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthāro pana ^b^udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ āgatanayena veditabbo. ^b^aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.206) pana ``upasampanno hutvā attano upajjhāyassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇī''ti vuttaṃ.
[03] so aparabhāge vimuttisukhena viharanto attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā somanassajāto udānavasena --
[21] ``upasampadā ca me laddhā, vimutto camhi anāsavo.
[22] so ca me bhagavā diṭṭho, vihāre ca sahāvasiṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^upasampadā ca me laddhā^eb^ti yā sā kicchena dasavaggaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā attanā laddhā upasampadā. yā ca pana varadānavasena sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena satthārā anuññātā upasampadā, tadubhayaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^ca^eb^-saddo ^a^P2.0156^ea^ samuccayattho, tena itarepi satthu santikā laddhavare saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^vimutto camhi anāsavo^eb^ti aggamaggena sakalakilesavatthuvimuttiyā vimutto ca amhi. tato eva kāmāsavādīhi anāsavo amhīti yojanā. ^b^so ca me bhagavā diṭṭho^eb^ti yadatthaṃ ahaṃ avantiraṭṭhato sāvatthiṃ gato, so ca bhagavā mayā adiṭṭhapubbo diṭṭho. ^b^vihāre ca sahāvasi^eb^nti na kevalaṃ tassa bhagavato dassanameva mayā laddhaṃ, atha kho vihāre satthu gandhakuṭiyaṃ satthārā kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā vāsentena saha avasiṃ. ^b^``vihāre^eb^ti vihārasamīpe''ti keci.

[03] ^b^bahudeva ratti^eb^nti paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāvasena kammaṭṭhānasodhanavasena ca, majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ devānaṃ brahmūnañca kaṅkhacchedanavasena bhagavā bahudeva rattiṃ abbhokāse ^b^atināmayi^eb^ vītināmesi. ^b^vihārakusalo^eb^ti dibbabrahmāaneñjāriyavihāresu kusalo. ^b^vihāraṃ pāvisī^eb^ti ativelaṃ nisajjacaṅkamehi uppannaparissamavinodanatthaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.

[03] ^b^santharitvāna saṅghāṭiṃ, seyyaṃ kappesī^eb^ti catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi. tenāha ``gotamo sīho selaguhāyaṃva pahīnabhayabheravo''ti. tattha ^b^gotamo^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ gottena kitteti. ^b^sīho selaguhāyaṃvā^eb^ti selassa pabbatassa guhāyaṃ. yathā sīho migarājā tejussadatāya pahīnabhayabheravo dakkhiṇena passena ^a^M2.0073^ea^ pāde pādaṃ accādhāya seyyaṃ kappesi, evaṃ cittutrāsalomahaṃsanachambhitattahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā pahīnabhayabheravo gotamo bhagavā seyyaṃ kappesīti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti pacchā, sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ``paṭibhātu taṃ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsitu''nti (udā0 46) satthārā ajjhesitoti attho. ^b^kalyāṇavākkaraṇo^eb^ti sundaravacīkaraṇo, lakkhaṇasampannavacanakkamoti attho. ^b^soṇo abhāsi saddhamma^eb^nti soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggiyasuttāni ^a^V2.0064^ea^ soṇo kuṭikaṇṇo, ^b^buddhaseṭṭhassa^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa ^b^sammukhā,^eb^ paccakkhato abhāsīti thero attānameva paraṃ viya avoca.

[03] ^b^pañcakkhandhe pariññāyā^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhe tīhipi pariññāhi parijānitvā te parijānantoyeva, ^b^añjasaṃ^eb^ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayitvā, ^b^paramaṃ santiṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^pappuyya^eb^ pāpuṇitvā ṭhito ^b^anāsavo^eb^. tato eva idāni ^b^parinibbissati^eb^ anupādisesanibbānavasena nibbāyissatīti.

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^P2.0157^ea^ ^b^eva garūna^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato kosiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannacitto ucchukhaṇḍikaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti, ^b^kosiyo^eb^tissa gottavasena nāmaṃ akāsi. so viññutaṃ patto āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ abhiṇhaṃ upasaṅkamati, tassa santike dhammaṃ suṇāti. so tena sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.44.44-49) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā garuvāsaṃ sappurisūpanissayañca pasaṃsanto --
[21] ``yo ve garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro, vase ca tamhi janayetha pemaṃ.
[22] so bhattimā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[22] so thāmavā nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[21] ``yo ve samuddova ṭhito anejo, gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī.
[22] asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa..
[21] ``bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti, dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī.
[22] so tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍito, ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa..

[03] tattha ^a^P2.0158^ea^ ^b^yo^eb^ti khattiyādīsu catūsu parisāsu yo koci. ^b^ve^eb^ti byattaṃ. ^b^garūna^eb^nti sīlādigaruguṇayuttānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ. ^b^vacanaññū^eb^ti tesaṃ anusāsanīvacanaṃ jānanto, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno paṭipajjitvā ca tassa phalaṃ jānantoti attho. ^b^dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^vase ca tamhi janayetha pema^eb^nti tasmiṃ garūnaṃ vacane ovāde vaseyya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjeyya, paṭipajjitvā ``iminā vatāhaṃ ovādena imaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ vītivatto''ti tattha janayetha pemaṃ gāravaṃ uppādeyya. idañhi dvayaṃ ``garūnaṃ vacanaññu dhīro''ti padadvayena vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. ^b^so^eb^ti yo garūnaṃ vacanaññū dhīro, so yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā tattha ^b^bhattimā^eb^ ca nāma hoti, jīvitahetupi tassa anatikkamanato ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ ca nāma hoti. ^b^ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assā^eb^ti tathā paṭipajjanto ca tāya eva paṭipattiyā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ jānanahetu ^a^V2.0066^ea^ lokiyalokuttaradhammesu vijjāttayādivasena ``tevijjo, chaḷabhiñño, paṭisambhidāpatto''ti visesi visesavā siyāti attho.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ puggalaṃ paṭipattiyā antarāyakaraṇato ^b^``āpadā''^eb^ti laddhavohārā sotuṇhakhuppipāsādipākaṭaparissayā ceva rāgādipaṭicchannaparissayā ca ^b^uppatitā^eb^ uppannā, ^b^uḷārā^eb^ balavantopi ^b^nakkhambhayante^eb^ na kiñci cālenti. kasmā? ^b^paṭisaṅkhayanta^eb^nti paṭisaṅkhāyamānaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabale ṭhitanti attho. ^b^so^eb^ti yo daḷhatarāhi āpadāhipi akkhambhanīyo, so ^b^thāmavā^eb^ dhitimā daḷhaparakkamo nāma hoti. anavasesasaṃkilesapakkhassa abhibhavanakapaññābalasamaṅgitāya ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ ca nāma hoti. tathābhūto ca ^b^ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assā^eb^ti taṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^samuddova^eb^ ^a^M2.0076^ea^ ^b^ṭhito^eb^ti samuddo viya ṭhitasabhāvo. yathā hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīre sinerupādasamīpe mahāsamuddo aṭṭhahipi disāhi uṭṭhitehi pakativātehi aniñjanato ^b^ṭhito anejo^eb^ gambhīro ca, evaṃ kilesavātehi titthiyavādavātehi ca akampanīyato ^b^ṭhito anejo^eb^. gambhīrassa anupacitañāṇasambhārehi aladdhagādhassa nipuṇassa sukhumassa paṭiccasamuppādādiatthassa paṭivijjhanena ^b^gambhīrapañño nipuṇatthadassī. asaṃhāriyo nāma ca hoti paṇḍito^eb^ so tādiso puggalo kilesehi devaputtamārādīsu vā kenaci asaṃhāriyatāya asaṃhāriyo nāma hoti, yathāvuttena atthena ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ ca nāma hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^bahussuto^eb^ti pariyattibāhusaccavasena bahussuto, suttageyyādi bahuṃ sutaṃ etassāti bahussuto. tameva dhammaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantameva dhāretīti ^b^dhammadharo^eb^ ^a^P2.0159^ea^ ca hoti. ^b^dhammassa hoti anudhammacārī^eb^ti yathāsutassa yathāpariyattassa dhammassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpaṃ dhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ catupārisuddhisīladhutaṅgāsubhakammaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ carati paṭipajjatīti anudhammacārī hoti, ``ajja ajjevā''ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhanto vicarati. ^b^so tādiso nāma ca hoti paṇḍito^eb^ti yo puggalo yaṃ garuṃ nissāya bahussuto dhammadharo dhammassa ca anudhammacārī hoti. so ca ^b^tādiso^eb^ tena garunā sadiso paṇḍito nāma hoti paṭipattiyā sadisabhāvato. tathābhūto pana so ^b^ñatvā ca dhammesu visesi assa,^eb^ taṃ vuttatthaṃva.

[03] ^b^atthañca yo jānāti bhāsitassā^eb^ti yo puggalo sammāsambuddhena bhāsitassa pariyattidhammassa ^a^V2.0067^ea^ atthaṃ jānāti. jānanto pana ``idha sīlaṃ vuttaṃ, idha samādhi, idha paññā''ti tattha tattha yathāvuttaṃ ^b^atthañca ñatvāna tathā karoti^eb^ yathā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā paṭipajjati. ^b^atthantaro nāma sa hoti paṇḍito^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo atthantaro atthakāraṇā sīlādiatthajānanamattameva upanissayaṃ katvā paṇḍito hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ettha ^a^M2.0077^ea^ ca paṭhamagāthāya ``yo ve garūna''ntiādinā saddhūpanissayo visesabhāvo vutto, dutiyagāthāya ``yaṃ āpadā''ti ādinā vīriyūpanissayo, tatiyagāthāya ``yo ve samuddova ṭhito''tiādinā samādhūpanissayo, catutthagāthāya ``bahussuto''tiādinā satūpanissayo, pañcamagāthāya ``atthañca yo jānātī''tiādinā paññūpanissayo visesabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] chakkanipāte ^a^M2.0078^ea^ ^a^V2.0068^ea^ ^b^disvāna pāṭihīrānī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato uruvelakassapattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā, vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānamakāsi. bhagavā cassa anantarāyataṃ disvā, ``anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparisānaṃ aggo bhavissatī''ti byākāsi.

[03] so ^a^P2.0160^ea^ tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvānavutikappamatthake phussassa bhagavato vemātikakaniṭṭhabhātā hutvā nibbatti. aññepissa dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro ahesuṃ. te tayopi buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ paramāya pūjāya pūjetvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato nibbattito puretarameva bārāṇasiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule bhātaro hutvā, anukkamena nibbattā gottavasena tayopi kassapā eva nāma jātā. te vayappattā tayo vede uggaṇhiṃsu. tesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa pañca māṇavakasatāni parivāro, majjhimassa tīṇi, kaniṭṭhassa dve. te attano ganthe sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva atthaṃ disvā pabbajjaṃ rocesuṃ. tesu jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ^b^uruvelakassapo^eb^ nāma jāto mahāgaṅgānadīvaṅke pabbajito ^b^nadīkassapo^eb^ nāma jāto, gayāsīse pabbajito ^b^gayākassapo^eb^ nāma jāto.

[03] evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā, paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo anukkamena dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā, pañcavaggiyatthere arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā yasappamukhe pañcapaññāsa sahāyake vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante ``caratha, bhikkhave, cārika''nti vissajjetvā, bhaddavaggiye vinetvā uruvelakassapassa ^a^V2.0069^ea^ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā ^a^M2.0079^ea^, tattha katanāgadamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi uruvelakassapaṃ saparisaṃ vinetvā pabbājesi. tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparisā āgantvā satthu santike pabbajiṃsu. sabbeva ehibhikkhū iddhimayapattacīvaradharā ahesuṃ.
[03] satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno ^b^ādittapariyāyadesanāya^eb^ sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.251-295) --
[22] tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ..
[22] parisā mahatī hotu, nibbattassa tahiṃ tahiṃ..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[21] ``so ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvā, vijaṭetvā mahājaṭaṃ.
[22] khemaṃ vijiritaṃ katvā, puna dethāti bhāsatha..
[22] nibbute tamhi lokagge, pūjaṃ katvā yathābalaṃ..
[22] bahudhā saṃsito santo, diṭṭhiṃ hitvāna pāpikaṃ..
[21] ``tadā dve bhātaro mayhaṃ, pabbajiṃsu mayā saha.
[22] tato me āsi paññatti, uruvelakassapo iti..
[22] mama pañca satānūnā, sissā sabbe mamānugā..
[21] ``tadā upecca maṃ buddho, katvāna vividhāni me.
[21] ``te cevaññe ca bahavo, sissā maṃ parivārayuṃ.
[22] aho buddhe kataṃ kāraṃ, saphalaṃ me ajāyatha..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto --
[22] tato me āsi saṃvego, abbhuto lomahaṃsano..

[01] tattha ^b^disvāna pāṭihīrānī^eb^ti nāgarājadamanādīni aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassāni pāṭihāriyāni disvā. ``pāṭihīraṃ, pāṭiheraṃ, pāṭihāriya''nti hi atthato ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. ^b^yasassino''^eb^ti ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinā sadevake loke yathābhuccaṃ patthaṭakittisaddassa. ^b^na tāvāhaṃ paṇipati^eb^nti yāva maṃ bhagavā ``neva kho tvaṃ, kassapa, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggaṃ samāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa, arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno''ti na tajjesi, tāva ahaṃ na paṇipātanaṃ akāsiṃ. kiṃkāraṇā? ^b^issāmānena vañcito,^eb^ ``imassa mayi sāvakattaṃ upagate mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, imassa eva vaḍḍhissatī''ti evaṃ parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya ceva, ``ahaṃ gaṇapāmokkho bahujanasammato''ti evaṃ abbhunnatilakkhaṇena mānena ca vañcito, palambhito hutvāti attho.

[03] ^b^mama saṅkappamaññāyā^eb^ti mayhaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ jānitvā, yaṃ yaṃ bhagavā uttari manussadhammā iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dasseti, taṃ taṃ disvā ``mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo''ti cintetvāpi ``na tveva kho arahā yathā aha''nti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ jānantopi ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento ajjhupekkhitvā pacchā nerañjarāya majjhe samantato udakaṃ ussāretvā reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamitvā tena ābhatanāvāya ṭhito tadāpi ``mahiddhiko''tiādikaṃ cintetvā puna ``na tveva kho arahā yathā aha''nti pavattitaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ ñatvāti attho. ^b^codesi narasārathī^eb^ti tadā me ^a^V2.0073^ea^ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā ``neva kho tvaṃ arahā''tiādinā purisadammasārathi satthā maṃ codesi niggaṇhi. ^b^tato me āsi saṃvego, abbhuto lomahaṃsano^eb^ti tato yathāvuttacodanāhetu ettakaṃ kālaṃ abhūtapubbatāya ^b^abbhuto^eb^ lomahaṃsanavasena pavattiyā ^b^lomahaṃsano^eb^ ``anarahāva samāno `arahā'ti ^a^M2.0084^ea^ maññi''nti ^b^saṃvego^eb^ sahottappo ñāṇuppādo mayhaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^jaṭilabhūtassā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0162^ea^ tāpasabhūtassa. ^b^siddhī^eb^ti lābhasakkārasamiddhi. ^b^parittikā^eb^ti appamattikā. ^b^tāha^eb^nti taṃ ahaṃ. ^b^tadā^eb^ti bhagavato codanāya saṃveguppattikāle. ^b^nirākatvā^eb^ti apanetvā chaḍḍetvā, anapekkho hutvāti attho. ^b^``iddhī^eb^ti bhāvanāmayaiddhī''ti vadanti. tadayuttaṃ tadā tassa ajhānalābhībhāvato. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``kāmadhātupurakkhato''ti.

[03] ^b^yaññena santuṭṭho^eb^ti ``yaññaṃ yajitvā saggasukhaṃ anubhavissāmi, alamettāvatā''ti yaññayajanena santuṭṭho niṭṭhitakiccasaññī. ^b^kāmadhātupurakkhato^eb^ti kāmasugatiṃ ārabbha uppannataṇho yaññayajanena kāmalokaṃ purakkhatvā ṭhito. so ce yañño pāṇātipātapaṭisaṃyutto hoti, na tena sugatiṃ sakkā laddhuṃ. na hi akusalassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko nibbattati. yā pana tattha dānādikusalacetanā, tāya sati paccayasamavāye sugatiṃ gaccheyya. ^b^pacchā^eb^ti tāpasapabbajjāto pacchā satthu ovādena tāpasaladdhiṃ pahāya catusaccakammaṭṭhānānuyogakāle. ^b^samūhani^eb^nti vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā rāgañca dosañca mohañca anavasesato samugghātesiṃ.

[03] yasmā panāyaṃ thero ariyamaggena rāgādayo samūhanantoyeva chaḷabhiñño ahosi, tasmā taṃ attano chaḷabhiññabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pubbenivāsaṃ jānāmī^eb^ti attano paresañca pubbenivāsaṃ atītāsu jātīsu nibbattakkhandhe khandhapaṭibaddhe ca pubbenivāsañāṇena hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato jānāmi bujjhāmi. ^b^dibbacakkhu visodhita^eb^nti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visodhitaṃ, pakaticakkhunā āpāthagataṃ pakatirūpaṃ viya dibbaṃ mānusampi dūraṃ tiroṭṭhitaṃ atisukhumañca rūpaṃ vibhāvetuṃ samatthañāṇaṃ bhāvanāya mayā visuddhaṃ katvā paṭiladdhanti attho. ^b^iddhimā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhāniddhivikubbaniddhiādīhi iddhīhi iddhimā, iddhividhañāṇalābhīti attho. sarāgādibhedassa paresaṃ cittassa jānanato ^b^paracittaññū,^eb^ cetopariyañāṇalābhīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dibbasotañca pāpuṇi^eb^nti dibbasotañāṇañca paṭilabhiṃ.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ^b^me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo^eb^ti yo sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ khayabhūto khayena ^a^V2.0074^ea^ vā laddhabbo, so sadattho paramattho ca mayā ariyamaggādhigamena adhigatoti. evametāya gāthāya therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^atihitā^eb^ ^a^P2.0163^ea^ ^b^vīhī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato tekicchakārittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto ito ekanavute kappe vipassissa bhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā vejjasatthe nipphattiṃ gato. vipassissa bhagavato upaṭṭhākaṃ asokaṃ nāma theraṃ byādhitaṃ arogamakāsi, aññesañca sattānaṃ rogābhibhūtānaṃ anukampāya bhesajjaṃ saṃvidahi.

[03] so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde subuddhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. tassa tikicchakehi gabbhakāle parissayaṃ apaharitvā paripālitatāya ^b^tekicchakārī^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so attano kulānurūpāni vijjāṭṭhānāni sippāni ca sikkhanto vaḍḍhati. tadā cāṇakko subuddhassa paññāveyyattiyaṃ kiriyāsu upāyakosallañca disvā, ``ayaṃ imasmiṃ rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ labhanto maṃ abhibhaveyyā''ti issāpakato raññā candaguttena taṃ bandhanāgāre khipāpesi. tekicchakārī pitu bandhanāgārappavesanaṃ sutvā bhīto palāyitvā sāṇavāsittherassa santikaṃ gantvā attano saṃvegakāraṇaṃ therassa kathetvā pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā abbhokāsiko nesajjiko ca hutvā viharati, sītuṇhaṃ agaṇento ^a^M2.0086^ea^ samaṇadhammameva karoti, visesato brahmavihārabhāvanamanuyuñjati. taṃ disvā māro pāpimā ``na imassa mama visayaṃ atikkamituṃ dassāmī''ti vikkhepaṃ kātukāmo sassānaṃ nipphattikāle khettagopakavaṇṇena therassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ nippaṇḍento --
[22] na ca labhe piṇḍaṃ, kathamahaṃ kassa''nti.. -- āha. taṃ sutvā thero --
[21] ``buddhamappameyyaṃ ^a^V2.0075^ea^ anussara pasanno, pītiyā phuṭasarīro hohisi satatamudaggo..
[22] mā sītena pareto vihaññittho, pavisa tvaṃ vihāraṃ phusitaggaḷa''nti.. --
[21] ``phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyo, tāhi ca sukhito viharissaṃ.
[22] nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ, aniñjito viharanto''ti.. -- āha.

[03] tattha ^b^atihitā vīhī^eb^ti vīhayo koṭṭhāgāraṃ atinetvā ṭhapitā, tattha paṭisāmitā khalato vā gharaṃ upanītāti attho. vīhiggahaṇena cettha itarampi dhaññaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. sālī pana yebhuyyena vīhito ^a^M2.0087^ea^ pacchā paccantīti āha. ^b^khalagatā sālī^eb^ti khalaṃ dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā, tattha rāsivasena maddanacāvanādivasena ṭhitāti attho. padhānadhaññabhāvadassanatthañcettha sālīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, ubhayenapi gāme, gāmato bahi ca dhaññaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ṭhitanti dasseti. ^b^na ca labhe piṇḍa^eb^nti evaṃ sulabhadhaññe subhikkhakāle ahaṃ piṇḍamattampi na labhāmi. idāni ^b^kathamahaṃ kassa^eb^nti ahaṃ kathaṃ karissāmi, kathaṃ jīvissāmīti parihāsakeḷiṃ akāsi.

[03] taṃ sutvā thero ``ayaṃ varāko attanā attano pavattiṃ mayhaṃ pakāsesi, mayā pana attanāva attā ovaditabbo, na mayā kiñci kathetabba''nti vatthuttayānussatiyaṃ attānaṃ niyojento ^b^``buddhamappameyya''^eb^ntiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^buddhamappameyyaṃ anussara pasanno^eb^ti savāsanāya avijjāniddāya accantavigamena, buddhiyā ca vikasitabhāvena buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādikilesānaṃ abhāvā aparimāṇaguṇasamaṅgitāya appameyyapuññakkhettatāya ca appameyyaṃ. okappanalakkhaṇena abhippasādena pasanno, pasannamānaso ``itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.74; saṃ0 ni0 5.997) anussara anu anu buddhārammaṇaṃ satiṃ pavattehi, pītiyā phuṭasarīro hohisi. ^b^satatamudaggo^eb^ti anussarantova pharaṇalakkhaṇāya pītiyā satataṃ sabbadā phuṭasarīro pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi ajjhotthaṭasarīro ubbegapītiyā ^a^P2.0165^ea^ udaggo kāyaṃ udaggaṃ katvā ākāsaṃ laṅghituṃ samattho ca bhaveyyāsi, buddhānussatiyā buddhārammaṇaṃ uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyyāsi. yato sītuṇhehi viya jighacchāpipāsāhipi anabhibhūto hohisīti attho.

[03] ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0076^ea^ ariyaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ. ^b^saṅgha^eb^nti ariyaṃ paramatthasaṅghaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^anussarā^eb^ti panettha ``svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo''tiādinā dhammaṃ, ``suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho''tiādinā saṅghaṃ anussarāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ therena ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇe niyojanavasena attani ovadite puna māro vivekavāsato naṃ vivecetukāmo hitesībhāvaṃ ^a^M2.0088^ea^ viya dassento ^b^``abbhokāse viharasī''^eb^ti pañcamaṃ gāthamāha. tassattho -- tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ^b^abbhokāse^eb^ kenaci apaṭicchanne vivaṭaṅgaṇe ^b^viharasi^eb^ iriyāpathe kappesi. ^b^hemantikā^eb^ himapātasamaye pariyāpannā imā sītā rattiyo vattanti. tasmā sītena ^b^pareto^eb^ abhibhūto hutvā ^b^mā vihaññittho^eb^ vighātaṃ mā āpajji mā kilami. ^b^phusitaggaḷaṃ^eb^ pihitakavāṭaṃ senāsanaṃ pavisa, evaṃ te sukhavihāro bhavissatīti.

[03] taṃ sutvā thero ``na mayhaṃ senāsanapariyesanāya payojanaṃ, etthevāhaṃ sukhavihārī''ti dassento ^b^``phusissa''^eb^ntiādinā chaṭṭhaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^phusissaṃ catasso appamaññāyo^eb^ti appamāṇagocaratāya ``appamaññā''ti laddhavohāre cattāro brahmavihāre phusissaṃ phusissāmi, kālena kālaṃ samāpajjissāmi. ^b^tāhi ca sukhito viharissa^eb^nti tāhi appamaññāhi sukhito sañjātasukho hutvā viharissaṃ cattāropi iriyāpathe kappessāmīti. tena mayhaṃ sabbakāle sukhameva, na dukkhaṃ. ^b^yato nāhaṃ sītena vihaññissaṃ^eb^ antaraṭṭhakepi himapātasamaye ahaṃ sītena na kilamissāmi, tasmā ^b^aniñjito viharanto^eb^ cittassa iñjitakāraṇānaṃ byāpādādīnaṃ suppahīnattā paccayuppanniñjanāya ca abhāvato samāpattisukheneva sukhito viharissāmīti. evaṃ thero imaṃ gāthaṃ vadantoyeva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.18.39-44) --
[03] ettha ca bindusārarañño kāle imassa therassa uppannattā tatiyasaṅgītiyaṃ imā gāthā saṅgītāti veditabbā.

[01] ^b^yassa sabrahmacārīsū^eb^tiādikā āyasmato mahānāgattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinanto kakusandhassa bhagavato kāle ^a^P2.0166^ea^ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ kakusandhaṃ bhagavantaṃ araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle jhānasukhena nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso tassa dāḷimaphalaṃ adāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sākete madhuvāseṭṭhassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^mahānāgo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto bhagavati sākete añjanavane viharante āyasmato gavampatittherassa pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho therasseva santike pabbajitvā tassovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.45.1-7) --
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā vimuttisukhena viharanto thero chabbaggiye bhikkhū sabrahmacārīsu gāravaṃ akatvā viharante disvā tesaṃ ovādadānavasena --
[22] na virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva pūtikaṃ..
[22] na vihāyati saddhammā, maccho bavhodake yathā..
[22] so virūhati saddhamme, khette bījaṃva bhaddakaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^sabrahmacārīsū^eb^ti samānaṃ brahmaṃ sīlādidhammaṃ carantīti sabrahmacārino, sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagatā sahadhammikā, tesu. ^b^gāravo^eb^ti garubhāvo sīlādiguṇanimittaṃ garukaraṇaṃ. ^b^nūpalabbhatī^eb^ti na vijjati na pavattati, na upatiṭṭhatīti attho. ^b^nibbānā^eb^ti kilesānaṃ nibbāpanato kilesakkhayāti attho. ^b^dhammarājassā^eb^ti satthuno. satthā hi sadevakaṃ lokaṃ yathārahaṃ lokiyalokuttarena dhammena rañjeti tosetīti ^b^dhammarājā^eb^. ettha ca ``dhammarājassa sāsane''ti iminā nibbānaṃ nāma dhammarājasseva sāsane ^a^P2.0167^ea^, na aññattha. tattha yo sabrahmacārīsu ^a^M2.0091^ea^ gāravarahito, so yathā nibbānā ārakā hoti, tathā dhammarājassa sāsanatopi ārakā hotīti dasseti. ^b^bavhodake^eb^ti bahūdake. ^b^santike hoti nibbāna^eb^nti nibbānaṃ tassa santike samīpe eva hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva. imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesuṃ.

[03] ^b^kullo sivathika^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato kullattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu ^a^V2.0079^ea^ katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbiyakule nibbattitvā ^b^kullo^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. so ca rāgacaritattā tibbarāgajātiko hoti. tenassa abhikkhaṇaṃ kilesā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti. athassa satthā cittācāraṃ ñatvā asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā, ``kulla, tayā abhiṇhaṃ susāne cārikā caritabbā''ti āha. so susānaṃ pavisitvā uddhumātakādīni tāni tāni asubhāni disvā taṃ muhuttaṃ asubhamanasikāraṃ uppādetvā susānato nikkhantamattova kāmarāgena abhibhuyyati. puna bhagavā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā ekadivasaṃ tassa susānaṭṭhānaṃ gatakāle ekaṃ taruṇitthirūpaṃ adhunā mataṃ avinaṭṭhacchaviṃ nimminitvā dasseti. tassa taṃ diṭṭhamattassa jīvamānavisabhāgavatthusmiṃ viya sahasā rāgo uppajjati. atha naṃ satthā tassa pekkhantasseva navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharamānāsuciṃ kimikulākulaṃ ativiya bībhacchaṃ duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ katvā dassesi. so taṃ pekkhanto virattacitto hutvā aṭṭhāsi. athassa bhagavā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janento --

[25] āha ^a^M2.0092^ea^. taṃ sutvā thero sammadeva sarīrasabhāvaṃ upadhārento asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā --
[21] ``yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ.
[22] yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho..
[21] ``yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
[22] yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure..
[03] tattha ^a^V2.0080^ea^ ^b^kullo^eb^ti attānameva thero paraṃ viya katvā vadati.

[03] ^b^ātura^eb^nti nānappakārehi dukkhehi abhiṇhaṃ paṭipīḷitaṃ. ^b^asuci^eb^nti sucirahitaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ. ^b^pūti^eb^nti duggandhaṃ. ^b^passā^eb^ti sabhāvato olokehi. ^b^kullā^eb^ti ovādakāle bhagavā theraṃ ālapati. udānakāle pana thero sayameva attānaṃ vadati. ^b^samussaya^eb^nti sarīraṃ. ^b^uggharanta^eb^nti uddhaṃ vaṇamukhehi asuciṃ savantaṃ. ^b^paggharanta^eb^nti adho vaṇamukhehi samantato ca asuciṃ savantaṃ. ^b^bālānaṃ abhinandita^eb^nti bālehi andhaputhujjanehi diṭṭhitaṇhābhinandanāhi ``ahaṃ mama''nti abhinivissa nanditaṃ.

[03] ^b^dhammādāsa^eb^nti dhammamayaṃ ādāsaṃ. yathā hi sattā adāsena attano mukhe kāye vā guṇadose passanti, evaṃ yogāvacaro yena attabhāve ^a^M2.0093^ea^ saṃkilesavodānadhamme yāthāvato passati, taṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ idha ``dhammādāsa''nti vuttaṃ. taṃ ñāṇadassanassa maggañāṇasaṅkhātassa dhammacakkhussa adhigamāya attano santāne uppādetvā. ^b^paccavekkhiṃ imaṃ kāya^eb^nti imaṃ karajakāyaṃ niccasārādivirahato ^b^tucchaṃ^eb^ attaparasantānānaṃ vibhāgato ^b^santarabāhiraṃ^eb^ ñāṇacakkhunā patiavekkhiṃ passiṃ.

[03] yathā pana paccavekkhiṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā ida''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yathā idaṃ tathā eta^eb^nti yathā idaṃ mayhaṃ sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ asubhaṃ āyūsmāviññāṇānaṃ anapagamā nānāvidhaṃ māyopamaṃ kiriyaṃ dasseti, tathāva etaṃ matasarīraṃ pubbe tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anapagamā ahosi. yathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā na kiñci kiriyaṃ dasseti, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ apagamā nassatevāti. yathā ca idaṃ mama sarīraṃ etarahi susāne na mataṃ na sayitaṃ, na uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ upagataṃ, tathā etaṃ etarahi matasarīrampi pubbe ^a^P2.0169^ea^ ahosi. yathā panetaṃ etarahi matasarīraṃ susāne sayitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ upagataṃ, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi bhavissati. atha vā yathā idaṃ mama sarīraṃ asuci duggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, tathā etaṃ matasarīrampi. yathā vā etaṃ matasarīraṃ asuciādisabhāvañceva aniccādisabhāvañca, tathā idaṃ mama sarīrampi. ^b^yathā adho tathā uddha^eb^nti yathā nābhito adho heṭṭhā ayaṃ kāyo asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo anicco dukkho anattā ca, tathā uddhaṃ nābhito upari asuciādisabhāvo ca. ^b^yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho^eb^ti yathā ca nābhito, uddhaṃ asuciādisabhāvo, tathā adho nābhito heṭṭhāpi.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ ^b^divā tathā ratti^eb^nti yathā ayaṃ kāyo divā ``akkhimhā akkhigūthako''tiādinā (su0 ni0 199) asuci paggharati, tathā rattimpi. ^b^yathā rattiṃ tathā divā^eb^ti yathā ca rattiṃ ayaṃ kāyo asuci paggharati, tathā divāpi, nayimassa kālavibhāgena aññathābhāvoti attho. ^b^yathā pure tathā pacchā^eb^ti yathā ayaṃ kāyo pure pubbe taruṇakāle asuci duggandho jeguccho paṭikkūlo, tathā ca pacchā jiṇṇakāle. yathā ca pacchā jiṇṇakāle asuciādisabhāvo, tathā pure taruṇakālepi ^a^M2.0094^ea^. yathā vā pure atītakāle saviññāṇakāle asuciādisabhāvo ca aniccādisabhāvo ca, tathā pacchā anāgatakāle aviññāṇakāleti evampettha attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^pañcaṅgikena turiyenā^eb^ti ``ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susīra''nti evaṃ pañcaṅgikena pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatena turiyena paricariyamānassa kāmasukhasamaṅgino issarajanassa ^b^tādisī^eb^ tathārūpā ^b^rati^eb^ sukhassādo na hoti. ^b^yathā ekaggacittassa, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato^eb^ti samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ passantassa yogāvacarassa yādisā dhammarati, tassā kalampi kāmarati na upetīti. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[22] labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānata''nti.. (dha0 pa0 374).
[03] imā eva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthāpi ahesuṃ.

[03] ^b^manujassā^eb^tiādikā ^a^P2.0170^ea^ āyasmato mālukyaputtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño aggāsanikassa putto hutvā nibbatti. tassa mātā mālukyā nāma, tassā vasena ^b^mālukyaputto^eb^tveva paññāyittha. so vayappatto nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ pabbajitvā vicaranto satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. so ñātīsu anukampāya ñātikulaṃ agamāsi. taṃ ñātakā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisitvā dhanena palobhetukāmā mahantaṃ dhanarāsiṃ ^a^M2.0095^ea^ purato upaṭṭhapetvā ``idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santakaṃ, vibbhamitvā iminā dhanena puttadāraṃ paṭijagganto puññāni karohī''ti yāciṃsu. thero tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viparivattento ākāse ṭhatvā --
[22] so plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro..
[21] ``yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā.
[21] ``yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ.
[21] ``taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā.
[22] mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^manujassā^eb^ti sattassa. ^b^pamattacārino^eb^ti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādena pamattacārissa, neva jhānaṃ, na vipassanā ^a^P2.0171^ea^, na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti. yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvā latā vaḍḍhati, evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya rūpādīsu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā taṇhā vaḍḍhati. vaḍḍhamānāva yathā māluvā latā attano apassayabhūtaṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā pāteti, evaṃ taṇhāvasikaṃ puggalaṃ apāye nipāteti. ^b^so plavatī^eb^ti so taṇhāvasiko puggalo aparāparaṃ bhavābhave uplavati dhāvati. yathā kiṃ? ^b^phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro^eb^ yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvanto rukkhassa ekaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññanti ``sākhaṃ ^a^V2.0083^ea^ alabhitvā nisinno''ti vattabbataṃ ^a^M2.0096^ea^ nāpajjati; evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ dhāvanto ``ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya appavattiṃ patto''ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ puggalaṃ. esā lāmakabhāvena ^b^jammī^eb^ visāhāratāya visamūlatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya rūpādīsu visattatāya āsattatāya ca ^b^visattikā^eb^ti saṅkhaṃ gatā chadvārikā taṇhā ^b^sahate^eb^ abhibhavati tassa puggalassa. yathā nāma vane punappunaṃ vassante deve abhivaṭṭhaṃ ^b^bīraṇaṃ^eb^ bīraṇatiṇaṃ vaḍḍhati, evaṃ vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhanti vuddhiṃ āpajjantīti attho.

[03] ^b^yo cetaṃ...pe0... duraccaya^eb^nti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ dukkaratāya duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ ^b^sahate^eb^ abhibhavati, tamhā puggalā vaṭṭamūlakā sokā papatanti. yathā nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udabindu na patiṭṭhāti, evaṃ na patiṭṭhahantīti attho.

[01] ^b^taṃ vo vadāmī^eb^ti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi. ^b^bhaddaṃ vo^eb^ti bhaddaṃ tumhākaṃ hotu, mā taṇhaṃ anuvattapuggalo viya vibhavaṃ anatthaṃ pāpuṇāthāti attho. ^b^yāvantettha samāgatā^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne yattakā sannipatitā, tattakā. kiṃ vadasīti ce? ^b^taṇhāya mūlaṃ khaṇatha^eb^ imissā chadvārikataṇhāya mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ avijjādikilesaggahanaṃ arahattamaggañāṇakudālena khaṇatha samucchindatha. kiṃ viyāti? ^b^usīratthova bīraṇaṃ^eb^ yathā usīrena atthiko puriso mahantena kudālena bīraṇāparanāmaṃ usīraṃ nāma tiṇaṃ khaṇati, evamassa mūlaṃ khaṇathāti attho. ^b^mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappuna^eb^nti tumhe nadītīre jātaṃ naḷaṃ mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto viya kilesamāro maccumāro devaputtamāro ca punappunaṃ mā bhañjīti attho.

[03] tasmā ^b^karotha buddhavacanaṃ^eb^ ``jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādatthā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.215) vuttaṃ buddhassa bhagavato vacanaṃ karotha, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā sampādetha. ^b^khaṇo vo mā^eb^ ^a^P2.0172^ea^ ^b^upaccagā^eb^ti yo hi buddhavacanaṃ na karoti, taṃ ^a^M2.0097^ea^ puggalaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo patirūpadesavāse uppattikkhaṇo sammadiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakkhaṇo channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakkhaṇoti sabbopi khaṇo atikkamati, so khaṇo mā tumhe atikkamatu. ^b^khaṇātītā^eb^ti ye hi taṃ khaṇaṃ atītā, ye vā puggale so khaṇo atīto, te ^b^nirayamhi samappitā^eb^ tattha nibbattā cirakālaṃ socanti.

[03] ^b^pamādo rajo^eb^ti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu sativossaggalakkhaṇo pamādo, saṃkilesasabhāvattā rāgarajādimissatāya ^a^V2.0084^ea^ ca rajo. ^b^pamādānupatito rajo^eb^ti yo hi koci rajo nāma rāgādiko, so sabbo pamādānupatito pamādavaseneva uppajjati. ^b^appamādenā^eb^ti appamajjanena appamādapaṭipattiyā. ^b^vijjāyā^eb^ti aggamaggavijjāya. ^b^abbahe sallamattano^eb^ti attano hadayanissitaṃ rāgādisallaṃ uddhareyya samūhaneyyāti.

[03] ^b^paṇṇavīsatī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sappadāsattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ suddhodanamahārājassa purohitaputto hutvā nibbatti, tassa ^b^sappadāso^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā kilesābhibhavena cetosamādhiṃ alabhanto brahmacariyaṃ caritvā saṃvegajāto pacchā satthaṃ āharanto yoniso manasikāraṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``satthaṃ ^a^M2.0098^ea^ vā āharissāmi, ko attho jīvitena me.
[22] kathañhi sikkhaṃ paccakkhaṃ, kālaṃ kubbetha mādiso..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0085^ea^ ^b^paṇṇavīsativassāni, yato pabbajito aha^eb^nti yato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ pabbajito tānimāni paṇṇavīsativassāni. ^b^accharāsaṅghātamattampi, cetosantimanajjhaga^eb^nti sohaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caranto accharāsaṅghātamattampi aṅguliphoṭanamattampi khaṇaṃ cetosantiṃ cetaso samādhānaṃ na labhiṃ.

[03] evaṃ pana aladdhā cittassekaggataṃ, tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``kāmarāgena aṭṭito^eb^''ti. tattha ^b^aṭṭito^eb^ti pīḷito, abhibhūtoti attho. ^b^bāhā paggayha kandanto^eb^ti ``idamidha ativiya ayuttaṃ vattati, yadāhaṃ niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ kilesapaṅkato uddharituṃ na sakkomī''ti uddhaṃmukho bāhā paggayha kandamāno. ^b^vihārā upanikkhami^eb^nti vasanakavihārato bahi nikkhanto.

[03] yenādhippāyena nikkhanto, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``satthaṃ vā āharissāmī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^satthaṃ vā āharissāmī^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo vikappanattho. tena ``rukkhā vā papatissāmi, ubbandhitvā vā marissāmī''tiādike maraṇappakāre saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^sikkha^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhaṃ. ^b^paccakkha^eb^nti paccācikkhanto pariccajanto. ``paccakkhā''tipi pāḷi, paccakkhāyāti attho. ^b^kāla^eb^nti maraṇaṃ. kathañhi nāma mādiso sikkhāpaccakkhānena kālaṃ kareyyāti attho. sikkhāpaccakkhānañhi ariyassa vinaye maraṇaṃ nāma. yathāha bhagavā -- ``maraṇañhetaṃ ^a^M2.0099^ea^, bhikkhave, yo sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.63). ``sikkhaṃ paccakkhā''ti pana pāṭhe kathañhi nāma mādiso sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya kālaṃ kareyya, sikkhāsamaṅgī eva pana hutvā kālaṃ kareyya? tasmā satthaṃ vā āharissāmi, ko attho jīvitena meti yojanā.

[03] ^b^tadāha^eb^nti yadā kilesābhibhavena samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya jīvite nibbindanto tadā. ^b^khura^eb^nti nisitakhuraṃ, khurasadisaṃ vā satthakaṃ. ^b^mañcakamhi upāvisi^eb^nti paresaṃ nivāraṇabhayena ovarakaṃ pavisitvā mañcake nisīdiṃ. ^b^parinīto^eb^ti upanīto, gale ṭhapitoti adhippāyo. ^b^dhamani^eb^nti ``kaṇṭhe dhamaniṃ, kaṇṭhadhamaniṃ galavalaya''ntipi vadanti. ^b^chettu^eb^nti chindituṃ.

[03] ^b^tato me manasīkāro, yoniso udapajjathā^eb^ti ``yadāhaṃ marissāmī''ti kaṇṭhe dhamaniṃ chindituṃ khuraṃ upanesiṃ, tato paraṃ ``arogaṃ nu kho me sīla''nti paccavekkhantassa akkhaṇḍaṃ acchiddaṃ suparisuddhaṃ ^a^V2.0086^ea^ sīlaṃ disvā pīti uppajji, pītimanassa kāyo passambhi, passaddhakāyassa nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavantassa cittassa samāhitatāya vipassanāvasena ^a^P2.0174^ea^ yoniso manasikāro uppajji. atha vā tatoti kaṇṭhe khurassa upanayato vaṇe jāte uppannaṃ vedanaṃ vikkhambhento vipassanāya vasena yonisomanasikāro uppajji. idāni tato paraṃ maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ``ādīnavo pāturahū''tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhehī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato kātiyānattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa ^a^M2.0100^ea^ putto hutvā nibbatto, mātugottavasena pana ^b^kātiyāno^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto sāmaññakānittherassa gihisahāyo theraṃ disvā pabbajito samaṇadhammaṃ karonto rattiṃ ``niddābhibhavaṃ vinodessāmī''ti caṅkamaṃ āruhi. so caṅkamanto niddāya abhibhūto pacalāyamāno paripatitvā tattheva anantarahitāya bhūmiyā nipajji, satthā tassa taṃ pavattiṃ disvā sayaṃ tattha gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā ^b^``kātiyānā''^eb^ti saññaṃ adāsi. so satthāraṃ disvā uṭṭhahitvā vanditvā saṃvegajāto aṭṭhāsi. athassa satthā dhammaṃ desento --
[21] ``uṭṭhehi nisīda kātiyāna, mā niddābahulo ahu jāgarassu.
[22] mā taṃ alasaṃ pamattabandhu, kūṭeneva jinātu maccurājā..
[22] so karohi sudīpamattano tvaṃ, na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva aññaṃ..
[21] ``satthā hi vijesi maggametaṃ, saṅgā jātijarābhayā atītaṃ.
[22] mā ^a^P2.0175^ea^ khiḍḍāratiñca mā niddaṃ, anuyuñjittha jhāya kātiyāna..
[22] pappuyya anuttaraṃ visuddhiṃ, parinibbāhisi vārināva joti..
[27] evampi tuvaṃ anādiyāno, māraṃ indasagotta niddhunāhi.
[22] so vedayitāsu vītarāgo, kālaṃ kaṅkha idheva sītibhūto''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^uṭṭhehī^eb^ti niddūpagamanato uṭṭhahanto uṭṭhānavīriyaṃ karohi. yasmā nipajjā nāma kosajjapakkhiyā, tasmā mā sayi. ^b^nisīdā^eb^ti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā nisīda. ^b^kātiyānā^eb^ti taṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^mā niddābahulo ahū^eb^ti niddābahulo niddābhibhūto mā ahu. ^b^jāgarassū^eb^ti jāgara, jāgariyamanuyutto hohi. ^b^mā taṃ alasa^eb^nti jāgariyaṃ ananuyuñjantaṃ taṃ alasaṃ kusītaṃ pamattabandhu maccurājā ^b^kūṭeneva^eb^ adduhanena viya nesādo migaṃ vā pakkhiṃ vā jarārogehi mā jinātu mā abhibhavatu, mā ajjhottharatūti attho.

[03] ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^ti seyyathā api. ^b^mahāsamuddavego^eb^ti mahāsamuddassa ūmivego. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā nāma mahāsamuddaūmivego uparūpari uṭṭhahanto taṃ abhikkamituṃ asakkontaṃ purisaṃ abhibhavati, evaṃ jāti jarā ca kosajjābhibhūtaṃ taṃ ^b^ativattate^eb^ uparūpari ajjhottharati. ^b^so karohī^eb^ti so tvaṃ, kātiyāna, catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^sudīpaṃ attano karohi^eb^ attano santāne uppādehi. ^b^na hi tāṇaṃ tava vijjateva añña^eb^nti ^b^hī^eb^ti hetuatthe nipāto. yasmā tato aggaphalato aññaṃ tava tāṇaṃ nāma idha vā huraṃ vā na upalabbhati, tasmā taṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ sudīpaṃ karohīti.

[03] ^b^satthā hi vijesi maggameta^eb^nti yaṃ sādhetuṃ avisahantā yato parājitā puthū aññatitthiyā, tadetaṃ tassa sudīpassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ pañcavidhasaṅgato jātiādibhayato ca atītaṃ ariyamaggaṃ devaputtamārādike abhibhavitvā tuyhaṃ satthā vijesi sādhesi. yasmā satthu santakaṃ ^a^M2.0102^ea^ nāma sāvakena adhigantabbaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ, tasmā tassa adhigamāya pubbarattāpararattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca ^a^P2.0176^ea^, ^b^appamatto^eb^ sato sampajāno hutvā ^b^anuyuñja yogaṃ^eb^ bhāvanaṃ daḷhañca karohi.
