[03] ^b^purimāni pamuñca bandhanānī^eb^ti purimakāni gihikāle ābaddhāni gihibandhanāni kāmaguṇabandhanāni pamuñca vissajjehi, tattha anapekkho hohi. ^b^saṅghāṭikhuramuṇḍabhikkhabhojī^eb^ti saṅghāṭidhārī ^a^V2.0088^ea^ khurena katasiramuṇḍo bhikkhāhārabhojī, tividhampetaṃ purimabandhanapamokkhassa khiḍḍāratiniddānanuyogassa ca kāraṇavacanaṃ. yasmā tvaṃ saṅghāṭipāruto muṇḍo bhikkhāhāro jīvati, tasmā te kāmasukhānuyogo khiḍḍāratiniddānuyogo ca na yuttoti tato purimāni pamuñca bandhanāni khiḍḍāratiṃ niddañca mānuyuñjitthāti yojanā. ^b^jhāyā^eb^ti jhāyassu ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ ^b^anuyuñja^eb^.

[03] taṃ pana anuyuñjanto yena jhānena jhāyato kilesā sabbaso jitā honti, taṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ anuyuñjāti dassento ^b^``jhāyāhi jināhī''^eb^ti āha. ^b^yogakkhemapathesu kovidosī^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa pathabhūtesu bodhipakkhiyadhammesu kusalo cheko asi, tasmā bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpento ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^ uttararahitaṃ, ^b^visuddhiṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ arahattañca ^b^pappuyya^eb^ pāpuṇitvā pana tvaṃ parinibbāhisi. ^b^vārināva jotī^eb^ti mahatā salilavuṭṭhinipātena aggikhandho viya ariyamaggavuṭṭhinipātena parinibbāyissati.

[03] ^b^pajjotakaro^eb^ti pajjotiṃ karo padīpo. ^b^parittaraṃso^eb^ti khuddakacciko. ^b^vinamyate^eb^ti vinamīyati apaniyyati. ^b^latāvā^eb^ti valli viya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā vaṭṭiādipaccayavekallena parittaraṃso mandapabho padīpo appikā latā vā vātena vidhamiyyati viddhaṃsiyyati, evaṃ tuvampi. kosiyagottatāya, ^b^indasagotta,^eb^ indasamānagottaṃ. māraṃ tassa vase anāvattanā anupādānato ca ^b^anādiyāno, niddhunāhi^eb^ vidhamehi viddhaṃsehi. evaṃ pana viddhaṃsamāno so tvaṃ vedayitāsu sabbāsu vedanāsu vigatacchandarāgo ^b^idheva^eb^ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhābhāvena ^b^sītibhūto^eb^ nibbuto attano parinibbānakālaṃ ^b^kaṅkha^eb^ āgamehīti ^a^M2.0103^ea^. evaṃ satthārā anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpetvā desanāya katāya thero desanāvasāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. arahattaṃ pana patvā satthārā desitaniyāmeneva imā gāthā abhāsi. tā eva imā gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇañca jātā.

[03] ^b^sudesito^eb^tiādikā ^a^P2.0177^ea^ āyasmato migajālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ visākhāya ^a^V2.0089^ea^ mahāupāsikāya putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^migajālo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vihāraṃ gantvā abhiṇhaso dhammassavanena paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] mahākhemaṅgamo santo, pariyosānabhaddako''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0104^ea^ ^b^sudesito^eb^ti suṭṭhu desito, veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ yāthāvato vibhāvanavasena desitoti attho. atha vā ^b^sudesito^eb^ti sammā desito, pavattinivattīnaṃ tadubhayahetūnañca aviparītato pakāsanavasena bhāsito svākhyātoti attho. ^b^cakkhumatā^eb^ti maṃsacakkhu, dibbacakkhu, paññācakkhu, buddhacakkhu, samantacakkhūti imehi pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumatā. ^b^buddhenā^eb^ti sabbaññubuddhena. ^b^ādiccabandhunā^eb^ti ādiccagottena. duvidho hi loke khattiyavaṃso -- ādiccavaṃso, somavaṃsoti. tattha ādiccavaṃso, okkākarājavaṃsoti jānitabbaṃ. tato sañjātatāya sākiyā ādiccagottāti bhagavā ``ādiccabandhū''ti vuccati. atha vā ādiccassa bandhūtipi bhagavā ādiccabandhu, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ samatikkamanabhāvato ^b^sabbasaṃyojanātīto^eb^ tato eva kilesakammavipākavaṭṭānaṃ vināsanato viddhaṃsanato ^b^sabbavaṭṭavināsano,^eb^ saṃsāracārakato ^a^P2.0178^ea^ niyyānato ^b^niyyāniko,^eb^ saṃsāramahoghato samuttaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^uttaraṇo,^eb^ kāmataṇhādīnaṃ sabbataṇhānaṃ mūlaṃ avijjaṃ ayoniso manasikārañca visoseti sukkhāpetīti ^b^taṇhāmūlavisosano,^eb^ tiṇṇampi vedānaṃ sampaṭivedhassa ^a^V2.0090^ea^ viddhaṃsanato visassa dukkhassa kāraṇattā ^b^visamūlaṃ,^eb^ sattānaṃ byasanuppattiṭṭhānatāya ^b^āghātanaṃ^eb^ kammaṃ kilesaṃ vā ^b^chetvā^eb^ samucchinditvā ^b^nibbutiṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ pāpeti.

[03] aññāṇassa mūlaṃ ayoniso manasikāro āsavā ca ``āsavasamudayā avijjāsamudayo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.103) hi vuttaṃ, tassa ^b^bhedāya^eb^ vajirūpamañāṇena bhindanatthāya. atha vā ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''tiādivacanato (vibha0 225-226; saṃ0 ni0 2.1) aññāṇaṃ mūlaṃ etassāti aññāṇamūlaṃ, bhavacakkaṃ, tassa maggañāṇavajirena padālanatthaṃ desitoti sambandho. ^b^kammayantavighāṭano^eb^ti kammaghaṭitassa attabhāvayantassa viddhaṃsano. ^b^viññāṇānaṃ pariggahe^eb^ti kāmabhavādīsu yathāsakakammunā viññāṇaggahaṇe upaṭṭhiteti vacanaseso. tattha tattha hi bhave paṭisandhiyā gahitāya taṃtaṃbhavanissitaviññāṇānipi gahitāneva honti. ^b^ñāṇavajiranipātano^eb^ti ñāṇavajirassa ^a^M2.0105^ea^ nipāto, ñāṇavajiraṃ nipātetvā tesaṃ padāletā. lokuttaradhammo hi uppajjamāno sattamabhavādīsu uppajjanārahāni viññāṇāni bhindattameva uppajjatīti.

[03] ^b^vedanānaṃ viññāpano^eb^ti sukhādīnaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ dukkhasallāniccavasena yāthāvato pavedako. ^b^upādānappamocano^eb^ti kāmupādānādīhi catūhipi upādānehi cittasantānassa vimocako. ^b^bhavaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃva, ñāṇena anupassano^eb^ti kāmabhavādinavavidhampi bhavaṃ ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato sādhikaporisaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ viya maggañāṇena anupaccakkhato dassetā.

[01] santapaṇītabhāvato atittikaraṭṭhena ^b^mahāraso^eb^ pariññādivasena vā mahākiccatāya sāmaññaphalavasena mahāsampattitāya ca ^b^mahāraso,^eb^ anupacitasambhārehi duravagāhatāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhatāya ca ^b^suṭṭhu gambhīro jarāmaccunivāraṇo,^eb^ āyatiṃ bhavābhinipphattiyā nivattanena jarāya maccuno ca paṭisedhako. idāni yathāvuttaguṇavisesayuttaṃ dhammaṃ sarūpato dassento ^b^``ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko''^eb^ti vatvā punapi tassa katipaye guṇe vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``dukkhūpasamano sivo^eb^''tiādimāha. tassattho -- parisuddhaṭṭhena ^b^ariyo,^eb^ sammādiṭṭhiādiaṭṭhadhammasamodhānatāya ^b^aṭṭhaṅgiko,^eb^ nibbānagavesanaṭṭhena ^b^maggo^eb^ sakalavaṭṭadukkhavūpasamanaṭṭhena ^a^P2.0179^ea^ ^b^dukkhavūpasamano,^eb^ khemaṭṭhena ^b^sivo^eb^.

[03] yathā ito bāhirakasamaye asammāsambuddhapaveditattā kammavipāko vipallāso siyāti evaṃ avipallāsetvā ^b^paṭiccuppannadhammānaṃ^eb^ paṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kammaṃ kammanti vipākañca vipākato ^a^V2.0091^ea^ ñatvāna pubbabhāgañāṇena jānanahetu sassatucchedaggāhānaṃ vidhamanena yāthāvato ālokadassano takkarassa lokuttarañāṇālokassa dassano. kenaci kañci kadācipi anupaddutattā mahākhemaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati satte gameti cāti ^b^mahākhemaṅgamo,^eb^ sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamanato ^b^santo,^eb^ akuppāya cetovimuttiyā anupādisesāya ca nibbānadhātuyā pāpanena ^b^pariyosānabhaddako^eb^ sudesito cakkhumatāti yojanā.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0106^ea^ thero nānānayehi ariyadhammaṃ pasaṃsanto tassa dhammassa attanā adhigatabhāvaṃ aññāpadesena pakāsesi.

[03] ^b^jātimadena mattoha^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato jentattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño purohitassa putto hutvā nibbatti, tassa ^b^jento^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto jātimadena bhogaissariyarūpamadena ca matto aññe hīḷento garuṭṭhāniyānampi apacitiṃ akaronto mānathaddho vicarati. so ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ mahatiyā parisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā upasaṅkamanto ``sace maṃ samaṇo gotamo paṭhamaṃ ālapissati, ahampi ālapissāmi; no ce, nālapissāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādetvā upasaṅkamitvā ṭhito bhagavati paṭhamaṃ anālapante sayampi mānena anālapitvā gamanākāraṃ dassesi. taṃ bhagavā --
[25] gāthāya ^a^P2.0180^ea^ ajjhabhāsi. so ``cittaṃ me samaṇo gotamo jānātī''ti abhippasanno bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā paramanipaccākāraṃ katvā --
[21] ``kesu na mānaṃ kayirātha, kesu cassa sagāravo.
[22] kyassa apacitā assu, kyassu sādhu supūjitā''ti.. --
[21] ``tesu ^a^M2.0107^ea^ na mānaṃ kayirātha, tesu assa sagāravo.
[22] kyassa apacitā assu, tyassu sādhu supūjitā..
[22] nihacca mānaṃ atthaddho, te namasse anuttare''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.201) --
[25] pañhaṃ vissajjento dhammaṃ desesi. so tāya desanāya sotāpanno hutvā pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattikittanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --

[03] tattha ^b^jātimadena mattoha^eb^nti ahaṃ udicce brāhmaṇakule nibbatto, ``na mādiso ubhato sujāto añño atthī''ti kulamānena matto mānathaddho acārinti yojanā. ^b^bhogaissariyena cā^eb^ti vibhavena ādhipaccena ca hetubhūtena bhogasampadañca issariyasampadañca paṭicca uppannamadena matto ahaṃ acārinti yojanā. ^b^saṇṭhānavaṇṇarūpenā^eb^ti saṇṭhānaṃ ^a^M2.0108^ea^ ārohapariṇāhasampatti, vaṇṇo ^a^P2.0181^ea^ odātasāmatādichavisampatti, rūpaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasobhā. idhāpi vuttanayena yojanā veditabbā. ^b^madamatto^eb^ti vuttappakārato aññenapi madena matto.

[03] ^b^nāttano^eb^ ^a^V2.0093^ea^ ^b^samakaṃ kañcī^eb^ti attano samakaṃ sadisaṃ jātiādīhi samānaṃ atirekaṃ vā kañci na maññisaṃ na maññiṃ, mayā samānampi na maññiṃ, kuto adhikanti adhippāyo. ^b^atimānahato bālo^eb^ti bālo ahaṃ tato bālabhāvato atimānena khatūpahatakusalācāro, tato eva ^b^patthaddho ussitaddhajo^eb^ thambhavasena garūnampi nipaccakārassa akaraṇato bhusaṃ thaddho anonamanathaddhajāto ussitamānaddhajo.

[03] vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``mātara''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^aññe^eb^ti jeṭṭhabhātuādike, samaṇabrāhmaṇe ca. ^b^garusammate^eb^ti garūti sammate garuṭṭhāniye. ^b^anādaro^eb^ti ādararahito.

[03] ^b^disvā vināyakaṃ agga^eb^nti evaṃ mānathaddho hutvā vicaranto diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi veneyyānaṃ vinayanato sayambhutāya nāyakabhāvato ca vināyakaṃ. sadevake loke sīlādiguṇehi seṭṭhabhāvato aggaṃ. purisadammānaṃ accantatāya damanato ^b^sārathīnaṃ varuttamaṃ,^eb^ ativiya uttamaṃ byāmappabhādiobhāsena ādiccamiva ^b^tapantaṃ,^eb^ obhāsantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ sabbasattānaṃ uttamaṃ satthāraṃ disvā buddhānubhāvena santajjito ``ahameva seṭṭho, aññe hīnā''ti pavattamānaṃ bhogamadādimadañca ^b^chaḍḍetvā^eb^ pahāya vippasannena cetasā sirasā abhivādesinti yojanā. kathaṃ panāyaṃ mānathaddho samāno satthu dassanamattena mānaṃ pahāsīti? na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. satthu dassanamattena mānaṃ na pahāsi ``na mānaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sādhū''tiādikāya pana desanāya mānaṃ pahāsi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``mānaṃ madañca chaḍḍetvā, vippasannena cetasā. sirasā abhivādesi''nti. ^b^vippasannena cetasā^eb^ti ca itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[01] ``ahameva ^a^M2.0109^ea^ seṭṭho''ti pavatto māno ^b^atimāno^eb^. ``ime pana nihīnā''ti aññe hīnato dahantassa māno ^b^``omāno''^eb^ti vadanti. ``seyyohamasmī''ti pana aññaṃ atikkamitvā attānaṃ seyyato dahantassa pavatto seyyamāno ^b^atimāno^eb^. ``hīnohamasmī''ti pavatto hīnamāno ^b^omāno. pahīnā susamūhatā^eb^ti heṭṭhimamaggehi pahīnā hutvā aggamaggena suṭṭhu samugghāṭitā. ^b^asmimāno^eb^ti ``esohamasmī''ti khandhe ``aha''nti ^a^P2.0182^ea^ gahaṇavasena pavattamāno. ^b^sabbe^eb^ti na kevalaṃ atimānaomānāsmimānā eva, atha kho seyyassa seyyamānādayo navavidhā antarabhedena anekavidhā ca sabbe mānavidhā mānakoṭṭhāsā ^b^hatā^eb^ aggamaggena samugghāṭitāti.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ ^a^V2.0094^ea^ ^b^navo pabbajito^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sumanattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto sikhissa bhagavato kāle mālākārakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ sikhiṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā pasannamānaso sumanapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aññatarassa upāsakassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. so ca upāsako āyasmato anuruddhattherassa upaṭṭhāko ahosi. tassa ca tato pubbe jātājātā dārakā mariṃsu. tena so ``sacāhaṃ idāni ekaṃ puttaṃ labhissāmi, ayyassa anuruddhattherassa santike pabbājessāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādesi. so ca dasamāsaccayena jāto arogoyeva hutvā anukkamena vaḍḍhento sattavassiko ahosi, taṃ pitā therassa santike pabbājesi. so pabbajitvā tato paripakkañāṇattā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño hutvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahanto ``pānīyaṃ āharissāmī''ti ghaṭaṃ ādāya iddhiyā anotattadahaṃ agamāsi. atheko micchādiṭṭhiko nāgarājā anotattadahaṃ paṭicchādento sattakkhattuṃ bhogena parikkhipitvā ^a^M2.0110^ea^ upari mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā sumanassa pānīyaṃ gahetuṃ okāsaṃ na deti. sumano garuḷarūpaṃ gahetvā taṃ nāgarājaṃ abhibhavitvā pānīyaṃ gahetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ uddissa ākāsena gacchati. taṃ satthā jetavane nisinno tathā gacchantaṃ disvā dhammasenāpatiṃ āmantetvā, ``sāriputta, imaṃ passā''tiādinā catūhi gāthāhi tassa guṇe abhāsi. atha sumanatthero --
[22] āharāmi tato disvā, maṃ satthā etadabravi..
[22] sāmaṇero sa sumano, mā maṃ jaññāti icchatī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ādito dve gāthā sumanatthereneva bhāsitā, itarā catasso taṃ pasaṃsantena satthārā bhāsitā. tā sabbā ekajjhaṃ katvā sumanatthero pacchā aññābyākaraṇavasena abhāsi. tattha ^b^pannaginda^eb^nti nāgarājaṃ. ^b^tato^eb^ti tattha, yadā navo pabbajito jātiyā sattavassiko iddhibalena mahiddhikaṃ nāgarājaṃ abhibhavitvā anotattadahato upajjhāyassa pānīyaṃ āharāmi, tasmiṃ kāleti attho.

[03] maṃ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ uddissa mayhaṃ satthā etadabravi, taṃ dassento, ^b^``sāriputta, imaṃ passā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^ajjhattaṃ susamāhita^eb^nti visayajjhattabhūtena aggaphalasamādhinā suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ.

[03] ^b^pāsādikena vattenā^eb^ti passantānaṃ pasādāvahena ācāravattena, karaṇatthe idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^kalyāṇairiyāpatho^eb^ti sampanniriyāpatho. pāsādikena vattenāti vā itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaṇyaṃ, sāmaññanti attho. tadatthaṃ īrati pavattatīti sāmaṇero, samaṇuddeso. ^b^iddhiyā ca visārado^eb^ti iddhiyampi byatto sukusalo. ^b^ājānīyenā^eb^ti purisājānīyena. attahitaparahitānaṃ sādhanato ^b^sādhunā^eb^ katakiccena anuruddhena ^b^sādhu^eb^ ubhayahitasādhako, suṭṭhu vā ājañño ^b^kārito^eb^ damito. aggavijjāya ^b^vinīto^eb^ asekkhabhāvāpādanena ^b^sikkhito^eb^ sikkhāpitoti attho.

[03] so sāmaṇero sumano paramaṃ ^b^santiṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^patvā^eb^ aggamaggādhigamena adhigantvā ^b^sacchikatvā^eb^ attapaccakkhaṃ katvā ^b^akuppataṃ^eb^ arahattaphalaṃ appicchabhāvassa paramukkaṃsagatattā ^b^mā maṃ jaññā^eb^ti maṃ ``ayaṃ khīṇāsavo''ti vā ``chaḷabhiñño''ti vā kocipi mā jāneyyāti ^b^icchati^eb^ abhikaṅkhatīti.

[03] ^b^vātarogābhinīto^eb^tiādikā ^a^V2.0096^ea^ ^a^P2.0184^ea^ āyasmato nhātakamunissa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto vijjāṭṭhānādīsu nipphattiṃ gato nhātakalakkhaṇayogena ^b^nhātako^eb^ti paññāyittha. so tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā rājagahassa tiyojanappamāṇe ṭhāne araññāyatane nīvārehi yāpento aggiṃ paricārayamāno vasati. tassa satthā ghaṭe viya padīpaṃ hadayabbhantare pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā assamapadaṃ agamāsi. so bhagavantaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho attano ^a^M2.0112^ea^ upakappananiyāmena āhāraṃ upanesi. taṃ bhagavā paribhuñji. evaṃ tayo divase datvā catutthadivase ``bhagavā tumhe paramasukhumālā, kathaṃ iminā āhārena yāpethā''ti āha. tassa satthā ariyasantosaguṇaṃ pakāsento dhammaṃ desesi. tāpaso taṃ sutvā sotāpanno hutvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. bhagavā taṃ arahatte patiṭṭhapetvā gato. so pana tattheva viharanto aparabhāge vātābādhena upadduto ahosi. satthā tattha gantvā paṭisanthāramukhena tassa vihāraṃ pucchanto --
[22] paviddhagocare lūkhe, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasī''ti.. -- gāthamāha. atha thero --
[21] ``ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, ye me vijjiṃsu āsavā.
[22] sabbe asesā ucchinnā, na ca uppajjare puna..
[25] imāhi sesagāthāhi attano vihāraṃ satthu pavedesi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0097^ea^ ^b^jhānasokhummasampanno^eb^ti jhānasukhumabhāvena samannāgato. jhānasukhumaṃ nāma arūpajjhānaṃ, tasmā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhimhīti vuttaṃ hoti. tena attano ubhatobhāgavimuttitaṃ dasseti. apare panāhu -- ``sokhummanti aggamaggaphalesu adhipaññāsikkhā ^a^P2.0185^ea^ adhippetā, tato jhānaggahaṇena ^a^M2.0113^ea^ attano ubhatobhāgavimuttitaṃ vibhāvetī''ti. ^b^vippamuttaṃ kilesehī^eb^ti paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā sabbakilesehi vimuttaṃ, tato eva ^b^suddhacittaṃ,^eb^ anāvilasaṅkappatāya ^b^anāvilaṃ,^eb^ tīhipi padehi arahattaphalacittameva vadati. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. imameva ca therassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ ahosīti.

[03] ^b^akkodhassā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato brahmadattattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^brahmadatto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto jetavanamahe buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi chaḷabhiñño ahosi. taṃ ekadivasaṃ nagare piṇḍāya carantaṃ aññataro brāhmaṇo akkosi. thero taṃ sutvāpi tuṇhībhūto piṇḍāya caratiyeva, brāhmaṇo punapi akkosiyeva. manussā evaṃ akkosantampi naṃ ``ayaṃ thero na kiñci bhaṇatī''ti āhaṃsu. taṃ sutvā thero tesaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desento --
[22] paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati..
[21] ``ubhinnaṃ tikicchantaṃ taṃ, attano ca parassa ca.
[22] janā maññanti bāloti, ye dhammassa akovidā.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.189).
[22] uppajje ce rase taṇhā, puttamaṃsūpamaṃ sara..
[21] ``sace dhāvati cittaṃ te, kāmesu ca bhavesu ca.
[22] khippaṃ niggaṇha satiyā, kiṭṭhādaṃ viya duppasu''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^akkodhassā^eb^ti kodharahitassa maggena samucchinnakodhassa. ^b^kuto kodho^eb^ti kuto nāma hetu kodho uppajjeyya, tassa uppattikāraṇaṃ natthīti attho. ^b^dantassā^eb^ti uttamena damena aggamaggadamathena dantassa. ^b^samajīvino^eb^ti kāyavisamādīni sabbaso pahāya kāyasamādīnaṃ vasena samaṃ jīvantassa sattaṭṭhāniyena sampajaññena sammadeva vattantassa. ^b^sammadaññā vimuttassā^eb^ti sammā aññāya abhiññeyyādike dhamme jānitvā sabbāsavehi vippamuttassa. tato eva sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena ^b^upasantassa^eb^. iṭṭhādīsu tādilakkhaṇappattiyā ^b^tādino^eb^ khīṇāsavassa kuto kodhoti aññāpadesena thero attano kodhābhāvaṃ tassa ca kāraṇāni vatvā idāni kodhe akodhe ca ādīnavānisaṃsadassanena dhammaṃ kathento ^b^``tassevā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhatī^eb^ti yo puggalo attano upari kuddhaṃ kupitaṃ puggalaṃ paṭikujjhati, tasseva tena paṭikujjhanapaccakkosanapaṭippaharaṇādinā ^b^pāpiyo^eb^ idhaloke viññūgarahādivasena paraloke nirayadukkhādivasena abhaddakataraṃ akalyāṇataraṃ hoti. kujjhanena pana akuddhassa pāpaṃ hotīti vattabbameva natthi. keci pana ``yo akuddhaṃ paṭikuddhaṃ ārabbha kujjhatī''ti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^kuddhaṃ appaṭikujjhanto^eb^ti yo pana kuddhaṃ puggalaṃ ``ayaṃ kuddho kodhapareto''ti ñatvā na paṭikujjhati khamati, so ^b^dujjayaṃ^eb^ kilesasaṅgāmaṃ jeti nāma. na kevalañcassa kilesasaṅgāmajayo eva, atha kho ubhayahitapaṭipattimpīti dassento āha ^b^``ubhinnamatthaṃ...pe0... upasammatī''^eb^ti. yo ^b^paraṃ^eb^ puggalaṃ ^b^saṅkupitaṃ^eb^ kuddhaṃ ``kodhapareto''ti ñatvā taṃ mettāyanto ajjhupekkhanto vā sato ^a^M2.0115^ea^ sampajāno hutvā ^b^upasammati^eb^ khamati na paṭippharati. so ^b^attano ca parassa cā^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ ubhayalokasukhāvahaṃ ^b^atthaṃ^eb^ hitaṃ carati.

[03] ^b^ubhinnaṃ tikicchantaṃ ta^eb^nti taṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kodhabyādhitikicchāya tikicchantaṃ khamantaṃ puggalaṃ ye janā ^b^dhammassa^eb^ ariyācāradhamme akusalā, te bālā ``ayaṃ aviddasu yo attānaṃ akkosantassa paharantassa kiñci na karotī''ti maññanti ^a^P2.0187^ea^, taṃ tesaṃ ayoniso maññananti adhippāyo. ``tikicchana''ntipi paṭhanti, tikicchanasabhāvanti attho.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0099^ea^ therena vuccamānaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā akkosakabrāhmaṇo saṃviggo pasannacitto ca hutvā theraṃ khamāpetvā tasseva santike pabbaji. thero tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ dento ``imassa mettābhāvanā yuttā''ti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā kodhapariyuṭṭhānādīsu paccavekkhaṇādividhiṃ dassento ^b^``uppajje te''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^uppajje te sace^eb^ti sace te kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa kañci puggalaṃ nissāya ciraparicayo kodho uppajjeyya, tassa vūpasamāya --
[02] ``ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṃ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro''ti (ma0 ni0 1.232) --
[25] satthārā vuttaṃ kakacūpamaṃ ovādaṃ āvajjehi. ^b^uppajje ce rase taṇhā^eb^ti sace te madhurādibhede rase taṇhā abhilāso uppajjeyya, tassa vūpasamāya --
[02] ``puttamaṃsaṃ jāyampatikā yathā kantāranittharaṇatthameva khādiṃsu, na rasataṇhāya evaṃ kulaputtopi pabbajito piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati...pe0... phāsuvihāro cā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.63 atthato samānaṃ) --

[03] ^b^sace dhāvati te citta^eb^nti ayoniso manasi karoto tava cittaṃ ^b^kāmesu^eb^ pañcakāmaguṇesu chandarāgavasena, kāmabhavādīsu ^b^bhavesu^eb^ bhavapatthanāvasena sace dhāvati sarati javati. ^b^khippaṃ niggaṇha satiyā, kiṭṭhādaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0116^ea^ ^b^viya duppasu^eb^nti tathā dhāvituṃ adento yathā nāma puriso kiṭṭhādaṃ sassakhādakaṃ duppasuṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ yottena thambhe bandhitvā attano vase vatteti, evaṃ satiyā satiyottena sammādhithambhe bandhanto khippaṃ sīghameva niggaṇha, yathā kilesavigamena nibbisevanaṃ hoti, tathā damehīti. keci pana ``thero puthujjanova hutvā akkosaṃ adhivāsento tesaṃ manussānaṃ ariyaguṇe pakāsento dhammaṃ kathetvā pacchā dvīhi gāthāhi attānaṃ ovadanto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ byākaronto imāyeva gāthā abhāsī''ti vadanti.

[01] ^b^channamativassatī^eb^tiādikā ^a^V2.0100^ea^ āyasmato sirimaṇḍattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde saṃsumāragire brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^a^P2.0188^ea^ ^b^sirimaṇḍo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto bhesakalāvane bhagavati viharante satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ekasmiṃ uposathadivase pātimokkhuddesaṭṭhāne nisinno nidānuddesassa pariyosāne ``āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī''ti (mahāva0 134) pāḷiyā atthaṃ upadhārento āpannaṃ āpattiṃ anāvikatvā paṭicchādento uparūpari āpattiyo āpajjati, tenassa na phāsu hoti, āvikatvā pana yathādhammaṃ paṭikarontassa phāsu hotīti imamatthaṃ manasi katvā ``aho satthu sāsanaṃ suvisuddha''nti laddhappasādo tathā uppannaṃ pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pasannamānaso bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento --
[22] tasmā channaṃ vivaretha, evaṃ taṃ nātivassati..
[22] paccuggantuṃ balaṃ natthi, javo natthi palāyituṃ..
[22] yaṃ yaṃ vijahate rattiṃ, tadūnaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ..
[22] upeti carimā ratti, na te kālo pamajjitu''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^channa^eb^nti chāditaṃ yathābhūtaṃ avivaṭaṃ appakāsitaṃ duccaritaṃ. ^b^ativassatī^eb^ti āpattivassañceva kilesavassañca ativiya vassati. āpattiyā hi chādanaṃ alajjibhāvādinā ^a^V2.0101^ea^ tādisova, chādanena tato aññathāva punapi tathārūpaṃ tato vā pāpiṭṭhataraṃ āpattiṃ āpajjeyyāti chādanaṃ vassanassa kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^vivaṭa^eb^nti pakāsitaṃ appaṭicchannaṃ. ^b^nātivassatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^atī^eb^ti upasaggamattaṃ, na vassatīti attho. avassanañcettha vuttavipariyāyena veditabbaṃ cittasantānassa visodhitattā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati, channassa duccaritassa āpattivassādīnaṃ ativassanato vivaṭassa ca avassanatoti attho. ^b^channaṃ vivarethā^eb^ti puthujjanabhāvena chādanādhippāye uppannepi taṃ ^a^P2.0189^ea^ ananuvattitvā vivaretha āvikareyya, yathādhammaṃ paṭikareyya. ^b^eva^eb^nti vivaraṇena yathādhammaṃ paṭipattiyā. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ channaṃ duccaritaṃ. ^b^nātivassati^eb^ āpattivassaṃ kilesavassañca na vassati, suddhante puggalaṃ patiṭṭhapetīti attho.

[03] idāni ^a^M2.0118^ea^ ``ekaṃsena sīghaṃyeva ca attā sodhetabbo, appamādo kātabbo''ti tassa kāraṇaṃ saṃvegavatthuṃ dassento ^b^``maccunābbhāhato loko''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^maccunābbhāhato loko^eb^ti ayaṃ sabbopi sattaloko coro viya coraghātakena, sabbavaṭṭanipātinā maccunā maraṇena abhihato, na tassa hatthato muccati. ^b^jarāya parivārito^eb^ti ayaṃ loko uppādato uddhaṃ maraṇūpanayanarasāya jarāya parivārito ajjhotthaṭo, jarāsaṅghātaparimukkoti attho. ^b^taṇhāsallena otiṇṇo^eb^ti sarīrassa anto nimuggena visapītakhurappena viya upādānalakkhaṇena taṇhāsaṅkhātena sallena otiṇṇo hadayabbhantare ogāḷho. taṇhā hi pīḷājananato anto tudanato duruddhārato ca ``sallo''ti vuccati. ^b^icchādhūpāyito^eb^ti ārammaṇābhipatthanalakkhaṇāya icchāya santāpito. taṃ visayaṃ icchanto hi puggalo yadicchitaṃ visayaṃ labhanto vā alabhanto vā tāya eva anudahanalakkhaṇāya icchāya santatto pariḷāhappatto hoti. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ, idañca padaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^parikkhitto jarāya cā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ maccunā abbhāhatoyeva, atha kho jarāya ca parikkhitto. jarāya samavaruddho jarāpākāraparikkhitto, na taṃ samatikkamatīti attho. ^b^haññati niccamattāṇo^eb^ti atāṇo asaraṇo hutvā niccakālaṃ jarāmaraṇehi haññati vibādhīyati. yathā kiṃ? ^b^pattadaṇḍova takkaro^eb^ yathā takkaro coro katāparādho vajjhappatto atāṇo rājāṇāya haññati, evamayaṃ loko jarāmaraṇehīti dasseti.

[03] ^b^āgacchantaggikhandhāvā^eb^ti mahāvane ḍayhamāne taṃ abhibhavantā mahantā aggikkhandhā viya maccu byādhi jarāti ime tayo anudahanaṭṭhena aggikkhandhā imaṃ sattalokaṃ abhibhavantā āgacchanti ^a^V2.0102^ea^, tesaṃ pana paṭibalo hutvā ^b^paccuggantuṃ^eb^ abhibhavituṃ ^b^balaṃ^eb^ ussāho natthi, imassa lokassa, ^b^javo natthi palāyituṃ^eb^ javantesu, ajjhottharantesu. yattha te nābhibhavanti, piṭṭhiṃ dassetvā tato palāyitumpi imassa lokassa jaṅghājavo natthi, evaṃ ^a^M2.0119^ea^ attanā asamattho māyādīhi upāyehi appaṭikāre tividhe balavati paccāmitte niccupaṭṭhite kiṃ kātabbanti ce? ^b^amoghaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0190^ea^ ^b^divasaṃ kayirā, appena bahukena vā^eb^ti appena antamaso gaddūhanamattampi kālaṃ pavattitena bahukena vā sakalaṃ ahorattaṃ pavattitena vipassanāmanasikārena amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ divasaṃ kareyya, yasmā ^b^yaṃ yaṃ vijahate rattiṃ, tadūnaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ^eb^ ayaṃ satto yaṃ yaṃ rattiṃ vijahati nāseti khepeti, tadūnaṃ tena ūnaṃ tassa sattassa jīvitaṃ hoti. etena rattikkhayo nāma jīvitakkhayo tassa anivattanatoti dasseti. tenāha --
[22] abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī''ti.. (jā0 1.15.363).

[03] na kevalaṃ rattivaseneva, atha kho iriyāpathavasenāpi jīvitakkhayo upadhāretabboti āha ^b^``carato''^eb^tiādi. ^b^carato^eb^ti gacchantassa. ^b^tiṭṭhato^eb^ti ṭhitaṃ kappentassa. ^b^āsīnasayanassa vā^eb^ti āsīnassa sayanassa vā, nisinnassa nipajjantassa vāti attho. ``āsīdana''ntipi paṭhanti, tattha sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^upeti carimā rattī^eb^ti carimakacittasahitā ratti upagacchati, rattiggahaṇañcettha desanāsīsamattaṃ. gamanādīsu yena kenaci iriyāpathena samaṅgībhūtassa carimakāloyeva, tenevassa iriyāpathakkhaṇā jīvitaṃ khepetvā eva gacchanti, tasmā ^b^na te kālo pamajjituṃ^eb^ nāyaṃ tuyhaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjituṃ kālo ``imasmiṃ nāma kāle maraṇaṃ na hotī''ti aviditattā. vuttaṃ hi --
[22] kasirañca parittañca, tañca dukkhena saṃyuta''nti.. (su0 ni0 579).
[03] tasmā evaṃ attānaṃ ovaditvā appamattena tīsu sikkhāsu anuyogo kātabboti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^dvipādako^eb^tiādikā ^a^M2.0120^ea^ ^a^V2.0103^ea^ āyasmato sabbakāmittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane uppannaṃ abbudaṃ sodhetvā paṭipākatikaṃ ṭhapentaṃ ekaṃ theraṃ disvā, ``ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane abbudaṃ sodhetvā paṭipākatikaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samattho bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadanurūpāni puññāni katvā ^a^P2.0191^ea^ devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde aparinibbute eva bhagavati vesāliyaṃ khattiyakule nibbattitvā ^b^sabbakāmo^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto ñātakehi dārapariggahaṃ kārito nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya gharāvāsaṃ jigucchanto dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa santike pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto upajjhāyena saddhiṃ vesāliṃ upagato ñātigharaṃ agamāsi. tattha naṃ purāṇadutiyikā pativiyogadukkhitā kisā dubbaṇṇā analaṅkatā kiliṭṭhavatthanivasanā vanditvā rodamānā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. taṃ disvā therassa karuṇāpurassaraṃ mettaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato anubhūtārammaṇe ayonisomanasikāravasena sahasā kileso uppajji.

[03] so tena kasāhi tāḷito ājānīyo viya sañjātasaṃvego tāvadeva susānaṃ gantvā, asubhanimittaṃ uggahetvā, tattha paṭiladdhajhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā, vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. athassa sasuro alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ dhītaraṃ ādāya mahatā parivārena naṃ uppabbājetukāmo vihāraṃ agamāsi. thero tassā adhippāyaṃ ñatvā attano kāmesu virattabhāvaṃ sabbattha ca anupalittataṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā.

[03] tattha ^b^dvipādako^eb^ti yadipi apādakādayopi kāyā asucīyeva, adhikāravasena pana ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ. yasmā vā aññe asucibhūtāpi kāyā loṇambilādīhi abhisaṅkharitvā manussānaṃ bhojanepi upanīyanti, na pana manussakāyo, tasmā asucitarasabhāvamassa dassento ``dvipādako''ti āha. ^b^aya^eb^nti tadā upaṭṭhitaṃ itthirūpaṃ ^a^P2.0192^ea^ sandhāyāha. ^b^asucī^eb^ti asuci eva, na ettha kiñcipi sucīti attho. ^b^duggandho parihīratī^eb^ti duggandho samāno pupphagandhādīhi saṅkharitvā pariharīyati. ^b^nānākuṇapaparipūro^eb^ti kesādianekappakārakuṇapabharito. ^b^vissavanto tato tato^eb^ti pupphagandhādīhissa jegucchabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ vāyamantānampi taṃ vāyāmaṃ nipphalaṃ katvā navahi dvārehi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīni lomakūpehi ca sedajallikaṃ `vissavantoyeva parihīratī'ti sambandho.

[03] evaṃ jegucchopi samāno cāyaṃ kāyo kūṭādīhi viya migādike attano rūpādīhi andhaputhujjane vañcetiyevāti dassento ^b^``miga''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^migaṃ nilīnaṃ kūṭenā^eb^ti pāsavākarādinā kūṭena nilīnaṃ, paṭicchannaṃ katvā migaṃ viya nesādo. vakkhamāno hi ^b^iva^eb^-saddo idhāpi ānetvā yojetabbo. ^b^baḷiseneva ambuja^eb^nti ambujaṃ macchaṃ āmisabaddhena baḷisena viya bāḷisiko. ^b^vānaraṃ viya lepenā^eb^ti rukkhasilādīsu pakkhittena makkaṭalepena makkaṭaṃ viya migaluddo andhaputhujjanaṃ vañcento bādhentīti.

[03] ke pana bādhentīti āha. ^b^``rūpā saddā''^eb^tiādi. rūpādayo hi pañca kāmakoṭṭhāsā visesato visabhāgavatthusannissayā vipallāsūpanissayena ayonisomanasikārena parikkhittānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ mano ramento kilesavatthutāya anatthāvahabhāvato te bādhenti nāma. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``rūpā saddā...pe0... itthirūpasmi dissare''^eb^ti.

[03] itthiggahaṇañcettha ^a^M2.0122^ea^ adhikāravasena katanti veditabbaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``ye etā upasevantī''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- ^b^ye^eb^ puthujjanā ^b^etā^eb^ itthiyo ^b^rattacittā^eb^ rāgābhibhūtacittā upabhogavatthusaññāya ^a^V2.0105^ea^ upasevanti. ^b^vaḍḍhenti kaṭasiṃ ghora^eb^nti te jātiādīhi nirayādīhi ca ghoraṃ, bhayānakaṃ, andhabālehi abhiramitabbato kaṭasisaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ punappunaṃ uppattimaraṇādinā vaḍḍhenti. tenāha ^b^``ācinanti punabbhava''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^yo cetā^eb^ti yo pana puggalo etā itthiyo tattha chandarāgassa vikkhambhanena vā samucchindanena vā attano pādena sappassa siraṃ viya parivajjeti, so sabbaṃ lokaṃ visajitvā ṭhitattā loke visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ sato hutvā samativattati.

[03] ^b^kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvā^eb^ti ``aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā''tiādinā (pāci0 417; cūḷava0 65; ma0 ni0 1.234) vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu anekākāravokāraṃ ādīnavaṃ, dosaṃ, disvā. ^b^nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato^eb^ti kāmehi bhavehi ca nikkhantabhāvato nekkhammaṃ, pabbajjaṃ ^a^P2.0193^ea^, nibbānañca, khemato, anupaddavato, daṭṭhu, disvā. ^b^sabbakāmehi^eb^pi tebhūmakadhammehi ^b^nissaṭo^eb^ visaṃyutto. sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā, tehi ca thero visaṃyutto. tenāha ^b^``patto me āsavakkhayo''^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ thero ādito pañcahi gāthāhi dhammaṃ kathetvā chaṭṭhagāthāya aññaṃ byākāsi. taṃ sutvā sasuro ``ayaṃ sabbattha anupalitto, na sakkā imaṃ kāmesu patāretu''nti yathāgatamaggeneva gato. theropi vassasataparinibbute bhagavati upasampadāya vīsavassasatiko pathabyā thero hutvā, vesālikehi vajjiputtehi uppāditaṃ sāsanassa abbudaṃ sodhetvā, dutiyaṃ dhammasaṅgītiṃ saṅgāyitvā ``anāgate dhammāsokakāle uppajjanakaṃ abbudaṃ sodhehī''ti tissamahābrahmānaṃ āṇāpetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.

[03] sattakanipāte ^a^M2.0123^ea^ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ^b^alaṅkatā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sundarasamuddattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti. ^b^samuddo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. rūpasampattiyā pana ^b^sundarasamuddo^eb^ti paññāyittha. so paṭhamavaye ṭhito bhagavato rājagahappavese buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā, paṭiladdhasaddho nissaraṇajjhāsayatāya pabbajitvā, laddhūpasampado samādinnadhutadhammo rājagahato sāvatthiṃ gantvā, kalyāṇamittassa santike vipassanācāraṃ uggahetvā, kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjanto viharati. tassa mātā rājagahe ussavadivase aññe seṭṭhiputte sapajāpatike alaṅkatapaṭiyatte ussavakīḷaṃ kīḷante disvā, puttaṃ anussaritvā rodati. taṃ disvā aññatarā gaṇikā rodanakāraṇaṃ pucchi. sā tassā taṃ kāraṇaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā gaṇikā ``ahaṃ taṃ ānessāmi, passa tāva mama itthibhāva''nti vatvā ``yadi evaṃ taṃyeva tassa pajāpatiṃ katvā imassa kulassa sāminiṃ karissāmī''ti tāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā ^a^P2.0194^ea^, vissajjitā mahatā parivārena sāvatthiṃ gantvā, therassa piṇḍāya vicaraṇaṭṭhāne ekasmiṃ gehe vasamānā divase divase aññehi therassa sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāpesi. alaṅkatapaṭiyattā ca hutvā suvaṇṇapādukā āruyha attānaṃ dassesi. athekadivasaṃ gehadvārena gacchantaṃ theraṃ disvā, suvaṇṇapādukā omuñcitvā, añjaliṃ paggayha purato gacchantī nānappakāraṃ theraṃ kāmanimantanāya nimantesi. taṃ sutvā thero ``puthujjanacittaṃ nāma cañcalaṃ, yaṃnūna mayā idāneva ussāho karaṇīyo''ti tattheva ṭhito bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ --
[22] sā maṃ saṇhena mudunā, mhitapubbaṃ abhāsatha..
[27] bhuñja mānusake kāme, ahaṃ vittaṃ dadāmi te.
[22] saccaṃ te paṭijānāmi, aggiṃ vā te harāmahaṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana''nti..

[03] tattha ^b^māladhārī^eb^ti mālādhārinī piḷandhapupphadāmā. ^b^vibhūsitā^eb^ti ūnaṭṭhānassa pūraṇavasena pupphehi ceva gandhavilepanādīhi ca vibhūsitagattā. ^b^``alaṅkatā''^eb^ti iminā hatthūpagagīvūpagādīhi ābharaṇehi alaṅkaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^alattakakatāpādā^eb^ti pariṇatajayasumanapupphavaṇṇena lākhārasena rañjitacaraṇayugaḷā. samāsapadañhetaṃ, ``alattakakatapādā''ti vattabbe gāthāsukhatthaṃ dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. asamāsabhāve pana ``tassā''ti vacanaseso veditabbo. ^b^pādukāruyha vesikā^eb^ti ekā rūpūpajīvikā itthī yathāvuttavesā suvaṇṇapādukā paṭimuñcitvā ``ṭhitā''ti vacanaseso.

[03] ^b^pādukā oruhitvānā^eb^ti pādukāhi otaritvā, suvaṇṇapādukāyo omuñcitvāti attho. ^b^pañjalīkatā^eb^ti paggahitāñjalikā ^b^sā^eb^ vesī maṃ. sāmaṃ vā vacanaparamparaṃ ^a^P2.0195^ea^ vinā sayameva abhāsatha. ^b^saṇhenā^eb^ti maṭṭhena. ^b^mudunā^eb^ti madhurena. ``vacanenā''ti avuttampi vuttameva hoti, abhāsathāti, vuttattā.

[03] ^b^yuvāsi^eb^ ^a^M2.0125^ea^ ^b^tvaṃ pabbajito^eb^ti tvaṃ pabbajanto yuvā, daharoyeva hutvā pabbajitosi, nanu pabbajantena sattame dasake sampatteva pabbajitabbanti dasseti. ^b^tiṭṭhāhi mama sāsane^eb^ti mama vacane tiṭṭha.

[03] kiṃ ^a^V2.0108^ea^ pana tanti āha ^b^``bhuñja mānusake kāme''^eb^ti kāme paribhuñjitukāmassa rūpasampatti, vayasampatti, parivārasampatti, bhogasampatti ca icchitabbā. tattha ``kuto me bhogasampattī''ti vadeyyāti, āha ^b^``ahaṃ vittaṃ dadāmi te''^eb^ti. ``tayidaṃ vacanaṃ kathaṃ saddahātabba''nti maññeyyāti taṃ saddahāpentī āha ^b^``saccaṃ te paṭijānāmi, aggiṃ vā te harāmaha''^eb^nti. ``bhuñja mānusake kāme, ahaṃ vittaṃ dadāmi te''ti yadidaṃ mayā paṭiññātaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsena saccameva paṭijānāmi, sace me na pattiyāyasi, aggiṃ vā te harāmahaṃ aggiṃ haritvā aggipaccayaṃ sapathaṃ karomīti attho. ^b^ubhayattha kaṭaggaho^eb^ti amhākaṃ ubhinnaṃ jiṇṇakāle pabbajjanaṃ ubhayattha jayaggāho. yaṃ mayaṃ yāva daṇḍaparāyanakālā bhoge bhuñjāma, evaṃ idhalokepi bhogehi na jīyāma, mayaṃ pacchā pabbajissāma, evaṃ paralokepi bhogehi na jīyāmāti adhippāyo. ^b^tato^eb^ti taṃ nimittaṃ, kāmehi nimantentiyā ``yuvāsi tva''ntiādinā ``yadā jiṇṇā bhavissāmā''tiādinā ca tassā vesiyā vuttavacanahetu. tañhi vacanaṃ aṅkusaṃ katvā thero samaṇadhammaṃ karonto sadatthaṃ paripūresi. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^pare ambāṭakārāme^eb^tiādikā āyasmato lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhoge kule nibbattitvā, vayappatto satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno tasmiṃ khaṇe satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mañjussarānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, ``aho vatāhampi anāgate ayaṃ bhikkhu ^a^M2.0126^ea^ viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ aggo bhaveyya''nti paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. bhagavā ca tassa anantarāyataṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.

[03] so ^a^P2.0196^ea^ tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto phussassa bhagavato kāle cittapattakokilo hutvā rājuyyānato madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍenādāya gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ``dassāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādesi. satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdi. kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. satthā taṃ paribhuñji. so kokilo ^a^V2.0109^ea^ pasannamānaso teneva pītisukhena sattāhaṃ vītināmesi. tena ca puññakammena mañjussaro ahosi. kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pana cetiye āraddhe kiṃ pamāṇaṃ karoma? sattayojanappamāṇaṃ. atimahantametaṃ. chayojanappamāṇaṃ. etampi atimahantaṃ. pañcayojanaṃ, catuyojanaṃ, tiyojanaṃ, dviyojananti vutte ayaṃ tadā jeṭṭhavaḍḍhakī hutvā ``etha, bho, anāgate sukhapaṭijaggiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti vatvā rajjuyā parikkhipanto gāvutamattake ṭhatvā ``ekekaṃ mukhaṃ gāvutaṃ gāvutaṃ hotu, cetiyaṃ ekayojanāvaṭṭaṃ yojanubbedhaṃ bhavissatī''ti āha. te tassa vacane aṭṭhaṃsu. iti appamāṇassa buddhassa pamāṇaṃ akāsīti. tena pana kammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi nīcatarappamāṇo hoti.

[03] so amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatti, ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. atirassatāya pana ^b^lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo^eb^ti paññāyittha. so satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā, paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā, bahussuto dhammakathiko hutvā madhurena sarena paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. athekasmiṃ ussavadivase ekena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ rathena gacchantī aññatarā gaṇikā theraṃ disvā dantavidaṃsakaṃ hasi. thero tassā dantaṭṭhike nimittaṃ gahetvā jhānaṃ uppādetvā, taṃ pādakaṃ katvā, vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā, anāgāmī ahosi. so abhiṇhaṃ kāyagatāya satiyā viharanto ekadivasaṃ āyasmatā dhammasenāpatinā ovadiyamāno arahatte patiṭṭhahi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.1-33) --
[21] ``taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, kāraṃ katvā mahesino.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] bhaddiyo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[22] patte pakkhippa pakkhehi, pañjaliṃ katvāna mañjunā..
[22] kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto seṭṭhikule ahaṃ.
[21] ``buddho ce me varaṃ dajjā, so ca labbhetha me varo.

[03] tattha ^b^pare^eb^ti seṭṭhe adhike, visiṭṭheti attho. adhikavācī hi ayaṃ parasaddo ``paraṃ viya mattāyā''tiādīsu viya. ^b^ambāṭakārāme^eb^ti evaṃnāmake ārāme. so kira chāyūdakasampanno vanasaṇḍamaṇḍito ramaṇīyo hoti tena ``pare''ti visesetvā vutto. ``ambāṭakavane ambāṭakehi abhilakkhitavane''ti ca vadanti. ^b^vanasaṇḍamhī^eb^ti vanagahane, ghananicitarukkhagacchalatāsamūhe vaneti attho. ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako, attānameva thero aññaṃ viya vadati. ^b^samūlaṃ taṇhamabbuyhā^eb^ti taṇhāya ^a^M2.0130^ea^ mūlaṃ nāma avijjā. tasmā sāvijjaṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggena ^a^V2.0112^ea^ samugghāṭetvāti attho. ^b^tattha bhaddova jhāyatī^eb^ti lokuttarehi sīlādīhi bhaddo sundaro tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe katakiccatāya diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena aggaphalajhānena jhāyati.

[03] phalasukhena ca jhānasamāpattīhi ca vītināmetīti attano vivekaratiṃ dassetvā ^b^``ramanteke''^eb^ti gāthāyapi byatirekamukhena tamevatthaṃ dasseti. tattha ^b^mudiṅgehī^eb^ti aṅgikādīhi murajehi. ^b^vīṇāhī^eb^ti nandinīādīhi vīṇāhi. ^b^paṇavehī^eb^ti turiyehi ramanti eke kāmabhogino, sā pana tesaṃ rati anariyā anatthasaṃhitā. ^b^ahañcā^eb^ ti ahaṃ pana, ekako ^b^buddhassa^eb^ bhagavato sāsane rato, tato eva rukkhamūlasmiṃ ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato viharāmīti attho.

[03] evaṃ attano vivekābhiratiṃ kittetvā idāni yaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā arahattaṃ patto, tassa pasaṃsanatthaṃ ^b^``buddho ce me''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- sace ^b^buddho^eb^ bhagavā ``ekāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ varaṃ yācāmī''ti mayā yācito ``atikkantavarā kho, bhikkhu, tathāgatā''ti apaṭikkhipitvā mayhaṃ yathāyācitaṃ varaṃ dadeyya, so ca varo mamādhippāyapūrako ^b^labbhetha^eb^ mayhaṃ manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpeyyāti thero parikappavasena vadati. ``bhante, sabbo loko sabbakālaṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetū''ti ``sabbalokassa niccaṃ kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā''ti katvā varaṃ gaṇhe ahanti dassento āha ^b^``gaṇhehaṃ sabbalokassa, niccaṃ kāyagataṃ sati''^eb^nti. idāni aparikkhaṇagarahāmukhena parikkhaṇaṃ pasaṃsanto --
[21] ``ye ^a^P2.0198^ea^ maṃ rūpena pāmiṃsu, ye ca ghosena anvagū.
[22] chandarāgavasūpetā, na maṃ jānanti te janā..
[21] ``ajjhattañca na jānāti, bahiddhā ca na passati.
[22] samantāvaraṇo bālo, sa ve ghosena vuyhati..

[03] tattha ^b^ye maṃ rūpena pāmiṃsū^eb^ti ye janā aviddasū mama rūpena apasādikena nihīnena ``ākārasadisī paññā''ti, dhammasarīrena ca maṃ nihīnaṃ pāmiṃsu, ``orako aya''nti hīḷentā paricchindanavasena ^a^V2.0113^ea^ maññiṃsūti attho. ^b^ye ca ghosena anvagū^eb^ti ye ca sattā ghosena mañjunā maṃ sambhāvanāvasena anugatā bahu maññiṃsu, taṃ tesaṃ micchā, na hi ahaṃ rūpamattena avamantabbo, ghosamattena vā na bahuṃ mantabbo, tasmā ^b^chandarāgavasūpetā, na maṃ jānanti te janā^eb^ti te duvidhāpi janā chandarāgassa vasaṃ upetā appahīnachandarāgā sabbaso pahīnachandarāgaṃ maṃ na jānanti.

[03] avisayo tesaṃ mādiso ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca apariññātavatthutāyāti dassetuṃ ^b^``ajjhatta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti attano santāne khandhāyatanādidhammaṃ. ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ti parasantāne. atha vā ajjhattanti, mama abbhantare asekkhasīlakkhandhādiṃ. bahiddhāti, mameva ākappasampattiyādiyuttaṃ bahiddhā rūpadhammappavattiṃ cakkhuviññāṇādippavattiñca. ^b^samantāvaraṇo^eb^ti evaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca ajānanena samantato āvaraṇayutto āvaṭañāṇagatiko. ^b^sa ve ghosena vuyhatī^eb^ti so paraneyyabuddhiko bālo ghosena paresaṃ vacanena vuyhati niyyati ākaḍḍhīyati.

[03] ^b^bahiddhā ca vipassatī^eb^ti yo ca vuttanayena ajjhattaṃ na jānāti, bahiddhā pana sutānusārena ākappasampattiādiupadhāraṇena vā visesato passati. ``guṇavisesayutto siyā''ti maññati, sopi ^b^bahiddhā phaladassāvī^eb^ nayaggāhena phalamattaṃ gaṇhanto vuttanayena ghosena vuyhati, sopi mādise na jānātīti attho.

[01] yo pana ^b^ajjhattañca^eb^ khīṇāsavassa abbhantare asekkhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaṃ jānāti, bahiddhā cassa paṭipattisallakkhaṇena visesato guṇavisesayogaṃ passati. ^b^anāvaraṇadassāvī^eb^ kenaci anāvaṭo hutvā ariyānaṃ guṇe ^a^M2.0132^ea^ daṭṭhuṃ ñātuṃ samattho, na so ghosamattena vuyhati yāthāvato dassanatoti.

[03] ^b^ekaputto^eb^tiādikā ^a^P2.0199^ea^ āyasmato bhaddattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca satasahassaparimāṇaṃ cīvarādīhi catūhi paccayehi pūjesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti. nibbattamāno ^a^V2.0114^ea^ ca aputtakesu mātāpitūsu devatāyācanādīni katvāpi alabhantesu satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``sace, bhante, mayaṃ ekaṃ puttaṃ lacchāma, taṃ tumhākaṃ dāsatthāya dassāmā''ti vatvā āyācitvā gatesu satthu adhippāyaṃ ñatvā aññataro devaputto khīṇāyuko hutvā ṭhito sakkena devaraññā ``amukasmiṃ kule nibbattāhī''ti āṇatto tattha nibbatti, ^b^bhaddo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. taṃ sattavassuddesikaṃ jātaṃ mātāpitaro alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ netvā ``ayaṃ so, bhante, tumhe āyācitvā laddhadārako, imaṃ tumhākaṃ niyyātemā''ti āhaṃsu. satthā ānandattheraṃ āṇāpesi -- ``imaṃ pabbājehī''ti. āṇāpetvā ca gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi. thero taṃ pabbājetvā saṅkhepena vipassanāmukhaṃ ācikkhi. so upanissayasampannattā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sūriye anoggateyeva bhāvanaṃ ussukkāpetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.5.54-69) --
[27] so ca pacchā pabbajitvā, sukkamūlena codito.
[22] bhaddiyo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..

[03] tassa ^a^M2.0134^ea^ bhagavā chaḷabhiññuppattiṃ ñatvā ``ehi, bhaddā''ti āha. so tāvadeva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pañjaliko satthu samīpe aṭṭhāsi, sā eva cassa upasampadā ahosi. buddhūpasampadā nāma kiresā. thero jātito paṭṭhāya attano pavattiyā kathanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``ekaputto ahaṃ āsiṃ, piyo mātu piyo pitu.
[22] ubho pitā ca mātā ca, buddhassa upanāmayuṃ..
[22] imaṃ dadāma te nātha, jinassa paricārakaṃ..
[22] anoggatasmiṃ sūriyasmiṃ, tato cittaṃ vimucci me..
[22] ehi bhaddāti maṃ āha, sā me āsūpasampadā..

[03] tattha ^b^vatacariyāhī^eb^ti, ``evaṃ katvā puttaṃ labhissathā''ti vuttaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, khīraṃ pāyitvā, anasanādivatacaraṇehi. ^b^āyācanāhī^eb^ti devatāyācanāhi satthuāyācanāya ca, idameva cettha kāraṇaṃ, itaraṃ thero mātāpitūnaṃ paṭipattidassanatthañceva kicchaladdhabhāvadassanatthañca vadati.
[03] ^b^hessatyājāniyo aya^eb^nti ayaṃ dārako mama sāsane ājānīyo bhavissati. tasmā khippaṃ ajjeva pabbājehīti etaṃ ^b^abravi,^eb^ āha.

[03] ^b^pabbājetvānā^eb^ti ānandattherena pabbājetvā. ^b^vihāra^eb^nti gandhakuṭiṃ. ^b^anoggatasmiṃ sūriyasmi^eb^nti sūriye anatthaṅgateyeva. ^b^tato cittaṃ vimucci me^eb^ti tato vipassanārambhato paraṃ na cireneva khaṇena sabbāsavehi me cittaṃ vimucci, khīṇāsavo ahosiṃ.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti mama āsavakkhayato pacchā. ^b^nirākatvā^eb^ti attanā samāpannaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā tato vuṭṭhāya. tenāha ^b^``paṭisallānavuṭṭhito''^eb^ti. ^b^sā me āsūpasampadā^eb^ti yā maṃ uddissa ``ehi, bhaddā''ti satthu vācā pavattā, sā eva me mayhaṃ upasampadā āsi. evaṃ ^b^jātiyā sattavassena, laddhā me upasampadā^eb^ti sātisayaṃ satthārā attano kataṃ anuggahaṃ sāsanassa ca niyyānikataṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``aho dhammasudhammatā''^eb^ti.

[03] ettha ca ``cittaṃ vimucci me''ti khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ pakāsetvāpi puna ^b^``tisso vijjā anuppattā''^eb^ti lokiyābhiññekadesadassanaṃ chaḷabhiññabhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ. tenāha apadāne ``chaḷabhiññā sacchikatā''ti.

[03] ^b^disvā^eb^ ^a^V2.0117^ea^ ^a^P2.0201^ea^ ^b^pāsādachāyāya^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato sopākattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsippesu nipphattiṃ gato kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā gharāvāsaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā ekasmiṃ ^a^M2.0136^ea^ pabbate viharati. satthā āsannamaraṇaṃ taṃ ñatvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. so bhagavantaṃ disvā pasannacitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavedento pupphamayaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā adāsi. satthā tattha nisīditvā, aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā tassa passantasseva ākāsena agamāsi. so pubbe gahitaṃ niccaggāhaṃ pahāya aniccasaññaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā, kālaṅkatvā, devaloke uppajitvā, aparāparaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto, imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe sopākayoniyaṃ nibbatti. so jātiāgatena ^b^sopāko^eb^ti nāmena paññāyi. keci pana ``vāṇijakule nibbatto, `sopāko'ti pana nāmamatta''nti vadanti. taṃ apadānapāḷiyā virujjhati ``pacchime bhave sampatte, sopākayonupāgami''nti vacanato.

[03] tassa catumāsajātassa pitā kālamakāsi, cūḷapitā posesi. anukkamena sattavassiko jāto. ekadivasaṃ cūḷapitā ``attano puttena kalahaṃ karotī''ti kujjhitvā, taṃ susānaṃ netvā, dve hatthe rajjuyā ekato bandhitvā, tāya eva rajjuyā matamanussassa sarīre gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā gato ``siṅgālādayo khādantū''ti. pacchimabhavikatāya dārakassa puññaphalena sayaṃ māretuṃ na visahi, siṅgālādayopi na abhibhaviṃsu. dārako aḍḍharattasamaye evaṃ vippalapati --
[21] ``kā gati me agatissa, ko vā bandhu abandhuno.
[03] satthā tāya velāya veneyyabandhave olokento dārakassa hadayabbhantare pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā satiṃ janetvā evamāha --

[03] dārako buddhānubhāvena chinnabandhano gāthāpariyosāne sotāpanno hutvā gandhakuṭisammukhe aṭṭhāsi. tassa mātā puttaṃ apassantī cūḷapitaraṃ pucchitvā tenassa pavattiyā akathitāya tattha tattha ^a^P2.0202^ea^ gantvā vicinantī ^a^M2.0137^ea^ ``buddhā kira atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ jānanti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama puttassa pavattiṃ jāneyya''nti satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. satthā, iddhiyā taṃ paṭicchādetvā, ``bhante, mama puttaṃ na passāmi, apica bhagavā tassa pavattiṃ jānātī''ti tāya puṭṭho --
[21] ``na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā.
[25] dhammaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā sā sotāpannā ahosi. dārako arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.112-123) --
[22] siddhattho nāma bhagavā, āgacchi mama santikaṃ..
[22] ekāhaṃ bhāvayitvāna, tattha kālaṃ kato ahaṃ..
[22] taṃ saññaṃ bhāvayantassa, patto me āsavakkhayo..

[03] atha bhagavā iddhiṃ paṭisaṃhari. sāpi puttaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ sutvā pabbājetvā gatā. so satthāraṃ gandhakuṭicchāyāyaṃ caṅkamantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, vanditvā anucaṅkami. tassa bhagavā upasampadaṃ anujānitukāmo ``ekaṃ nāma ki''ntiādinā dasa pañhe pucchi. sopi satthu adhippāyaṃ gaṇhanto sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsandento ``sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā''tiādinā (khu0 pā0 4.1) te pañhe vissajjesi. teneva te kumārapañhā nāma jātā. satthā tassa pañhabyākaraṇena ārādhitacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni. tena sā pañhabyākaraṇūpasampadā nāma jātā. tassimaṃ attano pavattiṃ pakāsetvā thero aññaṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``tato pañhe apucchi maṃ, pañhānaṃ kovido vidū.
[22] acchambhī ca abhīto ca, byākāsiṃ satthuno ahaṃ..
[22] esā ceva te sopāka, bhavatu upasampadā'''..
[22] dhāremi antimaṃ dehaṃ, aho dhammasudhammatā''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] ^b^saṃharitvāna pāṇayo^eb^ti ubho hatthe kamalamakuḷākārena saṅgate katvā, añjaliṃ paggahetvāti attho. ^b^anucaṅkamissa^eb^nti caṅkamantassa satthuno anupacchato anugamanavasena caṅkamiṃ. ^b^viraja^eb^nti vigatarāgādirajaṃ.

[03] ^b^pañhe^eb^ti kumārapañhe. ^b^vidū^eb^ti veditabbaṃ viditavā, sabbaññūti attho. ``satthā maṃ pucchatī''ti uppajjanakassa chambhitattassa bhayassa ca setughātena pahīnattā ^b^acchambhī^eb^ ca ^b^abhīto^eb^ ca byākāsi.
[03] ^b^yesāya^eb^nti yesaṃ aṅgamagadhānaṃ ayaṃ sopāko. ^b^paccaya^eb^nti gilānapaccayaṃ. ^b^sāmīci^eb^nti maggadānabījanādisāmīcikiriyaṃ.

[03] ^b^ajjadagge^eb^ti da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja agge ādiṃ katvā, ajja paṭṭhāya. ``ajjatagge''tipi pāḷi, ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvāti attho. ^b^dassanāyopasaṅkamā^eb^ti ``hīnajacco, vayasā taruṇataro''ti vā acintetvā dassanāya maṃ upasaṅkama. ^b^esā cevā^eb^ti yā tassa mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsandetvā katā pañhavissajjanā. esāyeva te bhavatu upasampadā iti ca abravīti yojanā. ``laddhā me upasampadā''tipi pāḷi. ye pana ``laddhāna upasampada''ntipi paṭhanti, tesaṃ ^b^sattavassenā^eb^ti sattamena vassenāti attho, sattavassena vā hutvāti vacanaseso. yaṃ panettha avuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] ^b^sare^eb^ ^a^M2.0140^ea^ ^b^hatthehī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sarabhaṅgattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^anabhilakkhito^eb^tissa kulavaṃsāgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto kāme pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā saratiṇāni ^a^V2.0121^ea^ sayameva bhañjitvā paṇṇasālaṃ katvā vasati. tato paṭṭhāya ^b^sarabhaṅgo^eb^tissa samaññā ahosi. atha bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tassa arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā, tattha gantvā, dhammaṃ desesi. so paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā tattheva vasati. athassa tāpasakāle katā paṇṇasālā jiṇṇā paluggā ahosi. taṃ disvā ^a^P2.0204^ea^ manussā ``kissa, bhante, imaṃ kuṭikaṃ na paṭisaṅkharothā''ti āhaṃsu. thero ``kuṭikā yathā tāpasakāle katā, idāni tathā kātuṃ na sakkā''ti taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsento --
[22] tena me sarabhaṅgoti, nāmaṃ sammutiyā ahu..
[21] ``na mayhaṃ kappate ajja, sare hatthehi bhañjituṃ.
[22] sikkhāpadā no paññattā, gotamena yasassinā''ti.. -- dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sare hatthehi bhañjitvā^eb^ti, pubbe tāpasakāle saratiṇāni mama hatthehi chinditvā tiṇakuṭiṃ katvā ^b^acchisaṃ^eb^ vasiṃ, nisīdiñceva nipajjiñca. ^b^tenā^eb^ti kuṭikaraṇatthaṃ sarānaṃ bhañjanena. ^b^sammutiyā^eb^ti anvatthasammutiyā sarabhaṅgoti, nāmaṃ ahu ahosi.

[03] ^b^na mayhaṃ kappate ajjā^eb^ti ajja idāni upasampannassa mayhaṃ ^b^sare^eb^ saratiṇe hatthehi bhañjituṃ na kappate na vaṭṭati. kasmā? ^b^sikkhāpadā no paññattā, gotamena yasassinā^eb^ti. tena yaṃ amhākaṃ satthārā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mayaṃ jīvitahetunāpi nātikkamāmāti dasseti.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0141^ea^ ekena pakārena tiṇakuṭikāya apaṭisaṅkharaṇe kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aparenapi pariyāyena naṃ dassento --
[22] soyaṃ rogo diṭṭho, vacanakarenātidevassā''ti.. -- imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^sakala^eb^nti sabbaṃ. ^b^samatta^eb^nti sampuṇṇaṃ, sabbabhāgato anavasesanti attho. ^b^roga^eb^nti dukkhadukkhatādivasena rujanaṭṭhena rogabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^nāddasaṃ pubbe^eb^ti ^a^V2.0122^ea^ satthu ovādapaṭilābhato pubbe na addakkhiṃ. ^b^soyaṃ rogo diṭṭho, vacanakarenātidevassā^eb^ti sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi deve attano sīlādiguṇehi atikkamitvā ṭhitattā atidevassa sammāsambuddhassa ovādapaṭikarena sarabhaṅgena so ayaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhāto rogo vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pañcakkhandhato diṭṭho, pariññātoti attho. etena evaṃ attabhāvakuṭikāyampi anapekkho bāhiraṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ kathaṃ paṭisaṅkharissatīti dasseti.

[03] idāni yaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjantena mayā ayaṃ attabhāvarogo yāthāvato diṭṭho, svāyaṃ maggo sabbabuddhasādhāraṇo. yena nesaṃ ovādadhammopi majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇasadiso yatthāhaṃ patiṭṭhāya dukkhakkhayaṃ pattoti ^a^P2.0205^ea^ evaṃ attano arahattapaṭipattiṃ byākaronto --
[21] ``yeneva maggena gato vipassī, yeneva maggena sikhī ca vessabhū.
[22] kakusandhakoṇāgamano ca kassapo, tenañjasena agamāsi gotamo..
[27] bhedā imassa kāyassa, jīvitassa ca saṅkhayā.

[03] tattha ^b^yeneva maggenā^eb^ti yeneva sapubbabhāgena ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena. ^b^gato^eb^ti paṭipanno nibbānaṃ adhigato. ^b^vipassī^eb^ti vipassī sammāsambuddho. ^b^kakusandhā^eb^ti avibhattiko niddeso. ``kakusandhakoṇāgamanā''tipi pāṭho. ^b^tenañjasenā^eb^ti teneva añjasena ariyamaggena.

[03] ^b^anādānā^eb^ti anupādānā appaṭisandhikā vā. ^b^khayogadhā^eb^ti nibbānogadhā nibbānapatiṭṭhā. ^b^yehāyaṃ desito dhammo^eb^ti yehi sattahi sammāsambuddhehi ayaṃ sāsanadhammo desito pavedito. ^b^dhammabhūtehī^eb^ti dhammakāyatāya dhammasabhāvehi, navalokuttaradhammato vā bhūtehi jātehi, dhammaṃ vā pattehi. ^b^tādibhī^eb^ti, iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattehi.

[03] ^b^``cattāri^eb^ ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ^b^ariyasaccānī''^eb^tiādinā tehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ dasseti. tattha ^b^cattārī^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^ariyasaccānī^eb^ti paricchinnadhammadassanaṃ. vacanatthato pana ariyāni ca avitathaṭṭhena saccāni cāti ariyasaccāni, ariyassa vā bhagavato saccāni tena desitattā, ariyabhāvakarāni vā saccānīti ariyasaccāni. kucchitabhāvato tucchabhāvato ca ^b^dukkhaṃ,^eb^ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. taṃ dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti ^b^samudayo,^eb^ taṇhā. kilese mārento gacchati, nibbānatthikehi maggīyatīti vā ^b^maggo,^eb^ sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā. saṃsāracārakasaṅkhāto natthi ettha rodho, etasmiṃ vā adhigate puggalassa rodhābhāvo hoti, nirujjhati dukkhametthāti vā ^b^nirodho,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. tenāha ``dukkhasaṅkhayo''ti. ayamettha ^a^P2.0206^ea^ saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yasmi^eb^nti yasmiṃ nirodhe nibbāne adhigate. ^b^nivattate^eb^ti ariyamaggabhāvanāya sati ^b^anantakaṃ^eb^ apariyantaṃ imasmiṃ saṃsāre jātiādidukkhaṃ na pavattati ucchijjati, so nirodhoti ayaṃ dhammabhūtehi sammāsambuddhehi desito ^a^M2.0143^ea^ dhammoti yojanā. ^b^``bhedā''^eb^tiādinā ``rogo diṭṭho''ti dukkhapariññāya sūcitaṃ attano arahattappattiṃ sarūpato dasseti. ``yasmiṃ nibbattate dukkha''nti pana pāṭhe sakalagāthāya tatthāyaṃ yojanā -- ^b^yasmiṃ^eb^ khandhādipaṭipāṭisaññite saṃsāre idaṃ anantakaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ nibbattaṃ, so ito dukkhappattito añño punappunaṃ bhavanabhāvato punabbhavo. imassa jīvitindriyassa saṅkhayā kāyasaṅkhātassa khandhapañcakassa bhedā vināsā uddhaṃ natthi, tasmā sabbadhi sabbehi kilesehi sabbehi bhavehi suṭṭhu vimutto visaṃyutto amhīti.

[03] aṭṭhakanipāte ^a^M2.0144^ea^ ^a^V2.0124^ea^ ^b^kammaṃ bahuka^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato mahākaccāyanattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto, ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento paṇidhānaṃ katvā, dānādīni puññāni katvā, devamanussesu saṃsaranto sumedhassa bhagavato kāle vijjādharo hutvā ākāsena gacchanto satthāraṃ himavantapabbate ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisinnaṃ disvā pasannamānaso kaṇikārapupphehi pūjaṃ akāsi.

[03] so tena puññakammena aparāparaṃ sugatīsuyeva parivattento kassapadasabalassa kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā parinibbute bhagavati suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhāne satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā, ``bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū''ti patthanaṃ akāsi.

[03] tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā ^a^P2.0207^ea^ imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ujjeniyaṃ rañño caṇḍapajjotassa purohitagehe nibbatti. tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātā ``mayhaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato''ti ^b^kañcanamāṇavo^eb^ tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. so vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi. so gottavasena ^b^kaccāyano^eb^ti paññāyittha. taṃ rājā caṇḍapajjoto buddhuppādaṃ sutvā, ``ācariya, tvaṃ tattha gantvā satthāraṃ idhānehī''ti pesesi. so attaṭṭhamo satthu santikaṃ upagato. tassa satthā dhammaṃ deseti. desanāpariyosāne so sattahi janehi saddhiṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.54.1-27) --
[22] parisaṃ mañca toseti, yathā kaccāyano ayaṃ..
[22] tadā mamāsayaṃ ñatvā, byākāsi sa raṇañjaho..
[21] ``kaccānassa ^a^M2.0146^ea^ guṇaṃ sutvā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayaṃ ṭhito.
[22] kaccāno nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[22] pāpuṇissati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yathāyaṃ byākato mayā..
[22] aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ..
[22] nīce kule na jāyāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ..
[21] ``pacchime ca bhave dāni, jāto ujjeniyaṃ pure.
[22] mātā ca candimā nāma, kaccānohaṃ varattaco..
[22] pāpuṇiṃ amataṃ santaṃ, sesehi saha sattahi..

[03] atha satthā ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. te tāvadeva dvaṅgulamattakesamassukā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ. evaṃ thero sadatthaṃ nipphādetvā, ``bhante, rājā pajjoto tumhākaṃ ^a^M2.0147^ea^ pāde vandituṃ dhammañca sotuṃ icchatī''ti satthu ārocesi. satthā, ``tvaṃyeva, bhikkhu, tattha gaccha, tayi gatepi rājā pasīdissatī''ti āha. thero satthu āṇāya attaṭṭhamo tattha gantvā rājānaṃ pasādetvā avantīsu sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā puna satthu santikameva gato. so ekadivasaṃ sambahule bhikkhū samaṇadhammaṃ pahāya kammārāme saṅgaṇikārāme rasataṇhānugate ca pamādavihārino disvā tesaṃ ovādavasena --
[21] ``kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kāraye, parivajjeyya janaṃ na uyyame.
[22] so ussukko rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhādhivāho..
[21] ``paṅkoti hi naṃ avedayuṃ, yāyaṃ vandanapūjanā kulesu.
[22] sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ, sakkāro kāpurisena dujjaho''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0127^ea^ ^a^P2.0208^ea^ ^b^kammaṃ bahukaṃ na kāraye^eb^ti navāvāsakārāpanādiṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa paribandhabhūtaṃ mahantaṃ navakammaṃ na paṭṭhapeyya, khuddakaṃ appasamārambhaṃ khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇādiṃ satthu vacanapaṭipūjanatthaṃ kātabbameva. ^b^parivajjeyya jana^eb^nti gaṇasaṅgaṇikavasena janaṃ vivajjeyya. jananti vā yādisaṃ saṃsevato bhajato payirupāsato kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tādisaṃ akalyāṇamittabhūtaṃ janaṃ parivajjeyya. ^b^na uyyame^eb^ti, paccayuppādanatthaṃ kulasaṅgaṇhanavasena na vāyameyya, yasmā ^b^so ussukko rasānugiddho, atthaṃ riñcati yo sukhādhivāho^eb^ti yo rasānugiddho rasataṇhāvasiko bhikkhu paccayuppādanapasuto, so kulasaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ussukko, tesu sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā yogaṃ āpajjati, yo sukhādhivāho samathavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānasukhāvaho sīlādiattho, taṃ riñcati pajahati ekaṃsena attānaṃ tato vivecetīti attho.

[03] evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya ``kammārāmataṃ saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ paccayagedhañca vajjethā''ti ovaditvā idāni sakkārābhilāsaṃ garahanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tassattho -- yā ayaṃ bhikkhāya upagatānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ kulesu gehavāsīhi guṇasambhāvanāya karīyamānā vandanā pūjanā ca, yasmā taṃ ^a^M2.0148^ea^ abhāvitattānaṃ osīdāpanaṭṭhena malinabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ca ^b^paṅko^eb^ kaddamoti buddhādayo ariyā ^b^pavedayuṃ^eb^ abbhaññaṃsu pavedesuṃ vā, yasmā ca apariññātakkhandhānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ sakkārābhilāsaṃ duviññeyyasabhāvatāya pīḷājananato anto tudanato duruddharaṇato ca ^b^sukhumaṃ sallaṃ durubbahaṃ^eb^ pavedayuṃ, tato eva sakkāro kāpurisena ^b^dujjaho^eb^ duppajaheyyo tassa pahānapaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjanato. sakkārābhilāsappahānena hi sakkāro pahīno hoti, tasmā tassa pahānāya āyogo karaṇīyoti dasseti --
[22] attanā taṃ na seveyya, kammabandhū hi mātiyā..
[21] ``na pare vacanā coro, na pare vacanā muni.
[22] attā ca naṃ yathā vedi, devāpi naṃ tathā vidū..
[22] ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā..
[22] paññāya ca alābhena, vittavāpi na jīvati..
[22] na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ ujjhitumarahati..

[25] imā cha gāthā rañño pajjotassa ovādavasena abhāsi. so kira brāhmaṇe saddahitvā pasughātayaññaṃ kāreti, kammaṃ asodhetvāva acore corasaññāya daṇḍesi, aṭṭakaraṇe ca assāmike sāmike karoti, sāmike ca assāmike. tato naṃ thero vivecetuṃ ^b^``na parassā''^eb^tiādinā cha gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0149^ea^ ^b^na parassupanidhāya, kammaṃ maccassa pāpaka^eb^nti parassa maccassa sattassa upanidhāya uddissa kāraṇaṃ katvā pāpakaṃ vadhabandhādikammaṃ na seveyya, parena na kārāpeyyāti attho. ^b^attanā taṃ na seveyyā^eb^ti attanāpi taṃ pāpakaṃ na kareyya. kasmā? ^b^kammabandhū hi mātiyā^eb^ ime mātiyā maccā kammadāyādā, tasmā attanā ca kiñci pāpakammaṃ na kareyya, parenapi na kārāpeyyāti attho.

[03] ^b^na pare vacanā coro^eb^ti attanā coriyaṃ akatvā paravacanā parassa vacanamattena coro nāma na hoti, tathā ^b^na pare vacanā muni^eb^ parassa vacanamattena muni suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro na hoti. ettha hi ^b^pare^eb^ti vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. keci pana ``paresanti vattabbe pareti saṃ-kāralopaṃ katvā niddiṭṭha''nti vadanti. ^b^attā ca naṃ yathā vedī^eb^ti naṃ sattaṃ tassa attā cittaṃ yathā ``ahaṃ parisuddho, aparisuddho vā''ti yāthāvato avedi jānāti. ^b^devāpi naṃ tathā vidū^eb^ti visuddhidevā, upapattidevā ca tathā vidū vidanti jānanti, tasmā sayaṃ tādisā devā ca pamāṇaṃ suddhāsuddhānaṃ suddhāsuddhabhāvajānane, na ye keci icchādosaparetā sattāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^pare^eb^ti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe, kusalākusalasāvajjānavajjaṃ kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ kāyassa asubhataṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccataṃ ajānantā idha pare nāma. te ^b^mayamettha^eb^ imasmiṃ jīvaloke ^b^yamāma^eb^ uparamāma, ``satataṃ samitaṃ maccu santikaṃ gacchāmā''ti na jānanti. ^b^ye ca tattha vijānantī^eb^ti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā ``mayaṃ maccu samīpaṃ gacchāmā''ti vijānanti. ^b^tato sammanti medhagā^eb^ti evañhi te jānantā medhagānaṃ paravihiṃsanānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti, attanā ^a^V2.0129^ea^ pare ca aññe na medhanti na bādhentīti attho. tvaṃ pana jīvitanimittaṃ acore core karontopi daṇḍanena sāmike assāmike karontopi dhanajāniyā bādhasi paññāvekallato. tathā ^a^P2.0210^ea^ akarontopi ^b^jīvate vāpi sappañño, api vittaparikkhayo^eb^ parikkhīṇadhanopi sappaññajātiko itarītarasantosena santuṭṭho anavajjāya jīvikāya jīvatiyeva. tassa hi jīvitaṃ nāma. tenāha bhagavā -- ``paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.73, 246; su0 ni0 184). dummedhapuggalo pana paññāya ^a^M2.0150^ea^ ca alābhena diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca atthaṃ virādhento vittavāpi na jīvati garahādipavattiyā jīvanto nāma na hoti, anupāyaññutāya yathādhigataṃ dhanaṃ nāsento jīvitampi sandhāretuṃ na sakkotiyeva.

[03] imā kira catassopi gāthā thero supinantena rañño kathesi. rājā supinaṃ disvā theraṃ namassantoyeva pabujjhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā attanā diṭṭhaniyāmena supinaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā thero tā gāthā paccunubhāsitvā ^b^``sabbaṃ suṇātī''^eb^tiādinā dvīhi gāthāhi rājānaṃ ovadi. tattha ^b^sabbaṃ suṇāti sotenā^eb^ti idha sotabbaṃ saddaṃ āpāthagataṃ sabbaṃ subhāsitaṃ dubbhāsitañca abadhiro sotena suṇāti. tathā sabbaṃ rūpaṃ sundaraṃ asundarampi cakkhunā anandho passati, ayamindriyānaṃ sabhāvo. tattha pana ^b^na ca diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ dhīro, sabbaṃ ujjhitu^eb^nti ca nidassanamattametaṃ. yañhi taṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ vā, na taṃ sabbaṃ dhīro sappañño ujjhituṃ pariccajituṃ gahetuṃ vā arahati. guṇāguṇaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhitvā ujjhitabbameva ujjhituṃ gahetabbañca gahetuṃ arahati, tasmā ^b^cakkhumāssa yathā andho^eb^ cakkhumāpi samāno ujjhitabbe diṭṭhe andho yathā assa apassanto viya bhaveyya, tathā ujjhitabbe sute sotavāpi badhiro yathā assa asuṇanto viya bhaveyya. ^b^paññavāssa yathā mūgo^eb^ti vicāraṇapaññāya paññavā vacanakusalopi avattabbe mūgo viya bhaveyya. ^b^balavā^eb^ thāmasampannopi akattabbe dubbaloriva, rakāro padasandhikaro, asamattho viya bhaveyya. ^b^atha atthe samuppanne, sayetha matasāyika^eb^nti attanā kātabbakicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha, matasāyikaṃ sayitvāpi taṃ kiccaṃ tīretabbameva, na virādhetabbaṃ. atha vā ^b^atha atthe samuppanne^eb^ti attanā akaraṇīye atthe kicce uppanne upaṭṭhite matasāyikaṃ sayetha, matasāyikaṃ sayitvāpi taṃ na kātabbameva. na hi paṇḍito ayuttaṃ kātumarahatīti evaṃ therena ovadito rājā akattabbaṃ pahāya kātabbeyeva yuttappayutto ahosīti.

[03] ^b^akkodhano^eb^tiādikā ^a^M2.0151^ea^ ^a^V2.0130^ea^ ^a^P2.0211^ea^ āyasmato sirimittattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe mahaddhanakuṭumbikassa putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^sirimitto^eb^ti laddhanāmo. tassa kira mātā siriguttassa bhaginī. tassa vatthu ^b^dhammapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.garahadinnavatthu) āgatameva. so siriguttassa bhāgineyyo sirimitto vayappatto satthu dhanapāladamane laddhappasādo pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto. ekadivasaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ āsanaṃ abhiruhitvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. kathento ca uḷāratare guṇe vibhajitvā dassento --
[22] sa ve tādisako bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati..
[22] guttadvāro sadā bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati..
[22] kalyāṇasīlo so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati..
[22] kalyāṇamitto so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati..
[22] kalyāṇapañño so bhikkhu, evaṃ pecca na socati..
[22] adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ..
[22] anuyuñjetha medhāvī, saraṃ buddhāna sāsana''nti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^akkodhano^eb^ti akujjhanasīlo. upaṭṭhite hi kodhuppattinimitte adhivāsanakhantiyaṃ ṭhatvā ^a^V2.0131^ea^ kopassa anuppādako. ^b^anupanāhī^eb^ti na upanāhako, parehi kataṃ aparādhaṃ paṭicca ``akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me''tiādinā (dha0 pa0 3; mahāva0 464; ma0 ni0 3.237) kodhassa anupanayhanasīlo. santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya abhāvato ^b^amāyo^eb^. pisuṇavācāvirahitato ^b^rittapesuṇo, sa ve tādisako bhikkhū^eb^ti so tathārūpo tathājātiko yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgato bhikkhu ^a^P2.0212^ea^. evaṃ yathāvuttapaṭipattiyā ^b^pecca^eb^ paraloke na socati sokanimittassa abhāvato. cakkhudvārādayo kāyadvārādayo ca guttā pihitā saṃvutā etassāti ^b^guttadvāro. kalyāṇasīlo^eb^ti sundarasīlo suvisuddhasīlo. ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^ti --
[22] gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojaye''ti.. (a0 ni0 7.37) --
[25] evaṃ vibhāvitalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto. ^b^kalyāṇapañño^eb^ti sundarapañño. yadipi paññā nāma asundarā natthi, niyyānikāya pana paññāya vasena evaṃ vuttaṃ

[03] evamettha kodhādīnaṃ vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca akkodhanādimukhena, puggalādhiṭṭhānāya gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni nipphattitalokuttarasaddhādike uddharitvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva gāthāya sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassento ^b^``yassa saddhā''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- ^b^yassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^tathāgate^eb^ sammāsambuddhe ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinayappavattā maggenāgatasaddhā, tato eva ^b^acalā^eb^ avikampā suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitā. ``atthī''ti, padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^ariyakanta^eb^nti ariyānaṃ kantaṃ piyāyitaṃ bhavantarepi avijahanato. ^b^pasaṃsita^eb^nti buddhādīhi pasaṭṭhaṃ, vaṇṇitaṃ thomitaṃ atthīti yojanā. taṃ panetaṃ sīlaṃ gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ pabbajitasīlanti ^a^M2.0153^ea^ duvidhaṃ. tattha gahaṭṭhasīlaṃ nāma pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ, yaṃ gahaṭṭhena rakkhituṃ sakkā. pabbajitasīlaṃ nāma dasasikkhāpadasīlaṃ upādāya sabbaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ, tayidaṃ sabbampi akhaṇḍādibhāvena aparāmaṭṭhatāya ``kalyāṇa''nti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^saṅghe pasādo yassatthī^eb^ti ``suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho''tiādinā ariyasaṅghe pasādo saddhā yassa puggalassa atthi acalo suppatiṭṭhitoti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^ujubhūtañca dassana^eb^nti diṭṭhivaṅkābhāvato kilesavaṅkābhāvato ca ujubhūtaṃ. akuṭilaṃ ajimhaṃ kammassakatādassanañceva sappaccayanāmarūpadassanañcāti duvidhampi dassanaṃ yassa atthi acalaṃ suppatiṭṭhitanti ^a^V2.0132^ea^ yojanā. ^b^adaliddoti taṃ āhu^eb^ saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ, sutadhanaṃ, cāgadhanaṃ, paññādhananti imesaṃ suvisuddhānaṃ dhanānaṃ atthitāya ``adaliddo''ti taṃ tādisaṃ puggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā āhu. ^b^amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ^eb^ tassa tathārūpassa jīvitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādiatthādhigamena amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ saphalamevāti āhūti attho.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0213^ea^, yasmā yathāvuttasaddhādiguṇasamannāgato puggalo ``adaliddo amoghajīvito''ti vuccati, tasmā ahampi tathārūpo bhaveyyanti. ^b^saddhañca...pe0... sāsana^eb^nti ``sabbapāpassa akaraṇa''ntiādinā (dha0 pa0 183; dī0 ni0 2.90) vuttaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ anussaranto kulaputto vuttappabhedaṃ saddhañceva sīlañca dhammadassanahetukaṃ dhamme sunicchayā vimokkhabhūtaṃ pasādañca anuyuñjeyya vaḍḍheyyāti.
[03] evaṃ thero bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanāmukhena attani vijjamāne guṇe pakāsento aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ ^a^M2.0154^ea^ ^b^paṭhamamaddakkhi^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato mahāpanthakattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiyo hutvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā, ``bhante, yaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake -- `saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ ayaṃ mama sāsane aggo'ti etadagge ṭhapayittha, ahampi imassa adhikārakammassa balena so bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aggo bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ akāsi. kaniṭṭhabhātā panassa tatheva bhagavati adhikārakammaṃ katvā manomayassa kāyassābhinimmānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakosallanti dvinnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena vuttanayeneva paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. bhagavā dvinnampi patthanaṃ anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā ``anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane tumhākaṃ patthanā samijjhissatī''ti byākāsi.

[03] te ^a^V2.0133^ea^ ubhopi janā tattha yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattiṃsu. tattha mahāpanthakassa antarākataṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ na kathīyati. cūḷapanthako pana kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni odātakasiṇakammaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti. apadāne pana ``cūḷapanthako padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tāpaso hutvā himavante vasanto tattha bhagavantaṃ disvā pupphacchattena pūjaṃ akāsī''ti āgataṃ. tesaṃ devamanussesu ^a^P2.0214^ea^ saṃsarantānaṃyeva kappasatasahassaṃ atikkantaṃ. atha amhākaṃ satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre viharati.

[03] tena ca samayena rājagahe dhanaseṭṭhissa dhītā attano dāsena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā ñātakehi bhītā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ palāyitvā aññattha vasantī taṃ paṭicca gabbhaṃ labhitvā paripakkagabbhā ``ñātigharaṃ ^a^M2.0155^ea^ gantvā vijāyissāmī''ti gacchantī antarāmaggeyeva puttaṃ vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā pubbe vasitaṭṭhāne vasantī puttassa panthe jātattā ^b^panthako^eb^ti, nāmaṃ akāsi. tasmiṃ ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle tameva paṭicca dutiyaṃ gabbhaṃ paṭilabhitvā paripakkagabbhā pubbe vuttanayeneva antarāmagge puttaṃ vijāyitvā sāminā nivattitā jeṭṭhaputtassa ^b^mahāpanthako^eb^ti kaniṭṭhassa ^b^cūḷapanthako^eb^ti nāmaṃ katvā yathāvasitaṭṭhāneyeva vasantī anukkamena dārakesu vaḍḍhantesu tehi, ``amma, ayyakakulaṃ no dassehī''ti nibundhiyamānā dārake mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ pesesi. tato paṭṭhāya dārakā dhanaseṭṭhino gehe vaḍḍhanti. tesu cūḷapanthako atidaharo. mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ bhagavato santikaṃ gato satthāraṃ disvā saha dassanena paṭiladdhasaddho dhammaṃ sutvā upanissayasampannatāya pabbajitukāmo hutvā pitāmahaṃ āpucchi. so satthu tamatthaṃ ārocetvā taṃ pabbājesi. so pabbajitvā bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampajjitvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto visesato catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ lābhī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. iti so saññāvivaṭṭakusalānaṃ aggo jāto. so jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā adhigatasampattiṃ paṭicca sañjātasomanasso sīhanādaṃ nadanto --
[22] tato me ahu saṃvego, passitvā purisuttamaṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] sabbaṃ taṇhaṃ visosetvā, pallaṅkena upāvisi''nti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[01] tattha ^b^yadā^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle. ^b^paṭhama^eb^nti ādito. ^b^addakkhi^eb^nti passiṃ, ^b^satthāra^eb^nti, bhagavantaṃ. ^b^akutobhaya^eb^nti nibbhayaṃ. ayañhettha attho -- sabbesaṃ bhayahetūnaṃ bodhimūleyeva pahīnattā kutocipi bhayābhāvato ^b^akutobhayaṃ^eb^ nibbhayaṃ, catuvesārajjavisāradaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi veneyyānaṃ yathārahamanusāsanato ^b^satthāraṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ mayhaṃ pitāmahena saddhiṃ gantvā yāya velāya sabbapaṭhamaṃ passiṃ, taṃ ^b^purisuttamaṃ^eb^ sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ passitvā tato dassanahetu ^b^tato^eb^ dassanato pacchā ``ettakaṃ kālaṃ satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ nālattha''nti mayhaṃ ^b^saṃvego ahu^eb^ sahottappaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajji. uppannasaṃvego panāhaṃ evaṃ cintesinti dasseti ^b^siriṃ hatthehī^eb^ti gāthāya. tassattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ vibhavatthiko puriso ``upaṭṭhāyiko hutvā tava santike vasissāmī''ti saviggahaṃ siriṃ sayane upagataṃ hatthehi ca pādehi ca koṭṭento ^b^paṇāmeyya^eb^ nīhareyya, ^b^so^eb^ tathārūpo alakkhikapuriso etādisaṃ ^b^satthāraṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ ^b^ārādhetvā^eb^ imasmiṃ navame khaṇe paṭilabhitvā ^b^virādhaye^eb^ tassa ovādākaraṇena taṃ virajjheyya, ahaṃ panevaṃ na karomīti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``tadāhaṃ...pe0... anagāriya''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^chaḍḍayi^eb^nti, pajahiṃ. ``chaḍḍiya''ntipi pāṭho. nanu ayaṃ thero dārapariggahaṃ akatvāva pabbajito, so kasmā ``puttadārañca ^a^M2.0157^ea^ chaḍḍayi''nti avocāti? yathā nāma puriso anibbattaphalameva rukkhaṃ chindanto acchinne tato laddhaphalehi parihīno nāma hoti. evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno^eb^ti yā adhisīlasikkhā, tāya ca, yattha bhikkhū saha jīvanti, ekajīvikā ^a^V2.0135^ea^ sabhāgavuttino honti, tena bhagavatā paññattasikkhāpadasaṅkhātena sājīvena ca samannāgato sikkhanabhāvena ^a^P2.0216^ea^ samaṅgībhūto, sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto hutvā tadubhayaṃ sampādentoti attho. tena suvisuddhe pātimokkhe sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^indriyesu susaṃvuto^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu suṭṭhu saṃvuto. rūpādivisayesu uppajjanakānaṃ abhijjhādīnaṃ pavattinivāraṇavasena satikavāṭena supihitacakkhādidvāroti attho. evaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarasīlasampattidassanena itarasīlampi atthato dassitameva hotīti thero attano catupārisuddhisīlasampadaṃ dassetvā ^b^``namassamāno sambuddha''^eb^nti iminā buddhānussatibhāvanānuyogamāha. ^b^vihāsiṃ aparājito^eb^ti kilesamārādīhi aparājito eva hutvā vihariṃ, yāva arahattappatti, tāva tehi anabhibhūto, aññadatthu te abhibhavanto eva vihāsinti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā, yasmā suvisuddhasīlo satthari abhippasanno kilesābhibhavanapaṭipattiyañca ṭhito, tasmā. ^b^paṇidhī^eb^ti paṇidhānaṃ. ^b^tato^eb^ vā cittābhinīhāro. ^b^āsī^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^cetaso abhipatthito^eb^ti, mama cittena icchito. kīdiso pana soti āha ^b^``na nisīde muhuttampi, taṇhāsalle anūhate''^eb^ti. ``aggamaggasaṇḍāsena mama hadayato taṇhāsalle anuddhaṭe muhuttampi na nisīde, nisajjaṃ na kappeyya''nti evaṃ me cittābhinīhāro ahosīti attho.

[03] evaṃ pana cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya bhāvanaṃ bhāvayitvā ṭhānacaṅkameheva rattiṃ vītināmento arūpasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``tassa me''^eb^tiādi. ^b^nirūpadhī^eb^ti kilesupadhiādīnaṃ abhāvena nirupadhi. ^b^ratyāvivasāne^eb^ti rattibhāgassa vigamane ^a^M2.0158^ea^ vibhātāya rattiyā. ^b^sūriyuggamanaṃ patī^eb^ti sūriyuggamanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā. ^b^sabbaṃ taṇha^eb^nti kāmataṇhādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ aggamaggena ^b^visosetvā^eb^ sukkhāpetvā ``taṇhāsalle anūhate na nisīde''ti, paṭiññāya mocitattā. ^b^pallaṅkena upāvisi^eb^nti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdinti. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] navakanipāte ^a^M2.0159^ea^ ^a^V2.0136^ea^ ^b^yadā dukkha^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato bhūtattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinanto siddhatthassa bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^a^P2.0217^ea^ ^b^seno^eb^ti laddhanāmo viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ disvā pasannamānaso ``usabhaṃ pavara''ntiādinā catūhi gāthāhi abhitthavi.

[03] so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāketanagarassa dvāragāme mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhissa putto hutvā nibbatti. tassa kira seṭṭhino jātā jātā dārakā baddhāghātena ekena yakkhena khāditā, imassa pana pacchimabhavikattā bhūtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. yakkho pana vessavaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gato, puna nāgamāsi. nāmakaraṇadivase cassa ``evaṃ kate amanussā anukampantā parihareyyu''nti ^b^bhūto^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. so pana attano puññabalena anantarāyo vaḍḍhi, tassa ``tayo pāsādā ahesu''ntiādi sabbaṃ yasassa kulaputtassa vibhavakittane viya veditabbaṃ. so viññutaṃ patto satthari sākete vasante upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gato. satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā ajakaraṇiyā nāma nadiyā tīre leṇe vasanto vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.7.20-28) --
[22] tatheva jhānaṃ buddhassa, ko disvā nappasīdati..
[22] tatheva sīlaṃ buddhassa, ko disvā nappasīdati..
[22] tatheva ñāṇaṃ buddhassa, ko disvā nappasīdati..

[01] arahattaṃ pana patvā aparena samayena ñātīnaṃ anukampāya sāketaṃ gantvā katipāhaṃ tehi upaṭṭhiyamāno añjanavane vasitvā puna attanā vasitaṭṭhānameva gantukāmo gamanākāraṃ dassesi. ñātakā ``idheva, bhante, vasatha, tumhepi na kilamissatha, mayampi puññena vaḍḍhissāmā''ti theraṃ yāciṃsu. thero attano vivekābhiratiṃ tattha ca phāsuvihāraṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``yadā dukkhaṃ jarāmaraṇanti paṇḍito, aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā.
[22] dukkhaṃ pariññāya satova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[22] taṇhaṃ pahantvāna satova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[22] paññāya passitva satova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[21] ``yadā ^a^P2.0218^ea^ asokaṃ virajaṃ asaṅkhataṃ, santaṃ padaṃ sabbakilesasodhanaṃ.
[22] bhāveti saññojanabandhanacchidaṃ, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[21] ``yadā nabhe gajjati meghadundubhi, dhārākulā vihagapathe samantato.
[22] bhikkhū ca pabbhāragatova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[22] tīre nisinno sumanova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[21] ``yadā nisīthe rahitamhi kānane, deve gaḷantamhi nadanti dāṭhino.
[22] bhikkhū ca pabbhāragatova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[22] vītaddaro vītakhilova jhāyati, tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindati..
[22] tato ratiṃ paramataraṃ na vindatī''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tatthāyaṃ ^a^M2.0162^ea^ padayojanāmukhena paṭhamagāthāya atthavaṇṇanā -- khandhānaṃ paripāko ^b^jarā^eb^. bhedo ^b^maraṇaṃ^eb^. jarāmaraṇasīsena cettha jarāmaraṇavanto dhammā gahitā. ``tayidaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkha''nti ^b^aviddasū^eb^ yathābhūtaṃ ajānantā ^b^puthujjanā yattha^eb^ yasmiṃ upādānakkhandhapañcake ^b^sitā^eb^ paṭibandhā allīnā, taṃ ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, na ito bhiyyo''ti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya parijānitvā, idha imasmiṃ sāsane ^b^sato^eb^ sampajāno, ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ bhikkhu, ^b^yadā^eb^ yasmiṃ kāle lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyati. ^b^tato^eb^ vipassanāratito maggaphalaratito ca ^b^paramataraṃ^eb^ uttamataraṃ ratiṃ ^b^na vindati^eb^ nappaṭilabhati. tenāha bhagavā --
