[03] ^b^velā^eb^ti duccaritehi anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena velā, sīmāti attho ^a^P2.0260^ea^. velāyati vā dussilyaṃ calayati viddhaṃsetīti velā. saṃvaraṃ sīlaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ uppattidvārassa pidahanato. ^b^abhihāsana^eb^nti tosanaṃ avippaṭisārahetutāya cittassābhippamodanato. ^b^titthañca sabbabuddhāna^eb^nti sāvakabuddhā, paccekabuddhā, sammāsambuddhāti sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ kilesamalappavāhane nibbānamahāsamuddāvagāhaṇe ca titthabhūtañca.

[03] ^b^sīlaṃ balaṃ appaṭima^eb^nti mārasenappamaddane asadisaṃ balaṃ senāthāmo ca. ^b^āvudhamuttama^eb^nti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ ^a^V2.0188^ea^ chedane uttamaṃ paharaṇaṃ. guṇasarīropasobhanaṭṭhena ^b^ābharaṇaṃ. seṭṭha^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ uttamaṃ dabbañca. sapāṇaparittānato ^b^kavacamabbhutaṃ^eb^. ``abbhida''nti ca paṭhanti, abhejjanti attho.

[03] apāyamahoghātikkamane saṃsāramahoghātikkamane ca kilesehi asaṃsīdanaṭṭhena ^b^setu. mahesakkho^eb^ti mahabbalo. ^b^gandho anuttaro^eb^ti paṭivātaṃ sabbadisāsu vāyanato anuttaro gandho sabbajanamanoharattā. tenāha ^b^``yena vāti disodisa''^eb^nti yena sīlagandhena taṃsamaṅgī disodisaṃ sabbā disā vāyati. ``disodisā''tipi pāḷi, dasa disāti attho.

[03] ^b^sambalamevagga^eb^nti sambalaṃ nāma puṭabhattaṃ. yathā puṭabhattaṃ gahetvā maggaṃ gacchanto puriso antarāmagge jighacchādukkhena na kilamati, evaṃ sīlasampannopi suddhaṃ sīlasambalaṃ gahetvā saṃsārakantāraṃ paṭipanno gatagataṭṭhāne na kilamatīti sīlaṃ aggaṃ sambalaṃ nāma. tathā ^b^sīlaṃ pātheyyamuttamaṃ^eb^ corādīhi asādhāraṇattā tattha tattha icchitabbasampattinipphādanato ca. atikkāmento taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ vā vāheti sampāpetīti ^b^ativāho, yānaṃ^eb^. kenaci anupaddutaṃ hutvā icchitaṭṭhānappattihetutāya ^a^M2.0222^ea^ sīlaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ativāho. ^b^yenā^eb^ti yena ativāhena ^b^yāti disodisa^eb^nti agatiṃ gatiñcāpi taṃ taṃ disaṃ sukheneva gacchati.

[03] ^b^idheva nindaṃ labhatī^eb^ti idhalokepi ^b^dummano^eb^ rāgādīhi dūsitacitto ``dussīlo pāpadhammo''ti nindaṃ garahaṃ labhati. ^b^pecca^eb^ paralokepi apāye ``purisattakali avajātā''tiādinā yamapurisādīhi ca nindaṃ labhati. na kevalaṃ nindameva labhati, atha kho ^b^sabbattha dummano bālo^eb^ idhaloke duccaritacaraṇena dūsitacitto paraloke kammakāraṇādivasena dukkhuppattiyāti sabbattha bālo dummano hoti. kathaṃ? ^b^sīlesu asamāhito^eb^ sammā sīlesu na ṭhapitacitto appatiṭṭhitacitto.

[03] ^b^idheva kittiṃ labhatī^eb^ti idhalokepi sumano ``sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo''ti kittiṃ labhati. ^b^pecca^eb^ paralokepi sagge ``ayaṃ sappuriso sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo. tathā hi devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapanno''tiādinā kittiṃ labhati. na kevalaṃ kittimeva labhati, atha kho ^a^P2.0261^ea^ ^b^dhīro^eb^ dhitisampanno ^b^sīlesu suṭṭhu samāhito^eb^ appitacitto supatiṭṭhitacitto sabbattha idhaloke sucaritacaraṇena, paraloke sampattipaṭilābhena ^b^sumano^eb^ somanassappatto hoti. ^b^sīlameva idha agga^eb^nti duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti. tattha lokiyaṃ tāva kāmaloke khattiyamahāsālādīsu, devaloke brahmaloke ca upapattivisesaṃ āvahati, lābhībhāvādikassa ca kāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0189^ea^ hoti. lokuttaraṃ pana sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ atikkāmetīti sīlaṃ aggameva. tathā hi vuttaṃ --

[02] ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu -- ``lābhī assaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.65), ``sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.65), ``ijjhati, bhikkhave, sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā''ti (a0 ni0 8.35; dī0 ni0 3.337) ca.

[03] lokuttarasīlassa ^a^M2.0223^ea^ pana sabbaso pahīnapaṭipakkhassa sattamabhavato paṭṭhāya saṃsāradukkhaṃ vinivattentassa aggabhāve vattabbameva natthi. ^b^paññavā pana uttamo^eb^ti ``paññavā pana puggalo uttamo paramo seṭṭhoyevā''ti puggalādhiṭṭhānena paññāya eva seṭṭhabhāvaṃ vadati. idāni sīlapaññānaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ kiccato dassento ^b^``sīlapaññāṇato jaya''^eb^nti āha. ^b^jaya^eb^nti ca liṅgavipallāso daṭṭhabbo, ahūti vā vacanaseso. tattha pajānanaṭṭhena paññāṇaṃ, sīlato paññāṇato ca paṭipakkhajayo. na hi sīlena vinā paññā sambhavati, paññāya ca vinā sīlaṃ kiccakaraṃ, aññamaññopakārakañcetaṃ. vuttañhi ``sīlaparidhotā paññā, paññāparidhotaṃ sīla''nti (dī0 ni0 1.317) ^b^manussesu ca devesū^eb^ti idaṃ nesaṃ ṭhānavisesadassanaṃ. tattha hi tāni savisesāni vattanti, samādhi panettha sīlapakkhiko paññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato, paññāpakkhiko vā bhāvetabbato sīlādhiṭṭhānato ca.
[03] evaṃ thero tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlamukhena dhammaṃ desento attano suvisuddhasīlādiguṇatādīpanena aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] ^b^nīce^eb^ ^a^P2.0262^ea^ ^b^kulamhī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sunītattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu ^a^V2.0190^ea^ katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto buddhassa suññakāle kulagehe nibbattitvā vayappatto bālajanehi saddhiṃ kīḷāpasuto hutvā vicaranto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ gāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā, ``kiṃ tuyhaṃ sabbaso vaṇitasarīrassa viya sakalaṃ kāyaṃ paṭicchādetvā bhikkhācaraṇena, nanu nāma kasivāṇijjādīhi jīvikā kappetabbā? tāni ce kātuṃ na sakkosi, ghare ghare muttakarīsādīni nīharanto pacchā vatthusodhanena jīvāhī''ti akkosi. so tena kammena niraye paccitvā tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena manussalokepi bahūni jātisatāni ^a^M2.0224^ea^ pupphachaḍḍakakule nibbattitvā tathā jīvikaṃ kappesi. imasmiñca buddhuppāde pupphachaḍḍakakule eva nibbatto ukkārasodhanakammena jīvikaṃ kappeti ghāsacchādanamattampi alabhanto.

[03] atha bhagavā pacchimayāme buddhāciṇṇaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento sunītassa hadayabbhantare ghaṭe padīpaṃ viya pajjalantaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā vibhātāya rattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho. yassaṃ vīthiyaṃ sunīto ukkārasodhanakammaṃ karoti, taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajji. sunītopi tattha tattha vighāsuccārasaṅkārādikaṃ rāsiṃ katvā piṭakesu pakkhipitvā kājenādāya pariharanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ satthāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sārajjamāno sambhamākulahadayo gamanamaggaṃ nilīyanokāsañca alabhanto kājaṃ bhittipasse ṭhapetvā ekena passena anupavisanto viya bhittiṃ allīno pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi. ``bhittichiddena apakkamitukāmo ahosī''tipi vadanti.

[03] satthā tassa samīpaṃ patvā ``ayaṃ attano kusalamūlasañcoditaṃ upagataṃ maṃ sārajjamāno jātiyā kammassa ca nihīnatāya sammukhībhāvampi lajjati, handassa vesārajjaṃ uppādessāmī''ti karavīkarutamañjunā sakalanagaraninnādavara-gambhīrena brahmassarena ``sunītā''ti ālapitvā ``kiṃ imāya dukkhajīvikāya pabbajituṃ sakkhissatī''ti āha. sunīto tena satthu vacanena amatena viya abhisitto uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedento ``bhagavā, sace mādisāpi idha pabbajjaṃ labhanti, kasmāhaṃ na pabbajissāmi, pabbājetha maṃ bhagavā''ti āha ^a^P2.0263^ea^. satthā ``ehi, bhikkhū''ti āha. so tāvadeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya hutvā satthu santike aṭṭhāsi. bhagavā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. so paṭhamaṃ aṭṭha samāpattiyo, pañca ca abhiññāyo nibbattetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā chaḷabhiñño ahosi. taṃ sakkādayo devā brahmāno ca upasaṅkamitvā namassiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``tā ^a^M2.0225^ea^ ^a^V2.0191^ea^ devatā sattasatā uḷārā, brahmā ca indo upasaṅkamitvā.

[03] bhagavā taṃyeva devasaṅghapurakkhataṃ disvā sitaṃ katvā pasaṃsanto ``tapena brahmacariyenā''ti gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi. atha naṃ sambahulā bhikkhū sīhanādaṃ nadāpetukāmā, ``āvuso sunīta, kasmā kulā tvaṃ pabbajito, kathaṃ vā pabbajito, kathañca saccāni paṭivijjhī''ti pucchiṃsu. so taṃ sabbaṃ pakāsento --
[22] nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvāna, vandissaṃ bahukaṃ janaṃ..
[22] `ehi bhikkhū'ti maṃ āha, sā me āsūpasampadā..
[22] akāsiṃ satthu vacanaṃ, yathā maṃ ovadī jino..
[22] indo brahmā ca āgantvā, maṃ namassiṃsu pañjalī..
[22] yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisa..

[03] tattha ^b^nīce^eb^ti lāmake sabbanihīne. uccanīcabhāvo hi nāma sattānaṃ upādāyupādāya, ayaṃ pana sabbanihīne pukkusakule uppannataṃ dassento ^b^``nīce kulamhi jāto''^eb^ti āha. tena vuttaṃ -- ``nīceti lāmake sabbanihīne''ti. ^b^daliddo^eb^ti duggato, daliddāpi keci kadāci ghāsacchādanassa lābhino, akasiravuttino honti, ahaṃ pana sabbakālaṃ kasiravuttitāya hīno uddhanaṃ upaṭṭhapitaukkhaliko dassanayuttaṃ thevakampi apassiṃ yevāti dassento ^b^``appabhojano''^eb^ti āha. nīcakulikā daliddāpi keci anīcakammājīvā honti, mayhaṃ pana na tathāti dassento āha ^b^``hīnakammaṃ mamaṃ āsī''^eb^ti. kīdisanti ce? ^b^ahosiṃ pupphachaḍḍako,^eb^ hatthavikalassa hatthavāti viya upacāravasenāyaṃ imassa samaññā ahosi yadidaṃ ``pupphachaḍḍako''ti. milātapupphasantharavaṇṇatāya vā ukkārabhūmiyā evaṃ vutto.

[03] ^b^jigucchito^eb^ti jātiyā ceva kammunā ca hīḷito. ^b^manussāna^eb^nti manussehi. ^b^paribhūto^eb^ti avaññāto. ^b^vambhito^eb^ti khuṃsito. ^b^nīcaṃ manaṃ karitvānā^eb^ti aññe manusse sineruṃ viya ukkhipitvā tesaṃ pādapaṃsutopi attānaṃ nihīnaṃ katvā pavattiyā nīcaṃ nihīnaṃ manaṃ katvā. ^b^vandissaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0227^ea^ ^b^bahukaṃ jana^eb^nti puthumahājanaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭhakāle vandiṃ sirasi añjaliṃ karonto paṇāmiṃ.

[03] ^b^athā^eb^ti adhikārantaradīpane nipāto. ^b^addasāsi^eb^nti addakkhiṃ. ^b^magadhāna^eb^nti magadhā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā, tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhiyā ``magadhāna''nti vutto, magadhajanapadassāti attho. ^b^puruttama^eb^nti uttamaṃ nagaraṃ.

[03] ^b^byābhaṅgi^eb^nti kājaṃ. ^b^pabbajjaṃ ahamāyāci^eb^nti, ``sunīta, pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī''ti satthārā okāse kate ahaṃ pabbajjaṃ ayāciṃ. ^b^āsūpasampadā^eb^ti ``ehi, bhikkhū''ti satthu vacanamattena āsi upasampadā. ^b^yathā maṃ ovadī^eb^ti ``evaṃ samathapubbaṅgamaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvehī''ti yathā maṃ ovadi, tathā satthuno vacanaṃ ^b^akāsiṃ^eb^ paṭipajjiṃ. ^b^rattiyā^eb^tiādi tassā paṭipattiyā rasadassanaṃ. tattha pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ ^a^P2.0265^ea^ anāgataṃsañāṇañca bahukiccanti ``^b^paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0193^ea^ ^b^majjhimaṃ yāma''^eb^nti accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ vuttaṃ. na tathā āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ ekābhisamayavasena pavattanatoti ^b^``pacchime yāme''^eb^ti bhummavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^indo^eb^ti sakko devarājā. ^b^brahmā^eb^ti mahābrahmā. indabrahmaggahaṇena aññesaṃ kāmadevānaṃ brahmūnañca āgamanaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaniddeso hesa yathā ``rājā āgato''ti. ^b^namassiṃsū^eb^ti kāyena vācāya ca namakkāraṃ akaṃsu.

[01] tattha kāyena kataṃ namakkāraṃ dassento ^b^``pañjalī''^eb^ti vatvā vācāya kataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``namo te''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^devasaṅghapurakkhata^eb^nti devaggahaṇena upapattidevabhāvato brahmānopi gahitā. ^b^sitaṃ pātukaritvānā^eb^ti attano ovādassa mahapphalataṃ devabrahmūnañca guṇasampattiṃ nissāya satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. pātukaronto ca na aññe viya dante vidaṃseti, mukhādhānaṃ pana thokaṃ vivarati, tattakena ca abhibhūtadibbaphalikamuttarasmiyo avahasitatārakāsasimarīciyo susukkadāṭhasambhavā ghanarasmiyo nikkhamitvā tikkhattuṃ satthu mukhaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonti, taṃ disvā pacchato gacchantāpi satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti sañjānanti.

[03] ^b^tapenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0228^ea^ indriyasaṃvarena, ``dhutadhammasamādānenā''ti keci. ^b^saṃyamenā^eb^ti sīlena. ^b^damenā^eb^ti paññāya. ^b^brahmacariyenā^eb^ti avasiṭṭhaseṭṭhacariyāya. ^b^etenā^eb^ti yathāvuttena tapādinā. ^b^brāhmaṇo hoti^eb^ bāhitapāpabhāvato. ^b^eta^eb^nti tapādi yathāvuttaṃ. ^b^brāhmaṇamuttama^eb^nti uttamaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ, brāhmaṇesu vā uttamaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ, ahūti vacanaseso. ^b^brāhmaṇa^eb^nti vā brahmaññamāha, evaṃ uttamaṃ brahmaññaṃ, na jaccādīti adhippāyo. na hi jātikulapadesagottasampattiādayo ariyabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ, adhisīlasikkhādayo eva pana kāraṇaṃ. tenāha --
[03] evaṃ thero tehi bhikkhūhi pucchitamatthaṃ imāhi gāthāhi vissajjento sīhanādaṃ nadīti.

[03] terasanipāte ^a^M2.0229^ea^ ^a^V2.0194^ea^ ^a^P2.0266^ea^ ^b^yāhu raṭṭhe^eb^tiādikā āyasmato soṇassa koḷivisassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacini. ayaṃ kira anomadassissa bhagavato kāle mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā pasannamānaso satthu caṅkamanaṭṭhāne sudhāya parikammaṃ kāretvā nānāvaṇṇehi pupphehi santharitvā upari nānāvirāgavatthehi vitānaṃ bandhāpesi, tathā satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca dīghasālaṃ kāretvā niyyādesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti, ^b^sirivaḍḍho^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā, sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānamakāsi. satthāpi tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.

[01] sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahi. paccekabuddho vuṭṭhavasso paripuṇṇaparikkhāro gandhamādanameva gato. sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ tattha puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle campānagare usabhaseṭṭhissa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhissa mahābhogakkhandho abhivaḍḍhi. tassa jātadivase sakalanagare mahāsakkārasampanno ahosi, tassa pubbe paccekabuddhassa satasahassagghanikarattakambalapariccāgena suvaṇṇavaṇṇo sukhumālataro ca attabhāvo ahosi, tenassa ^b^soṇo^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhati ^a^M2.0230^ea^, tassa hatthapādatalāni bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇāni ahesuṃ, satavihatakappāsassa viya samphasso pādatalesu maṇikuṇḍalāvaṭṭavaṇṇāni lomāni ^a^V2.0195^ea^ jāyiṃsu. vayappattassa tassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni upaṭṭhāpesuṃ. so tattha mahatiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavanto devakumāro viya paṭivasati.

[03] atha ^a^P2.0267^ea^ amhākaṃ satthari sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante bimbisāraraññā pakkosāpito asītiyā gāmikasahassehi saddhiṃ rājagahaṃ āgato, satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā, janasaṃsaggapariharaṇatthaṃ sītavane vasanto ``mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya, padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhahitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto, ``evaṃ vāyamantopi ahaṃ maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā nibbattetuṃ na sakkomi, kiṃ me pabbajjāya, hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjissāmi, puññāni ca karissāmī''ti cintesi. satthā tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. soṇattheropi satthu sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.5.25-53) --
[22] sudhāya lepanaṃ katvā, caṅkamaṃ kārayiṃ ahaṃ..
[21] ``yo so haṭṭhena cittena, dīghasālaṃ adāsi me.
[22] okkāko nāma nāmena, rājā raṭṭhe bhavissati..
[22] taruṇī ca piyā kaññā, mahesittaṃ karissati..
[22] varaṃ laddhāna sā kaññā, putte pabbājayissati..
[22] mā no jāti pabhijjīti, nikhaṇissanti khattiyā..
[22] ṭhatvāna yogassa payuttatādino, tatottariṃ pāramatā na vijjati..
[22] bhāro me ohito sabbo, nibbutomhi anāsavo..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā udānavasena aññābyākaraṇavasena ca --
[22] svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho, soṇo dukkhassa pāragū..
[21] ``pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye.
[22] sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṃ na gacchati..
[27] akiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino.
[27] vīṇopamaṃ karitvā me, dhammaṃ deseti cakkhumā.
[22] tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, vihāsiṃ sāsane rato..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] katassa paticayo natthi, karaṇīyaṃ na vijjati..
[22] evaṃ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā..
[22] ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ visaññuttaṃ, vayañcassānupassatī''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yāhu raṭṭhe samukkaṭṭho^eb^ti yo ahu ahosi aṅgaraṭṭhe asītiyā gāmikasahassehi bhogasampattiyā issariyasampattiyā ca sammā ativiya ukkaṭṭho seṭṭho. ^b^rañño aṅgassa paddhagū^eb^ti catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisāya rañjanaṭṭhena rañño aṅgādhipatino bimbisārassa parivārabhūto gahapativiseso tassa raṭṭhe kuṭumbiko ahūti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^svājja dhammesu ukkaṭṭho^eb^ti so soṇo ajjetarahi lokuttaradhammesu ukkaṭṭho jāto, gihikālepi kehici ukkaṭṭhoyeva hutvā idāni pabbajitakālepi ukkaṭṭhoyeva hotīti attānameva paraṃ viya dasseti. ^b^dukkhassa pāragū^eb^ti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa pāraṃ pariyantaṃ gato, etena dhammesu ukkaṭṭhoti avisesena vuttaṃ ukkaṭṭhabhāvaṃ viseseti arahattādhigamadīpanato.

[03] idāni yāya paṭipattiyā dukkhapāragū jāto, aññāpadesena taṃ dassento ^b^``pañca chinde''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- apāyakāmasugatisampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso satthena pāde baddharajjukaṃ viya heṭṭhimena maggattayena chindeyya, rūpārūpabhavasampāpakāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṃ viya aggamaggena jaheyya, chindeyya, tesaṃ pana uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya pañca saddhādīni indriyāni ^a^P2.0269^ea^ uttari ^b^bhāvaye^eb^ ^a^V2.0199^ea^ bhāveyya. evaṃbhūto pana bhikkhu rāgasaṅgo dosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgoti pañcannaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkamanena ^b^pañcasaṅgātigo^eb^ hutvā, kāmogho, bhavogho, diṭṭhogho, avijjoghoti catunnaṃ oghānaṃ tiṇṇattā ^b^oghatiṇṇo^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] ayañca oghataraṇapaṭipattisīlādīnaṃ pāripūriyāva hoti, sīlādayo ca mānādippahānena pāripūriṃ gacchanti, na aññathāti dassento ^b^``unnaḷassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^unnaḷassā^eb^ti uggatatucchamānassa. māno ^a^M2.0235^ea^ hi unnamanākāravuttiyā tucchabhāvena naḷo viyāti ``naḷo''ti vuccati. ^b^pamattassā^eb^ti sativossaggena pamādaṃ āpannassa. ^b^bāhirāsassā^eb^ti bāhiresu āyatanesu āsāvato, kāmesu avītarāgassāti attho. ^b^sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, pāripūriṃ na gacchatī^eb^ti tassa sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhasevino lokiyopi tāva sīlādiguṇo pāripūriṃ na gacchati, pageva lokuttaro.

[03] tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``yañhi kicca''^eb^ntiādinā. bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṃ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanārāmatāti evamādi kiccaṃ nāma. yehi pana idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ attano kiccaṃ, taṃ apaviddhaṃ akaraṇena chaḍḍitaṃ. ^b^akicca^eb^nti pattamaṇḍanaṃ cīvarakāyabandhanāṃsabaddhachattupāhanatālavaṇṭadhammakaraṇamaṇḍananti evamādi parikkhāramaṇḍanaṃ paccayabāhuliyanti evamādi bhikkhuno akiccaṃ nāma, taṃ kayirati, tesaṃ mānanaḷaṃ ukkhipitvā caraṇena ^b^unnaḷānaṃ^eb^ sativossaggena ^b^pamattānaṃ^eb^ cattāropi āsavā vaḍḍhanti.

[03] yesaṃ pana paññādiguṇo vaḍḍhati, te dassetuṃ ^b^``yesa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^susamāraddhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu paggahitā. ^b^kāyagatā satī^eb^ti, kāyānupassanābhāvanā. ^b^akiccaṃ te^eb^ti te etaṃ pattamaṇḍanādiakiccaṃ. ^b^na sevantī^eb^ti na karonti. ^b^kicce^eb^ti, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kattabbe aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanādike. ^b^sātaccakārino^eb^ti satatakārino tesaṃ satiyā avippavāsena ^b^satānaṃ^eb^ sātthakasampajaññaṃ, sappāyasampajaññaṃ, gocarasampajaññaṃ, asammohasampajaññanti catūhi sampajaññehi ^b^sampajānānaṃ,^eb^ cattāropi ^b^āsavā atthaṃ gacchanti^eb^ parikkhayaṃ abhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.

[03] idāni attano santike ṭhitabhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dento ^b^``ujumaggamhī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^ujumaggamhi akkhāte^eb^ti antadvayaparivajjanena kāyavaṅkādippahānena ca ujuke majjhimapaṭipadābhūte ariyamagge satthārā bhāsite. ^b^gacchathā^eb^ti paṭipajjatha. ^b^mā nivattathā^eb^ti antarā ^a^V2.0200^ea^ vosānaṃ māpajjatha. ^b^attanā codayattāna^eb^nti idha ^a^P2.0270^ea^ atthakāmo kulaputto apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādinā ^a^M2.0236^ea^ attanāva attānaṃ codento. ^b^nibbānamabhihāraye^eb^ti, attānaṃ nibbānaṃ abhihareyya upaneyya, yathā naṃ sacchikaroti, tathā paṭipajjeyyāti attho.

[01] idāni mayāpi evameva paṭipannanti, attano paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``accāraddhamhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^accāraddhamhi vīriyamhī^eb^ti vipassanaṃ bhāventena mayā samādhinā vīriyaṃ samarasaṃ akatvā ativiya vīriye paggahite. accāraddhavīriyatā cassa heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. ^b^vīṇopamaṃ karitvā me^eb^ti āyasmato soṇassa ``ye kho keci bhagavato sāvakā āraddhavīriyā viharanti. ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro, atha ca pana me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, tasmāhaṃ vibbhamissāmī''ti citte uppanne satthā iddhiyā tassa sammukhe attānaṃ dassetvā ``kasmā tvaṃ, soṇa, `vibbhamissāmī'ti cittaṃ uppādesi, kusalo tvaṃ pubbe agāriyabhūto vīṇāya tantissare''ti pucchitvā tena ``evaṃ, bhante''ti vutte ``taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa? yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? no hetaṃ, bhante! taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? no hetaṃ, bhante. taṃ kiṃ maññasi, soṇa, yadā pana te vīṇāya tantiyo neva accāyatā honti, nātisithilā same guṇe patiṭṭhitā, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṃ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti? evaṃ, bhante. evameva kho, soṇa, accāraddhavīriyaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati, atilīnavīriyaṃ kosajjāya saṃvattati, tasmātiha tvaṃ, soṇa, vīriyasamataṃ adhiṭṭhaha, indriyānañca samataṃ paṭivijjhā''ti evaṃ vīṇaṃ upamaṃ katvā pavattitena vīṇopamovādena mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. ^b^tassāhaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā^eb^ti tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ vīṇopamovādaṃ sutvā antarā uppannaṃ vibbhamitukāmataṃ pahāya satthu sāsane ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato vihariṃ.

[03] viharanto ca ^b^samathaṃ paṭipādesiṃ^eb^ vīriyasamataṃ yojento saddhāpaññānaṃ viya samādhivīriyānaṃ samarasataṃ uppādento jhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanāsamādhiṃ ^a^M2.0237^ea^ sampādesiṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpesiṃ. tattha payojanaṃ āha ^b^``uttamatthassa pattiyā''^eb^ti. ^b^uttamatthassa pattiyā^eb^ti arahattādhigamāyāti attho.

[03] idāni yathā paṭipannassa samathavipassanā sampajjiṃsu, taṃ ^a^P2.0271^ea^ aññāpadesena dassento ^b^``nekkhamme''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nekkhamme^eb^ti pabbajjādike kāmanissaraṇe. ^b^adhimuttassā^eb^ti tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ^a^V2.0201^ea^ yuttappayuttassa, paṭhamaṃ tāva pabbajjābhimukho hutvā kāme pahāya pabbajitvā ca sīlavisodhanaṃ araññavāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanābhiyogoti evamādīsu anavajjadhammesu yuttappayuttassāti attho. ^b^pavivekañca cetaso^eb^ti cetaso pavivekañca adhimuttassa evaṃ nekkhammādhimuttassa sato catukkapañcakajjhānānaṃ nibbattanena viveke yuttassa payuttassa. ^b^abyābajjhādhimuttassā^eb^ti abyābajjhe nidukkhatāya adhimuttassa jhānasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā samathasukhe yuttappayuttassa. ^b^upādānakkhayassa cā^eb^ti catunnampi upādānānaṃ khayante arahatte adhimuttassa. bhummatthe hi etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. taṃ yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattādhigamāya vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassāti attho.

[03] ^b^taṇhakkhayādhimuttassā^eb^ti taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayo, nibbānaṃ, tasmiṃ adhimuttassa upādiṃ bhayato, anupādiñca khemato dassanena nirodhe ninnapoṇapabbhārassa. ^b^asammohañca cetaso^eb^ti asammohasampajaññavasena cittassa asammohapavattiṃ sammohasamucchindanena vā cittassa asammohabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ adhimuttassa. ^b^disvā āyatanuppāda^eb^nti cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ yathāsakapaccayehi khaṇe khaṇe uppādaṃ, tappaṭipakkhato nirodhañca vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya disvā dassanahetu ^b^sammā cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^ti sammā hetunā ñāyena maggapaṭipāṭiyā sabbāsavato cittaṃ vimuccati.

[01] ^b^``tassa sammā vimuttassā''^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- tassa vuttanayena sammadeva sabbasaṃkilesato vimuttassa, tato eva accantupasamena santacittassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno katassa kusalassa akusalassa vā upacayo natthi maggeneva samugghātitattā, pariññādibhedaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ^a^M2.0238^ea^ na vijjati katakiccattā. evaṃ bhūtassa yathā ^b^ekaghano^eb^ selo pabbato pakativātena ^b^na samīrati^eb^ na saṃkampati, evaṃ iṭṭhā ca aniṭṭhā ca rūpādayo ārammaṇadhammā ^b^tādino^eb^ tādibhāvappattassa ^b^ṭhitaṃ^eb^ anejaṃ pahīnasabbasokatāya visaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ ^b^nappavedhanti^eb^ na cālenti. assa ca ārammaṇadhammassa kālena kālaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vipassanto ^b^vayaṃ^eb^ nirodhaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ anupassatīti aññaṃ byākāsi.

[03] cuddasakanipāte ^a^M2.0239^ea^ ^a^V2.0202^ea^ ^a^P2.0272^ea^ ^b^yadā aha^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato khadiravaniyarevatattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? kāmañcimassa therassa gāthā heṭṭhā ekakanipāte (theragā0 aṭṭha0 1. khadiravaniyattheragāthāvaṇṇanā) āgatā. tattha panassa attano bhāgineyyesu satijananamattaṃ dassitanti tassā ekakanipāte saṅgaho kato. imā pana therassa pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva parinibbānā paṭipattipakāsitā gāthā imasmiṃ cuddasakanipāte saṅgahaṃ āropitā. tattha aṭṭhuppatti heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. ayaṃ pana viseso -- thero kira arahattaṃ patvā kālena kālaṃ satthu dhammasenāpatippabhūtīnaṃ mahātherānañca upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā katipāhameva tattha vasitvā khadiravanameva paccāgantvā phalasamāpattisukhena brahmavihārehi ca vītināmeti. evaṃ gacchante kāle jiṇṇo vuḍḍho vayo anuppatto ahosi. so ekadivasaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge sāvatthiyā avidūre araññe vasi. tena ca samayena corā nagare katakammā ārakkhamanussehi anubandhā palāyantā therassa samīpe gahitabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. manussā anudhāvantā therassa samīpe bhaṇḍaṃ disvā theraṃ bandhitvā ``coro''ti saññāya gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ, ``ayaṃ, deva, coro''ti. rājā theraṃ muñcāpetvā, ``kiṃ, bhante, tumhehi idaṃ corikakammaṃ kataṃ vā, no vā''ti pucchi. thero kiñcāpi jātito paṭṭhāya attanā tādisaṃ na katapubbaṃ, taṃ pabbajitato paṭṭhāya pana akatabhāvassa, sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tādisassa karaṇe abhabbatāya pakāsanatthaṃ samīpe ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rañño ca dhammaṃ desento --
[22] evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati..
[22] evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā..
[22] handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ vippamuttomhi sabbadhī''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tatthāyaṃ ^a^M2.0241^ea^ apubbapadavaṇṇanā ^b^imasmiṃ dīghamantare^eb^ti, yadā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi, tato paṭṭhāya ayañca me carimakālo, etasmiṃ dīghamantare kāle ``idaṃ mayhaṃ hotū''ti abhijjhāvasena vā, ``ime sattā haññantū''tiādinā byāpādavasena vā anariyaṃ dosasaṃhitaṃ saṅkappaṃ nābhijānāmīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^mettañca^eb^ ^a^V2.0204^ea^ ^b^abhijānāmī^eb^ti, mijjati siniyhati etāyāti mettā, abyāpādo. mettā etissā atthīti mettā, mettābhāvanā mettābrahmavihāro, taṃ mettaṃ. ca-saddena karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkhañcāti itarabrahmavihāre saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^abhijānāmī^eb^ti, abhimukhato jānāmi. adhigatañhi jhānaṃ paccavekkhato paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa abhimukhaṃ hoti. kīdisanti āha ^b^``appamāṇa''^eb^ntiādi. tañhi yathā ^b^buddhena^eb^ bhagavatā desitaṃ, tathā anodissakapharaṇavasena aparimāṇasattārammaṇatāya ^b^appamāṇaṃ^eb^. paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena suṭṭhu bhāvitattā ^b^subhāvitaṃ^eb^. paṭhamaṃ mettā, tato karuṇā, tato muditā, pacchā upekkhāti evaṃ ^b^anupubbaṃ^eb^ anukkamena ^b^paricitaṃ^eb^ āsevitaṃ, bahulīkataṃ abhijānāmīti yojanā.

[03] sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ mitto, sabbe vā te mayhaṃ mittāti ^b^sabbamitto^eb^. mettañhi ^a^P2.0274^ea^ bhāvento sattānaṃ piyo hoti. ^b^sabbasakho^eb^ti, etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^sabbabhūtānukampako^eb^ti, sabbasattānaṃ anuggaṇhanako. ^b^mettacittañca bhāvemī^eb^ti, mettāya sahitaṃ sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ visesato bhāvemi, vaḍḍhemi, pakāsemi vā akathentepi bhāvanāya ukkaṃsagatabhāvato. ``mettaṃ cittañca bhāvemī''ti vā pāṭho. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayova. ^b^abyāpajjarato^eb^ti, abyāpajje sattānaṃ hitūpasaṃhāre abhirato. ^b^sadā^eb^ti, sabbakālaṃ, tena tattha sātaccakiriyaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^asaṃhīra^eb^nti na saṃhīraṃ, āsannapaccatthikena rāgena anākaḍḍhaniyaṃ. ^b^asaṃkuppa^eb^nti na kuppaṃ, dūrapaccatthikena byāpādena akopiyaṃ, evaṃbhūtaṃ katvā mama mettacittaṃ ^b^āmodayāmi^eb^ abhippamodayāmi brahmavihāraṃ bhāvemi. ^b^akāpurisasevita^eb^nti, kāpurisehi nīcajanehi asevitaṃ, akāpurisehi vā ariyehi buddhādīhi sevitaṃ brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ niddosaṃ mettādivihāraṃ bhāvemi vaḍḍhemīti attho.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0242^ea^ attuddesavasena pañcahi gāthāhi attano paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aññāpadesena dassento ^b^``avitakka''^eb^ntiādinā catasso gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^avitakkaṃ samāpanno^eb^ti, vitakkavirahitaṃ dutiyādijhānaṃ samāpanno, etena thero brahmavihārabhāvanāya aññāpadesena attanā dutiyādijhānādhigamamāha. yasmā panāyaṃ thero tameva jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ekāsaneneva arahattaṃ gaṇhi, tasmā tamatthaṃ aññāpadeseneva dassento ``avitakkaṃ samāpanno''ti vatvā ^b^``sammāsambuddhasāvako. ariyena tuṇhībhāvena, upeto hoti tāvade''^eb^ti āha. tattha vacīsaṅkhārābhāvato avitakkāvicārā samāpatti ``ariyo tuṇhībhāvo''ti vadanti. ``sannipatitānaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dvayaṃ karaṇīyaṃ dhammī vā kathā ariyo ^a^V2.0205^ea^ vā tuṇhībhāvo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.273) pana vacanato yā kāci samāpatti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo nāma. idha pana catutthajjhānikā aggaphalasamāpatti adhippetā.

[03] idāni tassādhigatattā lokadhammehi akampanīyataṃ upamāya pakāsento ^b^``yathāpi pabbato''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yathāpi pabbato selo^eb^ti, yathā silāmayo ekaghanaselo pabbato, na paṃsupabbato na missakapabbatoti attho. ^b^acalo suppatiṭṭhito^eb^ti, suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitamūlo pakativātehi acalo akampanīyo hoti, tasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca ^b^evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhatī^eb^ti mohassa anavasesappahānā, mohamūlakattā ca sabbākusalānaṃ pahīnasabbākusalo bhikkhu yathā so pabbato pakativātehi, evaṃ lokadhammehi na vedhati na kampati, mohakkhayoti vā yasmā arahattaṃ nibbānañca vuccati ^a^P2.0275^ea^, tasmā mohakkhayāti mohakkhayassa hetu nibbānassa arahattassa ca adhigatattā catūsu ariyasaccesu suppatiṭṭhito asamāpannakālepi pabbato viya na vedhati, pageva samāpannakāleti adhippāyo.

[03] idāni pāpaṃ nāmetaṃ asucisīlo eva samācarati, na ca sucisīlo, sucisīlassa pana taṃ aṇumattampi bhāriyaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti dassento ^b^``anaṅgaṇassā''^eb^tiādigāthamāha ^a^M2.0243^ea^. tassattho -- rāgādiaṅgaṇābhāvato ^b^anaṅgaṇassa^eb^ sabbakālaṃ sucianavajjadhamme eva gavesantassa sappurisassa ^b^vālaggamattaṃ^eb^ kesaggamattaṃ pāpassa lesamattampi sakalaṃ lokadhātuṃ pharitvā ṭhitaṃ abbhamattaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tasmā na evarūpe kamme mādisā āsaṅkitabbāti adhippāyo.

[03] yasmā nikkilesesupi andhabālā evarūpe apavāde samuṭṭhāpenti, tasmā atthakāmehi sakkaccaṃ attā rakkhitabboti ovādaṃ dento ^b^``nagaraṃ yathā''^eb^tiādigāthamāha. tassattho -- yathā pana paccantanagaravāsīhi manussehi paccantaṃ nagaraṃ dvārapākārādīni thirāni karontehi sāntaraṃ, uddāpaparikhādīni thirāni karontehi sabāhiranti ^b^santarabāhiraṃ^eb^ guttaṃ karīyati, evaṃ tumhehipi satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ajjhattikāni cha dvārāni pidahitvā dvārarakkhitaṃ satiṃ avissajjetvā yathā gayhamānāni bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ajjhattikāni upaghātāya saṃvattanti, tathā aggahaṇena tānipi thirāni katvā tesaṃ appavesāya dvārarakkhitaṃ satiṃ appahāya vicarantā attānaṃ gopetha. kasmā? ^b^khaṇo vo mā upaccagā^eb^. yo hi evaṃ attānaṃ na gopeti, taṃ puggalaṃ buddhuppādakkhaṇo, manussattabhāvakkhaṇo, majjhimadese uppattikkhaṇo, sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakkhaṇo, channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakkhaṇoti sabbopi ayaṃ khaṇo atikkamati, so khaṇo tumhe mā atikkamatūti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0206^ea^ thero imāya gāthāya sarājikaṃ parisaṃ bhikkhū ca ovaditvā puna maraṇe jīvite ca attano samacittataṃ katakiccatañca pakāsento ^b^``nābhinandāmi maraṇa''^eb^ntiādimāha. taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva (theragā0 aṭṭha0 2.607).

[03] evaṃ pana vatvā attano parinibbānakālaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ disvā saṅkhepeneva nesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā parinibbānaṃ pavedento osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^sampādethappamādenā^eb^ti sampādetabbaṃ dānasīlādiṃ appamādena sampādetha, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikapabhede gahaṭṭhavatte sīlānurakkhaṇe samathānuyoge vipassanābhāvanāya ca ^a^P2.0276^ea^ appamattā hotha. ^b^esā me anusāsanī^eb^ti dānasīlādīsu na pamajjathāti esā mama anusiṭṭhi ovādo.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0244^ea^ sikhāpattaṃ parahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpetvā attahitapaṭipattiyāpi matthakaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^``handāhaṃ parinibbissaṃ, vippamuttomhi sabbadhī''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^vippamuttomhi sabbadhī^eb^ti sabbaso kilesehi bhavehi ca vippamutto amhi, tasmā ekaṃsena parinibbāyissāmīti.
[03] evaṃ pana vatvā ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā pajjalanto anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.

[01] ^b^yathāpi bhaddo^eb^tiādikā āyasmato godattattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ satthavāhakule nibbatto. ^b^godatto^eb^ti nāmena vayappatto pitari kālaṅkate kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapento pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya aparāparaṃ sañcaritvā vāṇijjena jīvikaṃ kappeti yathāvibhavaṃ puññānipi karoti. so ekadivasaṃ antarāmagge dhure yuttagoṇe vahituṃ asakkonte patite manussesu taṃ vuṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontesu sayameva gantvā taṃ naṅguṭṭhe gāḷhaṃ vijjhi. goṇo ``ayaṃ asappuriso mama balābalaṃ ajānanto gāḷhaṃ vijjhatī''ti kuddho manussavācāya, ``bho godatta, ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ attano balaṃ aniguhanto tuyhaṃ ^a^V2.0207^ea^ bhāraṃ vahiṃ, ajja pana asamatthabhāvena patitaṃ maṃ ativiya bādhasi, hotu, ito cavitvā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne taṃ bādhetuṃ samattho paṭisattu bhaveyya''nti patthanānurūpena akkosi. taṃ sutvā godatto ``evaṃ nāma satte bādhetvā kiṃ imāya jīvikāyā''ti saṃvegajāto sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ pahāya aññatarassa mahātherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento ekadivasaṃ attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ ariyagaṇānaṃ lokadhamme ārabbha dhammaṃ kathento --
[21] ``evaṃ paññāya ye tittā, samuddo vārinā yathā.
[22] narā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti, tedha socanti māṇavā..
[22] ṭhitā te indakhīlova, na te unnataonatā..
[21] ``na heva lābhe nālābhe, na yase na ca kittiyā.
[22] na nindāyaṃ pasaṃsāya, na te dukkhe sukhamhi ca..
[21] ``dhammena ca alābho yo, yo ca lābho adhammiko.
[22] alābho dhammiko seyyo, yañce lābho adhammiko..
[21] ``yaso ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo.
[22] ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ, na yaso appabuddhinaṃ..
[21] ``dummedhehi pasaṃsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā.
[22] maraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammikaṃ..
[22] caranti loke asitā, natthi tesaṃ piyāpiyaṃ..
[22] pappuyya paramaṃ santiṃ, parinibbantināsavā''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^ājañño^eb^ti, usabhājānīyo. ^b^dhure yutto^eb^ti, sakaṭadhure yojito. ^b^dhurassaho^eb^ti, dhuravāho. gāthāsukhatthañcettha dvisakārato niddeso kato, sakaṭabhāraṃ vahituṃ samatthoti attho. ^b^mathito atibhārenā^eb^ti, atibhārena garubhārena pīḷito. ``maddito''tipi pāḷi, so evattho. ^b^saṃyuga^eb^nti, attano khandhe ṭhapitaṃ yugaṃ ^b^nātivattati^eb^ na atikkāmeti, sammā yo uddharitvā dhuraṃ chaḍḍetvā na tiṭṭhati. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā so dhorayho attano bhadrājānīyatāya attano dhīravīratāya attano bhāraṃ nātivattati na pariccajati, evaṃ ye vārinā viya mahāsamuddo lokiyalokuttarāya ^b^paññāya tittā^eb^ dhātā paripuṇṇā, te pare nihīnapaññe na atimaññanti, na paribhavanti. tattha ^a^P2.0278^ea^ kāraṇamāha ^b^``ariyadhammova pāṇina''^eb^nti, pāṇinaṃ sattesu ayaṃ ariyānaṃ dhammo yadidaṃ tesaṃ paññāya pāripūriṃ gatattā lābhādinā attānukkaṃsanaṃ viya alābhādinā paresaṃ avambhanaṃ.

[03] evaṃ paññāpāripūriyā ariyānaṃ sukhavihāraṃ dassetvā tadabhāvato anariyānaṃ dukkhavihāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kāle''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāle^eb^ti lābhālābhādinā samaṅgībhūtakāle. ^b^kālavasaṃ pattā^eb^ti lābhādikālassa ca vasaṃ upagatā, lābhādinā somanassitā alābhādinā ca domanassitāti attho. ^b^bhavābhavavasaṃ gatā^eb^ti bhavassa abhavassa ca vasaṃ upagatā vuddhihāniyo anuvattantā te. ^b^narā dukkhaṃ nigacchanti, tedha socanti māṇavā^eb^ti te narā ``māṇavā''ti laddhanāmā sattā lābhālābhādivasena vuddhihānivasena anurodhapaṭivirodhaṃ āpannā idhaloke socanti, paraloke ca nirayādidukkhaṃ gacchanti pāpuṇantīti attho.

[03] ^b^``unnatā''^eb^tiādināpi ^a^M2.0247^ea^ lokadhammavasena sattānaṃ anatthappattimeva dasseti. tattha ^b^unnatā sukhadhammenā^eb^ti sukhahetunā sukhapaccayena bhogasampattiādinā unnatiṃ gatā, bhogamadādinā mattāti attho. ^b^dukkhadhammena conatā^eb^ti dukkhahetunā dukkhapaccayena bhogavipattiādinā nihīnataṃ gatā dāliddiyādinā kāpaññataṃ pattā. ^b^dvayenā^eb^ti yathāvuttena unnationatidvayena lābhālābhādidvayena ^a^V2.0209^ea^ vā bālaputhujjanā haññanti, anurodhapaṭivirodhavasena vibādhīyanti pīḷiyanti. kasmā? ^b^yathābhūtaṃ adassino^eb^ yasmā te dhammasabhāvaṃ yāthāvato nabbhaññaṃsu, pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā ca na honti, tasmāti attho. ``yathābhūtaṃ adassanā''tipi paṭhanti, adassanahetūti attho. ^b^ye ca dukkhe sukhasmiñca, majjhe sibbinimaccagū^eb^ti ye pana ariyā dukkhavedanāya sukhavedanāya majjhattatāvedanāya ca tappaṭibaddhaṃ chandarāgabhūtaṃ sibbiniṃ taṇhaṃ aggamaggādhigamena accagū atikkamiṃsu, te indakhīlo viya vātehi lokadhammehi asampakampiyā ṭhitā, na te unnataonatā, kadācipi unnatā vā onatā vā na honti sabbaso anunayapaṭighābhāvato.

[03] evaṃ vedanādhiṭṭhānaṃ arahato anupalepaṃ dassetvā idāni lokadhamme vibhajitvā sabbatthakamevassa anupalepaṃ dassento ^b^``na hevā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^lābhe^eb^ti cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭilābhe. ^b^alābhe^eb^ti tesaṃyeva appaṭilābhe apagame. ^b^na yase^eb^ti parivārahāniyaṃ akittiyañca. ^b^kittiyā^eb^ti parammukhā kittane patthaṭayasatāyaṃ. ^b^nindāya^eb^nti sammukhā garahāyaṃ. ^b^pasaṃsāya^eb^nti, paccakkhato guṇābhitthavane. ^b^dukkhe^eb^ti dukkhe uppanne. ^b^sukhe^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0279^ea^ sabbasmiṃ yathāvutte aṭṭhavidhepi lokadhamme, sabbattha vā rūpādike visaye te khīṇāsavā na limpanti sabbaso pahīnakilesattā. yathā kiṃ? ^b^udabinduva pokkhare^eb^ yathā kamaladale jalabindu allīyitvā ṭhitampi tena na limpati, jalabindunā ca kamaladalaṃ, aññadatthu visaṃsaṭṭhameva, evametepi upaṭṭhite lābhādike, āpāthagate rūpādiārammaṇe ca visaṃsaṭṭhā evaṃ. tato eva dhīrā paṇḍitā ^b^sabbattha^eb^ lābhādīsu ñāṇamukhena piyanimittānaṃ sokādīnañca abhāvato ^b^sukhitā^eb^ ^a^M2.0248^ea^ lābhādīhi ca anabhibhavanīyato sabbattha aparājitāva honti.

[03] idāni lābhālābhādīsu seyyaṃ niddhāretvā dassento ^b^``dhammenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dhammena ca alābho yo^eb^ti yo dhammaṃ rakkhantassa taṃnimittaṃ alābho lābhābhāvo, lābhahāni. ^b^yo ca lābho adhammiko^eb^ adhammena aññāyena buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena vidhinā uppanno, tesu dvīsu ^b^alābho dhammiko^eb^ dhammāvaho seyyo, yādisaṃ lābhaṃ parivajjantassa akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, tādiso alābho pāsaṃsataro atthāvaho. ^b^yañce lābho adhammiko^eb^ti yo lābho adhammena uppanno, so na seyyoti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^yaso^eb^ ^a^V2.0210^ea^ ^b^ca appabuddhīnaṃ, viññūnaṃ ayaso ca yo^eb^ti yo appabuddhīnaṃ duppaññānaṃ vasena puggalassa yaso labbhati, yo ca ^b^viññūnaṃ^eb^ paṇḍitānaṃ vasena ^b^ayaso^eb^ yasahāni. imesu dvīsu ^b^ayasova seyyo viññūnaṃ^eb^. te hissa yathā akusalā dhammā parihāyanti, kusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, evaṃ yasahāniṃ iccheyyuṃ, tathā ca bhabbajātiko taṃ aguṇaṃ pahāya guṇe patiṭṭheyya. ^b^na yaso appabuddhīna^eb^nti duppaññānaṃ vasena yaso seyyo hoti, te hi abhūtaguṇābhibyāhāravasenāpi naṃ uppādeyyuṃ, so cassa idha ceva viññūgarahādinā samparāye ca duggatiyaṃ dukkhaparikkilesādinā anatthāvaho. tenāha bhagavā -- ``lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso''ti (su0 ni0 440) ``sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hantī''ti (cūḷava0 335; a0 ni0 4.68) ca.
[03] ^b^dummedhehī^eb^ti, nippaññehi. ^b^yañce bālappasaṃsanā^eb^ti bālehi aviddasūhi yā nāma pasaṃsanā.

[03] ^b^kāmamayika^eb^nti vatthukāmamayaṃ, kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppannaṃ. ^b^dukkhañca pavivekiya^eb^nti pavivekato nibbattaṃ kāyakilamathavasena pavattaṃ visamāsanupatāpādihetukaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ pana nirāmisavivaṭṭūpanissayatāya viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsā. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``pavivekadukkhaṃ seyyo''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^jīvitañca^eb^ ^a^M2.0249^ea^ ^a^P2.0280^ea^ ^b^adhammenā^eb^ti adhammena jīvikakappanaṃ jīvitahetu adhammacaraṇaṃ. ^b^dhammena maraṇaṃ^eb^ nāma ``imaṃ nāma pāpaṃ akarontaṃ taṃ māressāmī''ti kenaci vutte mārentepi tasmiṃ pāpaṃ akatvā dhammaṃ avikopentassa dhammahetumaraṇaṃ dhammikaṃ seyyoti tādisaṃ maraṇaṃ dhammato anapetattā dhammikaṃ saggasampāpanato nibbānupanissayato ca viññūnaṃ pāsaṃsataraṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ --
[21] ``caje dhanaṃ aṅgavarassa hetu, aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno.
[22] aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto''ti.. (jā0 2.21.470).
[03] ^b^yañce jīve adhammika^eb^nti puriso yaṃ dhammato apetaṃ jīvikaṃ jīveyya, taṃ na seveyya viññūhi garahitattā apāyasampāpanato cāti adhippāyo.
[03] idāni ^a^V2.0211^ea^ yathāvuttaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ anupalepaṃ kāraṇato dassento ^b^``kāmakopapahīnā''^eb^tiādigāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^kāmakopapahīnā^eb^ti ariyamaggena sabbasova pahīnā anurodhapaṭivirodhā. ^b^santacittā bhavābhave^eb^ti khuddake ceva mahante ca bhave anavasesapahīnakilesapariḷāhatāya vūpasantacittā. ^b^loke^eb^ti khandhādiloke. ^b^asitā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayavasena anissitā. ^b^natthi tesaṃ piyāpiya^eb^nti tesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ katthaci lābhādike rūpādivisaye ca ^b^piyaṃ vā apiyaṃ vā^eb^ natthi, taṃnimittānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā.

[03] idāni yāya bhāvanāya te evarūpā jātā, taṃ dassetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^``bhāvayitvānā''^eb^ti osānagāthamāha. tattha ^b^pappuyyā^eb^ti, pāpuṇitvā. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. imā eva ca gāthā therassa aññābyākaraṇāpi ahesuṃ.

[03] soḷasakanipāte ^a^M2.0250^ea^ ^a^V2.0212^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ ^b^esa bhiyyo^eb^tiādikā āyasmato aññāsikoṇḍaññattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammarattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthento satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyataṃ disvā bhāviniṃ sampattiṃ byākāsi. so yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā satthari parinibbute cetiye patiṭṭhāpiyamāne antocetiye ratanagharaṃ kāresi, cetiyaṃ parivāretvā sahassaratanagghiyāni ca kāresi.

[03] so evaṃ puññāni katvā, tato cavitvā, devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassissa bhagavato kāle mahākālo nāma kuṭumbiko hutvā aṭṭhakarīsamatte khette sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā, gahitasālitaṇḍulehi asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ sampādetvā, tattha madhusappisakkarādayo pakkhipitvā, buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi. sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati, puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ nāma adāsi. lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe veṇaggaṃ, kalāpādikaraṇe kalāpaggaṃ, khalaggaṃ, bhaṇḍaggaṃ, minaggaṃ, koṭṭhagganti; evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ nāma adāsi. tampi sassaṃ atirekataraṃ sampannaṃ ahosi.

[03] evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā, tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto, amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattito puretarameva ^a^P3.0002^ea^ kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthunāmake brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. tassa ^b^koṇḍañño^eb^ti gottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantesu ca pāraṃ agamāsi. tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto ^a^M2.0251^ea^ tusitapurato cavitvā kapilavatthupure suddhodanamahārājassa ^a^V2.0213^ea^ gehe nibbatti. tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttarasatesu brāhmaṇesu upanītesu ye aṭṭha brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇapariggahaṇatthaṃ mahātalaṃ upanītā. so tesu sabbanavako hutvā, mahāpurisassa lakkhaṇanipphattiṃ disvā, ``ekaṃsena ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī''ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāsattassa abhinikkhamanaṃ udikkhanto vicarati.

[03] bodhisattopi kho mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhamāno anukkamena vuddhippatto ñāṇaparipākaṃ gantvā ekūnatiṃsatime vasse mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamanto anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā padhānaṃ padahi. tadā koṇḍañño māṇavo mahāsattassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ sutvā, lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ puttehi vappamāṇavādīhi saddhiṃ attapañcamo pabbajitvā, anukkamena bodhisattassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, chabbassāni taṃ upaṭṭhahanto tassa oḷārikāhāraparibhogena nibbinno apakkamitvā isipatanaṃ agamāsi. atha kho bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena laddhakāyabalo vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā, abhisambuddho hutvā, sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva vītināmetvā, pañcavaggiyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā, āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā, tesaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttantaṃ (mahāva0 13 ādayo; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081) desesi. desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi. atha pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāya (mahāva0 20; saṃ0 ni0 3.59) arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.596-612) --
[22] idaṃ me paṭhamaṃ bhattaṃ, brahmacārissa yāpanaṃ..
[21] ``tusitā hi idhāgantvā, yo me bhikkhaṃ upānayi.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..

[03] atha ^a^M2.0253^ea^ naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammabhāvaṃ dīpento, ^a^P3.0003^ea^ ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rattaññūnaṃ yadidaṃ aññāsikoṇḍañño''ti (a0 ni0 1.188) etadagge ṭhapesi. so dvīhi aggasāvakehi attani karīyamānaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ gāmantasenāsane ākiṇṇavihārañca pariharitukāmo, vivekābhiratiyā viharitukāmo ca attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ paṭisanthārakaraṇampi papañcaṃ maññamāno satthāraṃ āpucchitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā chaddantehi nāgehi upaṭṭhiyamāno chaddantadahatīre dvādasa vassāni vasi. evaṃ tattha vasantaṃ theraṃ ekadivasaṃ sakko devarājā ^a^V2.0215^ea^ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ṭhito evamāha -- ``sādhu me, bhante, ayyo dhammaṃ desetū''ti. thero tassa catusaccagabbhaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ suññatapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ amatogadhaṃ buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi. taṃ sutvā sakko attano pasādaṃ pavedento --
[22] virāgo desito dhammo, anupādāya sabbaso''ti.. -- paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvā dhammaṃ mahārasa^eb^nti yadipi anekavāraṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā tattha abhippasanno. idāni pana tumhehi kathitaṃ nānānayavicittatāya asecanakatāya ca mahārasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā eso ahaṃ tato bhiyyo pasīdāmi. ^b^virāgo desito dhammo, anupādāya sabbaso^eb^ti sabbasaṃkilesato sabbasaṅkhārato ca virajjanato virāgajananato virāgo. tato eva rūpādīsu kañci dhammaṃ anupādāya aggahetvā vimuttisādhanavasena pavattattā sabbaso anupādāya desito.

[03] evaṃ sakko devarājā therassa desanaṃ thometvā theraṃ abhivādetvā sakaṭṭhānameva gato. athekadivasaṃ thero micchāvitakkehi abhibhuyyamānānaṃ ekaccānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ cittācāraṃ disvā tappaṭipakkhabhūtañcassa anukkamaṃ anussaritvā, attano ca sabbaso tato vinivattitamānasataṃ āvajjetvā tadatthaṃ dīpetvā --
[22] evaṃ sammanti saṅkappā, yadā paññāya passatī''ti.. -- dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^bahūni loke citrānī^eb^ti rūpādivasena tatthāpi nīlapītādivasena itthipurisādivasena ca anekāni loke cittavicittāni ārammaṇajātāni. ^b^asmiṃ pathavimaṇḍale^eb^ti paccakkhabhūtaṃ manussalokaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^mathenti maññe saṅkappa^eb^nti tajjaṃ purisavāyāmasahitaṃ araṇisahitaṃ viya aggiṃ ayonisomanasikārābhisaṅkhātāni micchāsaṅkappāni mathenti maññe mathentāni viya tiṭṭhanti. kīdisaṃ? ^b^subhaṃ rāgūpasaṃhitaṃ,^eb^ kāmavitakkanti attho. so hi subhākāraggahaṇena ``subho''ti voharīyati.

[03] ^b^rajamuhatañca^eb^ ^a^V2.0216^ea^ ^b^vātenā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-iti nipātamattaṃ. yathā gimhānaṃ pacchime māse vātena ūhataṃ uṭṭhitaṃ rajaṃ mahāmegho vassanto upasammaye, vūpasameyya. ^b^evaṃ sammanti saṅkappā, yadā paññāya passatī^eb^ti yadā ariyasāvako tāni lokacitrāni samudayato, assādato, ādīnavato, nissaraṇato ca yathābhūtaṃ paññāya passati, atha yathā taṃ rajaṃ uhataṃ meghena, evaṃ sammanti paññāya sabbepi micchāsaṅkappā. na hi uppannāya sammādiṭṭhiyā micchāsaṅkappā patiṭṭhaṃ labhanti. yathā pana paññāya passati, taṃ dassento --
[22] atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā..
[22] atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0255^ea^ ^b^sabbe saṅkhārā^eb^ti chaḷārammaṇasaṅgahā sabbe tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā. ^b^aniccā^eb^ti ``ādimajjhāntavantato, aniccantikato, tāvakālikato, tattha tattha bhijjanato na niccā''ti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati. ^b^atha nibbindati dukkhe^eb^ti atha imasmiṃ vaṭṭadukkhe nibbindati, nibbindanto dukkhaparijānanādividhinā saccāni paṭivijjhati. ^b^esa maggo visuddhiyā^eb^ti esa yathāvutto vipassanāvidhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā, accantavisuddhiyā ca maggo adhigamupāyo.
[03] ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0005^ea^ sappaṭibhayato, udayabbayasampaṭipīḷanato, dukkhamato, sukhapaṭikkhepato ca dukkhā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^sabbe dhammā anattā^eb^ti sabbepi catubhūmakā dhammā anattā. idha pana tebhūmakadhammāva gahetabbā. te hi asārato, avasavattanato, suññato, attapaṭikkhepato ca anattāti vipassitabbā. sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
[03] evaṃ vipassanāvidhiṃ dassetvā tena vidhinā katakiccaṃ attānaṃ aññaṃ viya katvā dassento --
[27] chetvā khilañca pāsañca, selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhidaṃ.
[22] tiṇṇo pāraṅgato jhāyī, mutto so mārabandhanā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^buddhānubuddho^eb^ti buddhānaṃ anubuddho, sammāsambuddhehi bujjhitāni saccāni tesaṃ desanānusārena bujjhatīti attho. thirehi asekkhehi sīlasārādīhi samannāgatoti, ^b^thero. koṇḍañño^eb^ti gottakittanaṃ. ^b^tibbanikkamo^eb^ti daḷhavīriyo, thiraparakkamo. jātimaraṇānaṃ pahīnakāraṇattā ^b^pahīnajātimaraṇo. brahmacariyassa kevalī^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyassa anavasesaṃ, anavasesato vā maggabrahmacariyassa pāripūrako, atha vā ^b^kevalī^eb^ nāma kilesehi asammissatāya maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇañca, taṃ imasmiṃ ^a^M2.0256^ea^ atthīti kevalī. yasmā pana tadubhayampi maggabrahmacariyassa vasena hoti na aññathā, tasmā ``brahmacariyassa kevalī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^oghapāso^eb^ti ``kāmogho, bhavogho, diṭṭhogho, avijjogho''ti (dha0 sa0 1156; vibha0 938) evaṃ vuttā cattāro oghā -- ``antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso''ti (mahāva0 33; saṃ0 ni0 1.151) evaṃ vutto rāgapāso ca. ^b^daḷhakhilo^eb^ti ``satthari kaṅkhati, dhamme kaṅkhati, saṅghe kaṅkhati, sikkhāya kaṅkhati, sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto''ti (ma0 ni0 1.185; a0 ni0 5.205) evaṃ vutto daḷho thiro pañcavidho cetokhilo ca. pacurajanehi padāletuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ^b^duppadālayo^eb^. tato eva pabbatasadisatāya ^b^pabbato^eb^ti ca saṅkhaṃ gato. ``dukkhe aññāṇa''ntiādinā (vibha0 226; saṃ0 ni0 2.2) vā nayena vutto aññāṇappabhedo ca. iti etaṃ sabbaṃ ^b^chetvā khilañca pāsañcā^eb^ti etesu catubbidhesu saṃkilesadhammesu yo khilañca pāsañca ariyamaggañāṇāsinā chinditvā. ^b^selaṃ bhetvāna dubbhida^eb^nti yena kenaci ñāṇena chindituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ aññāṇaselaṃ vajirūpamañāṇena ^a^P3.0006^ea^ chinditvā, cattāropi oghe taritvā, tesaṃ paratīre nibbāne ṭhitattā ^b^tiṇṇo pāraṅgato^eb^. ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇenāti duvidhenapi ^b^jhāyī; mutto so mārabandhanā^eb^ti so evarūpo khīṇāsavo sabbasmāpi kilesamārabandhanā mutto vippamutto visaṃyuttoti. attānameva sandhāya thero vadati.

[03] athekadivasaṃ ^a^V2.0218^ea^ thero, attano saddhivihārikaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ akalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena kusītaṃ hīnavīriyaṃ uddhataṃ unnaḷaṃ viharantaṃ disvā, iddhiyā tattha gantvā, taṃ ``mā, āvuso, evaṃ kari, akalyāṇamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte sevanto samaṇadhammaṃ karohī''ti ovadi. so therassa vacanaṃ nādiyi. thero tassa anādiyanena dhammasaṃvegappatto puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya micchāpaṭipattiṃ garahanto sammāpaṭipattiṃ vivekavāsañca pasaṃsanto --
[22] so me attho anuppatto, kiṃ me saddhivihārinā''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^uddhato^eb^ti uddhaccayutto asamāhito vikkhittacitto. ^b^capalo^eb^ti pattacīvaramaṇḍanādinā cāpalyena samannāgato lolapakatiko. ^b^mitte āgamma pāpake^eb^ti akalyāṇamitte nissāya samaṇadhammaṃ akaronto. ^b^saṃsīdati mahoghasmiṃ, ūmiyā paṭikujjito^eb^ti yathā mahāsamudde patitapuriso samuddavīcīhi otthaṭo sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ alabhanto tattheva saṃsīdati, evaṃ saṃsāramahoghasmiṃ paribbhamanto kodhupāyāsaūmiyā paṭikujjito otthaṭo vipassanāvasena paññāsīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ alabhanto tattheva saṃsīdati.

[03] ^b^nipako^eb^ti ^a^P3.0007^ea^ nipuṇo, attatthaparatthesu kusalo. ^b^saṃvutindriyo^eb^ti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ saṃvaraṇena pihitindriyo. ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^ti kalyāṇehi mittehi samannāgato. ^b^medhāvī^eb^ti dhammojapaññāya ^a^V2.0219^ea^ samaṅgībhūto. ^b^dukkhassantakaro siyā^eb^ti so tādiso sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^kālapabbaṅgasaṅkāso^eb^tiādi vivekābhiratikittanaṃ. ^b^nābhinandāmī^eb^tiādi pana katakiccabhāvadassanaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā (theragā0 aṭṭha0 2.607) vuttatthameva. osāne pana ^a^M2.0258^ea^ ^b^kiṃ me saddhivihārinā^eb^ti attano saddhivihārikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. tasmā edisena dubbacena anādarena saddhivihārinā kiṃ me payojanaṃ ekavihāroyeva mayhaṃ ruccatīti attho.
[03] evaṃ pana vatvā chaddantadahameva gato. tattha dvādasa vassāni vasitvā upakaṭṭhe parinibbāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā parinibbānaṃ anujānāpetvā tattheva gantvā parinibbāyi.

[03] ^b^manussabhūta^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato udāyittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ puññaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthusmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^udāyī^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto satthu ñātisamāgame buddhānubhāvaṃ disvā, paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tayo hi ime udāyittherā amaccaputto pubbe āgato kāḷudāyī, kovariyaputto lāludāyī, ayaṃ brāhmaṇaputto mahāudāyīti. svāyaṃ ekadivasaṃ satthārā setavāraṇaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahājanena pasaṃsiyamānaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā nāgopamasuttante (a0 ni0 6.43) desite desanāpariyosāne attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ satthu guṇe anussaritvā, buddhārammaṇāya pītiyā samussāhitamānaso ``ayaṃ mahājano imaṃ tiracchānagataṃ nāgaṃ pasaṃsati, na buddhamahānāgaṃ. handāhaṃ buddhamahāgandhahatthino guṇe pākaṭe karissāmī''ti satthāraṃ thomento --
[22] devāpi taṃ namassanti, iti me arahato sutaṃ..
[21] ``nāgaṃ vo kittayissāmi, na hi āguṃ karoti so.
[22] soraccaṃ avihiṃsā ca, pādā nāgassa te duve..
[22] gacchaṃ samāhito nāgo, ṭhito nāgo samāhito..
[22] sabbattha saṃvuto nāgo, esā nāgassa sampadā..
[21] ``tatheva ca loke jāto, buddho loke viharati.
[22] sarīraṃ vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatyanāsavo''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ^a^P3.0009^ea^ ^b^manussabhūta^eb^nti manussesu bhūtaṃ, nibbattaṃ; manussattabhāvaṃ vā pattaṃ. satthā hi āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamena sabbagativimuttopi carimattabhāve gahitapaṭisandhivasena ``manusso''tveva voharīyatīti. guṇavasena pana devānaṃ atidevo, brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. ^b^sambuddha^eb^nti sayameva bujjhitabbabuddhavantaṃ. ^b^attadanta^eb^nti attanāyeva dantaṃ. bhagavā hi attanāyeva uppāditena ariyamaggena cakkhutopi...pe0... manatopi uttamena damathena danto. ^b^samāhita^eb^nti aṭṭhavidhena samādhinā maggaphalasamādhinā ca samāhitaṃ. ^b^iriyamānaṃ brahmapathe^eb^ti catubbidhepi brahmavihārapathe, brahme vā seṭṭhe phalasamāpattipathe samāpajjanavasena pavattamānaṃ. kiñcāpi bhagavā na sabbakālaṃ yathāvutte brahmapathe iriyati, tattha iriyasāmatthiyaṃ pana tanninnatañca upādāya ``iriyamāna''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^cittassūpasame rata^eb^nti cittassa upasamahetubhūte sabbasaṅkhārasamathe, nibbāne, abhirataṃ. ^b^yaṃ manussā namassanti, sabbadhammāna pāragu^eb^nti yaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, pahānapāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, sacchikiriyapāragū, samāpattipāragūti chadhā pāraguṃ paramukkaṃsagatasampattiṃ khattiyapaṇḍitādayo manussā namassanti. dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā pūjentā kāyena vācāya manasā ca tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā honti. ^b^devāpi taṃ namassantī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ manussā eva, atha kho aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu devāpi taṃ namassanti. ^b^iti me arahato suta^eb^nti evaṃ mayā ārakattādīhi kāraṇehi arahato, bhagavato, dhammasenāpatiādīnañca ``satthā devamanussāna''ntiādikaṃ vadantānaṃ santike evaṃ sutanti dasseti.

[03] ^b^sabbasaṃyojanātīta^eb^nti sabbāni dasapi saṃyojanāni yathārahaṃ catūhi maggehi saha vāsanāya atikkantaṃ. ^b^vanā nibbanamāgata^eb^nti kilesavanato tabbirahitaṃ nibbanaṃ upagataṃ. ^b^kāmehi nekkhammarata^eb^nti sabbaso kāmehi nikkhamitvā pabbajjājhānavipassanādibhede nekkhamme abhirataṃ. ^b^muttaṃ selāva kañcana^eb^nti asārato nissaṭasārasabhāvattā selato nissaṭakañcanasadisaṃ devāpi taṃ namassantīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^sa^eb^ ^a^M2.0261^ea^ ^b^ve accaruci nāgo^eb^ti so ekaṃsato āguṃ na karoti, punabbhavaṃ na gacchati; nāgo viya balavāti. ``nāgo''ti laddhanāmo sammāsambuddho, ^b^accarucī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0010^ea^ attano kāyaruciyā ñāṇaruciyā ca sadevakaṃ lokaṃ atikkamitvā ruci, sobhi. yathā kiṃ? ^b^himavāvaññe siluccaye,^eb^ yathā hi himavā pabbatarājā attano thiragarumahāsārabhāvādīhi guṇehi aññe pabbate atirocati, evaṃ atirocatīti attho. ^b^sabbesaṃ nāganāmāna^eb^nti ahināgahatthināgapurisanāgānaṃ ^a^V2.0222^ea^, sekhāsekhapaccekabuddhanāgānaṃ vā. ^b^saccanāmo^eb^ti sacceneva nāganāmo. taṃ pana saccanāmataṃ ``na hi āguṃ karotī''tiādinā sayameva vakkhati.

[03] idāni buddhanāgaṃ avayavato ca dassento nāmato tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``na hi āguṃ karoti so''^eb^ti āha. yasmā āguṃ, pāpaṃ, sabbena sabbaṃ na karoti, tasmā nāgoti attho. ^b^soracca^eb^nti sīlaṃ. ^b^avihiṃsā^eb^ti karuṇā. tadubhayaṃ sabbassapi guṇarāsissa pubbaṅgamanti, katvā buddhanāgassa purimapādabhāvo tassa yuttoti āha ^b^``pādā nāgassa te duve''^eb^ti.

[03] aparapādabhāvena vadanto ^b^``sati ca sampajaññañca, caraṇā nāgassa tepare''^eb^ti āha. ``tyāpare''ti vā pāṭho. te aparetveva padavibhāgo. anavajjadhammānaṃ ādāne saddhā hattho etassāti, ^b^saddhāhattho^eb^. suparisuddhavedanā ñāṇappabhedā upekkhā setadantā te etassa atthīti, ^b^upekkhāsetadantavā^eb^.

[03] uttamaṅgaṃ paññā, tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ satīti āha ^b^``sati gīvā siro paññā''^eb^ti. ^b^vīmaṃsā dhammacintanā^eb^ti yathā khāditabbākhāditabbassa soṇḍāya parāmasanaṃ ghāyanañca hatthināgassa vīmaṃsā nāma hoti, evaṃ buddhanāgassa kusalādidhammacintanā vīmaṃsā. samā vasanti etthāti, samāvāso, bhājanaṃ kucchi eva samāvāso, abhiññāsamathānaṃ ādhānabhāvato samathavipassanāsaṅkhāto dhammo kucchisamāvāso etassāti ^b^dhammakucchisamāvāso. viveko^eb^ti upadhiviveko. ^b^tassā^eb^ti buddhanāgassa. ^b^vāladhi,^eb^ pariyosānaṅgabhāvato.

[03] ^b^jhāyī^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanasīlo. ^b^assāsarato^eb^ti paramassāsabhūte nibbāne rato. ^b^ajjhattaṃ susamāhito^eb^ti visayajjhatte ^a^M2.0262^ea^ phalasamāpattiyaṃ suṭṭhu samāhito tadidaṃ samādhānaṃ suṭṭhu sabbakālikanti dassetuṃ ^b^``gacchaṃ samāhito nāgo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. bhagavā hi savāsanassa uddhaccassa pahīnattā vikkhepābhāvato niccaṃ samāhitova. tasmā yaṃ yaṃ iriyāpathaṃ kappeti, taṃ taṃ samāhitova kappesīti.

[03] ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti, sabbasmiṃ gocare, sabbasmiñca dvāre sabbaso pihitavutti. tenāha -- ``sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ^a^P3.0011^ea^ ñāṇānuparivatta''ntiādi (netti0 15). ^b^esā nāgassa sampadā^eb^ti esā ``na hi āguṃ karoti so''tiādinā ``sambuddha''ntiādinā eva vā yathāvuttā vakkhamānā ca buddhagandhahatthino sampatti guṇaparipuṇṇā.

[03] ^b^bhuñjati^eb^ ^a^V2.0223^ea^ ^b^anavajjānī^eb^ti sammājīvassa ukkaṃsapāramippattiyā bhuñjati agarahitabbāni, micchājīvassa sabbaso savāsanānañca pahīnattā sāvajjāni garahitabbāni na bhuñjati anavajjāni bhuñjanto ca sannidhiṃ parivajjayaṃ bhuñjatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^saṃyojana^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhena saddhiṃ santānaṃ saṃyojanato vaṭṭe osīdāpanasamatthaṃ dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^aṇuṃ thūla^eb^nti khuddakañceva mahantañca. ^b^sabbaṃ chetvāna bandhana^eb^nti maggañāṇena anavasesaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinditvā. ^b^yena yenā^eb^ti yena yena disābhāgena.
[03] yathā hi udake jātaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ udake pavaḍḍhati nopalippati toyena, anupalepasabhāvattā, tatheva loke jāto buddho loke viharati, nopalippati lokena taṇhādiṭṭhimānalepābhāvatoti yojanā.

[03] ^b^atthassāyaṃ viññāpanī^eb^ti satthu guṇasaṅkhātassa upameyyatthassa viññāpanī, pakāsanī ayaṃ nāgūpamā. ^b^viññūhī^eb^ti satthu paṭividdhacatusaccadhammaṃ parijānantehi attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^viññissantī^eb^tiādi kāraṇavacanaṃ, yasmā nāgena mayā desitaṃ nāgaṃ tathāgatagandhahatthiṃ mahānāgā khīṇāsavā attano visaye ṭhatvā vijānissanti, tasmā aññesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ ayaṃ upamā amhehi bhāsitāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^sarīraṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0263^ea^ ^b^vijahaṃ nāgo, parinibbissatyanāsavo^eb^ti bodhimūle saupādisesaparinibbānena anāsavo sammāsambuddhanāgo, idāni sarīraṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahanto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbāyissatīti.
[03] evaṃ cuddasahi upamāhi maṇḍetvā, soḷasahi gāthāhi, catusaṭṭhiyā pādehi satthu guṇe vaṇṇento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] vīsatinipāte ^a^M2.0264^ea^ ^a^V2.0224^ea^ ^a^P3.0012^ea^ ^b^yaññatthaṃ vā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato aparassa adhimuttattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave puññāni upacinanto atthadassissa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanne kule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upaṭṭhahanto mahādānāni pavattesi. so tena puññakammena devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa bhaginiyā kucchimhi nibbatti, ^b^adhimutto^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto mātulattherassa santike pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.4.84-88) --

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā samāpattisukhena vītināmento upasampajjitukāmo ``mātaraṃ āpucchissāmī''ti mātu santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge devatāya balikammakaraṇatthaṃ maṃsapariyesanaṃ carantehi pañcasatehi corehi samāgacchi. corā ca taṃ aggahesuṃ ``devatāya bali ^a^V2.0225^ea^ bhavissatī''ti. so corehi gahitopi abhīto acchambhī vippasannamukhova aṭṭhāsi. taṃ disvā coragāmaṇiacchariyabbhutacittajāto pasaṃsanto --
[21] ``yaññatthaṃ ^a^M2.0265^ea^ vā dhanatthaṃ vā, ye hanāma mayaṃ pure.
[22] avasesaṃ bhayaṃ hoti, vedhanti vilapanti ca..
[21] ``tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati.
[22] kasmā na paridevesi, evarūpe mahabbhaye''ti.. -- dve gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^yaññattha^eb^nti yajanatthaṃ devatānaṃ balikammakaraṇatthaṃ vā. vā-saddo vikappanattho. ^b^dhanattha^eb^nti sāpateyyaharaṇatthaṃ. ^b^ye hanāma mayaṃ pure^eb^ti ye satte mayaṃ pubbe hanimha. atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. ^b^avase^eb^ti avase aserike katvā. ^b^ta^eb^nti tesaṃ. ``avasesanti''pi paṭhanti. amhehi gahitesu taṃ ekaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesānaṃ; ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^bhayaṃ hotī^eb^ti maraṇabhayaṃ hoti. yena te ^b^vedhanti vilapanti,^eb^cittutrāsena vedhanti ^a^P3.0013^ea^, ``sāmi, tumhākaṃ idañcidañca dassāma, dāsā bhavissāmā''tiādikaṃ vadantā vilapanti.

[03] ^b^tassa te^eb^ti yo tvaṃ amhehi devatāya balikammatthaṃ jīvitā voropetukāmehi ukkhittāsikehi santajjito, tassa te. ^b^bhītatta^eb^nti bhītabhāvo, bhayanti attho. ^b^bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdatī^eb^ti pakativaṇṇato uparipi te mukhavaṇṇo vippasīdati. therassa kira tadā ``sace ime māressanti, idānevāhaṃ anupādāya parinibbāyissāmi, dukkhabhāro vigacchissatī''ti uḷāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji. ^b^evarūpe mahabbhaye^eb^ti edise mahati maraṇabhaye upaṭṭhite. hetuatthe vā etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
[03] idāni thero coragāmaṇissa paṭivacanadānamukhena dhammaṃ desento --
[22] na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā..
[22] maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, rogānamiva saṅkhaye..
[22] nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā, visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍitaṃ..
[22] tuṭṭho āyukkhayā hoti, mutto āghātanā yathā..
[22] ādittāva gharā mutto, maraṇasmiṃ na socati..
[21] ``yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñci, bhavo vā yattha labbhati.
[22] sabbaṃ anissaraṃ etaṃ, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``yo taṃ tathā pajānāti, yathā buddhena desitaṃ.
[22] na gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñci, sutattaṃva ayoguḷaṃ..
[22] passantassa yathābhūtaṃ, na bhayaṃ hoti gāmaṇi..
[22] mamattaṃ so asaṃvindaṃ, `natthi me'ti na socati..
[22] soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyo, añño ca na bhavissati..
[21] ``yaṃ ^a^P3.0014^ea^ vo kiccaṃ sarīrena, taṃ karotha yadicchatha.
[22] na me tappaccayā tattha, doso pemañca hehitī''ti.. --
[25] ayaṃ saṅgītikārehi vuttagāthā. ito aparā tisso corānaṃ, therassa ca vacanapaṭivacanagāthā --
[21] ``kiṃ ^a^M2.0267^ea^ bhadante karitvāna, ko vā ācariyo tava.
[21] ``sutvāna corā isino subhāsitaṃ, nikkhippa satthāni ca āvudhāni ca.
[22] tamhā ca kammā viramiṃsu eke, eke ca pabbajjamarocayiṃsu..
[21] ``te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane, bhāvetva bojjhaṅgabalāni paṇḍitā.
[22] udaggacittā sumanā katindriyā, phusiṃsu nibbānapadaṃ asaṅkhata''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^natthi cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ, anapekkhassa, gāmaṇī^eb^ti gāmaṇi, apekkhāya, taṇhāya, abhāvena anapekkhassa mādisassa, lohitasabhāvo pubbo viya, cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ natthi, domanassābhāvāpadesena bhayābhāvaṃ vadati. tenāha ^b^``atikkantā bhayā sabbe''^eb^ti. ^b^atikkantā bhayā sabbe^eb^ti khīṇasaṃyojanassa arahato pañcavīsati mahābhayā, aññe ca sabbepi bhayā ekaṃsena atikkantā atītā, apagatāti attho.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme yathātathe^eb^ti catusaccadhamme pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhe. ^b^maraṇe^eb^ti maraṇahetu. ^b^bhāranikkhepane yathā^eb^ti yathā koci puriso sīse ṭhitena mahatā garubhārena saṃsīdanto tassa nikkhepane, apanayane na bhāyati, evaṃ sampadamidanti attho. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[22] bhārādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke, bhāranikkhepanaṃ sukha''nti.. (saṃ0 ni0 3.22).

[03] ^b^suciṇṇa^eb^nti suṭṭhu caritaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti, sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. tato eva ^b^maggo cāpi subhāvito^eb^ aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggopi sammadeva bhāvito. ^b^rogānamiva saṅkhaye^eb^ti yathā bahūhi rogehi abhibhūtassa āturassa rogānaṃ saṅkhaye pītisomanassameva hoti, evaṃ khandharogasaṅkhaye maraṇe mādisassa bhayaṃ natthi.

[03] ^b^nirassādā bhavā diṭṭhā^eb^ti tīhi dukkhatāhi abhibhūtā, ekādasahi aggīhi ādittā, tayo bhavā nirassādā, assādarahitā, mayā diṭṭhā. ^b^visaṃ pitvāva chaḍḍita^eb^nti pamādavasena visaṃ pivitvā tādisena payogena chaḍḍitaṃ viya maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthīti attho.

[03] ^b^mutto^eb^ ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^b^āghātanā yathā^eb^ti yathā corehi māraṇatthaṃ āghātanaṃ nīto kenaci upāyena tato mutto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hoti, evaṃ saṃsārapāraṃ, nibbānaṃ, gatattā ^b^pāragū,^eb^ catūhipi upādānehi ^b^anupādāno,^eb^ pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā ^b^katakicco^eb^ kāmāsavādīhi ^b^anāsavo, āyukkhayā^eb^ āyukkhayahetu ^b^tuṭṭho^eb^ somanassiko hoti.

[03] ^b^uttama^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^dhammata^eb^nti, dhammasabhāvaṃ. arahatte siddhe sijjhanahetu iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvaṃ. ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ti sabbalokasmimpi, dīghāyukasukhabahulatādivasena saṃyuttepi loke. ^b^anatthiko^eb^ti, anapekkho. ^b^ādittāva gharā mutto^eb^ti yathā koci puriso samantato ādittato pajjalitato gehato nissaṭo, tato nissaraṇanimittaṃ na socati, evaṃ khīṇāsavo maraṇanimittaṃ na socati.

[03] ^b^yadatthi saṅgataṃ kiñcī^eb^ti yaṃkiñci imasmiṃ loke atthi, vijjati, upalabbhati saṅgataṃ, sattehi saṅkhārehi vā samāgamo, samodhānaṃ. ``saṅkhata''ntipi pāṭho, tassa yaṃkiñci paccayehi samacca sambhuyya kataṃ, paṭiccasamuppannanti attho. ^b^bhavo vā yattha labbhatī^eb^ti yasmiṃ sattanikāye yo upapattibhavo labbhati. ^b^sabbaṃ anissaraṃ eta^eb^nti sabbametaṃ issararahitaṃ, na ettha kenaci ``evaṃ hotū''ti issariyaṃ vattetuṃ sakkā. ^b^iti vuttaṃ mahesinā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0269^ea^ ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena. tasmā ``anissaraṃ eta''nti pajānanto maraṇasmiṃ na socatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^P3.0016^ea^ ^b^gaṇhāti bhavaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti yo ariyasāvako ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā (dha0 pa0 277) yathā buddhena bhagavatā desitaṃ, tathā taṃ bhavattayaṃ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya pajānāti. so yathā koci puriso sukhakāmo divasaṃ santattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ hatthena na gaṇhāti, evaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhavaṃ na gaṇhāti, na tattha taṇhaṃ karotīti attho.

[03] ^b^na me hoti ``ahosi''^eb^nti ``atītamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ īdiso ahosi''nti attadiṭṭhivasena na me cittappavatti atthi diṭṭhiyā sammadeva ugghāṭitattā, dhammasabhāvassa ca sudiṭṭhattā. ^b^``bhavissa''nti na hoti me^eb^ti tato eva ``anāgatamaddhānaṃ ahaṃ ediso kathaṃ nu kho bhavissaṃ bhaveyya''nti evampi me na hoti. ^b^saṅkhārā vigamissantī^eb^ti evaṃ pana hoti ``yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā saṅkhārāva, na ettha koci attā vā attaniyaṃ vā, te ca kho vigamissanti ^a^V2.0229^ea^, vinassissanti, khaṇe khaṇe bhijjissantī''ti. ^b^tattha kā paridevanā^eb^ti evaṃ passantassa mādisassa tattha saṅkhāragate kā nāma paridevanā.

[03] ^b^suddha^eb^nti kevalaṃ, attasārena asammissaṃ. ^b^dhammasamuppāda^eb^nti paccayapaccayuppannadhammasamuppattiṃ avijjādipaccayehi saṅkhārādidhammamattappavattiṃ. ^b^saṅkhārasantati^eb^nti kilesakammavipākappabhedasaṅkhārapabandhaṃ. ^b^passantassa yathābhūta^eb^nti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya yāthāvato jānantassa.

[03] ^b^tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ loka^eb^nti yathā araññe apariggahe tiṇakaṭṭhe kenaci gayhamāne aparassa ``mayhaṃ santakaṃ ayaṃ gaṇhatī''ti na hoti, evaṃ so asāmikatāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ yadā paññāya passati, so tattha mamattaṃ ^b^asaṃvindaṃ^eb^ asaṃvindanto alabhanto akaronto. ^b^natthi me^eb^ti ``ahu vata sohaṃ, taṃ me natthī''ti na socati.

[03] ^b^ukkaṇṭhāmi sarīrenā^eb^ti asārakena abhinudena dukkhena akataññunā asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlasabhāvena iminā kāyena ukkaṇṭhāmi imaṃ kāyaṃ ^a^M2.0270^ea^ nibbindanto evaṃ tiṭṭhāmi. ^b^bhavenamhi anatthiko^eb^ti sabbenapi bhavena anatthiko amhi, na kiñci bhavaṃ patthemi. ^b^soyaṃ bhijjissati kāyo^eb^ti ayaṃ mama kāyo idāni tumhākaṃ payogena aññathā vā aññattha bhijjissati. ^b^añño ca na bhavissatī^eb^ti añño kāyo mayhaṃ āyatiṃ na bhavissati, punabbhavābhāvato.

[03] ^b^yaṃ vo kiccaṃ sarīrenā^eb^ti yaṃ tumhākaṃ iminā sarīrena payojanaṃ, ^b^taṃ karotha yadicchatha,^eb^ icchatha ce. ^b^na me tappaccayā^eb^ti, taṃ nimittaṃ ^a^P3.0017^ea^ imassa sarīrassa tumhehi yathicchitakiccassa karaṇahetu. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu karontesu ca akarontesu ca. ^b^doso pemañca hehitī^eb^ti yathākkamaṃ paṭigho anunayo na bhavissati, attano bhave apekkhāya sabbaso pahīnattāti adhippāyo. aññapaccayā aññattha ca paṭighānunayesu asantesupi tappaccayā, ``tatthā''ti vacanaṃ yathādhigatavasena vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti adhimuttattherassa. ^b^taṃ vacana^eb^nti ``natthi cetasikaṃ dukkha''ntiādikaṃ maraṇe bhayābhāvādidīpakaṃ, tato eva abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā. ^b^māṇavā^eb^ti corā. corā hi ``māṇavā''ti vuccanti ``māṇavehi saha gacchanti katakammehi akatakammehipī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.149) viya.

[03] ^b^kiṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ^b^bhadante karitvānā^eb^ti, bhante, kiṃ nāma tapokammaṃ katvā. ko vā tava ācariyo kassa ^b^sāsanaṃ,^eb^ ovādaṃ nissāya ayaṃ ^b^asokatā^eb^ maraṇakāle sokābhāvo labbhatīti ^b^etaṃ^eb^ atthaṃ ^b^abravuṃ,^eb^ pucchāvasena kathesuṃ, bhāsiṃsu.

[03] taṃ sutvā thero tesaṃ paṭivacanaṃ dento ^b^``sabbaññū''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sabbaññū^eb^ti paropadesena vinā sabbapakārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhāpaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇassa adhigamena atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānātīti, sabbaññū. teneva samantacakkhunā sabbassa dassanato ^b^sabbadassāvī^eb^. yamhi anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ, tadeva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, nattheva asādhāraṇañāṇapāḷiyā virodho visayuppattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^itivuttakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (itivu0 aṭṭha0 38) vitthārato vuttamevāti tattha vuttanayeneva ^a^M2.0271^ea^ veditabbaṃ. pañcannampi mārānaṃ vijayato ^b^jino,^eb^ hīnādivibhāgabhinne sabbasmiṃ sattanikāye adhimuttavuttitāya mahatiyā karuṇāya samannāgatattā ^b^mahākāruṇiko,^eb^ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ veneyyānaṃ anusāsanato ^b^satthā,^eb^ tato eva sabbalokassa kilesarogatikicchanato ^b^sabbalokatikicchako,^eb^ sammāsambuddho ācariyo mamāti yojanā. ^b^khayagāmī^eb^ti nibbānagāmī.

[03] evaṃ therena satthu sāsanassa ca guṇe pakāsite paṭiladdhasaddhā ekacce corā pabbajiṃsu, ekacce upāsakattaṃ pavedesuṃ. tamatthaṃ dīpento dhammasaṅgāhakā ^b^``sutvāna corā''^eb^tiādinā dve gāthā abhāsiṃsu. tattha ^a^P3.0018^ea^ ^b^isino^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena isino, adhimuttattherassa. ^b^nikkhippā^eb^ti pahāya. ^b^satthāni ca āvudhāni cā^eb^ti asiādisatthāni ceva dhanukalāpādiāvudhāni ca. ^b^tamhā ca kammā^eb^ti tato corakammato.

[03] ^b^te pabbajitvā sugatassa sāsane^eb^ti te corā sobhanagamanatādīhi sugatassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajjaṃ upagantvā. bhāvanāvisesādhigatāya odagyalakkhaṇāya pītiyā samannāgamena ^b^udaggacittā. sumanā^eb^ti somanassappattā. ^b^katindriyā^eb^ti bhāvitindriyā. ^b^phusiṃsū^eb^ti aggamaggādhigamena asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchiṃsu. adhimutto kira core nibbisevane katvā, te tattheva ṭhapetvā, mātu santikaṃ gantvā, mātaraṃ āpucchitvā, paccāgantvā tehi saddhiṃ upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā, pabbājetvā upasampadaṃ akāsi. atha tesaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi ^a^V2.0231^ea^, te nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ``pabbajitvā...pe0... asaṅkhata''nti.

[03] ^b^samaṇassa ahu cintā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto hutvā ^a^M2.0272^ea^ nibbatti. tassa vayappattassa gottavasena ^b^pārāpariyo^eb^tveva samaññā ahosi. so tayo vede uggahetvā brāhmaṇasippesu nipphattiṃ gato. ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammadesanākāle jetavanavihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi. satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā ^b^indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.453) desesi. so taṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji. taṃ suttaṃ uggahetvā tadatthamanucintesi. yathā pana anucintesi, svāyamattho gāthāsu eva āvi bhavissati. so tathā anuvicintento āyatanamukhena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ patto. aparabhāge attanā cintitākāraṃ pakāsento --
[22] attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye..
[22] attano kiccakārīssa, na ca kañci viheṭhaye..
[22] anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati..
[22] anādīnavadassāvī, so dukkhā na hi muccati..
[22] na so muccati dukkhamhā, gandhesu adhimucchito..
[21] ``manaṃ cetehi dhammehi, yo na sakkoti rakkhituṃ.
[21] ``so atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo.
[22] na taṃ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇo..
[21] ``yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati.
[22] taṃ samādāya vattetha, sā hi ve uttamā rati..
[22] hantvā vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṃ..
[22] pañca pañcahi hantvāna, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo..
[22] sabbena sabbaṃ buddhassa, so naro sukhamedhatī''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^samaṇassā^eb^ti pabbajitassa. ^b^ahū^eb^ti ahosi. ^b^cintā^eb^ti dhammacintā dhammavicāraṇā. ^b^pārāpariyassā^eb^ti pārāparagottassa. ``pārācariyassā''tipi paṭhanti. ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanasīlassa. ^b^ekakassā^eb^ti asahāyassa, etena kāyavivekaṃ dasseti. ^b^pavivittassā^eb^ti pavivekahetunā kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanena vivekaṃ āraddhassa, etena cittavivekaṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``jhāyino''^eb^ti. ^b^jhāyino^eb^ti jhāyanasīlassa, yonisomanasikāresu yuttassāti attho. sabbametaṃ thero attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā vadati.

[03] ^b^``kimānupubba''^eb^ntiādinā taṃ cintanaṃ dasseti. tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ tāva ^b^kimānupubba^eb^nti anupubbaṃ anukkamo, anupubbameva vakkhamānesu vatasamācāresu ko anukkamo, kena anukkamena te paṭipajjitabbāti attho. ^b^puriso kiṃ vataṃ kiṃ samācāra^eb^nti atthakāmo puriso samādiyitabbaṭṭhena ``vata''nti laddhanāmaṃ, kīdisaṃ sīlaṃ samācāraṃ, samācaranto, attano ^b^kiccakārī^eb^ kattabbakārī assa, ^b^kañci^eb^ sattaṃ na ca ^b^viheṭhaye,^eb^ na bādheyyāti attho. attano kiccaṃ nāma samaṇadhammo, saṅkhepato sīlasamādhipaññā, taṃ sampādentassa paraviheṭhanāya lesopi natthi tāya sati samaṇabhāvasseva abhāvato.

[03] yathāha bhagavā -- ``na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto''ti (dha0 pa0 184). ettha ca vataggahaṇena vārittasīlaṃ gahitaṃ, samācāraggahaṇena samācaritabbato cārittasīlena saddhiṃ jhānavipassanādi, tasmā vārittasīlaṃ padhānaṃ. tatthāpi ca yasmā indriyasaṃvare siddhe sabbaṃ sīlaṃ surakkhitaṃ, sugopitameva hoti, tasmā indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ tāva dassetukāmo indriyānaṃ arakkhaṇe rakkhaṇe ca ādīnavānisaṃse vibhāvento ^a^M2.0275^ea^ ^b^``indriyāni manussāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti rakkhitabbadhammanidassanaṃ, tasmā cakkhādīni cha indriyānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^manussāna^eb^nti rakkhaṇayogyapuggalanidassanaṃ. ^b^hitāyā^eb^ti atthāya. ^b^ahitāyā^eb^ti anatthāya. hontīti ^a^P3.0021^ea^ vacanaseso. kathaṃ pana tāniyeva hitāya ca ahitāya hontīti āha ``rakkhitānī''tiādi. tassattho -- yassa cakkhādīni indriyāni satikavāṭena apihitāni, tassa rūpādīsu abhijjhādipāpadhammapavattiyā dvārabhāvato anatthāya pihitāni, tadabhāvato atthāya saṃvattantīti.

[03] ^b^indriyāneva^eb^ ^a^V2.0234^ea^ ^b^sārakkha^eb^nti yasmā indriyasaṃvaro paripuṇṇo sīlasampadaṃ paripūreti, sīlasampadā paripuṇṇā samādhisampadaṃ paripūreti, samādhisampadā paripuṇṇā paññāsampadaṃ paripūreti, tasmā indriyārakkhā attahitapaṭipattiyāva mūlanti dassento āha ``indriyāneva sārakkha''nti. satipubbaṅgamena ārakkhena saṃrakkhanto yonisomanasikārena indriyāni eva tāva sammadeva rakkhanto, yathā akusalacorā tehi tehi dvārehi pavisitvā cittasantāne kusalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ na vilumpanti, tathā tāni pidahantoti attho. sārakkhanti ca saṃ-saddassa sābhāvaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, ``sārāgo''tiādīsu viya. ``saṃrakkha''nti ca pāṭho. ^b^indriyāni ca gopaya^eb^nti tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ, pariyāyavacane payojanaṃ ^b^nettiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^``attano kiccakārīssā''^eb^ti iminā attahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti, ^b^``na ca kañci viheṭhaye''^eb^ti iminā parahitapaṭipattiṃ, ubhayenāpi vā attahitapaṭipattimeva dasseti parāviheṭhanassāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato. atha vā padadvayenapi attahitapaṭipattiṃ dasseti puthujjanassa sekkhassa ca parahitapaṭipattiyāpi attahitapaṭipattibhāvato.

[03] evaṃ rakkhitāni indriyāni hitāya hontīti vodānapakkhaṃ saṅkhepeneva dassetvā, arakkhitāni ahitāya hontīti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ pana vibhajitvā dassento ^b^``cakkhundriyaṃ ce''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^cakkhundriyaṃ ce rūpesu, gacchantaṃ anivārayaṃ. anādīnavadassāvī^eb^ti yo nīlapītādibhedesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu rūpāyatanesu gacchantaṃ yathāruci pavattantaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ anivārayaṃ, anivārayanto appaṭibāhanto tathāpavattiyaṃ ādīnavadassāvī na hoti ce, diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ na passati ce ^a^M2.0276^ea^. ``gacchantaṃ nivāraye anissaraṇadassāvī''ti ca pāṭho. tattha yo ``diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.95) vuttavidhinā diṭṭhamatteyeva ṭhatvā satisampajaññavasena rūpāyatane pavattamāno tattha nissaraṇadassāvī nāma. vuttavipariyāyena anissaraṇadassāvī daṭṭhabbo. ^b^so dukkhā na hi muccatī^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo vaṭṭadukkhato na muccateva. ettha ca cakkhundriyassa anivāraṇaṃ ^a^P3.0022^ea^ nāma yathā tena dvārena abhijjhādayo pāpadhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tathā pavattanaṃ, taṃ pana atthato satisampajaññassa anuṭṭhāpanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sesindriyesupi eseva nayo. ^b^adhimucchito^eb^ti adhimuttataṇhāya mucchaṃ āpanno. ^b^ambila^eb^nti ambilarasaṃ. ^b^madhuragga^eb^nti madhurarasakoṭṭhāsaṃ. tathā ^b^tittakaggaṃ. anussara^eb^nti assādavasena taṃ taṃ rasaṃ anuvicintento. ^b^ganthito^eb^ti rasataṇhāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ rase ganthito bandho. ``gadhito''ti ca paṭhanti, gedhaṃ āpannoti attho. ^b^hadayaṃ nāvabujjhatī^eb^ti ``dukkhassantaṃ karissāmī''ti pabbajjādikkhaṇe uppannaṃ cittaṃ na jānāti na sallakkheti ^a^V2.0235^ea^, sāsanassa hadayaṃ abbhantaraṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ sammaddanarasataṇhāya gadhito nāvabujjhati na jānāti, na paṭipajjatīti attho.

[03] ^b^subhānī^eb^ti sundarāni. ^b^appaṭikūlānī^eb^ti manoramāni, iṭṭhāni. ^b^phoṭṭhabbānī^eb^ti upādiṇṇānupādiṇṇappabhede phasse. ^b^ratto^eb^ti rajjanasabhāvena rāgena ratto. ^b^rāgādhikaraṇa^eb^nti rāgahetu. ^b^vividhaṃ vindate dukha^eb^nti rāgapariḷāhādivasena diṭṭhadhammikañca nirayasantāpādivasena abhisamparāyañca nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ paṭilabhati.

[03] ^b^manaṃ cetehī^eb^ti manañca etehi rūpārammaṇādīhi dhammārammaṇappabhedehi ca. ^b^na^eb^nti puggalaṃ. ^b^sabbehī^eb^ti sabbehi pañcahipi. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo puggalo manaṃ, manodvāraṃ, ^b^etehi^eb^ yathāvuttehi rūpādīhi pañcahi dhammehi dhammārammaṇappabhedato ca. tattha pavattanakapāpakammanivāraṇena ^b^rakkhituṃ,^eb^ gopituṃ na sakkoti, ^b^tato^eb^ tassa arakkhaṇato naṃ puggalaṃ taṃnimittaṃ dukkhaṃ ^b^anveti,^eb^ anugacchati, anugacchantañca etehi pañcahipi rūpārammaṇādīhi chaṭṭhārammaṇena saddhiṃ sabbehipi ārammaṇappaccayabhūtehi anugacchatīti. ettha cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyañca asampattaggāhibhāvato ``gacchantaṃ ^a^M2.0277^ea^ anivāraya''nti vuttaṃ itaraṃ sampattaggāhīti ``gandhe ce paṭisevatī''tiādinā vuttaṃ. tatthāpi ca rasataṇhā ca phoṭṭhabbataṇhā ca sattānaṃ visesato balavatīti ``rasataṇhāya gadhito, phoṭṭhabbāni anussarantoti'' vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
