[03] evaṃ aguttadvārassa puggalassa chahi dvārehi chasupi ārammaṇesu asaṃvaranimittaṃ uppajjanakadukkhaṃ dassetvā svāyamasaṃvaro yasmā sarīrasabhāvānavabodhena hoti, tasmā sarīrasabhāvaṃ vicinanto ^b^``pubbalohitasampuṇṇa''^eb^ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tassattho ^a^P3.0023^ea^ -- sarīraṃ nāmetaṃ pubbena lohitena ca ^b^sampuṇṇaṃ^eb^ bharitaṃ aññena ca pittasemhādinā bahunā kuṇapena, tayidaṃ naravīrena naresu chekena sippācariyena kataṃ vaggu maṭṭhaṃ lākhāparikammādinā cittitaṃ, anto pana gūthādiasucibharitaṃ samuggaṃ viya chavimattamanoharaṃ bālajanasammohaṃ dukkhasabhāvatāya nirayādidukkhatāpanato ca ^b^kaṭukaṃ,^eb^ parikappasambhavena amūlakena assādamattena madhuratāya ^b^madhurassādaṃ,^eb^ tato eva piyabhāvanibandhanena ^b^piyanibandhanaṃ,^eb^ dussahatāya appatītatāya ca ^b^dukhaṃ,^eb^ īdise sarīre assādalobhena mahādukkhaṃ paccanubhuyyamānaṃ anavabujjhanto loko madhuragiddho khuradhārālehakapuriso viya daṭṭhabboti.

[03] idāni ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ete cakkhādīnaṃ gocarabhūtā rūpādayo vuttā, te visesato purisassa itthipaṭibaddhā kamanīyāti tattha saṃvaro kātabboti dassento ^b^``itthirūpe''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^itthirūpe^eb^ti itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikarūpāyatanasaṅkhāte vaṇṇe. api ca yo koci itthiyā nivatthassa alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṃ vā piḷandhanamālānaṃ vā kāyapaṭibaddho vaṇṇo purisassa cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvāya upakappati, sabbametaṃ ``itthirūpa''ntveva veditabbaṃ. ^b^itthisare^eb^ti itthiyā gītalapitahasitaruditasadde. api ca itthiyā nivatthavatthassapi alaṅkatālaṅkārassapi itthipayoganipphāditā veṇuvīṇāsaṅkhapaṇavādīnampi saddā idha itthisaraggahaṇena gahitāti veditabbā. sabbopeso purisassa cittaṃ ākaḍḍhatīti. ``itthirase''ti pana pāḷiyā catusamuṭṭhānikarasāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. itthiyā kiṃkārapaṭissāvitādivasena assavaraso ceva paribhogaraso ^a^M2.0278^ea^ ca itthirasoti eke. yo pana itthiyā oṭṭhamaṃsasammakkhitakheḷādiraso, yo ca tāya purisassa dinnayāgubhattādīnaṃ raso, sabbopeso ``itthiraso''tveva veditabbo. phoṭṭhabbepi ca itthiyā kāyasamphasso, itthisarīrārūḷhānaṃ vatthālaṅkāramālādīnaṃ phasso ``itthiphoṭṭhabbo''tveva veditabbo. ettha ca yesaṃ itthirūpe itthisareti pāḷi, tesaṃ api-saddena itthirasasaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^itthigandhesū^eb^ti itthiyā catusamuṭṭhānikagandhāyatanesu. itthiyā sarīragandho nāma duggandho. ekaccā hi itthī assagandhinī hoti, ekaccā meṇḍagandhinī, ekaccā sedagandhinī, ekaccā soṇitagandhinī, tathāpi tāsu andhabālo rajjateva. cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa kāyato candanagandho vāyati, mukhato ^a^P3.0024^ea^ uppalagandho, ayaṃ na sabbāsaṃ hotīti, itthiyā sarīre ārūḷho āgantuko anulimpanādigandho ``itthigandho''ti veditabbo. ^b^sāratto^eb^ti suṭṭhu ratto gadhito mucchito, idaṃ pana padaṃ ``itthirūpe''tiādīsupi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^vividhaṃ vindate dukha^eb^nti itthirūpādīsu sarāganimittaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vadhabandhanādivasena samparāyikaṃ pañcavidhabandhanādivasena nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ paṭilabhati.

[03] ^b^itthisotāni sabbānī^eb^ti itthiyā rūpādiārammaṇāni sabbāni anavasesāni pañca taṇhāsotāni sandanti. ^b^pañcasū^eb^ti purisassa pañcasu dvāresu. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesaṃ pañcannaṃ sotānaṃ. ^b^āvaraṇa^eb^nti saṃvaraṇaṃ, yathā asaṃvaro na uppajjati, evaṃ satisampajaññaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā saṃvaraṃ pavattetuṃ yo sakkoti, so ^b^vīriyavā^eb^ āraddhavīriyo akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyāti attho.

[03] evaṃ rūpādigocare pabbajitassa paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni gahaṭṭhassa dassetuṃ ^b^``so atthavā''^eb^tiādi ^a^V2.0237^ea^ vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^so atthavā so dhammaṭṭho, so dakkho so vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti so puggalo imasmiṃ loke atthavā, buddhimā, dhamme ṭhito, dhamme dakkho, dhamme cheko, analaso vā vicakkhaṇo iti kattabbatāsu kusalo nāma. ^b^kareyya ramamānopi, kiccaṃ dhammatthasaṃhita^eb^nti geharatiyā ramamānopi dhammatthasaṃhitaṃ dhammato atthato ca anapetameva taṃ taṃ kattabbaṃ. anuppannānaṃ bhogānaṃ uppādanaṃ, uppannānaṃ paripālanaṃ, paribhogañca kareyya, aññamaññaṃ, avirodhena, aññamaññaṃ, abādhanena, tivaggatthaṃ anuyuñjeyyāti adhippāyo ^a^M2.0279^ea^. ayañca nayo yesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiavirodhena tivaggatthassa vasena vattati bimbisāramahārājādīnaṃ viya, tesaṃ vasena vutto. na yesaṃ kesañci vasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^atho sīdati saññutta^eb^nti yadi idhaloke supasaṃhitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ atthaṃ pariggahetvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^vajje kiccaṃ niratthaka^eb^nti samparāyikattharahitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ kiccaṃ sacepi vissajjeyya pariccajeyya. ^b^na taṃ kiccanti maññitvā, appamatto vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti satiavippavāsena appamatto vicāraṇapaññāsambhavena vicakkhaṇo anatthupasaṃhitaṃ, taṃ kiccaṃ mayā na kātabbanti maññitvā vivajjeyya.

[03] vivajjetvā pana ^b^yañca atthena saññuttaṃ, yā ca dhammagatā rati. taṃ samādāya vattethā^eb^ti yaṃkiñci diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikappabhedena atthena ^a^P3.0025^ea^ hitena saṃyuttaṃ tadubhayahitāvahaṃ, yā ca adhikusaladhammagatā samathavipassanāsahitā rati, tadubhayaṃ sammā ādiyitvā pariggahaṃ katvā vatteyya. ``sabbaṃ ratiṃ dhammarati jinātī''ti (dha0 pa0 354) vacanato sā hi ekaṃsena uttamatthassa pāpanato uttamā rati nāma.

[03] yaṃ pana kāmaratisaṃyuttaṃ kiccaṃ niratthakanti vuttaṃ, tassā anatthupasaṃhitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``uccāvacehī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^uccāvacehī^eb^ti mahantehi ceva khuddakehi ca. ^b^upāyehī^eb^ti nayehi. ^b^paresamabhijigīsatī^eb^ti paresaṃ santakaṃ āharituṃ icchati, pare vā sabbathā hāpeti, jināpeti paraṃ hantvā, vadhitvā atha socayitvā, ālopati sāhasā yo paresaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo puggalo kāmahetu pare hananto, ghātento, socento sandhicchedasandhiruhanapasayhāvahārādīhi nānupāyehi paresaṃ santakaṃ harituṃ vāyamanto sāhasākāraṃ karoti, ālopati, jigīsati sāpateyyavasena pare hāpeti, tassa taṃ kiccaṃ kāmaratisannissitaṃ anatthupasaṃhitaṃ ekantanihīnanti. etena tappaṭipakkhato dhammagatāya ratiyā ekaṃsato uttamabhāvaṃyeva vibhāveti.

[03] idāni ^a^V2.0238^ea^ yaṃ ``tesamāvaraṇaṃ kātuṃ yo sakkotī''ti indriyānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ upāyena saha vibhāvento ^b^``tacchanto āṇiyā āṇiṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0280^ea^, ^b^nihanti balavā yathā''^eb^ti āha. yathā ^b^balavā^eb^ kāyabalena, ñāṇabalena ca samannāgato tacchako rukkhadaṇḍagataṃ āṇiṃ nīharitukāmo tato balavatiṃ āṇiṃ koṭento tato nīharati, tathā kusalo bhikkhu cakkhādīni indriyāni vipassanābalena nihantukāmo indriyehi eva nihanti.

[03] katamehi panāti āha ^b^``saddha''^eb^ntiādi. tassattho -- adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ saddhaṃ, paggahalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ, avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ samādhiṃ, upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ satiṃ, dassanalakkhaṇaṃ paññanti imānipi vimuttiparipācakāni pañcindriyāni bhāvento vaḍḍhento etehi pañcahi indriyehi cakkhādīni pañcindriyāni anunayapaṭighādikilesuppattiyā dvārabhāvavihanena hantvā, ariyamaggena tadupanissaye kilese samucchinditvā, tato eva anīgho niddukkho brāhmaṇo anupādisesaparinibbānameva yāti upagacchatīti.

[03] ^b^so atthavā^eb^ti so yathāvutto brāhmaṇo uttamatthena samannāgatattā atthavā, taṃ sampāpake dhamme ṭhitattā ^b^dhammaṭṭho. sabbena sabbaṃ^eb^ anavasesena vidhinā anavasesaṃ ^b^buddhassa^eb^ bhagavato vākyabhūtaṃ anusāsaniṃ katvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā ṭhito. tato eva ^b^so naro^eb^ uttamapuriso nibbānasukhañca ^b^edhati,^eb^ brūheti, vaḍḍhetīti.
[03] evaṃ ^a^P3.0026^ea^ therena attano cintitākāravibhāvanāvasena paṭipattiyā pakāsitattā idameva cassa aññābyākaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^cirarattaṃ vatātāpī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato telakānittherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde satthu abhijātito puretaraṃyeva sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^telakānī^eb^ti laddhanāmo vayappatto hetusampannatāya kāme jigucchanto gharāvāsaṃ pahāya paribbājakapabbajjaṃ ^a^V2.0239^ea^ pabbajitvā vivaṭṭajjhāsayo ``ko so pāraṅgato loke''tiādinā vimokkhapariyesanaṃ ^a^M2.0281^ea^ caramāno te te samaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati, te na sampāyanti. so tena anārādhitacitto vicarati. atha amhākaṃ bhagavati loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakke lokahitaṃ karonte ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāti. so ekadivasaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nisinno attanā adhigatavisesaṃ paccavekkhitvā tadanusārena attano paṭipattiṃ anussaritvā taṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ācikkhanto --
[21] ``ko so pāraṅgato loke, ko patto amatogadhaṃ.
[22] ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissati..
[22] passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhati..
[21] ``taṃ ^a^M2.0282^ea^ na passāmi tekicchaṃ, yo metaṃ sallamuddhare.
[22] gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassaye..
[22] te sote ko nivāreyya, taṃ lataṃ ko hi checchati..
[22] mā te manomayo sotā, rukkhaṃva sahasā luve..
[22] pādāsi vuyhamānassa, mā bhāyīti ca mabravi..
[22] yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ pajaṃ..
[22] buddho mepānudī ganthaṃ, visadosappavāhano''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0028^ea^ ^b^cirarattaṃ vatā^eb^ti cirakālaṃ vata. ^b^ātāpī^eb^ti vīriyavā vimokkhadhammapariyesane āraddhavīriyo. ^b^dhammaṃ anuvicintaya^eb^nti ``kīdiso nu kho vimokkhadhammo, kathaṃ vā adhigantabbo''ti vimuttidhammaṃ anuvicinanto gavesanto. ^b^samaṃ cittassa nālatthaṃ, pucchaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇe^eb^ti te te nānātitthiye samaṇabrāhmaṇe vimuttidhammaṃ pucchanto pakatiyā anupasantasabhāvassa cittassa samaṃ vūpasamabhūtaṃ vaṭṭadukkhavissaraṇaṃ ariyadhammaṃ nālatthaṃ nādhigacchanti attho.

[03] ^b^ko^eb^ ^a^V2.0241^ea^ ^b^so pāraṅgato^eb^tiādi pucchitākāradassanaṃ. tattha ^b^ko so pāraṅgato loke^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke titthakārapaṭiññesu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu ko nu kho so saṃsārassa pāraṃ nibbānaṃ upagato. ^b^ko patto amatogadha^eb^nti nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko patto adhigatoti attho. ^b^kassa dhammaṃ paṭicchāmī^eb^ti kassa samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā ovādadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmi paṭipajjāmi. ^b^paramatthavijānana^eb^nti paramatthassa vijānanaṃ, aviparītappavattinivattiyo pavedentanti attho.

[03] ^b^antovaṅkagato āsī^eb^ti vaṅkaṃ vuccati diṭṭhigataṃ manovaṅkabhāvato, sabbepi vā kilesā, antoti pana hadayavaṅkassa anto, hadayabbhantaragatakilesavaṅko vā ahosīti attho. ^b^macchova ghasamāmisa^eb^nti āmisaṃ ghasanto khādanto maccho viya, gilabaḷiso maccho viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^baddho mahindapāsena, vepacityasuro yathā^eb^ti mahindassa sakkassa pāsena baddho yathā vepacitti asurindo aserivihārī mahādukkhappatto, evamahaṃ pubbe kilesapāsena baddho āsiṃ, aserivihārī mahādukkhappattoti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^añchāmī^eb^ti ākaḍḍhāmi. ^b^na^eb^nti kilesapāsaṃ. ^b^na muñcāmī^eb^ti na mocemi. ^b^asmā sokapariddavā^eb^ti imasmā sokaparidevavaṭṭato. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathāpāsena baddho migo sūkaro vā mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto paripphandamāno taṃ āviñchanto bandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti, evaṃ ahaṃ pubbe ^a^M2.0284^ea^ kilesapāsena paṭimukko mocanupāyaṃ ajānanto kāyasañcetanādivasena paripphandamāno taṃ na mocesiṃ, aññadatthu taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto sokādinā paraṃ kilesaṃ eva pāpuṇinti. ^b^ko me bandhaṃ muñcaṃ loke, sambodhiṃ vedayissatī^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke etaṃ kilesabandhanena bandhaṃ muñcanto sambujjhati etenāti ``sambodhī''ti laddhanāmaṃ vimokkhamaggaṃ ko me vedayissati ācikkhissatīti attho. ``bandhamuñca''ntipi paṭhanti, bandhā, bandhassa vā mocakaṃ sambodhinti yojanā.

[03] ^b^ādisanta^eb^nti desentaṃ. ^b^pabhaṅguna^eb^nti pabhañjanaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ ^a^P3.0029^ea^, pabhaṅgunaṃ vā dhammappavattiṃ ādisantaṃ kathentaṃ jarāya maccuno ca pavāhanaṃ kassa dhammaṃ paṭicchāmi. ``paṭipajjāmī''ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^vicikicchākaṅkhāganthita^eb^nti ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna''ntiādinayappavattāya (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20) vicikicchāya āsappanaparisappanākāravuttiyā kaṅkhāya ca ganthitaṃ. ^b^sārambhabalasaññuta^eb^nti karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇena balappattena sārambhena yuttaṃ. ^b^kodhappattamanatthaddha^eb^nti sabbattha kodhena yuttamanasā ^a^V2.0242^ea^ thaddhabhāvaṃ gataṃ abhijappappadāraṇaṃ. icchitālābhādivasena hi taṇhā sattānaṃ cittaṃ padālentī viya pavattati. dūre ṭhitassāpi vijjhanupāyatāya taṇhāva dhanu samupatiṭṭhati uppajjati etasmāti ^b^taṇhādhanusamuṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ diṭṭhisallaṃ. taṃ pana yasmā vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi, dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhīti tiṃsappabhedaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``dve ca pannarasāyuta''^eb^nti, dvikkhattuṃ pannarasabhedavantanti attho. ^b^passa orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ, bhetvāna yadi tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti yaṃ urasambandhanīyatāya orasikaṃ bāḷhaṃ balavataraṃ bhetvāna hadayaṃ vinivijjhitvā tasmiṃyeva hadaye tiṭṭhati, taṃ passāti attānameva ālapati.

[03] ^b^anudiṭṭhīnaṃ appahāna^eb^nti anudiṭṭhibhūtānaṃ sesadiṭṭhīnaṃ appahānakāraṇaṃ. yāva hi sakkāyadiṭṭhi santānato na vigacchati, tāva sassatadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ appahānamevāti. ^b^saṅkappaparatejita^eb^nti saṅkappena micchāvitakkena pare parajane nissayalakkhaṇaṃ patipatite tejitaṃ ussāhitaṃ. ^b^tena viddho pavedhāmī^eb^ti tena diṭṭhisallena yathā hadayaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati, evaṃ viddho pavedhāmi saṅkappāmi sassatucchedādivasena ito cito ca parivaṭṭāmi. ^b^pattaṃva^eb^ ^a^M2.0285^ea^ ^b^māluterita^eb^nti mālutena vāyunā eritaṃ vaṇṭato muttaṃ dumapattaṃ viya.

[03] ^b^ajjhattaṃ me samuṭṭhāyā^eb^ti yathā loke sallaṃ nāma bāhirato uṭṭhāya ajjhattaṃ nimmathetvā bādhati, na evamidaṃ. idaṃ pana ajjhattaṃ me mama attabhāve samuṭṭhāya so attabhāvasaññito chaphassāyatanakāyo yathā ^b^khippaṃ^eb^ sīghaṃ ^b^paccati,^eb^ ḍayhati. yathā kiṃ? aggi viya sanissayaḍāhako taṃyeva ^b^māmakaṃ^eb^ mama santakaṃ attabhāvaṃ ḍahanto yattha uppanno, tattheva ^b^sarati^eb^ pavattati.

[03] ^b^taṃ na passāmi tekiccha^eb^nti tādisāya tikicchāya niyuttatāya tekicchaṃ ^a^P3.0030^ea^ sallakattaṃ bhisakkaṃ taṃ na passāmi. ^b^yo metaṃ sallamuddhare^eb^ti yo bhisakko etaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ kilesasallañca uddhareyya, uddharanto ca ^b^nānārajjena^eb^ rajjusadisasaṅkhātāya esanisalākāya pavesetvāna ^b^satthena^eb^ kantitvā ^b^nāññena^eb^ mantāgadappayogena ^b^vicikicchitaṃ^eb^ sallaṃ tikicchituṃ sakkāti āharitvā yojetabbaṃ. vicikicchitanti, ca nidassanamattametaṃ. sabbassapi kilesasallassa vasena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^asattho^eb^ti sattharahito. ^b^avaṇo^eb^ti vaṇena vinā. ^b^abbhantarapassaya^eb^nti abbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ hadayaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. ^b^ahiṃsa^eb^nti apīḷento. ``ahiṃsā''ti ca pāṭho, ahiṃsāya apīḷanenāti ^a^V2.0243^ea^ attho. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- ko nu kho kiñci satthaṃ aggahetvā vaṇañca akaronto tato eva sabbagattāni abādhento mama hadayabbhantaragataṃ pīḷājananato anto tudanato anto ruddhanato ca paramattheneva sallabhūtaṃ kilesasallaṃ uddharissatīti.

[03] evaṃ dasahi gāthāhi pubbe attanā cintitākāraṃ dassetvā punapi taṃ pakārantarena dassetuṃ ^b^``dhammappati hi so seṭṭho''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dhammappatī^eb^ti dhammanimittaṃ dhammahetu. ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^so seṭṭho^eb^ti so puggalo uttamo. ^b^visadosappavāhako^eb^ti ^b^yo mayhaṃ^eb^ rāgādikilesassa pavāhako ucchinnako. ^b^gambhīre patitassa me, thalaṃ pāṇiñca dassaye^eb^ti ko nu kho atigambhīre saṃsāramahoghe patitassa mayhaṃ ``mā bhāyī''ti assāsento nibbānathalaṃ taṃsampāpakaṃ ariyamaggahatthañca dasseyya.

[03] ^b^rahadehamasmi^eb^ ^a^M2.0286^ea^ ^b^ogāḷho^eb^ti mahati saṃsārarahade ahamasmi sasīsaṃ nimujjanavasena otiṇṇo anupaviṭṭho. ^b^ahāriyarajamattike^eb^ti apanetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo rāgādirajo mattikā kaddamo etassāti ahāriyarajamattiko, rahado. tasmiṃ rahadasmiṃ. ``ahāriyarajamantike''ti vā pāṭho, antike ṭhitarāgādīsu dunnīharaṇīyarāgādirajeti attho. santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā ^b^māyā,^eb^ parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇā ^b^usūyā,^eb^ karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇo ^b^sārambho,^eb^ cittālasiyalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^thinaṃ,^eb^ kāyālasiyalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^middha^eb^nti ime pāpadhammā patthaṭā yaṃ rahadaṃ, tasmiṃ māyāusūyasārambhathinamiddhamapatthaṭe, makāro cettha padasandhikaro vutto. yathāvuttehi imehi pāpadhammehi patthaṭeti attho.

[03] ^b^uddhaccameghathanitaṃ, saṃyojanavalāhaka^eb^nti vacanavipallāsena vuttaṃ, bhantasabhāvaṃ uddhaccaṃ meghathanitaṃ meghagajjitaṃ etesanti uddhaccameghathanitā. dasavidhā saṃyojanā ^a^P3.0031^ea^ eva valāhakā etesanti saṃyojanavalāhakā. ^b^vāhā^eb^ mahāudakavāhasadisā rāganissitā micchāsaṅkappā asubhādīsu ṭhitā ^b^kuddiṭṭhiṃ^eb^ maṃ ^b^vahanti^eb^ apāyasamuddameva uddissa kaḍḍhantīti attho.

[03] ^b^savanti sabbadhi sotā^eb^ti taṇhāsoto, diṭṭhisoto, mānasoto, avijjāsoto, kilesasototi ime pañcapisotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato ``rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā''tiādinā (vibha0 204, 232) sabbabhāgehi vā savanato sabbadhi savanti. ^b^latā^eb^ti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena latā viyāti latā, taṇhā. ^b^ubbhijja tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti chahi dvārehi ubbhijjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati. ^b^te sote^eb^ti taṇhādike ^a^V2.0244^ea^ sote mama santāne sandante maggasetubandhanena ko purisaviseso nivāreyya, ^b^taṃ lata^eb^nti taṇhālataṃ, maggasatthena ko ^b^checchati^eb^ chindissati.

[03] ^b^velaṃ karothā^eb^ti tesaṃ sotānaṃ velaṃ setuṃ karotha sannivāraṇaṃ. ^b^bhaddante^eb^ti ālapanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^mā te manomayo soto^eb^ti udakasoto oḷāriko, tassa bālamahājanenapi setuṃ ^a^M2.0287^ea^ katvā nivāraṇaṃ sakkā. ayaṃ pana manomayo soto sukhumo dunnivāraṇo. so yathā udakasoto vaḍḍhanto kūle ṭhitaṃ rukkhaṃ pātetvāva nāseti, evaṃ tumhe apāyatīre ṭhite tattha sahasā pātetvā apāyasamuddaṃ pāpento ^b^mā luve^eb^ mā vināseyya mā anayabyasanaṃ pāpeyyāti attho.

[03] evaṃ ayaṃ thero purimattabhāve parimadditasaṅkhārattā ñāṇaparipākaṃ gatattā pavattidukkhaṃ upadhārento yathā vicikicchādike saṃkilesadhamme pariggaṇhi, tamākāraṃ dassetvā idāni jātasaṃvego kiṃkusalagavesī satthu santikaṃ gato yaṃ visesaṃ adhimucci, taṃ dassento ^b^``evaṃ me bhayajātassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^evaṃ me bhayajātassā^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārena saṃsāre jātabhayassa ^b^apārā^eb^ orimatīrato sappaṭibhayato saṃsāravaṭṭato ``kathaṃ nu kho muñceyya''nti ^b^pāraṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ, ^b^esato^eb^ gavesato, ^b^tāṇo^eb^ sadevakassa lokassa tāṇabhūto kilesasamucchedanī paññā āvudho etassāti ^b^paññāvudho^eb^. diṭṭhadhammikādiatthena sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ anusāsanato ^b^satthā,^eb^ isisaṅghena aggasāvakādiariyapuggalasamūhena nisevito payirupāsito ^b^isisaṅghanisevito, sopāna^eb^nti desanāñāṇena suṭṭhu katattā abhisaṅkhatattā ^b^sukataṃ,^eb^ upakkilesavirahitato ^b^suddhaṃ,^eb^ saddhāpaññādisārabhūtaṃ ^b^dhammasāramayaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0032^ea^ paṭipakkhehi acalanīyato ^b^daḷhaṃ,^eb^ vipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ sopānaṃ mahoghena vuyhamānassa mayhaṃ satthā pādāsi, dadanto ca ``iminā te sotthi bhavissatī''ti samassāsento ^b^mā bhāyīti ca abravi,^eb^ kathesi.

[03] ^b^satipaṭṭhānapāsāda^eb^nti tena vipassanāsopānena kāyānupassanādinā laddhabbacatubbidhasāmaññaphalavisesena catubhūmisampannaṃ satipaṭṭhānapāsādaṃ āruhitvā ^b^paccavekkhisaṃ^eb^ catusaccadhammaṃ maggañāṇena patiavekkhiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. ^b^yaṃ taṃ pubbe amaññissaṃ, sakkāyābhirataṃ paja^eb^nti evaṃ paṭividdhasacco yaṃ sakkāye ``ahaṃ mamā''ti abhirataṃ pajaṃ titthiyajanaṃ tena parikappitāttānañca pubbe sārato amaññissaṃ. ^b^yadā ca maggamaddakkhiṃ, nāvāya abhirūhana^eb^nti ariyamagganāvāya abhiruhanūpāyabhūtaṃ yadā vipassanāmaggaṃ yāthāvato addakkhiṃ. tato paṭṭhāya taṃ titthiyajanaṃ attānañca ^b^anadhiṭṭhāya^eb^ citte aṭṭhapetvā aggahetvā ^b^titthaṃ^eb^ nibbānasaṅkhātassa amatamahāpārassa ^a^M2.0288^ea^ ^a^V2.0245^ea^ titthabhūtaṃ ariyamaggadassanaṃ sabbehi maggehi sabbehi kusaladhammehi ukkaṭṭhaṃ addakkhiṃ, yāthāvato apassinti attho.

[03] evaṃ attano anuttaraṃ maggādhigamaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tassa desakaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ thomento ^b^``sallaṃ attasamuṭṭhāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^salla^eb^nti diṭṭhimānādikilesasallaṃ. ^b^attasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti ``aha''nti mānaṭṭhānatāya ``attā''ti ca laddhanāme attabhāve sambhūtaṃ. ^b^bhavanettippabhāvita^eb^nti bhavataṇhāsamuṭṭhitaṃ bhavataṇhāsannissayaṃ. sā hi diṭṭhimānādīnaṃ sambhavo. ^b^etesaṃ appavattāyā^eb^ti yathāvuttānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ appavattiyā anuppādāya. ^b^desesi maggamuttama^eb^nti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, tadupāyañca vipassanāmaggaṃ kathesi.

[03] ^b^dīgharattānusayita^eb^nti anamatagge saṃsāre cirakālaṃ santāne anu anu sayitaṃ kāraṇalābhena uppajjanārahabhāvena thāmagataṃ, tato ca cirarattaṃ ^b^adhiṭṭhitaṃ^eb^ santānaṃ ajjhāruyha ṭhitaṃ. ^b^gantha^eb^nti abhijjhākāyaganthādiṃ mama santāne ganthabhūtaṃ kilesavisadosaṃ pavāhano ^b^buddho^eb^ bhagavā attano desanānubhāvena ^b^apānudī^eb^ parijahāpesi, ganthesu hi anavasesato pahīnesu appahīno nāma kileso natthīti.

[03] ^b^passa^eb^ ^a^P3.0033^ea^ ^b^cittakata^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato raṭṭhapālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarassa bhagavato uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena gharāvāse patiṭṭhito ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammikena dassitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ kulavaṃsānugataṃ dhanaṃ disvā ``imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ mayhaṃ pituayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, mayā pana gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti cintetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. so abhiññālābhiṃ ekaṃ tāpasaṃ upaṭṭhahanto tena devalokādhipacce niyojito yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto ^a^M2.0289^ea^ devaloke nibbattitvā dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto manussaloke bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa ekaputtako hutvā nibbatti.

[03] tena ^a^V2.0246^ea^ ca samayena padumuttaro bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko veneyyasatte nibbānamahānagarasaṅkhātaṃ khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpesi. atha so kulaputto anukkamena viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ upāsakehi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ disvā pasannacitto parisapariyante nisīdi. tena kho pana samayena satthā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. taṃ disvā so pasannamānaso tadatthāya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivutassa bhagavato mahatā sakkārena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthā tassa anantarāyena ijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā ``anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissatī''ti byākāsi. so satthāraṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. so tattha yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni katvā tato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavute kappe phussassa bhagavato kāle satthu vemātikabhātikesu tīsu rājaputtesu satthāraṃ upaṭṭhahantesu tesaṃ puññakiriyāya kiccaṃ akāsi.

[03] evaṃ tattha tattha bhave taṃ taṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā sugatīsuyeva saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kururaṭṭhe thullakoṭṭhikanigame raṭṭhapālaseṭṭhino gehe nibbatti, tassa bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule nibbattattā ^b^raṭṭhapālo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0034^ea^ vaṃsānugatameva nāmaṃ ahosi. so mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhanto anukkamena yobbanapatto mātāpitūhi patirūpena dārena saṃyojito mahante ca yase patiṭṭhāpito dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ paccanubhoti. atha bhagavā kururaṭṭhe janapadacārikaṃ caranto thullakoṭṭhikaṃ anupāpuṇi. taṃ sutvā raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitukāmo sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā kicchena kasirena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa santike pabbajitvā yonisomanasikārena kammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.2.97-111) --
[22] sabbe jane hāsayanto, desesi amataṃ padaṃ..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] kheḷapiṇḍeva bhogamhi, pemaṃ mayhaṃ na vijjati..

[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro passituṃ thullakoṭṭhikaṃ gantvā, tattha sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto, pitarā nimantito svātanāya adhivāsetvā, dutiyadivase pitu nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthāgārajane upagantvā ``kīdisā nāma tā, ayyaputta, accharāyo, yāsaṃ tvaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carasī''tiādīni (ma0 ni0 2.301) vatvā, palobhanakammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe tassa adhippāyaṃ parivattetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ kathento --
[22] āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti..
[22] aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] bhutvā nivāpaṃ gacchāma, socante migaluddake''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^cittakata^eb^nti cittaṃ kataṃ cittakataṃ, vatthābharaṇamālādīhi vicittaṃ katanti attho. ^b^bimba^eb^nti dīghādibhāvena yuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi maṇḍitaṃ attabhāvaṃ. ^b^arukāya^eb^nti navannaṃ vaṇamukhānaṃ lomakūpānañca vasena vissandamānāsuciṃ, sabbaso ca arubhūtaṃ vaṇabhūtaṃ arūnaṃ vā kāyaṃ. ^b^samussita^eb^nti tīhi aṭṭhisatehi samussitaṃ. ^b^ātura^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ iriyāpathantarādīhi pariharitabbatāya niccaṃ gilānaṃ. ^b^bahusaṅkappa^eb^nti bālajanena abhūtaṃ āropetvā bahudhā saṅkappitabbaṃ. ^b^yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitī^eb^ti yassa kāyassa dhuvabhāvo ṭhitisabhāvo natthi, ekaṃsato bhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammoyeva. taṃ ^b^passā^eb^ti samīpe ṭhitaṃ janaṃ, attānameva vā sandhāya vadati.

[03] ^b^rūpa^eb^nti sarīraṃ. sarīrampi hi ``aṭṭhiñca paṭicca, nhāruñca paṭicca, maṃsañca paṭicca, cammañca paṭicca, ākāso parivārito `rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.306) rūpanti vuccati. ^b^maṇinā kuṇḍalena cā^eb^ti sīsūpagādiābharaṇagatena maṇinā kuṇḍalena cittakataṃ. ^b^aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddha^eb^nti allacammena pariyonaddhaṃ atirekatisatapabhedaṃ aṭṭhiṃ passāti yojanā. kuṇḍalena cāti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena sesābharaṇālaṅkāre saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^saha vatthehi sobhatī^eb^ti tayidaṃ rūpaṃ maṇinā cittakatampi vatthehi paṭicchāditameva sobhati, na apaṭicchāditanti ^a^V2.0249^ea^ attho. ye pana ``aṭṭhitacenā''ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ aṭṭhitacenaṃ onaddhaṃ sobhati, onaddhattā aṭṭhitacenāti attho.

[03] ^b^alattakakatā^eb^ti alattakena katarañjanā lākhāya saṃrañjitā. ^b^pādā^eb^ti caraṇā. ^b^mukhaṃ cuṇṇakamakkhita^eb^nti mukhaṃ cuṇṇakena makkhitaṃ, yaṃ maṇḍanamanuyuttā sāsapakakkena mukhapīḷakādīni haritvā loṇamattikāya duṭṭhalohitaṃ haritvā mukhacuṇṇakavilepanaṃ karonti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^ala^eb^nti ^b^bālassa^eb^ andhaputhujjanassa ^b^no^eb^ ^a^P3.0036^ea^ ^b^ca pāragavesino^eb^ vaṭṭābhiratassa ^b^mohāya^eb^ sammohanāya samatthaṃ tassa cittaṃ mohetuṃ pariyattaṃ, pāragavesino pana vivaṭṭābhiratassa no alaṃ na pariyattaṃ.

[03] ^b^aṭṭhāpadakatā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0293^ea^ aṭṭhapadākārena katā sañcitā purimabhāge kese kappetvā nalāṭassa paṭicchādanavasena katā kesaracanā aṭṭhapadaṃ nāma, yaṃ ``alaka''ntipi vuccati. ^b^nettā añjanamakkhitā^eb^ti ubhopi nayanāni anto dvīsu antesu ca yathā añjanacchāyā dissati, evaṃ añjitañjanāni.

[03] ^b^añjanīva navā cittā, pūtikāyo alaṅkato^eb^ti yathā añjanī añjananāḷikā navā abhinavā mālākammamakaradantādivasena cittā bahi maṭṭhā ujjalā dassanīyā, anto pana na dassanīyā hoti, evameva tāsaṃ kāyo nhānabbhañjanavatthālaṅkārehi alaṅkato bahi ujjalo, anto pana pūti nānappakārāsucīhi bharito tiṭṭhatīti attho.

[03] ^b^odahī^eb^ti oḍḍesi. ^b^migavo^eb^ti, migaluddako. ^b^pāsa^eb^nti, daṇḍavāguraṃ. ^b^nāsadā^eb^ti na saṅghaṭṭesi. ^b^vāgura^eb^nti pāsaṃ. ^b^nivāpa^eb^nti migānaṃ khādanatthāya khittaṃ tiṇādighāsaṃ. upamā kho ayaṃ therena katā atthassa viññāpanāya. ayañhettha attho -- yathā migānaṃ māraṇatthāya daṇḍavāguraṃ oḍḍetvā tattha nivāpaṃ vikiriya migaluddake nilīne ṭhite tattheko javaparakkamasampanno cheko migo pāsaṃ aphusanto eva yathāsukhaṃ nivāpaṃ khāditvā, ``vañcesi vata migo''ti migaluddake viravante eva gacchati. aparo migo balavā cheko javasampannova tattha gantvā nivāpaṃ khāditvā tattha tattha pāsaṃ chinditvā, ``vañcesi vata migo, pāso chinno''ti migaluddake socante eva gacchati, evaṃ mayampi pubbe puthujjanakāle mātāpitūhi āsajjanatthāya niyyādite bhoge bhuñjitvā tattha tattha asajjamānā nikkhantā. idāni pana sabbaso ^a^V2.0250^ea^ chinnakilesā apāsā hutvā ṭhitā, tehi dinnabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tesu socantesu eva gacchāmāti.

[03] evaṃ thero migaluddakaṃ viya mātāpitaro, hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ itthāgārañca vāgurajālaṃ viya, attanā pubbe bhuttabhoge ca idāni bhuttabhojanañca nivāpatiṇaṃ viya, attānaṃ mahāmigaṃ viya ca katvā dasseti. imā gāthā vatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño korabyassa migājinauyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe nisīdi. therassa kira pitā sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu aggaḷaṃ dāpetvā ^a^M2.0294^ea^ malle āṇāpesi ``nikkhamituṃ mā detha, kāsāyāni apanetvā setakāni nivāsethā''ti, tasmā thero ākāsena ^a^P3.0037^ea^ agamāsi. atha rājā korabyo therassa tattha nisinnabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ``idha, bho raṭṭhapāla, pabbajanto byādhipārijuññaṃ vā jarābhogañātipārijuññaṃ vā patto pabbajati. tvaṃ pana kiñcipi pārijuññaṃ anupagato eva kasmā pabbajito''ti pucchi. athassa thero, ``upaniyyati loko addhuvo, atāṇo loko anabhissaro, assako loko sabbaṃ pahāya gamanīyaṃ, ūno loko atitto taṇhādāso''ti (ma0 ni0 2.305) imesaṃ catunnaṃ dhammuddesānaṃ attānaṃ vivittabhāvaṃ kathetvā tassā desanāya anugītiṃ kathento --
[21] ``passāmi loke sadhane manusse, laddhāna vittaṃ na dadanti mohā.
[22] luddhā dhanaṃ sannicayaṃ karonti, bhiyyova kāme abhipatthayanti..
[22] oraṃ samuddassa atittarūpo, pāraṃ samuddassapi patthayetha..
[21] ``rājā ca aññe ca bahū manussā, avītataṇhā maraṇaṃ upenti.
[22] ūnāva hutvāna jahanti dehaṃ, kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi titti..
[21] ``kandanti naṃ ñātī pakiriya kese, `aho vatā no amarā'ti cāhu.
[22] vatthena naṃ pārutaṃ nīharitvā, citaṃ samodhāya tato ḍahanti..
[21] ``so ^a^M2.0295^ea^ ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno, ekena vatthena pahāya bhoge.
[22] na mīyamānassa bhavanti tāṇā, ñātī ca mittā atha vā sahāyā..
[21] ``dāyādakā tassa dhanaṃ haranti, satto pana gacchati yenakammaṃ.
[22] na mīyamānaṃ dhanamanveti kiñci, puttā ca dārā ca dhanañca raṭṭhaṃ..
[21] ``na ^a^P3.0038^ea^ dīghamāyuṃ labhate dhanena, na cāpi vittena jaraṃ vihanti.
[22] appaṃ hidaṃ jīvitamāhu dhīrā, asassataṃ vippariṇāmadhammaṃ..
[21] ``aḍḍhā ^a^V2.0251^ea^ daliddā ca phusanti phassaṃ, bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho.
[22] bālo hi bālyā vadhitova seti, dhīro ca no vedhati phassaphuṭṭho..
[21] ``tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchati.
[22] abyositattā hi bhavābhavesu, pāpāni kammāni karoti mohā..
[22] tassappapañño abhisaddahanto, upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ..
[21] ``coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo.
[22] evaṃ pajā pecca paramhi loke, sakammunā haññati pāpadhammo..
[21] ``kāmā ^a^M2.0296^ea^ hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ.
[22] ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja..
[21] ``dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrabhedā.
[22] etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo..
[22] avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā, anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ..
[22] sohaṃ viddho tadā santo, sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ..
[22] so me attho anuppatto, sabbasaṃyojanakkhayo''ti.. -- imā gāthā avoca.

[03] tattha ^b^passāmi loke^eb^ti ahaṃ, mahārāja, imasmiṃ loke ^b^sadhane^eb^ dhanasampanne aḍḍhe manusse passāmi, te pana ^b^laddhāna vittaṃ^eb^ dhanaṃ labhitvā bhogasampattiyaṃ ṭhitā samaṇabrāhmaṇādīsu kassaci kiñcipi na dadanti. kasmā? ^b^mohā^eb^ kammassakatāpaññāya abhāvato. ^b^luddhā^eb^ lobhābhibhūtā yathāladdhaṃ dhanaṃ ^b^sannicayaṃ^eb^ sabbaso nicetabbaṃ nidhetabbaṃ karonti. ^b^bhiyyova^eb^ yathādhigatakāmato upari ^b^kāme^eb^ kāmaguṇe ``tathāhaṃ edise ca bhoge paṭilabheyya''nti ^b^abhipatthayanti^eb^ paccāsīsanti tajjañca vāyāmaṃ karonti.

[03] bhiyyo ^a^M2.0297^ea^ ^a^V2.0252^ea^ kāmapatthanāya udāharaṇaṃ dassento ^b^``rājā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pasayhappathaviṃ vijetvā^eb^ti attano vaṃsānugataṃ pathaviṃ balakkārena abhivijiya. ^b^āvasanto^eb^ti pasāsento. ^b^oraṃ samuddassā^eb^ti anavasesaṃ samuddassa orabhāgaṃ labhitvāpi tena atittarūpo ^b^pāraṃ samuddassa^eb^ dīpantarampi patthayeyya.
[03] ^b^avītataṇhā^eb^ti avigatataṇhā. ^b^ūnāvā^eb^ti aparipuṇṇamanorathāva. ^b^kāmehi lokamhi na hatthi tittī^eb^ti taṇhāvipannānaṃ imasmiṃ loke vatthukāmehi titti nāma natthi.

[03] ^b^kandanti na^eb^nti matapurisaṃ uddissa tassa guṇe kittentā kandanaṃ karonti. ^b^aho vatā no amarāti cāhū^eb^ti aho vata amhākaṃ ñātī amarā siyunti ca kathenti, gāthāsukhatthañhettha vatā-iti dīghaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^so ḍayhati sūlehi tujjamāno^eb^ti so matasatto chavaḍāhakehi sammā jhāpetuṃ sūlehi tujjamāno. ^b^tāṇā^eb^ti parittāṇakarā.
[03] ^b^yenakamma^eb^nti yathākammaṃ. ^b^dhana^eb^nti dhanāyitabbaṃ yaṃkiñci vatthu. puna ^b^dhana^eb^nti hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03] ^b^``na dīghamāyu''^eb^ntiādinā kāmaguṇassa jarāya ca paṭikārābhāvaṃ vatvā puna tassa ekantikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``appaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^phusantī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0040^ea^ aniṭṭhaphassaṃ phusanti pāpuṇanti, tattha aḍḍhadaliddatā akāraṇanti dasseti. ^b^phassaṃ bālo ca dhīro ca tatheva phuṭṭho^eb^ti yathā bālo iṭṭhāniṭṭhasamphassaṃ phuṭṭho, tatheva dhīro iṭṭhāniṭṭhaphassaṃ phuṭṭho hoti, na ettha bālapaṇḍitānaṃ koci viseso. ayaṃ pana viseso, ^b^bālo hi bālyā vadhitova setī^eb^ti bālapuggalo kenaci dukkhadhammena phuṭṭho socanto kilamanto urattāḷiṃ kandanto bālabhāvena vadhito pīḷitova hutvā seti sayati. ito cito ca āvaṭṭanto vivaṭṭanto virodhento ^b^vedhati phassaphuṭṭho^eb^ti ^b^dhīro^eb^ pana paṇḍito dukkhasamphassena samphuṭṭho na vedhati kampanamattampi tassa na hotīti.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^ yasmā bālapaṇḍitānaṃ lokadhamme edisī pavatti, ^b^tasmā hi paññāva dhanena seyyā, yāya vosānamidhādhigacchatī^eb^ti paññāva dhanato pāsaṃsatarā, yāya paññāya vosānaṃ bhavassa ^a^V2.0253^ea^ pariyosānabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchati. ^b^abyositattā hī^eb^ti anadhigataniṭṭhattā. ^b^bhavābhavesū^eb^ti mahantāmahantesu bhavesu.

[03] ^b^upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ, saṃsāramāpajja paramparāyā^eb^ti yo pāpāni katvā aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇamāpajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ gabbhaseyyāya paralokuppattiyā ca na muccati, ^b^tassa^eb^ pāpakammakārino puggalassa kiriyaṃ ^b^abhisaddahanto^eb^ ``attā ca me hotī''ti pattiyāyanto aññopi ^b^appapañño^eb^ bālo yathā paṭipajjitvā upeti gabbhañca parañca lokaṃ, na tato parimuccati.

[03] ^b^coro yathā^eb^ti yathā coro pāpadhammo gharasandhiṃ chindanto sandhimukhe ārakkhakapurisehi gahito ^b^sakammunā^eb^ tena attano sandhicchedakammunā kāraṇabhūtena kasādīhi tāḷanādivasena ^b^haññati^eb^ rājapurisehi bādhiyyati bajjhati ca. ^b^evaṃ pajā^eb^ti evamayaṃ sattaloko idha pāpāni karitvā ^b^pecca^eb^ patvā tena kammunā ^b^paramhi loke^eb^ nirayādīsu haññati, pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇādivasena bādhiyyati.

[03] evametāhi ekādasahi gāthāhi yathārahaṃ cattāro dhammuddese pakāsetvā idāni kāmesu saṃsāre ca ādīnavaṃ disvā saddhāya attano pabbajitabhāvaṃ pabbajitakiccassa ca matthakappattiṃ vibhāvento ^b^``kāmā hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kāmā^eb^ti vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpādayo dhammā, kilesakāmā sabbepi rāgappabhedā. idha pana vatthukāmā veditabbā. te hi rūpādivasena anekappakāratāya ^b^citrā^eb^. lokassādavasena iṭṭhākāratāya ^b^madhurā^eb^. bālaputhujjanānaṃ manaṃ ^a^P3.0041^ea^ ramentīti ^b^manoramā. virūparūpenā^eb^ti vividharūpena, anekavidhasabhāvenāti attho. te hi rūpādivasena citrā, nīlādivasena vividharūpā. evaṃ tena virūparūpena tathā tathā assādaṃ dassetvā ^b^mathenti cittaṃ^eb^ pabbajjāya abhiramituṃ na dentīti iminā appassādabahudukkhatādinā ^b^ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā tasmā^eb^ taṃnimittaṃ ahaṃ pabbajito amhi. dumapphalāni ^a^M2.0299^ea^ pakkakāle aparipakkakāle ca yattha katthaci parūpakkamato sarasato vā patanti, evaṃ sattā daharā ca vuḍḍhā ca sarīrassa bhedā patantiyeva. ^b^etampi disvā^eb^ti evaṃ aniccatampi paññācakkhunā disvā, na kevalaṃ appassādatāditāya ādīnavamevāti adhippāyo. ^b^apaṇṇaka^eb^nti aviraddhanakaṃ ^b^sāmaññameva^eb^ samaṇabhāvova ^b^seyyo^eb^ uttaritaro.

[03] ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti kammaṃ kammaphalaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca saddahitvā. ^b^upeto^eb^ ^a^V2.0254^ea^ ^b^jinasāsane^eb^ti satthu sāsane sammāpaṭipattiṃ upagato. ^b^avañjhā mayhaṃ pabbajjā^eb^ arahattassa adhigatattā. tato eva ^b^anaṇo bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ^eb^ nikkilesavasena sāmibhāvato sāmiparibhogena paribhuñjanato.

[03] ^b^kāme ādittato disvā^eb^ti vatthukāme kilesakāme ca ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato disvā. ^b^jātarūpāni satthato^eb^ti katākatappabhedā sabbasuvaṇṇavikatiyo anatthāvahatāya nisitasatthato. ^b^gabbhavokkantito dukkha^eb^nti gabbhavokkantito paṭṭhāya sabbasaṃsārapavattidukkhaṃ. ^b^nirayesu mahabbhaya^eb^nti saussadesu aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu labbhamānaṃ mahābhayañca sabbattha disvāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti etaṃ kāmānaṃ ādittatādiṃ saṃsāre ādīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. ^b^saṃvegaṃ alabhiṃ tadā^eb^ti tasmiṃ satthu santike dhammassa sutakāle bhavādike saṃvegaṃ alatthaṃ. ^b^viddho tadā santo^eb^ti tasmiṃ gahaṭṭhakāle rāgasallādīhi viddho samāno idāni satthu sāsanaṃ āgamma sampatto āsavakkhayaṃ, viddho vā cattāri saccāni, paṭividdhoti attho. sesaṃ antarantarādīsu vuttattā suviññeyyameva.
[03] evaṃ thero rañño korabyassa dhammaṃ desetvā satthu santikameva gato. satthā ca aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.

[01] ^b^rūpaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0300^ea^ ^a^P3.0042^ea^ ^b^disvā sati muṭṭhā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato mālukyaputtassa gāthā. imassa āyasmato vatthu heṭṭhā chakkanipāte (theragā0 399 ādayo) vuttameva. tā pana gāthā therena arahatte patiṭṭhitena ñātīnaṃ dhammadesanāvasena bhāsitā. idha pana puthujjanakāle ``sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū''ti yācitena satthārā ``taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mālukyaputta, ye te cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti, atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante''. ``ye te sotaviññeyyā saddā...pe0... ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ghāna...jivhā...kāya..ṃanoviññeyyā dhammā aviññātā aviññātapubbā, na ca vijānāsi, na ca te hoti vijāneyyanti, atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā''ti? ``no hetaṃ, bhante''. ``ettha ca te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ, mute mutamattaṃ, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati. yato kho te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ, sute sutamattaṃ, mute mutamattaṃ, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tena. yato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tena, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tattha. yato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, na tattha, tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena, esevanto dukkhassā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.95). saṃkhittena dhamme desite tassa dhammassa sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ pakāsentena --
[21] ``rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``saddaṃ sutvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``gandhaṃ ^a^P3.0043^ea^ ghatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``rasaṃ bhotvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``phassaṃ ^a^V2.0256^ea^ phussa sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``dhammaṃ ñatvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto.
[21] ``na so rajjati rūpesu, rūpaṃ disvā paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati saddesu, saddaṃ sutvā paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati gandhesu, gandhaṃ ghatvā paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati rasesu, rasaṃ bhotvā paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati phassesu, phassaṃ phussa paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccati..
[21] ``na so rajjati dhammesu, dhammaṃ ñatvā paṭissato.
[27] khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato.
[22] evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccatī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ cakkhudvārena upalabhitvā. ^b^sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto^eb^ti tasmiṃ rūpe diṭṭhamatte eva aṭṭhatvā subhanimittaṃ manasi karoto subhākāraggahaṇavasena ayoniso manasi karoto sati muṭṭhā hoti. tathā ca sati ^b^sārattacitto vedeti^eb^ taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ratto, giddho, gadhito hutvā anubhavati, assādeti, abhinandati. tathābhūto ca ^b^tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti tañca rūpārammaṇaṃ ajjhosāya ``sukhaṃ sukha''nti abhinivissa gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā tiṭṭhati.

[03] ^b^tassa vaḍḍhanti vedanā, anekā rūpasambhavā^eb^ti tassa evarūpassa puggalassa ^a^P3.0044^ea^ rūpasambhavā rūpārammaṇā sukhādibhedena anekā vedanā kilesuppattihetubhūtā vaḍḍhanti. ^b^abhijjhā ca vihesā ca, cittamassūpahaññatī^eb^ti piyarūpe sārajjanavasena uppajjamānāya abhijjhāya, apiyarūpe byāpajjanavasena piyarūpasseva vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāya uppajjamānāya sokādilakkhaṇāya vihesāya ca assa puggalassa cittaṃ upahaññati bādhīyati. ^b^evamācinato dukkha^eb^nti vuttākārena taṃ taṃ vedanassādavasena bhavābhisaṅkhāraṃ ācinato vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pavattati. tenāha bhagavā -- ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā...pe0... dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī''ti (vibha0 225; saṃ0 ni0 2.1). tathābhūtassa ^b^ārā^eb^ ārakā dūre nibbānaṃ vuccati, tassa taṃ dullabhanti attho. ^b^saddaṃ sutvā^eb^tiādigāthāsupi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. tattha ^b^ghatvā^eb^ti ghāyitvā. ^b^bhotvā^eb^ti sāyitvā. ^b^phussā^eb^ti phusitvā. ^b^dhammaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā.

[03] evaṃ chadvāragocare sārajjantassa vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tattha virajjantassa vivaṭṭaṃ dassento ^b^``na so rajjati rūpesū''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^na so rajjati rūpesu, rūpaṃ disvā paṭissato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0258^ea^ yo puggalo rūpaṃ disvā āpāthagataṃ ^a^M2.0304^ea^ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvārikena viññāṇasantānena gahetvā catusampajaññavasena sampajānakāritāya paṭissato hoti, so rūpārammaṇesu na rajjati rāgaṃ na janeti, aññadatthu virattacitto vedeti, rūpārammaṇamhi samudayādito yathābhūtaṃ pajānanto nibbindati, nibbindanto taṃ tatthuppannavedanañca virattacitto vedeti, tathābhūto ca ^b^tañca najjhosa tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sammadeva virattacittatāya ajjhosāya na tiṭṭhati ``etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā''ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena nābhinivisati.

[03] ^b^yathāssa passato rūpa^eb^nti assa yogino yathā tattha abhijjhādayo nappavattanti, evaṃ aniccādito rūpaṃ passantassa. ^b^sevato cāpi vedana^eb^nti taṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ vedanaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca gocarasevanāya sevato cāpi. ^b^khīyatī^eb^ti sabbaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati. ^b^nopacīyatī^eb^ti na upaciyati na ācayaṃ gacchati. ^b^evaṃ so caratī sato^eb^ti evaṃ kilesāpanayanapaṭipattiyā sato sampajāno hutvā carati, viharati. ^b^evaṃ apacinato dukkha^eb^nti vuttanayena apacayagāminiyā maggapaññāya sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ apacinantassa. ^b^santike nibbāna vuccatī^eb^ti saupādisesānupādisesanibbānadhātusamīpe evāti vuccati asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā sacchikatattā. ^b^na so rajjati saddesū^eb^tiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
[03] evaṃ ^a^P3.0045^ea^ thero imāhi gāthāhi satthu ovādassa attanā upadhāritabhāvaṃ pavedetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā gato nacirasseva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.

[03] ^b^paripuṇṇakāyo^eb^tiādikā āyasmato selattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarabhagavato kāle kulagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto gaṇapāmokkho hutvā tīṇi purisasatāni samādapetvā tehi saddhiṃ satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā katapariyositāya gandhakuṭiyā ^a^M2.0305^ea^ sabhikkhusaṅghassa bhagavato mahādānaṃ pavattetvā satthāraṃ bhikkhū ca ticīvarena acchādesi. so tena puññakammena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke eva vasitvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ ^a^V2.0259^ea^ buddhuppāde aṅguttarāpesu āpaṇe nāma brāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^selo^eb^ti laddhanāmo ahosi. so vayappatto tīsu vedesu, brāhmaṇasippesu ca nipphattiṃ gantvā tīṇi māṇavakasatāni mante vācento āpaṇe paṭivasati. tena ca samayena satthā sāvatthito nikkhamitvā aḍḍhateḷasahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caranto selassa, antevāsikānañca ñāṇaparipākaṃ disvā aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati. atha keṇiyo nāma jaṭilo satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā tattha gantvā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā sake assame pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādeti. tasmiñca samaye selo brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ tīhi māṇavakasatehi jaṅghāvihāraṃ anuvicaranto keṇiyassa assamaṃ pavisitvā jaṭile kaṭṭhaphālanuddhanasampādanādinā dānūpakaraṇaṃ sajjente disvā, ``kiṃ nu kho te, keṇiya, mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito''tiādiṃ pucchitvā tena ``buddho bhagavā mayā svātanāya nimantito''ti vutte ``buddho''ti vacanaṃ sutvāva haṭṭho udaggo pītisomanassajāto tāvadeva māṇavakehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavato kāye bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni disvā ``imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā vā hoti cakkavattī, buddho vā loke vivaṭṭacchado, ayaṃ pana pabbajito, no ca kho naṃ jānāmi `buddho vā, no vā', sutaṃ kho pana metaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vuddhānaṃ mahallakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ `ye te bhavanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā ^a^P3.0046^ea^, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī'ti asammāsambuddho hi sammukhe ṭhatvā buddhaguṇehi abhitthavīyamāno sārajjati maṅkubhāvaṃ āpajjati avesārajjappattatāya ananuyogakkhamattā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyya''nti evaṃ pana cintetvā --

[03] tattha ^b^paripuṇṇakāyo^eb^ti abhibyattarūpānaṃ dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ paripuṇṇatāya ahīnaṅgapaccaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro. ^b^surucī^eb^ti sundarasarīrappabho. ^b^sujāto^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā, saṇṭhānasampattiyā ca sunibbatto. ^b^cārudassano^eb^ti sucirampi passantānaṃ atittijanakaṃ appaṭikkūlaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cāru eva dassanaṃ assāti cārudassano. keci panāhu ``cārudassanoti sundaranetto''ti. ^b^suvaṇṇavaṇṇo^eb^ti suvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇo. ^b^asī^eb^ti bhavasi, idaṃ padaṃ ``paripuṇṇakāyo asī''tiādinā sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^susukkadāṭho^eb^ti suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho. bhagavato hi dāṭhāhi candakiraṇā viya dhavalarasmiyo niccharanti. ^b^vīriyavā^eb^ti vīriyapāramīpāripūriyā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyādhiṭṭhānato catubbidhassa sammappadhānassa sampattiyā ca atisayayutto.

[03] ^b^narassa hi sujātassā^eb^ti samatiṃsāya pāramīnaṃ, ariyassa vā cakkavattīvattassa paripūritattā suṭṭhu sammadeva jātassa narassa, mahāpurisassāti attho. ^b^sabbe te^eb^ti ye mahāpurisabhāvaṃ loke aggapuggalabhāvaṃ ^a^M2.0307^ea^ byañjayantīti ^b^byañjanā^eb^ti laddhavohārasuppatiṭṭhitapādatādibāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇasaṅkhātā tambanakhatuṅganakhatādiasītianubyañjanasaṅkhātā ^a^P3.0047^ea^ ca rūpaguṇā, te anavasesā, tava kāyasmiṃ santīti vacanaseso.

[03] idāni tesu lakkhaṇesu attanā abhirucitehi lakkhaṇehi bhagavantaṃ thomento ^b^``pasannanetto''^eb^tiādimāha. bhagavā hi pañca vaṇṇapasādasampattiyā ^b^pasannanetto^eb^. paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalasadisamukhatāya ^b^sumukho^eb^. ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā ^b^brahā^eb^. brahmujugattatāya ^b^uju^eb^. jutimantatāya ^b^patāpavā^eb^.

[03] idāni tameva patāpavantataṃ ādiccūpamāya vibhāvento ^b^``majjhe samaṇasaṅghassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^ādiccova virocasī^eb^ti yathā ādicco uggacchanto sabbaṃ tamagataṃ ^a^V2.0261^ea^ vidhametvā ālokaṃ karonto virocati, evaṃ tvampi anto ceva bahi ca sabbaṃ avijjātamaṃ viddhaṃsetvā ñāṇālokaṃ karonto virocasi.
[03] dassanīyarūpatāya aṅgīgatānaṃ dassanasampattīnaṃ āvahanato, kalyāṇehi pañcahi dassanehi samannāgatattā ca ^b^kalyāṇadassano. uttamavaṇṇino^eb^ti uttamavaṇṇasampannassa.

[03] ^b^cakkavattī^eb^ti cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi vatteti, tehi ca pare vatteti. parahitāya iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavattī. atha vā catūhi acchariyadhammehi ca saṅgahavatthūhi ca samannāgamena parehi anabhibhavanīyassa āṇācakkassa vatto etasmiṃ atthītipi cakkavattī. ^b^rathesabho^eb^ti rathikesu ājānīyausabhapuriso, mahārathikoti attho. ^b^cāturanto^eb^ti catusamuddantāya pathaviyā issaro. ^b^vijitāvī^eb^ti vijitavijayo. ^b^jambusaṇḍassā^eb^ti jambudīpassa, pākaṭena hi issariyāni dassento evamāha. cakkavattī pana saparittadīpānaṃ catunnampi mahādīpānaṃ issarova.

[03] ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0308^ea^ jātikhattiyā. ^b^bhogī^eb^ti bhogiyā. ^b^rājāno^eb^ti ye keci rajjaṃ kārentā. ^b^anuyantā^eb^ti anugāmino sevakā. ^b^rājābhirājā^eb^ti rājūnaṃ pūjanīyo rājā hutvā, cakkavattīti adhippāyo. ^b^manujindo^eb^ti manussādhipati, manussānaṃ paramissaroti attho.
[03] evaṃ selena vutte bhagavā ``ye te bhavanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī''ti imaṃ selassa manorathaṃ pūrento --
[22] dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi, cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya''nti.. -- imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tatrāyaṃ ^a^P3.0048^ea^ adhippāyo -- yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ, sela, yācasi, ``rājā arahasi bhavituṃ cakkavattī''ti, ettha appossukko hohi, ^b^rājāhamasmi,^eb^ sati ca rājatte yathā añño rājā samānopi yojanasataṃ vā anusāsati, dve tīṇi cattāri pañca yojanasatāni vā yojanasahassaṃ vā cakkavattī hutvāpi catudīpapariyantamattaṃ vā, nāhamevaṃ paricchinnavisayo. ahañhi ^b^dhammarājā anuttaro^eb^ bhavaggato avīcipariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimeyyalokadhātuyo anusāsāmi. yāvatā hi apadādibhedā sattā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aggo. na hi me koci sīlena vā...pe0... ^a^V2.0262^ea^ vimuttiñāṇadassanena vā sadiso natthi, kuto bhiyyo. svāhaṃ evaṃ dhammarājā anuttaro, anuttareneva catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātena ^b^dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi,^eb^ ``idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā''tiādinā āṇācakkaṃ. ``idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasacca''ntiādinā (mahāva0 14; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081) pariyattidhammena dhammacakkameva vā. ^b^cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya^eb^nti yaṃ cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti samaṇena vā...pe0... kenaci vā lokasminti.
[03] evaṃ attānamāvikarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto selo puna daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ --
[22] dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi, iti bhāsatha gotama..
[03] tattha ^b^ko nu senāpatī^eb^ti dhammarañño bhoto dhammena pavattitassa cakkassa anupavattanako senāpati ko nūti pucchi.
[03] tena ca samayena bhagavato dakkhiṇapasse āyasmā sāriputto nisinno hoti, suvaṇṇapuñjo viya siriyā sobhamāno. taṃ dassento bhagavā --
[03] tattha ^b^anujāto tathāgata^eb^nti, tathāgataṃ anujāto, tathā gatena hetunā ariyāya jātiyā jātoti attho.

[03] evaṃ ``ko nu senāpati bhoto''ti selena vuttapañhaṃ byākaritvā yaṃ selo āha ``sambuddho paṭijānāsī''ti tattha naṃ nikkaṅkhaṃ kātukāmo ``nāhaṃ paṭiññāmatteneva paṭijānāmi, api cāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena buddho''ti ñāpetuṃ --
[22] pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā''ti.. -- gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^abhiññeyya^eb^nti cattāri saccāni cattāri ariyasaccāni. catunnañhi saccānaṃ ariyasaccānañca sāmaññaggahaṇametaṃ yadidaṃ abhiññeyyanti. tattha ariyasaccesu yaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ maggasaccaṃ, yañca pahātabbaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tadubhayaggahaṇena ^a^M2.0310^ea^ tesaṃ phalabhūtāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi gahitāneva honti hetuggahaṇeneva phalasiddhito. tena tattha ``sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta''nti idampi vuttameva hoti. ``abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññāta''nti vā iminā ca sabbassapi ñeyyassa abhiññātasambuddhabhāvaṃ uddesavasena pakāsetvā tadekadesaṃ niddesavasena dassento ^b^``bhāvetabbañca bhāvita''^eb^ntiādimāha. atha vā ^b^``bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīna''^eb^nti iminā attano ñāṇapahānasampadākittanamukhena taṃmūlakattā sabbepi buddhaguṇā kittitā hontīti āha ^b^``tasmā buddhosmi, brāhmaṇā''^eb^ti. abhiññeyyābhiññātaggahaṇena hi sabbaso vijjāvimuttīnaṃ gahitattā saphalaṃ catusaccabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ hetusampattiyā dassento bujjhitabbaṃ sabbaṃ bujjhitvā buddho jātosmīti ñāyena hetunā attano buddhabhāvaṃ vibhāveti.
[03] evaṃ nippariyāyena attānaṃ pātukaritvā attani kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ussāhento --
[22] sabbāmitte vase katvā, modāmi akutobhayo''ti.. -- gāthattayamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^vinayassū^eb^ti vinehi chinda. ^b^kaṅkha^eb^nti vicikicchaṃ. ^b^adhimuccassū^eb^ti adhimokkhaṃ kara ``sammāsambuddho''ti saddaha. ^b^dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ hoti, sambuddhāna^eb^nti yato kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyampi buddhasuñño loko hoti. ^b^sallakatto^eb^ti, rāgādisallakattano. ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūto. ^b^atitulo^eb^ti tulaṃ atīto, nirupamoti attho. ^b^mārasenappamaddano^eb^ti ``kāmā te paṭhamā senā''ti (su0 ni0 438; mahāni0 28; cūḷani0 nandamāṇavapucchāniddesa 47) evaṃ āgatāya mārasenāya pamaddano. ^b^sabbāmitte^eb^ti khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārasaṅkhāte sabbapaccatthike ^a^M2.0311^ea^. ^b^vase katvā^eb^ti attano ^a^P3.0050^ea^ vase katvā. ^b^modāmi akutobhayo^eb^ti kutoci nibbhayo samādhisukhena, phalanibbānasukhena ca modāmi.
[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0264^ea^ vutte selo brāhmaṇo tāvadeva bhagavati sañjātapasādo pabbajjāpekkho hutvā --
[21] ``yo maṃ icchati anvetu, yo vā nicchati gacchatu.
[25] gāthattayamāha. yathā taṃ paripākagatāya upanissayasampattiyā codiyamāno.
[03] tato tepi māṇavakā hetusampannatāya tattheva pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā --
[25] gāthamāhaṃsu, yathā taṃ tena saddhiṃ katādhikārā kulaputtā.
[03] atha selo tesu māṇavakesu tuṭṭhacitto te dassento pabbajjañca yācamāno --
[22] brahmacariyaṃ carissāma, bhagavā tava santike''ti.. -- gāthamāha.

[03] tato ^a^M2.0312^ea^ bhagavā yasmā selo heṭṭhā vuttanayena padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle tesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ purisasatānaṃ gaṇajeṭṭho hutvā ropitakusalamūlo, idāni pacchimabhavepi tesaṃyeva ācariyo hutvā ^a^V2.0265^ea^ nibbatto, ñāṇañcassa tesañca paripakkaṃ, ehibhikkhubhāvassa ca upanissayo atthi, tasmā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjāya pabbājento --
[22] yattha amoghā pabbajjā, appamattassa sikkhato''ti.. -- gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^sandiṭṭhika^eb^nti paccakkhaṃ. ^b^akālika^eb^nti maggānantaraphaluppattito na kālantare pattabbaphalaṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yaṃnimittā ^a^P3.0051^ea^. maggabrahmacariyanimittā hi pabbajjā amoghā anipphalā, yatthāti vā yasmiṃ sāsane ^b^appamattassa^eb^ sativippavāsarahitassa tīsu sikkhāsu ^b^sikkhato^eb^.

[03] evañca vatvā ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti bhagavā avoca. tāvadeva te sabbe iddhimayapattacīvaradharā hutvā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā parivāresuṃ. so evaṃ pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto sattame divase sapariso arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.40.208-303) --
[21] ``uggā ^a^M2.0313^ea^ ca rājaputtā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā.
[21] ``te me sutvāna vacanaṃ, gaṇaṃ bandhiṃsu tāvade.
[21] ``ime ^a^M2.0314^ea^ tīṇi satā vīra, purisā ekato gaṇā.
[22] tiṇṇaṃ satānaṃ purato, imā gāthā abhāsatha..
[22] pacchime bhave sampatte, vāseṭṭho nāma brāhmaṇo..
[22] selo iti mamaṃ nāmaṃ, chaḷaṅge pāramiṃ gato..
[22] āvāho vā vivāho vā, rājā vā te nimantito..
[22] na nimantemi rājānaṃ, āhutī me na vijjati..
[21] ``na catthi mayhamāvāho, vivāho me na vijjati.
[22] so me nimantito ajja, tassetaṃ paṭiyādanaṃ..
[22] vijjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] sīhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] nāgūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] usabhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] sakkūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[21] ``vasī gaṇī patāpī ca, tejassī ca durāsado.
[22] brahmūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] dharaṇūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] udadhūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] nerūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] gaganūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] assāsako mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] ratanākaro mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] meghūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] sūriyūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] candūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] appameyyo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] vimutti asadisā yassa, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] yassa parakkamo jeṭṭho, so me buddho nimantito..
[21] ``rāgo doso ca moho ca, visā sabbe samūhatā.
[22] agadūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] vejjūpamo mahāvīro, so me buddho nimantito..
[22] buddho buddhoti sutvāna, pīti me udapajjatha..
[21] ``kahaṃ ^a^V2.0269^ea^ nu kho so bhagavā, lokajeṭṭho narāsabho.
[22] gāvī yathā vacchagiddhā, evāhaṃ viciniṃ jinaṃ..
[22] mattova kuñjaro dantī, evaṃ buddhā durāsadā..
[22] buddhoti niṭṭhaṃ gantvāna, saha sissehi pabbajiṃ..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, aṭṭha hetū labhāmahaṃ..
[21] ``disāsu pūjito homi, bhogā ca amitā mama.
[22] patiṭṭhā homi sabbesaṃ, tāso mama na vijjati..
[21] ``byādhayo me na vijjanti, dīghāyuṃ pālayāmi ca.
[22] aṭṭha gopānasī nāma, tava putto mahāmuni..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ..
[22] ādeyyavacano homi, na dhaṃsemi yathā ahaṃ..
[21] ``abhantaṃ hoti me cittaṃ, akhilo homi kassaci.
[22] tena kammena sukatena, vimalo homi sāsane..
[22] sāvako te mahāvīra, bhikkhu taṃ vandate muni..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, pañca hetū labhāmahaṃ..
[22] sabbasampattiko homi, maccheraṃ me na vijjati..
[22] tena kammena sukatena, pāvisiṃ abhayaṃ puraṃ..
[21] ``ye keci damakā loke, hatthiasse damenti ye.
[22] karitvā kāraṇā nānā, dāruṇena damenti te..
[03] arahattaṃ pana patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aññaṃ byākaronto --

[25] gāthamāha ^a^M2.0320^ea^. tassattho -- pañcahi cakkhūhi ^b^cakkhuma^eb^ bhagavā yasmā mayaṃ ito atīte ^b^aṭṭhame^eb^ divase taṃ saraṇaṃ ^b^agamimha^eb^. tasmā sattarattena tava sāsane damakena ^b^dantā amha,^eb^ aho ^b^te^eb^ saraṇagamanassa ānubhāvoti. tato paraṃ --
[21] ``tuvaṃ buddho tuvaṃ satthā, tuvaṃ mārābhibhū muni.
[22] tuvaṃ anusaye chetvā, tiṇṇo tāresimaṃ pajaṃ..
[25] imāhi dvīhi gāthāhi abhitthavitvā osānagāthāya satthāraṃ vandanaṃ yācati --
[22] pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno''ti..

[25] tattha ^b^tuvaṃ buddho^eb^ti tvameva imasmiṃ loke sabbaññubuddho. diṭṭhadhammikādiatthena sattānaṃ anusāsanato tvameva ^b^satthā^eb^. sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ abhibhavanato ^b^mārābhibhū^eb^. munibhāvato ^b^muni. anusaye^eb^ ^a^V2.0272^ea^ ^b^chetvā^eb^ti kāmarāgādike anusaye ariyamaggasatthena chinditvā. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti sayaṃ saṃsāramahoghaṃ tiṇṇo, desanāhatthena imaṃ ^b^pajaṃ^eb^ sattakāyaṃ tāresi. ^b^upadhī^eb^ti khandhūpadhiādayo sabbe upadhī. ^b^adupādāno^eb^ti sabbaso pahīnakāmupādānādiko. evaṃ vatvā thero sapariso satthāraṃ abhivandatīti.

[03] ^b^yātaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0052^ea^ ^b^me hatthigīvāyā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato bhaddiyattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle mahābhogakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ekadivasaṃ satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthārā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uccākulikānaṃ ^a^M2.0321^ea^ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapiyamānaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākāsi. sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā uccākulikasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ pucchitvā dhammassavanassa kārāpanaṃ, dhammamaṇḍape āsanadānaṃ, bījanīdānaṃ, dhammakathikānaṃ pūjāsakkārakaraṇaṃ, uposathāgāre paṭissayadānanti evamādiṃ yāvajīvaṃ bahupuññaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato uppattiyā puretaraṃ bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto sambahule paccekabuddhe piṇḍāya caritvā ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samāgantvā bhattavissaggaṃ karonte disvā tattha pāsāṇaphalakāni attharitvā pādodakādiṃ upaṭṭhapento yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahi.

[03] so ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sākiyarājakule nibbatti, ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so vayappatto anuruddhādīhi pañcahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ satthari anupiyambavane viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. taṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavane ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. so phalasukhena nibbānasukhena ca vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi ``aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha''nti abhikkhaṇaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. taṃ sutvā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ -- ``āyasmā bhaddiyo kāḷigodhāya putto abhikkhaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0273^ea^ `aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha'nti vadati, anabhirato maññe brahmacariyaṃ caratī''ti. satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā ``saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhaddiya, abhikkhaṇaṃ `aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha'nti vadasī''ti pucchi. so ``saccaṃ bhagavā''ti paṭijānitvā ``pubbe me, bhante, rajjaṃ kārentassa susaṃvihitārakkho ahosiṃ, tathāpi bhīto ubbiggo ussaṅkito vihāsiṃ. idāni pana pabbajito abhīto anubbiggo anussaṅkito viharāmī''ti vatvā --
[25] imāhi gāthāhi satthu purato sīhanādaṃ nadi.

[01] tattha ^b^yātaṃ me hatthigīvāyā^eb^ti, bhante, pubbe mayā gacchantenāpi hatthigīvāya hatthikkhandhe nisīditvā yātaṃ caritaṃ. vatthāni pariharantenāpi ^b^sukhumā^eb^ sukhasamphassā kāsikavatthavisesā dhāritā. odanaṃ bhuñjantenāpi tivassikānaṃ purāṇagandhasālīnaṃ odano tittirakapiñjarādinā sucinā maṃsena upasittatāya ^b^sucimaṃsūpasecano^eb^ bhutto, tathāpi taṃ sukhaṃ na mayhaṃ cittaparitosakaraṃ ahosi, yathā etarahi vivekasukhanti dassento āha ^b^``sojja bhaddo''^eb^tiādi. ettha ca hatthiggahaṇeneva assarathayānāni, vatthaggahaṇena sabbarājālaṅkārā, odanaggahaṇena sabbabhojanavikati gahitāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^sojjā^eb^ti so ajja etarahi pabbajjāyaṃ ṭhito. ^b^bhaddo^eb^ti sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā bhaddo. ^b^sātatiko^eb^ti samaṇadhamme diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāre sātaccayutto. ^b^uñchāpattāgate rato^eb^ti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne abhirato, teneva santuṭṭhoti adhippāyo. ^b^jhāyatī^eb^ti phalasamāpattijhānena jhāyati. ^b^putto godhāyā^eb^ti kāḷigodhāya nāma khattiyāya putto. ^b^bhaddiyo^eb^ti evaṃnāmo attānameva thero aññaṃ viya katvā vadati.

[03] gahapaticīvaraṃ ^a^P3.0054^ea^ paṭikkhipitvā paṃsukūlikaṅgasamādānena ^b^paṃsukūliko^eb^. saṅghabhattaṃ paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātikaṅgasamādānena ^b^piṇḍapātiko^eb^. atirekacīvaraṃ ^a^M2.0324^ea^ paṭikkhipitvā tecīvarikaṅgasamādānena ^b^tecīvariko^eb^. loluppacāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā sapadānacārikaṅgasamādānena ^b^sapadānacārī^eb^. nānāsanabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekāsanikaṅgasamādānena ^b^ekāsaniko^eb^. dutiyakabhājanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā pattapiṇḍikaṅgasamādānena ^b^pattapiṇḍiko^eb^. atirittabhojanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā khalupacchābhattikaṅgasamādānena ^b^khalupacchābhattiko^eb^. gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āraññikaṅgasamādānena ^b^āraññiko^eb^. channavāsaṃ paṭikkhipitvā rukkhamūlikaṅgasamādānena ^b^rukkhamūliko^eb^. channarukkhamūlāni paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsikaṅgasamādānena ^b^abbhokāsiko^eb^. nasusānaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sosānikaṅgasamādānena ^b^sosāniko^eb^. senāsanaloluppaṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathāsanthatikaṅgasamādānena ^b^yathāsanthatiko^eb^. sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nesajjikaṅgasamādānena ^b^nesajjiko^eb^ ^a^V2.0275^ea^. ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthārato pana dhutaṅgakathā ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.22 ādayo) vuttanayeneva gahetabbā.

[03] ^b^ucce^eb^ti uccādiṭṭhāne, uparipāsādatāya vā ucce. ^b^maṇḍalipākāre^eb^ti maṇḍalākārena pākāraparikkhitte. ^b^daḷhamaṭṭālakoṭṭhake^eb^ti thirehi aṭṭālehi dvārakoṭṭhakehi ca samannāgate, nagareti attho.
[03] ^b^satiṃ paññañcā^eb^ti ettha satisīsena samādhiṃ vadati. phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattiyo sandhāya ``satiṃ paññañca bhāvaya''nti vutto. sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayattā uttānameva.
[03] evaṃ thero satthu sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadi. taṃ sutvā bhikkhū abhippasannā ahesuṃ.

[03] ^b^gacchaṃ vadesī^eb^tiādikā āyasmato aṅgulimālattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kosalarañño purohitassa bhaggavassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto hutvā nibbatti. tassa jātadivase ^a^M2.0325^ea^ sakalanagare āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, rañño ca ^a^P3.0055^ea^ maṅgalāvudhaṃ sayanapīṭhe ṭhapitaṃ pajjali, taṃ disvā rājā bhīto saṃviggo niddaṃ na labhi. purohito tāyaṃ velāyaṃ nakkhattayogaṃ ullokento ``coranakkhattena jāto''ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. so vibhātāya rattiyā rañño santikaṃ gato sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi. rājā ``kuto, ācariya, sukhaseyyaṃ, rattiyaṃ mayhaṃ maṅgalāvudhaṃ pajjali, tassa ko nu kho vipāko bhavissatī''ti? ``mā bhāyi, mahārāja, mayhaṃ ghare dārako jāto. tassa ānubhāvena sakalanagarepi āvudhāni pajjaliṃsū''ti. ``kiṃ bhavissati, ācariyā''ti? ``dārako coro bhavissatī''ti. ``kiṃ ekacārī coro, udāhu gaṇajeṭṭhako''ti? ``ekacāriko, deva''. ``kiṃ naṃ māremā''ti? ``ekacāriko ce, paṭijaggatha tāva na''nti āha. tassa nāmaṃ karontā yasmā jāyamāno rañño cittaṃ vihesento jāto, tasmā ^b^hiṃsako^eb^ti katvā pacchā diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhanti viya ^b^ahiṃsako^eb^ti vohariṃsu.

[03] so ^a^V2.0276^ea^ vayappatto pubbakammabalena sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. tassidaṃ pubbakammaṃ -- buddhasuññe loke kassako hutvā nibbatto ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ vassodakena tintaṃ allacīvaraṃ sītapīḷitaṃ attano khettabhūmiṃ upagataṃ disvā ``puññakkhettaṃ me upaṭṭhita''nti somanassajāto aggiṃ katvā adāsi. so tassa kammassa balena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne thāmajavabalasampanno ca hutvā imasmiṃ pacchimattabhāve sattannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. so takkasilaṃ gantvā disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike dhammantevāsī hutvā sippaṃ uggaṇhato ācariyabrāhmaṇaṃ tassa bhariyañca sakkaccaṃ paṭijaggati. tenassa sā brāhmaṇī gehe labbhamānena bhattādinā saṅgahaṃ karoti. taṃ asahamānā aññe māṇavā ācariyena saddhiṃ bhedaṃ akaṃsu. brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vacanaṃ dve tayo vāre asaddahanto hutvā pacchā saddahitvā ``mahābalo māṇavo, na sakkā kenaci mārāpetuṃ, upāyena naṃ māressāmī''ti cintetvā niṭṭhitasippaṃ attano nagaraṃ gantuṃ āpucchantaṃ māṇavaṃ āha -- ``tāta ahiṃsaka, niṭṭhitasippena nāma antevāsinā ācariyassa garudakkhiṇā dātabbā, taṃ mayhaṃ dehī''ti. ``sādhu, ācariya, kiṃ dassāmī''ti? ``manussānaṃ sahassadakkhiṇahatthaṅgaliyo ānehī''ti. brāhmaṇassa kira ayamassa adhippāyo -- bahūsu māriyamānesu ekantato eko naṃ māreyyāti ^a^M2.0326^ea^. taṃ sutvā ahiṃsako attano ciraparicitaṃ nikkaruṇataṃ purakkhatvā sannaddhapañcāvudho kosalarañño vijite ^a^P3.0056^ea^ jālinaṃ vanaṃ pavisitvā mahāmaggasamīpe pabbatantare vasanto pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā maggena gacchante manusse oloketvā vegena gantvā aṅguliyo gahetvā rukkhagge olambesi. tā gijjhāpi kākāpi khādiṃsu, bhūmiyaṃ nikkhittā pūtibhāvaṃ agamaṃsu. evaṃ gaṇanāya aparipūramānāya laddhā laddhā aṅguliyo suttena ganthitvā mālaṃ katvā yaññopacitaṃ viya aṃse olambesi. tato paṭṭhāya ^b^aṅgulimālo^eb^tvevassa samaññā ahosi.

[03] evaṃ tasmiṃ manusse mārente maggo avaḷañjo ahosi. so magge manusse alabhanto gāmūpacāraṃ gantvā nilīyitvā āgatāgate manusse māretvā aṅguliyo gahetvā gacchati. taṃ ñatvā manussā gāmato apakkamiṃsu, gāmā suññā ahesuṃ, tathā nigamā janapadā ca. evaṃ tena so padeso ubbāsito ahosi. aṅgulimālassa ca ekāya ūnā sahassāṅguliyo saṅgahā ahesuṃ. atha manussā taṃ corupaddavaṃ kosalarañño ārocesuṃ. rājā pātova nagare bheriṃ carāpesi, ``sīghaṃ aṅgulimālacoraṃ gaṇhāma, balakāyo āgacchatū''ti. taṃ sutvā aṅgulimālassa mātā mantāṇī nāma brāhmaṇī tassa pitaraṃ āha -- ``putto kira te coro hutvā idañcidañca karoti, taṃ `īdisaṃ mā karī'ti saññāpetvā ānehi, aññathā naṃ rājā ghāteyyā''ti. brāhmaṇo ``na mayhaṃ tādisehi puttehi attho, rājā yaṃ vā taṃ vā karotū''ti āha ^a^V2.0277^ea^. atha brāhmaṇī puttasinehena pātheyyaṃ gahetvā ``mama puttaṃ saññāpetvā ānessāmī''ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.

[03] bhagavā ``ayaṃ `aṅgulimālaṃ ānessāmī'ti gacchati, sace sā gamissati, aṅgulimālo `aṅgulisahassaṃ pūressāmī'ti mātarampi māressati. so ca pacchimabhaviko, sacāhaṃ na gamissaṃ, mahājāni abhavissā''ti ñatvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā aṅgulimālaṃ uddissa tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ padasāva paṭipajjamāno antarāmagge gopālakādīhi vāriyamānopi jālinaṃ vanaṃ upagacchi. tasmiñca khaṇe tassa mātā tena diṭṭhā, so mātaraṃ dūratova disvā ``mātarampi māretvā ajja ūnaṅguliṃ pūressāmī''ti asiṃ ukkhipitvā upadhāvi. tesaṃ ^a^M2.0327^ea^ ubhinnaṃ antare bhagavā attānaṃ dassesi. aṅgulimālo bhagavantaṃ disvā ``kiṃ me mātaraṃ vadhitvā aṅguliyā gahitena? jīvatu me mātā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ jīvitā voropetvā aṅguliṃ gaṇheyya''nti ukkhittāsiko bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi. atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāsi, yathā pakatīriyāpathena gacchantampi attānaṃ aṅgulimālo sabbathāmena dhāvantopi na sakkoti sampāpuṇituṃ. so parihīnajavo ghurughurupassāsī kacchehi ^a^P3.0057^ea^ sedaṃ muñcanto padaṃ uddharitumpi asakkonto khāṇu viya ṭhito bhagavantaṃ ``tiṭṭha tiṭṭha, samaṇā''ti āha. bhagavā gacchantova ``ṭhito ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, tvañca tiṭṭhā''ti āha. so ``ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā saccavādino, ayaṃ samaṇo gacchantoyeva `ṭhito ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, tvañca tiṭṭhā'ti āha, ahañcamhi ṭhito, ko nu kho imassa adhippāyo, pucchitvā naṃ jānissāmī''ti bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``gacchaṃ vadesi samaṇa ṭhitomhi, mamañca brūsi ṭhitamaṭṭhitoti.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ samaṇa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ ṭhito tvaṃ ahamaṭṭhitomhī''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ ālapati. ^b^mama^eb^nti maṃ. ^b^katha^eb^nti kenākārena. ayañhettha attho -- samaṇa, tvaṃ gacchantova samāno ``ṭhitomhī''ti vadesi. mamañca ṭhitaṃyeva ``aṭṭhito''ti brūsi, vadesi. kāraṇenettha bhavitabbaṃ, tasmā taṃ samaṇaṃ ahaṃ evamatthaṃ pucchāmi. kathaṃ kenākārena tvaṃ ṭhito ahosi, ahañca aṭṭhitomhīti. evaṃ vutte bhagavā --
[21] ``ṭhito ^a^V2.0278^ea^ ahaṃ aṅgulimāla sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ.
[22] tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosi, tasmā ṭhitohaṃ tuvamaṭṭhitosī''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0328^ea^ ^b^ṭhito ahaṃ, aṅgulimāla, sabbadā, sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa^eb^nti, aṅgulimāla, ahaṃ sabbadā sabbakāle ādimajjhapariyosānesu tasathāvarabhedesu sabbesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ nidhāya nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno, tato aññathā avattanato evarūpeneva ṭhito. ^b^tuvañca pāṇesu asaññatosī^eb^ti tvaṃ pana sattesu saññamarahito asi, luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno, tasmā asaññato virativasena aṭṭhito. tato eva tāsu tāsu gatīsu paribbhamanatopi tuvaṃ idāni iriyāpathena ṭhitopi aṭṭhito asi, ahaṃ pana vuttappakārena ṭhitoti. tato aṅgulimālo yathābhuccaguṇappabhāvitassa jalatale telassa viya sakalaṃ lokaṃ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitassa bhagavato kittisaddassa sutapubbattā hetusampattiyā ñāṇassa ca paripākagatattā ``ayaṃ so bhagavā''ti sañjātapītisomanasso ``mahā ayaṃ sīhanādo, mahantaṃ gajjitaṃ, nayidaṃ aññassa bhavissati, samaṇassa maññe gotamassa etaṃ gajjitaṃ, diṭṭho ^a^P3.0058^ea^ vatamhi mahesinā sammāsambuddhena, mayhaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthaṃ bhagavā idhāgato''ti cintetvā --
[21] ``cirassaṃ vata me mahito mahesī, mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādi.
[22] sohaṃ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayutta''nti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^cirassaṃ vatā^eb^ti cirakālena vata. ^b^me^eb^ti mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya. ^b^mahito^eb^ti sadevakena lokena mahatiyā pūjāya pūjito. mahante sīlakkhandhādiguṇe esi, gavesīti mahesī. ^b^mahāvanaṃ samaṇo paccapādī^eb^ti imaṃ mahāraññaṃ samitasabbapāpo bhagavā paṭipajji. ^b^sohaṃ cajissāmi sahassapāpaṃ, sutvāna gāthaṃ tava dhammayutta^eb^nti sohaṃ dhammayuttaṃ dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ tava gāthaṃ suṇiṃ. sohaṃ taṃ sutvāna ``cirassampi cirakālenapi saṅgataṃ paricitaṃ pāpasahassaṃ pajahissa''nti cintetvā idāni naṃ aññadatthu pariccajissāmīti attho. evaṃ pana vatvā yathā paṭipajji, yathā ca bhagavatā anuggahito, taṃ dassetuṃ --
[21] ``icceva ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ^a^V2.0279^ea^ coro asimāvudhañca, sobbhe papāte narake anvakāsi.
[22] avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci buddhaṃ..
[21] ``buddho ca kho kāruṇiko mahesi, yo satthā lokassa sadevakassa.
[22] tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo''ti..

[03] tattha ^b^iccevā^eb^ti iti eva evaṃ vatvā anantarameva. ^b^coro^eb^ti aṅgulimālo. ^b^asi^eb^nti khaggaṃ. ^b^āvudha^eb^nti sesāvudhaṃ. ^b^sobbhe^eb^ti samantato chinnataṭe. ^b^papāte^eb^ti ekato chinnataṭe. ^b^narake^eb^ti bhūmiyā phalitavivare. idha pana tīhipi padehi yattha patitaṃ aññena gahetuṃ na sakkā, tādisaṃ pabbatantarameva vadati. ^b^anvakāsī^eb^ti anu akāsi, pañcavidhampi attano āvudhaṃ anu khipi chaḍḍesi, tāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā ``pabbājetha maṃ, bhante''ti āha. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``avandi coro sugatassa pāde, tattheva pabbajjamayāci buddha''^eb^nti. evaṃ tena pabbajjāya ^a^P3.0059^ea^ yācitāya satthā tassa purimakammaṃ olokento ehibhikkhubhāvāya hetusampattiṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā -- ``ehi, bhikkhu, svākhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ, sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā''ti āha. sā eva ca tassa pabbajjā upasampadā ca ahosi. tenāha ^b^``tamehi bhikkhūti tadā avoca, eseva tassa ahu bhikkhubhāvo''^eb^ti.
[03] evaṃ thero satthu santike ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ upasampadañca labhitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento pītisomanassajāto udānavasena --
[21] ``yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati.
[22] somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā..
[22] somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā..
[22] somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā''ti.. -- gāthattayaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tassattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggato pubbe pāpamittasaṃsaggena vā attano vā paṭisaṅkhānābhāvena ^b^pamajjitvā^eb^ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ pamādaṃ āpajjitvā ^a^V2.0280^ea^, pacchā kalyāṇamittasaṃsaggena yoniso ummujjanto nappamajjati, sammā paṭipajjati, samathavipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto tisso vijjā cha abhiññā pāpuṇāti, so abbhādīhi mutto cando viya okāsalokaṃ attanā adhigatāhi vijjābhiññāhi imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ obhāsetīti.

[03] ^b^yassa^eb^ puggalassa ^b^kataṃ^eb^ upacitaṃ pāpakammaṃ kammakkhayakarena lokuttarakusalena avipākārahabhāvassa āharitattā vipākuppādane dvārapidhānena ^b^pidhīyati^eb^ thakīyati. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^daharo^eb^ti taruṇo, tenassa yogakkhamasarīrataṃ dasseti. so hi uppannaṃ vātātapaparissayaṃ abhibhavitvā yogaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. ^b^yuñjati buddhasāsane^eb^ sikkhattaye yuttappayutto hoti, sakkaccaṃ sampādetīti attho.

[03] evaṃ pītisomanassajāto vimuttisukhena viharanto yadā nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, tadā aññenapi khitto leḍḍu therassa kāye nipatati, aññenapi khitto daṇḍo tasseva kāye nipatati. so bhinnena pattena vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati. satthā taṃ ovadati ``adhivāsehi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, adhivāsehi, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, yassa ^a^P3.0060^ea^ kho, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākena bahūni vassasahassāni niraye pacceyyāsi, tassa, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, kammassa vipākaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme paṭisaṃvedesī''ti. atha thero anodhiso sabbasattesu mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā --
[21] ``disāpi ^a^M2.0331^ea^ me dhammakathaṃ suṇantu, disāpi me yuñjantu buddhasāsane.
[22] disāpi me te manuje bhajantu, ye dhammamevādapayanti santo..
[21] ``na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃse, aññaṃ vā pana kañci naṃ.
[22] dāruṃ damayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā..
[22] ajjāhaṃ saccanāmomhi, na naṃ hiṃsāmi kañci naṃ..
[22] appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti paramaṃ sukhaṃ..
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] ohito garuko bhāro, bhavanetti samūhatā''ti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^disāpī^eb^ti mayhaṃ disāpi amittā paccatthikāpi ye maṃ evaṃ upavadanti ``yathā mayaṃ aṅgulimālassa vasena ñātiviyogadukkhaparetā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāma, evaṃ aṅgulimālopi dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātū''ti. ^b^me dhammakathaṃ suṇantū^eb^ti mayā satthu santike sutaṃ catusaccadhammapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ suṇantu ^a^V2.0282^ea^. ^b^yuñjantū^eb^ti sutvā ca tadatthāya paṭipajjantu. ^b^te manuje bhajantū^eb^ti tādise sappurise kalyāṇamitte bhajantu sevantu. ^b^ye dhammamevādapayanti santo^eb^ti ye sappurisā kusaladhammameva, uttarimanussadhammameva, nibbattitalokuttaradhammameva ca ādapenti samādapenti gaṇhāpenti.

[03] ^b^khantivādāna^eb^nti adhivāsanakhantimeva vadantānaṃ tato eva ^b^avirodhappasaṃsina^eb^nti kenaci avirodhabhūtāya mettāya eva pasaṃsanasīlānaṃ. ^b^suṇantu dhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0333^ea^ ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttappayuttakāle tesaṃ santike dhammaṃ suṇantu. ^b^tañca anuvidhīyantū^eb^ti tañca yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ sammadeva uggahitvā anukarontu dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjantūti attho.

[03] ^b^na hi jātu so mamaṃ hiṃse^eb^ti so mayhaṃ diso paccatthiko jātu, ekaṃseneva maṃ na hiṃse, na bādheyya. ^b^aññaṃ vā pana kañci na^eb^nti na kevalaṃ maṃyeva, aññaṃ vāpi kañci sattaṃ na hiṃseyya, ^b^pappuyya paramaṃ santi^eb^nti, paramaṃ uttamaṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇeyya, pāpuṇitvā ca ^b^rakkheyya tasathāvare^eb^ti sabbe ca satte paramāya rakkhāya rakkheyya, sissaṃ puttaṃ viya paripāleyyāti attho.

[03] evaṃ thero imāhi gāthāhi pare pāpato parimocento parittakiriyaṃ nāma katvā attano paṭipattiṃ pakāsento ^b^``udakaṃ hī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha pathaviyā thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā ninnaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attanā icchikicchitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ ^a^P3.0062^ea^ nentīti ^b^nettikā,^eb^ udakahārino. ^b^tejana^eb^nti kaṇḍaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- nettikā attano ruciyā udakaṃ nayanti, usukārāpi tāpetvā vaṅkābhāvaṃ harantā tejanaṃ usuṃ ^b^damayanti^eb^, ujukaṃ karonti, tacchakāpi nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ ^b^damayanti^eb^ attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti. evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ^b^paṇḍitā^eb^ sappaññā ariyamaggaṃ uppādentā attānaṃ damenti, arahattappattā pana ekantadantā nāma hontīti.

[03] idāni purisadammasārathinā satthārā attano damitākāraṃ kataññutañca pakāsento ^b^``daṇḍeneke''^eb^tiādikā pañca gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^daṇḍeneke damayantī^eb^ti rājarājamahāmattādayo daṇḍena, hatthiassādinā balakāyena ca paccatthikādike damenti, gopālādayo ca gāvādike daṇḍena yaṭṭhiyā damenti. hatthācariyā hatthiṃ aṅkusehi, assācariyā asse kasāhi ca damenti. ^b^adaṇḍena asatthena, ahaṃ dantomhi tādinā^eb^ti ahaṃ pana iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappattena sammāsambuddhena vinā eva daṇḍena, vinā satthena, nihitadaṇḍanihitasatthabhāvena danto damito nibbisevano gato amhi.

[03] ^b^ahiṃsakoti^eb^ ^a^M2.0334^ea^ ^a^V2.0283^ea^ ^b^me nāmaṃ, hiṃsakassa pure sato^eb^ti satthārā samāgamato pubbe hiṃsakassa me samānassa ahiṃsakoti nāmamattaṃ ahosi. ^b^ajjāha^eb^nti idāni panāhaṃ ``ahiṃsako''ti ^b^saccanāmo^eb^ avitathanāmo amhi. tasmā ^b^na naṃ hiṃsāmi^eb^ kañcipi sattaṃ na hiṃsāmi na bādhemi, ^b^na^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ.

[03] ^b^vissuto^eb^ti ``pāṇātipātī luddo lohitapāṇī''tiādinā paññāto. ^b^mahoghenā^eb^ti kāmoghādinā mahatā oghena, tassa oghassa vicchedakaraṃ ^b^buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ^eb^ buddhasaṅkhātaṃ saraṇaṃ ^b^agamaṃ^eb^ upagacchiṃ.
[03] ^b^lohitapāṇī^eb^ti pāṇamatipātanena paresaṃ lohitena ruhirena makkhitapāṇi. ^b^saraṇagamanaṃ passā^eb^ti mahapphalaṃ mama saraṇagamanaṃ passāti attānamevālapati.

[03] ^b^tādisaṃ kamma^eb^nti anekasatapurisavadhaṃ dāruṇaṃ tathārūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ. ^b^phuṭṭho kammavipākenā^eb^ti pubbe katassa pāpakammassa vipākena phuṭṭho, sabbaso pahīnakammo vipākamattaṃ paccanubhonto. atha vā ^b^phuṭṭho kammavipākenā^eb^ti upanissayabhūtassa kusalakammassa phalabhūtena lokuttaramaggena, lokuttarakammasseva vā phalena vimuttisukhena phuṭṭho. sabbaso kilesānaṃ khīṇattā ^b^anaṇo^eb^ bhuñjāmi bhojanaṃ, bhojanāpadesena cattāropi paccaye vadati.

[03] idāni pubbe attano pamādavihāraṃ garahāmukhena ^a^P3.0063^ea^ pacchā appamādapaṭipattiṃ pasaṃsanto tattha ca paresaṃ ussāhaṃ janento ^b^``pamādamanuyuñjantī''^eb^tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^bālā^eb^ti bālyena samannāgatā idhalokaparalokatthaṃ ajānantā. ^b^dummedhino^eb^ti nippaññā, te pamāde ādīnavaṃ apassantā pamādaṃ ^b^anuyuñjanti^eb^ pavattenti, pamādeneva kālaṃ vītināmenti. ^b^medhāvī^eb^ti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato pana paṇḍito kulavaṃsāgataṃ ^b^seṭṭhaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ sattaratanadhanaṃ viya appamādaṃ rakkhati. yathā hi ``uttamaṃ dhanaṃ nissāya bhogasampattiṃ pāpuṇissāma, puttadāraṃ posessāma, sugatimaggaṃ sodhessāmā''ti dhane ānisaṃsaṃ passantā dhanaṃ rakkhanti; evaṃ paṇḍitopi ``appamādaṃ nissāya paṭhamajjhānādīni paṭilabhissāmi ^a^M2.0335^ea^, maggaphalāni pāpuṇissāmi, tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sampādessāmī''ti appamāde ānisaṃsaṃ passanto dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva appamādaṃ rakkhatīti attho.

[03] ^b^mā pamāda^eb^nti pamādaṃ mā anuyuñjetha pamādena kālaṃ mā vītināmayittha. ^b^kāmaratisanthava^eb^nti ^a^V2.0284^ea^ vatthukāmesu, kilesakāmesu ca ratisaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāsanthavampi mā ^b^anuyuñjetha^eb^ mā vindittha mā paṭilabhittha. ^b^appamatto hī^eb^ti upaṭṭhitasatitāya appamatto puggalo ^b^jhāyanto^eb^ jhāyanappasuto ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ pāpuṇāti.

[03] ^b^svāgataṃ nāpagata^eb^nti yaṃ tadā mama satthu santike āgataṃ āgamanaṃ, satthu vā tasmiṃ mahāvane āgamanaṃ, taṃ svāgataṃ svāgamanaṃ nāpagataṃ, atthato apetaṃ vigataṃ na hoti. ^b^netaṃ dummantitaṃ mamā^eb^ti yaṃ tadā mayā ``satthu santike pabbajissāmī''ti mantitaṃ, idampi mama na dummantitaṃ, sumantitameva. kasmā? ^b^savibhattesu dhammesū^eb^ti sāvajjānavajjādivasena pakārato vibhattesu dhammesu yaṃ ^b^seṭṭhaṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^tadupāgamaṃ^eb^ tadeva upagacchinti attho.

[03] ``tadā puthujjanakāle payogāsayavipannatāya araññādīsu dukkhaṃ vihāsiṃ, idāni payogāsayasampannatāya tattha sukhaṃ viharāmī''ti sukhavihārabhāvañceva ``pubbe jātimattena brāhmaṇo, idāni satthu orasaputtatāya brāhmaṇo''ti paramatthabrāhmaṇabhāvañca dassento ``araññe''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sukhaṃ sayāmī^eb^ti sayantopi sukhaṃ sukhena nidukkhena cittutrāsādīnaṃ abhāvena cetodukkharahito sayāmi. ^b^ṭhāyāmī^eb^ti ṭhāmi ^a^P3.0064^ea^. ^b^ahatthapāso mārassā^eb^ti kilesamārādīnaṃ agocaro. ^b^aho satthānukampito^eb^ti satthārānukampito aho.
[03] ^b^brahmajacco^eb^ti brāhmaṇajātiko. ^b^udicco ubhato^eb^ti mātito ca pitito ca ubhato udito saṃsuddhagahaṇiko. sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayameva.
