[03] ^b^pahāya^eb^ ^a^M2.0336^ea^ ^b^mātāpitaro^eb^tiādikā āyasmato anuruddhattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro padumuttarassa bhagavato kāle vibhavasampanno kuṭumbiko hutvā nibbatti. so ekadivasaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā sayampi taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satasahassabhikkhuparivārassa bhagavato sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā sattame divase bhagavato, bhikkhusaṅghassa ^a^V2.0285^ea^ ca uttamāni vatthāni datvā paṇidhānamakāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā ``anāgate gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhavissatī''ti byākāsi. sopi tattha puññāni karonto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite sattayojanike suvaṇṇacetiye anekasahassehi dīparukkhehi dīpakapallikāhi ca ``dibbacakkhuñāṇassa upanissayapaccayo hotū''ti uḷāraṃ dīpapūjaṃ akāsi.

[03] evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehe nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto satthari parinibbute niṭṭhite yojanike kanakathūpe bahū kaṃsapātiyo kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā majjhe ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpetvā attanā ekaṃ mahatiṃ kaṃsapātiṃ kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā sīse ṭhapetvā sabbarattiṃ cetiyaṃ anupariyāyi.

[03] evaṃ tasmimpi attabhāve yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃyeva duggatakule nibbatti, ^b^annabhāro^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so sumanaseṭṭhissa nāma gehe kammaṃ karonto jīvati. so ekadivasaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhamādanapabbatato ākāsenāgantvā bārāṇasīnagaradvāre otaritvā cīvaraṃ ^a^P3.0065^ea^ pārupitvā nagare piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacitto pattaṃ gahetvā attano atthāya ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ bhāgabhattaṃ patte pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa dātukāmo ārabhi. bhariyāpissa attano bhāgabhattaṃ tattheva ^a^M2.0337^ea^ pakkhipi. so taṃ netvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapesi. paccekabuddho taṃ gahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. taṃ disvā rattiṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā ``aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ, upariṭṭhe, suppatiṭṭhita''nti mahāsaddena anumodi. taṃ sutvā sumanaseṭṭhi ``evaṃ devatāya anumoditaṃ idameva uttamadāna''nti cintetvā tattha pattiṃ yāci. annabhāro pana tassa pattiṃ adāsi. tena pasannacitto sumanaseṭṭhi tassa sahassaṃ datvā ``ito paṭṭhāya tuyhaṃ sahatthena kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi, patirūpaṃ gehaṃ katvā niccaṃ vasāhī''ti āha.

[03] yasmā nirodhato vuṭṭhitassa paccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto taṃdivasameva uḷārataravipāko hoti, tasmā taṃdivasaṃ sumanaseṭṭhi rañño santikaṃ gacchanto taṃ gahetvā agamāsi. rājā pana taṃ ādaravasena olokesi. seṭṭhi ``mahārāja, ayaṃ oloketabbayuttoyevā''ti vatvā tadā ^a^V2.0286^ea^ tena katapuññaṃ attanāpissa sahassaṃ dinnabhāvaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā rājā tussitvā sahassaṃ datvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne gehaṃ katvā vasā''ti gehaṭṭhānamassa āṇāpesi. tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhāpentassa mahantiyo nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. tā disvā so rañño ārocesi. rājā sabbaṃ dhanaṃ uddharāpetvā rāsikataṃ disvā ``ettakaṃ dhanaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kassa gehe atthī''ti? ``na kassaci, devā''ti. ``tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro imasmiṃ nagare mahādhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū''ti taṃdivasameva tassa seṭṭhichattaṃ ussāpesi.

[03] so tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare sukkodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, ^b^anuruddho^eb^tissa nāmaṃ ahosi. so mahānāmassa sakkassa kaniṭṭhabhātā, satthu cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi parivuto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavanto suddhodanamahārājena ussāhitehi sakyarājūhi satthu parivāratthaṃ pesitehi bhaddiyakumārādīhi anupiyambavane viharantaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā antovasseyeva dibbacakkhuṃ nibbattetvā, puna ^a^M2.0338^ea^ dhammasenāpatissa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto sattamahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā aṭṭhamaṃ jānituṃ nāsakkhi. tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā satthā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ kathetvā ^a^P3.0066^ea^ catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ deseti. so desanānusārena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhiññāpaṭisambhidāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.421-433) --
[22] divā rattiñca passāmi, samantā yojanaṃ tadā..
[22] tassa dīpo mayā dinno, vippasannena cetasā..

[03] atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho''ti (a0 ni0 1.180, 192).

[03] so vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedī viharanto ekadivasaṃ attano paṭipattiṃ paccavekkhitvā pītisomanassajāto udānavasena ^b^``pahāya mātāpitaro''^eb^tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. keci pana ``therassa pabbajjaṃ arahattappattiñca pakāsentehi saṅgītikārehi ādito catasso gāthā bhāsitā. tato parā therassa ariyavaṃsapaṭipattiyā ārādhitacittena bhagavatā bhāsitā. itarā sabbāpi tena tena kāraṇena thereneva bhāsitā''ti vadanti. iti sabbathāpi imā gāthā therena bhāsitāpi, theraṃ uddissa bhāsitāpi therassa cetā gāthāti veditabbā. seyyathidaṃ --
[22] na tena suddhimajjhagaṃ, mārassa visaye rato..
[21] ``rūpā saddā rasā gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā.
[21] ``mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho, saṃsaṭṭho yo ca uddhato.
[22] tassa dhammā ime honti, pāpakā saṃkilesikā..
[22] anāsavo ca so hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā..
[21] ``yadā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..
[22] vasī iddhiguṇe cutūpapāte, kāle passati devatā sa bhikkhu..

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0342^ea^ ^b^pahāyā^eb^ti pajahitvā. ^b^mātāpitaro^eb^ti mātarañca pitarañca. ayañhettha adhippāyo -- yathā aññe keci ñātipārijuññena vā bhogapārijuññena vā abhibhūtā pabbajanti, pabbajitā ca kiccantarapasutā viharanti, na evaṃ mayaṃ. mayaṃ pana mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ, mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya kāmesu nirapekkhā pabbajitāti. ^b^jhāyatī^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānañcāti, duvidhampi jhānaṃ anuyutto viharati.

[03] ^b^sameto naccagītehī^eb^ti naccehi ca gītehi ca samaṅgībhūto, naccāni passanto gītāni suṇantoti ^a^V2.0290^ea^ attho. ``sammato''ti ca paṭhanti, naccagītehi pūjitoti attho. ^b^sammatāḷappabodhano^eb^ti sammatāḷasaddehi paccūsakāle pabodhetabbo. ^b^na tena suddhimajjhaga^eb^nti tena kāmabhogena saṃsārasuddhiṃ nādhigacchiṃ. ^b^mārassa visaye rato^eb^ti kilesamārassa visayabhūte kāmaguṇe rato. ``kilesamārassa visayabhūtena kāmaguṇabhogena saṃsārasuddhi hotī''ti evaṃdiṭṭhiko ahutvāti attho. tenāha ^b^``etañca samatikkammā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti etaṃ pañcavidhampi kāmaguṇaṃ. ^b^samatikkammā^eb^ti samatikkamitvā, anapekkho chaḍḍetvāti attho. ^b^sabbogha^eb^nti kāmoghādikaṃ sabbampi oghaṃ.

[03] pañca kāmaguṇe sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``rūpā saddā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^a^P3.0069^ea^ ^b^manoramā^eb^ti lobhanīyaṭṭhena manaṃ ramayantīti manoramā, manāpiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. yathāha ``katame pañca manāpiyā rūpā, manāpiyā saddā''tiādi (ma0 ni0 3.328 atthato samānaṃ).

[03] ^b^piṇḍapātamatikkanto^eb^ti piṇḍapātaggahaṇaṃ atikkanto, piṇḍapātaggahaṇato nivattentoti attho. ^b^eko^eb^ti ekākī apacchāsamaṇo. ^b^adutiyo^eb^ti nittaṇho. taṇhā hi purisassa dutiyo nāma. yathāha ``taṇhādutiyo puriso''ti (itivu0 15, 105; mahāni0 191). ^b^esatī^eb^ti pariyesati.

[03] ^b^vicinī^eb^ti esantova tattha tattha saṅkārakūṭādike paṃsukūluppattiṭṭhāne vicini. ^b^aggahī^eb^ti vicinitvā asucimakkhitampi ajigucchanto gaṇhi. ^b^dhovī^eb^ti, vikkhālesi. ^b^rajayī^eb^ti dhovitvā gahitaṃ sibbitvā kappiyarajanena rajayi. ^b^dhārayī^eb^ti rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā dhāresi, nivāsesi ceva pārupi ca.

[03] idāni ^a^M2.0343^ea^ pācīnavaṃsadāye satthārā dinnaovādaṃ tassa ca attanā matthakappattabhāvaṃ dīpento ^b^``mahiccho ca asantuṭṭho''^eb^tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^mahiccho^eb^ti mahatiyā paccayicchāya samannāgato, uḷāruḷāre bahū ca paccaye icchantoti attho. ^b^asantuṭṭho^eb^ti nissantuṭṭho, yathālābhasantosādinā santosena virahito. ^b^saṃsaṭṭho^eb^ti gihīhi ceva pabbajitehi ca ananulomikena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho. ^b^uddhato^eb^ti ukkhitto. ^b^tassā^eb^ti ``mahiccho''tiādinā vuttapuggalassa. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti mahicchatā asantoso, saṃsaṭṭhatā vikkhepoti īdisā. lāmakaṭṭhena ^b^pāpakā. saṃkilesikā^eb^ti tassa cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato saṃkilesikā dhammā honti.

[03] ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^V2.0291^ea^ ^b^ca hoti appiccho^eb^ti yadā panāyaṃ puggalo kalyāṇamitte sevanto bhajanto payirupāsanto saddhammaṃ suṇanto yoniso manasi karonto satimā ca mahicchataṃ pahāya appiccho ca hoti. asantosaṃ pahāya ^b^santuṭṭho,^eb^ cittassa vighātakaraṃ vikkhepaṃ pahāya ^b^avighātavā^eb^ avikkhitto samāhito, gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya^b^ pavivekarato,^eb^ vivekābhiratiyā nibbidāya dhammapītiyā ^b^vitto^eb^ sumano tuṭṭhacitto, sabbaso kosajjapahānena ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^.

[03] ^b^tassa^eb^ evaṃ appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatassa ime satipaṭṭhānādayo sattatiṃsappabhedā tividhavipassanāsaṅgahā kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ^b^kusalā,^eb^ maggapariyāpannā ^b^bodhipakkhikā^eb^ dhammā honti. so tehi samannāgato sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepanena aggamaggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya ^b^anāsavo^eb^ ca hoti. ^b^iti^eb^ evaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^mahesinā^eb^ sammāsambuddhena pācīnavaṃsadāye mahāpurisavitakke matthakaṃ pāpanavasenāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^mama^eb^ ^a^P3.0070^ea^ ^b^saṅkappamaññāyā^eb^ti ``apicchassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā''tiādinā (a0 ni0 8.30) mahāpurisavitakkavasena āraddhaṃ, te ca matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvena ṭhitaṃ mama saṅkappaṃ jānitvā. ^b^manomayenā^eb^ti manomayena viya, manasā nimmitasadisena pariṇāmitenāti attho. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū''ti evaṃ pavattādhiṭṭhāniddhiyā.

[03] ^b^yadā^eb^ ^a^M2.0344^ea^ ^b^me ahu saṅkappo^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāle mayhaṃ ``kīdiso nu kho aṭṭhamo mahāpurisavitakko''ti parivitakko ahosi. tato mama saṅkappamaññāya iddhiyā upasaṅkamīti yojanā. ^b^uttari desayī^eb^ti ``nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṃdhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino''ti (a0 ni0 8.30) imamaṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūrento upari desayi. taṃ pana desitaṃ dhammaṃ desento āha ^b^``nippapañcarato buddho, nippapañcamadesayī''^eb^ti. papañcā nāma rāgādayo kilesā, tesaṃ vūpasamatāya, tadabhāvato ca lokuttaradhammā nippapañcā nāma. tasmiṃ nippapañce rato abhirato sammāsambuddho yathā taṃ pāpuṇāmi, tathā tādisaṃ dhammaṃ adesayi, sāmukkaṃsikaṃ catusaccadhammadesanaṃ pakāsayīti attho.
[03] ^b^tassāhaṃ dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti tassā satthu desanāya dhammaṃ jānitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanto vihāsiṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahe ^b^sāsane rato^eb^ abhirato hutvāti attho.

[03] satthārā ^a^V2.0292^ea^ attano samāgamaṃ tena sādhitamatthaṃ dassetvā idāni attano pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyataṃ, kāye anapekkhatāya seyyasukhapassasukhānaṃ pariccāgaṃ, appamiddhakālato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyatañca dassento ^b^``pañcapaññāsavassānī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yato nesajjiko aha^eb^nti yato paṭṭhāya ``yogānukūlatā kammaṭṭhānapariyuṭṭhitasappurisacariyā sallekhavuttī''ti evamādiguṇe disvā nesajjiko ahosiṃ tāni pañcapaññāsa vassāni. ^b^yato middhaṃ samūhata^eb^nti yato paṭṭhāya mayā niddā pariccattā tāni pañcavīsativassāni. ``therassa pañcapaññāsāya vassesu nesajjikassa sato ādito pañcavīsativassāni niddā nāhosi, tato paraṃ sarīrakilamathena pacchimayāme niddā ahosī''ti vadanti.

[03] ^b^``nāhu assāsapassāsā''^eb^ tiādikā tisso gāthā satthu parinibbānakāle bhikkhūhi ``kiṃ bhagavā parinibbuto''ti puṭṭho parinibbānabhāvaṃ pavedento āha. tattha ^b^nāhu assāsapassāsā, ṭhitacittassa tādino^eb^ti ^a^P3.0071^ea^ anulomapaṭilomato anekākāravokārā sabbā samāpattiyo ^a^M2.0345^ea^ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sabbapacchā catutthajjhāne ṭhitacittassa tādino buddhassa bhagavato assāsapassāsā nāhu nāhesunti attho. etena yasmā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpannassa kāyasaṅkhārā nirujjhanti. kāyasaṅkhārāti ca assāsapassāsā vuccanti, tasmā catutthajjhānakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya assāsapassāsā nāhesunti dasseti. taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya abhāvato ^b^anejo,^eb^ samādhismiṃ ṭhitattā vā ^b^anejo. santimārabbhā^eb^ti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti parinibbāyi. ayañhettha attho -- nibbānārammaṇacatutthajjhānaphalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tadanantarameva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti.

[03] ^b^asallīnenā^eb^ti alīnena asaṃkuṭitena suvikasiteneva cittena. ^b^vedanaṃ ajjhavāsayī^eb^ti sato sampajāno hutvā māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ adhivāsesi, na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito ca samparivatti. ^b^pajjotasseva nibbānaṃ, vimokkho cetaso ahū^eb^ti yathā telañca paṭicca, vaṭṭiñca paṭicca pajjalanto pajjoto padīpo tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati. nibbuto ca katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati, aññadatthu antaradhāyati, adassanameva gacchati; evaṃ kilesābhisaṅkhāre nissāya pavattamāno khandhasantāno tesaṃ parikkhaye nibbāyati, nibbuto ca katthaci gantvā na tiṭṭhati, aññadatthu antaradhāyati, adassanameva gacchatīti dasseti. tena vuttaṃ ``nibbanti dhīrā yathāyaṃ padīpo''ti (khu0 pā0 6.15), ``accī yathā vātavegena khittā''ti (su0 ni0 1080) ca ādi.

[03] ^b^ete^eb^ti ^a^V2.0293^ea^ parinibbānakkhaṇe satthu santāne pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ attano paccakkhatāya vuttaṃ. pacchimakā tato paraṃ cittuppādābhāvato. ^b^dānī^eb^ti etarahi. ^b^phassapañcamā^eb^ti phassapañcamakānaṃ dhammānaṃ pākaṭabhāvato vuttaṃ. tathā hi cittuppādakathāyampi phassapañcamakāva ādito vuttā. ^b^aññe dhammā^eb^ti saha nissayena aññe cittacetasikā dhammā, na parinibbānacittacetasikā. nanu tepi na bhavissantevāti? saccaṃ na bhavissanti, āsaṅkābhāvato pana te sandhāya ``na bhavissantī''ti na vattabbameva. ``itare pana sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ viya bhavissanti nu kho''ti siyā āsaṅkāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ ``nāññe dhammā bhavissantī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^natthi^eb^ ^a^M2.0346^ea^ ^b^dāni punāvāso, devakāyasmi jālinī^eb^ti, ettha ^b^jālinī^eb^ti ^a^P3.0072^ea^ devataṃ ālapati, devate devakāyasmiṃ devasamūhe upapajjanavasena puna āvāso āvasanaṃ idāni mayhaṃ natthīti attho. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``vikkhīṇo^eb^''tiādinā. sā kira devatā purimattabhāve therassa pādaparicārikā, tasmā idāni theraṃ jiṇṇaṃ vuddhaṃ disvā purimasinehena āgantvā ``tattha cittaṃ paṇidhehi, yattha te vusitaṃ pure''ti devūpapattiṃ yāci. atha ``dāni natthī''tiādinā thero tassā paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. taṃ sutvā devatā vihatāsā tatthevantaradhāyi.

[03] atha thero vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā attano ānubhāvaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ pakāsento ^b^``yassa muhuttenā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^yassa^eb^ khīṇāsavabhikkhuno muhuttamattena eva ^b^sahassadhā^eb^ sahassappakāro tisahassimahāsahassipabhedo, ^b^loko sabrahmakappo^eb^ sahabrahmaloko, ^b^saṃvidito^eb^ sammadeva vidito ñāto paccakkhaṃ kato, evaṃ ^b^iddhiguṇe^eb^ iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca vasībhāvappatto so bhikkhu upagatakāle devatā passati, na tassa devatānaṃ dassane parihānīti. therena kira jāliniyā devatāya paṭivacanadānavasena ``natthi dānī''ti gāthāya vuttāya bhikkhū jāliniṃ apassantā ``kiṃ nu kho thero dhammālapanavasena kiñci ālapatī''ti cintesuṃ. tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā thero ``yassa muhuttenā''ti imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] ^b^annabhāro pure^eb^ti evaṃnāmo purimattabhāve. ^b^ghāsahārako^eb^ti ghāsamattassa atthāya bhattiṃ katvā jīvanako. ^b^samaṇa^eb^nti samitapāpaṃ. ^b^paṭipādesi^eb^nti paṭimukho hutvā pādāsiṃ, pasādena abhimukho hutvā āhāradānaṃ adāsinti adhippāyo. ^b^upariṭṭha^eb^nti evaṃnāmakaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ. ^b^yasassina^eb^nti kittimantaṃ patthaṭayasaṃ. imāya gāthāya yāva carimattabhāvā uḷārasampattihetubhūtaṃ attano pubbakammaṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``somhi sakyakule jāto''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^ito^eb^ ^a^V2.0294^ea^ ^b^sattā^eb^ti ito manussalokato cavitvā devaloke dibbena ādhipaccena satta. ^b^tato sattā^eb^ti tato devalokato cavitvā manussaloke cakkavattibhāvena satta. ^b^saṃsārāni catuddasā^eb^ti catuddasa bhavantarasaṃsaraṇāni. ^b^nivāsamabhijānissa^eb^nti pubbenivāsaṃ aññāsiṃ. ^b^devaloke^eb^ ^a^M2.0347^ea^ ṭhito tadāb^ti tañca kho na imasmiṃyeva attabhāve, api ca kho yadā ito anantarātīte attabhāve devaloke ṭhito, tadā aññāsinti attho.

[03] idāni attanā dibbacakkhuñāṇacutūpapātañāṇānaṃ adhigatākāraṃ dassento ^b^``pañcaṅgike''^eb^tiādinā dve gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^pañcaṅgike samādhimhī^eb^ti abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānasamādhimhi. so hi pītipharaṇatā, sukhapharaṇatā, cetopharaṇatā, ālokapharaṇatā ^a^P3.0073^ea^, paccavekkhaṇanimittanti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā pañcaṅgiko samādhīti vuccati. ^b^sante^eb^ti paṭipakkhavūpasamena aṅgasantatāya ca sante. ^b^ekodibhāvite^eb^ti ekodibhāvagate, suciṇṇe vasībhāvappatteti attho. ^b^paṭippassaddhiladdhamhī^eb^ti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā laddhe. ^b^dibbacakkhu visujjhi me^eb^ti evaṃvidhe samādhimhi sampādite mayhaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visujjhi, ekādasahi upakkilesehi vimuttiyā visuddhaṃ ahosi.

[03] ^b^cutūpapātaṃ jānāmī^eb^ti sattānaṃ cutiñca upapattiñca jānāmi, jānanto ca ``ime sattā amumhā lokamhā āgantvā idhūpapannā, imamhā ca lokā gantvā amumhi loke upapajjissantī''ti sattānaṃ ^b^āgatiṃ gatiñca^eb^ jānāmi, jānanto eva ca nesaṃ ^b^itthabhāvaṃ^eb^ manussabhāvaṃ tato ^b^aññathābhāvaṃ^eb^ aññathātiracchānabhāvañca upapattito puretarameva jānāmi. tayidaṃ sabbampi pañcaṅgike samādhimhi sampādite evāti dassento āha ^b^``jhāne pañcaṅgike ṭhito''^eb^ti. tattha pañcaṅgike jhāne ṭhito patiṭṭhito hutvā evaṃ jānāmīti attho.

[03] evaṃ vijjāttayaṃ dassetvā tappasaṅgena pubbe dassitampi tatiyavijjaṃ saha kiccanipphattiyā dassento ^b^``pariciṇṇo mayā satthā''^eb^tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^vajjīnaṃ veḷuvagāme^eb^ti vajjiraṭṭhassa veḷuvagāme, vajjiraṭṭhe yattha pacchimavassaṃ upagacchi veḷuvagāme. ^b^heṭṭhato veḷugumbasmi^eb^nti tattha aññatarassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā. ^b^nibbāyissa^eb^nti nibbāyissāmi, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyissāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^samaṇassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0348^ea^ ^a^V2.0295^ea^ ^b^ahu cintā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato pārāpariyattherassa gāthā. imassa vatthu heṭṭhā āgatameva. tā ca gāthā satthari dharante attano puthujjanakāle manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ niggaṇhanacintāya pakāsanavasena bhāsitā. imā pana aparabhāge satthari parinibbute attano ca parinibbāne upaṭṭhite tadā āyatiñca bhikkhūnaṃ uddhammapaṭipattiyā pakāsanavasena bhāsitā. tattha --

[25] ayaṃ gāthā saṅgītikārehi ṭhapitā. tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayova. ayaṃ pana sambandho -- satthari aggasāvakesu ekaccesu mahātheresu ca parinibbutesu atītasatthuke pāvacane subbacesu sikkhākāmesu bhikkhūsu dullabhesu, dubbacesu micchāpaṭipattibahulesu bhikkhūsu ca jātesu supupphite mahante sālavane nisinnassa pavivittassa ekaggassa jhāyanasīlassa, samitapāpatāya ^b^samaṇassa,^eb^ pārāpariyattherassa paṭipattiṃ nissāya ^b^cintā^eb^ vīmaṃsā ahosīti itarā --
[22] iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūnaṃ, aññathā dāni dissati..
[21] ``paṇītaṃ yadi vā lūkhaṃ, appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
[22] na bāḷhaṃ ussukā āsuṃ, yathā te āsavakkhaye..
[22] nibbutā dāni te therā, parittā dāni tādisā..
[22] kathā vaḍḍhenti paṭibuddhā, yā kathā satthugarahitā..
[22] piṇḍapāte ca sampanne, ambe āmalakāni ca..
[22] dhammaṃ paresaṃ desenti, lābhato no ca atthato..
[22] satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna, evaṃ gāme munī care..
[22] kiñcāpi pacchimo kālo, phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ..

[03] tattha ^b^iriyaṃ āsi bhikkhūna^eb^nti purisuttame ^b^lokanāthamhi^eb^ sammāsambuddhe ^b^tiṭṭhante^eb^ dharante etarahi paṭipattibhāvato. ^b^aññathā^eb^ aññena pakārena ^a^M2.0351^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ iriyaṃ caritaṃ ahosi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattibhāvato. ^b^aññathā dāni dissatī^eb^ti idāni pana tato aññathā bhikkhūnaṃ iriyaṃ dissati ayāthāvapaṭipattibhāvatoti adhippāyo ^a^P3.0076^ea^.

[03] idāni satthari dharante yenākārena bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti ahosi, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``sītavātaparittāṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mattaṭṭhiya^eb^nti taṃ mattaṃ payojanaṃ. yāvadeva sītavātaparittāṇaṃ, yāvadeva hirīkopīnapaṭicchādanaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu. kathaṃ? ^b^santuṭṭhā itarītare^eb^ yasmiṃ tasmiṃ hīne paṇīte vā yathāladdhe paccaye santosaṃ āpannā.

[03] ^b^paṇīta^eb^nti uḷāraṃ sappiādinā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, tadabhāvena ^b^lūkhaṃ. appa^eb^nti, catupañcālopamattampi. ^b^bahuṃ yāpanatthaṃ abhuñjiṃsū^eb^ti paṇītaṃ bahuṃ bhuñjantāpi yāpanamattameva āhāraṃ bhuñjiṃsu. tato eva ^b^agiddhā^eb^ gedhaṃ anāpannā. ^b^nādhimucchitā^eb^ na ajjhositā akkhabbhañjanaṃ viya sākaṭikā, vaṇalepanaṃ viya vaṇino abhuñjiṃsu.

[03] ^b^jīvitānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0298^ea^ ^b^parikkhāre, bhesajje atha paccaye^eb^pi jīvitānaṃ pavattiyā parikkhārabhūte bhesajjasaṅkhāte paccaye gilānapaccaye. ^b^yathā te^eb^ti yathā te purimakā bhikkhū āsavakkhaye ^b^ussukā^eb^ yuttā āsuṃ, tathā te rogābhibhūtāpi gilānapaccaye bāḷhaṃ ativiya ^b^ussukā^eb^ nāhesunti attho.
[03] ^b^tapparāyaṇā^eb^ti vivekaparāyaṇā vivekapoṇā. evaṃ catūhi gāthāhi catupaccayasantosaṃ bhāvanābhiratiñca dassentena tesaṃ ariyavaṃsapaṭipadā dassitā.

[03] ^b^nīcā^eb^ti ``mayaṃ paṃsukūlikā piṇḍapātikā''ti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni akatvā nīcavuttino, nivātavuttinoti attho. ^b^niviṭṭhā^eb^ti sāsane niviṭṭhasaddhā. ^b^subharā^eb^ti appicchatādibhāvena suposā. ^b^mudū^eb^ti vattapaṭipattiyaṃ sakale ca brahmacariye mudū, suparikammakatasuvaṇṇaṃ viya viniyogakkhamā. ^b^mudū^eb^ti vā abhākuṭikā uttānamukhā pupphitamukhena paṭisanthāravuttino, sutitthaṃ viya sukhāvahāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^athaddhamānasā^eb^ti akathinacittā ^a^M2.0352^ea^ tena subbacabhāvamāha. ^b^abyāsekā^eb^ti sativippavāsābhāvato kilesabyāsekarahitā, antarantarā taṇhādiṭṭhimānādīhi avokiṇṇāti attho. ^b^amukharā^eb^ti na mukharā, na mukhena kharā vacīpāgabbhiyarahitāti vā attho. ^b^atthacintāvasānugā^eb^ti hitacintāvasānugāhitacintāvasikā, attano paresañca hitacintameva anuparivattanakā.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tasmā nīcavuttādihetu. ^b^pāsādika^eb^nti pasādajanikaṃ paṭipattiṃ passantānaṃ suṇantānañca pasādāvahaṃ. ^b^gata^eb^nti abhikkantapaṭikkantaparivattanādigamanaṃ. ^b^gata^eb^nti vā kāyavācāpavatti. ^b^bhutta^eb^nti catupaccayaparibhogo. ^b^nisevita^eb^nti gocaranisevanaṃ. ^b^siniddhā^eb^ ^a^P3.0077^ea^ ^b^teladhārāvā^eb^ti yathā anivattitā kusalajanābhisiñcitā savantī teladhārā avicchinnā ^b^siniddhā^eb^ maṭṭhā dassanīyā pāsādikā hoti, evaṃ tesaṃ ākappasampannānaṃ iriyāpatho acchiddo saṇho maṭṭho dassanīyo pāsādiko ahosi.

[03] ^b^mahājhāyī^eb^ti mahantehi jhānehi jhāyanasīlā, mahantaṃ vā nibbānaṃ jhāyantīti mahājhāyī. tato eva ^b^mahāhitā,^eb^ mahantehi hitehi samannāgatāti attho. ^b^te therā^eb^ti te yathāvuttappakārā paṭipattiparāyaṇā therā idāni parinibbutāti attho. ^b^parittā dāni tādisā^eb^ti idāni pacchime kāle tādisā tathārūpā therā parittā appakā katipayā evāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^kusalānañca^eb^ ^a^V2.0299^ea^ ^b^dhammāna^eb^nti vivaṭṭassa upanissayabhūtānaṃ vimokkhasambhārānaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ. ^b^paññāya cā^eb^ti tathārūpāya paññāya ca. ^b^parikkhayā^eb^ti abhāvato anuppattito. kāmañcettha paññāpi siyā anavajjadhammā, bahukārabhāvadassanatthaṃ panassā visuṃ gahaṇaṃ yathā puññañāṇasambhārāti. ^b^sabbākāravarūpeta^eb^nti ādikalyāṇatādīhi sabbehi ākāravarehi pakāravisesehi upetaṃ yuttaṃ jinassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ lujjati vinassatīti attho.

[03] ^b^pāpakānañca dhammānaṃ, kilesānañca yo utū^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ lobhādīnañca kilesānaṃ yo utu yo kālo, so ayaṃ ^a^M2.0353^ea^ vattatīti vacanaseso. ^b^upaṭṭhitā vivekāya, ye ca saddhammasesakā^eb^ti ye pana evarūpe kāle kāyacittaupadhivivekatthāya upaṭṭhitā āraddhavīriyā, te ca sesapaṭipattisaddhammakā honti. ayañhettha adhippāyo -- suvisuddhasīlācārāpi samānā idāni ekacce bhikkhū iriyāpathasaṇṭhāpanaṃ, samathavipassanābhāvanāvidhānaṃ, mahāpalibodhūpacchedo, khuddakapalibodhūpacchedoti evamādipubbakiccaṃ sampādetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjanti. te sesapaṭipattisaddhammakā, paṭipattiṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkontīti.

[03] ^b^te kilesā pavaḍḍhantā^eb^ti ye bhagavato orasaputtehi ca tadā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gamitā kilesā, te etarahi laddhokāsā bhikkhūsu vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantā. ^b^āvisanti bahuṃ jana^eb^nti kalyāṇamittarahitaṃ ayonisomanasikārabahulaṃ andhabālajanaṃ abhibhavitvā avasaṃ karontā āvisanti santānaṃ anupavisanti. evaṃbhūtā ca te ^b^kīḷanti maññe bālehi, ummattehiva rakkhasā,^eb^ yathā nāma keḷisīlā rakkhasā bhisakkarahite ummatte āvisitvā te anayabyasanaṃ āpādentā tehi kīḷanti, evaṃ te kilesā sammāsambuddhabhisakkarahite andhabāle bhikkhū āvisitvā tesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādibhedaṃ anatthaṃ uppādentā tehi saddhiṃ kīḷanti maññe, kīḷantā viya hontīti attho.

[03] ^b^tena^eb^ ^a^P3.0078^ea^ ^b^tenā^eb^ti tena tena ārammaṇabhāgena. ^b^vidhāvitā^eb^ti virūpaṃ dhāvitā asāruppavasena paṭipajjantā. ^b^kilesavatthūsū^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ kilesā pacchā uppajjanakānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato kilesāva kilesavatthūni, tesu kilesavatthūsu samūhitesu. ^b^sasaṅgāmeva ghosite^eb^ti hiraññasuvaṇṇamaṇimuttādikaṃ dhanaṃ vippakiritvā ``yaṃ yaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādi yassa yassa hatthagataṃ, taṃ taṃ tassa tasseva hotū''ti evaṃ kāmaghosanā sasaṅgāmaghosanā nāma. tatthāyamattho ^a^V2.0300^ea^ -- kilesavatthūsu ``yo yo kileso yaṃ yaṃ sattaṃ gaṇhāti abhibhavati, so so tassa tassa hotū''ti kilesasenāpatinā mārena sasaṅgāme ghosite viya. tehi tehi kilesehi abhibhūtā te bālaputhujjanā tena tena ārammaṇabhāgena vidhāvitā vositāti.

[03] te ^a^M2.0354^ea^ evaṃ vidhāvitā kiṃ karontīti āha ^b^``pariccajitvā saddhammaṃ, aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare''^eb^ti. tassattho -- paṭipattisaddhammaṃ chaḍḍetvā āmisakiñjakkhahetu ^b^aññamaññehi bhaṇḍare^eb^ kalahaṃ karontīti. ^b^diṭṭhigatānī^eb^ti ``viññāṇamattameva atthi, nattheva rūpadhammā''ti, ``yathā puggalo nāma paramatthato natthi, evaṃ sabhāvadhammāpi paramatthato natthi, vohāramattamevā''ti ca evamādīni diṭṭhigatāni micchāgāhe ^b^anventā^eb^ anugacchantā ^b^idaṃ seyyo^eb^ idameva seṭṭhaṃ, aññaṃ micchāti maññanti.

[03] ^b^niggatā^eb^ti gehato nikkhantā. ^b^kaṭacchubhikkhahetūpī^eb^ti kaṭacchumattabhikkhānimittampi. taṃ dadantassa gahaṭṭhassa ananulomikasaṃsaggavasena ^b^akiccāni^eb^ pabbajitena akattabbāni kammāni ^b^nisevare^eb^ karonti.

[03] ^b^udarāvadehakaṃ bhutvā^eb^ti ``ūnūdaro mitāhāro''ti (theragā0 982; mi0 pa0 6.5.10) vuttavacanaṃ acintetvā udarapūraṃ bhuñjitvā. ^b^sayantuttānaseyyakā^eb^ti ``dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno''ti (a0 ni0 8.9; vibha0 519) vuttavidhānaṃ ananussaritvā uttānaseyyakā sayanti. ^b^yā kathā satthugarahitā^eb^ti rājakathāditiracchānakathaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03] ^b^sabbakārukasippānī^eb^ti sabbehi vessādīhi kārukehi kattabbāni bhattatālavaṇṭakaraṇādīni hatthasippāni. ^b^cittiṃ katvānā^eb^ti sakkaccaṃ sādaraṃ katvā. ^b^avūpasantā ajjhatta^eb^nti kilesavūpasamābhāvato gadduhanamattampi samādhānābhāvato ca ajjhattaṃ avūpasantā, avūpasantacittāti attho. ^b^sāmaññattho^eb^ti samaṇadhammo. ^b^atiacchatī^eb^ti tesaṃ ājīvakiccapasutatāya ekadesampi aphusanato visuṃyeva nisīdati, anallīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^mattika^eb^nti ^a^P3.0079^ea^ pākatikaṃ vā pañcavaṇṇaṃ vā gihīnaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ mattikaṃ. ^b^telacuṇṇañcā^eb^ti pākatikaṃ, abhisaṅkhataṃ vā telañca cuṇṇañca. ^b^udakāsanabhojana^eb^nti udakañca āsanañca ^a^V2.0301^ea^ bhojanañca. ^b^ākaṅkhantā bahuttara^eb^nti bahuṃ piṇḍapātādiuttaruttaraṃ ākaṅkhantā ``amhehi mattikādīsu dinnesu manussā daḷhabhattikā hutvā bahuṃ uttaruttaraṃ catupaccayajātaṃ dassantī''ti adhippāyena gihīnaṃ upanāmentīti attho.

[03] dante ^a^M2.0355^ea^ punanti sodhenti etenāti ^b^dantaponaṃ,^eb^ dantakaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^kapittha^eb^nti kapitthaphalaṃ. ^b^puppha^eb^nti sumanacampakādipupphaṃ. ^b^khādanīyānī^eb^ti aṭṭhārasavidhepi khajjakavisese. ^b^piṇḍapāte ca sampanne^eb^ti vaṇṇādisampayutte odanavisese. ^b^``ambe āmalakāni cā''^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena mātuluṅgatālanāḷikerādiphalāni avuttāni saṅgaṇhāti. sabbattha gihīnaṃ upanāmenti ākaṅkhantā bahuttaranti yojanā.

[03] ^b^bhesajjesu yathā vejjā^eb^ti gihīnaṃ bhesajjappayogesu yathā vejjā, tathā bhikkhū paṭipajjantīti adhippāyo. ^b^kiccākicce yathā gihī^eb^ti gahaṭṭhānaṃ khuddake ceva mahante ca kicce kattabbe gihī viya. ^b^gaṇikāva vibhūsāya^eb^nti attano sarīrassa vibhūsane rūpūpajīviniyo viya. ^b^issare khattiyā yathā^eb^ti issare issariyapavattane yathā khattiyā, evaṃ kulapatī hutvā vattantīti attho.

[03] ^b^nekatikā^eb^ti nikatiyaṃ niyuttā, amaṇiṃyeva maṇiṃ, asuvaṇṇaṃyeva suvaṇṇaṃ katvā paṭirūpasāciyoganiratā. ^b^vañcanikā^eb^ti kūṭamānādīhi vippalambakā. ^b^kūṭasakkhī^eb^ti ayāthāvasakkhino. ^b^apāṭukā^eb^ti vāmakā, asaṃyatavuttīti attho. ^b^bahūhi parikappehī^eb^ti yathāvuttehi aññehi ca bahūhi micchājīvappakārehi.

[03] ^b^lesakappe^eb^ti kappiyalese kappiyapaṭirūpe. ^b^pariyāyeti,^eb^ paccayesu pariyāyassa yoge. ^b^parikappe^eb^ti vaḍḍhiādivikappane, sabbattha visaye bhummaṃ. ^b^anudhāvitā^eb^ti mahicchatādīhi pāpadhammehi anudhāvitā vositā. ^b^jīvikatthā^eb^ jīvikappayojanā ājīvahetukā. ^b^upāyenā^eb^ti parikathādinā upāyena paccayuppādananayena. ^b^saṅkaḍḍhantī^eb^ti saṃharanti.

[03] ^b^upaṭṭhāpenti parisa^eb^nti parisāya attānaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, yathā parisā attānaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, evaṃ parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantīti attho. ^b^kammato^eb^ti kammahetu. te hi attano kattabbaveyyāvaccanimittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti. ^b^no ca dhammato^eb^ti dhammanimittaṃ no ca upaṭṭhapenti. yo satthārā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitāya parisāya saṅgaho anuññāto, tena na saṅgaṇhantīti attho. ^b^lābhato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0302^ea^ lābhahetu, ``ayyo ^a^P3.0080^ea^ bahussuto, bhāṇako, `dhammakathiko'ti evaṃ sambhāvento mahājano mayhaṃ lābhasakkāre upanayissatī''ti ^a^M2.0356^ea^ icchācāre ṭhatvā lābhanimittaṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desenti. ^b^no ca atthato^eb^ti yo so vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ kathentena pattabbo attho, na taṃdiṭṭhadhammikādibhedahitanimittaṃ dhammaṃ desentīti attho.

[03] ^b^saṅghalābhassa bhaṇḍantī^eb^ti saṅghalābhahetu bhaṇḍanti ``mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tuyha''ntiādinā kalahaṃ karonti. ^b^saṅghato paribāhirā^eb^ti, ariyasaṅghato bahibhūtā ariyasaṅghe tadabhāvato. ^b^paralābhopajīvantā^eb^ti sāsane lābhassa andhabālaputhujjanehi pare sīlādiguṇasampanne sekkhe uddissa uppannattā taṃ paralābhaṃ, parato vā dāyakato laddhabbalābhaṃ upajīvantā bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū pāpajigucchāya abhāvato ^b^ahirikā^eb^ samānā ca ``mayaṃ paralābhaṃ bhuñjāma, parapaṭibaddhajīvikā''tipi ^b^na lajjare^eb^ na hirīyanti.

[03] ^b^nānuyuttā^eb^ti samaṇakaraṇehi dhammehi ananuyuttā. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā pubbe vuttā bandhanakārakādayo, tathā. ^b^eke^eb^ti ekacce. ^b^muṇḍā saṅghāṭipārutā^eb^ti kevalaṃ muṇḍitakesatāya muṇḍā pilotikakhaṇḍehi saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena ``saṅghāṭī''ti laddhanāmena cīvarena pārutasarīrā. ^b^sambhāvanaṃyevicchanti, lābhasakkāramucchitā^eb^ti lābhasakkārāsāya mucchitā ajjhositā hutvā, ``pesalo dhutavādo bahussuto''ti vā madhuravacanamanuyuttā ``ariyo''ti ca kevalaṃ ^b^sambhāvanaṃ^eb^ bahumānaṃyeva icchanti esanti, na tannimitte guṇeti attho.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti ``kusalānañca dhammānaṃ paññāya ca parikkhayā''ti vuttanayena. ^b^nānappayātamhī^eb^ti nānappakāre bhedanadhamme payāte samakate, nānappakārena vā saṃkilesadhamme payātuṃ pavattituṃ āraddhe. ^b^na dāni sukaraṃ tathā^eb^ti idāni imasmiṃ dullabhakalyāṇamitte dullabhasappāyasaddhammassavane ca kāle yathā satthari dharante ^b^aphusitaṃ^eb^ aphuṭṭhaṃ, anadhigataṃ jhānavipassanaṃ ^b^phusituṃ adhigantuṃ, phusitaṃ vā^eb^ hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyameva vā ahutvā yathā visesabhāgiyaṃ hoti, tathā ^b^anurakkhituṃ^eb^ pāletuṃ sukaraṃ, tathā na sukaraṃ, tathā sampādetuṃ na sakkāti attho.

[03] idāni ^a^M2.0357^ea^ attano parinibbānakālassa āsannattā saṃkhittena ovādena sabrahmacāriṃ ovadanto ^b^``yathā kaṇṭakaṭṭhānamhī''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- yathā puriso kenacideva payojanena kaṇṭakanicite padese anupāhano vicaranto ``mā maṃ kaṇṭako vijjhī''ti ^a^P3.0081^ea^ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva ^a^V2.0303^ea^ vicarati, evaṃ kilesakaṇṭakanicite gocaragāme payojanena caranto muni satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāna satisampajaññayutto appamattova careyya kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahantoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^saritvā pubbake yogī, tesaṃ vattamanussara^eb^nti purimake yoge bhāvanāya yuttatāya yogī āraddhavipassake saritvā tesaṃ vattaṃ āgamānusārena sammāpaṭipattibhāvanāvidhiṃ anussaranto dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā yathāpaṭipajjanto. ^b^kiñcāpi pacchimo kālo^eb^ti yadipāyaṃ atītasatthuko carimo kālo, tathāpi yathādhammameva paṭipajjanto vipassanaṃ ussukkāpento ^b^phuseyya amataṃ padaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ adhigaccheyya.
[03] ^b^idaṃ vatvā^eb^ti, yathādassitaṃ saṃkilesavodānesu imaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ kathetvā. ayañca osānagāthā saṅgītikārehi therassa parinibbānaṃ pakāsetuṃ vuttāti veditabbā.

[03] tiṃsanipāte ^a^M2.0358^ea^ ^a^V2.0304^ea^ ^b^pāsādike bahū disvā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato phussattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde ekassa maṇḍalikarañño putto hutvā nibbatti, ^b^phusso^eb^ti nāmaṃ ahosi. so viññutaṃ patto khattiyakumārehi sikkhitabbasippesu nipphattiṃ gato. upanissayasampannattā kāmesu alaggacitto aññatarassa mahātherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā cariyānukūlaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nacirasseva chaḷabhiñño ahosi. athekadivasaṃ paṇḍaragotto nāma eko tāpaso tassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā nisinno sambahule bhikkhū sīlācārasampanne susaṃvutindriye bhāvitakāye bhāvitacitte disvā pasannacitto ``sādhu vatāyaṃ paṭipatti loke ciraṃ tiṭṭheyyā''ti cintetvā ``kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, anāgatamaddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipatti bhavissatī''ti theraṃ pucchi. tamatthaṃ dassento saṅgītikārā --
[22] isi paṇḍarasagotto, apucchi phussasavhaya''nti.. -- gāthaṃ ādito ṭhapesuṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^P3.0082^ea^ ^b^pāsādike^eb^ti attano paṭipattiyā pasādārahe. ^b^bahū^eb^ti sambahule. ^b^bhāvitatte^eb^ti samathavipassanābhāvanāhi bhāvitacitte. ^b^susaṃvute^eb^ti suṭṭhu saṃvutindriye. ^b^isī^eb^ti tāpaso. ^b^paṇḍarasagotto^eb^ti paṇḍarassa nāma isino vaṃse jātattā tena samānagotto. ^b^phussasavhaya^eb^nti phussasaddena avhātabbaṃ, phussanāmakanti attho.
[22] anāgatamhi kālamhi, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito''ti.. --

[03] tattha ^b^kiṃ chandā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane anāgate bhikkhū kīdisacchandā kīdisādhimuttikā, kiṃ hīnādhimuttikā, udāhu paṇītādhimuttikāti attho. ^b^kimadhippāyā^eb^ti kīdisādhippāyā kīdisajjhāsayā, kiṃ saṃkilesajjhāsayā, udāhu vodānajjhāsayāti attho. atha vā ^b^chandā^eb^ nāma kattukamyatā, tasmā kīdisī tesaṃ kattukamyatāti attho. ^b^adhippāyo^eb^ ajjhāsayoyeva. ^b^kimākappā^eb^ti kīdisākappā. ākappāti ca vesagahaṇādivārittacārittavantoti attho. ^b^bhavissare^eb^ti bhavissanti. ^b^taṃ me^eb^ti taṃ anāgate bhikkhūnaṃ chandādhippāyākappabhedaṃ pucchito mayhaṃ ^b^akkhāhi^eb^ kathehīti theraṃ ajjhesati. tassa thero tamatthaṃ ācikkhanto sakkaccasavane tāva niyojetuṃ --
[03] tassattho -- bho paṇḍaranāma isi, yaṃ tvaṃ maṃ pucchasi, taṃ te anāgataṃ ācikkhissāmi, ācikkhato pana mama vacanaṃ suṇāhi anāgatatthadīpanato saṃvegāvahato ca sakkaccaṃ upadhārehīti.
[03] atha thero anāgataṃsañāṇena bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnañca bhāviniṃ pavattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ disvā tassa ācikkhanto --
[21] ``kodhanā upanāhī ca, makkhī thambhī saṭhā bahū.
[22] kuhā thaddhā lapā siṅgī, carissantyariyā viya..
[21] ``ye ye alābhino lābhaṃ, na te pujjā bhavissare.
[22] supesalepi te dhīre, sevissanti na te tadā..
[22] paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāve, bhikkhūnaṃ na bhavissati..
[21] ``uddhato unnaḷo bālo, sīlaṃ yassa na vijjati.
[22] bhāvethaṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, phusantā amataṃ pada''nti.. -- imā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^kodhanā^eb^ti kujjhanasīlā. ^b^bhavissanti anāgate^eb^ti sambandho. kiṃ therassa kāle tathā nāhesunti? na nāhesuṃ. tadā pana kalyāṇamittabahulatāya ovādakesu viññāpakesu sabrahmacārīsu bahūsu vijjamānesu kilesesu balavantesu paṭisaṅkhānabahulatāya ca yebhuyyena bhikkhū akkodhanā ahesuṃ, āyatiṃ tabbipariyāye atikodhanā bhavissanti, tasmā ``anāgate''ti vuttaṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^upanāhī^eb^ti āghātavatthūsu āghātassa upanayhanasīlā upanāhasambhavato vā upanāhī. tattha purimakāliko byāpādo kodho, aparakāliko upanāho. sakiṃ pavatto vā doso kodho, anekakkhattuṃ pavatto upanāho. paresaṃ vijjamāne guṇe makkhanti puñjanti, tesaṃ vā udakapuñjaniyā viya udakassa makkho makkhanaṃ puñjanaṃ etesaṃ atthīti ^b^makkhī^eb^. atimānalakkhaṇo thambho etesaṃ atthīti ^b^thambhī. saṭhā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0308^ea^ asantaguṇavibhāvanalakkhaṇena sāṭheyyena samannāgatā. ^b^issukī^eb^ti parasampattikhiyyanalakkhaṇāya issāya samannāgatā. ^b^nānāvādā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ viruddhavādā viruddhadiṭṭhikā, kalahakārakā cāti attho.

[03] ^b^aññātamānino dhamme, gambhīre tīragocarā^eb^ti gambhīre durobhāse saddhamme aññāte eva ``ñātoti, diṭṭho''ti evaṃ mānino, tato eva tassa orabhāge pavattitāya orimatīragocarā. ^b^lahukā^eb^ti lahusabhāvā capalā. ^b^agarū dhamme^eb^ti saddhamme gāravarahitā. ^b^aññamaññamagāravā^eb^ti aññamaññasmiṃ appatissā, saṅghe sabrahmacārīsu ca garugāravavirahitā. ^b^bahū ādīnavā^eb^ti vuttappakārā, vakkhamānā ca bahū anekadosā antarāyā ^a^P3.0085^ea^. ^b^loke^eb^ti sattaloke. ^b^uppajjissantyanāgate^eb^ti anāgate pātu bhavissanti. ^b^sudesitaṃ imaṃ dhamma^eb^nti, sammāsambuddhena suṭṭhu aviparītaṃ ādikalyāṇādippakārena desitaṃ imaṃ āgamasaddhammaṃ. ^b^kilesissantī^eb^ti kiliṭṭhaṃ kilesadūsitaṃ karissanti, ``āpattiṃ `anāpattī'ti garukāpattiṃ `lahukāpattī'''tiādinā ^a^M2.0363^ea^ duccaritasaṃkilesena asaddhammena saṇhasukhumaṃ rūpārūpadhammaṃ paṭikkhipissanti, diṭṭhisaṃkilesena ubhayatrāpi taṇhāsaṃkilesena saṃkilesissanti malinaṃ karissanti. ^b^dummatī^eb^ti nippaññā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``bhavissanti, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anāgatamaddhānaṃ...pe0... abhidhammakathaṃ vedallakathaṃ kathentā kaṇhadhammaṃ okkamamānā na bujjhissantī''ti (a0 ni0 5.79).

[03] ^b^guṇahīnā^eb^ti sīlādiguṇavirahitā dussīlā, alajjino ca. atha vā ^b^guṇahīnā^eb^ti vinayavārittādiguṇena hīnā dhammavinaye appakataññuno. ^b^saṅghamhī^eb^ti saṅghamajjhe. ^b^voharantā^eb^ti kathentā, saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya yaṃkiñci bhaṇantā. ^b^visāradā^eb^ti nibbhayā pagabbhā. ^b^balavanto^eb^ti pakkhabalena balavanto. ^b^mukharā^eb^ti mukhakharā kharavādino. ^b^assutāvino^eb^ti na sutavanto, kevalaṃ lābhasakkārasilokasannissayena guṇadharā hutvā ``dhammaṃ `adhammo'ti, adhammañca `dhammo'ti, vinayaṃ `avinayo'ti, avinayañca `vinayo'''ti evaṃ attanā yathicchitamatthaṃ saṅghamajjhe patiṭṭhapentā balavanto bhavissanti.

[03] ^b^guṇavanto^eb^ti sīlādiguṇasampannā. ^b^voharantā yathātthato^eb^ti atthānurūpaṃ, aviparītatthaṃ ``dhammaṃ `dhammo'ti, adhammaṃ `adhammo'ti, vinayaṃ `vinayo'ti avinayaṃ `avinayo'''ti evaṃ dīpentā. ^b^dubbalā te bhavissantī^eb^ti parisāyaṃ alajjussannatāya balavirahitā te bhavissanti, tesaṃ vacanaṃ na tiṭṭhissati. ^b^hirīmanā anatthikā^eb^ti hirīmanto kenaci anatthikā. te hi dhammena vattuṃ samatthāpi ^a^V2.0309^ea^ pāpajigucchatāya appakiccatāya ca kehici virodhaṃ akarontā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na vāyamantā diṭṭhāvikammaṃ vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vā akatvā tuṇhī honti.

[03] ^b^rajata^eb^nti rūpiyaṃ, tena kahāpaṇalohamāsakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^jātarūpa^eb^nti suvaṇṇaṃ, tena maṇimuttādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. vā-saddo samuccayattho ``apadā vā''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 4.34; 5.32; itivu0 90) viya. ``rajatajātarūpañcā''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^khetta^eb^nti yattha pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ ruhati, taṃ khettaṃ. tadatthaṃ akatabhūmibhāgo vatthu. ^b^ajeḷaka^eb^nti eḷakā nāma ajāyeva, te ṭhapetvā avasesā pasujātī ajā nāma. ajeḷakaggahaṇeneva hettha gomahiṃsādīnampi saṅgaho kato. ^b^dāsidāsañcā^eb^ti dāsiyo ca dāse ^a^M2.0364^ea^ ca. ^b^dummedhā^eb^ti aviddasuno ^a^P3.0086^ea^, kappiyākappiyaṃ sāruppāsāruppaṃ ajānantā attano atthāya ^b^sādiyissanti^eb^ sampaṭicchissanti.

[03] ^b^ujjhānasaññino^eb^ti pare heṭṭhato katvā olokanacittā, anujjhāyitabbaṭṭhānepi vā ujjhānasīlā. ^b^bālā^eb^ti duccintitacintanādinā bālalakkhaṇena samannāgatā, tato eva ^b^sīlesu asamāhitā^eb^ catupārisuddhisīlesu na samāhitacittā. ^b^unnaḷā^eb^ti, samussitatucchamānā. ^b^vicarissantī^eb^ti mānaddhajaṃ ukkhipitvā vicarissanti. ^b^kalahābhiratā magā^eb^ti sārambhabahulatāya karaṇuttariyapasutā kalahe eva abhiratā magasadisā migā viya attahitāpekkhā ghāsesanābhiratā dubbalavihesaparāti attho.

[03] ^b^uddhatā^eb^ti uddhaccena samannāgatā cittekaggatārahitā. ^b^nīlacīvarapārutā^eb^ti akappiyarajanarattena nīlavaṇṇena cīvarena pārutā, tādisaṃ cīvaraṃ nivāsetvā ceva pārupitvā ca vicaraṇakā. ^b^kuhā^eb^ti sāmantajappanādinā kuhanavatthunā kuhakā, asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya kohaññaṃ katvā paresaṃ vimhāpayā. ^b^thaddhā^eb^ti kodhena mānena ca thaddhamānasā kakkhaḷahadayā. ^b^lapā^eb^ti lapanakā kuhanavuttikā, pasannamānasehi manussehi ``kena, bhante, ayyassa attho''ti paccayadāyakānaṃ vadāpanakā, payuttavācāvasena, nippesikatāvasena ca paccayatthaṃ lapakāti vā attho. ^b^siṅgī^eb^ti ``tattha katamaṃ siṅgaṃ? yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā cāturiyaṃ parikkhatatā pārikkhatiya''nti (vibha0 852) evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi samannāgatā, siṅgāracaritāti attho. ^b^``ariyā viyā''^eb^ti idaṃ ``kuhā''ti etasseva atthadassanaṃ. kuhakānañhi ariyānamiva ṭhitabhāvaṃ dassento ariyā viya vicarantīti āha.

[03] ^b^telasaṇṭhehī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0310^ea^ sitthakatelena vā udakatelena vā osaṇṭhitehi. ^b^capalā^eb^ti kāyamaṇḍanaparikkhāramaṇḍanādinā cāpallena yuttā. ^b^añjanakkhikā^eb^ti alaṅkārañjanena añjitanettā. ^b^rathiyāya gamissantī^eb^ti bhikkhācariyāya kulūpasaṅkamanāpadesehi, mahāracchāya ito cito ca paribbhamissanti. ^b^dantavaṇṇikapārutā^eb^ti dantavaṇṇarattena cīvarena pārutasarīrā.

[03] ^b^ajeguccha^eb^nti ^a^M2.0365^ea^ ajigucchitabbaṃ. ^b^vimuttehī^eb^ti ariyehi. ^b^suratta^eb^nti kappiyarajanena suṭṭhu rattaṃ, arahantānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ciṇṇatāya arahaddhajaṃ jigucchissanti kāsāvaṃ. kasmā? ^b^odātesu samucchitā^eb^ gedhaṃ āpannā. dantavaṇṇapārupanassa hi idaṃ ^a^P3.0087^ea^ kāraṇavacanaṃ. te hi setakaṃ sambhāventā ``sabbena sabbaṃ setake gahite liṅgapariccāgo eva siyā''ti dantavaṇṇaṃ pārupanti.

[03] ^b^lābhakāmā^eb^ti lābhagiddhā. bhikkhācariyāsupi kosajjayogato ^b^kusītā^eb^. samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ cittassa ussāhābhāvena ^b^hīnavīriyā. kicchantā^eb^ti, kilamantā, vanapatthesu vasituṃ kicchantā kilantacittāti attho. ^b^gāmantesū^eb^ti gāmantasenāsanesu gāmasamīpesu senāsanesu, gāmadvāresu vā senāsanesu. ^b^vasissare^eb^ti vasissanti.

[03] ^b^te teva anusikkhantā^eb^ti ye ye micchājīvappayogena laddhalābhā, te te eva puggale anusikkhantā bhamissanti. ^b^bhamissantī^eb^ti sayampi te viya micchājīvena lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ rājakulādīni sevantā paribbhamissanti. ^b^``bhajissantī''^eb^ti vā pāṭho, sevissantīti attho. ^b^asaṃyatā^eb^ti sīlasaṃyamarahitā.

[03] ^b^ye ye alābhino lābha^eb^nti ye ye bhikkhū micchājīvaparivajjanena appapuññatāya ca lābhassa paccayassa na lābhino, te ^b^pujjā^eb^ pūjanīyā pāsaṃsā ^b^tadā^eb^ anāgate kāle na bhavissanti. ^b^supesalepi te dhīre^eb^ti dhitisampannatāya dhīre suṭṭhu pesalepi te bhikkhū na sevissanti, tadā anāgate te lābhino lābhakāmāva bhikkhūti attho.

[03] ^b^milakkhurajanaṃ ratta^eb^nti kālakacchakarajanena rattaṃ. samāsapadañhetaṃ, gāthāsukhatthaṃ sānunāsikaniddeso. ^b^garahantā sakaṃ dhaja^eb^nti attano dhajabhūtaṃ kāsāvaṃ jigucchantā. sāsane pabbajitānañhi kāsāvo dhajo nāma. ^b^titthiyānaṃ dhajaṃ kecī^eb^ti keci sakyaputtiyabhāvaṃ paṭijānantā eva titthiyānaṃ setavatthikānaṃ dhajabhūtaṃ avadātakaṃ setavatthaṃ dhāressanti.

[03] ^b^agāravo^eb^ ^a^V2.0311^ea^ ^b^ca kāsāve^eb^ti arahaddhajabhūte kāsāve agāravo abahumānaṃ tadā anāgate tesaṃ bhavissati. ^b^paṭisaṅkhā ca kāsāve^eb^ti ``paṭisaṅkhā ^a^M2.0366^ea^ yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevāmī''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58) nayena paccavekkhaṇamattampi kāsāvaparibhoge na bhavissati.

[03] kāsāvaṃ dhārentena kāsāvaṃ bahumānena ``duccaritato oramitabba''nti kāsāvassa garukātabbabhāve chaddantajātakamudāharanto ^b^``abhibhūtassa dukkhenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sallaviddhassā^eb^ti puthunā savisena sallena viddhassa, tato eva mahatā dukkhena abhibhūtassa. ^b^ruppato^eb^ti sarīravikāraṃ āpajjato. ^b^mahāghorā^eb^ti sarīrajīvitesu nirapekkhatāya bhimmā garutarā paṭisaṅkhā aññehi ^b^acintiyā^eb^ cintāmattena pavattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyā chaddantamahānāgassa^b^āsi,^eb^ ahosi. chaddantanāgarājakāle hi bodhisatto soṇuttarena nāma nesādena paṭicchannaṭṭhāne ^a^P3.0088^ea^ ṭhatvā visapītena sallena viddho mahatā dukkhena abhibhūto taṃ gahetvā paridahitaṃ kāsāvaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ ariyaddhajena paṭicchanno, na mayā hiṃsitabbo''ti tattha mettacittameva paccupaṭṭhapetvā uparidhammaṃ desesi. yathāha --

[03] imamatthaṃ dassento thero ^b^``chaddanto hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^surattaṃ arahaddhaja^eb^nti soṇuttarena paridahitakāsāvaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^abhaṇī^eb^ti abhāsi. ^b^gāthā^eb^ti gāthāyo. ^b^gajo^eb^ti chaddanto nāgarājā. ^b^atthopasaṃhitā^eb^ti atthasannissitā hitā, hitayuttāti attho.

[03] chaddantanāgarājena vuttagāthāsu ^b^anikkasāvo^eb^ti rāgādīhi kasāvehi kasāvo, ^b^paridahissatī^eb^ti nivāsanapārupanāttharaṇavasena paribhuñjissati. ``paridhassatī''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^apeto damasaccenā^eb^ti indriyadamena ceva paramatthasaccapakkhikena vacīsaccena ca apeto, viyutto pariccattoti attho. ^b^na so^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo kāsāvaṃ paridahituṃ nārahati.

[03] ^b^vantakasāvassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0367^ea^ ^a^V2.0312^ea^ catūhi maggehi vantakasāvo chaḍḍitakasāvo pahīnakasāvo assa bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^sīlesū^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlesu. ^b^susamāhito^eb^ti suṭṭhu samāhito. ^b^upeto^eb^ti indriyadamena ceva vuttappakārena saccena ca upagato samannāgato. ^b^sa ve^eb^ti so evarūpo puggalo taṃ gandhakāsāvavatthaṃ ekantena arahatīti attho.

[03] ^b^vipannasīlo^eb^ti bhinnasīlo. ^b^dummedho^eb^ti nippañño sīlavisodhanapaññāya virahito. ^b^pākaṭo^eb^ti ``dussīlo aya''nti pākaṭo pakāso, vikkhittindriyatāya vā ^b^pākaṭo^eb^ pākaṭindriyoti attho. ^b^kāmakāriyo^eb^ti bhinnasaṃvaratāya yathicchitakārako, kāmassa vā mārassa yathākāmakaraṇīyo. ^b^vibbhantacitto^eb^ti rūpādīsu visayesu vikkhittacitto. ^b^nissukko^eb^ti asukko sukkadhammarahito hirottappavivajjito, kusaladhammasampādanaussukkarahito vā.
[03] ^b^kāsāvaṃ kiṃ karissatī^eb^ti yassa sīlaṃ natthi, tassa kāsāvaṃ kiṃ nāma payojanaṃ sādhessati, cittakatasadisaṃ tassa pabbajitaliṅganti attho.

[03] ^b^duṭṭhacittā^eb^ti ^a^P3.0089^ea^ rāgādidosehi dūsitacittā. ^b^anādarā^eb^ti satthari dhamme aññamaññañca ādararahitā agāravā. ^b^tādīnaṃ mettacittāna^eb^nti mettābhāvanāya sampayuttahadaye teneva arahattādhigamena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvappatte uḷāraguṇe. upayogatthe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^niggaṇhissantī^eb^ti ``sīlādisampanne disvā te sambhāventā vipannasīle amhe na bahuṃ maññissantī''ti attani agāravabhayena yathā te ubbāḷhā pakkamissanti, tathā bādhissantīti attho.

[03] ^b^sikkhāpentāpī^eb^ti sikkhāpiyamānāpi. kammatthe hi ayaṃ kattuniddeso. ^b^therehī^eb^ti attano ācariyupajjhāyehi. ^b^cīvaradhāraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ samaṇapaṭipattiyā nidassanamattaṃ, tasmā ``evaṃ te abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ te paṭikkamitabba''ntiādinā ^a^M2.0368^ea^ (a0 ni0 4.122) sikkhāpiyamānāpīti attho. ^b^na suṇissantī^eb^ti ovādaṃ na gaṇhissanti.

[03] ^b^te tathā sikkhitā bālā^eb^ti te andhabālā ācariyupajjhāyehi sikkhāpiyamānāpi anādaratāya ^a^V2.0313^ea^ asikkhitāti. ^b^nādiyissantupajjhāye^eb^ti upajjhāye ācariye ca ādaraṃ na karonti, tesaṃ anusāsaniyaṃ na tiṭṭhanti. yathā kiṃ? ^b^khaḷuṅko viya sārathiṃ^eb^ yathā khaḷuṅko duṭṭhasso assadamakaṃ nādiyati na tassa upadese tiṭṭhati, evaṃ tepi upajjhāyācariye na bhāyanti na sārajjantīti attho.

[03] ^b^``eva''^eb^ntiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ. tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena. ^b^anāgataddhāna^eb^nti anāgatamaddhānaṃ, anāgate kāleti attho. taṃyeva sarūpato dassento ^b^``patte kālamhi pacchime''^eb^ti āha. tattha katamo pacchimakālo? ``tatiyasaṅgītito paṭṭhāya pacchimakālo''ti keci, taṃ eke nānujānanti. sāsanassa hi pañcayugāni vimuttiyugaṃ, samādhiyugaṃ, sīlayugaṃ, sutayugaṃ, dānayuganti. tesu paṭhamaṃ vimuttiyugaṃ, tasmiṃ antarahite samādhiyugaṃ vattati, tasmimpi antarahite sīlayugaṃ vattati, tasmimpi antarahite sutayugaṃ vattateva. aparisuddhasīlo hi ekadesena pariyattibāhusaccaṃ paggayha tiṭṭhati lābhādikāmatāya. yadā pana mātikāpariyosānā pariyatti sabbaso antaradhāyati, tato paṭṭhāya liṅgamattameva avasissati, tadā yathā tathā dhanaṃ saṃharitvā dānamukhena vissajjenti, sā kira nesaṃ carimā sammāpaṭipatti. tattha sutayugato paṭṭhāya pacchimakālo, ``sīlayugato paṭṭhāyā''ti apare.

[03] evaṃ thero pacchime kāle uppajjanakaṃ mahābhayaṃ dassetvā puna tattha sannipatitabhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ dadanto ^b^``purā āgacchate''^eb^tiādinā tisso gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^purā āgacchate eta^eb^nti etaṃ mayā tumhākaṃ vuttaṃ paṭipattiantarāyakaraṃ anāgataṃ mahābhayaṃ āgacchati purā, yāva āgamissati, tāvadevāti attho. ^b^subbacā^eb^ti vacanakkhamā sovacassakārakehi dhammehi ^a^P3.0090^ea^ samannāgatā, garūnaṃ anusāsaniyo padakkhiṇaggāhino hothāti attho. ^b^sakhilā^eb^ti muduhadayā.

[03] ^b^mettacittā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0369^ea^ sabbasattesu hitūpasaṃhāralakkhaṇāya mettāya sampayuttacittā. ^b^kāruṇikā^eb^ti karuṇāya niyuttā paresaṃ dukkhāpanayanākāravuttiyā karuṇāya samannāgatā. ^b^āraddhavīriyā^eb^ti akusalānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyā. ^b^pahitattā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ paṭipesitacittā. ^b^nicca^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ. ^b^daḷhaparakkamā^eb^ti thiravīriyā.
[03] ^b^pamāda^eb^nti pamajjanaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ananuṭṭhānaṃ, akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossaggo. vuttañhi --

[02] ``tattha ^a^V2.0314^ea^ katamo pamādo? kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppadānaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā''tiādi (vibha0 930).

[03] ^b^appamāda^eb^nti appamajjanaṃ, so pamādassa paṭipakkhato veditabbo. atthato hi appamādo nāma satiyā avippavāso, upaṭṭhitāya satiyā eva cetaṃ nāmaṃ. ayañhettha attho -- yasmā pamādamūlakā sabbe anatthā, appamādamūlakā ca sabbe atthā, tasmā pamādaṃ ^b^bhayato^eb^ upaddavato disvā appamādañca ^b^khemato^eb^ anupaddavato disvā appamādapaṭipattiyā sikhābhūtaṃ sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena ^b^aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ^eb^ ariyamaggaṃ ^b^bhāvetha, amataṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^phusantā^eb^ sacchikarontā attano santāne uppādetha, dassanamaggamatte aṭṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha, evaṃ vo appamādabhāvanā sikhāpattā bhavissatīti.
[03] evaṃ thero sampattaparisaṃ ovadati. imā eva cimassa therassa aññābyākaraṇagāthā ahesunti.

[03] ^b^yathācārī^eb^ ^a^M2.0370^ea^ ^b^yathāsato^eb^tiādikā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa gāthā. tassa āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa ca vatthu evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- atīte ito satasahassakappādhike asaṅkhyeyyamatthake āyasmā sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena ^b^saradamāṇavo^eb^ nāma ahosi. mahāmoggallāno gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatti, nāmena ^b^sirivaḍḍhakuṭumbiko^eb^ nāma ahosi. te ubhopi sahapaṃsukīḷakasahāyā ahesuṃ. tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ ^a^P3.0091^ea^ dhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi -- ``imesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma ekantikaṃ, tasmā mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagantvā mokkhamaggo gavesitabbo''ti sahāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, samma, ahaṃ pabbajitukāmo, kiṃ tvaṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī''ti vatvā tena ``na sakkhissāmī''ti vutte ``hotu ahameva pabbajissāmī''ti ratanakoṭṭhāgārāni vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0315^ea^ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. tassa pabbajjaṃ anupabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā brāhmaṇaputtā ahesuṃ. so pañca abhiññāyo aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. tepi sabbe pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.

[03] tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko satte saṃsāramahoghato tāretvā ekadivasaṃ ``saradatāpasassa ca antevāsikānañca saṅgahaṃ karissāmī''ti eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya ākāsena gantvā ``buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū''ti tāpasassa passantasseva ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi. saradatāpaso satthu sarīre mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni upadhāretvā ``sabbaññubuddhoyevāya''nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. saradatāpaso satthu santike ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

[03] tasmiṃ samaye tassa antevāsikā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā āgatā satthāraṃ disvā ^a^M2.0371^ea^ sañjātappasādā attano ācariyassa ca satthu ca nisinnākāraṃ oloketvā, ``ācariya, mayaṃ pubbe `tumhehi mahantataro koci natthī'ti vicarāma, ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe''ti āhaṃsu. ``kiṃ vadetha, tātā? sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha? sabbaññubuddhena maṃ tulyaṃ mā karitthā''ti. atha te tāpasā ācariyassa vacanaṃ sutvā ``yāva mahā vatāyaṃ purisuttamo''ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.

[03] atha te ācariyo āha -- ``tātā, satthu anucchaviko no deyyadhammo natthi, satthā ca bhikkhācāravelāya idhāgato, handa mayaṃ deyyadhammaṃ yathābalaṃ dassāma. tumhehi yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ ābhataṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā''ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. satthārā ca phalāphale paṭiggaṇhitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. tato bhojanakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā satthari nisinne sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi. satthā ^a^P3.0092^ea^ ``dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū''ti cintesi. te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā tāvadeva satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā aggasāvakā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] tato ^a^V2.0316^ea^ saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi -- ``tātā, satthu bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pupphāsanena pūjā kātabbā, tasmā pupphāni āharathā''ti. te tāvadeva iddhiyā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhassa yojanappamāṇaṃ pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ, ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ, saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ paññāpesuṃ. evaṃ tesaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito -- ``bhante, mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā''ti āha. nisīdi bhagavā pupphāsane. satthari nisinne dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu. satthā ``tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū''ti nirodhaṃ samāpajji. satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi nirodhaṃ samāpajjiṃsu. tāpaso ^a^M2.0372^ea^ sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārento aṭṭhāsi. itare pana vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] satthā sattāhassa accayena nirodhato vuṭṭhāya aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī''ti. thero sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā tesaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ akāsi. tassa desanāvasāne satthā dutiyaṃ aggasāvakaṃ anomattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``tvampi imesaṃ dhammaṃ desehī''ti. sopi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ kathesi. dvinnampi desanāya ekassapi dhammābhisamayo nāhosi. atha satthā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. desanāvasāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ avasesā sabbepi catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. satthā ``etha, bhikkhavo''ti hatthaṃ pasāresi. te tāvadeva antarahitatāpasavesā aṭṭhaparikkhāravaradharā saṭṭhivassikattherā viya ahesuṃ.

[03] saradatāpaso pana ``aho vatāhampi ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya''nti satthu desanākāle uppannaparivitakkatāya aññavihito hutvā maggaphalāni paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi. atha tathāgataṃ vanditvā tathā paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā -- ``ito tvaṃ kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvako sāriputto nāma bhavissasī''ti byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.

[03] saradatāpasopi ^a^P3.0093^ea^ sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhassa santikaṃ gantvā, samma, mayā anomadassissa ^a^V2.0317^ea^ bhagavato pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamassa nāma sammāsambuddhassa aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ, tvampi tassa dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehīti.

[03] sirivaḍḍho taṃ upadesaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā bhikkhūnampi āsanāni paññāpetvā ^a^M2.0373^ea^ mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā, saradatāpasena satthāraṃ nimantāpetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā, buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mahārahehi vatthehi acchādetvā, dutiyasāvakabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ akāsi. satthāpissa anantarāyena samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā vuttanayena byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi. sirivaḍḍho haṭṭhapahaṭṭho yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā dutiyacittavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatti.

[03] tato paṭṭhāya nesaṃ ubhinnampi antarākammaṃ na kathitaṃ. amhākaṃ pana bhagavato uppattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahassa avidūre upatissagāme rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. taṃdivasamevassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggaliyā brāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva. tesaṃ dvinnaṃ ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāramadaṃsu. dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhāpesuṃ, nāmaggahaṇadivase rūpasāribrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā ^b^upatisso^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā ^b^kolito^eb^ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. te ubhopi mahatā parivārena vaḍḍhantā vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.

[03] athekadivasaṃ te rājagahe giraggasamajjaṃ passantā mahājanaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ñāṇassa paripākagatattā yoniso ummujjantā ``sabbepime oraṃ vassasatānaṃ maccumukhe patissantī''ti saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhitvā ``amhehi mokkhadhammo pariyesitabbo, tañca pariyesantehi ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti nicchayaṃ katvā pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa paribbājakassa santike pabbajiṃsu. tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi ^a^P3.0094^ea^. te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ adisvā tato nikkhamitvā tattha tattha te te paṇḍitasammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe pañhaṃ pucchanti, te tehi ^a^M2.0374^ea^ puṭṭhā neva ^a^V2.0318^ea^ sampāyanti, aññadatthu teyeva tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. evaṃ te mokkhaṃ pariyesantā katikaṃ akaṃsu -- ``amhesu yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so itarassa ārocetū''ti.

[03] tena ca samayena amhākaṃ satthari paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena uruvelakassapādike sahassajaṭile dametvā rājagahe viharante ekadivasaṃ upatisso paribbājako paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto āyasmantaṃ assajittheraṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā ``na mayā evarūpo ākappasampanno pabbajito diṭṭhapubbo, santadhammena nāma ettha bhavitabba''nti sañjātappasādo pañhaṃ pucchituṃ āyasmantaṃ udikkhanto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi. theropi laddhapiṇḍapāto paribhuñjituṃ patirūpaṃ okāsaṃ gato. paribbājako attano paribbājakapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. bhattakiccapariyosāne cassa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi.

[03] evaṃ so ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ``ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī''ti pucchi. thero sammāsambuddhaṃ apadisi. puna tena ``kiṃvādī panāyasmato satthā''ti puṭṭho ``imassa sāsanassa gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī''ti attano navakabhāvaṃ pavedetvā saṅkhepavasena cassa sāsanadhammaṃ kathento ``ye dhammā hetuppabhavā''ti (mahāva0 60; apa0 thera 1.1.286; peṭako0 9) gāthamāha. paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi, itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle niṭṭhāsi. gāthāpariyosāne pana sotāpanno hutvā upari visese appavattente ``bhavissati ettha kāraṇa''nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha -- ``mā, bhante, upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva hotu, kahaṃ amhākaṃ satthā vasatī''ti? ``veḷuvane''ti. ``bhante, tumhe purato gacchatha, ahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyakassa katapaṭiññaṃ mocetvā taṃ gahetvā āgamissāmī''ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ^a^M2.0375^ea^ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.

[03] kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā ``mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya, addhānena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī''ti tenevassa visesādhigamaṃ sambhāvetvā amatādhigamaṃ pucchi. sopissa ``āmāvuso, amataṃ adhigata''nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. gāthāpariyosāne kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā ^a^P3.0095^ea^ āha -- ``kahaṃ no satthā''ti? ``veḷuvane''ti. ``tena hi, āvuso, āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmā''ti. upatisso ^a^V2.0319^ea^ sabbakālampi ācariyapūjakova, tasmā sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā satthu guṇe pakāsetvā tampi satthu santikaṃ netukāmo ahosi. so lābhāsāpakato antevāsikabhāvaṃ anicchanto ``na sakkomi cāṭi hutvā udakasiñcanaṃ hotu''nti paṭikkhipi. te anekehi kāraṇehi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānehi aḍḍhateyyasatehi antevāsikehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu. satthā te dūratova āgacchante disvā ``etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga''nti vatvā tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammaṃ desetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena upasampadaṃ adāsi. yathā tesaṃ, evaṃ aggasāvakānampi iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ āgatameva. uparimaggattayakiccaṃ pana na niṭṭhāti. kasmā? sāvakapāramīñāṇassa mahantatāya.

[03] tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāme samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ (a0 ni0 7.61) suṇanto eva uparimaggattayaṃ adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. āyasmā sāriputto pabbajitadivasato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ rājagahe sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante (ma0 ni0 2.201 ādayo) desiyamāne desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ^a^M2.0376^ea^ matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. iti dvinnampi aggasāvakānaṃ satthu samīpe eva sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.141-374) --
[22] aṅkolā bimbijālā ca, pupphitā mama assame..
[22] aññe opupphā padumā, pupphitā taḷāke tadā..
[22] saṃgulā maggurā ceva, vasanti taḷāke tadā..
[22] oguhā ajagarā ca, vasanti taḷāke tadā..
[22] dindibhā suvapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] pampakā jīvaṃjīvā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] mahākāḷā ca sakuṇā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[21] ``pasadā ca varāhā ca, camarā gaṇḍakā bahū.
[22] rohiccā sukapotā ca, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] cetā ca luddakā ceva, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] kolā bhallātakā billā, phalāni dhārayanti te..
[22] jīvakā sutakā ceva, bahukā mama assame..
[22] sukate assame ramme, viharāmi ahaṃ tadā..
[22] sabbe maṃ brāhmaṇā ete, jātimanto yasassino..
[22] asaṃsaṭṭhā ca te dhīrā, mama sissā durāsadā..
[22] vītināmenti te rattiṃ, mama sissā durāsadā..
[22] mohanīye na muyhanti, mama sissā durāsadā..
[21] ``purato pesenti khāriṃ, pacchato ca vajanti te.
[22] anattukkaṃsakā sabbe, na te vambhenti kassaci..
[22] kumbhaṇḍā dānavā garuḷā, upajīvanti taṃ saraṃ..
[22] vasāmi assame tattha, jhāyī jhānarato ahaṃ..
[21] ``rattindivaṃ na jānāmi, arati me na vijjati.
[22] sake sisse ovadanto, bhiyyo hāsaṃ labhāmahaṃ..
[22] buddho nu kho na vā buddho, handa passāmi cakkhumaṃ..
[22] taṃ ñāṇaṃ kittayissāmi, suṇātha mama bhāsato..
[21] ``tuvaṃ satthā ca ketu ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ.
[22] parāyaṇo patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā dharetave..
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[21] ``tāva accuggato neru, āyato vitthato ca so.
[22] na tveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave..
[22] ye keci udake pāṇā, antojālīkatā siyuṃ..
[21] ``ko nu kho bhagavā hetu, sitakammassa satthuno.
[22] na hi buddhā ahetūhi, sitaṃ pātukaronti te..
[21] ``hatthī ^a^M2.0384^ea^ assā rathā pattī, senā ca caturaṅginī.
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] yassāhaṃ kāraṃ katvāna, sabbattha pāramiṃ gato..
[21] ``aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dasseti me idha.
[22] vicinaṃ titthiye sabbe, esāhaṃ saṃsariṃ bhave..
[22] ye keci buddhimā sattā, sujjhanti jinasāsane..
[22] na tattha sāraṃ vindeyya, sārena rittako hi so..
[22] brāhmaṇo sañcayo nāma, tassa mūle vasāmahaṃ..
[22] so me puṭṭho kathessati, paṭipucchāmahaṃ tadā..
[22] kathaṃ gottosi tvaṃ vīra, kassa sissosi mārisa..
[22] buddho loke samuppanno, tassa sissomhi āvuso..
[22] buddhassa sāsanaṃ dhammaṃ, sādhu me kathayassu bho..
[21] ``so me puṭṭho kathī sabbaṃ, gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ padaṃ.
[21] ``ye dhammā hetuppabhavā, tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āha.
[22] so me attho anuppatto, kālo me nappamajjituṃ..
[22] paññāya sadiso natthi, tava puttassa cakkhuma..
[22] uttame damathe dantā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] anāgāmī ca arahā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] sāvakā te bahū sabbe, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] paññāya pāramiṃ pattā, parivārenti taṃ sadā..
[22] sāsane te patiṭṭhāya, labhanti amataṃ phalaṃ..
[22] gaṅgā ca yamunā ceva, sarabhū ca atho mahī..
[22] ete sabbe atikkamma, jalasi sabbadā tuvaṃ..
[22] sabbā velaṃva phusanti, sañcuṇṇā vikiranti tā..
[22] dhammaṃ vāditukāmā te, nātivattanti taṃ muniṃ..
[22] na so limpati toyena, parisuddho hi kesarī..
[22] nātikkamanti taṃ māsaṃ, samayo pupphanāya so..
[22] tevijjā chaḷabhiññā ca, iddhiyā pāramiṃ gatā..
[22] tathā hi jātimā eso, pasū tāseti sabbadā..
[22] kākā senāva vibbhantā, migaraññā yathā migā..
[21] ``na hevaṃ tvaṃ mahāvīra, dhammaṃ desesi pāṇinaṃ.
[22] ekaṃ pañhaṃ kathentova, vimatiṃ chindasi pāṇinaṃ..
[21] ``yathā sakena thāmena, kittito hi mayā jino.
[21] ``sace ^a^M2.0392^ea^ hi koci devo vā, manusso vā susikkhito.
[21] ``aparimeyye kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
[21] ``yo koci manujo bhāraṃ, dhāreyya matthake sadā.
[22] bhārena dukkhito assa, bhārehi bharito tathā..
[21] ``oropito ca me bhāro, bhavā ugghāṭitā mayā.
[22] ahaṃ aggomhi paññāya, sadiso me na vijjati..
[22] kathesi sāsanaṃ mayhaṃ, nirodho sayanaṃ mama..
[22] lokanāthaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sadiso me na vijjati..
[21] ``yadi rūpinī bhaveyya, paññā me vasumatīpi na sameyya.
[22] appicchā hotha santuṭṭhā, jhāyī jhānaratā sadā..
[22] so me ācariyo dhīro, assaji nāma sāvako..
[21] ``yo me ācariyo āsi, assaji nāma sāvako.

[03] aparabhāge pana satthā jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno attano sāvake tena tena guṇavisesena etadagge ṭhapento -- ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto''ti ^a^M2.0394^ea^ (a0 ni0 1.188-189) theraṃ mahāpaññabhāvena etadagge ṭhapesi. so evaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahitvā sattahitaṃ karonto ekadivasaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ ^a^P3.0096^ea^ attano cariyavibhāvanamukhena aññaṃ byākaronto --
[22] ajjhattarato samāhitatto, eko santusito tamāhu bhikkhuṃ..
[21] ``allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā bhuñjanto, na bāḷhaṃ suhito siyā.
[22] ubhayantarena nāhosi, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā..
[22] appassuto anādaro, kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā..
[21] ``gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale.
[22] tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo..
[22] satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo..
[22] taṃ me amoghaṃ savanaṃ, vimuttomhi anāsavo..
[22] evaṃ mohakkhayā bhikkhu, pabbatova na vedhati..
[21] ``ubhayena ^a^V2.0336^ea^ midaṃ maraṇameva, nāmaraṇaṃ pacchā vā pure vā.
[22] paṭipajjatha mā vinassatha, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā..
[27] evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā.
[21] ``na vissase ekatiyesu evaṃ, agārisu pabbajitesu cāpi.
[22] sādhūpi hutvāna asādhu honti, asādhu hutvā puna sādhu honti..
[25] imā gāthā abhāsi. imā hi kāci gāthā therena bhāsitā, kāci theraṃ ārabbha bhagavatā bhāsitā, sabbā pacchā attano cariyapavedanavasena therena bhāsitattā therasseva gāthā ahesuṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0337^ea^ ^b^yathācārī^eb^ti yathā kāyādīhi saṃyato, saṃvuto hutvā carati viharati, yathācaraṇasīloti vā yathācārī, sīlasampannoti attho. ^b^yathāsato^eb^ti yathāsanto. gāthāsukhatthañhi anunāsikalopaṃ katvā niddeso kato, santo viya, ariyehi nibbisesoti attho. ^b^satīmā^eb^ti paramāya satiyā samannāgato. ^b^yatasaṅkappajjhāyī^eb^ti sabbaso micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena saṃyatasaṅkappo hutvā ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanasīlo. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva yathācāribhāve yatasaṅkappo hutvā jhāyanena ca pamādarahito sabbattha suppatiṭṭhitasatisampajañño. ^b^ajjhattarato^eb^ti gocarajjhatte kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya abhirato. ^b^samāhitatto^eb^ti tāya eva bhāvanāya ekaggacitto. ^b^eko^eb^ti asahāyo gaṇasaṃsaggaṃ, kilesasaṃsaggañca pahāya kāyavivekaṃ, cittavivekañca paribrūhayanto. ^b^santusito^eb^ti paccayasantosena ca bhāvanārāmasantosena ca sammadeva tusito tuṭṭho. bhāvanāya hi uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantiyā uḷāraṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati, matthakaṃ pattāya pana vattabbameva natthi. ^b^tamāhu^eb^ ^a^P3.0099^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^nti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ sikkhattayapāripūriyā bhayaṃ ikkhanatāya bhinnakilesatāya ca bhikkhūti vadanti.

[03] idāni ^a^M2.0398^ea^ yathāvuttasantosadvaye paccayasantosaṃ tāva dassento ^b^``allaṃ sukkhaṃ vā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^alla^eb^nti sappiādiupasekena tintaṃ siniddhaṃ. ^b^sukkha^eb^nti tadabhāvena lūkhaṃ. ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho, allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vāti. ^b^bāḷha^eb^nti ativiya. ^b^suhito^eb^ti dhāto na siyāti attho. kathaṃ pana siyāti āha ^b^``ūnūdaro mitāhāro''^eb^ti paṇītaṃ lūkhaṃ vāpi bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto bhikkhu yāvadatthaṃ abhuñjitvā ūnūdaro sallahukudaro, tato eva mitāhāro parimitabhojano aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āharanto tattha mattaññutāya paccavekkhaṇasatiyā ca ^b^sato^eb^ hutvā ^b^paribbaje^eb^ vihareyya.

[03] yathā pana ūnūdaro mitāhāro ca nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``cattāro''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^abhutvā^eb^ti cattāro vā pañca vā ^b^ālope^eb^ kabaḷe abhuñjitvā tattakassa āhārassa okāsaṃ ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ piveyya. ayañhi āhāre sallahukavutti. nibbānañhi pesitacittassa bhikkhuno ^b^phāsuvihārāya^eb^ jhānādīnaṃ adhigamayogyatāya sukhavihārāya ^b^alaṃ^eb^ pariyattanti attho. iminā kucchiparihāriyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vadanto piṇḍapāte itarītarasantosaṃ dasseti. ``bhutvānā''ti vā pāṭho, so catupañcālopamattenāpi āhārena sarīraṃ yāpetuṃ samatthassa ativiya thirapakatikassa puggalassa vasena vutto siyā, uttaragāthāhipi saṃsandati eva appakasseva cīvarassa senāsanassa ca vakkhamānattā.

[03] ^b^kappiya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0338^ea^ yaṃ kappiyakappiyānulomesu khomādīsu aññataranti attho. ^b^tañce chādetī^eb^ti kappiyaṃ cīvaraṃ samānaṃ chādetabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ chādeti ce, satthārā anuññātajātiyaṃ santaṃ heṭṭhimantena anuññātapamāṇayuttaṃ ce hotīti attho. ^b^idamatthika^eb^nti idaṃ payojanatthaṃ satthārā vuttapayojanatthaṃ yāvadeva sītādipaṭighātanatthañceva hirīkopīnapaṭicchādanatthañcāti attho. etena kāyaparihāriyaṃ cīvaraṃ tattha itarītarasantosañca vadati.

[03] ^b^pallaṅkena nisinnassā^eb^ti pallaṅkaṃ vuccati samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ, tena nisinnassa, tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnassāti attho. ^b^jaṇṇuke^eb^ ^a^M2.0399^ea^ ^b^nābhivassatī^eb^ti yassaṃ kuṭiyaṃ tathā nisinnassa deve vassante jaṇṇukadvayaṃ vassodakena na temiyati, ettakampi sabbapariyantasenāsanaṃ ^a^P3.0100^ea^, sakkā hi tattha nisīditvā atthakāmarūpena kulaputtena sadatthaṃ nipphādetuṃ. tenāha ^b^``alaṃ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno''^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ thero imāhi catūhi gāthāhi ye te bhikkhū mahicchā asantuṭṭhā, tesaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ sallekhaovādaṃ pakāsetvā idāni vedanāmukhena bhāvanārāmasantosaṃ dassento ^b^``yo sukha''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sukha^eb^nti sukhavedanaṃ. ^b^dukkhato^eb^ti vipariṇāmadukkhato. ^b^addā^eb^ti addasa, vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya yathābhūtaṃ yo apassīti attho. sukhavedanā hi paribhogakāle assādiyamānāpi visamissaṃ viya bhojanaṃ vipariṇāmakāle dukkhāyeva hoti. tenettha dukkhānupassanaṃ dasseti. ^b^dukkhamaddakkhi sallato^eb^ti dukkhavedanaṃ yo sallanti passi. dukkhavedanā hi yathā sallaṃ sarīraṃ anupavisantampi anupavisitvā ṭhitampi uddhariyamānampi pīḷanameva janeti, evaṃ uppajjamānāpi ṭhitippattāpi bhijjamānāpi vibādhatiyevāti. etenettha dukkhānupassanaṃyeva ukkaṃsetvā vadati, tena ca ``yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.15) vacanato vedanādvaye attattaniyagāhaṃ viniveṭheti. ^b^ubhayantarenā^eb^ti ubhayesaṃ antare, sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ majjhabhūte adukkhamasukheti attho. ^b^nāhosī^eb^ti yathābhūtāvabodhane attattaniyābhinivesanaṃ ahosi. ^b^kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā^eb^ti evaṃ vedanāmukhena pañcapi upādānakkhandhe parijānitvā tappaṭibaddhaṃ sakalakilesajālaṃ samucchinditvā ṭhito kena nāma kilesena lokasmiṃ baddho, devatādīsu kiṃ vā āyati siyā, aññadatthu chinnabandhano apaññattikova siyāti adhippāyo.

[03] idāni micchāpaṭipanne puggale garahanto sammāpaṭipanne pasaṃsanto ^b^``mā me''^eb^tiādikā catasso gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^mā me kadāci pāpiccho^eb^ti yo asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya pāpiccho ^a^V2.0339^ea^, samaṇadhamme ussāhābhāvena ^b^kusīto,^eb^ tatoyeva ^b^hīnavīriyo,^eb^ saccapaṭiccasamuppādādipaṭisaṃyuttassa sutassa abhāvena ^b^appassuto,^eb^ ovādānusāsanīsu ādarābhāvena ^b^anādaro,^eb^ tādiso atihīnapuggalo mama ^a^M2.0400^ea^ santike kadācipi mā hotu. kasmā? ^b^kena lokasmi kiṃ siyā^eb^ti lokasmiṃ sattanikāye tassa tādisassa puggalassa kena ovādena kiṃ bhavitabbaṃ, kena vā katena kiṃ siyā, niratthakamevāti attho.

[03] ^b^bahussuto cā^eb^ti yo puggalo sīlādipaṭisaṃyuttassa suttageyyādibhedassa bahuno sutassa sambhavena bahussuto, dhammojapaññāya pārihāriyapaññāya paṭivedhapaññāya ca vasena ^b^medhāvī,^eb^ sīlesu ca suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitattā ^b^susamāhito, cetosamathaṃ^eb^ lokiyalokuttarabhedaṃ cittasamādhānaṃ ^a^P3.0101^ea^ ^b^anuyutto,^eb^ tādiso puggalo mayhaṃ matthakepi tiṭṭhatu, pageva sahavāso.

[03] ^b^yo papañcamanuyutto^eb^ti yo pana puggalo kammārāmatādivasena rūpābhisaṅgādivasena ca pavattiyā papañcanaṭṭhena taṇhādibhedaṃ papañcaṃ anuyutto, tattha ca anādīnavadassanena abhirato magasadiso, so nibbānaṃ virādhayi, so nibbānā suvidūravidūre ṭhito.

[03] ^b^yo ca papañcaṃ hitvānā^eb^ti yo pana puggalo taṇhāpapañcaṃ pahāya tadabhāvato nippapañcassa nibbānassa pathe adhigamupāye ariyamagge ^b^rato^eb^ bhāvanābhisamaye abhirato, so nibbānaṃ ^b^ārādhayi^eb^ sādhesi adhigacchīti attho.

[03] athekadivasaṃ thero attano kaniṭṭhabhātikassa revatattherassa kaṇṭakanicitakhadirarukkhasañchanne nirudakakantāre vāsaṃ disvā taṃ pasaṃsanto ^b^``gāme vā''^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^gāme vā^eb^ti kiñcāpi arahanto gāmante kāyavivekaṃ na labhanti, cittavivekaṃ pana labhanteva. tesañhi dibbapaṭibhāgānipi ārammaṇāni cittaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti, tasmā gāme vā hotu araññādīsu aññataraṃ vā, ^b^yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyaka^eb^nti so bhūmippadeso ramaṇīyo evāti attho.

[03] ^b^araññānī^eb^ti supupphitatarusaṇḍamaṇḍitāni vimalasalilāsayasampannāni araññāni ramaṇīyānīti sambandho. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yesu araññesu vikasitesu viya ramamānesu kāmapakkhiko kāmagavesako ^b^jano^eb^ na ramati. ^b^vītarāgā^eb^ti vigatarāgā pana khīṇāsavā bhamaramadhukarā viya padumavanesu ^a^M2.0401^ea^ ^a^V2.0340^ea^ tathārūpesu araññesu ramissantīti. ^b^na te kāmagavesino^eb^ti yasmā te vītarāgā kāmagavesino na hontīti attho.

[03] puna thero rādhaṃ nāma duggatabrāhmaṇaṃ anukampāya pabbājetvā, upasampādetvā tameva pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā vicaranto ekadivasaṃ tassa ca subbacabhāvena tussitvā ovādaṃ dento ^b^``nidhīnaṃvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nidhīnaṃvā^eb^ti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ. ^b^pavattāra^eb^nti kicchajīvike duggatamanusse anukampaṃ katvā ``ehi te sukhena jīvituṃ upāyaṃ dassessāmī''ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā ``imaṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ jīvāhī''ti ācikkhitāraṃ viya. ^b^vajjadassina^eb^nti dve vajjadassino -- ``iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī''ti randhagavesako ca, aññātaṃ ñāpetukāmo ñātaṃ assādento sīlādivuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokento ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito ^a^P3.0102^ea^ cāti, ayaṃ idha adhippeto. yathā hi duggatamanusso ``imaṃ nidhiṃ gaṇhāhī''ti niggayhamānopi nidhidassane kopaṃ na karoti, pamuditova hoti, evaṃ evarūpesu puggalesu asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo, tuṭṭhacitteneva bhavitabbaṃ, ``bhante, punapi maṃ evarūpaṃ vadeyyāthā''ti pavāretabbameva. ^b^niggayhavādi^eb^nti yo vajjaṃ disvā ayaṃ me saddhivihāriko, antevāsiko, upakārakoti acintetvā vajjānurūpaṃ tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto sikkhāpeti, ayaṃ niggayhavādī nāma sammāsambuddho viya. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``niggayha niggayhāhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi; pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi. yo sāro so ṭhassatī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.196). ^b^medhāvi^eb^nti dhammojapaññāya samannāgataṃ. ^b^tādisa^eb^nti evarūpaṃ paṇḍitaṃ. ^b^bhaje^eb^ti payirupāseyya. tādisañhi ācariyaṃ bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyo hoti, na pāpiyo, vuḍḍhiyeva hoti, no parihānīti attho.

[03] athekadā assajipunabbasukehi kīṭāgirismiṃ āvāse dūsite satthārā āṇatto attano parisāya mahāmoggallānena ca saddhiṃ tattha gato dhammasenāpati assajipunabbasukesu ovādaṃ anādiyantesu imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^ovadeyyā^eb^ti ovādaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ dadeyya. ^b^anusāseyyā^eb^ti tasseva pariyāyavacanaṃ. atha vā uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati ^a^M2.0402^ea^ nāma, anuppanne ``ayasopi te siyā''tiādiṃ anāgataṃ uddissa vadanto anusāsati nāma. sammukhā vadanto vā ovadati nāma, parammukhā dūtaṃ, sāsanaṃ vā pesetvā vadanto anusāsati nāma. sakiṃ vadanto vā ovadati nāma, punappunaṃ vadanto anusāsati nāma. ^b^asabbhā cā^eb^ti akusalā dhammā ca nivāraye, kusale dhamme ca patiṭṭhāpeyyāti attho. ^b^satañhi so^eb^ti evarūpo puggalo ^a^V2.0341^ea^ sādhūnaṃ piyo hoti. ye pana asantā asappurisā vitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ so ovādako anusāsako ``na tvaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyo, na ācariyo, kasmā amhe vadasī''ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotīti.

[03] ``yaṃ ārabbha satthā dhammaṃ deseti, so eva upanissayasampanno''ti bhikkhūsu kathāya samuṭṭhitāya ``nayidameta''nti dassento ^b^``aññassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^aññassā^eb^ti attano bhāgineyyaṃ dīghanakhaparibbājakaṃ sandhāyāha. tassa hi satthārā vedanāpariggahasutte (ma0 ni0 2.205-206) desiyamāne ayaṃ mahāthero bhāvanāmagge adhigantvā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. ^b^sotamodhesimatthiko^eb^ti satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito atthiko hutvā sussūsanto sotaṃ odahiṃ. ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0103^ea^ ^b^me amoghaṃ savana^eb^nti taṃ tathā sutaṃ savanaṃ mayhaṃ amoghaṃ avañjhaṃ ahosi, aggasāvakena pattabbaṃ sampattīnaṃ avassayo ahosi. tenāha ^b^``vimuttomhī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^neva pubbenivāsāyā^eb^ti attano paresañca pubbenivāsajānanañāṇatthāya, paṇidhī me neva vijjatīti yojanā. parikammakaraṇavasena tadatthaṃ cittapaṇidhānamattampi nevatthi neva ahosīti attho. ^b^cetopariyāyā^eb^ti cetopariyañāṇassa. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti iddhividhañāṇassa. ^b^cutiyā upapattiyā^eb^ti, sattānaṃ cutiyā upapattiyā ca jānanañāṇāya cutūpapātañāṇatthāya. ^b^sotadhātuvisuddhiyā^eb^ti dibbasotañāṇassa. ^b^paṇidhī me na vijjatī^eb^ti imesaṃ abhiññāvisesānaṃ atthāya parikammavasena cittassa paṇidhi cittābhinīhāro me natthi nāhosīti attho. sabbaññuguṇā viya hi buddhānaṃ aggamaggādhigameneva sāvakānaṃ ^a^M2.0403^ea^ sabbe sāvakaguṇā hatthagatā honti, na tesaṃ adhigamāya visuṃ parikammakaraṇakiccaṃ atthīti.

[03] ^b^rukkhamūla^eb^ntiādikā tisso gāthā kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa yakkhena pahatakāle samāpattibalena attano nibbikāratādīpanavasena vuttā. tattha ^b^muṇḍo^eb^ti na voropitakeso. ^b^saṅghāṭipāruto^eb^ti saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā nisinno. ``saṅghāṭiyā supāruto''ti ca paṭhanti. ^b^paññāya uttamo thero^eb^ti thero hutvā paññāya uttamo, sāvakesu paññāya seṭṭhoti attho. ^b^jhāyatī^eb^ti ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyati, bahulaṃ samāpattivihārena viharatīti attho.

[03] ^b^upeto hoti tāvade^eb^ti yadā yakkhena sīse pahato, tāvadeva ^b^avitakkaṃ^eb^ catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpattiṃ ^a^V2.0342^ea^ samāpanno ariyena tuṇhībhāvena upeto samannāgato ahosi. atītatthe hi hotīti idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^pabbatova na vedhatī^eb^ti mohakkhayā bhinnasabbakileso ^b^bhikkhu^eb^. so selamayapabbato viya ^b^acalo^eb^ suppatiṭṭhito iṭṭhādinā kenaci na vedhati, sabbattha nibbikāro hotīti attho.

[03] athekadivasaṃ therassa asatiyā nivāsanakaṇṇe olambante aññataro sāmaṇero, ``bhante, parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetabba''nti āha. taṃ sutvā ``bhaddaṃ tayā suṭṭhu vutta''nti sirasā viya sampaṭicchanto tāvadeva thokaṃ apakkamitvā parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā ``mādisānaṃ ayampi dosoyevā''ti dassento ^b^``anaṅgaṇassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha.

[03] puna maraṇe jīvite ca attano samacittataṃ dassento ^b^``nābhinandāmī''^eb^tiādinā dve gāthā vatvā paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathento ^b^``ubhayena mida''^eb^ntiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^ubhayenā^eb^ti ubhayesu, ubhosu kālesūti attho. ^b^mida^eb^nti ^a^P3.0104^ea^ ma-kāro padasandhikaro. idaṃ maraṇameva, maraṇaṃ attheva nāma, amaraṇaṃ nāma natthi. kesu ubhosu kālesūti āha ^a^M2.0404^ea^ ^b^``pacchā vā pure vā''^eb^ti majjhimavayassa ^b^pacchā vā^eb^ jarājiṇṇakāle ^b^pure vā^eb^ daharakāle ^b^maraṇameva^eb^ maraṇaṃ ekantikameva. tasmā ^b^paṭipajjatha^eb^ sammā paṭipattiṃ pūretha vippaṭipajjitvā ^b^mā vinassatha^eb^ apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ mānubhavatha. ^b^khaṇo vo mā upaccagā^eb^ti aṭṭhahi akkhaṇehi vivajjito ayaṃ navamo khaṇo mā tumhe atikkamīti attho.
