[03] ^b^ete sambahulā^eb^tiādikā pañca gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ namassante brahmakāyike deve disvā āyasmato kappinassa sitapātukammanimittaṃ vuttā. tattha ^b^ete^eb^ti tesaṃ paccakkhatāya vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0386^ea^. ^b^sambahulā^eb^ti bahubhāvato, taṃ pana bahubhāvaṃ ^b^``dasadevasahassānī''^eb^ti paricchinditvā āha. ^b^devā^eb^ti upapattidevā. taṃ tesaṃ devabhāvaṃ aññehi visesetvā dassento ^b^``sabbe te brahmakāyikā''^eb^ti āha. yasmā te attano upapattiddhiyā mahatiyā deviddhiyā samannāgatā parivārasampannā ca, tasmā āha ^b^``iddhimanto yasassino''^eb^ti.

[03] ``ko nu senāpati bhoto''ti pucchāya vissajjanavasena ``mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuttaraṃ sāriputto anuvattetī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.399) vadantena bhagavatā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa dhammasenāpatibhāvo anuññātoti āha -- ^b^``dhammasenāpatiṃ vīraṃ mahājhāyiṃ samāhitaṃ sāriputta''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^vīra^eb^nti kilesamārādīnaṃ nimmathanena vīriyavantaṃ mahāvikkantaṃ. ^b^mahājhāyi^eb^nti dibbavihārādīnaṃ ukkaṃsagamanena mahantaṃ jhāyiṃ. tato eva sabbaso vikkhepaviddhaṃsanavasena ^b^samāhitaṃ. namassantā^eb^ti sirasi añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā tiṭṭhanti.
[03] ^b^yampi^eb^ ^a^M2.0455^ea^ ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti yaṃ nu kho ārammaṇaṃ nissāya ārabbha jhāyatīti nābhijānāmāti puthujjanabhāvena brahmāno evaṃ āhaṃsu.

[03] ^b^accheraṃ vatā^eb^ti acchariyaṃ vata. ^b^buddhāna^eb^nti catusaccabuddhānaṃ. ^b^gambhīro gocaro sako^eb^ti paramagambhīro atiduddaso duranubodho puthujjanehi asādhāraṇo avisayo. idāni tassa gambhīrabhāve kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ye maya''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vālavedhisamāgatā^eb^ti ye mayaṃ vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā atisukhumampi visayaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā āgatā upaparikkhantā nābhijānāma, gambhīro vata buddhānaṃ visayoti attho. ^b^taṃ tathā devakāyehī^eb^ti taṃ tathārūpaṃ sāriputtaṃ sadevakassa lokassa pūjanārahaṃ tehi brahmakāyikehi tadā tathā pūjitaṃ disvā āyasmato mahākappinassa sitaṃ ahosi. imesaṃ lokasammatānaṃ brahmūnampi avisayo, yattha sāvakānaṃ visayoti.

[03] ^b^yāvatā buddhakhettamhī^eb^ti gāthā therena attānaṃ ārabbha sīhanādaṃ nadantena bhāsitā. tattha ^b^buddhakhettamhī^eb^ti āṇākhettaṃ sandhāya vadati. ^b^ṭhapayitvā mahāmuni^eb^nti sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā ^a^P3.0143^ea^. buddhā hi bhagavanto dhutaguṇehipi sabbasattehi paramukkaṃsagatā eva, kevalaṃ pana mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānasā sattānaṃ tādisaṃ mahantaṃ upakāraṃ oloketvā gāmantasenāsanavāsādiṃ anuvattantīti taṃ taṃ dhutadhammavirodhī hoti. ^b^dhutaguṇe^eb^ti kilesānaṃ dhutena guṇena ^a^V2.0387^ea^ āraññakādibhāvena apekkhitaguṇe. karaṇatthe vā etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. sadiso me na vijjati, kuto pana uttarīti adhippāyo. tathā hesa thero tattha aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito.

[03] ^b^na cīvare^eb^ti gāthāya ``ṭhapayitvā mahāmuni''nti vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti, cīvarādīsu taṇhāya anupalepo dhutaṅgaphalaṃ. tattha na cīvare sampatte taṇhālepenāti yojanā. ^b^sayane^eb^ti senāsane. ^b^gotamo^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ gottena kitteti. ^b^anappameyyo^eb^ti pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato aparimāṇaguṇatāya ca anappameyyo. ^b^muḷālapupphaṃ vimalaṃva ambunā^eb^ti yathā nimmalaṃ virajaṃ naḷinaṃ udakena na limpati, evaṃ ^a^M2.0456^ea^ gotamo bhagavā taṇhālepādinā na limpatīti attho. ^b^nekkhammaninno^eb^ abhinikkhammaninno tato eva ^b^tibhavābhinissaṭo^eb^ bhavattayato vinissaṭo visaṃyutto.

[03] yesaṃ satipaṭṭhānagīvādīnaṃ bhāvanāpāripūriyā yattha katthaci anupalitto nekkhammaninnova ahosi, te aṅgabhūte dassento ^b^``satipaṭṭhānagīvo''^eb^ti osānagāthamāha. tattha guṇarāsito uttamaṅgabhūtāya paññāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvato satipaṭṭhānaṃ gīvā etassāti satipaṭṭhānagīvo, anavajjadhammānaṃ ādāne saddhā hattho etassāti ^b^saddhāhattho^eb^. guṇasarīrassa uttamaṅgabhāvato paññā sīsaṃ etassāti ^b^paññāsīso^eb^. mahāsamudāgamanatāya mahāvisayatāya mahānubhāvatāya mahābalatāya ca mahantaṃ sabbaññutasaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^mahāñāṇī. sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ ^b^nibbuto^eb^ sītibhūto carati. ``susamāhito...pe0... nāgo''ti (a0 ni0 6.43) suttapadañcettha nidassetabbaṃ. yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] paññāsanipāte ^a^M2.0457^ea^ ^a^V2.0388^ea^ ^b^kadā nuha^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato tālapuṭattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayampi purimabuddhesu katādhikāro tattha tattha bhave vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ kusalaṃ upacinitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe aññatarasmiṃ naṭakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto ^a^P3.0144^ea^ kulānurūpesu naccaṭṭhānesu nipphattiṃ gantvā sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo naṭagāmaṇi ahosi. so pañcasatamātugāmaparivāro mahatā naṭavibhavena gāmanigamarājadhānīsu samajjaṃ dassetvā, mahantaṃ pūjāsakkāraṃ labhitvā, vicaranto rājagahaṃ āgantvā, nagaravāsīnaṃ samajjaṃ dassetvā, laddhasammānasakkāro ñāṇassa paripākaṃ gatattā satthu santikaṃ gantvā, vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``sutametaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ naṭānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ `yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī'ti, idha bhagavā kimāhā''ti. atha naṃ bhagavā tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipi ``mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī''ti. catutthavāraṃ puṭṭho āha -- ``gāmaṇi, ime sattā pakatiyāpi rāgabandhanabaddhā dosabandhanabaddhā mohabandhanabaddhā tesaṃ bhiyyopi rajanīye dosanīye mohanīye dhamme upasaṃharanto pamādetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā niraye upapajjati. sace panassa evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti `yo so naṭo raṅgamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccālikena janaṃ hāseti rameti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pahāsānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī'''ti sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi. micchādiṭṭhissa ca dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati icchitabbā, nirayassa vā tiracchānayoniyā vāti. taṃ sutvā tālapuṭo gāmaṇi parodi. nanu gāmaṇi pageva mayā paṭikkhitto ``mā maṃ etaṃ pucchī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.354)? ``nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmi, yaṃ maṃ bhagavā naṭānaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ evamāhā''ti. api cāhaṃ, bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi naṭehi vañcito ``naṭo mahājanassa naṭasamajjaṃ dassetvā sugatiṃ upapajjatī''ti. so satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā laddhūpasampanno vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva ^a^M2.0458^ea^ arahattaṃ ^a^V2.0389^ea^ pāpuṇi, adhigatārahatto pana arahattappattito pubbe yenākārena attano cittaṃ niggaṇhanavasena yonisomanasikāro udapādi, taṃ anekadhā vibhajitvā dassetuṃ --
[22] aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassaṃ, taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā ^a^P3.0145^ea^ nuhaṃ bhinnapaṭandharo muni, kāsāvavattho amamo nirāso.
[22] rāgañca dosañca tatheva mohaṃ, hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassaṃ..
[22] vipassamāno vītabhayo vihassaṃ, eko vane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[22] paññāmayaṃ tikhiṇamasiṃ gahetvā, chetvā vase tampi kadā bhavissati..
[22] māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissaṃ, sīhāsane taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā nuhaṃ sabbhi samāgamesu, diṭṭho bhave dhammagarūhi tādibhi.
[22] yāthāvadassīhi jitindriyehi, padhāniyo taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā ^a^M2.0459^ea^ nu maṃ tandi khudā pipāsā, vātātapā kīṭasarīsapā vā.
[22] na bādhayissanti na taṃ giribbaje, atthatthiyaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā nu kho yaṃ viditaṃ mahesinā, cattāri saccāni sududdasāni.
[22] samāhitatto satimā agacchaṃ, paññāya taṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā nu rūpe amite ca sadde, gandhe rase phusitabbe ca dhamme.
[22] ādittatohaṃ samathehi yutto, paññāya dacchaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me..
[21] ``kadā nuhaṃ dubbacanena vutto, tato nimittaṃ vimano na hessaṃ.
[22] atho pasatthopi tato nimittaṃ, tuṭṭho na hessaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me..
[21] ``kadā ^a^P3.0146^ea^ nu kaṭṭhe ca tiṇe latā ca, khandhe imehaṃ amite ca dhamme.
[22] ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni ca, samaṃ tuleyyaṃ tadidaṃ kadā me..
[21] ``kadā nu maṃ pāvusakālamegho, navena toyena sacīvaraṃ vane.
[22] isippayātamhi pathe vajantaṃ, ovassate taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane, dijassa sutvā girigabbhare rutaṃ.
[22] paccuṭṭhahitvā amatassa pattiyā, saṃcintaye taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā ^a^M2.0460^ea^ ^a^V2.0390^ea^ nu gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassatiṃ, pātālakhittaṃ vaḷavāmukhañca.
[22] asajjamāno patareyyamiddhiyā, vibhiṃsanaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā nu nāgova asaṅgacārī, padālaye kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ.
[22] nibbajjayaṃ sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ, jhāne yuto taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``kadā iṇaṭṭova daliddako nidhiṃ, ārādhayitvā dhanikehi pīḷito.
[22] tuṭṭho bhavissaṃ adhigamma sāsanaṃ, mahesino taṃ nu kadā bhavissati..
[21] ``bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, agāravāsena alaṃ nu te idaṃ.
[22] taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ, kiṃkāraṇā citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi..
[21] ``nanu ahaṃ citta tayāmhi yācito, giribbaje citrachadā vihaṅgamā.
[22] mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ..
[21] ``kulamhi mitte ca piye ca ñātake, khiḍḍāratiṃ kāmaguṇañca loke.
[22] sabbaṃ pahāya imamajjhupāgato, athopi tvaṃ citta na mayha tussasi..
[21] ``mameva ^a^P3.0147^ea^ etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresaṃ, sannāhakāle paridevitena kiṃ.
[22] sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamāno, abhinikkhamiṃ amatapadaṃ jigīsaṃ..
[22] cittaṃ calaṃ makkaṭasannibhaṃ iti, avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ..
[21] ``kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā.
[22] te dukkhamicchanti punabbhavesino, cittena nītā niraye nirākatā..
[22] kāye apekkhaṃ jaha mā virādhaya, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[21] ``bhāvehi jhānāni ca indriyāni ca, balāni bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanā.
[22] tisso ca vijjā phusa buddhasāsane, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[22] aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ sabbakilesasodhanaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[21] ``dukkhanti khandhe paṭipassa yoniso, yato ca dukkhaṃ samudeti taṃ jaha.
[22] idheva dukkhassa karohi antaṃ, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[21] ``aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassa yoniso, suññaṃ anattāti aghaṃ vadhanti ca.
[22] manovicāre uparundha cetaso, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[22] yuñjassu satthuvacane mahesino, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[22] cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyā, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[21] ``āraññiko hohi ca piṇḍapātiko, sosāniko hohi ca paṃsukūliko.
[22] nesajjiko hohi sadā dhute rato, itissu maṃ citta pure niyuñjasi..
[21] ``ropetva rukkhāni yathā phalesī, mūle taruṃ chettu tameva icchasi.
[22] tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosi, yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasi..
[21] ``arūpa dūraṅgama ekacāri, na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idānihaṃ.
[22] dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā, nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ..
[22] kato ca te citta paṭissavo mayā..
[22] itissu maṃ citta tadā niyuñjasi, idāni tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ..
[21] ``taṇhā ^a^M2.0463^ea^ avijjā ca piyāpiyañca, subhāni rūpāni sukhā ca vedanā.
[22] manāpiyā kāmaguṇā ca vantā, vante ahaṃ āvamituṃ na ussahe..
[21] ``sabbattha te citta vaco kataṃ mayā, bahūsu jātīsu namesi kopito.
[22] ajjhattasambhavo kataññutāya te, dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate..
[21] ``tvaññeva no citta karosi brāhmaṇo, tvaṃ khattiyo rājadasī karosi.
[22] vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā, devattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā..
[21] ``taveva ^a^P3.0149^ea^ hetū asurā bhavāmase, tvaṃmūlakaṃ nerayikā bhavāmase.
[22] atho tiracchānagatāpi ekadā, petattanaṃ vāpi taveva vāhasā..
[21] ``nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappunaṃ, muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva dassayaṃ.
[22] ummattakeneva mayā palobhasi, kiñcāpi te citta virādhitaṃ mayā..
[21] ``idaṃ pure cittamacāri cārikaṃ, yenicchakaṃ yatthakāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ.
[22] tadajjahaṃ niggahessāmi yoniso, hatthippabhinnaṃ viya aṅgusaggaho..
[21] ``satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahi, aniccato addhuvato asārato.
[22] pakkhanda maṃ citta jinassa sāsane, tārehi oghā mahatā suduttarā..
[21] ``na ^a^M2.0464^ea^ te idaṃ citta yathā purāṇakaṃ, nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattituṃ.
[22] mahesino pabbajitomhi sāsane, na mādisā honti vināsadhārino..
[21] ``nagā ^a^V2.0392^ea^ samuddā saritā vasundharā, disā catasso vidisā adho divā.
[22] sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutā, kuhiṃ gato citta sukhaṃ ramissasi..
[21] ``dhitipparaṃ kiṃ mama citta kāhisi, na te alaṃ citta vasānuvattako.
[22] na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe, dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandaniṃ..
[22] sumañjughosatthanitābhigajjino, te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyinaṃ..
[21] ``vuṭṭhamhi ^a^P3.0150^ea^ deve caturaṅgule tiṇe, saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi kānane.
[22] nagantare viṭapisamo sayissaṃ, taṃ me mudū hehiti tūlasannibhaṃ..
[21] ``tathā tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ.
[22] na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ..
[21] ``tathā ^a^M2.0465^ea^ tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro, yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me alaṃ.
[22] viriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissaṃ, gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggaho..
[21] ``tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hi, hayena yoggācariyova ujjunā.
[22] pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ sivaṃ, cittānurakkhīhi sadā nisevitaṃ..
[21] ``ārammaṇe taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya rajjuyā.
[22] taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvitaṃ, anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisi..
[21] ``paññāya chetvā vipathānusārinaṃ, yogena niggayha pathe nivesiya.
[22] disvā samudayaṃ vibhavañca sambhavaṃ, dāyādako hehisi aggavādino..
[21] ``migo yathā seri sucittakānane, rammaṃ giriṃ pāvusābbhamāliniṃ.
[22] anākule tattha nage ramissaṃ, asaṃsayaṃ citta parā bhavissasi..
[27] narā ca nārī ca anubhonti yaṃ sukhaṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0466^ea^ ^b^kadā nuha^eb^nti kadā nu ahaṃ. ^b^pabbatakandarāsū^eb^ti pabbatesu ca kandaresu ca, pabbatassa ^a^V2.0393^ea^ vā kandarāsu. ^b^ekākiyo^eb^ti ^a^P3.0151^ea^ ekako. ^b^addutiyo^eb^ti nittaṇho. taṇhā hi purisassa dutiyā nāma. ^b^vihassa^eb^nti viharissāmi. ^b^aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassa^eb^nti kāmabhavādibhedaṃ sabbampi bhavaṃ ``hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena anicca''nti vipassanto kadā nu viharissanti yojanā. nidassanamattañcetaṃ, ``yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā''ti vacanato (saṃ0 ni0 3.15) itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissatī^eb^ti taṃ idaṃ me parivitakkitaṃ kadā nu bhavissati, kadā nu kho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatīti attho. ^b^taṃ nū^eb^ti cettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- kadā nu kho ahaṃ mahāgajo viya saṅkhalikabandhanaṃ, gihibandhanaṃ chinditvā pabbajitvā kāyavivekaṃ paribrūhayanto ekākī pabbatakandarāsu adutiyo sabbattha nirapekkho sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ aniccādito vipassanto viharissāmīti.

[03] ^b^bhinnapaṭandharo^eb^ti bhinnavatthadharo, gāthāsukhatthaṃ nakārāgamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. satthakacchinnāgghaphassavaṇṇabhinnaṃ paṭacīvaraṃ dhārentoti attho. ^b^munī^eb^ti pabbajito. ^b^amamo^eb^ti kule vā gaṇe vā mamattābhāvena amamo. katthacipi ārammaṇe āsīsanāya abhāvena ^b^nirāso. hantvā sukhī pavanagato vihassa^eb^nti rāgādike kilese ariyamaggena samucchinditvā maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhī mahāvanagato kadā nu kho ahaṃ viharissāmi.

[03] ^b^vadharoganīḷa^eb^nti maraṇassa ca rogassa ca kulāvakabhūtaṃ. ^b^kāyaṃ ima^eb^nti imaṃ khandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ. khandhapañcakopi hi ``avijjāgatassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa taṇhānugatassa ayameva kāyo bahiddhā nāmarūpa''ntiādīsu kāyo vuccati. ^b^maccujarāyupadduta^eb^nti maraṇena ceva jarāya ca pīḷitaṃ, vipassamāno ahaṃ bhayahetupahānena ^b^vītabhayo,^eb^ taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti attho.

[03] ^b^bhayajanani^eb^nti pañcavīsatiyā mahābhayānaṃ uppādakāraṇabhūtaṃ kāyikassa ca cetasikassa ca sakalassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa āvahanato ^b^dukhāvahaṃ. taṇhālataṃ bahuvidhānuvattani^eb^nti bahuvidhañca ārammaṇaṃ bhavameva vā anuvattati ^a^M2.0467^ea^ santanotīti bahuvidhānuvattaniṃ, taṇhāsaṅkhātalataṃ. ^b^paññāmaya^eb^nti maggapaññāmayaṃ sunisitaṃ asikhaggaṃ vīriyapaggahitena saddhāhatthena gahetvā samucchinditvā ``kadā nuhaṃ vase''ti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, tampi kadā bhavissatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^uggateja^eb^nti samathavipassanāvasena nisitatāya tikkhatejaṃ. ^b^satthaṃ isīna^eb^nti buddhapaccekabuddhāriyasāvakaisīnaṃ ^a^V2.0394^ea^ satthabhūtaṃ ^a^P3.0152^ea^. ^b^māraṃ sasenaṃ sahasā bhañjissa^eb^nti kilesasenāya sasenaṃ abhisaṅkhārādimāraṃ sahasā sīghameva bhañjissāmi. ^b^sīhāsane^eb^ti thirāsane, aparājitapallaṅketi attho.

[03] ^b^sabbhi samāgamesu diṭṭho bhave^eb^ti dhammagāravayuttatāya ^b^dhammagarūhi^eb^ tādilakkhaṇappattiyā ^b^tādīhi^eb^ aviparītadassitāya ^b^yāthāvadassīhi^eb^ ariyamaggeneva pāpajitindriyatāya ^b^jitindriyehi^eb^ buddhādīhi sādhūhi samāgamesu ``kadā nu ahaṃ padhāniyoti diṭṭho bhaveyya''nti yaṃ me parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ nu kadā bhavissatīti yojanā. iminā nayena sabbattha padayojanā veditabbā, padatthamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] ^b^tandī^eb^ti ālasiyaṃ. ^b^khudā^eb^ti jighacchā. ^b^kīṭasarīsapā^eb^ti kīṭañceva sarīsapā ca. ^b^na bādhayissantī^eb^ti maṃ na byādhayissanti sukhadukkhasomanassadomanassānaṃ jhānehi paṭibāhitattāti adhippāyo. ^b^giribbaje^eb^ti pabbatakandarāya. ^b^atthatthiya^eb^nti sadatthasaṅkhātena atthena atthikaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ viditaṃ mahesinā^eb^ti yaṃ catusaccaṃ mahesinā sammāsambuddhena sayambhūñāṇena ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, tāni cattāri saccāni anupacitakusalasambhārehi suṭṭhu duddasāni maggasamādhinā ^b^samāhitatto,^eb^ sammāsatiyā ^b^satimā,^eb^ ariyamaggapaññāya ahaṃ ^b^agacchaṃ^eb^ paṭivijjhissaṃ adhigamissanti attho.

[03] ^b^rūpe^eb^ti cakkhuviññeyyarūpe. ^b^amite^eb^ti ñāṇena amite, aparicchinne apariññāteti attho. ^b^phusitabbe^eb^ti, phoṭṭhabbe. ^b^dhamme^eb^ti manoviññeyyadhamme. ^b^amite^eb^ti vā aparimāṇe nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinne rūpe bherisaddādivasena, mūlarasādivasena, kakkhaḷamudutādivasena, sukhadukkhādivasena ca, anekabhedasaddādike cāti attho. ^b^ādittato^eb^ti ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato. ^b^samathehi yutto^eb^ti jhānavipassanāmaggasamādhīhi ^a^M2.0468^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^paññāya daccha^eb^nti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya dakkhissaṃ.

[03] ^b^dubbacanena vutto^eb^ti duruttavacanena ghaṭṭito. ^b^tato nimitta^eb^nti pharusavācāhetu. ^b^vimano na hessa^eb^nti domanassito na bhaveyyaṃ. ^b^atho^eb^ti atha. ^b^pasattho^eb^ti kenaci pasaṃsito.

[03] ^b^kaṭṭhe^eb^ti dārukkhandhe. ^b^tiṇe^eb^ti tiṇānaṃ khandhe. ^b^ime^eb^ti ime mama santatipariyāpanne pañca khandhe ^a^V2.0395^ea^. ^b^amite ca dhamme^eb^ti tato aññena indriyakkhandhena amite rūpadhamme. tenāha -- ``ajjhattikāneva ca bāhirāni cā''ti. ^b^samaṃ tuleyya^eb^nti aniccādivasena ceva asārādiupamāvasena ca sabbaṃ samameva katvā tīreyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^isippayātamhi^eb^ ^a^P3.0153^ea^ ^b^pathe vajanta^eb^nti buddhādīhi mahesīhi sammadeva payāte samathavipassanāmagge vajantaṃ paṭipajjantaṃ. pāvusasamaye kālamegho ^b^navena toyena^eb^ vassodakena sacīvaraṃ pavane kadā nu ovassati, temetīti attano abbhokāsikabhāvaparivitakkitaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^mayūrassa sikhaṇḍino vane dijassā^eb^ti mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyanavasena dijassa, sikhāsambhavena sikhaṇḍino ca mayūrassa vane kadā pana girigabbhare ^b^rutaṃ^eb^ kekāravaṃ sutvā velaṃ sallakkhitvā sayanato vuṭṭhahitvā ^b^amatassa pattiyā^eb^ nibbānādhigamāya. ^b^saṃcintaye^eb^ti vuccamāne bhave aniccādito manasi kareyyaṃ vipasseyyanti attho.

[03] ^b^gaṅgaṃ yamunaṃ sarassati^eb^nti etā mahānadiyo asajjamāno bhāvanāmayāya ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ kadā nu patareyyanti yojanā. ^b^pātālakhittaṃ baḷavāmukhañcā^eb^ti pātāya alaṃ pariyattanti pātālaṃ, tadeva khittaṃ, pathaviyā saṇṭhahanakāle tathā ṭhitanti pātālakhittaṃ. yojanasatikādibhedāni samuddassa antopathaviyā tīraṭṭhānāni, yesu kānici nāgādīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānāni honti, kānici suññāniyeva hutvā tiṭṭhanti. baḷavāmukhanti mahāsamudde mahantaṃ āvaṭṭamukhaṃ. mahānirayadvārassa hi vivaṭakāle mahāaggikkhandho tato nikkhanto tadabhimukhaṃ anekayojanasatāyāmavitthāraṃ heṭṭhā samuddapadesaṃ ḍahati, tasmiṃ daḍḍhe upari udakaṃ āvaṭṭākārena ^a^M2.0469^ea^ paribbhamantaṃ mahatā saddena heṭṭhā nipatati. tattha baḷavāmukhasamaññā, iti tañca pātālakhittaṃ baḷavāmukhañca ^b^vibhiṃsanaṃ^eb^ bhayānakaṃ asajjamāno iddhiyā kadā nu patareyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ kadā nu bhavissati, bhāvanāmayaṃ iddhiṃ nibbattetvā kadā nu evaṃ iddhiṃ vaḷañjissāmīti attho.

[03] ^b^nāgova asaṅgacārī padālaye^eb^ti yathā mattavāraṇo daḷhathambhaṃ bhinditvā ayasaṅkhalikaṃ viddhaṃsetvā asaṅgacārī vanaṃ pavisitvā eko adutiyo hutvā attano rucivasena carati, evamahaṃ kadā nu sabbasubhaṃ nimittaṃ ^b^nibbajjayaṃ^eb^ niravasesato vajjayanto kāmacchandavaso ahutvā jhāne ^b^yuto^eb^ payutto kāmaguṇesu chandaṃ sammadeva padāleyyaṃ chindeyyaṃ pajaheyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.

[03] ^b^iṇaṭṭova^eb^ ^a^V2.0396^ea^ ^b^daliddako nidhiṃ ārādhayitvā^eb^ti yathā koci daliddo jīvikapakato iṇaṃ gahetvā taṃ sodhetuṃ asakkonto iṇaṭṭo iṇena aṭṭito dhanikehi pīḷito nidhiṃ ārādhayitvā adhigantvā iṇañca sodhetvā sukhena ca jīvanto tuṭṭho bhaveyya, evaṃ ahampi kadā nu iṇasadisaṃ kāmacchandaṃ pahāya ^b^mahesino^eb^ ariyadhanasampuṇṇatāya maṇikanakādiratanasampuṇṇanidhisadisaṃ ^a^P3.0154^ea^ buddhassa ^b^sāsanaṃ^eb^ adhigantvā tuṭṭho bhaveyyanti yaṃ parivitakkitaṃ, taṃ kadā nu bhavissatīti.

[03] evaṃ pabbajjato pubbe nekkhammavitakkavasena pavattaṃ attano vitakkapavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pabbajitvā yehākārehi attānaṃ ovaditvā adhigacchi, te dassento ^b^``bahūni vassānī''^eb^tiādikā gāthā abhāsi. tattha ^b^bahūni vassāni tayāmhi yācito, agāravāsena alaṃ nu te ida^eb^nti anekasaṃvaccharāni vividhadukkhānubandhena agāramajjhe vāsena alaṃ pariyattameva teti, ambho citta, idaṃ tayā anekāni saṃvaccharāni ahaṃ amhi nanu yācito. ^b^taṃ dāni maṃ pabbajitaṃ samāna^eb^nti taṃ maṃ tayā tathā ussāhanena pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ kena kāraṇena citta tuvaṃ na yuñjasi, samathavipassanaṃ chaḍḍetvā nihīne ālasiye niyojesīti attho.

[03] ^b^nanu^eb^ ^a^M2.0470^ea^ ahaṃ, citta, tayāmhi yācitob^ti, ambho citta, ahaṃ tayā nanu yācito amhi āyācito maññe. yadi yācito, kasmā idāni tadanurūpaṃ na paṭipajjasīti adhippāyo. ^b^``giribbaje''^eb^tiādinā yācitākāraṃ dasseti. ^b^citrachadā vihaṅgamā^eb^ vicitrapekhuṇapakkhino, mayūrāti attho. ^b^mahindaghosatthanitābhigajjino^eb^ti jalaghosatthanitena hetunā suṭṭhu gajjanasīlā. ^b^te taṃ ramessanti vanamhi jhāyina^eb^nti te mayūrā taṃ vane jhānapasutaṃ ramessantīti nanu tayā yācitoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^kulamhī^eb^ti kulaparivaṭṭe. ^b^imamajjhupāgato^eb^ti imaṃ araññaṭṭhānaṃ pabbajjaṃ vā ajjhupāgato. ^b^athopi tvaṃ, citta, na mayha tussasī^eb^ti tvaṃ anuvattitvā ṭhitampi maṃ nārādhessasīti attho.

[03] ^b^mameva etaṃ na hi tvaṃ paresa^eb^nti etaṃ, citta, mameva tasmā tvaṃ paresaṃ na hosi. tvaṃ pana aññesaṃ viya katvā ^b^sannāhakāle^eb^ kilesamāre yujjhituṃ bhāvanāsannāhakāle nati vatvā paridevitena ^b^kiṃ^eb^ payojanaṃ, idāni taṃ aññathā vattituṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^sabbaṃ idaṃ calamiti pekkhamāno^eb^ti yasmā ``idaṃ cittaṃ aññañca sabbaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāraṃ calaṃ anavaṭṭhita''nti paññācakkhunā ^a^V2.0397^ea^ olokento gehato kāmehi ca abhinikkhamiṃ ^b^amatapadaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^jigīsaṃ^eb^ pariyesanto, tasmā, citta, ananuvattanto nibbānaṃ pariyesanameva karomīti adhippāyo.
[03] avītarāgena sudunnivārayaṃ cittaṃ calaṃ ^b^makkaṭasannibhaṃ^eb^ vanamakkaṭasadisaṃ iti ^b^suyuttavādī^eb^ subhāsitavādī dvipadānamuttamo mahābhisakko naradammasārathīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^aviddasū yattha sitā puthujjanā^eb^ti yattha yesu vatthukāmesu kilesakāmesu ca sitā paṭibaddhā te andhaputhujjanā tena ^a^P3.0155^ea^ kāmarāgena punabbhavesino ekanteneva dukkhamicchanti. icchantā ca ^b^cittena nītā niraye nirākatā^eb^ti cittavasikā nirayasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ karontā hitasukhato nirākatā hutvā attano citteneva niraye nītā na aññathāti cittasseva niggahetabbataṃ dasseti.

[03] punapi ^a^M2.0471^ea^ cittaṃyeva niggahetuṃ mantento ^b^``mayūrakoñcābhirutamhī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^mayūrakoñcābhirutamhī^eb^ti sikhīhi sārasehi ca abhikūjite. ^b^dīpīhi byagghehi purakkhato vasa^eb^nti mettāvihāritāya evarūpehi tiracchānagatehi purakkhato parivārito hutvā vane vasanto, etena suññabhāvaparibrūhanamāha. ^b^kāye apekkhaṃ jahā^eb^ti sabbaso kāye nirapekkho jaha, etena pahitattataṃ vadati. ^b^mā virādhayā^eb^ti imaṃ sudullabhaṃ navamaṃ khaṇaṃ mā virādhehi. ^b^itissu maṃ, citta, pure niyuñjasī^eb^ti evañhi tvaṃ, citta, maṃ pabbajjato pubbe sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ uyyojesīti attho.

[03] ^b^bhāvehī^eb^ti uppādehi vaḍḍhehi ca. ^b^jhānānī^eb^ti paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti saddhādīni pañcindriyāni. ^b^balānī^eb^ti tāniyeva pañca balāni. ^b^bojjhaṅgasamādhibhāvanā^eb^ti satta bojjhaṅge catasso samādhibhāvanā ca. ^b^tisso ca vijjā^eb^ti pubbenivāsañāṇādikā tisso vijjā ca. ^b^phusa^eb^ pāpuṇāhi ^b^buddhasāsane^eb^ sammāsambuddhaovāde ṭhito.
[03] ^b^niyyānika^eb^nti vaṭṭadukkhato niyhānavahaṃ. ^b^sabbadukkhakkhayogadha^eb^nti amatogadhaṃ nibbānapatiṭṭhaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ. ^b^sabbakilesasodhana^eb^nti anavasesakilesamalavisodhanaṃ.

[03] ^b^khandhe^eb^ti upādānakkhandhe. ^b^paṭipassa yoniso^eb^ti rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhatoti ^a^V2.0398^ea^ evamādīhi vividhehi pakārehi vipassanāñāṇena sammā upāyena nayena passa. ^b^taṃ jahā^eb^ti taṃ dukkhassa samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ pajaha, samucchinda. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve.

[03] ^b^anicca^eb^ntiādi antavantato aniccantikato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti vā passa. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti te udayabbayapaṭipīḷanato sappaṭibhayato dukkhamato sukhapaṭikkhepato dukkhanti vā passa. ^b^suñña^eb^nti avasavattanato asāmikato asārato attapaṭikkhepato ca suññaṃ, tato eva ^b^anattā^eb^ti. vigarahitabbato avaḍḍhiābādhanato ca ^b^agha^eb^nti ca ^b^vadha^eb^nti ca vipassa yonisoti yojanā. ^b^manovicāre^eb^ ^a^M2.0472^ea^ ^b^uparundha cetaso^eb^ti manovicārasaññino gehasitasomanassupavicārādike aṭṭhārasa cetaso uparundha vārehi nirodhehi.

[03] ^b^muṇḍo^eb^ti muṇḍabhāvaṃ upagato, ohāritakesamassuko. ^b^virūpo^eb^ti tena muṇḍabhāvena parūḷhalomatāya chinnabhinnakāsāya vatthatāya virūpo ^a^P3.0156^ea^ vevaṇṇiyaṃ upagato. ^b^abhisāpamāgato^eb^ti ``piṇḍolo vicarati pattapāṇī''ti ariyehi kātabbaṃ abhisāpaṃ upagato. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``abhisāpoyaṃ, bhikkhave, lokasmiṃ piṇḍolo vicarasi pattapāṇī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.80). tenāha ^b^``kapālahatthova kulesu bhikkhasū''^eb^ti. ^b^yuñjassu satthuvacane^eb^ti sammāsambuddhassa ovāde yogaṃ karohi anuyuñjassu.

[03] ^b^susaṃvutatto^eb^ti suṭṭhu kāyavācācittehi sammadeva saṃvuto. ^b^visikhantare cara^eb^nti bhikkhācariyāya icchāvisesesu caranto. ^b^cando yathā dosinapuṇṇamāsiyā^eb^ti vigatadosāya puṇṇamāya kulesu niccanavasāya pāsādikatāya candimā viya carāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^sadā dhute rato^eb^ti sabbakālañca dhutaguṇe abhirato. ^b^tathūpamaṃ cittamidaṃ karosī^eb^ti yathā koci puriso phalāni icchanto phalarukkhe ropetvā tato aladdhaphalova te mūlato chindituṃ icchati, citta, tvaṃ tathūpamaṃ tappaṭibhāgaṃ idaṃ karosi. ^b^yaṃ maṃ aniccamhi cale niyuñjasī^eb^ti yaṃ maṃ pabbajjāya niyojetvā pabbajitvā addhāgataṃ pabbajjāphalaṃ aniccamhi cale saṃsāramukhe niyuñjasi niyojanavasena pavattesi.

[03] rūpābhāvato ^b^arūpā^eb^. cittassa hi tādisaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ nīlādivaṇṇabhedo vā natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ arūpāti. dūraṭṭhānappavattiyā ^b^dūraṅgama^eb^. yadipi cittassa makkaṭasuttamattampi puratthimādidisābhāgena ^a^V2.0399^ea^ gamanaṃ nāma natthi, dūre santaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti dūraṅgama. ekoyeva hutvā caraṇavasena pavattanato ^b^ekacāri,^eb^ antamaso dve tīṇipi cittāni ekato uppajjituṃ samatthāni nāma natthi, ekameva pana cittaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne uppajjati. tasmiṃ niruddhe aparampi ekameva uppajjati, tasmā ekacāri. ^b^na te karissaṃ vacanaṃ idāniha^eb^nti yadipi pubbe tava vase anuvattiṃ, idāni pana satthu ovādaṃ laddhakālato ^a^M2.0473^ea^ paṭṭhāya cittavasiko na bhavissāmi. kasmāti ce? ^b^dukkhā hi kāmā kaṭukā mahabbhayā^eb^ kāmā nāmete atītepi dukkhā, āyatimpi kaṭukaphalā, attānuvādādibhedena mahatā bhayena anubandhantā mahabbhayā. ^b^nibbānamevābhimano carissaṃ^eb^ tasmā nibbānameva uddissa abhimukhacitto viharissaṃ.
[03] tameva nibbānābhimukhabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``nāhaṃ alakkhyā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nāhaṃ alakkhyā^eb^ti alakkhikatāya nissirīkatāya nāhaṃ gehato nikkhaminti yojanā.

[03] ^b^ahirikkatāyā^eb^ti yathāvajjaṃ keḷiṃ karonto viya nillajjatāya. ^b^cittahetū^eb^ti ekadā ^a^P3.0157^ea^ nigaṇṭho, ekadā paribbājakādiko honto anavaṭṭhitacitto puriso viya cittavasiko hutvā. ^b^dūrakantanā^eb^ti rājādīhi mettaṃ katvā tesu dubbhitvā dubbhibhāvena. ^b^ājīvahetū^eb^ti ājīvakāraṇā jīvikāpakato hutvā ājīvikābhayena ahaṃ ^b^na nikkhamiṃ^eb^ na pabbajiṃ. ^b^kato ca te, citta, paṭissavo mayā^eb^ti, ``pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na tava vase vattāmi, mameva pana vase vattāmī''ti, citta, mayā nanu paṭiññā katāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^appicchatā sappurisehi vaṇṇitā^eb^ti ``paccayesu sabbaso appicchā nāma sādhū''ti buddhādīhi pasaṭṭhā, tathā ^b^makkhappahānaṃ^eb^ paresaṃ guṇe makkhanassa pahānaṃ vūpasamo sabbassa dukkhassa ^b^vūpasamo^eb^ nibbāpanaṃ sappurisehi vaṇṇitaṃ. ^b^itissu maṃ, citta, tadā niyuñjasi,^eb^ ``samma, tayā tesu guṇesu patiṭṭhātabba''nti, citta, tvaṃ evaṃ tadā niyuñjasi. ^b^idāni tvaṃ gacchasi pubbaciṇṇaṃ^eb^ idāni maṃ tvaṃ pahāya attano purimāciṇṇaṃ mahicchatādiṃ paṭipajjasi, kiṃ nāmetanti adhippāyo.

[03] yamatthaṃ sandhāya ``gacchasi pubbaciṇṇa''nti vuttaṃ. taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``taṇhā avijjā cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti paccayesu taṇhā, ^b^avijjā^eb^ti tattheva ādīnavapaṭicchādikā avijjā. ^b^piyāpiya^eb^nti puttadārādīsu pemasaṅkhāto piyabhāvo ceva pantasenāsanesu adhikusaladhammesu ^a^V2.0400^ea^ anabhiratisaṅkhāto appiyabhāvo ca ubhayattha anurodhapaṭivirodho. ^b^subhāni rūpānī^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca subharūpāni. ^b^sukhā vedanā^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇe paṭicca uppajjanasukhavedanā. ^b^manāpiyā kāmaguṇā^eb^ti vuttāvasesā manoramā ^a^M2.0474^ea^ kāmakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^vantā^eb^ti nirūpato taṃnissitassa chandarāgassa vikkhambhanapahānena chaḍḍitatāya pariccattatāya ca vantā. ^b^vante ahaṃ āvamituṃ na ussahe^eb^ti evaṃ te chaḍḍite puna paccāvamituṃ ahaṃ na sakkomi, pariccattā eva hontīti vadati.

[03] ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu bhavesu sabbāsu yonīsu sabbāsu gatīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu ca. ^b^vaco kataṃ mayā^eb^ti, ambho citta, tava vacanaṃ mayā kataṃ. karonto ca ^b^bahūsu jātīsu na mesi kopito^eb^ti anekāsu jātīsu pana mayā na kopito asi. mayā neva paribhavito. tathāpi ^b^ajjhattasambhavo^eb^ attani sambhūto hutvāpi tava akataññutāya ^b^dukkhe cīraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate^eb^ti tayā nibbattite anādimati saṃsāradukkhe sucirakālaṃ mayā saṃsaritaṃ paribbhamitaṃ.

[03] idāni ``dukkhe ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ tayā kate''ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ uppattibhedena gatibhedena ca vitthārato dassento ^b^``tvaññevā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^rājadasī^eb^ti rājā asi, dakāro padasandhikaro, vessā ca suddā ca bhavāma ekadā taveva vāhasāti yojanā ^a^P3.0158^ea^. ^b^devattanaṃ vāpī^eb^ti devabhāvaṃ vāpi tvaṃyeva ^b^no^eb^ amhākaṃ, citta, karosīti yojanā. ^b^vāhasā^eb^ti kāraṇabhāvena.

[03] ^b^nanu dubbhissasi maṃ punappuna^eb^nti punappunaṃ dubbhissasi nuna, yathā pubbe tvaṃ anantāsu jātīsu, citta, mittapaṭirūpako sapatto hutvā mayhaṃ punappunaṃ dubbhi, idāni tathā dubbhissasi maññe, pubbe viya cāretuṃ na dassāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^muhuṃ muhuṃ cāraṇikaṃva dassaya^eb^nti abhiṇhato caraṇārahaṃ viya mano dassento caraṇārahaṃ purisaṃ vañcetvā caragopakaṃ nipphādento viya punappunaṃ taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ dassento. ^b^ummattakeneva mayā palobhasī^eb^ti ummattakapurisena viya mayā saddhiṃ kīḷanto taṃ taṃ palobhanīyaṃ dassetvā palobhasi. ^b^kiñcāpi te, citta, virādhitaṃ mayā^eb^ti, ambho citta, kiṃ nāma te mayā viraddhaṃ, taṃ kathehīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^idaṃ pure citta^eb^nti idaṃ cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu rajjanādinā, yena ākārena icchati, yattheva cassa kāmo uppajjati, tassa ^a^M2.0475^ea^ vasena yatthakāmaṃ yathā vicarantassa sukhaṃ ^a^V2.0401^ea^ hoti, tatheva ca caranto yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ acari. ajjāhaṃ pabhinnamadaṃ mattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena naṃ niggahessāmi, nassa vītikkamituṃ dassāmīti.

[03] ^b^satthā ca me lokamimaṃ adhiṭṭhahī^eb^ti mama satthā sammāsambuddho imaṃ anavasesakhandhalokaṃ ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahi. kinti? hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena ^b^aniccato,^eb^ kassacipi dhuvassa thāvarassa abhāvato ^b^addhuvato^eb^ sukhasārādīnaṃ abhāvato ^b^asārato^eb^. ^b^pakkhanda maṃ, citta, jinassa sāsane^eb^ti tasmā yāthāvato paṭipajjituṃ, citta, maṃ jinassa bhagavato sāsane pakkhandehi anuppavesehi. ``pakkhandima''ntipi pāḷi, jinassa sāsane imaṃ lokaṃ ñāṇena pakkhanda, yāthāvato tārehi, pakkhandanto ca vipassanāñāṇamaggena yāpento suduttarato mahantato saṃsāramahoghato maṃ tārehi.

[03] ^b^na te idaṃ, citta, yathā purāṇaka^eb^nti, ambho citta, idaṃ attabhāvagehaṃ porāṇakaṃ viya tava na hotīti attho. kasmā? ^b^nāhaṃ alaṃ tuyha vase nivattitu^eb^nti idānāhaṃ tava vase nivattituṃ na yutto. yasmā ^b^mahesino^eb^ bhagavato ^b^pabbajitomhi^eb^ sāsane. pabbajitakālato ca paṭṭhāya ^a^P3.0159^ea^ samaṇā nāma mādisāva na honti vināsadhārino, ekaṃsato samaṇāyeva hontīti attho.

[03] ^b^nagā^eb^ti sineruhimavantādayo sabbe pabbatā. ^b^samuddā^eb^ti puratthimasamuddādayo sītasamuddādayo, na sabbe samuddā. ^b^saritā^eb^ti gaṅgādayo sabbā nadiyo ca. ^b^vasundharā^eb^ti pathavī. ^b^disā catasso^eb^ti puratthimādibhedā catasso disā. ^b^vidisā^eb^ti puratthimadakkhiṇādayo catasso anudisā. ^b^adho^eb^ti heṭṭhā yāva udakasandhārakavāyukhandhā. ^b^divā^eb^ti devalokā. divāggahaṇena cettha tattha gate sattasaṅkhāre vadati. ^b^sabbe aniccā tibhavā upaddutā^eb^ti sabbe kāmabhavādayo tayo bhavā aniccā ceva jātiādīhi rāgādīhi kilesehi upaddutā pīḷitā ca, na ettha kiñci khemaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthi, tadabhāvato kuhiṃ gato, citta, sukhaṃ ramissasi, tasmā tato nissaraṇañcettha pariyesāhīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^dhitippara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0476^ea^ dhitiparāyaṇaṃ paramaṃ thirabhāve ṭhitaṃ mamaṃ, citta, kiṃ kāhisi, tato īsakampi maṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhissasīti attho. tenāha ^b^``na te alaṃ, citta, vasānuvattako''^eb^ti. idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassento ^b^``na jātu bhastaṃ ubhatomukhaṃ chupe ^a^V2.0402^ea^, dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandani''^eb^nti āha. tattha ^b^bhasta^eb^nti ruttiṃ. ^b^ubhatomukha^eb^nti putoḷiyā ubhatomukhaṃ. ^b^na jātu chupe^eb^ti ekaṃseneva pādenāpi na chupeyya, tathā ^b^dhiratthu pūraṃ navasotasandani^eb^nti nānappakārassa asucino pūraṃ navahi sotehi vaṇamukhehi asucisandaniṃ savatiṃ. tāya vaccakuṭiyā dhī atthu, tassā garahā hotu.

[03] evaṃ aṭṭhavīsatiyā gāthāhi niggaṇhanavasena cittaṃ ovaditvā idāni vivekaṭṭhānācikkhaṇādinā sampahaṃsento ^b^``varāhaeṇeyyavigāḷhasevite''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^varāhaeṇeyyavigāḷhasevite^eb^ti varāhehi ceva eṇeyyehi ca ogāhetvā sevite. ^b^pabbhārakuṭṭe^eb^ti pabbhāraṭṭhāne ceva pabbatasikhare ca. ^b^pakateva sundare^eb^ti pakatiyā eva sundare atittimanohare. ``pakativasundhare''ti vā pāṭho, pākatike bhūmipadeseti attho. ^b^navambunā pāvusasittakānane^eb^ti pāvusavasena vuṭṭhena meghodakena upasittavasse sutheve vane. ^b^tahiṃ guhāgehagato ramissasī^eb^ti tasmiṃ pabbatakānane guhāsaṅkhātaṃ gehaṃ upagato bhāvanāratiyā abhiramissasi.
[03] ^b^te taṃ ramessantī^eb^ti te mayūrādayo vanasaññaṃ uppādentā taṃ ramessantīti attho.

[03] ^b^vuṭṭhamhi deve^eb^ti meghe adhippavuṭṭhe. ^b^caturaṅgule tiṇe^eb^ti teneva gassodakapātena tattha tattha tiṇe surattavaṇṇakambalasadise caturaṅgule ^a^P3.0160^ea^ jāte. ^b^saṃpupphite meghanibhamhi kānane^eb^ti pāvusameghasaṅkāse kānane sammadeva pupphite. ^b^nagantare^eb^ti pabbatantare. ^b^viṭapisamo sayissa^eb^nti tarusadiso apariggaho hutvā nipajjissaṃ. ^b^taṃ me mudū hehiti tūlasannibha^eb^nti taṃ tiṇapaccattharaṇaṃ mudu sukhasamphassaṃ tūlasannibhaṃ tūlikasadisaṃ sayanaṃ me bhavissati.

[03] ^b^tathā^eb^ ^a^M2.0477^ea^ ^b^tu kassāmi yathāpi issaro^eb^ti yathā koci issarapuriso attano vacanakaradāsādiṃ vase vatteti, ahampi, citta, taṃ tathā karissāmi, mayhaṃ vase vattemiyeva. kathaṃ? ^b^yaṃ labbhati tenapi hotu me ala^eb^nti catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā labbhati, tena ca mayhaṃ alaṃ pariyattaṃ hotu. etena idaṃ dasseti -- yasmā idhekacce sattā taṇhuppādahetu cittassa vase anuvattanti, ahaṃ pana taṇhuppādaṃ dūrato vajjento cittaṃ dāsaṃ viya karonto attano vase vattemīti. ^b^na tāhaṃ kassāmi yathā atandito, biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumaddita^eb^nti citta taṇhuppādaparivajjanahetu, puna tanti cittaṃ āmasati, yathā aññopi koci sammappadhānayogena bhāvanāya atandito attano cittaṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ karoti, tathā ahampi, citta, taṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ mayhaṃ vase vattaṃ karissāmi ^a^V2.0403^ea^. yathā kiṃ? ^b^biḷārabhastaṃva yathā sumadditaṃ, na^eb^iti nipātamattaṃ. yathā suṭṭhu madditaṃ biḷārabhastaṃ kammakkhamaṃ, kammayoggaṃ sukhena pariharaṇīyañca hoti, tathāhaṃ taṃ karissāmi.

[03] ^b^vīriyena taṃ mayha vasānayissa^eb^nti, ambho citta, taṃ attano vīriyena bhāvanābalaṃ uppādetvā tena mayhaṃ vasaṃ ānayissaṃ. ^b^gajaṃva mattaṃ kusalaṅkusaggaho^eb^ti yathā kusalo cheko aṅkusaggaho hatthācariyo attano sikkhābalena mattahatthiṃ attano vasaṃ āneti, tathevāti attho.

[03] ^b^tayā sudantena avaṭṭhitena hī^eb^ti ^b^hī^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, citta, samathavipassanābhāvanāhi suṭṭhu dantena tato eva sammadeva vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipannattā avaṭṭhitena tayā. ^b^hayena yoggācariyova ujjunā^eb^ti yathā sudantena sudantattā eva ujunā avaṅkagatinā assājānīyena yoggācariyo assadammasārathi akhemaṭṭhānato khemantabhūmiṃ paṭipajjituṃ sakkoti, evaṃ ^b^pahomi maggaṃ paṭipajjituṃ siva^eb^nti asivabhāvakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena sivaṃ. ^b^cittānurakkhīhī^eb^ti attano cittaṃ anurakkhaṇasīlehi buddhādīhi sabbakālaṃ sevitaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ahaṃ paṭipajjituṃ adhigantuṃ pahomi sakkomīti.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇe^eb^ ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ^b^taṃ balasā nibandhisaṃ, nāgaṃva thambhamhi daḷhāya^eb^ ^a^P3.0161^ea^ ^b^rajjuyā^eb^ti yathā hatthācariyo mahāhatthiṃ āḷānathambhe daḷhāya thirāya rajjuyā nibandhati, evamahaṃ, citta, kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe bhāvanābalena nibandhissaṃ. ^b^taṃ me suguttaṃ satiyā subhāvita^eb^nti taṃ tvaṃ, citta, mama satiyā suguttaṃ subhāvitañca hutvā. ^b^anissitaṃ sabbabhavesu hehisī^eb^ti ariyamaggabhāvanādibalena kāmabhavādīsu sabbesupi bhavesu taṇhādinissayehi anissitaṃ bhavissasi.

[03] ^b^paññāya chetvā vipathānusārina^eb^nti uppathagāminaṃ āyatanasamudayaṃ yāthāvato disvā yena samudayena uppathagāmī, tassa kilesavissandanaṃ kilesavipphanditaṃ indriyasaṃvarūpanissayāya paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya chinditvā sotavicchedanavasena āvaraṇaṃ katvā. ^b^yogena niggayhā^eb^ti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātena yogena sāmatthiyavidhamanena niggahetvā. ^b^pathe nivesiyā^eb^ti vipassanāvīthiyaṃ nivesetvā, patiṭṭhapetvā. yadā pana vipassanā ussukkāpitā maggena ghaṭṭeti, tadā maggapaññāya ``yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti (mahāva0 16; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081) nidassanena sabbaso āyatanasamudayassa vibhavaṃ sambhavañca asammohato disvā sadevake loke ^b^aggavādino^eb^ sammāsambuddhassa ^b^dāyādo^eb^ orasaputto ^b^hehisi^eb^ bhavissasīti attho.

[03] ^b^catubbipallāsavasaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0404^ea^ ^b^adhiṭṭhita^eb^nti anicce niccanti, asubhe subhanti, dukkhe sukhanti, anattani attāti imesaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ vasaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ anuvattantaṃ. ^b^gāmaṇḍalaṃva parinesi, citta, ma^eb^nti, ambho citta, maṃ gāmadārakaṃ viya parikaḍḍhasi, ito cito parikaḍḍhasi. ^b^nanu saṃyojanabandhanacchida^eb^nti saṃyojanasaṅkhātānaṃ dasannaṃ bandhanānaṃ chedakaṃ ^b^kāruṇikaṃ mahāmuniṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ saṃsevasi nanu, ``tathārūpe mahānubhāve dūratova vajjesi, mādise pana tapassine yathāruci parinesī''ti appasādalesena satthāraṃ pasaṃsati.

[03] ^b^migo yathā^eb^ti yathā migo rukkhagacchalatādīhi suṭṭhu cittavicitte anākule kānane ^b^seri^eb^ sayaṃvasī ramati. ^b^rammaṃ giriṃ pāvusābbhamālini^eb^nti evaṃ pāvusakāle samantato sumālinīhi thalajajalajamālāhi samannāgatattā ^a^M2.0479^ea^ abbhamāliniṃ janavivittatāya manoramatāya ca rammaṃ pabbataṃ labhitvā tattha nage ramissaṃ, ^b^asaṃsayaṃ^eb^ ekaṃseneva tvaṃ, citta, parābhavissasi, saṃsārabyasanehi ṭhassasīti attho.

[03] ^b^ye tuyha chandena vasena vattino^eb^ti sabbe puthujjane cittasāmaññena gahetvā vadati. tassattho -- ^b^ye^eb^ naranāriyo, ambho ^a^P3.0162^ea^ citta, tuyhaṃ ^b^chandena vasena^eb^ ruciyā ṭhitā ^b^yaṃ^eb^ gehanissitaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ anubhonti^eb^ anubhavissanti, te ^b^aviddasū^eb^ andhabālā, ^b^māravasānuvattino^eb^ kilesamārādīnaṃ vase anuvattanasīlā, ^b^bhavābhinandī^eb^ kāmādibhavameva abhinandanato, tava sāvakā anusiṭṭhikarā. mayaṃ pana sammāsambuddhassa sāvakā, na tuyhaṃ vase anuvattāmāti.

[03] evaṃ thero pubbe attano uppannaṃ yonisomanasikāraṃ cittassa niggaṇhanavasena pavattaṃ nānappakārato vibhajitvā samīpe ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena dhammaṃ kathesi. yaṃ panettha antarantarā atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.

[03] saṭṭhinipāte ^a^M2.0480^ea^ ^a^V2.0405^ea^ ^b^āraññikā^eb^tiādikā āyasmato mahāmoggallānattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? tassa vatthu dhammasenāpativatthumhi vuttameva. thero hi pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā -- ``moggallāna, moggallāna, mā, brāhmaṇa, ariyaṃ tuṇhībhāvaṃ pamādo''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 2.235) saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā bhagavatā vuccamānaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇanto eva vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paṭipāṭiyā uparimaggattayaṃ upagantvā aggaphalakkhaṇe sāvakapāramīñāṇassa matthakaṃ pāpuṇi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375-397) --
[22] obhāsento disā sabbā, bhavanaṃ me upāgami..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[21] ``asmimānaṃ ^a^M2.0482^ea^ na passāmi, māno mayhaṃ na vijjati.

[03] atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno tena tena guṇena attano sāvake etadagge ṭhapento ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno''ti (a0 ni0 1.188, 190) iddhimantatāya etadagge ṭhapesi. tena evaṃ satthārā etadagge ṭhapitena sāvakapāramiyā matthakaṃ pattena mahātherena taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ āgamma tattha tattha bhāsitā gāthā, tā saṅgītikāle dhammasaṅgāhakehi --
[22] bhikkhu parivajjayate taṃ, mīḷhañca yathā sucikāmo..
[21] ``evañce ^a^M2.0483^ea^ taṃ jano jaññā, yathā jānāmi taṃ ahaṃ.
[22] āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhiti..
[22] aṭṭhiṃ tacena onaddhaṃ, saha vatthehi sobhati..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] alaṃ bālassa mohāya, no ca pāragavesino..
[22] ye pañcakkhandhe passanti, parato no ca attato..
[21] ``ye ca passanti saṅkhāre, parato no ca attato.
[22] dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhanaṃ..
[22] khippaṃ pañjaliko vanda, mā te vijaṭi matthakaṃ..
[22] yassa te āsavā khīṇā, dakkhiṇeyyosi mārisa..
[21] ``yassa muhuttena sahassadhā loko, saṃvidito sabrahmakappo vasi.
[22] iddhiguṇe cutupapāte kāle, passati devatā sa bhikkhu..
[22] dhīro samucchindi samāhitindriyo, nāgo yathā pūtilataṃva bandhanaṃ..
[27] īdiso nirayo āsi, yattha dussī apaccatha.
[22] tassa sakko viyākāsi, pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātathaṃ..
[27] ajjāpi tyāvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu.
[22] na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu..
[22] sohaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato..
[22] vanaṃ pubbavidehānaṃ, ye ca bhūmisayā narā..
[21] ``na ve aggi cetayati, ahaṃ bālaṃ ḍahāmiti.
[22] bālova jalitaṃ aggiṃ, āsajja naṃ paḍayhati..
[22] sayaṃ ḍahissasi attānaṃ, bālo aggiṃva samphusaṃ..
[22] kinnu maññasi pāpima, na me pāpaṃ vipaccati..
[22] māra nibbinda buddhamhā, āsaṃ mākāsi bhikkhusu..
[25] itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno thero gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
[03] iminā anukkamena ekaccaṃ saṅgahaṃ āropetvā ṭhapitā.

[03] tattha ^b^``āraññikā''^eb^tiādikā catasso gāthā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena bhāsitā. ^b^āraññikā^eb^ti gāmantasenāsanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā āraññakadhutaṅgasamādānena āraññikā. saṅghabhattaṃ paṭikkhipitvā piṇḍapātikaṅgasamādānena ^a^P3.0167^ea^ ^b^piṇḍapātikā,^eb^ ghare ghare laddhapiṇḍapātena yāpanakā. ^b^uñchāpattāgate^eb^ ^a^V2.0412^ea^ ^b^ratā^eb^ti uñchācariyāya patte āgate pattapariyāpanne ratā, teneva abhiratā santuṭṭhā. ^b^dālemu maccuno sena^eb^nti attānaṃ anatthajanane sahāyabhāvūpagamanato maccurājassa senābhūtaṃ kilesavāhiniṃ samucchindema. ^b^ajjhattaṃ susamāhitā^eb^ti gocarajjhattesu suṭṭhu samāhitā hutvā, etenassa padālanupāyamāha.

[03] ^b^``aṭṭhikaṅkalakuṭike''^eb^tiādikā catasso gāthā attānaṃ palobhetuṃ upagatāya gaṇikāya ovādavasena abhāsi. tattha ^b^aṭṭhikaṅkalakuṭike^eb^ti aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāmayakuṭike. ^b^nhārupasibbite^eb^ti navahi nhārusatehi samantato sibbite. araññe kuṭiyo dārudaṇḍe ussāpetvā ^a^M2.0489^ea^ valliādīhi bandhitvā kariyanti, tvaṃ pana paramajegucchena aṭṭhikaṅkalena paramajeguccheheva nhārūhi bandhitvā katā, ativiya jegucchā paṭikkūlā cāti dasseti. ^b^dhiratthu pūre duggandhe^eb^ti kesalomādino nānappakārassa asucino pūre paripuṇṇe, tato eva duggandhe dhiratthu tava dhīkāro hotu. ^b^paragatte mamāyase^eb^ti idañca te duggandhassa upari phoṭasamuṭṭhānaṃ parissayaṃ evaṃ asuciduggandhaṃ jegucchaṃ paṭikkūlasamādānaṃ tādise eva aññasmiṃ padese soṇasiṅgālakimikulādīnaṃ gattabhūte kaḷevare mamattaṃ karosi.

[03] ^b^gūthabhaste^eb^ti gūthabharitabhastasadise. ^b^taconaddhe^eb^ti tacena onaddhe chavimattapaṭicchāditakibbise. ^b^uragaṇḍipisācinī^eb^ti ure ṭhitagaṇḍadvayavatī bhayānakabhāvato anatthāvahato ca pisācasadisī. ^b^yāni sandanti sabbadā^eb^ti yāni nava sotāni, nava vaṇamukhāni sabbadā rattindivaṃ sandanti, savanti, asuciṃ paggharanti.

[03] ^b^paribandha^eb^nti sammāpaṭipattiparibandhabhūtaṃ. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanto bhinnakileso vā dūrato ^b^parivajjayate^eb^ti mamattaṃ na karoti. ^b^mīḷhañca yathā sucikāmo^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-iti nipātamattaṃ. yathā sucijātiko sucimeva icchanto sasīsaṃ nhāto mīḷhaṃ disvā dūratova parivajjesi, evamevaṃ bhikkhūti attho.

[03] ^b^evañce taṃ jano jaññā, yathā jānāmi taṃ aha^eb^nti evaṃ sarīrasaññitaṃ asucipuñjaṃ yathā ahaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānāmi, evameva mahājano jāneyya, taṃ ārakā dūratova parivajjeyya. ^b^gūthaṭṭhānaṃva^eb^ ^a^V2.0413^ea^ ^b^pāvuse^eb^ti pāvusakāle kilinnāsuciṃ nirantaraṃ gūthaṭṭhānaṃ viya sucijātiko. yasmā pana taṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti, tasmā tattha nimuggo sīsaṃ na ukkhipatīti adhippāyo.

[03] evaṃ ^a^P3.0168^ea^ therena sarīre dose vibhāvite sā gaṇikā lajjāvanatamukhā there gāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā ^b^``evametaṃ mahāvīrā''^eb^ti gāthaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. tattha ^b^ettha ceke^eb^ti evaṃ pākaṭapaṭikkūlasabhāvepi etasmiṃ kāye ekacce sattā āsattibalavatāya ^b^visīdanti^eb^ visādaṃ ^a^M2.0490^ea^ āpajjanti. ^b^paṅkamhiva jaraggavo^eb^ mahākaddamakucchiyaṃ sampatitadubbalabalibaddo viya byasanameva pāpuṇantīti attho.

[03] puna taṃ thero mādise evarūpā paṭipatti niratthakā vighātāvahā evāti dassento ^b^``ākāsamhī''^eb^tiādinā gāthādvayamāha. tassattho -- yo puggalo haliddiyā aññena vā raṅgajātena ākāsaṃ rañjituṃ maññeyya, tassa taṃ kammaṃ ^b^vighātudayaṃ^eb^ cittavighātāvahameva siyā, yathā taṃ avisaye yogo.

[03] ^b^tadākāsasamaṃ citta^eb^nti tayidaṃ mama cittaṃ ākāsasamaṃ katthaci alaggabhāvena ajjhattaṃ suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ, tasmā ^b^mā pāpacitte āsādī^eb^ti kāmesu nimuggatāya lāmakacitte nihīnacitte mādise mā āsādehi. ^b^aggikhandhaṃva pakkhimā^eb^ti pakkhimā salabho aggikkhandhaṃ āsādento anatthameva pāpuṇāti, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ tuyhanti dasseti.
[03] ^b^passa cittakata^eb^ntiādikā satta gāthā tameva gaṇikaṃ disvā vipallattacittānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ovādadānavasena vuttā. taṃ sutvā sā gaṇikā maṅkubhūtā āgatamaggeneva palātā.
[03] ^b^tadāsī^eb^tiādikā catasso gāthā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha vuttā. tattha ^b^anekākārasampanne^eb^ti anekehi sīlasaṃvarādippakārehi paripuṇṇe.

[03] ^b^sukhumaṃ te paṭivijjhantī^eb^ti te yogino atisukhumaṃ paṭivijjhanti nāma. yathā kiṃ? ^b^vālaggaṃ usunā yathā^eb^ yathā satadhābhinnassa vālassa ekaṃ aṃsu aggaṃ rattandhakāratimisāya vijjullatobhāsena vijjhantā viyāti attho. ke pana teti āha ^b^``ye pañcakkhandhe passanti, parato no ca attato''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^parato^eb^ti anattato. tassa attaggāhapaṭikkhepadassanañhetaṃ. tenāha ^b^``no ca attato''^eb^ti. etena anattato abhivuṭṭhitassa ariyamaggassa vasena dukkhasacce ^a^V2.0414^ea^ pariññābhisamayaṃ āha, tadavinābhāvato pana itaresampi abhisamayānaṃ suppaṭivijjhatā vuttā eva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. keci pana ``anatthakārakato pare nāma pañcupādānakkhandhāti `parato passantī'ti iminā visesato sabbopi sammadeva vutto''ti vadanti. ^b^paccabyādhiṃsū^eb^ti paṭivijjhiṃsu.
[03] ^b^sattiyā^eb^ ^a^M2.0491^ea^ ^b^viya omaṭṭho^eb^ti paṭhamagāthā tissattheraṃ ārabbha vuttā, dutiyā vaḍḍhamānattheraṃ. tā heṭṭhā vuttatthāva.
[03] ^b^codito^eb^ ^a^P3.0169^ea^ ^b^bhāvitattenā^eb^ti gāthā pāsādakampanasuttantaṃ ārabbha vuttā. tattha ^b^bhāvitattena sarīrantimadhārinā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.

[03] ^b^nayidaṃ sithilamārabbhā^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā hīnavīriyaṃ ^b^veda^eb^nāmakaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ārabbha vuttā. tattha ^b^sithilamārabbhā^eb^ti sithilaṃ katvā vīriyaṃ akatvā. ^b^appena thāmasā^eb^ti appakena vīriyabalena nayidaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigantabbaṃ, mahanteneva pana catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyena pattabbanti attho.
[03] ^b^vivaramanupabhantī^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā attano vivekabhāvaṃ ārabbha vuttā. tattha ^b^brahmunā abhivandito^eb^ti mahābrahmunā sadevakena lokena ca abhimukhena hutvā thomito namassito ca.

[03] ^b^upasantaṃ uparata^eb^ntiādikā pañca gāthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ disvā ``kāḷakaṇṇī mayā diṭṭhā''ti oloketvā ṭhitaṃ sāriputtattherassa bhāgineyyaṃ micchādiṭṭhibrāhmaṇaṃ disvā tassa anukampāya ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mā nassī''ti ariyūpavādapaṭighātatthaṃ ``theraṃ vandāhī''ti taṃ uyyojentena vuttā. tattha ^b^jātisataṃ gacche^eb^ti jātīnaṃ sataṃ upagaccheyya. ^b^sottiyo^eb^ti sottiyajātiko. ^b^vedasampanno^eb^ti ñāṇasampanno. ^b^etassā^eb^ti therassa. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo uditoditā asambhinnā satabrāhmaṇajātiyo anupaṭipāṭiyā uppajjanavasena upagaccheyya, tattha ca brāhmaṇānaṃ vijjāsu nipphattiṃ gato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū siyā brāhmaṇavattañca pūrento, tassetaṃ vijjādianuṭṭhānaṃ etassa mahākassapattherassa vandanāya vandanāmayapuññassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati, vandanāmayapuññameva tato mahantataranti.

[03] ^b^aṭṭha^eb^ ^a^V2.0415^ea^ ^b^vimokkhānī^eb^ti rūpajjhānādike aṭṭha vimokkhe. bhāvanāvasena hi laddhāni rūpajjhānāni paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttataṃ abhirativasena ārammaṇe nirāsaṅgañca pavattiṃ upādāya ``vimokkhānī''ti vuccanti. nirodhasamāpatti pana paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā eva. idha pana jhānameva veditabbaṃ. ^b^anulomaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0492^ea^ ^b^paṭiloma^eb^nti paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā anulomaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā paṭilomaṃ. ^b^purebhatta^eb^nti bhattakiccato pureyeva. ^b^aphassayī^eb^ti anekākāravokārā samāpattiyo samāpajji. ^b^tato piṇḍāya gacchatī^eb^ti tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya, tato vā samāpattisamāpajjitato pacchā idāni piṇḍāya gacchatīti tadahu pavattaṃ therassa paṭipattiṃ sandhāya vadati. thero pana divase divase tatheva paṭipajjati.

[03] ^b^tādisaṃ^eb^ ^a^P3.0170^ea^ ^b^bhikkhuṃ māsādī^eb^ti yādisassa guṇā ekadesena vuttā, tādisaṃ tathārūpaṃ buddhānubuddhaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ bhikkhuṃ mā āsādehi. ^b^māttānaṃ khaṇi brāhmaṇā^eb^ti āsādanena ca, brāhmaṇa, mā attānaṃ khaṇi, ariyūpavādena attano kusaladhammaṃ vā ummulehi. ^b^abhippasādehi mana^eb^nti ``sādhurūpo vata ayaṃ samaṇo''ti attano cittaṃ pasādehi. ^b^mā te vijaṭi matthaka^eb^nti tava matthakaṃ tasmiṃ katena aparādhena sattadhā mā phali. tasmā tassa paṭikāratthaṃ khippameva pañjaliko vandāti. brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvā bhīto saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto tāvadeva theraṃ khamāpesi.

[03] ^b^neso passatī^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā poṭṭhilaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ sammā apaṭipajjantaṃ micchājīvakataṃ disvā codanāvasena vuttā. tattha ^b^neso passati saddhamma^eb^nti eso poṭṭhilo bhikkhu sataṃ buddhādīnaṃ dhammaṃ maggaphalanibbānaṃ na passati. kasmā? ^b^saṃsārena purakkhato^eb^ saṃsārabandhanāvijjādinā purakkhato apāyesu nibbattanato ^b^adhogamaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhāgāmiṃ māyāsāṭheyyānugatattā ^b^jimhapathaṃ^eb^ micchāmaggabhāvato ^b^kummagga^eb^bhūtaṃ micchājīvaṃ ^b^anudhāvati^eb^ anuparivattati.

[03] ^b^kimīva mīḷhasallitto^eb^ti gūthakimī viya mīḷhena samantato litto kilesāsucivimissite ^b^saṅkhāre adhimucchito^eb^ ajjhāpanno. ^b^pagāḷho lābhasakkāre^eb^ti lābhe ca sakkāre ca taṇhāvasena pakārato gāḷho ogāḷho. ^b^tuccho gacchati poṭṭhilo^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhābhāvato tuccho asāro hutvā poṭṭhilo bhikkhu gacchati pavattati.

[03] ^b^imañca^eb^ ^a^M2.0493^ea^ ^a^V2.0416^ea^ ^b^passā^eb^tiādikā dve gāthā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ pasaṃsantena vuttā. tattha ^b^imañca passā^eb^ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ disvā pasannamānaso attano cittaṃ ālapati. ^b^sudassana^eb^nti asekkhānaṃ sīlakkhandhānañceva pāripūriyā sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca pāripūriyā sundaradassanaṃ. ^b^vimuttaṃ ubhatobhāge^eb^ti ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ ubhatobhāgeti arūpasamāpattiyā rūpakāyato, maggena nāmakāyato, yathārahaṃ tehiyeva vikkhambhanasamucchedabhāgehi vimuttanti attho. sabbaso rāgasallādīnaṃ abhāvena ^b^visallaṃ^eb^ kāmādiyogānaṃ sammadeva khīṇattā ^b^khīṇasaṃyogaṃ^eb^ suparisuddhassa vijjāttayassa adhigatattā ^b^tevijjaṃ^eb^ maccurājassa bhañjitattā ^b^maccuhāyinaṃ^eb^ passāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^ete sambahulā^eb^tiādikā gāthā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pasaṃsantena vuttā. tattha ^b^pūjito naradevenā^eb^ti narehi ca devehi ca paramāya pūjāya ^a^P3.0171^ea^ pūjito. ^b^uppanno maraṇābhibhū^eb^ti loke uppanno hutvā maraṇaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhito. atha vā ^b^pūjito naradevena^eb^ sammāsambuddhena kāraṇabhūtena ariyāya jātiyā uppanno. sammāsambuddho hi paṭhamaṃ kammunā naro manusso hutvā pacchāpi ariyāya jātiyā uttamo devo devātidevo ahosi, tasmā ``naradevo''ti vuccati. pūjito naradevena bhagavatā pasaṃsāvasena uppanno maraṇābhibhūte loke uppanno hutvā maraṇābhibhū maccuhāyī. ^b^puṇḍarīkaṃva toyena^eb^ udakena puṇḍarīkaṃ viya saṅkhāragate taṇhādiṭṭhilepena na upalimpati, katthacipi anissitoti attho.

[03] ^b^yassā^eb^ti yena. ^b^muhutte^eb^ti khaṇamatte kāle. ^b^sahassadhā^eb^ti sahassapakāro. ^b^loko^eb^ti okāsaloko. ayañhettha attho -- yena mahiddhikena āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena sahassilokadhātu khaṇeneva sammadeva vidito, paccakkhato ñāto ^b^sabrahmakappo^eb^ mahābrahmasadiso āvajjanādivasībhāvappattiyā iddhisampadāya cutūpapāte ca vasī. ^b^kāle passatī^eb^ti tadanurūpe kāle dibbena cakkhunā devatā passatīti.

[03] ^b^sāriputtovā^eb^tiādikā gāthā āyasmatā mahāmoggallānena attano guṇe pakāsentena vuttā. tattha ^b^sāriputtovā^eb^ti gāthāya ^a^M2.0494^ea^ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^paññāya^eb^ paññāsampadāya, ^b^sīlena^eb^ sīlasampattiyā, ^b^upasamena^eb^ kilesavūpasamena, yo bhikkhu ^b^pāraṅgato^eb^ pāraṃ pariyantaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ gato so sāriputto sāvakehi paññādīhi guṇehi paramukkaṃsagato. paññāya sīlena hi paramukkaṃsagato. ^b^etāvaparamo siyā^eb^ etaparamo eva, natthi tato uttarīti. imaṃ pana thero yathā sāriputto paññāya uttamo, tathā ahaṃ samādhinā uttamoti dīpetuṃ avoca. tenevāha ^b^``koṭisatasahassassā^eb^''tiādi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0417^ea^ ^b^khaṇena nimmine^eb^ti khaṇeneva koṭisatasahassāttabhāvaṃ nimmineyya nimmituṃ samattho. tassa nimminane na mayhaṃ bhāro atthi. ^b^vikubbanāsu kusalo, vasībhūtomhi iddhiyā^eb^ti na kevalaṃ manomayavikubbanāsu eva, sabbāyapi iddhiyā vasībhāvappatto amhi.

[03] ^b^samādhivijjāvasipāramīgato^eb^ti savitakkasavicārādisamādhīsu ceva pubbenivāsañāṇādivijjāsu ca vasībhāvena pāramiṃ koṭiṃ patto asi. tassa taṇhānissayādirahitassa satthu sāsane yathāvuttehi guṇehi ukkaṃsagato. dhitisampannatāya ^b^dhīro, moggallānagotto^eb^ moggallāno, suṭṭhu ṭhapitaindriyatāya ^b^samāhitindriyo,^eb^ yathā hatthināgo pūtilatābandhanaṃ sukheneva chindati, evaṃ sakalaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ samucchindi evāti.

[03] ^b^kīdiso^eb^ ^a^P3.0172^ea^ ^b^nirayo āsī^eb^tiādayo gāthā koṭṭhaṃ anupavisitvā nikkhamitvā ṭhitamāraṃ tajjentena therena vuttā. tattha ^b^kīdiso^eb^ti kiṃpakāro. ^b^yattha dussī^eb^ti yasmiṃ niraye ``dussī''ti evaṃnāmo māro. ^b^apaccathā^eb^ti nirayagginā apacci. ^b^vidhuraṃ sāvaka^eb^nti vidhuraṃ nāma kakusandhassa bhagavato aggasāvakaṃ. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti ghaṭṭayitvā bādhitvā. ^b^kakusandhañca brāhmaṇa^eb^nti kakusandhañca sammāsambuddhaṃ āsajjāti attho. bhagavantaṃ uddissa kumāraṃ āvisitvā mārena khittā sakkharā therassa sīse pati.

[03] ^b^sataṃ āsi ayosaṅkū^eb^ti tasmiṃ kira niraye upapannānaṃ tigāvuto attabhāvo hoti, dussīmārassāpi tādisova ahosi. atha nirayapālā tālakkhandhappamāṇānaṃ ayosūlānaṃ ādittānaṃ sampajjalitānaṃ sajotibhūtānaṃ satameva gahetvā ``imasmiṃva te ṭhāne ṭhitena ^a^M2.0495^ea^ hadayena cintetvā pāpaṃ kata''nti sudhādoṇiyaṃ sudhaṃ koṭṭentā viya hadayamajjhaṃ koṭṭetvā paṇṇāsa janā pādābhimukhā, paṇṇāsa janā sīsābhimukhā koṭṭentā gacchanti, evaṃ gacchantā ca pañcahi vassasatehi ubho ante patvā puna nivattamānā pañcahi vassasatehi hadayamajjhaṃ upagacchanti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``sataṃ āsi ayosaṅkū''ti. ^b^sabbe paccattavedanā^eb^ti sayameva pāṭiyekkavedanājanakā. sā kira vedanā mahānirayavedanāto dukkhatarā hoti, yathā hi sinehapānasattāhato parihārasattāhaṃ dukkhataraṃ, evaṃ mahānirayadukkhato ussade vuṭṭhānavedanā dukkhatarā. ^b^īdiso nirayo āsī^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne devadūtasuttena (a0 ni0 3.36; ma0 ni0 3.261) nirayo dīpetabbo.

[03] ^b^yo etamabhijānātī^eb^ti yo mahābhiñño etaṃ kammaphalañca hatthatale ṭhapitāamalakaṃ viya abhimukhaṃ ^a^V2.0418^ea^ katvā paccakkhato jānāti. ^b^bhikkhu buddhassa sāvako^eb^ti bhinnakileso bhikkhu sammāsambuddhassa sāvako. ^b^kaṇha, dukkhaṃ nigacchasī^eb^ti ekantakāḷakehi pāpadhammehi samannāgatattā, kaṇha māra, dukkhaṃ vindissasi.

[03] ^b^majjhesarasmi^eb^nti mahāsamuddassa majjhe kira udakaṃ vatthuṃ katvā nibbattavimānāni kappaṭṭhitikāni honti. tenāha ^b^``vimānā kappaṭhāyino''^eb^ti. tesaṃ veḷuriyassa viya vaṇṇo hoti, pabbatamatthake jalitanaḷaggikhandho viya ca etesaṃ acciyo jotanti, tena te ativiya pabhassarā pabhāsampannā honti. tenāha ^b^``veḷuriyavaṇṇā rucirā, accimanto pabhassarā''^eb^ti. ^b^puthu^eb^ ^a^P3.0173^ea^ ^b^nānattavaṇṇiyo^eb^ti nīlādivasena nānattavaṇṇā bahū accharā ^b^tattha^eb^ tesu vimānesu naccanti.
[03] ^b^yo etamabhijānātī^eb^ti yo etaṃ vimānaṃ vatthuṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā jānāti. ayañhi attho vimānapetavatthūhi dīpetabbo.

[03] ^b^buddhena codito^eb^ti sammāsambuddhena codito uyyojito. ^b^bhikkhusaṅghassa pekkhato^eb^ti mahato bhikkhusaṅghassa passantassa. ^b^migāramātupāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampayī^eb^ti (ma0 ni0 1.513) pubbārāme visākhāya mahāupāsikāya kāritaṃ sahassagabbhapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ attano pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesiṃ. ekasmiñhi samaye pubbārāme yathāvuttapāsāde bhagavati ^a^M2.0496^ea^ viharante sambahulā navakatarā bhikkhū uparipāsāde nisinnā satthārampi acintetvā tiracchānakathaṃ kathetumāraddhā, taṃ sutvā bhagavā te saṃvejetvā attano dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte kātukāmo āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``passasi tvaṃ, moggallāna, nave bhikkhū tiracchānakathamanuyutte''ti. taṃ sutvā thero satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā abhiññāpādakaṃ āpokasiṇārammaṇaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ``pāsādassa patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ udakaṃ hotū''ti adhiṭṭhāya pāsādamatthake thūpikaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena pahari, pāsādo onamitvā ekena passena aṭṭhāsi. punapi pahari, aparena passena aṭṭhāsi. te bhikkhū bhītā saṃviggā pāsādassa patanabhayena tato nikkhamitvā bhagavato samīpe aṭṭhaṃsu. satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ deseti. taṃ sutvā tesu keci sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, keci sakadāgāmiphale, keci anāgāmiphale, keci arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. svāyamattho pāsādakampanasuttena dīpetabbo.

[03] ^b^vejayantapāsāda^eb^nti so vejayantapāsādo tāvatiṃsabhavane yojanasahassubbedho anekasahassaniyyūhakūṭāgārapaṭimaṇḍito devāsurasaṅgāme asure jinitvā sakke devānaminde nagaramajjhe ^a^V2.0419^ea^ ṭhite uṭṭhito vijayantena nibbattattā ``vejayanto''ti laddhanāmo pāsādo, taṃ sandhāyāha ``vejayantapāsāda''nti. tampi hi ayaṃ thero pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi. ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavantaṃ pubbārāme viharantaṃ sakko devarājā upasaṅkamitvā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ pucchi. tassa bhagavā vissajjeti. so taṃ sutvā attamano pamudito abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā attano devalokameva gato. athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno evaṃ cintesi -- ``ayaṃ sakko bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evarūpaṃ gambhīraṃ nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, bhagavatā ca pañho vissajjito, kinnu kho jānitvā gato, udāhu ajānitvā? yaṃnūnāhaṃ ^a^P3.0174^ea^ devalokaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ jāneyya''nti. so tāvadeva tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ tamatthaṃ pucchi. sakko dibbasampattiyā pamatto hutvā vikkhepaṃ akāsi. thero tassa saṃvegajananatthaṃ vejayantapāsādaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhena kampesi. tena vuttaṃ --
[03] ayaṃ panattho cūḷataṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttena (ma0 ni0 1.390 ādayo) dīpetabbo. kampitākāro heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] ^b^sakkaṃ so paripucchatī^eb^ti yathāvuttameva therassa taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttipucchaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``api, āvuso, jānāsi, taṇhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^''ti. ^b^tassa sakko viyākāsī^eb^ti idaṃ therena pāsādakampane kate saṃviggahadayena pamādaṃ pahāya yoniso manasi karitvā pañhassa byākatabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. satthārā desitaniyāmeneva hi so tadā kathesi. tenāha ``pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātatha''nti. tattha ^b^sakkaṃ so paripucchatī^eb^ti sakkaṃ devarājaṃ so moggallānatthero satthārā desitāya taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyā sammadeva gahitabhāvaṃ pucchi. atītatthe hi idaṃ vattamānavacanaṃ. ^b^api, āvuso, jānāsī^eb^ti, āvuso, api jānāsi, kiṃ jānāsi? ^b^taṇhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti yathā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiyo satthārā tuyhaṃ desitā, tathā kiṃ jānāsīti pucchi. ^b^taṇhakkhayavimuttiyo^eb^ti vā taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttisuttassa desanaṃ pucchati.

[03] ^b^brahmāna^eb^nti mahābrahmānaṃ. ^b^sudhammāyaṃ ṭhito sabha^eb^nti sudhammāya sabhāya. ayaṃ pana brahmaloke sudhammasabhāva, na tāvatiṃsabhavane, sudhammasabhāvirahito devaloko nāma natthi. ^b^ajjāpi tyāvuso, sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahū^eb^ti imaṃ brahmalokaṃ upagantuṃ samattho natthi koci ^a^V2.0420^ea^ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, satthu idhāgamanato pubbe yā tuyhaṃ diṭṭhi ahosi, kiṃ ajjāpi idānipi sā diṭṭhi na vigatāti? ^b^passasi vītivattantaṃ, brahmaloke pabhassara^eb^nti brahmaloke vītipatantaṃ mahākappinamahākassapādīhi sāvakehi parivāritassa tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnassa sasāvakassa bhagavato obhāsaṃ passasīti attho. ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā brahmaloke sudhammāya sabhāya sannipatitvā sannisinnassa -- ``atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṃmahiddhiko, yo idha āgantuṃ sakkuṇeyyā''ti cintentassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0498^ea^ cittamaññāya tattha gantvā brahmuno matthake ākāse nisinno tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā obhāsaṃ muñcanto mahāmoggallānādīnaṃ āgamanaṃ cintesi. saha cintanena tepi tattha gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthu ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā tejodhātuṃ ^a^P3.0175^ea^ samāpajjitvā paccekadisāsu nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjitvā sakalabrahmaloko ekobhāso ahosi. satthā brahmuno kallacittataṃ ñatvā catusaccapakāsanaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. desanāpariyosāne anekāni brahmasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhahiṃsu, taṃ sandhāya codento ^b^``ajjāpi tyāvuso, sā diṭṭhī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo. vuttañhetaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 1.176) --

[02] ``ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti -- `natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā'ti. atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. atha kho bhagavā tassa brahmuno upari vehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā.

[02] ``atha kho āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa etadahosi -- `kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī'ti? addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya, evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno puratthimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno ^a^M2.0499^ea^ uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.

[02] ``atha ^a^V2.0421^ea^ kho āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi -- `kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī'ti? addasā kho āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.

[02] ``atha kho āyasmato mahākappinassa etadahosi -- `kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī'ti? addasā kho āyasmā mahākappino bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi. atha kho āyasmā mahākappino pacchimaṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno. uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato.

[02] ``atha kho āyasmato anuruddhassa etadahosi -- `kahaṃ nu kho bhagavā etarahi viharatī'ti? addasā kho āyasmā anuruddho bhagavantaṃ dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisinnaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpannaṃ. disvāna seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso...pe0... evameva jetavane antarahito tasmiṃ brahmaloke pāturahosi ^a^P3.0176^ea^. atha kho āyasmā anuruddho uttaraṃ disaṃ nissāya tassa brahmuno uparivehāsaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nīcataraṃ bhagavato. atha ^a^M2.0500^ea^ kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --
[21] ``ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu.
[21] ``na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu.
[22] svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato''ti..

[02] ``atha kho bhagavā taṃ brahmānaṃ saṃvejetvā seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso...pe0... ^a^V2.0422^ea^ evameva tasmiṃ brahmaloke antarahito jetavane pāturahosi. atha kho so brahmā aññataraṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ āmantesi -- `ehi tvaṃ, mārisa, yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkama, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ evaṃ vadehi `atthi nu kho mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo, kappino, anuruddho'''ti. ``evaṃ, mārisā''ti kho so brahmapārisajjo tassa brahmuno paṭissutvā yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca -- ``atthi nu kho, mārisa moggallāna, aññepi tassa bhagavato sāvakā evaṃmahiddhikā evaṃmahānubhāvā seyyathāpi bhavaṃ moggallāno, kassapo, kappino, anuruddho''ti. atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ brahmapārisajjaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi --

[02] ``atha kho so brahmapārisajjo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā yena so brahmā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ brahmānaṃ etadavoca -- āyasmā, mārisa mahāmoggallāno evamāha --
[02] ``idamavoca so brahmapārisajjo. attamano ca so brahmā tassa brahmapārisajjassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandī''ti.
[03] idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``ayaṃ panattho bakabrahmasuttena dīpetabbo''ti.

[03] ^b^mahāneruno kūṭa^eb^nti kūṭasīsena sakalameva sinerupabbatarājaṃ vadati. ^b^vimokkhena aphassayī^eb^ti jhānavimokkhanissayena abhiññāṇena phassayīti adhippāyo. ^b^vana^eb^nti jambudīpaṃ. so hi vanabahulatāya ``vana''nti vutto. tenāha ``jambusaṇḍassa issaro''ti. ^b^pubbavidehāna^eb^nti pubbavidehaṭṭhānaṃ, pubbavidehanti attho. ^b^ye ca bhūmisayā narā^eb^ti bhūmisayā narā nāma ^a^P3.0177^ea^ aparagoyānakā ca uttarakurukā ca manussā. te hi gehābhāvato ``bhūmisayā''ti vuttā. tepi sabbe aphassayīti sambandho. ayaṃ panattho nandopanandadamanena (visuddhi0 2.396 nandopanandanāgadamanakathā) dīpetabbo --

[03] ``ekasmiṃ ^a^V2.0423^ea^ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā `sve, bhante, pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā'ti nimantetvā pakkāmi. taṃdivasañca bhagavato paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokentassa ^b^nandopanando^eb^ nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchi. bhagavā `ayaṃ nāgarājā mayhaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchati, kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī'ti āvajjento saraṇagamanassa upanissayaṃ disvā `ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasanno, ko nu kho imaṃ micchādiṭṭhito vimoceyyā'ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṃ addasa.

[03] ``tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi -- `ānanda, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṃ gacchatī'ti. taṃdivasañca nandopanandassa āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsu. so dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena dhāriyamāno tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṃ annapānavidhiṃ ^a^M2.0502^ea^ olokayamāno nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavā yathā nāgarājā passati, tathā katvā tassa vimānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ tāvatiṃsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.

[03] ``tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti -- `ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṃ uparibhavanena devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ bhavanaṃ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi, na idāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṃ amhākaṃ matthake pādapaṃsuṃ okirantānaṃ gantuṃ dassāmī'ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṃ gantvā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ avakujjena phaṇena paṭiggahetvā adassanaṃ gamesi.

[03] ``atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- `pubbe, bhante, imasmiṃ padese ṭhito sineruṃ passāmi, sineruparibhaṇḍaṃ passāmi, tāvatiṃsaṃ passāmi, vejayantaṃ passāmi, vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmi. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yaṃ etarahi neva sineruṃ passāmi...pe0... na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṃ passāmī'ti? ayaṃ, raṭṭhapāla, nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṃ kupito sineruṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṃ katvā ṭhitoti. `damemi ^a^P3.0178^ea^ naṃ, bhante'ti. na bhagavā naṃ anujāni. atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṃsu. na bhagavā anujāni.

[03] ``avasāne ^a^V2.0424^ea^ mahāmoggallānatthero `ahaṃ, bhante, damemi na'nti āha. `damehi, moggallānā'ti bhagavā anujāni. thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā mahantaṃ nāgarājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā nandopanandaṃ cuddasakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇassa matthake attano phaṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṃ abhinippīḷesi. nāgarājā dhūmāyi. thero `na tuyhaṃyeva sarīre dhūmo atthi, mayhampi atthī'ti dhūmāyi. nāgarājassa dhūmo theraṃ na bādhati. therassa pana dhūmo nāgarājaṃ bādhati. tato nāgarājā pajjali. theropi `na tuyhaṃyeva sarīre aggi atthi, mayhampi atthī'ti pajjali. nāgarājassa tejo theraṃ na bādhati, therassa pana tejo nāgarājaṃ bādhati. nāgarājā `ayaṃ maṃ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā dhūmāyati ceva ^a^M2.0503^ea^ pajjalati cā'ti cintetvā, `bho, tuvaṃ kosī'ti paṭipucchi. ahaṃ kho, nanda, moggallānoti. bhante, attano bhikkhubhāvena tiṭṭhāhī''ti.

[03] ``thero taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena nikkhami, vāmakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena nikkhami. tathā dakkhiṇanāsasotena pavisitvā vāmanāsasotena nikkhami, vāmanāsasotena pavisitvā dakkhiṇanāsasotena nikkhami. tato nāgarājā mukhaṃ vivari. thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṃ pācīnena ca pacchimena ca caṅkamati. bhagavā `moggallāna, manasi karohi mahiddhiko nāgo'ti āha. thero `mayhaṃ kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante, nandopanando, ahaṃ nandopanandasadisānaṃ nāgarājānaṃ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya'nti āha.

[03] ``nāgarājā cintesi -- `pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho, nikkhamanakāle dāni naṃ dāṭhāntare pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī'ti cintetvā `nikkhamatha, bhante, mā maṃ antokucchiyaṃ aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto bādhayitthā'ti āha. thero nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. nāgarājā `ayaṃ so'ti disvā nāsavātaṃ vissajji. thero catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji, lomakūpampissa vāto cāletuṃ nāsakkhi. `avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyuṃ, imaṃ pana ṭhānaṃ patvā evaṃ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṃ nāsakkhissantī'ti nesaṃ bhagavā nāgarājadamanaṃ nānujāni.

[03] ``nāgarājā ^a^P3.0179^ea^ `ahaṃ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, mahiddhiko so samaṇo'ti cintesi. thero attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṃ nimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṃ ^a^V2.0425^ea^ dassento nāgarājānaṃ anubandhi, nāgarājā taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā, `bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī'ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi. thero `satthā, nando āgato, ehi tvaṃ, gamissāmā'ti nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ katvā, gahetvā bhagavato ^a^M2.0504^ea^ santikaṃ agamāsi. nāgarājā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā `bhante, tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī'ti āha. bhagavā `sukhī hohi, nāgarājā'ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.

[03] ``anāthapiṇḍiko `kiṃ, bhante, atidivā āgatatthā'ti āha. moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. kassa pana, bhante, jayo, kassa parājayoti? moggallānassa jayo, nandassa parājayoti. anāthapiṇḍiko `adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapaṭipāṭiyā bhattaṃ, sattāhaṃ therassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī'ti vatvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsi. tena vuttaṃ -- `nandopanandadamanena dīpetabbo'''ti.
[03] ^b^yo etamabhijānātī^eb^ti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ vimokkhaṃ phusanakaraṇavasena jānāti.

[03] ^b^na ve aggi cetayati, ahaṃ bālaṃ ḍahāmī^eb^ti evaṃ na aggi abhisaṃceteti, nāpi ḍahanāya payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti, bālo eva pana ``ayaṃ mandāgatī''ti anijalantaṃ viya jalitaṃ aggiṃ āsajja naṃ paḍayhati, evameva, māra, na mayaṃ ḍahitukāmā, bādhetukāmā, tvaññeva pana tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgataṃ aggikhandhasadisaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ āsajja attānaṃ ḍahissasi, ḍahadukkhato na muñcissasi.
[03] ^b^apuññaṃ pasavī^eb^ti apuññaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^na me pāpaṃ vipaccatī^eb^ti mama pāpaṃ na vipaccati, kiṃ nu, māra, evaṃ maññasi nayidamatthi.

[03] ^b^karoto te cīyate pāpa^eb^nti ekaṃsena karontassa te pāpaṃ cirarattāya cirakālaṃ anatthāya dukkhāya upacīyati. ^b^māra, nibbinda buddhamhā^eb^ti catusaccabuddhato buddhasāvakato nibbinda nibbijja parato kammaṃ. ^b^āsaṃ mākāsi bhikkhusū^eb^ti ``bhikkhū virodhemi vihesemī''ti etaṃ āsaṃ mākāsi.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^māraṃ atajjesī^eb^ti, ``māra, nibbinda...pe0... bhikkhusū''ti āyasmā mahāmoggallāno. ^b^bhesakaḷāvane^eb^ti ^a^P3.0180^ea^ evaṃnāmake araññe. ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0505^ea^ tajjanahetu. ^b^so dummano yakkho^eb^ti ^a^V2.0426^ea^ so māro domanassiko hutvā tattheva tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne antaradhāyi, adassanaṃ agamāsi. ayañca gāthā dhammasaṅgāyanakāle ṭhapitā. yaṃ panettha antarantarā atthato na vibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānameva.

[03] evamayaṃ mahāthero māraṃ tajjetvā devacārikānarakacārikādivasena aññehi sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ sattūpakāraṃ katvā āyupariyosāne parinibbāyi. parinibbāyanto ca anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle paṇidhānaṃ katvā tato paṭṭhāya tattha tattha bhave uḷārāni puññāni katvā sāvakapāramiyā matthake ṭhitopi antarā katassa pāpakammassa vasena uṭṭhitāya kammapilotikāya titthiyehi uyyojitehi corehi bādhito anappakaṃ sarīrakhedaṃ katvā parinibbāyi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 1.1.375, 380-397) --
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[21] ``asmimānaṃ ^a^M2.0507^ea^ na passāmi, māno mayhaṃ na vijjati.

[03] sattatinipāte ^a^M2.0508^ea^ ^a^V2.0428^ea^ ^b^nikkhantaṃ vata maṃ santa^eb^ntiādikā āyasmato vaṅgīsattherassa gāthā. kā uppatti? ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto, purimanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā satthu adhikārakammaṃ katvā -- ``ahampi anāgate paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggo bhaveyya''nti patthanaṃ katvā, satthārā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā ^b^vaṅgīso^eb^ti laddhanāmo tayo bede uggaṇhanto ācariyaṃ ārādhetvā, chavasīsamantaṃ nāma sikkhitvā chavasīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā ``ayaṃ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto''ti jānāti.

[03] brāhmaṇā ``ayaṃ amhākaṃ jīvitamaggo''ti ñatvā vaṅgīsaṃ gahetvā paṭicchannayāne nisīdāpetvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo vicaranti. vaṅgīsopi tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ āharāpetvā nakhena ākoṭetvā ``ayaṃ ^a^P3.0181^ea^ satto asukayoniyaṃ nibbatto''ti vatvā mahājanassa kaṅkhacchedanatthaṃ te te jane āvāhetvā attano attano gatiṃ kathāpeti. tena tasmiṃ mahājano abhippasīdati. so taṃ nissāya mahājanassa hatthato satampi sahassampi labhatīti. brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsamādāya yathāruciṃ vicaritvā puna sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. vaṅgīso satthu guṇe sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi. brāhmaṇā ``samaṇo gotamo māyāya taṃ āvaṭṭessatī''ti paṭikkhipiṃsu. vaṅgīso tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

[03] taṃ satthā pucchi -- ``vaṅgīsa, kiñci sippaṃ jānāsī''ti? ``āma, bho gotama, chavasīsamantaṃ nāma jānāmi. tena tivassamatthake matānampi sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī''ti. satthā tassa ekaṃ niraye nibbattassa ^a^M2.0509^ea^ sīsaṃ dassesi, ekaṃ manussesu ^a^V2.0429^ea^, ekaṃ devesu, ekaṃ parinibbutassa sīsaṃ dassesi. so paṭhamaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā, ``bho gotama, ayaṃ satto niraye nibbatto''ti āha. ``sādhu, vaṅgīsa, suṭṭhu tayā diṭṭhaṃ. ayaṃ satto kuhiṃ nibbatto''ti pucchi. ``manussaloke''ti. ``ayaṃ kuhi''nti? ``devaloke''ti tiṇṇannampi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. parinibbutassa pana sīsaṃ nakhena ākoṭento neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ passi. atha naṃ satthā ``na sakkosi vaṅgīsā''ti pucchi. ``upaparikkhāmi tāvā''ti punappunaṃ parivattetvā ākoṭentopi bāhirakamantena khīṇāsavassa gatiṃ kathaṃ jānissati, athassa matthakato sedo mucci. so lajjitvā tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi. atha naṃ satthā -- ``kilamasi, vaṅgīsā''ti āha. ``āma, bho gotama, imassa uppannaṭṭhānaṃ jānituṃ na sakkomi, sace tumhe jānātha, kathethā''ti. ``vaṅgīsa, ahaṃ etampi jānāmi, ito uttaritarampi jānāmī''ti vatvā --
[22] asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ..
[22] khīṇāsavaṃ arahantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa''nti.. (dha0 pa0 419-420; su0 ni0 648-649) --

[25] imā dve gāthā abhāsi. vaṅgīso ``tena hi, bho gotama, taṃ vijjaṃ me dethā''ti apacitiṃ dassetvā satthu santike nisīdi. satthā ``amhehi samānaliṅgassa demā''ti āha. vaṅgīso ``yaṃkiñci katvā mayā imaṃ mantaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti brāhmaṇe āha -- ``tumhe mayi pabbajante mā cintayittha, ahaṃ mantaṃ uggaṇhitvā sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi, tumhākampi ^a^P3.0182^ea^ tena bhaddakameva bhavissatī''ti mantatthāya satthusantikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. tadā ca thero nigrodhakappo bhagavato santike ṭhito hoti, taṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi -- ``nigrodhakappa, imaṃ pabbājehī''ti. so satthu āṇāya taṃ pabbājesi. athassa satthā ``mantaparivāraṃ tāva uggaṇhāhī''ti dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānañca ācikkhi. so dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantova vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. brāhmaṇā vaṅgīsaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``kiṃ, bho vaṅgīsa, samaṇasma gotamassa santike sippaṃ sikkhita''nti ^a^M2.0510^ea^ pucchiṃsu. ``kiṃ sippasikkhanena, gacchatha tumhe, na mayhaṃ tumhehi kattabbakicca''nti. brāhmaṇā ``tvampi dāni samaṇassa gotamassa vasaṃ āpanno, māyāya āvaṭṭito, kiṃ mayaṃ tava santike karissāmā''ti āgatamaggeneva pakkamiṃsu. vaṅgīsatthero vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^apadāne^eb^ (apa0 thera 2.55.96-142) --
[22] devā naro vā brahmā vā, paṭivattā na vijjati..
[22] guṇaṃ bahuṃ pakittetvā, etadagge ṭhapesi taṃ..
[22] namo te sabbalokagga, namo te abhayaṃ kara..
[22] namo te santisukhada, namo te saraṇaṃ kara..
[22] yo so buddhaṃ abhojesi, sattāhaṃ sahasāvakaṃ..
[22] gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati..
[22] vaṅgīso nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako..
[21] ``taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ.
[21] ``pacchime ^a^M2.0512^ea^ ca bhave dāni, jāto vippakule ahaṃ.
[22] vaṅgīso iti me nāmaṃ, abhavī lokasammataṃ..
[22] tadā so paṇḍito vīro, uttariṃ samavoca me..
[22] mamāha vadataṃ seṭṭho, kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi..
[22] takkikā panimā gāthā, ṭhānaso paṭibhanti taṃ..
[22] tena hi dāni vaṅgīsa, ṭhānaso santhavāhi maṃ..
[22] ṭhānaso me tadā tuṭṭho, jino agge ṭhapesi maṃ..
[22] yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vaṅgīso, evaṃ dhāretha bhikkhavo..
[21] ``satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha.
[22] tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ..

[03] arahā ^a^V2.0433^ea^ pana hutvā thero satthu santikaṃ gacchanto cakkhupathato paṭṭhāya candena, sūriyena, ākāsena, mahāsamuddena, sinerunā pabbatarājena, sīhena migaraññā, hatthināgenāti tena tena saddhiṃ upamento anekehi padasatehi satthāraṃ vaṇṇentova upagacchati. tena taṃ satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭibhānavantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. atha therena arahattappattito pubbe ca pacchā ca taṃ taṃ cittaṃ āgamma bhāsitā. theraṃ uddissa ānandattherādīhi bhāsitā ca --
[22] neva maṃ byādhayissanti, dhamme samhi patiṭṭhito..
[22] nibbānagamanaṃ maggaṃ, tattha me nirato mano..
[22] tathā maccu karissāmi, na me maggampi dakkhasi..
[22] vanathaṃ na kareyya kuhiñci, nibbanatho avanatho sa bhikkhu..
[22] parijīyati sabbamaniccaṃ, evaṃ samecca caranti mutattā..
[21] ``upadhīsu janā gadhitāse, diṭṭhasute paṭighe ca mute ca.
[22] ettha vinodaya chandamanejo, yo hettha na limpati muni tamāhu..
[22] na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñci, no pana duṭṭhullagāhī sa bhikkhu..
[22] santaṃ padaṃ ajjhagamā muni, paṭicca parinibbuto kaṅkhati kālaṃ..
[22] socanti janā cirarattaṃ, mānahatā nirayaṃ upapannā..
[21] ``na ^a^V2.0434^ea^ hi socati bhikkhu kadāci, maggajino sammā paṭipanno.
